analyzed: t atha śrī tantrālokaḥ
prathamam āhnikam
vimala kalā āśraya abhinava sṛṣṭi mahā jananī bharita tanuḥ ca pañcamukha gupta ruciḥ janakaḥ
tad ubhaya yāmala sphurita bhāva visarga mayam hṛdayam anuttara amṛta kulam mama sasphuratāt

original: AbhT_1.2a/. naumi citpratibhāṃ devīṃ parāṃ bhairavayoginīm /
analyzed: naumi cit pratibhām devīm parām bhairava yoginīm
mātṛmān aprameya aṃśa śūla ambuja kṛta āspadām

original: AbhT_1.3a/. naumi devīṃ śarīrasthāṃ nṛtyato bhairavākṛte /
analyzed: naumi devīm śarīra sthām nṛtyataḥ bhairava ākṛte
prāvṛṣ megha ghana vyoma vidyut lekhā vilāsinīm
stād jñāna śūlam sat pakṣa vipakṣa utkartana kṣamam

original: AbhT_1.5a/. svātantryaśaktiḥ kramasaṃsisṛkṣā kramātmatā ceti vibhorvibhūtiḥ /
analyzed: svātantrya śaktiḥ krama saṃsisṛkṣā krama ātma tā ca iti vibhoḥ vibhūtiḥ
tat eva devī trayam antar āstām anuttaram me prathayat svarūpam

original: AbhT_1.6b/. devīsuto gaṇapatiḥ sphuradindukāntiḥ samyaksamucchalayatānmama saṃvidabdhim // 6
analyzed: devī sutaḥ gaṇapatiḥ sphurat indu kāntiḥ samyak samucchalayatāt mama saṃvid abdhim
rāga aruṇām granthi bila avakīrṇa yaḥ jālam ātāna vitāna vṛtti

original: AbhT_1.7b/. kalombhitaṃ bāhyapathe cakāra stānme sa macchandavibhuḥ prasannaḥ // 7
analyzed: bāhya pathe cakāra stād me sa mad chanda vibhuḥ prasannaḥ
pūrve jayanti guravaḥ guru śāstra sindhu kallola keli kalana amala karṇadhārāḥ

original: AbhT_1.9a/. jayati gurureka eva śrīśrīkaṇṭho bhuvi prathitaḥ /
analyzed: jayati guruḥ ekaḥ eva śrī śrīkaṇṭhaḥ bhuvi prathitaḥ
tad apara mūrtiḥ bhagavān maheśvaraḥ bhūti rājaḥ ca
jayanti saṃvid āmoda sandarbhāḥ diś prasarpiṇaḥ
tad āsvāda bhara āveśa bṛṃhitām mati ṣaṭpadīm
guroḥ lakṣmaṇaguptasya nāda saṃmohinīm numaḥ

original: AbhT_1.12b/. sa śrīcukhulako diśyādiṣṭaṃ me gururuttamaḥ // 12
analyzed: sa śrī cukhulakaḥ diśi ādiṣṭam me guruḥ uttamaḥ

original: AbhT_1.13a/. jayatājjagaduddhṛtikṣamo@sau bhagavatyā saha śaṃbhunātha ekaḥ /
analyzed: jayatāt jagat uddhṛti kṣamaḥ asau bhagavatyā saha śaṃbhu nāthaḥ ekaḥ
yad udīrita śāsana aṃśubhiḥ me prakaṭaḥ yam gahanaḥ api śāstra mārgaḥ
santi paddhatayaḥ citrāḥ srotaḥ bhedeṣu bhūyasā
anuttara ṣaṣ ardha artha krame tu ekā api na īkṣyate
iti aham bahuśas sadbhiḥ śiṣya sabrahmacāribhiḥ

original: AbhT_1.15b/. arthito racaye spaṣṭāṃ pūrṇārthā prakriyāmimām // 15
analyzed: arthitaḥ racaye spaṣṭām pūrṇa arthā prakriyām imām
śrī bhaṭṭanātha caraṇa abja yugāt tathā śrī bhaṭṭārikā aṃghri yugalāt guru santatiḥ yā
na tat asti iha yat na śrīmālinīvijayottare
devadevena nirdiṣṭam sva śabdena atha liṅgataḥ
daśa aṣṭādaśa vasu aṣṭa bhinnam yat śāsanam vibhoḥ

original: AbhT_1.18b/. tatsāraṃ trikaśāstraṃ hi tatsāraṃ mālinīmatam // 18
analyzed: tad sāram trikaśāstram hi tad sāram mālinīmatam
a totra antargatam sarva saṃpradāya ujjhitaiḥ budhaiḥ
adṛṣṭa prakaṭīkurmaḥ gurunā atha ājñayā vayam

original: AbhT_1.20a/. abhinavaguptasya kṛtiḥ seyaṃ yasyoditā gurubhirākhyā /
analyzed: abhinavaguptasya kṛtiḥ sā iyam yasya uditā gurubhiḥ ākhyā
trinayana caraṇa saroruha cintana labdha prasiddhiḥ iti
śrī śambhunātha bhāskara caraṇa nipāta prabhā apagata saṃkocam
abhinavagupta hṛd ambujam etat vicinuta maheśa pūjana hetoḥ
ādi vākyam
iha tāvat samasteṣu śāstreṣu parigīyate
ajñānam saṃsṛteḥ hetuḥ jñānam mokṣa eka kāraṇam
malam ajñānam icchanti saṃsāra aṅkura kāraṇam

original: AbhT_1.23b/. iti proktaṃ tathā va śrīmalinīvijayottare // 23
analyzed: iti proktam tathā va śrīmalinīvijayottare
viśeṣaṇena buddhi sthe saṃsāra uttarakālike
saṃbhāvanām nirasya etat abhāve mokṣam abravīt
ajñānam iti na jñāna abhāvaḥ ca atiprasaṅgataḥ

original: AbhT_1.25b/. sa hi loṣṭādike@pyasti na ca tasyāsti saṃsṛtiḥ // 25
analyzed: sa hi loṣṭa ādike api asti na ca tasya asti saṃsṛtiḥ
atas jñeyasya tattvasya sāmastyena a prathā ātmakam
jñānam eva tat ajñānam śivasūtreṣu bhāṣitam

original: AbhT_1.27a/. caitanyamātmā jñānaṃ ca bandha ityatra sūtrayoḥ /
analyzed: caitanyam ātmā jñānam ca bandhaḥ iti atra sūtrayoḥ
saṃśleṣa itara yoga āśyām ayam arthaḥ pradarśitaḥ
caitanyam iti bhāva antaḥ śabdaḥ svātantrya mātrakam
an ākṣipra viśeṣam sadā āha sūtre purātane

original: AbhT_1.29a/. dvitīyena tu sūtreṇa kriyāṃ vā karaṇaṃ ca vā /
analyzed: dvitīyena tu sūtreṇa kriyām vā karaṇam ca vā
bruvatā tasya cit mātra rūpasya dvaitam ucyate
dvaita prathā tad ajñānam tuccha tvāt bandhaḥ ucyate
tatas eva samucchedyam iti āvṛttyā anirūpitam
svatantra ātma atiriktaḥ tu tucchaḥ api kaścana

original: AbhT_1.31b/. na mokṣo nāma tannāsya pṛthaṅnāmāpi gṛhyate // 31
analyzed: na mokṣaḥ nāma tat na asya pṛthak nāma api gṛhyate
yat tu jñeya sa tattvasya pūrṇa pūrṇa prathā ātmakam
tat uttarottaram jñānam tat tat saṃsāra śānti dam
rāga ādi akaluṣaḥ asmi antar śūnyaḥ aham kartṛ tā ujjhitaḥ

original: AbhT_1.33b/. itthaṃ samāsavyāsābhyāṃ jñānaṃ muñcati tāvataḥ // 33
analyzed: ittham samāsa vyāsābhyām jñānam muñcati tāvataḥ
tasmāt muktaḥ upi avacchedāt avaccheda antara sthiteḥ
amuktaḥ eva muktaḥ tu sarva avaccheda varjitaḥ
yat tu jñeya sa tattvasya jñānam sarva ātmanā ujjhitam
avacchedaiḥ na tat kutra api ajñānam satya mukti dam
jñāna ajñāna svarūpam yat uktam pratyekam api adaḥ
dvidhā pauruṣa bauddha tva bhidā uktam śiva śāsane

original: AbhT_1.37a/. tatra puṃso yadajñānaṃ malākhyaṃ tajjamapyaya /
analyzed: tatra puṃsaḥ yat ajñānam mala ākhyam tad jam apyaya
saṃkoci dṛkkriyā rūpam tat paśoḥ avikalpitam
tat ajñānam na budghi aṃśa udhyavasāya ādi abhāvataḥ
aham ittham idam vedmi iti evam adhyavasāyinī
ṣaṣ kañcuka bila aṇu uttha pratibimbanataḥ yadā
dhīḥ jāyate tadā tādṛś jñānam ajñāna śabditam

original: AbhT_1.40b/. bauddhaṃ tasya ca tatpauṃsnaṃ poṣaṇīyaṃ ca poṣṭṛca // 40
analyzed: bauddham tasya ca tat pauṃsnam poṣaṇīyam ca poṣṭṛ ca

original: AbhT_1.41a/. kṣīṇe tu paśusaṃskāre puṃsaḥ prāptaparasthiteḥ /
analyzed: kṣīṇe tu paśu saṃskāre puṃsaḥ prāpta para sthiteḥ
vikasvaram tat vijñānam pauruṣam nirvikalpakam
vikasvara avikalpa ātma jñāna aucityena

original: AbhT_1.42b/. tadbauddhaṃ yasya tatpauṃsnaṃ prāgvatpoṣyaṃ ca poṣṭṛ ca // 42
analyzed: tat bauddham yasya tat pauṃsnam prāgvat poṣyam ca poṣṭṛ ca

original: AbhT_1.43a/. tatra dīkṣādinā pauṃsnamajñānaṃ dhvaṃsi yadyapi /
analyzed: tatra dīkṣā ādinā pauṃsnam ajñānam dhvaṃsi yadi api

original: AbhT_1.43b/. tathāpi taccharīrānte tajjñānaṃ vyajyate sphuṭam // 43
analyzed: tathā api tat śarīra ante tat jñānam vyajyate sphuṭam
bauddha jñānena tu yadā bauddham ajñāna jṛmbhitam

original: AbhT_1.44b/. vilīyate tadā jīvanmuktiḥ karatale sthitā // 44
analyzed: vilīyate tadā jīvanmuktiḥ kara tale sthitā
dīkṣā api bauddha vijñāna pūrvā satyam vimocikā

original: AbhT_1.45b/. tena tatrāpi bauddhasya jñānasyāsti pradhānatā // 45
analyzed: tena tatra api bauddhasya jñānasya asti pradhāna tā
jñāna ajñāna āgatam ca etat dvi tvam svāyambhuve rurau
mataṅga ādau kṛtam śrīmat kheṭapāla ādi daiśikaiḥ
tathāvidha avasāya ātma bauddha vijñāna sampade
śāstram eva pradhānam yat jñeya tattva pradarśakam
dīkṣayā galite ipi antar ajñāne pauruṣa ātmani
dhī gatasya anivṛtta tvāt vikalpaḥ api hi saṃbhaveta
deha sadbhāva paryantam ātma bhāvaḥ yatas dhiyi
dehānte api na mokṣaḥ syāt pauruṣa ajñāna hānitaḥ
bauddha ajñāna nivṛttau tu vikalpa unmūlanāt dhruvam

original: AbhT_1.50b/. tadaiva mokṣa ityuktaṃ dhātrā śrīmanniśāṭane // 50
analyzed: tadā eva mokṣaḥ iti uktam dhātrā śrīmat niśāṭane
vikalpa yukta citaḥ tu piṇḍa pātāt śivam brajet
itaraḥ tu tadā eva iti śāstrasya atra pradhānataḥ

original: AbhT_1.52a/. jñeyasya hi paraṃ tattvaṃ yaḥ prakāśātmakaḥ śivaḥ /
analyzed: jñeyasya hi param tattvam yaḥ prakāśa ātmakaḥ śivaḥ
na hi aprakāśa rūpasya prākāśyam vastu tā api vā
avastu tā api bhāvānām camatkāra eka gocarā
yat kuḍya sadṛśī na iyam dhīra vastu etat iti api

original: AbhT_1.54a/. prakāśo nāma yaścāyaṃ sarvatraiva prakāśate /
analyzed: prakāśaḥ nāma yaḥ ca ayam sarvatra eva prakāśate
anapahnavanīya tvāt kim tasmin māna kalpanaiḥ

original: AbhT_1.55a/. pramāṇānyapi vastūnāṃ jīvitaṃ yāni tanvate /
analyzed: pramāṇāni api vastūnām jīvitam yāni tanvate

original: AbhT_1.55b/. teṣāmapi paro jīvaḥ sa eva parameśvaraḥ // 55
analyzed: teṣām api paraḥ jīvaḥ saḥ eva parameśvaraḥ
sarva apahnava hevāka dharmā api evam hi vartate
jñānam ātma artham iti etat na iti mām prati bhāsate
apahnutau sādhane vā vastūnām ādyam īdṛśam
yat tatra ke pramāṇānām upapatti upayogi te
rooth
kāmike tatas eva uktam hetuvāda vivarjitam

original: AbhT_1.59b/. tasya devātidevasya parāpekṣā na vidyate // 59
analyzed: tasya devātidevasya para apekṣā na vidyate
parasya tad apekṣa tvāt svatantraḥ yam atas sthitaḥ
anapekṣasya vaśinaḥ deśa kāla ākṛti kramāḥ

original: AbhT_1.61a/. niyatā neti sa vibhurnityo viśvākṛtiḥ śivaḥ /
analyzed: niyatāḥ na iti sa vibhuḥ nityaḥ viśva ākṛtiḥ śivaḥ
vibhu tvāt sarva gaḥ nitya bhāvāt ādi anta varjitaḥ
viśva ākṛti tvāt cit acit tad vaicitrya avabhāsakaḥ
tatas asya bahu rūpa tvam uktam dīkṣā uttara ādike

original: AbhT_1.63a/. bhuvanaṃ vigraho jyotiḥ khaṃ śabdo mantra eva ca /
analyzed: bhuvanam vigrahaḥ jyotiḥ kham śabdaḥ mantraḥ eva ca
bindu nāda ādi saṃbhinnaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ śivaḥ ucyate
yaḥ yad ātmaka tā niṣṭhaḥ tad bhāvam sa prapadyate
vyoma ādi śabda vijñānāt paraḥ mokṣaḥ na saṃśayaḥ
viśva ākṛti tve devasya tat etat ca upalakṣaṇam
anavacchinna tā ārūḍhau avaccheda laya isya ca

original: AbhT_1.66a/. uktaṃ ca kāmike devaḥ sarvākṛtirnirākṛtiḥ /
analyzed: uktam ca kāmike devaḥ sarva ākṛtiḥ nirākṛtiḥ
jala darpaṇa vat tena sarvam vyāptam carācaram

original: AbhT_1.67a/. na cāsya vimutādyo@yaṃ dharmo@nyonyaṃ vibhidyate /
analyzed: na ca asya vimuta ādyaḥ yaḥ ayam dharmaḥ nyonyam vibhidyate

original: AbhT_1.67b/. eka evāsya dharmo@sau sarvākṣepeṇa vartate // 67
analyzed: ekaḥ eva asya dharmaḥ asau sarva ākṣepeṇa vartate

original: AbhT_1.68a/. tena svātantryaśaktyaiva yukta ityāñjaso vidhiḥ /
analyzed: tena svātantrya śaktyā eva yuktaḥ iti āñjasaḥ vidhiḥ
bahu śakti tvam api asya tad śaktyā eva a viyukta tā

original: AbhT_1.69a/. śaktiśca nāma bhāvasya svaṃ rūpaṃ mātṛkalpitam /
analyzed: śaktiḥ ca nāma bhāvasya svam rūpam mātṛ kalpitam
tena advayaḥ saḥ eva api śaktimat parikalpane

original: AbhT_1.70a/. mātṛklṛpte hi devasya tatra tatra vapuṣyalam /
analyzed: mātṛ klṛpte hi devasya tatra tatra vapuṣi alam
kaḥ bhedaḥ vastutas vahneḥ dagdhṛ paktṛ tvayoḥ iva

original: AbhT_1.71a/. na vāsau paramārthena na kiṃcidbhāsanādṛte /
analyzed: na vā asau paramārthena na kiṃcid bhāsanāt ṛte
na hi asti kiṃcid tad śakti tadvat bhedaḥ api vāstavaḥ
sva śakti udreka janakam tādātmyāt vastunaḥ hi yat
śaktiḥ tat api devī evam bhānti api anya svarūpiṇī
śivaḥ ca alupta vibhavaḥ tathā sṛṣṭaḥ uvabhāsate
tasmāt yena mukhena eṣa bhāti anaṃśaḥ pi tat tathā
śaktiḥ iti eṣa vastu eva śakti tadvat kramaḥ sphuṭaḥ
śrīmat kiraṇaśāstre ca tad praśna uttara pūrvakam

original: AbhT_1.75b/. anubhāvo vikalpo@pi mānaso na manaḥ śive // 75
analyzed: anubhāvaḥ vikalpaḥ api mānasaḥ na manaḥ śive

original: AbhT_1.76a/. avijñāya śivaṃ dīkṣā kathamityatra cottaram /
analyzed: a vijñāya śivam dīkṣā katham iti atra ca uttaram

original: AbhT_1.76b/. kṣudhādyanubhavo naiva vikalpo nahi mānasaḥ // 76
analyzed: kṣudhā ādi anubhavaḥ na eva vikalpaḥ na hi mānasaḥ
rasa ādi anadhyakṣa tve pi rūpāt eva yathā tarum

original: AbhT_1.77b/. vikalpo vetti tadvattu nādabindvādinā śivam // 77
analyzed: vikalpaḥ vetti tadvat tu nādabindu ādinā śivam
bahu śakti tvam asya uktam śivasya yat atas mahān
kalā tattva pura arṇa aṇu pada ādiḥ bheda vistaraḥ
sṛṣṭi sthiti tirodhāna saṃhāra anugraha ādi ca
turyam iti api devasya bahu śakti tva jṛmbhitam
jāgrat svapna suṣupta anya tad atītāni yāni api
tāni api amuṣya nāthasya svātantrya laharī bharaḥ
mahā mantra īśa mantreśa mantrāḥ śiva purogamāḥ
akalau sakalaḥ ca iti śivasya eva vibhūtayaḥ
tattva grāmasya sarvasya dharmaḥ syāt an apāyavān
ātmā eva hi svabhāva ātmā iti uktam śrī triśiromate
hṛdistham sarva deha stham sva bhāva stham su sūkṣmakam

original: AbhT_1.83b/. sāmūhyaṃ caiva tattvānāṃ grāmaśabdena kīrtitam // 83
analyzed: sāmūhyam ca eva tattvānām grāma śabdena kīrtitam
ātmā eva dharmaḥ iti uktaḥ śiva amṛta pariplutaḥ
prakāśa avasthitam jñānam bhāva abhāva ādi madhyataḥ

original: AbhT_1.85a/. svasthāne vartanaṃ jñeyaṃ draṣṭṛtvaṃ vigatāvṛti /
analyzed: sva sthāne vartanam jñeyam draṣṭṛ tvam vigata āvṛti
grāma dharma vṛttiḥ uktaḥ tasya sarvam prasiddhi ati

original: AbhT_1.86b/. ūrdhva tyaktvādho viśetsa rāmastho madhyadeśagaḥ // 86
analyzed: tyaktvā adhas viśet sa rāma sthaḥ madhyadeśa gaḥ
gatiḥ sthānam svapna jāgrat unmeṣaṇa nimeṣaṇe

original: AbhT_1.87b/. dhāvanaṃ plavanaṃ caiva āyāsaḥ śaktivedanam // 87
analyzed: dhāvanam plavanam ca eva āyāsaḥ śakti vedanam
buddhi bhedāḥ tathā bhāvāḥ saṃjñāḥ karmāṇi anekaśas

original: AbhT_1.88b/. eṣa rāmo vyāpako@tra śivaḥ paramakāraṇam // 88
analyzed: eṣa rāmaḥ vyāpakaḥ utra śivaḥ parama kāraṇam
kalmaṣa kṣīṇa manasā smṛti mātra nirodhanāt

original: AbhT_1.89b/. dhyāyate paramaṃ dhyeyaṃ gamāgamapade sthitam // 89
analyzed: dhyāyate paramam dhyeyam gama āgama pade sthitam

original: AbhT_1.90a/. paraṃ śivaṃ tu vrajati bhairavākhyaṃ japādapi /
analyzed: param śivam tu vrajati bhairava ākhyam japāt api
tad svarūpam japaḥ proktaḥ bhāva abhāva pada cyutaḥ
tat atra api tadīyena svātantryeṇa upakalpitaḥ
dūra āsanna ādikaḥ bhedaḥ cit svātantrya vyapekṣayā
evam svātantrya pūrṇa tvāt ati durghaṭa kārī ayam

original: AbhT_1.92b/. kena nāma na rūpeṇa bhāsate parameśvaraḥ // 92
analyzed: kena nāma na rūpeṇa bhāsate parameśvaraḥ
nirāvaraṇam ābhāti bhāti ābṛta nija ātmakaḥ
āvṛta anāvṛtaḥ bhāti bahudhā bheda saṃgamāt
iti śakti trayam nāthe svātantrya apara nāmakam
icchā ādibhiḥ abhikhyābhiḥ gurubhiḥ prakaṭīkṛtam
devaḥ hi anvartha śāstra uktaiḥ śabdaiḥ samupadiśyate
mahābhairava devā iyam patiḥ yaḥ paramaḥ śivaḥ

original: AbhT_1.96a/. viśvaṃ bibharti pūraṇadhāraṇayogena tena ca śriyate /
analyzed: viśvam bibharti pūraṇa dhāraṇa yogena tena ca śriyate
sa vimarśa tayā rava rūpataḥ ca saṃsāra bhīru hita kṛt ca
saṃsāra bhīti janitāt ravāt parāmarśataḥ api hṛdi jātaḥ
prakaṭībhūtam bhava bhaya vimarśanam śaktipātataḥ yena
kāla grāsa samādhāna rasika manaḥsu teṣu ca prakaṭaḥ
saṃkoci paśu jana bhiye yāsām ravaṇam sva karaṇa devīnām
antar bahis caturvidha khecarī ādika gaṇasya api
tasya svāmī saṃsāra vṛtti vighaṭana mahā bhīmaḥ

original: AbhT_1.100b/. bhairava iti gurubhirimairanvarthaiḥ saṃstutaḥ śāstre // 100
analyzed: bhairavaḥ iti gurubhiḥ imaiḥ anvarthaiḥ saṃstutaḥ śāstre
heya upādeya kathā virahe sva ānanda ghana tayā ucchalanam
vyavaharaṇam abhinne pi sva ātmani bhedena saṃjalpaḥ
nikhila avabhāsanāt ca dyotanam asya stutiḥ yatas sakalam
tat pravaṇam ātmalābhāt prabhṛti samaste api kartavye
bodha ātmakaḥ samasta kriyā mayaḥ dṛkkriyā guṇaḥ ca gatiḥ

original: AbhT_1.104a/. iti nirvacanaiḥ śivatanuśāstre gurubhiḥ smṛto devaḥ /
analyzed: iti nirvacanaiḥ śivatanuśāstre gurubhiḥ smṛtaḥ devaḥ
śāsana rodhana pālana pācana yogāt sa sarvam upakurute

original: AbhT_1.104c/. tena patiḥ śreyomaya eva śivo nāśivaṃ kimapi tatra // 104
analyzed: tena patiḥ śreyaḥ mayaḥ eva śivaḥ na aśivam kim api tatra
īdṛś rūpam kiyat api rudra upendra ādiṣu sphuret yena
tena avaccheda nude parama mahat pada viśeṣaṇam upāttam
iti yat jñeya sa tattvam darśyate tat śiva ājñayā

original: AbhT_1.107a/. tasya śaktaya evaitāstisro bhānti parādikāḥ /
analyzed: tasya śaktayaḥ eva etāḥ tisraḥ bhānti parā ādikāḥ

original: AbhT_1.107b/. sṛṣṭau sthitau laye turye tenaitā dvādaśoditāḥ // 107
analyzed: sṛṣṭau sthitau laye turye tena etāḥ dvādaśa uditāḥ
tāvān pūrṇa svabhāvaḥ asau paramaḥ śivaḥ ucyate
tena atra upāsakāḥ sākṣāt tatra eva pariniṣṭhitāḥ
tāsām api ca bheda aṃśa nyūna ādhikya ādi yojanam
tat svātantrya balāt eva śāstreṣu paribhāṣitam
eka vīraḥ yāmalā utha tri śaktiḥ catur ātmakaḥ
pañca mūrtiḥ ṣaṣ ātmā ayam sapta koṣṭaka bhūṣitaḥ
dvādaśa āra mahā cakra nāyakaḥ bhairavaḥ tu iti

original: AbhT_1.112a/. evaṃ yāvatsahasrāre niḥsaṃkhyāre@pi vā prabhuḥ /
analyzed: evam yāvat sahasrāre niḥsaṃkhya āre api vā prabhuḥ
viśvacakre maheśānaḥ viśva śaktiḥ vijṛmbhate
teṣām api ca cakrāṇā sva varga anugama ātmanā

original: AbhT_1.113b/. aikyena cakrago bhedastatra tatra nirūpitaḥ // 113
analyzed: aikyena cakra gaḥ bhedaḥ tatra tatra nirūpitaḥ
catur ṣaṣ dvis dvi gaṇanā yogāt traiśirase mate
ṣaṭcakra īśvara tā nāthasya uktā citra nija ākṛteḥ
nāmāni cakra devīnām tatra kṛtya vibhedataḥ
saumya raudra ākṛti dhyāna yogīni anvartha kalpanāt

original: AbhT_1.116a/. ekasya saṃvinnāthasya hyāntarī pratibhā tanuḥ /
analyzed: ekasya saṃvid nāthasya hi āntarī pratibhā tanuḥ
saumyam vā anyat mitam saṃvid ūrmi cakram upāsyate
asya syāt puṣṭiḥ iti eṣā saṃvid devī tathā uditāt
dhyānāt saṃjalpa saṃmiśrāt vyāpārāt ca api bāhyatas

original: AbhT_1.118a/. sphuṭībhūtā satī bhāti tasya tādṛkphalapradā /
analyzed: sphuṭībhūtā satī bhāti tasya tādṛś phala pradā

original: AbhT_1.118b/. puṣṭiḥ śuṣkasya sarasībhāvo jalamataḥ sitam // 118
analyzed: puṣṭiḥ śuṣkasya sarasībhāvaḥ jalam atas sitam

original: AbhT_1.119a/. anugamya tato dhyānaṃ tatpradhānaṃ pratanyate /
analyzed: anugamya tatas dhyānam tat pradhānam pratanyate

original: AbhT_1.119b/. ye ca svabhāvato varṇā rasaniḥṣyandino yathā // 119
analyzed: ye ca svabhāvataḥ varṇāḥ rasa niḥṣyandinaḥ yathā
dantya oṣṭhya dantya prāyāḥ te kaiścid varṇaiḥ kṛtāḥ saha

original: AbhT_1.120b/. taṃ bījabhāvamāgatya saṃvidaṃ sphuṭayanti tām // 120
analyzed: tam bīja bhāvam āgatya saṃvidam sphuṭayanti tām
puṣṭim kuru rasena enam āpyāyaya tarām iti

original: AbhT_1.121b/. saṃjalpo@pi vikalpātmā kiṃ tāmeva na pūrayet // 121
analyzed: saṃjalpaḥ api vikalpa ātmā kim tām eva na pūrayet
amṛtā iyam idam kṣīram idam sarpiḥ bala āvaham
tena asya bījam puṣṇīyām iti enām pūrayet kriyām
tasmāt viśveśvaraḥ bodha bhairavaḥ samupāsyate
avaccheda an avacchidbhyām bhoga mokṣa arthibhiḥ janaiḥ
ye pi anya devatā bhaktāḥ iti atas guruḥ ādiśat

original: AbhT_1.124b/. ye bodhādvyatiriktaṃ hi kiṃcidyājyatayā viduḥ // 124
analyzed: ye bodhāt vyatiriktam hi kiṃcid yājya tayā viduḥ

original: AbhT_1.125a/. te@pi vedyaṃ viviñcānā bodhābhedena manvate /
analyzed: te api vedyam viviñcānāḥ bodha abhedena manvate
tena a vicchinna tā āmarśa rūpa ahaṃtā prathā ātmanaḥ

original: AbhT_1.126a/. svayaṃ-prathasya na vidhiḥ sṛṣṭyātmāsya ca pūrvagaḥ /
analyzed: svayam prathasya na vidhiḥ sṛṣṭi ātmā asya ca pūrva gaḥ

original: AbhT_1.126b/. vedyā hi devatāsṛṣṭiḥ śakterhetoḥ samutthitā // 126
analyzed: vedyā hi devatā sṛṣṭiḥ śakteḥ hetoḥ samutthitā
ahaṃrūpā tu saṃvittiḥ nityā sva prathana ātmikā
vidhiḥ niyogaḥ tri aṃśā ca bhāvanā codana ātmikā

original: AbhT_1.128a/. tadekasiddhā indrādyā vidhipūrvā hi devatāḥ /
analyzed: tad eka siddhāḥ indra ādyāḥ vidhi pūrvāḥ hi devatāḥ

original: AbhT_1.128b/. ahaṃbodhastu na tathā te tu saṃvedyarūpatām // 128
analyzed: ahaṃbodhaḥ tu na tathā te tu saṃvedya rūpa tām

original: AbhT_1.129a/. unmagnāmeva paśyantastaṃ vidanto@pi no viduḥ /
analyzed: unmagnām eva paśyantaḥ tam vidantaḥ api no viduḥ

original: AbhT_1.129b/. taduktaṃ na vidurmāṃ tu tattvenātaścalanti te // 129
analyzed: tat uktam na viduḥ mām tu tattvena atas calanti te
devān deva yajaḥ yānti ityādi tena nyarūpyata

original: AbhT_1.131a/. nimajjya vedyatāṃ ye tu tatra saṃvinmayīṃ sthitim /
analyzed: nimajjya vedya tām ye tu tatra saṃvid mayīm sthitim

original: AbhT_1.131b/. viduste hyanavacchinnaṃ tadbhaktā api yānti mām // 131
analyzed: viduḥ te hi anavacchinnam tad bhaktāḥ api yānti mām
sarvatra atra hi ahaṃśabdaḥ bodha mātra eka vācakaḥ
sa bhoktṛ prabhu śabdābhyām

original: AbhT_1.133a/. yājamānī saṃvideva yājyā nānyeti coditam /
analyzed: yāja mānī saṃvid eva yājyā na anyā iti ca uditam

original: AbhT_1.133b/. na tvākṛtiḥ kuto@pyanyā devatā na hi socitā // 133
analyzed: na tu ākṛtiḥ kutas api anyā devatā na hi sā ucitā

original: AbhT_1.134a/. vidhiśca noktaḥ ko@pyatra mantrādi vṛttidhāma vā /
analyzed: vidhiḥ ca nā uktaḥ kaḥ api atra mantra ādi vṛtti dhāma vā
saḥ ayam ātmānam āvṛtya sthitaḥ jaḍa padam gataḥ
āvṛta an āvṛta ātmā tu deva ādi sthāvara antagaḥ
jaḍa a jaḍasya api etasya dvairūpyasya asti citra tā

original: AbhT_1.136a/. tasya svatantrabhāvo hi kiṃ kiṃ yanna vicintayet /
analyzed: tasya svatantra bhāvaḥ hi kim kim yat na vicintayet

original: AbhT_1.136b/. taduktaṃ triśiraḥśāstre saṃbuddha iti vetti yaḥ // 136
analyzed: tat uktam triśiraḥśāstre saṃbuddhaḥ iti vetti yaḥ
jñeya bhāvaḥ hi cit dharmaḥ tad chāyā ācchādayet na tām
tena a jaḍasya bhāgasya pudgala aṇu ādi saṃjñinaḥ

original: AbhT_1.138a/. saṃvidrūpe na bhedo@sti vāstavo yadyapi dhruve /
analyzed: saṃvid rūpe na bhedaḥ usti vāstavaḥ yadi api dhruve
tathā api āvṛti nirhāsa tāratamyāt sa lakṣyate
tad vistareṇa vakṣyāmaḥ śaktipāta vinirṇaye
samāpya para tām sthaulya prasaṃge carcayiṣyate

original: AbhT_1.140a/. ataḥ kaṃcitpramātāraṃ prati prathayate vibhuḥ /
analyzed: atas kaṃcid pramātāram prati prathayate vibhuḥ
pūrṇam eva nijam rūpam kaṃcid aṃśa aṃśikā kramāt
viśva bhāva eka bhāva ātma svarūpa prathanam hi yat

original: AbhT_1.141b/. aṇūnāṃ tatparaṃ jñānaṃ tadanyadaparaṃ bahu // 141
analyzed: aṇūnām tat param jñānam tad anyat aparam bahu
tat ca sākṣāt upāyena tad upāya ādinā api ca
prathamānam vicitrābhiḥ bhaṃgībhiḥ iha bhidyate
tatra api sva para dvāra dvāri tvāt sarva śoṃśaśaḥ
bhūyān bhedaḥ pravartate

original: AbhT_1.144a/. jñānasya cābhyupāyo yo na tadajñānamucyate /
analyzed: jñānasya ca abhyupāyaḥ yaḥ na tat ajñānam ucyate

original: AbhT_1.144b/. jñānameva tu tatsūkṣmaṃ paraṃ tvicchātmakaṃ matam // 144
analyzed: jñānam eva tu tat sūkṣmam param tu icchā ātmakam matam
upāya upeya bhāvaḥ tu jñānasya sthaulya viśramaḥ
eṣā eva ca kriyāśaktiḥ bandha mokṣa eka kāraṇam
tatra ādye sva parāmarśe nirvikalpa eka dhāmani
yat sphuret prakaṭam sākṣāt tat icchā ākhyam prakīrtitam
yathā visphurita dṛśām anu sandhim vinā api alam
bhāti bhāvaḥ sphuṭaḥ tadvat keṣām api śiva ātma tā
yat parāmarśam abhyeti jñāna upāyam tu tat viduḥ
yat tu tad kalpanā klṛpta bahis bhūta artha sādhanam
kriyā upāyam tat āmnātam bhedaḥ na atra apavarga gaḥ

original: AbhT_1.150a/. yato nānyā kriyā nāma jñānameva hi tattathā /
analyzed: yatas nā anyā kriyā nāma jñānam eva hi tat tathā
rūḍheḥ yoga anta tām prāptam iti śrī gamaśāsane

original: AbhT_1.151a/. yogo nānyaḥ kriyā nānyā tattvārūḍhā hi yā matiḥ /
analyzed: yogaḥ na anyaḥ kriyā na anyā tattva ārūḍhā hi yā matiḥ
sva citte vāsanāḥ karma mala māyā prasūtayaḥ

original: AbhT_1.152b/. tāsāṃ śāntinimittaṃ yā matiḥ saṃvitsvabhāvikā // 152
analyzed: tāsām śānti nimittam yā matiḥ saṃvid svabhāvikā
sā deha ārambhi bāhya stha tattva brāta adhiśāyinī

original: AbhT_1.153b/. kriyā saiva ca yogaḥ syāttattvānāṃ cillayīkṛtau // 153
analyzed: kriyā sā eva ca yogaḥ syāt tattvānām cit layīkṛtau

original: AbhT_1.154a/. loke@pi kila gacchāmītyevamantaḥ sphuraiva yā /
analyzed: loke api kila gacchāmi iti evam antar sphurā eva yā
sā deham deśam akṣān ca api āviśantī gati kriyā

original: AbhT_1.155a/. tasmātkriyāpi yā nāma jñānameva hi sā tataḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt kriyā api yā nāma jñānam eva hi sā tatas
jñānam eva vimokṣāya yuktam ca etat udāhṛtam

original: AbhT_1.156a/. mokṣo hi nāma naivānyaḥ svarūpaprathanaṃ hi saḥ /
analyzed: mokṣaḥ hi nāma na eva anyaḥ svarūpa prathanam hi saḥ

original: AbhT_1.156b/. svarūpaṃ cātmanaḥ saṃvinnānyattatra tu yāḥ punaḥ // 156
analyzed: svarūpam ca ātmanaḥ saṃvid na anyat tatra tu yāḥ punar
kriyā ādikāḥ śaktayaḥ tāḥ saṃvid rūpa adhikāḥ na hi
a saṃvid rūpa tā yogāt dharmiṇaḥ ca a nirūpaṇāt

original: AbhT_1.158a/. parameśvaraśāstre hi na ca kāṇādadṛṣṭivat /
analyzed: parameśvara śāstre hi na ca kāṇāda dṛṣṭi vat
śaktīnām dharma rūpāṇām āśrayaḥ kaḥ api kathyate
tatas ca dṛkkriyā icchā ādyāḥ bhinnāḥ ced śaktayaḥ tathā

original: AbhT_1.159b/. ekaḥ śiva itīyaṃ vāgvastuśūnyaiva jāyate // 159
analyzed: ekaḥ śivaḥ iti iyam vāc vastu śūnyā eva jāyate
tasmāt saṃvid tvam eva etat svātantryam yat tat api alam
vivicyamānam bahvīṣu paryavasyati śaktiṣu
yatas ca ātma prathā mokṣaḥ tat na iha āśaṅkyam īdṛśam

original: AbhT_1.161b/. nāvaśyaṃ kāraṇātkārya tajjñānyapi na mucyate // 161
analyzed: na avaśyam kāraṇāt kārya tad jñāni api na mucyate

original: AbhT_1.162a/. yato jñānena mokṣasya yā hetuphalatoditā /
analyzed: yatas jñānena mokṣasya yā hetu phala tā uditā

original: AbhT_1.162b/. na sā mukhyā tato nāyaṃ prasaṃga iti niścitam // 162
analyzed: na sā mukhyā tatas nā ayam prasaṃgaḥ iti niścitam
evam jñāna svabhāvā eva kriyā sthūla tvam ātmani

original: AbhT_1.163b/. yato vahati tenāsyāṃ citratā dṛśyatāṃ kila // 163
analyzed: yatas vahati tena asyām citra tā dṛśyatām kila
kriyā upāya ibhyupāyānām grāhya bāhya vibhedinām
bheda upabheda vaividhyāt niḥsaṃkhya tvam avāntarāt
anena ca etat pradhvastam yat kecana śaśaṅkire
upāya bhedāt mokṣe api bhedaḥ syāt iti sūrayaḥ
hetu bhede pi no bhinnā ghaṭa dhvaṃsa ādi vṛtti vat
tat etat trividha tvam hi śāstre śrī pūrva nāmani
a kiṃcid cintakasya eva guruṇā pratibodhataḥ
utpadyate yaḥ āveśaḥ śāmbhavosā vidīritaḥ
uccāra rahitam vastu cetasā eva vicintayan
yam samāveśam āpnoti śāktaḥ sotrā abhidhīyate
uccāra karaṇa dhyāna varṇa sthāna prakalpanaiḥ

original: AbhT_1.170b/. yo bhavetsa samāveśaḥ samyagāṇava ucyate // 170
analyzed: yaḥ bhavet sa samāveśaḥ samyak āṇavaḥ ucyate
a kiṃcid cintakasya iti vikalpa anupayogi tā
tayā ca jhaṭiti jñeya samāpattiḥ nirūpyate
sā katham bhavati iti āha guruṇā ati garīyasā
jñeya abhimukha bodhena drāk prarūḍha tva śālinā

original: AbhT_1.173a/. tṛtīyārthe tasi vyākhyā vā vaiyadhikaraṇyataḥ /
analyzed: tṛtīyā arthe tasi vyākhyā vā vaiyadhikaraṇyataḥ
āveśaḥ ca asvatantrasya sva tad rūpa nimajjanāt
para tad rūpa tā śambhoḥ ādyāt śakti avibhāginaḥ
tena ayam atra vākya arthaḥ vijñeyam pronmiṣat svayam
vinā api niścayena drāk mātṛ darpaṇa bimbitam
mātāram adharīkurvat svām vibhūtim pradarśayat
āste hṛdaya nairmalya atiśaye tāratamyataḥ

original: AbhT_1.176b/. jñeyaṃ dvidhā ca cinmātraṃ jaḍaṃ cādyaṃ ca kalpitam // 176
analyzed: jñeyam dvidhā ca cit mātram jaḍam ca ādyam ca kalpitam
itarat tu tathā satyam tad vibhāgaḥ yam īdṛśaḥ
jaḍena yaḥ samāveśaḥ sa praticchandaka ākṛtiḥ
caitanyena samāveśaḥ tādātmyam na aparam kila
tena avikalpā saṃvittiḥ bhāvanā ādi anapekṣiṇī
śiva tādātmyam āpannā samāveśaḥ utra śāṃbhavaḥ
tad prasādāt punar paścāt bhāvinā utra viniścayāḥ

original: AbhT_1.180a/. santu tādātmyamāpannā na tu teṣāmupāyatā /
analyzed: santu tādātmyam āpannāḥ na tu teṣām upāya tā
vikalpa apekṣayā mānam avikalpam iti bruvan

original: AbhT_1.181a/. pratyukta eva siddhaṃ hi vikalpenānugamyate /
analyzed: pratyuktaḥ eva siddham hi vikalpena anugamyate

original: AbhT_1.181b/. gṛhītamiti suspaṣṭā niścayasya yataḥ prathā // 181
analyzed: gṛhītam iti su spaṣṭā niścayasya yatas prathā
gṛhṇāmi iti avikalpa aikya balāt tu pratipadyate
avikalpa ātma saṃvittau yā sphurat tā eva vastunaḥ
sā siddhiḥ na vikalpāt tu vastu apekṣā vivarjitāt
kevalam saṃvidaḥ saḥ ayam nairmalya itara viśramaḥ
yat vikalpa anapekṣa tva sāpekṣa tve nija ātmani
tān tān viśeṣān cinute ratnānām bhūyasām api
nairmalyam saṃvidaḥ ca idam pūrva abhyāsa vaśāt atho
a niyantra īśvara icchātaḥ iti etat carcayiṣyate
pañcāśat vidha tā ca asya samāveśasya varṇitā
etat tattva antare yat puṃs vidyā śakti ātmakam trayam
ambhodhi kāṣṭhā jvalana saṃkhyaiḥ bhedaiḥ yatas kramāt
puṃs vidyā śakti saṃjñam yat tat sarva vyāpakam yatas
avyāpakebhyaḥ tena idam bhedena gaṇitam kila
aśuddhi śuddhi amāna tva śuddhitaḥ tu mithas upi tat
bhūtāni adhyakṣa siddhāni kārya hetu anumeyataḥ
tattva vargāt pṛthak bhūta samākhyāni atas eva hi
sarva pratīti sadbhāva gocaram bhūtam eva hi
viduḥ catuṣṭaye ca atra sa avakāśe tad āsthitim
rudra śakti samāveśaḥ pañcadhā nanu carcyate
bhavet tatra bhauta āveśa ādi varṇane
prasaṃgāt etat iti ced samādhiḥ saṃbhavan ayam
na asmākam mānasa āvarjī lokaḥ bhinna ruciḥ yatas
ucyate dvaita śāstreṣu parameśāt vibheditā

original: AbhT_1.194b/. bhūtādīnāṃ yathā sātra na tathā dvayavarjite // 194
analyzed: bhūta ādīnām yathā sā atra na tathā dvaya varjite
yāvān ṣaṭtriṃśakaḥ saḥ uyam yat anyat api kiṃcana
etāvatī mahādevī rudra śaktiḥ anargalā
tatas eva dvitīye smin adhikāre nyarūpyata
dharā ādeḥ viśva rūpa tvam pāñcadaśya ādi bhedataḥ
tasmāt yathā pura stha irthe guṇa ādi aṃśa aṃśikā mukhāt
niraṃśa bhāva saṃbodhaḥ tathā eva atra api budhyatām
atas eva avikalpa tva dhrauvya prābhava vaibhavaiḥ
anyaiḥ vā śakti rūpa tvāt dharmaiḥ sva samavāyibhiḥ

original: AbhT_1.199a/. sarvaśo@pyatha vāṃśena taṃ vibhuṃ parameśvaram /
analyzed: sarvaśas api atha vā aṃśena tam vibhum parameśvaram
upāsate vikalpa ogha saṃskārāt ye śruta utthitāt
te tad tad sva vikalpa antar sphurat tad dharma pāṭavāt
dharmiṇam pūrṇa dharma ogham abhedena adhiśerate
ūcivān atas eva śrī vidyā adhipatiḥ ādarāt

original: AbhT_1.201b/. tvatsvarūpamavikalpamakṣajā kalpane na viṣayīkaroti cet /
analyzed: tvad svarūpam avikalpam akṣa jā kalpane na viṣayīkaroti ced
antar ullikhita citra saṃvidaḥ no bhaveyuḥ anubhūtayaḥ sphuṭāḥ
atha patyuḥ adhiṣṭhānam ityādi uktam viśeṣaṇaiḥ
tasyām divi su dīpta ātmā niṣkampa ucala mūrtimān

original: AbhT_1.203b/. kāṣṭhā saiva parā sūkṣmā sarvadikkāmṛtātmikā // 203
analyzed: kāṣṭhā sā eva parā sūkṣmā sarva dikka amṛta ātmikā
pradhvasta āvaraṇā śāntā vastu mātrā ati lālasā
ādi anta uparatā sādhvī mūrti tvena upacaryate
tathā upacārasya atra etat nimitam sa prayojanam
tad mukhā sphuṭa tā dharmiṇī āśu tad maya tā sthitiḥ
te eva dharmāḥ śakti ākhyāḥ taiḥ taiḥ ucita rūpakaiḥ
ākāraiḥ paryupāsyante tanmayībhāva siddhaye

original: AbhT_1.207a/. tatra kācitpunaḥ śaktiranantā vā mitāśca vā /
analyzed: tatra kācid punar śaktiḥ anantā vā mitāḥ ca vā
ākṣipet hava tā sattva nyāyāt dūra antika tvataḥ
tena pūrṇa svabhāva tvam prakāśa tvam cit ātma tā
bhairava tvam viśva śaktīḥ ākṣipet vyāpaka tvataḥ
sadāśiva ādayaḥ tu ūrdhva vyāpti abhāvāt adhas juṣaḥ
śaktīḥ samākṣipeyuḥ tad upāsā antika dūrataḥ
itthaṃbhāve ca śākta ākhyaḥ vaikalpika patha kramaḥ
iha tu uktaḥ yatas tasmāt pratiyogi avikalpakam

original: AbhT_1.211a/. avikalpapathārūḍho yena yena pathā viśet /
analyzed: avikalpa patha ārūḍhaḥ yena yena pathā viśet
dharā sadāśiva antena tena tena śivībhavet
nirmale hṛdaye prāgrya sphurat bhūmi aṃśa bhāsini
prakāśe tad mukhena eva saṃvid para śiva ātma tā
evam para icchā śakti aṃśa sat upāyam imam viduḥ
śāmbhava ākhyam samāveśam sumati antenivāsinaḥ
śāktā utha bhaṇyate cetaḥ dhī manaḥ ahaṃkṛti sphuṭam
sa vikalpa tayā māyā mayam icchā ādi vastutas
abhimānena saṃkalpa adhyavasāya krameṇa yaḥ

original: AbhT_1.215b/. śāktaḥ sa māyopāyo@pi tadante nirvikalpakaḥ // 215
analyzed: śāktaḥ sa māyā upāyaḥ api tad ante nirvikalpakaḥ

original: AbhT_1.216a/. paśorvai yāvikalpā bhūrdaśā sā śāmbhavī param /
analyzed: paśoḥ vai yā avikalpā bhūḥ daśā sā śāmbhavī param
apūrṇā mātṛ daurātmyāt tad apāye vikasvarā

original: AbhT_1.217a/. evaṃ vaikalpikī bhūmiḥ śākte kartṛtvavedane /
analyzed: evam vaikalpikī bhūmiḥ śākte kartṛ tva vedane

original: AbhT_1.217b/. yasyāṃ sphuṭe paraṃ tvasyāṃ saṃkocaḥ pūrvanītitaḥ // 217
analyzed: yasyām sphuṭe param tu asyām saṃkocaḥ pūrva nītitaḥ
tathā saṃkoca saṃbhāra vilāyana parasya tu
sā yatheṣṭa antar ābhāsa kāriṇī śaktiḥ ujjvalā

original: AbhT_1.219a/. nanu vaikalpikī kiṃ dhīrāṇave nāsti tatra sā /
analyzed: nanu vaikalpikī kim dhīra aṇave nā asti tatra sā
anya upāyā atra tu uccāra rahita tvam nyarūpayat
uccāra śabdena atra uktāḥ bahu antena tad ādayaḥ

original: AbhT_1.220b/. śaktyupāye na santyete bhedābhedau hi śaktitā // 220
analyzed: śakti upāye na santi ete bheda abhedau hi śakti tā
aṇuḥ nāma sphuṭaḥ bhedaḥ tad upāyaḥ iha āṇavaḥ
vikalpa niścaya ātmā eva paryante nirvikalpakaḥ
nanu dhī mānasa ahaṃkṛt pumāṃsaḥ vyāpnuyuḥ śivam
na adhas varti tayā tena kathitam katham īdṛśam

original: AbhT_1.223a/. ucyate vastuto@smākaṃ śiva eva tathāvidhaḥ /
analyzed: ucyate vastutas smākam śivaḥ eva tathāvidhaḥ
sva rūpa gopanam kṛtvā sva prakāśaḥ punar tathā
dvaita śāstre mataṅga ādau ca api etat su nirūpitam

original: AbhT_1.224b/. adhovyāptuḥ śivasyaiva sa prakāśo vyavasthitaḥ // 224
analyzed: adhas vyāptuḥ śivasya eva sa prakāśaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: AbhT_1.225a/. yena buddhi-manobhūmāvapi bhāti paraṃ padam // 225
analyzed: yena buddhi manaḥ bhūmau api bhāti param padam
dvau api etau samāveśau nirvikalpa arṇavam prati

original: AbhT_1.226b/. prayāta eva tadrūḍhiṃ vinā naiva hi kiṃcana // 226
analyzed: prayātaḥ eva tad rūḍhim vinā na eva hi kiṃcana
saṃvitti phala bhid ca atra na prakalpyā iti atas bravīt
kalpanāyāḥ ca mukhya tvam atra eva kila sūcitam

original: AbhT_1.228a/. vikalpāpekṣayā yo@pi prāmāṇyaṃ prāha tanmate /
analyzed: vikalpa apekṣayā yaḥ api prāmāṇyam prāha tad mate
ratna tattvam avidvān prāk niścaya upāya carcanāt
abheda upāyam atra uktam śāmbhavam śāktam ucyate
bheda abheda ātmaka upāyam bheda upāyam tat āṇavam

original: AbhT_1.231a/. ante jñāne@tra sopāye samastaḥ karmavistaraḥ /
analyzed: ante sa upāye samastaḥ karma vistaraḥ
prasphuṭena eva rūpeṇa bhāvī saḥ ntarbhaviṣyati

original: AbhT_1.232a/. kriyā hi nāma vijñānānnānyadvastu kramātmatām /
analyzed: kriyā hi nāma vijñānāt na anyat vastu krama ātma tām
upāya vaśataḥ prāptam tad kriyā iti purā uditam
samyak jñānam ca mukti eka kāraṇam sva para sthitam
yatas hi kalpanā mātram sva para ādi vibhūtayaḥ
tulye kālpanika tve ca yadā aikya sphuraṇa ātmakaḥ

original: AbhT_1.234b/. guruḥ sa tāvadekātmā siddho muktaśca bhaṇyate // 234
analyzed: guruḥ sa tāvat eka ātmā siddhaḥ muktaḥ ca bhaṇyate

original: AbhT_1.235a/. yāvānasya hi saṃtāno gurustāvatsa kīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: yāvān asya hi saṃtānaḥ guruḥ tāvat sa kīrtitaḥ
samyak jñāna mayaḥ ca iti sva ātmanā mucyate tatas

original: AbhT_1.236a/. tata eva svasaṃtānaṃ jñānī tārayatītyadaḥ /
analyzed: tatas eva sva saṃtānam jñānī tārayati iti adaḥ

original: AbhT_1.236b/. yuktyāgamābhyāṃ saṃsiddhaṃ tāvāneko yato muniḥ // 236
analyzed: yukti āgamābhyām saṃsiddham tāvān ekaḥ yatas muniḥ

original: AbhT_1.237a/. tenātra ye codayanti nanu jñānādvimuktatā /
analyzed: tena atra ye codayanti nanu jñānāt vimukta tā

original: AbhT_1.237b/. dīkṣādikā kriyā ceyaṃ sā kathaṃ muktaye bhavet // 237
analyzed: dīkṣā ādikā kriyā ca iyam sā katham muktaye bhavet

original: AbhT_1.238a/. jñānātmā seti cejjñānaṃ yatrasthaṃ taṃ vimocayet /
analyzed: jñāna ātmā sā iti ced jñānam yatrastham tam vimocayet

original: AbhT_1.238b/. anyasya mocane vāpi bhavetkiṃ nāsamañjasam /
analyzed: anyasya mocane vā api bhavet kim nā asamañjasam

original: AbhT_1.238c/. iti te mūlataḥ kṣiptā yattvatrānyaiḥ samarthitam // 238
analyzed: iti te mūlataḥ kṣiptāḥ yat tu atra anyaiḥ samarthitam

original: AbhT_1.239a/. malo nāma kila dravyaṃ cakṣuḥsthapaṭalādivat /
analyzed: malaḥ nāma kila dravyam cakṣuḥ stha paṭala ādi vat
tad vihantrī kriyā dīkṣā tu añjana ādika karma vat
tat purastāt niṣetsyāmaḥ yukti āgama vigarhitam
mala māyā karmaṇām ca darśayiṣyāmahe sthitim

original: AbhT_1.241a/. evaṃ śaktitrayopāyaṃ yajjñānaṃ tatra paścimam /
analyzed: evam śakti traya upāyam yat jñānam tatra paścimam
mūlam tad uttaram madhyam uttarottaram ādimam
tatas api paramam jñānam upāya ādi vivarjitam
ānanda śakti viśrāntam anuttaram iha ucyate
tat sva prakāśam vijñānam vidyā vidyeśvara ādibhiḥ
api durlabha sadbhāvam śrī siddhātantre ucyate
na ca etat aprasannena śaṃkareṇa iti vākyataḥ
iti anena eva pāṭhena mālinīvijaya uttare
iti jñāna catuṣkam yat siddhi mukti mahā udayam
tat mayā tantryate tantrāloka nāmni atra śāsane
tatra iha yat yat antar vā bahis vā parimṛśyate
an udghāṭita rūpam tat pūrvam eva prakāśate
tathā an udghāṭita ākārā nirvācyena ātmanā prathā

original: AbhT_1.247b/. saṃśayaḥ kutracidrūpe niścite sati nānyathā // 247
analyzed: saṃśayaḥ kutracid rūpe niścite sati na anyathā
etat kim iti mukhye smin etad aṃśaḥ su niścitaḥ
saṃśaya ustitva na asti ādi dharma an udghāṭita ātmakaḥ
kim iti etasya śabdasya na adhikaḥ arthaḥ prakāśate
kim tu an unmudrita ākāram vastu eva abhidadhāti ayam

original: AbhT_1.250a/. sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti na mukhyo@styeṣa saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti na mukhyaḥ asti eṣa saṃśayaḥ
bhūyas stha dharma jāteṣu niścaya utpādaḥ eva hi
āmarśanīya dvairūpya an udghāṭana vaśāt punar

original: AbhT_1.251b/. saṃśayaḥ sa kimityaṃśe vikalpastvanyathā sphuṭaḥ // 251
analyzed: saṃśayaḥ sa kim iti aṃśe vikalpaḥ tu anyathā sphuṭaḥ
tena an udghāṭita ātmatva bhāva prathanam eva yat

original: AbhT_1.252b/. prathamaṃ sa ihoddeśaḥ praśnaḥ saṃśaya eva ca // 252
analyzed: prathamam saḥ iha uddeśaḥ praśnaḥ saṃśayaḥ eva ca
tathā an udghāṭita ākāra bhāva prasara vartmanā

original: AbhT_1.253b/. prasarantī svasaṃvittiḥ praṣṭrī śiṣyātmatāṃ gatā // 253
analyzed: prasarantī sva saṃvittiḥ praṣṭrī śiṣya ātma tām gatā
tathā antara parāmarśa niścaya ātma tirohiteḥ
prasara anantara udbhūta saṃhāra udaya bhāj api
yāvatī eva bhavet bāhya prasare prasphuṭa ātmani

original: AbhT_1.255b/. anunmīlitarūpā sā praṣṭrī tāvati bhaṇyate // 255
analyzed: an unmīlita rūpā sā praṣṭrī tāvati bhaṇyate
svayam evam vibodhaḥ ca tathā praśna uttara ātmakaḥ
guru śiṣya pade pi eṣa dehabhedaḥ hi a tāttvikaḥ
bodhaḥ hi bodha rūpa tvāt antar nānā ākṛtīḥ sthitāḥ
bahis ābhāsayati eva drāk sāmānya viśeṣataḥ
srakṣyamāṇa viśeṣa aṃśa ākāṃkṣā yogyasya kasyacid

original: AbhT_1.258b/. dharmasya sṛṣṭiḥ sāmānyasṛṣṭiḥ sā saṃśayātmikā // 258
analyzed: dharmasya sṛṣṭiḥ sāmānya sṛṣṭiḥ sā saṃśaya ātmikā
srakṣyamāṇaḥ viśeṣa aṃśaḥ yadā tu uparamet tadā
nirṇayaḥ mātṛ rucitaḥ na anyathā kalpa koṭibhiḥ
tasya atha vastunaḥ sva ātma vīrya ākramaṇa pāṭavāt
unmudraṇam tayā ākṛtyā lakṣaṇa uttara nirṇayāḥ
nirṇīta tāvat dharma aṃśa pṛṣṭhapāti tayā punar
bhūyas bhūyas samuddeśa lakṣaṇa ātma parīkṣaṇam
dṛṣṭa anumāna aupamya āpta vacana ādiṣu sarvatas
uddeśa lakṣaṇa avekṣā tritayam prāṇinām sphuret
niḥ vikalpitam uddeśaḥ vikalpaḥ lakṣaṇam punar
parīkṣaṇam tathā adhyakṣe vikalpānām paramparā
nagaḥ yam iti ca uddeśaḥ dhūmi tvāt agnimān iti
lakṣyam vyāpti ādi vijñāna jālam tu atra parīkṣaṇam
uddeśaḥ yam iti prācyaḥ gotulyaḥ gavaya abhidhaḥ

original: AbhT_1.265b/. iti vā lakṣaṇaṃ śeṣaḥ parīkṣopamitau bhavet // 265
analyzed: iti vā lakṣaṇam śeṣaḥ parīkṣā upamitau bhavet
svar kāmaḥ īdṛś uddeśaḥ yajeta iti asya lakṣaṇam
agniṣṭoma ādinā iti eṣā parīkṣā śeṣa vartinī
vikalpa srakṣyamāṇa anya rucita aṃśa sahiṣṇunaḥ

original: AbhT_1.267b/. vastuno yā tathātvena sṛṣṭiḥ soddeśasaṃjñitā // 267
analyzed: vastunaḥ yā tathātvena sṛṣṭiḥ sā uddeśa saṃjñitā
tadā eva saṃvid cinute yāvataḥ srakṣyamāṇa tā
yatas hi akāla kalitā saṃdhatte sārvakālikam

original: AbhT_1.269a/. srakṣyamāṇasya yā sṛṣṭiḥ prāksṛṣṭāṃśasya saṃhṛtiḥ /
analyzed: srakṣyamāṇasya yā sṛṣṭiḥ prāc sṛṣṭa aṃśasya saṃhṛtiḥ
anūdyamāne dharme sā saṃvid lakṣaṇam ucyate
parīkṣā kathyate mātṛ rucitā kalpita avadhiḥ

original: AbhT_1.271a/. prākpaśyantyatha madhyānyā vaikharī ceti tā imāḥ /
analyzed: prāk paśyanti atha madhyā anyā vaikharī ca iti tāḥ imāḥ

original: AbhT_1.271b/. parā parāparā devī caramā tvaparātmikā // 271
analyzed: parā parāparā devī caramā tu apara ātmikā
icchā ādi śakti tritayam idam eva nigadyate
etad prāṇitaḥ eva ayam vyavahāraḥ pratāyate
yathā uktam ratnamālāyām sarvaḥ para kalā ātmakaḥ
mahān avāntaraḥ divyaḥ miśraḥ nyonyaḥ tu pañcamaḥ
bhinnayoḥ praṣṭṛ tad vaktroḥ ca aikātmyam yat saḥ ucyate
saṃbandhaḥ para tā ca asya pūrṇa aikātmya prathā mayī
anena eva nayena syāt saṃbandha antaram api alam
śāstra vācyam phala ādīnām paripūrṇa tva yogataḥ

original: AbhT_1.277a/. itthaṃ saṃvidiyaṃ devī svabhāvādeva sarvadā /
analyzed: ittham saṃvid iyam devī svabhāvāt eva sarvadā
tatra ucyate purā uddeśaḥ pūrvaja anuja bhedavān
vijñāna bhid gata upāyaḥ para upāyaḥ tṛtīyakaḥ
śākta upāyaḥ nara upāyaḥ kāla upāyaḥ atha saptamaḥ
cakra udayaḥ utha deśa adhvā tattva adhvā tattva bhedanam
kalā ādi adhva adhva upayogaḥ śaktipāta tirohitī

original: AbhT_1.280b/. dīkṣopakramaṇaṃ dīkṣā sāmayī pautrike vidhau // 280
analyzed: dīkṣā upakramaṇam dīkṣā sāmayī pautrike vidhau
tulā dīkṣā atha pārokṣī liṅga uddhāraḥ abhiṣecanam
antyeṣṭiḥ śrāddha klṛptiḥ ca śeṣa vṛtti nirūpaṇam
ekīkāraḥ sva svarūpe praveśaḥ śāstra melanam

original: AbhT_1.284b/. iti saptādhikāmenāṃ triṃśataṃ yaḥ sadā budhaḥ // 284
analyzed: iti sapta adhikām enām triṃśatam yaḥ sadā budhaḥ

original: AbhT_1.285a/. āhnikānāṃ samabhyasyet sa sākṣādbhairavo bhavet /
analyzed: āhnikānām samabhyasyet sa sākṣāt bhairavaḥ bhavet
saptatriṃśatsu saṃpūrṇa bodhaḥ yat bhairavaḥ bhavet
kim citram aṇavaḥ pyasya dṛśā bhairava tām iyuḥ
iti eṣa pūrvaja uddeśaḥ kathyate tu anujaḥ adhunā
vijñānabhid prakaraṇe bharvasya uddeśanam kramāt
dvitīyasmin prakaraṇe gata upāya tva bhedi tā

original: AbhT_1.292a/. karaṇaṃ varṇatattvaṃ cetyāṇave tu nirūpyate /
analyzed: karaṇam varṇa tattvam ca iti āṇave tu nirūpyate
cakra bhid mantra vidyā bhid etat cakra udaye bhavet
parimāṇam purāṇām ca saṃgrahaḥ tattva yojanam
kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ ca tattva krama nirūpaṇam
pramātṛ bhedaḥ iti etat tattva bhede vicāryate
kalā svarūpam eka tri pañca ādyaiḥ tattva kalpanam
kalā ādi adhva vicāra antarā etāvat pravivicyate
abheda bhāvanā kampa hāsau tu adhva upayojane
saṃkhyā ādhikyam mala ādīnām tattvam śakti vicitra tā
anapekṣi tva siddhiḥ ca tirobhāva vicitra tā
śaktipāta parīkṣāyām etāvān vācya saṃgrahaḥ
tirobhāva vyapagamaḥ jñānena paripūrṇa tā
utkrānti anupayogi tvam dīkṣā upakramaṇe sthitam
sāmānya nyāsa bheda ūrghapātram ca etat prayojanam
dravya yogya tvam arcā ca bahis dvāra arcanam kramāt
deha pūjā prāṇa buddhi citsu adhva nyāsa pūjane
anya śāstra gaṇa utkarṣaḥ pūjā cakrasya sarvatas
kṣetra grahaḥ pañcagavyam pūjanam bhū gaṇeśayoḥ
astra arcā vahni kāryam ca api adhivāsanam agni gam
tarpaṇam caru saṃsiddhiḥ dantakāṣṭha anta saṃskriyā

original: AbhT_1.306b/. svapnasya sāmayaṃ karma samayāśceti saṃgrahaḥ // 306
analyzed: svapnasya sāmayam karma samayāḥ ca iti saṃgrahaḥ
samayi tva vidhau asmin syāt pañcadaśe āhnike
bhedaḥ yojanikā ādeḥ ca ṣoḍaśe syāt iha āhnike
sūtra klṛptiḥ tattva śuddhiḥ pāśa dāhaḥ utha yojanam
adhva bhedaḥ tathā iti evam kathitam pautrike vidhau
janana ādi vihīna tvam mantra bhedaḥ utha su sphuṭaḥ
iti saṃkṣipta dīkṣā ākhye syāt aṣṭādaśe āhnike
kalā avekṣā kṛpāṇī ādi nyāsaḥ cāraḥ śarīra gaḥ
brahmavidyā vidhiḥ ca evam uktam sadyas samutkrame
adhikāra parīkṣā antar saṃskārā utha tulā vidhiḥ
iti etat vācya sarvasvam syāt viṃśatitama āhnike
balābala vicāraḥ ca iti ekaviṃśa āhnike vidhiḥ
śravaṇam ca abhyanujñānam śodhanam pātaka cyutiḥ

original: AbhT_1.315b/. śaṅkāccheda iti spaṣṭaṃ vācyaṃ liṅgoddhṛtikrame // 315
analyzed: śaṅkā chedaḥ iti spaṣṭam vācyam liṅga uddhṛti krame
parīkṣā ācārya karaṇam tad vratam haraṇam mateḥ
tad vibhāgaḥ sādhaka tvam abhiṣeka vidhau tu iyat
adhikārī atha saṃskāraḥ tad prayojanam iti adaḥ
prayojanam bhoga mokṣa dānena atra vidhiḥ sphuṭaḥ
prayojanam śeṣa vṛtteḥ nitya arcā sthaṇḍile parā
pūjā bhedaḥ iti vācyam liṅga arcā saṃprakāśane
naimittika vibhāgaḥ tad prayojana vidhiḥ tatas
parva bhedāḥ tad viśeṣaḥ cakra carcā tad arcanam
mṛteḥ parīkṣā yogi īśī melaka ādi vidhiḥ tathā
vyākhyā vidhiḥ śruta vidhiḥ guru pūjā vidhiḥ tu iyat
naimittika prakāśa ākhye pi aṣṭāviṃśa āhnike sthitam
adhikārī ātmanaḥ bhedaḥ siddha patnī kula kramaḥ
dīkṣā abhiṣekau bodhaḥ ca iti ekonatriṃśe āhnike
mantra svarūpam tad vīryam iti triṃśe nirūpitam
vistareṇa abhidhātavyam iti ekatriṃśe āhnike

original: AbhT_1.327a/. kalābheda iti proktaṃ mudrāṇāṃ saṃprakāśane /
analyzed: kalā bhedaḥ iti proktam mudrāṇām saṃprakāśane
dvātriṃśa tattvāt īśa ākhyāt prabhṛti prasphuṭaḥ yatas

original: AbhT_1.328a/. na bhedo@sti tato noktamuddeśāntaramatra tat /
analyzed: na bhedaḥ usti tatas nā uktam uddeśa antaram atra tat
mukhya tvena ca vedya tvāt adhikāra antara kramaḥ
iti uddeśa vidhiḥ proktaḥ sukha saṃgraha hetave
atha asya lakṣaṇa avekṣe nirūpyete yathākramam

original: AbhT_1.330a/. ātmā saṃvitprakāśasthitiranavayavā saṃvidityāttaśaktivrātaṃ tasya svarūpaṃ sa ca nija mahasaśchādanādbaddharūpaḥ /
analyzed: ātmā saṃvid prakāśa sthitiḥ an avayavā saṃvid iti ātta śakti vrātam tasya svarūpam sa ca nija mahasaḥ chādanāt baddha rūpaḥ

original: AbhT_1.330b/. ātmajyotiḥsvabhāvaprakaṭanavidhinā tasya mokṣaḥ sa cāyaṃ citrākārasya citraḥ prakaṭita iha yatsaṃgraheṇārtha eṣaḥ // 330
analyzed: ātma jyotiḥ svabhāva prakaṭana vidhinā tasya mokṣaḥ sa ca ayam citra ākārasya citraḥ prakaṭitaḥ iha yat saṃgraheṇa arthaḥ eṣaḥ

original: AbhT_1.331a/. mithyājñānaṃ timiramasamān dṛṣṭidoṣānprasūte tatsadbhāvādvimalamapi tadbhāti mālinyadhāma /
analyzed: mithyājñānam timiram asamān dṛṣṭi doṣān prasūte tad sadbhāvāt vimalam api tat bhāti mālinya dhāma

original: AbhT_1.331b/. yattu prekṣyaṃ dṛśi parigataṃ taimirīṃ doṣamudrāṃ dūraṃ runddhetprabhavatu kathaṃ tatra mālinyaśaṅkā // 331
analyzed: yat tu prekṣyam dṛśi parigatam taimirīm doṣa mudrām dūram runddha id prabhavatu katham tatra mālinya śaṅkā
bhāvavrāta

original: haṭhājjanasya hṛdayānyākramya yannartayan bhaṅgībhirvividhābhirātmahṛdayaṃ pracchādya saṃkrīḍase /
analyzed: haṭhāt janasya hṛdayāni ākramya yat nartayan bhaṅgībhiḥ vividhābhiḥ ātma hṛdayam pracchādya saṃkrīḍase

original: AbhT_1.332b/. yastvāmāha jaḍaṃ jaḍaḥ sahṛdayaṃmanyatvaduḥśikṣito manye@muṣya jaḍātmatā stutipadaṃ tvatsāmyasaṃbhāvanāt // 332
analyzed: yaḥ tvām āha jaḍam jaḍaḥ sahṛdayaṃmanya tva duḥśikṣitaḥ manya amuṣya jaḍa ātma tā stuti padam tvad sāmya saṃbhāvanāt

original: AbhT_1.333a/. iha galitamalāḥ parāvarajñāḥ śivasadbhāvamayā adhikriyante /
analyzed: iha galita malāḥ parāvara jñāḥ śiva sadbhāva mayāḥ adhikriyante
guravaḥ pravicāraṇe yatas tat viphalā dveṣa kalaṃka hāni yācñā
tantrāloka ibhinava racita imutra vijñāna sattā bheda udgāra prakaṭana paṭau āhnike smin samāptiḥ
atha śrī tantrālokasya dvitīyam āhnikam
yat tatra ādyam padam avirata anuttara jñapti rūpam
tat nirṇetum prakaraṇam idam ārabha iham dvitīyam

original: AbhT_2.2a/. anupāyaṃ hi yadrūpaṃ ko@rtho deśanayātra vai /
analyzed: anupāyam hi yat rūpam kaḥ ūrthaḥ deśanayā atra vai
sakṛt syāt deśanā paścāt anupāya tvam ucyayate
anupāyam idam tattvam iti upāyam vinā kutas

original: AbhT_2.3b/. svayaṃ tu teṣāṃ tattādṛk kiṃ brūmaḥ kila tānprati // 3
analyzed: svayam tu teṣām tat tādṛś kim brūmaḥ kila tān prati
yat caturdhā uditam rūpam vijñānasya vibhoḥ asau

original: AbhT_2.4b/. svabhāva eva mantavyaḥ sa hi nityodito vibhuḥ // 4
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ eva mantavyaḥ sa hi nitya uditaḥ vibhuḥ
etāvadbhiḥ asaṃkhyātaiḥ svabhāvaiḥ yat prakāśate
ke pi aṃśa aṃśikayā tena viśanti anye niraṃśataḥ
tatra api ca abhyupāya ādi sāpekṣa anyatva yogataḥ
upāyasya api no vāryā tad anya tvāt vicitra tā

original: AbhT_2.7a/. tatra ye nirmalātmāno bhairavīyāṃ svasaṃvidam /
analyzed: tatra ye nirmala ātmānaḥ bhairavīyām sva saṃvidam
nirupāyām upāsīnāḥ tad vidhiḥ praṇigadyate
tatra tāvat kriyā yogaḥ na abhyupāya tvam arhati

original: AbhT_2.8b/. sa hi tasmātsamudbhūtaḥ pratyuta pravibhāvyate // 8
analyzed: sa hi tasmāt samudbhūtaḥ pratyuta pravibhāvyate
jñaptau upāyaḥ eva syāt iti ced jñaptiḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_2.9b/. prakāśatvaṃ svaprakāśe tacca tatrānyataḥ katham // 9
analyzed: prakāśa tvam sva prakāśe tat ca tatra anyatas katham
saṃvid tattvam sva prakāśam iti asmin kam nu yuktibhiḥ
tad abhāve bhavet viśvam jaḍa tvāt aprakāśakam

original: AbhT_2.11a/. yāvānupāyo bāhyaḥ syādāntaro vāpi kaścana /
analyzed: yāvān upāyaḥ bāhyaḥ syāt āntaraḥ vā api kaścana
sa sarvaḥ tad mukha prekṣī tatra upāya tva bhāj katham

original: AbhT_2.12a/. tyajāvadhānāni nanu kva nāma dhatse@vadhānaṃ vicinu svayaṃ tat /
analyzed: tyaja avadhānāni nanu kva nāma dhatse ivadhānam vicinu svayam tat

original: AbhT_2.12b/. pūrṇe@vadhānaṃ na hi nāma yuktaṃ nāpūrṇamabhyeti ca satyabhāvam // 12
analyzed: pūrṇa ivadhānam na hi nāma yuktam na a pūrṇam abhyeti ca satya bhāvam
tena avadhāna prāṇasya bhāvanā ādeḥ pare pathi
ye api sākṣāt upāyena tad rūpam praviviñcate

original: AbhT_2.14b/. nūnaṃ te sūryasaṃvittyai khadyotādhitsavo jaḍāḥ // 14
analyzed: nūnam te sūrya saṃvittyai khadyota ādhitsavaḥ jaḍāḥ
kim ca yāvat idam bāhyam āntara upāya saṃmatam
tad prakāśa ātma tā mātram śivasya eva nijam vapuḥ

original: AbhT_2.16a/. nīlaṃ pītaṃ sukhamiti prakāśaḥ kevalaḥ śivaḥ /
analyzed: nīlam pītam sukham iti prakāśaḥ kevalaḥ śivaḥ
amuṣmin parama advaite prakāśa ātmani kaḥ uparaḥ

original: AbhT_2.17a/. upāyopeyabhāvaḥ syātprakāśaḥ kevalaṃ hi saḥ // 17
analyzed: upāya upeya bhāvaḥ syāt prakāśaḥ kevalam hi saḥ
idam dvaitam ayam bhedaḥ idam advaitam iti api
prakāśa vapuḥ eva ayam bhāsate parameśvaraḥ

original: AbhT_2.19a/. asyāṃ bhūmau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bandho mokṣaścitarjaḍaḥ /
analyzed: asyām bhūmau sukham duḥkham bandhaḥ mokṣaḥ citaḥ jaḍaḥ
ghaṭa kumbha vat eka arthāḥ śabdāḥ te api ekam eva ca

original: AbhT_2.20a/. praśāśe hyaprakāśāṃśaḥ kathaṃ nāma prakāśatām /
analyzed: hi aprakāśa aṃśaḥ katham nāma prakāśatām
prakāśamāne tasmin vā tad dvaitāḥ tasya lopitāḥ
tasmin vā vastu tā katham ucyate
na prakāśa viśeṣa tvam atas eva upapadyate
atas eka prakāśaḥ yam iti vādaḥ itra susthite
dūrāt āvāritāḥ satyam vibhinna jñāna vādinaḥ
prakāśa mātram uditam aprakāśa niṣedhanāt

original: AbhT_2.23b/. ekaśabdasya na tvarthaḥ saṃkhyā cidvyaktibhedabhāk // 23
analyzed: eka śabdasya na tu arthaḥ saṃkhyā cit vyakti bheda bhāj

original: AbhT_2.24a/. naiṣa śaktirmahādevī na paratrāśrito yataḥ /
analyzed: na eṣa śaktiḥ mahādevī na paratra āśritaḥ yatas

original: AbhT_2.24b/. na caiṣa śaktimāndevo na kasyāpyāśrayo yataḥ // 24
analyzed: na ca eṣa śaktimān devaḥ na kasya api āśrayaḥ yatas

original: AbhT_2.25a/. naiṣa dhyeyo dhyātrabhāvānna dhyātā dhyeyavarjanāt /
analyzed: na eṣa dhyeyaḥ dhyātṛ abhāvāt na dhyātā dhyeya varjanāt
na pūjyaḥ pūjaka abhāvāt pūjya abhāvāt na pūjakaḥ

original: AbhT_2.26a/. na mantro na ca mantryo@sau na ca mantrayitā prabhuḥ /
analyzed: na mantraḥ na ca mantryā asau na ca mantrayitā prabhuḥ

original: AbhT_2.26b/. na dīkṣā dīkṣako vāpi na dīkṣāvānmaheśvaraḥ // 26
analyzed: na dīkṣā dīkṣakaḥ vā api na dīkṣāvān maheśvaraḥ
sthāna āsana nirodha argha saṃgha an āvāhana ādikam
visarjana antam na asti atra kartṛ karma kriyā ujjhite

original: AbhT_2.28a/. na sanna cāsatsadasanna ca tannobhayojjhitam /
analyzed: na sat na ca asat sat asat na ca tat na ubhaya ujjhitam
durvijñeyā hi sā avasthā kim api etat anuttaram
ayam iti avabhāsaḥ hi yaḥ

original: AbhT_2.29b/. sa eva ghaṭavalloke saṃstathā naiṣa bhairavaḥ // 29
analyzed: saḥ eva ghaṭa vat loke san tathā na eṣa bhairavaḥ
asattvam ca aprakāśa tvam na kutra api upayogi tā

original: AbhT_2.30b/. viśvasya jīvitaṃ satyaṃ prakāśaikātmakaśca saḥ // 30
analyzed: viśvasya jīvitam satyam prakāśa eka ātmakaḥ ca saḥ

original: AbhT_2.31a/. ābhyāmeva tu hetubhyāṃ na dvyātmā na dvayojjhitaḥ /
analyzed: ābhyām eva tu hetubhyām na dvi ātmā na dvaya ujjhitaḥ

original: AbhT_2.31b/. sarvātmanā hi bhātyeṣa kena rūpeṇa mantryatām // 31
analyzed: sarva ātmanā hi bhāti eṣa kena rūpeṇa mantryatām

original: AbhT_2.32b/. śaktyā garbhāntarvartinyā śaktigarbha paraṃ padam // 32
analyzed: śaktyā garbha antar vartinyā śakti garbha param padam

original: AbhT_2.33a/. na bhāvo nāpyabhāvo na dvayaṃ vācāmagocarāt /
analyzed: na bhāvaḥ na api abhāvaḥ na dvayam vācām agocarāt
a kathya padavī rūḍham śakti stham śakti varjitam
iti ye rūḍha saṃvitti parama artha pavitritāḥ
anuttara pathe rūḍhāḥ tebhyaḥ upāya a niyantritāḥ
teṣām idam samābhāti sarvatas bhāva maṇḍalam
puraḥstham eva saṃvitti bhairava agni vilāpitam
eteṣām sukha duḥkha aṃśa śaṃkā ātaṃka vikalpanāḥ
nirvikalpa parāveśa mātra śeṣa tvam āgatāḥ

original: AbhT_2.37a/. eṣāṃ na mantro na dhyānaṃ na pūjā nāpi kalpanā /
analyzed: eṣām na mantraḥ na dhyānam na pūjā nā api kalpanā
na samayi ādika ācārya paryantaḥ kaḥ api viśramaḥ
samasta yantraṇā tantra troṭana āṭaṃka dharmiṇaḥ
na anugrahāt param kiṃcid śeṣa vṛttau prayojanam

original: AbhT_2.39a/. svaṃ kartavyaṃ kimapi kalayaṃlloka eṣa prayatnānno pārārthyaṃ prati ghaṭayate kāṃcana svapravṛttim /
analyzed: svam kartavyam kim api kalayan lokaḥ eṣa prayatnāt no pārārthyam prati ghaṭayate kāṃcana sva pravṛttim

original: AbhT_2.39b/. yastu dhvastākhilabhavamalo bhairavībhāvapūrṇaḥ kṛtyaṃ tasya sphuṭamidamiyallokakartavyamātram // 39
analyzed: yaḥ tu dhvasta akhila bhava malaḥ bhairavībhāva pūrṇaḥ kṛtyam tasya sphuṭam idam iyat loka kartavya mātram
tam ye paśyanti tādrūpya krameṇa amala
te api tad rūpiṇaḥ tāvatī eva asya anugraha ātma tā
etat tattva parijñānam mukhyam yāga ādi kathyate
dīkṣā antam vibhunā śrīmat siddhayogīśvarīmate
sthaṇḍilāt uttaram tūram tūrāt uttaratas paṭaḥ

original: AbhT_2.42b/. paṭāddhyānaṃ tato dhyeyaṃ tataḥ syāddhāraṇottarā // 42
analyzed: paṭāt dhyānam tatas dhyeyam tatas syāt dhāraṇa uttarā

original: AbhT_2.43a/. tato@pi yogajaṃ rūpaṃ tato@pi jñānamuttaram /
analyzed: tatas api yoga jam rūpam tatas api jñānam uttaram
jñānena hi mahā siddhaḥ bhavet yogi īśvaraḥ tu iti
saḥ upi svātantrya dhāmnā ced api anirmala saṃvidām
anugraham cikīrṣuḥ tad bhāvinam vidhim āśrayet

original: AbhT_2.45a/. anugrāhyānusāreṇa vicitraḥ sa ca kathyate /
analyzed: anugrāhya anusāreṇa vicitraḥ sa ca kathyate
tad artham eva ca asya api parameśvara rūpiṇaḥ
tad abhyupāya śāstra ādi śravaṇa adhyayana ādaraḥ

original: AbhT_2.47a/. nahi tasya svatantrasya kāpi kutrāpi khaṇḍanā /
analyzed: nahi tasya svatantrasya kā api kutra api khaṇḍanā
na anirmala citaḥ puṃsaḥ anugrahaḥ tu anupāyakaḥ
śrīmat ūrmi mahā śāstre siddha saṃtāna rūpake
idam uktam tathā śrīmat somānanda ādi daiśikaiḥ
guroḥ vākya ādi ukti pracaya racanā unmārjana vaśāt samāśvāsāt śāstram prati samuditāt vā api kathitāt

original: AbhT_2.49b/. vilīne śaṃkābhre tdṛdayagaganodbhāsimahasaḥ prabhoḥ sūryasyeva spṛśata caraṇāndhvāntajayinaḥ // 49
analyzed: vilīne śaṃkā abhre prabhoḥ sūryasya iva spṛśata caraṇān dhvānta jayinaḥ
idam anuttara dhāma vivecakam vigalita aupayikam kṛtam āhnikam
śrī tantrālokasya tṛtīyam āhnikam

original: AbhT_3.0b/. atha paraupayikaṃ praṇigadyate padamanuttarameva maheśituḥ // 0b
analyzed: atha para aupayikam praṇigadyate padam anuttaram eva maheśituḥ

original: AbhT_3.1a/. prakāśamātraṃ yatproktaṃ bhairavīyaṃ paraṃ mahaḥ /
analyzed: prakāśa mātram yat proktam bhairavīyam param mahaḥ
tatra svatantra tā mātram adhikam pravivicyate

original: AbhT_3.2a/. yaḥ prakāśaḥ sa sarvasya prakāśatvaṃ prayacchati /
analyzed: yaḥ prakāśaḥ sa sarvasya prakāśa tvam prayacchati

original: AbhT_3.2b/. na ca tadvyatirekyasti viśvaṃ sadvāvabhāsate // 2
analyzed: na ca tad vyatireki asti viśvam sat vā avabhāsate
atas asau parameśānaḥ sva ātma vyomani anargalaḥ
iyataḥ sṛṣṭi saṃhāra āḍambarasya pradarśakaḥ
nirmale makure yadvat bhānti bhūmi jala ādayaḥ
amiśrāḥ tadvat ekasmin cit nāthe viśva vṛttayaḥ
sadṛśam bhāti nayana darpaṇa ambara vāriṣu

original: AbhT_3.5b/. tathā hi nirmale rūpe rūpamevāvabhāsate // 5
analyzed: tathā hi nirmale rūpe rūpam eva avabhāsate
pracchanna rāgiṇī kānta pratibimbita sundaram

original: AbhT_3.6b/. darpaṇaṃ kucakumbhābhyāṃ spṛśantyapi na tṛpyati // 6
analyzed: darpaṇam kuca kumbhābhyām spṛśantī api na tṛpyati

original: AbhT_3.7a/. na hi sparśo@sya vimalo rūpameva tathā yataḥ /
analyzed: na hi sparśaḥ usya vimalaḥ rūpam eva tathā yatas
nairmalyam ca ati nibiḍa sajātīya eka saṃgatiḥ
svasmin abhedāt bhinnasya darśana kṣama tā eva yā
atyakta sva prakāśasya nairmalyam tat guru uditam
nairmalyam mukhyam ekasya saṃvid nāthasya sarvatas
aṃśa aṃśikātaḥ kvāpi anyat vimalam tad tad icchayā

original: AbhT_3.10a/. bhāvānāṃ yatpratīghāti vapurmāyātmakaṃ hi tat /
analyzed: bhāvānām yat pratīghāti vapuḥ māyā ātmakam hi tat
teṣām eva asti sat vidyā mayam tu apratighātakam
tat evam ubhaya ākāram avabhāsam prakāśayan
vibhāti vara daḥ bimba pratibimba dṛśā akhile
yaḥ tu āha netra tejāṃsi svacchāt pratiphalanti alam

original: AbhT_3.12b/. viparyasya svakaṃ vaktraṃ gṛhṇantīti sa pṛcchyate // 12
analyzed: viparyasya svakam vaktram gṛhṇanti iti sa pṛcchyate
dehāt anyatra yat tejaḥ tat adhiṣṭhātuḥ ātmanaḥ

original: AbhT_3.13b/. tenaiva tejasā jñatve ko@rthaḥ syāddarpaṇena tu // 13
analyzed: tena eva tejasā jña tve kaḥ ṛthaḥ syāt darpaṇena tu
viparyastaiḥ tu tejobhiḥ grāhaka ātma tvam āgataiḥ

original: AbhT_3.14b/. rūpaṃ dṛśyeta vadane nije na makurāntare // 14
analyzed: rūpam dṛśyeta vadane nije na makura antare
sva mukhe sparśavat ca etat rūpam bhāyāt mama iti alam
na tu asya spṛśya bhinnasya vedya ekānta svarūpiṇaḥ
rūpa saṃsthāna mātram tad sparśa gandha rasa ādibhiḥ
nyagbhūtaiḥ eva tat yuktam vastu tat pratibimbitam
nyagbhāvaḥ grāhya tā bhāvāt tad abhāvaḥ upramāṇataḥ
sa ca artha saṃgama abhāvāt saḥ api ādarśena avasthiteḥ

original: AbhT_3.18a/. ata eva gurutvādirdharmo naitasya lakṣyate /
analyzed: atas eva guru tva ādiḥ dharmaḥ na etasya lakṣyate

original: AbhT_3.18b/. nahyādarśe saṃsthito@sau taddṛṣṭau sa upāyakaḥ // 18
analyzed: na hi ādarśe saṃsthitā usau tad dṛṣṭau sa upāyakaḥ

original: AbhT_3.19a/. tasmāttu naiṣa bhedena yadbhāti tata ucyate /
analyzed: tasmāt tu nā eṣa bhedena yat bhāti tatas ucyate
ādhāraḥ tatra tu upāyāḥ dīpa dṛś saṃvidaḥ kramāt
sarvatas ca api nairmalyāt na vibhā ādarśa vat pṛthak
etat ca devadevena darśitam bodha vṛddhaye

original: AbhT_3.21b/. mūḍhānāṃ vastu bhavati tato@pyanyatra nāpyalam // 21
analyzed: mūḍhānām vastu bhavati tatas upi anyatra na api alam

original: AbhT_3.22a/. pratīghāti svatantraṃ no na sthāyyasthāyi cāpi na /
analyzed: pratīghāti svatantram no na sthāyi asthāyi ca api na
svacchasya eva eṣa kasya api mahimā iti kṛpālunā

original: AbhT_3.23a/. na deśoṃ no rūpaṃ na ca samayayogo na parimā na cānyonyāsaṃgo na ca tadapahānirna ghanatā /
analyzed: na na rūpam na ca samaya yogaḥ na parimā na ca anyonya asaṃgaḥ na ca tad apahāniḥ na ghana tā

original: AbhT_3.23b/. na cāvastutvaṃ syānna ca kimapi sāraṃ nijamiti dhruvaṃ mohaḥ śāmyediti niradiśaddarpaṇavidhiḥ // 23
analyzed: na ca avastu tvam syāt na ca kim api sāram nijam iti dhruvam mohaḥ śāmyet iti niradiśat darpaṇa vidhiḥ
ittham pradarśitā imutra pratibimbana vartmani

original: AbhT_3.24b/. śabdasya pratibimbaṃ yat pratiśrutketi bhaṇyate // 24
analyzed: śabdasya pratibimbam yat pratiśrutkā iti bhaṇyate

original: AbhT_3.25a/. na cāsau śabdajaḥ śabda āgacchattvena saṃśravāt /
analyzed: na ca asau śabda jaḥ śabdaḥ āgacchat tvena saṃśravāt
tena eva vaktrā dūra sthaiḥ śabdasya aśravaṇāt api
piṭhira ādi pidhāna aṃśa viśiṣṭa chidra saṃgatau
citra tvāt ca asya śabdasya pratibimbam mukha ādi vat
idam anyasya vedyasya rūpam iti avabhāsate
yathā ādarśe tathā kena api uktam ākarṇaye tu iti
niyamāt bimba sāṃmukhyam pratibimbasya yat tatas
tad madhya gāḥ pramātāraḥ śṛṇvanti pratiśabdakam

original: AbhT_3.29a/. mukhyagrahaṃ tvapi vinā pratibimbagraho bhavet /
analyzed: mukhya graham tu api vinā pratibimba grahaḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_3.29b/. svapaścātsthaṃ priyaṃ paśyeṭṭaṅkitaṃ mukure vapuḥ // 29
analyzed: sva paścāt stham priyam paśyet ṭaṅkitam mukure vapuḥ
sāṃmukhyam ca ucyate tādṛś darpaṇa abheda saṃsthiteḥ
atas kūpa ādi piṭhira ākāśe tat pratibimbitam
vaktra ākāśam sa śabdam sat bhāti tat paravaktavat

original: AbhT_3.32a/. yathā cādarśapāścātyabhāgastho vetti no mukham /
analyzed: yathā ca ādarśa pāścātya bhāga sthaḥ vetti no mukham

original: AbhT_3.32b/. tathā tathāvidhākāśapaścātstho vetti na dhvanim // 32
analyzed: tathā tathāvidha ākāśa paścāt sthaḥ vetti na dhvanim

original: AbhT_3.33a/. śabdo na cānabhivyaktaḥ pratibimbati taddhruvam /
analyzed: śabdaḥ na ca anabhivyaktaḥ pratibimbati tat dhruvam
abhivyakti śrutī tasya sama kālam dvitīyake

original: AbhT_3.34a/. kṣaṇe tu pratibimbatvaṃ śrutiśca samakālikā /
analyzed: kṣaṇe tu pratibimba tvam śrutiḥ ca sama kālikā
tulya kālam hi no hasta tad chāyā rūpa niścayaḥ
ittham pradarśita imutra pratibimba sa tattvake
prakṛtam brūmahe tatra pratibimbanam arhati

original: AbhT_3.36a/. śabdo nabhasi sānande sparśadhāmani sundaraḥ /
analyzed: śabdaḥ nabhasi sa ānande sparśa dhāmani sundaraḥ
sparśaḥ nyaḥ api dṛḍha āghāta śūla śīta ādika udbhavaḥ
na ca eṣa mukhyaḥ tad kārya pāramparya aprakāśanāt

original: AbhT_3.38a/. evaṃ ghrāṇāntare gandho raso dantodake sphuṭaḥ // 38
analyzed: evam ghrāṇa antare gandhaḥ rasaḥ danta udake sphuṭaḥ

original: AbhT_3.39a/. yathā ca rūpaṃ pratibimbitaṃ dṛśorna cakṣuṣānyena vinā hi lakṣyate /
analyzed: yathā ca rūpam pratibimbitam dṛśoḥ na cakṣuṣā anyena vinā hi lakṣyate

original: AbhT_3.39b/. tathā rasasparśanasaurabhādikaṃ na lakṣyate@kṣeṇa vinā sthitaṃ tvapi // 39
analyzed: tathā rasa sparśana saurabha ādikam na lakṣyate īkṣeṇa vinā sthitam tu api

original: AbhT_3.40a/. na cāntare sparśanadhāmani sthitaṃ bahiḥspṛśonyākṣadhiyaḥ sa gocaraḥ // 40
analyzed: na ca antare sparśana dhāmani sthitam bahis spṛśaḥ nyā akṣa dhiyaḥ sa gocaraḥ
atontika stha svaka tādṛś indriya prayojana antaḥkaraṇaiḥ yadā kṛtā

original: AbhT_3.41b/. tadā tadāttaṃ pratibimbamindriye svakāṃ kriyāṃ sūyata eva tādṛśīm // 41
analyzed: tadā tat āttam pratibimbam indriye svakām kriyām sūyate eva tādṛśīm

original: AbhT_3.42a/. na tu smṛtānmānasagocarādṛtā bhavetkriyā sā kila vartamānataḥ /
analyzed: na tu smṛtāt mānasa gocara ādṛtā bhavet kriyā sā kila vartamānataḥ

original: AbhT_3.42b/. ataḥ sthitaḥ sparśavarastadindriye samāgataḥ sanviditastathākriyaḥ // 42
analyzed: atas sthitaḥ sparśa varaḥ tad indriye samāgataḥ san viditaḥ tathākriyaḥ

original: AbhT_3.43a/. asaṃbhave bāhyagatasya tādṛśaḥ sva eva tasminpratibimbitastathā /
analyzed: asaṃbhave bāhya gatasya tādṛśaḥ svaḥ eva tasmin pratibimbitaḥ tathā

original: AbhT_3.43b/. karoti tāṃ sparśavaraḥ sukhātmikāṃ sa cāpi kasyāmapi nāḍisaṃtatau // 43
analyzed: karoti tām sparśa varaḥ sukha ātmikām sa ca api kasyām api nāḍi saṃtatau
tena saṃvitti makure viśvam ātmānam arpayat
nāthasya vadata amuṣya vimalām viśva rūpa tām
yathā ca gandha rūpa spṛś rasa ādyāḥ pratibimbitāḥ
tad ādhāra uparāgeṇa bhānti khaṅge mukha ādi vat
tathā viśvam idam bodhe pratibimbitam āśrayet
prakāśa tva svatantra tva prabhṛtim dharma vistaram

original: AbhT_3.47a/. yathā ca sarvataḥ svacche sphaṭike sarvato bhavet /
analyzed: yathā ca sarvatas svacche sphaṭike sarvatas bhavet

original: AbhT_3.47b/. pratibimbaṃ tathā bodhe sarvataḥ svacchatājuṣi // 47
analyzed: pratibimbam tathā bodhe sarvatas svaccha tā juṣi
atyanta svaccha tā sā yat sva ākṛti an avabhāsanam

original: AbhT_3.48b/. ataḥ svacchatamo bodho na ratnaṃ tvākṛtigrahāt // 48
analyzed: atas svacchatamaḥ bodhaḥ na ratnam tu ākṛti grahāt

original: AbhT_3.49a/. pratibimbaṃ ca bimbena bāhyasthena samarpyate /
analyzed: pratibimbam ca bimbena bāhya sthena samarpyate
tasya eva pratibimba tve kim bimbam avaśiṣyatām
yat vā api kāraṇam kiṃcid bimba tvena abhiṣicyate
tat api pratibimba tvam eti bodhenyathā tu asat
ittham etat sva saṃvitti dṛḍha nyāya astra rakṣitam
sāmrājyam eva viśvatra pratibimbasya jṛmbhate

original: AbhT_3.52a/. nanu bimbasya virahe pratibimbaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: nanu bimbasya virahe pratibimbam katham bhavet

original: AbhT_3.52b/. kiṃ kurmo dṛśyate taddhi nanu tadbimbamucyatām // 52
analyzed: kim kurmaḥ dṛśyate tat hi nanu tat bimbam ucyatām
nā evam tad lakṣaṇa abhāvāt bimbam kila kim ucyate

original: AbhT_3.53b/. anyāmiśraṃ svatantraṃ sadbhāsamānaṃ mukhaṃ yathā // 53
analyzed: anya amiśram svatantram sat bhāsamānam mukham yathā
sva rūpa an apahānena para rūpa sadṛkṣa tām
pratibimba ātma tām āhuḥ khaḍga ādarśa tala ādi vat

original: AbhT_3.55a/. uktaṃ ca sati bāhye@pi dhīrekānekavedanāt /
analyzed: uktam ca sati bāhyā api dhīḥ ekā aneka vedanāt
aneka sadṛśa ākārā na tu anekā iti saugataiḥ

original: AbhT_3.56a/. nanvitthaṃ pratibimbasya lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ taducyate /
analyzed: nanu ittham pratibimbasya lakṣaṇam kim tat ucyate
anya vyāmiśraṇā yogāt tad bheda aśakya bhāsanam
pratibimbam iti prāhuḥ darpaṇe vadanam yathā
bodha miśram idam bodhāt bhedena aśakya bhāsanam

original: AbhT_3.57b/. paratattvādi bodhe kiṃ pratibimbaṃ na bhaṇyate // 57

analyzed: lakṣaṇasya vyavasthā eṣā kasmāt ced bimbam ucyatām

original: AbhT_3.58b/. prājñā vastuni yujyante na tu sāmayike dhvanau // 58
analyzed: prājñāḥ vastuni yujyante na tu sāmayike dhvanau

original: AbhT_3.59a/. nanu na pratibimbasya vinā bimbaṃ bhavetsthitiḥ /
analyzed: nanu na pratibimbasya vinā bimbam bhavet sthitiḥ

original: AbhT_3.59b/. kiṃ tataḥ pratibimbe hi bimbaṃ tādātmyavṛtti na // 59
analyzed: kim tatas pratibimbe hi bimbam tādātmya vṛtti na
atas ca lakṣaṇasya asya proktasya tad asaṃbhave

original: AbhT_3.60b/. na hānirhetumātre tu praśno@yaṃ paryavasyati // 60
analyzed: na hāniḥ hetu mātre tu praśnaḥ yam paryavasyati

original: AbhT_3.61a/. tatrāpi ca nimittākhye nopādāne kathaṃcana /
analyzed: tatra api ca nimitta ākhye na upādāne kathaṃcana
nimitta kāraṇānām ca kadācid kvāpi saṃbhavaḥ
atas eva purovartini āloke smaraṇa ādinā
nimittena ghanena astu saṃkrānta dayita ākṛtiḥ
anyathā saṃvid ārūḍhā kāntā viccheda yoginī

original: AbhT_3.63b/. kasmādbhāti na vai saṃvid vicchedaṃ purato gatā // 63
analyzed: kasmāt bhāti na vai saṃvid vicchedam puratas gatā

original: AbhT_3.64a/. ata evāntaraṃ kiṃciddhīsaṃjñaṃ bhavatu sphuṭam /
analyzed: atas eva antaram kiṃcid dhī saṃjñam bhavatu sphuṭam
yatra asya vicchidā bhānam saṃkalpa svapna darśane

original: AbhT_3.65a/. ato nimittaṃ devasya śaktayaḥ santu tādṛśe /
analyzed: atas nimittam devasya śaktayaḥ santu tādṛśe
ittham viśvam idam nāthe bhairavīya cit ambare
pratibimba malam svacche na khalu anya prasādataḥ

original: AbhT_3.66a/. ananyāpekṣitā yāsya viśvātmatvaṃ prati prabhoḥ /
analyzed: an anya apekṣi tā yā asya viśva ātma tvam prati prabhoḥ

original: AbhT_3.66b/. tāṃ parāṃ pratibhāṃ devīṃ saṃgirante hyanuttarām // 66
analyzed: tām parām pratibhām devīm saṃgirante hi anuttarām
akulasya asya devasya kula prathana śālinī

original: AbhT_3.67b/. kaulikī sā parā śaktiraviyukto yayā prabhuḥ // 67
analyzed: kaulikī sā parā śaktiḥ a viyuktaḥ yayā prabhuḥ

original: AbhT_3.68a/. tayoryadyāmalaṃ rūpaṃ sa saṃghaṭṭa iti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ yat yāmalam rūpam sa saṃghaṭṭaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_3.68b/. ānandaśaktiḥ saivoktā yato viśvaṃ visṛjyate // 68
analyzed: ānanda śaktiḥ sā eva uktā yatas viśvam visṛjyate

original: AbhT_3.69a/. parāparātparaṃ tattvaṃ saiṣā devī nigadyate /
AbhT_3.69b/. tatsāraṃ tacca hṛdayaṃ sa visargaḥ paraḥ prabhuḥ // 69
analyzed: tat sāram tat ca hṛdayam sa visargaḥ paraḥ prabhuḥ
devīyāmalaśāstre sā kathitā kālakarṣiṇī

original: AbhT_3.70b/. mahāḍāmarake yāge śrīparā mastake tathā // 70
analyzed: mahā ḍāmarake yāge śrī parā mastake tathā
śrī pūrvaśāstre sā mātṛsadbhāva tvena varṇitā
saṃghaṭṭe smin cit ātma tvāt yat tat pratyavamarśanam

original: AbhT_3.72a/. icchāśaktiraghorāṇāṃ śaktīnāṃ sā parā prabhuḥ /
analyzed: icchā śaktiḥ aghorāṇām śaktīnām sā parā prabhuḥ
sā eva prakṣubdha rūpā ced īśitrī saṃprajāyate

original: AbhT_3.73a/. tadā ghorāḥ parā devyo jātāḥ śaivādhvadaiśikāḥ /
analyzed: tadā ghorāḥ parāḥ devyaḥ jātāḥ śaiva adhva daiśikāḥ
sva ātma pratyavamarśaḥ yaḥ prāk abhūt eka vīrakaḥ

original: AbhT_3.74b/. iyaṃ parāparā devī ghorāṃ yā mātṛmaṇḍalīm // 74
analyzed: iyam parāparā devī ghorām yā mātṛ maṇḍalīm
sṛjati aviratam śuddha aśuddha mārga eka dīpikām
jñeya aṃśaḥ pronmiṣan kṣobham yadā eti balavat tvataḥ
ūna tā bhāsanam saṃvid mātra tve jāyate tadā
rūḍham tat jñeya vargasya sthiti prārambhaḥ ucyate
rūḍhiḥ eṣā vibodha abdheḥ citra ākāra parigrahaḥ
idam tad bīja saṃdarbha bījam cinvanti yoginaḥ
icchā śaktiḥ dvi rūpā uktā kṣubhitā a kṣubhitā ca yā

original: AbhT_3.78b/. iṣyamāṇaṃ hi sā vastudvairūpyeṇātmani śrayet // 78
analyzed: iṣyamāṇam hi sā vastu dvairūpyeṇa ātmani śrayet
acira dyuti bhāsinyā śaktyā jvalana rūpayā
iṣyamāṇa samāpattiḥ sthairyeṇa atha dharā ātmanā
unmeṣa śaktau asti etat jñeyam yadi api bhūyasā

original: AbhT_3.80b/. tathāpi vibhavasthānaṃ sā na tu prācyajanmabhūḥ // 80
analyzed: tathā api vibhava sthānam sā na tu prācya janma bhūḥ
icchā śakteḥ atas prāhuḥ cātūrūpyam para amṛtam
kṣobha antarasya asadbhāvāt na idam bījam ca kasyacid
prakṣobhaka tvam bīja tvam kṣobha ādhāraḥ ca yoni tā

original: AbhT_3.82b/. kṣobhakaṃ saṃvido rūpaṃ kṣubhyati kṣobhayatyapi // 82
analyzed: kṣobhakam saṃvidaḥ rūpam kṣubhyati kṣobhayati api
kṣobhaḥ syāt jñeya dharma tvam kṣobhaṇā tad bahiṣkṛtiḥ
tattva icchā bhāsanam kṣobhaṇām viduḥ
yat aikya āpattim āsādya tad icchā kṛtinī bhavet
kṣobha ādhāram imam prāhuḥ śrī somānanda putrakāḥ
yat jñeya mātram tat bījam yat yogāt bīja tā svare

original: AbhT_3.86b/. tasya bījasya saivoktā visisṛkṣā ya udbhavaḥ /
analyzed: tasya bījasya sā eva uktā visisṛkṣā yaḥ udbhavaḥ
yatas grāhyam idam bhāsyat bhinna kalpam cit ātmanaḥ

original: AbhT_3.87a/. eṣa kṣobhaḥ kṣobhaṇā tu tūṣṇīṃbhūtānyamātṛgam /
analyzed: eṣa kṣobhaḥ kṣobhaṇā tu tūṣṇīṃbhūta anya mātṛ gam
haṭhāt yat audāsīnya aṃśa cyāvanam saṃvidaḥ balāt
jātā api visisṛkṣā asau yat vimarśa antar aikyataḥ
kṛtārthā jāyate
tatas tadā antaram jñeyam bhinna kalpa tvam icchati

original: AbhT_3.89b/. viśvabījādataḥ sarva bāhyaṃ bimbaṃ vivartsyati // 89
analyzed: viśva bījāt atas sarva bāhyam bimbam vivartsyati
kṣobhya kṣobhaka bhāvasya sa tattvam darśitam mayā
śrīmat maheśvareṇa uktam guruṇā yat prasādataḥ

original: AbhT_3.91a/. prakṛtaṃ brūmahe nedaṃ bījaṃ varṇacatuṣṭayam /
analyzed: prakṛtam brūmahe na idam bījam varṇa catuṣṭayam
nā api yoniḥ yatas nā etat kṣobha ādhāra tvam ṛcchati
ātmani eva ca viśrāntyā tat proktam amṛta ātmakam
ittham prāk uditam yat tat pañcakam tat parasparam
ucchalat vividha ākāram anyonya vyatimiśraṇāt

original: AbhT_3.93b/. yo@nuttaraḥ paraḥ spando yaścānandaḥ samucchalan // 93
analyzed: yaḥ unuttaraḥ paraḥ spandaḥ yaḥ ca ānandaḥ samucchalan
tau icchā unmeṣa saṃghaṭṭāt gacchataḥ uti vicitra tām
trikoṇam iti tat prāhuḥ visarga āmoda sundaram
anuttara ānanda śaktī tatra rūḍhim upāgate
trikoṇa dvitva yogena vrajataḥ ṣaṣ ara sthitim
te eva unmeṣa yoge api punar tad maya tām gate
kriyāśakteḥ sphuṭam rūpam abhivyaṅktaḥ parasparam
icchā unmeṣa gataḥ kṣobhaḥ yaḥ proktaḥ tad gateḥ api

original: AbhT_3.98a/. te eva śaktī tādrūpyabhāginyau nānyathāsthite /
analyzed: te eva śaktī tādrūpya bhāginyau na anyathā sthite
nanu anuttara tā ānandau sva ātmanā bheda varjitau
katham etāvatīm enām vaicitrīm sva ātmani śritau
śṛṇu tāvat ayam saṃvid nātha uparimita ātmakaḥ
asthāsyat eka rūpeṇa vapuṣā ced maheśvaraḥ
maheśvara tvam saṃvid tvam tat atyakṣyat dhaṭa ādi vat
paricchinna prakāśa tvam jaḍasya kila lakṣaṇam

original: AbhT_3.102a/. jaḍādvilakṣaṇo bodho yato na parimīyate /
analyzed: jaḍāt vilakṣaṇaḥ bodhaḥ yatas na parimīyate
tena bodha maha sindhoḥ ullāsinyaḥ sva śaktayaḥ
āśrayanti ūrmayaḥ iva sva ātma saṃghaṭṭa citra tām
sva ātma saṃghaṭṭa vaicitryam śaktīnām yat parasparam

original: AbhT_3.104a/. etadeva paraṃ prāhuḥ kriyāśakteḥ sphuṭaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: etat eva param prāhuḥ kriyāśakteḥ sphuṭam vapuḥ
asmin caturdaśe dhāmni sphuṭībhūta tri śaktike
triśūla tvam atas prāha śāstā śrī pūrva śāsane
nirañjanam idam ca uktam gurubhiḥ tattva darśibhiḥ
śaktimān añjyate yasmāt na śaktiḥ jātu kenacid

original: AbhT_3.106b/. icchā jñānaṃ kriyā ceti yatpṛthakpṛthagañjyate // 106
analyzed: icchā jñānam kriyā ca iti yat pṛthak pṛthak añjyate
tat eva śaktimat svaiḥ svaiḥ iṣyamāṇa ādikaiḥ sphuṭam
etat tritayam aikyena yadā tu prasphuret tadā
na kenacid upādheyam sva sva vipratiṣedhataḥ
lolībhūtam atas śakti tritayam tat triśūlakam
yasmin āśu samāveśāt bhavet yogī nirañjanaḥ
ittham para amṛta padāt ārabhya aṣṭakam īdṛśam
brāhmī ādi rūpa saṃbheda ādyā ati aṣṭa aṣṭaka tām sphuṭam

original: AbhT_3.110a/. atrānuttaraśaktiḥ sā svaṃ vapuḥ prakaṭasthitam /
analyzed: atra anuttara śaktiḥ sā svam vapuḥ prakaṭa sthitam
kurvantī api jñeya kalā kāluṣyāt vindu rūpiṇī
uditāyām kriyāśaktau soma sūrya agni dhāmani

original: AbhT_3.111b/. avibhāgaḥ prakāśo yaḥ sa binduḥ paramo hi naḥ // 111
analyzed: avibhāgaḥ prakāśaḥ yaḥ sa binduḥ paramaḥ hi naḥ
tattva rakṣā vidhāne ca tat uktam parameśinā
boddhavyaḥ laya bhedena vinduḥ vimala tārakaḥ
yaḥ asau nāda ātmakaḥ śabdaḥ sarva prāṇiṣu avasthitaḥ
adhas ūrdhva vibhāgena niṣkriyeṇa avatiṣṭhate

original: AbhT_3.114b/. hlādataikṣṇyādi vaicitryaṃ sitaraktādikaṃ ca yat // 114
analyzed: hlāda taikṣṇya ādi vaicitryam sita rakta ādikam ca yat

original: AbhT_3.115a/. svayaṃ tannirapekṣo@sau prakāśo gururāha ca /
analyzed: svayam tad nirapekṣaḥ asau prakāśaḥ guruḥ āha ca

original: AbhT_3.115b/. yanna sūryo na vā somo nāgnirbhāsayate@pi ca // 115
analyzed: yat na sūryaḥ na vā somaḥ na agniḥ bhāsayata ipi ca
na ca arka soma vahnīnām tad prakāśāt vinā mahar

original: AbhT_3.116b/. kimapyasti nijaṃ kiṃ tu saṃviditthaṃ prakāśate // 116
analyzed: kim api asti nijam kim tu saṃvid ittham prakāśate
prakāśaḥ yāti taikṣṇya ādim avāntara vicitra tām

original: AbhT_3.118a/. durdarśano@pi gharmāṃśuḥ patitaḥ pāthasāṃ pathi /
analyzed: durdarśanaḥ api gharmāṃśuḥ patitaḥ pāthasām pathi
netra ānanda tvam abhyeti paśya upādheḥ prabhāvi tām
sūrya ādiṣu prakāśaḥ asau upādhi kaluṣīkṛtaḥ
saṃvid prakāśam māheśamate eva hi apekṣate

original: AbhT_3.120a/. prakāśamātraṃ suvyaktaṃ sūrya ityucyate sphuṭam /
analyzed: prakāśa mātram su vyaktam sūryaḥ iti ucyate sphuṭam

original: AbhT_3.121a/. sūrya pramāṇamityāhuḥ somaṃ meyaṃ pracakṣate /
analyzed: sūrya pramāṇam iti āhuḥ somam meyam pracakṣate
anyonyam a viyuktau tau svatantrau api ubhau sthitau
bhoktṛ bhogya ubhaya ātmā etat anyonya unmukha tām gatam
tatas jvalana cit rūpam citrabhānuḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: AbhT_3.123a/. yo@yaṃ vahneḥ paraṃ tattvaṃ pramāturidameva tat /
analyzed: vahneḥ param tattvam pramātuḥ idam eva tat
saṃvid eva tu vijñeya tādātmyāt anapekṣiṇī
svatantra tvāt pramātā uktāḥ vicitraḥ jñeya bhedataḥ
tatas eva agniḥ uditaḥ citrabhānuḥ mahā īśinā
jñeya ādi upāya saṃghāta nirapekṣā eva saṃvidaḥ
sthitiḥ mātā aham asmi iti jñātā śāstra jña vat yatas

original: AbhT_3.126b/. ajña eva yato jñātānubhavātmā na rūpataḥ // 126
analyzed: ajñaḥ eva yatas jñātā anubhava ātmā na rūpataḥ

original: AbhT_3.127a/. na tu sā jñātṛtā yasyāṃ śuddhajñeyādyapekṣate /
analyzed: na tu sā jñātṛ tā yasyām śuddha jñeya ādi apekṣate
tasyām daśāyām jñātṛ tvam ucyate yogya tā vaśāt
māna tā eva tu sā prācya pramātṛ parikalpitā
ucchalantī api saṃvittiḥ kāla krama vivarjanāt
uditā eva satī pūrṇā mātṛ meya ādi rūpiṇī
pāka ādiḥ tu kriyā kāla paricchedāt krama ucitā
mata antya kṣaṇa vandhyā api na pāka tvam prapadyate
ittham prakāśa tattvasya soma sūrya agni tā sthitā

original: AbhT_3.131a/. api mukhyaṃ tatprakāśamātratvaṃ na vyapohyate /
analyzed: api mukhyam tat prakāśa mātra tvam na vyapohyate

original: AbhT_3.131b/. eṣāṃ yatprathamaṃ rūpaṃ hrasvaṃ tatsūrya ucyate // 131
analyzed: eṣām yat prathamam rūpam hrasvam tat sūryaḥ ucyate
kṣobha ānanda vaśāt dīrgha viśrāntyā somaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_3.132b/. yattatparaṃ plutaṃ nāma somānandātparaṃ sthitam // 132
analyzed: yat tat param plutam nāma soma ānandāt param sthitam
prakāśa rūpam tat prāhuḥ āgneyam śāstra kovidāḥ

original: AbhT_3.133b/. atra prakāśamātraṃ yatsthite dhāmatraye sati // 133
analyzed: atra prakāśa mātram yat sthite dhāma traye sati

original: AbhT_3.134a/. uktaṃ vindutayā śāstre śivavindurasau mataḥ /
analyzed: uktam vindu tayā śāstre śiva vinduḥ asau mataḥ
makārāt anyaḥ eva ayam tad chāyā mātra dhṛt yathā
ra la hāḥ ṣaṇṭha vaisarga varṇa rūpa tva saṃsthitāḥ

original: AbhT_3.135b/. ikāra eva rephāṃśacchāyayānyo yathā svaraḥ // 135
analyzed: ikāraḥ eva repha aṃśa chāyayā anyaḥ yathā svaraḥ

original: AbhT_3.136a/. tathaiva mahaleśādaḥ so@nyo dvedhāsvaro@pi san /
analyzed: tathā eva ma ha leśāt aḥ saḥ anyaḥ san

original: AbhT_3.136b/. asyāntarvisisṛkṣāsau yā proktā kaulikī parā // 136
analyzed: asya antar visisṛkṣā asau yā proktā kaulikī parā
sā eva kṣobha vaśāt eti visarga ātmaka tām dhruvam
uktam ca triśiraḥśāstre kalā vyāpti anta carcane
kalā saptadaśī tasmāt amṛta ākāra rūpiṇī

original: AbhT_3.139a/. prakāśyaṃ sarvavastūnāṃ visargarahitā tu sā /
analyzed: prakāśyam sarva vastūnām visarga rahitā tu sā
śakti kuṇḍalikā ca eva prāṇa kuṇḍalikā tathā

original: AbhT_3.140a/. visargaprāntadeśe tu parā kuṇḍalinīti ca /
analyzed: visarga prānta deśe tu parā kuṇḍalinī iti ca
śiva vyoma iti paramam brahma ātma sthānam ucyate
visarga mātram nāthasya sṛṣṭi saṃhāra vibhramāḥ

original: AbhT_3.141b/. svātmanaḥ svātmani svātmakṣepo vaisargikī sthitiḥ // 141

analyzed: visargaḥ evam utsṛṣṭaḥ āśyāna tvam upāgataḥ

original: AbhT_3.142b/. haṃsaḥ prāṇo vyañjanaṃ ca sparśaśca paribhāṣyate // 142
analyzed: haṃsaḥ prāṇaḥ vyañjanam ca sparśaḥ ca paribhāṣyate
anuttaram param dhāma tat eva ākulam ucyate
visargaḥ tasya nāthasya kaulikī śaktiḥ ucyate
visarga tā ca sā eva asyāḥ yat ānanda udaya kramāt
visargaḥ eva tāvān yat ākṣipta etāvat ātmakaḥ
iyat rūpam sāgarasya yat ananta ūrmi saṃtatiḥ
atas eva visargaḥ yam avyakta ha ka la ātmakaḥ
kāma tattvam iti śrīmat kulaguhvare ucyate
yat tat akṣaram avyakta kāntā kaṇṭhe vyavasthitam
dhvani rūpam aniccham tu dhyāna dhāraṇa varjitam
tatra cittam samādhāya vaśayet yugapad jagat

original: AbhT_3.148b/. ata eva visargasya haṃse yadvatsphuṭā sthitiḥ // 148
analyzed: atas eva visargasya haṃse yadvat sphuṭā sthitiḥ
tadvat sā anuttara ādīnām ka ādi sa anta tayā sthitiḥ
anuttarāt kavargasya sūtiḥ pañca ātmanaḥ sphuṭam
pañca śakti ātmataḥ vaśaḥ eka ekatra yathā sphuṭaḥ
yā tu uktā jñeya kāluṣya bhāj kṣipra cara yogataḥ
dvi rūpāyāḥ tatas jātam ṭa ta ādyam varga yugmakam
unmeṣāt pa ādi vargaḥ tu yatas viśvam samāpyate
jñeya rūpam idam pañcaviṃśati antam yatas sphuṭam
jñeya tvāt sphuṭataḥ proktam etāvat sparśa rūpakam
icchā śaktiḥ ca yā dvedhā kṣubhita a kṣubhita tvataḥ
sā vijātīya śakti aṃśa pronmukhī yāti yā ātma tām
sā eva śīghratara upātta jñeya kāluṣya rūṣitā

original: AbhT_3.155b/. vijātīyonmukhatvena ratvaṃ latvaṃ ca gacchati // 155
analyzed: vijātīya unmukha tvena ra tvam la tvam ca gacchati
tadvat unmeṣa śaktiḥ dvi rūpā vaijātya śakti gā
vakāra tvam prapadyeta sṛṣṭi sāra pravarṣakam
icchā eva anuttara ānanda yātā śīghra tva yogataḥ
vāyuḥ iti ucyate vahniḥ bhāsanāt sthairyataḥ dharā
idam catuṣkam antaḥstham atas eva nigadyate
icchā ādi antargata tvena sva samāptau ca saṃsthiteḥ
sajātīyaka śaktīnām icchā ādyānām ca yojanam
kṣobha ātmakam idam prāhuḥ kṣobha akṣobha ātmanām api

original: AbhT_3.160a/. anuttarasya sājātye bhavettu dvitayī gatiḥ /
analyzed: anuttarasya sājātye bhavet tu dvitayī gatiḥ
anuttaram yat tatra ekam tat ced ānanda sūtaye

original: AbhT_3.161a/. prabhaviṣyati tadyoge yogaḥ kṣobhātmakaḥ sphuṭaḥ /
analyzed: prabhaviṣyati tad yoge yogaḥ kṣobha ātmakaḥ sphuṭaḥ
atra api anuttaram dhāma dvitīyam api sūtaye

original: AbhT_3.162a/. na paryāptaṃ tadā kṣobhaṃ vinaivānuttarātmatā /
analyzed: na paryāptam tadā kṣobham vinā eva anuttara ātma tā

original: AbhT_3.162b/. icchā yā karmaṇā hīnā yā caiṣṭavyena rūṣitā // 162
analyzed: icchā yā karmaṇā hīnā yā ca eṣṭavyena rūṣitā
śīghra sthairya prabhinnena tridhā bhāvam upāgatā
an unmiṣitam unmīlat pronmīlitam iti sthitam
iṣyamāṇam tridhā etasyām tādrūpyasya a paricyuteḥ
tat eva sva ūṣmaṇā sva ātma svātantrya preraṇa ātmanā

original: AbhT_3.165a/. bahirbhāvya sphuṭaṃ kṣiptaṃ śa-ṣa-satritayaṃ sthitam /
analyzed: bahis bhāvya sphuṭam kṣiptam śa ṣa sa tritayam sthitam

original: AbhT_3.165b/. tata eva sakāre@sminsphuṭaṃ viśvaṃ prakāśate // 165
analyzed: tatas eva sakāre smin sphuṭam viśvam prakāśate

original: AbhT_3.166a/. amṛtaṃ ca paraṃ dhāma yoginastatpracakṣate /
analyzed: amṛtam ca param dhāma yoginaḥ tat pracakṣate
kṣobha ādi anta virāmeṣu tat eva ca para amṛtam
sītkāra sukha sadbhāva samāveśa samādhiṣu
tat eva brahma paramam avibhaktam pracakṣate
uvāca bhagavān eva tat śrīmat kulaguhkare
kāka cañcu puṭa ākāram dhyāna dhāraṇa varjitam
viṣa tattvam anacka ākhyam tava snehāt prakāśitam

original: AbhT_3.170a/. kāmasya pūrṇatā tattvaṃ saṃghaṭṭe pravibhāvyate /
analyzed: kāmasya pūrṇa tā tattvam saṃghaṭṭe pravibhāvyate

original: AbhT_3.170b/. viṣasya cāmṛtaṃ tattvaṃ chādyatve@ṇoścyute sati // 170
analyzed: viṣasya ca amṛtam tattvam chādya tva iṇoḥ cyute sati
vyāptrī śaktiḥ viṣam yasmāt a vyāptuḥ chādayet mahaḥ

original: AbhT_3.171b/. nirañjanaṃ paraṃ dhāma tattvaṃ tasya tu sāñjanam // 171
analyzed: nirañjanam param dhāma tattvam tasya tu sa añjanam
kriyā śakti ātmakam viśva mayam tasmāt sphuret yatas

original: AbhT_3.172b/. icchā kāmo viṣaṃ jñānaṃ kriyā devī nirañjanam // 172
analyzed: icchā kāmaḥ viṣam jñānam kriyā devī nirañjanam

original: AbhT_3.173b/. atra rūḍhiṃ sadā kuryāditi no guravo jaguḥ // 173
analyzed: atra rūḍhim sadā kuryāt iti no guravaḥ jaguḥ

original: AbhT_3.174a/. viṣatattve saṃpraviśya na bhūtaṃ na viṣaṃ na ca /
analyzed: viṣa tattve saṃpraviśya na bhūtam na viṣam na ca

original: AbhT_3.174b/. grahaḥ kevala evāhamiti bhāvanayā sphuret // 174
analyzed: grahaḥ kevalaḥ eva aham iti bhāvanayā sphuret

original: AbhT_3.175a/. nanvatra ṣaṇṭhavarṇebhyo janmoktaṃ tena ṣaṇṭhatā /
analyzed: nanu atra ṣaṇṭha varṇebhyaḥ janma uktam tena ṣaṇṭha tā

original: AbhT_3.175b/. kathaṃ syāditi cedbrūmo nātra ṣaṇṭhasya sotṛtā // 175
