analyzed: katham syāt iti ced brūmaḥ na atra ṣaṇṭhasya sotṛ tā
tathā hi tatragā yā asau icchāśaktiḥ udīritā
sā eva sūte sva kartavyam antaḥstham sva iṣṭa rūpakam
yat tu atra rūṣaṇā hetuḥ eṣitavyam sthitam tatas

original: AbhT_3.177b/. bhāgānna prasavastajjaṃ kāluṣyaṃ tadvapuśca tat // 177
analyzed: bhāgāt na prasavaḥ tad jam kāluṣyam tad vapuḥ ca tat
jñeya a rūṣaṇayā yuktam samudāya ātmakam viduḥ
ūṣmā iti kathitam nāma bhairaveṇa amala ātmanā
ka ādi ha antam idam prahuḥ kṣobha ādhāra tayā budhāḥ

original: AbhT_3.180b/. yonirūpeṇa tasyāpi yoge kṣobhāntaraṃ vrajet // 180
analyzed: yoni rūpeṇa tasya api yoge kṣobha antaram vrajet
tad nidarśana yogena pañcāśattama varṇa tā

original: AbhT_3.182a/. catuṣkaṃ ca catuṣkaṃ ca bhedābhedagataṃ kramāt /
analyzed: catuṣkam ca catuṣkam ca bheda abheda gatam kramāt
bhedasya abheda rūḍhi eka hetuḥ anyat catuṣṭayam

original: AbhT_3.183b/. itthaṃ yadvarṇajātaṃ tatsarva svaramayaṃ purā // 183
analyzed: ittham yat varṇa jātam tat sarva svara mayam purā
vyakti yogāt vyañjanam tat svara prāṇam yatas kila
svarāṇām ṣaṭkam eva iha mūlam syāt varṇa saṃtatau

original: AbhT_3.185a/. ṣaḍdevatāstu tā eva ye mukhyāḥ sūryaraśmayaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaḍ devatāḥ tu tāḥ eva ye mukhyāḥ sūrya raśmayaḥ
saurāṇām eva raśmīnām antar cāndra kalā yatas

original: AbhT_3.186a/. ato@tra dīrghatritayaṃ sphuṭaṃ cāndramasaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: atas utra dīrgha tritayam sphuṭam cāndramasam vapuḥ

original: AbhT_3.186b/. candraśca nāma naivānyo bhogyaṃ bhoktuśca nāparam // 186
analyzed: candraḥ ca nāma na eva anyaḥ bhogyam bhoktuḥ ca na aparam
bhoktā eva bhogya bhāvena dvaividhyāt saṃvyavasthitaḥ

original: AbhT_3.187b/. ghaṭasya na hi bhogyatvaṃ svaṃ vapurmātṛgaṃ hi tat // 187
analyzed: ghaṭasya na hi bhogya tvam svam vapuḥ mātṛ gam hi tat

original: AbhT_3.188a/. ato mātari yā rūḍhiḥ sāsya bhogyatvamucyate /
analyzed: atas mātari yā rūḍhiḥ sā asya bhogya tvam ucyate
anuttaram parāmṛśya parāmarśaka bhāvataḥ
saṃghaṭṭa rūpa tām prāptam bhogyam icchā ādikam tathā
saṃdhyakṣarāṇām udayaḥ bhoktṛ rūpam ca kathyate

original: AbhT_3.191a/. icchādikaṃ bhogyameva tata evāsya śaktitā /
analyzed: icchā ādikam bhogyam eva tatas eva asya śakti tā

original: AbhT_3.191b/. bhogyaṃ bhoktari līnaṃ ced bhoktā tadvastutaḥ sphuṭaḥ // 191
analyzed: bhogyam bhoktari līnam ced bhoktā tat vastutas sphuṭaḥ

original: AbhT_3.192a/. ataḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ trikaṃ sāraṃ cidiṣyunmeṣaṇātmakam /
analyzed: atas ṣaṇṇām trikam sāram cit iṣi unmeṣaṇa ātmakam

original: AbhT_3.192b/. tadeva tritayaṃ prāhurbhairavasya paraṃ mahaḥ // 192
analyzed: tat eva tritayam prāhuḥ bhairavasya param mahaḥ

original: AbhT_3.193a/. tattrikaṃ parameśasya pūrṇā śaktiḥ pragīyate /
analyzed: tat trikam parameśasya pūrṇā śaktiḥ pragīyate
tena ākṣiptam yatas viśvam atas asmin samupāsite
viśva śaktau avaccheda vandhye jātam upāsanam
iti eṣa mahimā etāvān iti tāvat na śakyate
aparicchinna śakteḥ kaḥ kuryāt śakti paricchidām
tasmāt anuttaraḥ devaḥ svācchandya anuttara tvataḥ
visarga śakti yukta tvāt saṃpannaḥ viśva rūpakaḥ
evam pañcāśat āmarśa pūrṇa śaktiḥ maheśvaraḥ
vimarśa ātmā ekaḥ eva anyāḥ śaktayaḥ utra eva niṣṭhitāḥ
ekāśīti padā devī hi atra antar bhāvayiṣyate
eka āmarśa svabhāva tve śabdarāśiḥ sa bhairavaḥ
āmṛśya chāyayā yogāt sā eva śaktiḥ ca mātṛkā
sā śabdarāśi saṃghaṭṭāt bhinna yoniḥ tu mālinī
prāgvat nava tayā āmarśāt pṛthak varga svarūpiṇī
ekaika āmarśa rūḍhau tu sā eva pañcāśat ātmikā
ittham nāda anuvedhena parāmarśa svabhāvakaḥ

original: AbhT_3.201a/. śivo mātāpitṛtvena kartā viśvatra saṃsthitaḥ /
analyzed: śivaḥ mātā pitṛ tvena kartā viśvatra saṃsthitaḥ

original: AbhT_3.201b/. visarga eva śākto@yaṃ śivabindutayā punaḥ // 201
analyzed: visargaḥ eva śāktoyam śiva bindu tayā punar
garbhīkṛta ananta viśvaḥ śrayaten uttara ātma tām
parāmarśaḥ nirbhara tvāt aham iti ucyate vibhoḥ
anuttara ādyā prasṛtiḥ ha antā śakti svarūpiṇī
pratyāhṛta aśeṣa viśva anuttare sā nilīyate

original: AbhT_3.205b/. tadidaṃ viśvamantaḥsthaṃ śaktau sānuttare pare // 205
analyzed: tat idam viśvam antaḥstham śaktau sā anuttare pare
tat tasyām iti yat satyam vibhunā saṃpuṭīkṛtiḥ
tena śrī trīśikā śāstre śakteḥ saṃpuṭita ākṛtiḥ

original: AbhT_3.207a/. saṃvittau bhāti yadviśvaṃ tatrāpi khalu saṃvidā /
analyzed: saṃvittau bhāti yat viśvam tatra api khalu saṃvidā
tat etat tritayam dvandva yogāt saṃghāta tām gatam
ekam eva param rūpam bhairavasya aham ātmakam

original: AbhT_3.208b/. visargaśaktiryā śaṃbhoḥ setthaṃ sarvatra vartate // 208
analyzed: visarga śaktiḥ yā śaṃbhoḥ sā ittham sarvatra vartate
tatas

original: AbhT_3.209b/. tathāhi madhure gīte sparśe vā candanādike // 209
analyzed: tathā hi madhure gīte sparśe vā candana ādike
mādhyasthya vigame yā asau hṛdaye spandamāna tā

original: AbhT_3.210b/. ānandaśaktiḥ saivoktā yataḥ sahṛdayo janaḥ // 210
analyzed: ānanda śaktiḥ sā eva uktā yatas sahṛdayaḥ janaḥ
citta viśrānti saṃjñā uyamāṇavaḥ tad anantaram
dṛṣṭa śruta ādi tad vastu pronmukha tvam sva saṃvidi
tatra unmukha tva tad vastu saṃghaṭṭāt vastunaḥ hṛdi
rūḍheḥ pūrṇa tayā āveśāt mita citta layāt śive
prāgvat bhaviṣyat aunmukhya saṃbhāvya mita tā layāt
tattva rakṣā vidhāna itas visarga traidham ucyate
hṛd padma kośa madhya sthaḥ tayoḥ saṃghaṭṭaḥ iṣyate
visarga untaḥ sa ca proktaḥ citta viśrānti lakṣaṇaḥ
dvitīyaḥ sa visargaḥ tu citta saṃbodha lakṣaṇaḥ
ekībhūtam vibhāti atra jagat etat carācaram
grāhya grāhaka bhedaḥ vai kiṃcid atra iṣyate yadā

original: AbhT_3.218a/. tadāsau sakalaḥ prokto niṣkalaḥ śivayogataḥ /
analyzed: tadā asau sakalaḥ proktaḥ niṣkalaḥ śiva yogataḥ
tṛtīyaḥ sa visargaḥ tu citta pralaya lakṣaṇaḥ
ekībhāva ātmakaḥ sūkṣmaḥ vijñāna ātmā ātma nirvṛtaḥ
nirūpitaḥ ayam arthaḥ śrī siddhayogīśvarīmate

original: AbhT_3.220b/. sātra kuṇḍalinī bījaṃ jīvabhūtā cidātmikā // 220
analyzed: sā atra kuṇḍalinī bījam jīva bhūtā cit ātmikā

original: AbhT_3.221a/. tajjaṃ dhruvecchonmeṣākhyaṃ trikaṃ varṇāstataḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: tad jam dhruva icchā unmeṣa ākhyam trikam varṇāḥ tatas punar
ā iti avarṇāt ityādi yāvat vaisargikī kalā
kakāra ādi sakāra antāḥ visargāt pañcadhā sa ca

original: AbhT_3.222b/. bahiścāntaśca hṛdaye nāde@tha parame pade // 222
analyzed: bahis ca antar ca hṛdaye parame pade

original: AbhT_3.223a/. bindurātmani mūrdhāntaṃ hṛdayādvyāpako hi saḥ /
analyzed: binduḥ ātmani mūrdha antam hṛdayāt vyāpakaḥ hi saḥ
ādimāntya vihīnāḥ tu mantrāḥ syuḥ śarad abhra vat
guroḥ lakṣaṇam etāvat ādimāntyam ca vedayet

original: AbhT_3.224b/. pūjyaḥ so@hamiva jñānī bhairavo devatātmakaḥ // 224
analyzed: pūjyaḥ saḥ ham iva jñānī bhairavaḥ devatā ātmakaḥ
śloka gāthā ādi yat kiṃcid ādimāntya yutam tatas
tasmāt vidan tathā sarvam mantra tvena eva paśyati
visarga śaktiḥ viśvasya kāraṇam ca nirūpitā
yat lohitam tat agniḥ yat vīryam sūrya indu vigraham

original: AbhT_3.227b/. a iti brahma paramaṃ tatsaṃghaṭṭodayātmakam // 227
analyzed: iti

original: AbhT_3.228a/. tasyāpi ca paraṃ vīrya pañcabhūtakalātmakam /
analyzed: tasya api ca param vīrya pañcabhūta kalā ātmakam
bhogya tvena anna rūpam ca śabda sparśa rasa ātmakam
śabdaḥ api madhuraḥ yasmāt vīrya upacaya kārakaḥ

original: AbhT_3.229b/. taddhi vīryaṃ paraṃ śuddhaṃ visisṛkṣātmakaṃ matam // 229
analyzed: tat hi vīryam param śuddham visisṛkṣā ātmakam matam

original: AbhT_3.230a/. tadbalaṃ ca tadojaśca te prāṇāḥ sā ca kāntatā /
analyzed: tat balam ca tat ojaḥ ca te prāṇāḥ sā ca kānta tā
tasmāt vīryāt prajāḥ tāḥ ca vīrya karmasu kathyate

original: AbhT_3.231a/. yajñādikeṣu tadvṛṣṭau sauṣadhīṣvatha tāḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: yajña ādikeṣu tat vṛṣṭau sa oṣadhīṣu atha tāḥ punar

original: AbhT_3.231b/. vīrye tacca prajāsvevaṃ visarge viśvarūpatā // 231
analyzed: vīrye tat ca prajāsu evam visarge viśva rūpa tā

original: AbhT_3.232a/. śabdarāśiḥ sa evokto mātṛkā sāca kīrtitā /
analyzed: śabdarāśiḥ saḥ eva uktaḥ mātṛkā sā ca kīrtitā
kṣobhya kṣobhaka tā āveśāt mālinīm tām pracakṣate

original: AbhT_3.233b/. mālinī hi parā śaktirnirṇītā viśvarūpiṇī // 233
analyzed: mālinī hi parā śaktiḥ nirṇītā viśva rūpiṇī

original: AbhT_3.234a/. eṣā vastuta ekaiva parā kālasya karṣiṇī /
analyzed: eṣā vastutas ekā eva parā kālasya karṣiṇī
śaktimat bheda yogena yāmala tvam prapadyate
tasya pratyavamarśaḥ yaḥ paripūrṇaḥ uham ātmakaḥ
sa sva ātmani svatantra tvāt vibhāgam avabhāsayet
vibhāga ābhāsane ca asya tridhā vapuḥ udāhṛtam
paśyantī madhyamā sthūlā vaikharī iti abhiśabditam
tāsām api tridhā rūpam sthūla sūkṣma para tvataḥ
tatra yā svara sandarbha subhagā nāda rūpiṇī

original: AbhT_3.238a/. sā sthūlā khalu paśyantī varṇādyapravibhāgataḥ /
analyzed: sā sthūlā khalu paśyantī varṇa ādya pravibhāgataḥ
avibhāga eka rūpa tvam mādhuryam śaktiḥ ucyate
sthāna vāyu ādi gharṣa utthā sphuṭa tā eva ca pāruṣī
tat asyām nāda rūpāyām saṃvid savidha vṛttitaḥ
sājātya antar matta ma yībhūtiḥ jhak iti eva upalabhyate
yeṣām na tanmayībhūtiḥ te deha ādi nimajjanam
a vidantaḥ magna saṃvid mānāḥ tu a hṛdayāḥ iti
yat tu carma avanaddha ādi kiṃcid tatra eṣa yaḥ dhvaniḥ
sa sphuṭa asphuṭa rūpa tvāt madhyamā sthūla rūpiṇī
madhyāyāḥ ca avibhāga aṃśa sadbhāvaḥ iti rakta tā
avibhāga svara mayī yatra syāt tat su rañjakam

original: AbhT_3.243b/. avibhāgo hi nirvṛtyai dṛśyatāṃ tālapāṭhataḥ // 243
analyzed: avibhāgaḥ hi nirvṛtyai dṛśyatām tāla pāṭhataḥ
kila avyakta dhvanau tasmin vādane parituṣyati

original: AbhT_3.244b/. yā tu sphuṭānāṃ varṇānāmutpattau kāraṇaṃ bhavet // 244
analyzed: yā tu sphuṭānām varṇānām utpattau kāraṇam bhavet

original: AbhT_3.245a/. sā sthūlā vaikharī yasyāḥ kāryaṃ vākyādi bhūyasā /
analyzed: sā sthūlā vaikharī yasyāḥ kāryam vākya ādi bhūyasā
asmin sthūla traye yat tat anusandhānam ādi vat
pṛthak pṛthak tat tritayam sūkṣmam iti abhiśabdyate

original: AbhT_3.246b/. ṣaḍjaṃ karomi madhuraṃ vādayāmi bruve vacaḥ // 246
analyzed: ṣaḍjam karomi madhuram vādayāmi bruve vacaḥ
pṛthak eva anusandhāna trayam saṃvedyate kila
etasya api trayasya ādyam yat rupam an upādhimat

original: AbhT_3.248a/. tatparaṃ tritayaṃ tatra śivaḥ paracidātmakaḥ /
analyzed: tat param tritayam tatra śivaḥ para cit ātmakaḥ
vibhāga ābhāsanāyām ca mukhyāḥ tisraḥ utra śaktayaḥ

original: AbhT_3.249a/. anuttarā parecchā ca parāparatayā sthitā /
analyzed: anuttarā parā icchā ca para apara tayā sthitā
unmeṣa śaktiḥ jñāna ākhyā tu aparā iti nigadyate
kṣobha rūpāt punar tāsām uktāḥ ṣaḍ saṃvidaḥ malāḥ
āsām eva samāveśāt kriyā śakti tayā uditāt

original: AbhT_3.251a/. saṃvido dvādaśa proktā yāsu sarvaṃ samāpyate /
analyzed: saṃvidaḥ dvādaśa proktāḥ yāsu sarvam samāpyate
etāvat devadevasya mukhyam tat śakti cakrakam

original: AbhT_3.252a/. etāvatā devadevaḥ pūrṇaśaktiḥ sa bhairavaḥ /
analyzed: etāvatā devadevaḥ pūrṇa śaktiḥ sa bhairavaḥ
iyat tā kalanāt jñānāt tāḥ proktāḥ kālikāḥ kvacid

original: AbhT_3.253b/. śrīsāraśāstre cāpyuktaṃ madhya ekākṣarāṃ parām // 253
analyzed: śrī sāraśāstre ca api uktam madhye ekākṣarām parām
pūjayet bhairava ātma ākhyām yoginī dvādaśa āvṛtām
tābhyaḥ eva catuḥṣaṣṭi paryantam śakti cakrakam
ekārataḥ samārabhya sahasrāram pravartate

original: AbhT_3.255b/. tāsāṃ ca kṛtyabhedena nāmāni bahudhāgame // 255
analyzed: tāsām ca kṛtya bhedena nāmāni bahudhā āgame
upāsāḥ ca dvaya advaita vyāmiśra ākāra yogataḥ
śrīmat traiśirame tat ca kathitam vistarāt bahu
iha naḥ likhitam vyāsa bhayāt ca anupayogataḥ

original: AbhT_3.257b/. tā eva nirmalāḥ śuddhā aghorāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // 257
analyzed: tāḥ eva nirmalāḥ śuddhāḥ aghorāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
ghora ghoratarāṇām tu sotṛ tvāt ca tad ātmikāḥ

original: AbhT_3.258b/. sṛṣṭau sthitau ca saṃhāre tadupādhitrayātyaye // 258
analyzed: sṛṣṭau sthitau ca saṃhāre tad upādhi traya atyaye

original: AbhT_3.259a/. tāsāmeva sthitaṃ rūpaṃ bahudhā pravibhajyate /
analyzed: tāsām eva sthitam rūpam bahudhā pravibhajyate

original: AbhT_3.259b/. upādhyatītaṃ yadrūpaṃ taddvidhā guravo jaguḥ // 259
analyzed: upādhi atītam yat rūpam tat dvidhā guravaḥ jaguḥ
an ullāsāt upādhīnām yat vā praśama yogataḥ

original: AbhT_3.260b/. praśamaśca dvidhā śāntyā haṭhapākakrameṇa tu // 260
analyzed: praśamaḥ ca dvidhā śāntyā haṭha pāka krameṇa tu
alam grāsa rasa ākhyena satatam jvalana ātmanā
haṭha pāka praśamanam yat tṛtīyam tat eva ca
upadeśāya yujyeta bheda indhana vidāhakam

original: AbhT_3.262a/. nijabodhajaṭharahutabhuji bhāvāḥ sarve samarpitā haṭhataḥ /
analyzed: nija bodha jaṭhara hutabhuji bhāvāḥ sarve samarpitāḥ haṭhataḥ

original: AbhT_3.262b/. vijahati bhedavibhāgaṃ nijaśaktyā taṃ samindhānāḥ // 262
analyzed: vijahati bheda vibhāgam nija śaktyā tam samindhānāḥ

original: AbhT_3.263a/. haṭhapākena bhāvānāṃ rūpe bhinne vilāpite /
analyzed: haṭha pākena bhāvānām rūpe bhinne vilāpite
aśnanti amṛtasādbhūtam viśvam saṃvitti devatāḥ
tāḥ tṛptāḥ sva ātmanaḥ pūrṇa hṛdaya ekānta śāyinam
cit vyoma bhairavam devam abhedena adhiśerate
evam kṛtya kriyā āveśāt nāma upāsā bahu tvataḥ
āsām bahuvidham rūpam abhede pi avabhāsate
āsām eva ca devīnām āvāpa udvāpa yogataḥ
eka dvi tri catuṣpañca ṣaṣ sapta aṣṭa nava uttaraiḥ
rudra arka anya kalā senā prabhṛtiḥ bheda vistaraḥ
alam anyena bahunā niyujyate
saṃvid ātmani viśvaḥ yam bhāva vargaḥ prapañcavān

original: AbhT_3.268b/. pratibimbatayā bhāti yasya viśveśvaro hi saḥ // 268
analyzed: pratibimba tayā bhāti yasya viśveśvaraḥ hi saḥ
evam ātmani yasya īdṛś avikalpaḥ sadā udayaḥ
parāmarśaḥ saḥ eva asau śāṃbhava upāya mudritaḥ
pūrṇa ahantā parāmarśaḥ yaḥ sya ayam pravivecitaḥ
mantra mudrā kriyā upāsāḥ tad anyāḥ na atra kāścana
bhūyas bhūyas samāveśam nirvikalpam imam śritaḥ
abhyeti bhairavībhāvam jīvanmukti apara abhidham
itas eva prabhṛti eṣā jīvanmuktiḥ vicāryate
yatra sūtraṇayā api iyam upāya upeya kalpanā

original: AbhT_3.273a/. prāktane tvāhnike kācidbhedasya kalanāpi no /
analyzed: prāktane tu āhnike kācid bhedasya kalanā api no

original: AbhT_3.273b/. tenānupāye tasminko mucyate vā kathaṃ kutaḥ // 273
analyzed: tena anupāye tasmin kaḥ mucyate vā katham kutas
pañcāśat bheda tām pūrva sūtritām yojayet budhaḥ
dharām eva avikalpena sva ātmani pratibimbitām
paśyan bhairava tām yāti jala ādiṣu api ayam vidhiḥ
yāvat ante param tattvam samasta āvaraṇa ūrdhva gam

original: AbhT_3.276b/. vyāpi svatantraṃ sarvajñaṃ yacchivaṃ parikalpitam // 276
analyzed: vyāpi svatantram sarva jñam yat śivam parikalpitam
tat api akalpita udāra saṃvid darpaṇa bimbitam
paśyan vikalpa vikalaḥ bhairavībhavati svayam
yathā raktam puras paśyan nirvikalpaka saṃvidā
tadvat dharā ādika ekaika saṃghāta samudāyataḥ
parāmṛśan svam ātmānam pūrṇaḥ eva avabhāsate
mattaḥ eva uditam idam mayi eva pratibimbitam

original: AbhT_3.280b/. madabhinnamidaṃ ceti tridhopāyaḥ sa śāmbhavaḥ // 280
analyzed: mad abhinnam idam ca iti tridhā upāyaḥ sa śāmbhavaḥ

original: AbhT_3.281a/. sṛṣṭeḥ sthiteḥ saṃhṛteśca tadetatsūtraṇaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: sṛṣṭeḥ sthiteḥ saṃhṛteḥ ca tat etat sūtraṇam kṛtam

original: AbhT_3.281b/. yatra sthitaṃ yataśceti tadāha spandaśāsane // 281
analyzed: yatra sthitam yatas ca iti tat āha spanda śāsane

original: AbhT_3.282a/. etāvataiva hyaiśvarya saṃvidaḥ khyāpitaṃ param /
analyzed: etāvatā eva hi aiśvarya saṃvidaḥ khyāpitam param

original: AbhT_3.282b/. viśvātmakatvaṃ cetyanyallakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ nu kathyatām // 282
analyzed: viśva ātmaka tvam ca iti anyat lakṣaṇam kim nu kathyatām
sva ātmani eva cit ākāśe viśvam asmi avabhāsayan

original: AbhT_3.283b/. sraṣṭā viśvātmaka iti prathayā bhairavātmatā // 283
analyzed: sraṣṭā viśva ātmakaḥ iti prathayā bhairava ātma tā
ṣaḍadhva jātam nikhilam mayi eva pratibimbitam
sthiti kartā aham asmi iti sphuṭā iyam viśva rūpa tā
sadā udita mahā bodha jvālā jaṭila tā ātmani
viśvam dravati mayi etat iti paśyan praśāmyati
ploṣakaḥ śivaḥ eva aham iti ullāsī hutāśanaḥ

original: AbhT_3.287a/. jagatsarvaṃ mattaḥ prabhavati vibhedena bahudhā tathāpyetadrūḍhaṃ mayi vigalite tvatra na paraḥ /
analyzed: jagat sarvam mattaḥ prabhavati vibhedena bahudhā tathā api etat rūḍham mayi vigalite tu atra na paraḥ

original: AbhT_3.287b/. taditthaṃ yaḥ sṛṣṭisthitivilayabhekīkṛtivaśādanaṃśaṃ paśyetsa sphurati hi turīyaṃ padabhitaḥ // 287
analyzed: tat ittham yaḥ sṛṣṭi sthiti vilaya bhekīkṛti vaśāt anaṃśam paśyet sa sphurati hi turīyam pada bhitas
tat asmin parama upāye śāmbhava advaita śālini

original: AbhT_3.288b/. ke@pyeva yānti viśvāsaṃ pasmeśena bhāvitāḥ // 288
analyzed: kepi eva yānti viśvāsam pasma īśena bhāvitāḥ
snānam vratam deha śuddhiḥ dhāraṇā mantra yojanā

original: AbhT_3.290a/. ityādikalpanā kāpi nātra bhedena yujyate /
analyzed: iti ādi kalpanā kā api na atra bhedena yujyate
para anugraha kāri tvam atra sthasya sphuṭam sthitam
yadi tādṛś anugrāhyaḥ daiśikasya upasarpati

original: AbhT_3.291b/. athāsau tādṛśo na syādbhavabhaktyā ca bhāvitaḥ // 291
analyzed: atha asau tādṛśaḥ na syāt bhava bhaktyā ca bhāvitaḥ
tam ca ārādhayate bhāvi tādṛśa anugraha īritaḥ

original: AbhT_3.292b/. tadā vicitraṃ dīkṣādividhiṃ śikṣeta koviṃdaḥ // 292
analyzed: tadā vicitram dīkṣā ādi vidhim śikṣeta koviṃdaḥ
bhāvinyaḥ api hi upāsāḥ tāḥ strā eva āyānti niṣṭhitim

original: AbhT_3.294a/. iti kathitamidaṃ suvistaraṃ paramaṃ śāmbhavamātmavedanam // 294a
analyzed: iti kathitam idam su vistaram paramam śāmbhavam ātma vedanam
atha śrī tantrāloke caturtham āhnikam
atha śāktam upāya maṇḍalam kathayāmaḥ parama ātma saṃvide
anantara āhnika ukte ismin svabhāve pārameśvare
pravivikṣuḥ vikalpasya kuryāt saṃskāram añjasā

original: AbhT_4.3a/. vikalpaḥ saṃskṛtaḥ sūte vikalpaṃ svātmasaṃskṛtam /
analyzed: vikalpaḥ saṃskṛtaḥ sūte vikalpam sva ātma saṃskṛtam

original: AbhT_4.3b/. svatulyaṃ so@pi so@pyanyaṃ so@pyanyaṃ sadṛśātmakam // 3
analyzed: sva tulyam saḥ api saḥ upi anyam saḥ upi anyam sadṛśa ātmakam

original: AbhT_4.4a/. caturṣveva vikalpeṣu yaḥ saṃskāraḥ kramādasau /
analyzed: caturṣu eva vikalpeṣu yaḥ saṃskāraḥ kramāt asau
asphuṭaḥ sphuṭatā bhāvī prasphuṭan sphuṭita ātmakaḥ

original: AbhT_4.5a/. tataḥ sphuṭataro yāvadante sphuṭatamo bhavet /
analyzed: tatas sphuṭataraḥ yāvat ante sphuṭatamaḥ bhavet
asphuṭa ādau vikalpe ca bhedaḥ api asti āntarālikaḥ
tatas sphuṭatama udāra tādrūpya parivṛṃhitā
saṃvid abhyeti vimalām avikalpa svarūpa tām
atas ca bhairavīyam yat tejaḥ saṃvid svabhāvakam

original: AbhT_4.7b/. bhūyo bhūyo vimṛśatāṃ jāyate tatsphuṭātmatā // 7
analyzed: bhūyas bhūyas vimṛśatām jāyate tad sphuṭa ātma tā
nanu saṃvid parāmraṣṭrī parāmarśa mayī svatas

original: AbhT_4.8b/. parāmṛśyā kathaṃ tāthārūpyasṛṣṭau tu sā jaḍā // 8
analyzed: parāmṛśyā katham tāthārūpya sṛṣṭau tu sā jaḍā
ucyate sva ātma saṃvittiḥ svabhāvāt eva nirbharā
na asyām apāsyam na ādheyam kiṃcid iti uditam purā
kim tu durghaṭa kāri tvāt svācchandyāt nirmalāt asau
an āvṛtte sva rūpe pi yat ātma ācchādanam vibhoḥ

original: AbhT_4.11b/. saiva māyā yato bheda etāvānviśvavṛttikaḥ // 11
analyzed: sā eva māyā yatas bhedaḥ etāvān viśvavṛttikaḥ
tathā ābhāsanam eva asya dvaitam uktam maheśituḥ
tad dvaya apāsanena ayam parāmarśaḥ abhidhīyate
durbheda pādapasya asya mūlam kṛntanti kovidāḥ
dhārā rūḍhena sat tarka kuṭhāreṇa iti niścayaḥ
tām enām bhāvanām āhuḥ sarva kāmadughām budhāḥ
sphuṭayet vastu yā apetam manaḥ stha padāt api
śrī pūrvaśāstre tat proktam tarkaḥ yoga aṅgam uttamam
heya ādi ālocanāt tasmāt tatra yatnaḥ praśasyate

original: AbhT_4.16a/. mārge cetaḥ sthirībhūtaṃ heye@pi viṣayecchayā /
analyzed: mārge cetaḥ sthirībhūtam heya ipi viṣaya icchayā
prerya tena nayet tāvat yāvat padam anāmayam

original: AbhT_4.17a/. mārgo@tra mokṣopāyaḥ sa heyaḥ śāstrāntaroditaḥ /
analyzed: mārga utra mokṣa upāyaḥ sa heyaḥ śāstra antara uditaḥ
viṣiṇoti nibadhnāti yā icchā niyati saṃgatam

original: AbhT_4.18a/. rāgatattvaṃ tayoktaṃ yat tena tatrānurajyate /
analyzed: rāga tattvam tayā uktam yat tena tatra anurajyate
yathā sāmrājya saṃbhogam dṛṣṭvā a dṛṣṭvā atha bādhame
bhoge rajyeta durbuddhiḥ tadvat mokṣe api rāgataḥ

original: AbhT_4.19b/. sa evāṃśaka ityuktaḥ svabhāvākhyaḥ sa tu sphuṭam // 19
analyzed: saḥ eva aṃśakaḥ iti uktaḥ svabhāva ākhyaḥ sa tu sphuṭam

original: AbhT_4.20a/. siddhyaṅgamiti mokṣāya pratyūha iti kovidāḥ /
analyzed: siddhi aṅgam iti mokṣāya pratyūhaḥ iti kovidāḥ
śiva śāsana māhātmyam vidan api atas eva hi

original: AbhT_4.21a/. vaiṣṇavādhyeṣu rajyeta mūḍho rāgeṇa rañjitaḥ /
analyzed: vaiṣṇava adhyeṣu rajyeta mūḍhaḥ rāgeṇa rañjitaḥ

original: AbhT_4.21b/. yatastāvati sā tasya vāmākhyā śaktiraiśvarī // 21
analyzed: yatas tāvati sā tasya vāma ākhyā śaktiḥ aiśvarī
pāñcarātrika vairiñca saugata ādeḥ vijṛmbhate

original: AbhT_4.22b/. dṛṣṭāḥ sāmrājyasaṃbhogaṃ nindantaḥ ke@pi vāliśāḥ // 22
analyzed: dṛṣṭāḥ sāmrājya saṃbhogam nindantaḥ ke pi vāliśāḥ

original: AbhT_4.23a/. na tu saṃtoṣataḥ sveṣu bhogeṣvāśīḥpravartanāt /
analyzed: na tu saṃtoṣataḥ sveṣu bhogeṣu āśīḥ pravartanāt
bhavanti ati su ghorābhiḥ śaktibhiḥ pātitāḥ yatas
tena śāṃbhava māhātmyam jānanyaḥ śāsana antare
āśvastaḥ na uttarītavyam tena bheda mahā arṇavāt

original: AbhT_4.25b/. śrīkāmikāyāṃ proktaṃ ca pāśaprakaraṇe sphuṭam // 25
analyzed: śrī kāmikāyām proktam ca pāśa prakaraṇe sphuṭam
veda sāṃkhya purāṇa jñāḥ pāñcarātra parāyaṇāḥ
ye kecid ṛṣayaḥ dhīrāḥ śāstra antara parāyaṇāḥ

original: AbhT_4.27a/. bauddhārhatādyāḥ sarve te vidyārāgeṇa rañjitāḥ /
analyzed: bauddha ārhata ādyāḥ sarve te vidyā rāgeṇa rañjitāḥ
māyā pāśena baddha tvāt śiva dīkṣām na vindate

original: AbhT_4.28a/. rāgaśabdena ca proktaṃ rāgatattvaṃ niyāmakam /
analyzed: rāga śabdena ca proktam rāga tattvam niyāmakam

original: AbhT_4.28b/. māyīye tacca taṃ tasmiñchāstre niyamayediti // 28
analyzed: māyīye tat ca tam tasmin śāstre niyamayet iti
mokṣaḥ api vaiṣṇava ādeḥ yaḥ sva saṃkalpena bhāvitaḥ
para prakṛti sāyujyam yat vā api ānanda rūpa tā
viśuddha citta mātram vā dīpa vat saṃtati kṣayaḥ
sa sa vedya apavedya ātma pralaya akala tā mayaḥ

original: AbhT_4.31a/. taṃ prāpyāpi ciraṃ kālaṃ tadgogābhogabhuktataḥ /
analyzed: tam prāpya api ciram kālam tad go gā bhoga bhuktataḥ
tad tattva pralaya ante tu tad ūrdhvām sṛṣṭim āgataḥ
mantra tvam eti saṃbodhāt ananta īśena kalpitāt

original: AbhT_4.32b/. etaccāgre taniṣyāma ityāstāṃ tāvadatra tat // 32
analyzed: etat ca agre taniṣyāmaḥ iti āstām tāvat atra tat
tena ajña jana tā klṛpta pravādaiḥ yaḥ viḍambitaḥ
asat gurau rūḍha cit sa māyā pāśena rañjitaḥ

original: AbhT_4.34a/. so@pi sattarkayogena nīyate sadguruṃ prati /
analyzed: saḥ api sat tarka yogena nīyate sat gurum prati

original: AbhT_4.34b/. sattarkaḥ śuddhavidyaiva sā cecchā parameśituḥ // 34
analyzed: sat tarkaḥ śuddhavidyā eva sā ca icchā parameśituḥ

original: AbhT_4.35a/. śrīpūrvaśāstre tenoktaṃ sa yiyāsuḥ śivecchayā /
analyzed: śrī pūrvaśāstre tena uktam sa yiyāsuḥ śiva icchayā
bhukti mukti prasiddhi artham nīyate sat gurum prati
śaktipātaḥ tu tatra eṣa kramikaḥ saṃpravartate

original: AbhT_4.36b/. sthitvā yo@sadgurau śāstrāntare vā satpathaṃ śritaḥ // 36
analyzed: sthitvā yaḥ sat gurau śāstra antare vā sat patham śritaḥ
guru śāstra gate sattve sattve ca atra vibhedakam
śaktipātasya vaicitryam purastāt pravivicyate
uktam svacchandaśāstre tat vaiṣṇava ādyān pravādinaḥ
sarvān bhramayate māyā sāmokṣe mokṣa lipsayā
yaḥ tu rūḍhaḥ api tatra udyat parāmarśa viśāradaḥ
sa śuddhavidyā māhātmyāt śaktipāta pavitritaḥ
ārohati eva sat mārgam pratyūha parivarjitaḥ

original: AbhT_4.40b/. sa tāvatkasyacittarkaḥ svata eva pravartate // 40
analyzed: sa tāvat kasyacid tarkaḥ svatas eva pravartate

original: AbhT_4.41a/. sa ca sāṃsiddhikaḥ śāstre proktaḥ svapratyayātmakaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca sāṃsiddhikaḥ śāstre proktaḥ sva pratyaya ātmakaḥ

original: AbhT_4.41b/. kiraṇāyāṃ yadapyuktaṃ gurutaḥ śāstrataḥ svataḥ // 41
analyzed: kiraṇāyām yat api uktam gurutaḥ śāstrataḥ svatas
tatra uttarottaram mukhyam pūrva pūrvaḥ upāyakaḥ
yasya sva toyam sat tarkaḥ sarvatra eva adhikāravān
abhiṣiktaḥ sva saṃvitti devībhiḥ dīkṣitaḥ ca saḥ

original: AbhT_4.43b/. sa eva sarvācāryāṇāṃ madhye mukhyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // 43
analyzed: saḥ eva sarva ācāryāṇām madhye mukhyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
tad saṃnidhāne na anyeṣu kalpiteṣu adhikāri tā

original: AbhT_4.44b/. sa samastaṃ ca śāstrārthaṃ sattarkādeva manyate // 44
analyzed: sa samastam ca śāstra artham sat tarkāt eva manyate

original: AbhT_4.45a/. śuddhavidyā hi tannāsti satyaṃ yadyanna bhāsayet /
analyzed: śuddhavidyā hi tat na asti satyam yat yat na bhāsayet
sarva śāstra artha vettṛ tvam akasmāt ca asya jāyate
iti śrī pūva vākye tat akasmāt iti śabdataḥ

original: AbhT_4.46b/. lokāprasiddho yo hetuḥ so@kasmāditi kathyate // 46
analyzed: loka aprasiddhaḥ yaḥ hetuḥ saḥ ukasmāt iti kathyate
sa ca eṣa parameśāna śuddhavidyā vijṛmbhatam

original: AbhT_4.47b/. asya bhodāśca bahavo nirbhittiḥ sahabhittikaḥ // 47
analyzed: asya bhodāḥ ca bahavaḥ nirbhittiḥ sahabhittikaḥ
sarva go ṃśa gataḥ saḥ api mukhya amukhya aṃśa niṣṭhitaḥ

original: AbhT_4.48b/. bhittiḥ paropajīvitvaṃ parā prajñātha tatkṛtiḥ // 48
analyzed: bhittiḥ para upajīvi tvam parā prajñā atha tad kṛtiḥ
adṛṣṭa maṇḍalaḥ upi evam yaḥ kaścid vetti tattvataḥ

original: AbhT_4.49b/. sa siddhibhāgbhavennityaṃ sa yogī sa ca dīkṣitaḥ // 49
analyzed: sa siddhi bhāj bhavet nityam sa yogī sa ca dīkṣitaḥ

original: AbhT_4.50a/. evaṃ yo vetti tattvena tasya nirvāṇagāminī /
analyzed: evam yaḥ vetti tattvena tasya nirvāṇa gāminī
dīkṣā bhavet iti proktam tat śrī triṃśakaśāsane

original: AbhT_4.51a/. akalpito gururjñayaḥ sāṃsiddhika iti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: akalpitaḥ guruḥ jñayaḥ sāṃsiddhikaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
yaḥ tu tad rūpa bhāga ātma bhāvanātaḥ param vinā
śāstra vid sa guruḥ śāstre
tasya api bhedāḥ utkṛṣṭa madhya manda ādi upāyataḥ
bhāvanātaḥ utha vā dhyānāt japāt svapnāt vratāt dhuteḥ
prāpnoti akalpita udāram abhiṣekam mahāmatiḥ
śrīmat vājasanīye śrī vīre śrī brahmayāmale

original: AbhT_4.54b/. śrīsiddhāyāmidaṃ dhātrā proktamanyatra ca sphuṭam // 54
analyzed: śrī siddhāyām idam dhātrā proktam anyatra ca sphuṭam
tasya sva icchā pravṛtta tvāt kāraṇa ananta tā iṣyate
kadācid bhakti yogena karmaṇā vidyayā api vā
jñāna dharma upadeśena mantraiḥ vā dīkṣayā api vā
evamādyaiḥ anekaiḥ ca prakāraiḥ parameśvaraḥ
saṃsāriṇaḥ anugṛhṇāti viśvasya jagataḥ patiḥ
mātṛ maṇḍala saṃbodhāt saṃskārāt tapasaḥ priye
dhyānāt yogāt japāt jñānāt mantra ārādhanāt atas vratāt
saṃprāpyam kula sāmānyam jñānam kaulika siddhi dam

original: AbhT_4.59a/. tattvajñānātmakaṃ sādhyaṃ yatra yatraiva dṛśyate /
analyzed: tattva jñāna ātmakam sādhyam yatra yatra eva dṛśyate

original: AbhT_4.59b/. sa eva hi gurustatra hetujālaṃ prakalpyatām // 59
analyzed: saḥ eva hi guruḥ tatra hetu jālam prakalpyatām
tattva jñānāt ṛte na anyat lakṣaṇam brahmayāmale
tatra eva ca uktam sevāyām kṛtāyām avikalpataḥ

original: AbhT_4.61a/. sādhakasya na cetsiddhiḥ kiṃ kāryamiti codite /
analyzed: sādhakasya na ced siddhiḥ kim kāryam iti ca udite
ātmīyam asya saṃjñāna krameṇa sva ātma dīkṣaṇam
sa sphura tva prasiddhi artham tatas sādhyam prasiddhi ati

original: AbhT_4.63a/. uktaṃ mukhyatayācāryo bhavedyadi na sasphuraḥ /
analyzed: uktam mukhya tayā ācāryaḥ bhavet yadi na sa sphuraḥ
tatra eva ca punar śrīmat rakta ārādhana karmaṇi

original: AbhT_4.64a/. vidhiṃ proktaṃ sadā kurvanmāsenācārya ucyate /
analyzed: vidhim proktam sadā kurvat māsena ācāryaḥ ucyate
pakṣeṇa sādhaka ūrdhva ardhāt putrakaḥ samayī tathā
dīkṣayet japa yogena raktā devī kramāt yatas
guroḥ alābhe proktasya vidhim etam samācaret

original: AbhT_4.66a/. mate ca pustakādvidyādhyayane doṣa īdṛśaḥ /
analyzed: mate ca pustakāt vidyā adhyayane doṣaḥ īdṛśaḥ

original: AbhT_4.66b/. ukto yastena taddoṣābhāve@sau na niṣiddhatā // 66
analyzed: uktaḥ yaḥ tena tad doṣa abhāve au na niṣiddha tā
mantra dravya ādi gupta tve phalam kim iti ca udite
pustaka adhīta vidyāḥ ye dīkṣā samaya varjitāḥ

original: AbhT_4.68a/. tāmasāḥ parahiṃsādi vaśyādi ca carantyalam /
analyzed: tāmasāḥ para hiṃsā ādi vaśyā ādi ca caranti alam

original: AbhT_4.68b/. na ca tattvaṃ vidustena doṣabhāja iti sphuṭam // 68
analyzed: na ca tattvam viduḥ tena doṣa bhājaḥ iti sphuṭam
pūrvam pada yugam vācyam anyonyam hetu hetumat

original: AbhT_4.69b/. yastu śāstraṃ vinā naiti śuddhavidyākhyasaṃvidam // 69
analyzed: yaḥ tu śāstram vinā na eti śuddhavidyā ākhya saṃvidam
guroḥ sa śāstram anvicchuḥ tad uktam kramam ācaret
yena kena api upāyena gurum ārādhya bhaktitaḥ
tad dīkṣā krama yogena śāstra artham vetti asau tatas

original: AbhT_4.71b/. abhiṣekaṃ samāsādya yo bhavetsa tu kalpitaḥ // 71
analyzed: abhiṣekam samāsādya yaḥ bhavet sa tu kalpitaḥ
san api aśeṣa pāśa ogha vinivartana kovidaḥ
yaḥ yathā krama yogena kasmiṃścid śāstra vastuni

original: AbhT_4.73a/. ākasmikaṃ brajedbodhaṃ kalpitākalpito hi saḥ /
analyzed: ākasmikam brajet bodham kalpita akalpitaḥ hi saḥ

original: AbhT_4.73b/. tasya yo@kalpito bhāgaḥ sa tu śreṣṭhamaḥ smṛtaḥ // 73
analyzed: tasya yaḥ kalpitaḥ bhāgaḥ sa tu śreṣṭhamaḥ smṛtaḥ
utkarṣaḥ śuddhavidyā aṃśa tāratamya kṛtaḥ yatas
yathā bhedena ādisiddhāt śivāt mukta śivāḥ hi adhas
tathā sāṃsiddhika jñānāt āhṛta jñāninaḥ adhamāḥ
tad saṃnidhau na adhikāraḥ teṣām mukta śiva ātma vat

original: AbhT_4.76a/. kiṃ tu tūṣṇīṃ-sthitiryadvā kṛtyaṃ tadanuvartanam /
analyzed: kim tu tūṣṇīṃsthitiḥ yat vā kṛtyam tad anuvartanam
yaḥ tu akalpita rūpaḥ api saṃvāda dṛḍha tā kṛte

original: AbhT_4.77a/. anyato labdhasaṃskāraḥ sa sākṣādbhairavo guruḥ /
analyzed: anyatas labdha saṃskāraḥ sa sākṣāt bhairavaḥ guruḥ
yatas śāstra kramāt tad jña guru prajñā anuśīlanāt

original: AbhT_4.78b/. tena śrīkiraṇoktaṃ yadgurutaḥ śāstrataḥ svataḥ // 78
analyzed: tena śrī kiraṇa uktam yat gurutaḥ śāstrataḥ svatas
tri pratyayam idam jñānam iti yat ca niśāṭane
tad saṃghāta viparyāsa vigrahaiḥ bhāsate tathā
karaṇasya vicitra tvāt vicitrām eva tām chidam

original: AbhT_4.80b/. kartuṃ vāsīṃ ca ṭaṅkaṃ ca krakacaṃ cāpi gṛhṇate // 80
analyzed: kartum vāsīm ca ṭaṅkam ca krakacam ca api gṛhṇate
tāvat ca chedanam hi ekam tathā eva adya abhisaṃdhitaḥ

original: AbhT_4.81b/. itthameva mitau vācyaṃ karaṇasya svakaṃ vapuḥ // 81
analyzed: ittham eva mitau vācyam karaṇasya svakam vapuḥ

original: AbhT_4.82a/. na svatantraṃ svato mānaṃ kuryādadhigamaṃ haṭhāt /
analyzed: na svatantram svatas mānam kuryāt adhigamam haṭhāt
pramātṛ āśvāsa paryantaḥ yatas adhigamaḥ ucyate
āśvāsaḥ ca vicitraḥ ūsau śaktipāta vaśāt tathā
pramite api pramāṇānām avakāśaḥ asti atas sphuṭaḥ

original: AbhT_4.84a/. dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā samāśliṣya ciraṃ saṃcarvya cetasā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā samāśliṣya ciram saṃcarvya cetasā

original: AbhT_4.84b/. priyā yaiḥ parituṣyeta kiṃ brūmaḥ kila tānprati // 84
analyzed: priyāḥ yaiḥ parituṣyeta kim brūmaḥ kila tān prati

original: AbhT_4.85a/. itthaṃ ca mānasaṃplutyāmapi nādhigate gatiḥ /
analyzed: ittham ca māna saṃplutyām api na adhigate gatiḥ

original: AbhT_4.85b/. na vyarthatā nānavasthā nānyonyāśrayatāpi ca // 85
analyzed: na vyartha tā nā anavasthā na anyonya āśraya tā api ca

original: AbhT_4.86a/. evaṃ yogāṅgamiyati tarka eva na cāparam /
analyzed: evam yoga aṅgam iyati tarkaḥ eva na ca aparam
antar antar parāmarśa pāṭava atiśayāya saḥ
ahiṃsā satyam asteya brahmacarya aparigrahāḥ

original: AbhT_4.87b/. iti pañca yamāḥ sākṣātsaṃvittau nopayoginaḥ // 87
analyzed: iti pañca yamāḥ sākṣāt saṃvittau na upayoginaḥ

original: AbhT_4.88a/. tapaḥprabhṛtayo ye ca niyamā yattathāsanam /
analyzed: tapaḥ prabhṛtayaḥ ye ca niyamāḥ yat tathā āsanam
prāṇāyāmāḥ ca ye sarvam etat bāhya vijṛmbhitam
śrīmat vīrāvalau ca uktam bodha mātre śiva ātmake
citta pralaya bandhena pralīne śaśi bhāskare

original: AbhT_4.90a/. prāpte ca dvādaśe bhāge jīvāditye svabodhake /
analyzed: prāpte ca dvādaśe bhāge jīvāditye sva bodhake

original: AbhT_4.90b/. mokṣaḥ sa eva kathitaḥ prāṇāyāmo nirarthakaḥ // 90
analyzed: mokṣaḥ saḥ eva kathitaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ nirarthakaḥ

original: AbhT_4.91a/. prāṇāyāmo na kartavyaḥ śarīraṃ yena pīḍyate /
analyzed: prāṇāyāmaḥ na kartavyaḥ śarīram yena pīḍyate

original: AbhT_4.91b/. rahasyaṃ vetti yo yatra sa muktaḥ sa ca mocakaḥ // 91
analyzed: rahasyam vetti yaḥ yatra sa muktaḥ sa ca mocakaḥ
pratyāhāraḥ ca nāma ayam arthebhyaḥ ukṣa dhiyām hi yaḥ

original: AbhT_4.92b/. anibaddhasya bandhasya tadantaḥ kila kīlanam // 92
analyzed: anibaddhasya bandhasya tat antar kila kīlanam

original: AbhT_4.93a/. cittasya viṣaye kvāpi bandhanaṃ dhāraṇātmakam /
analyzed: cittasya viṣaye kvāpi bandhanam dhāraṇā ātmakam
tad sadṛś jñāna saṃtānaḥ dhyānam astamitā param

original: AbhT_4.94a/. yadā tu jñeyatādātmyameva saṃvidi jāyate /
analyzed: yadā tu jñeya tādātmyam eva saṃvidi jāyate
tat eṣā dhāraṇā dhyāna samādhi tritayī parām

original: AbhT_4.95b/. saṃvidaṃ prati no kaṃcidupayogaṃ samaśnute // 95
analyzed: saṃvidam prati no kaṃcid upayogam samaśnute
yoga aṅga tā yama ādeḥ tu samādhi antasya varṇyate
sva pūrva pūrva upāya tvāt antya tarka upayogataḥ

original: AbhT_4.97a/. antaḥ saṃvidi rūḍhaṃ hi taddvārā prāṇadehayoḥ /
analyzed: antar saṃvidi rūḍham hi tad dvārā prāṇa dehayoḥ

original: AbhT_4.97b/. buddhau vārpyaṃ tadabhyāsānnaiṣa nyāyastu saṃvidi // 97
analyzed: buddhau vā arpyam tad abhyāsāt na eṣa nyāyaḥ tu saṃvidi
atha vā asmad dṛśi prāṇa dhī deha ādeḥ api sphuṭam
sarva ātmaka tvāt tatrasthaḥ upi abhyāsaḥ nya vyapohanam
utplāvyate tad vipakṣa pāta āśaṅkā vyapohanāt
guru vākya parāmarśa sadṛśe sva vimarśane
prabuddhe tad vipakṣāṇām vyudāsaḥ pāṭha cintane

original: AbhT_4.101a/. nahyasya guruṇā śakyaṃ svaṃ jñānaṃ śabda eva vā /
analyzed: na hi asya guruṇā śakyam svam jñānam śabdaḥ eva vā

original: AbhT_4.101b/. dhiyi ropayituṃ tena svaprabodhakramo dhruvam // 101
analyzed: dhiyi ropayitum tena sva prabodha kramaḥ dhruvam

original: AbhT_4.102a/. ata eva svapnakāle śrute tatrāpi vastuni /
analyzed: atas eva svapna kāle śrute tatra api vastuni

original: AbhT_4.102b/. tādātmyabhāvanāyogo na phalāya na bhaṇyate // 102
analyzed: tādātmya bhāvanā yogaḥ na phalāya na bhaṇyate
saṃketa anādare śabda niṣṭham āmarśanam
tad ādare tad arthaḥ tu cintā iti paricarcyatām
tad advayāyām saṃvittau abhyāsaḥ anupayogavān
kevalam dvaita mālinya śaṅkā nirmūlanāya saḥ

original: AbhT_4.105a/. dvaitaśaṅkāśca tarkeṇa tarkyanta iti varṇitam /
analyzed: dvaita śaṅkāḥ ca tarkeṇa tarkyante iti varṇitam
tad tarka sādhanāyāḥ tu yama ādeḥ api upāya tā

original: AbhT_4.106a/. uktaṃ śrīpūrvaśastre ca na dvaitaṃ nāpi cādvayam /
analyzed: uktam śrī pūrvaśastre ca na dvaitam na api ca advayam
liṅga pūjā ādikam sarvam iti upakramya śaṃbhunā
vihitam sarvam eva atra pratiṣiddham atha api vā
prāṇāyāma ādikaiḥ aṅgaiḥ yogāḥ syuḥ kṛttrimāḥ yatas
tat tena akṛtakasya asya kalām ṣoḍaśīm

original: AbhT_4.108b/. kiṃ tvetadatra deveśi niyamena vidhīyate // 108
analyzed: kim tu etat atra deveśi niyamena vidhīyate

original: AbhT_4.109a/. tattve cetaḥ sthiraṃ kāryaṃ tacca yasya yathāstviti /
analyzed: tattve cetaḥ sthiram kāryam tat ca yasya yathā astu iti
evam dvaita parāmarśa nāśāya parameśvaraḥ
kvacid svabhāvam amalam āmṛśan aniśam sthitaḥ
vinā eva tad mukhaḥ nyaḥ vā svātantryāt tad vikalpanam
tat ca svaccha svatantra ātma ratna nirbhāsini sphuṭam
bhāva oghe bheda saṃdhātṛ sva ātmanaḥ naiśam ucyate
tat eva tu samasta artha nirbhara ātma eka gocaram
śuddhavidyā ātmakam sarvam eva idam aham iti alam
idam vikalpanam śuddhavidyā rūpam sphuṭa ātmakam
pratihanti iha māyīyam vikalpam bheda bhāvakam

original: AbhT_4.114b/. śuddhavidyāparāmarśo yaḥ sa eva tvanekadhā // 114
analyzed: śuddhavidyā parāmarśaḥ yaḥ saḥ eva tu anekadhā
snāna śuddhi arcanā homa dhyāna japya ādi yogataḥ
viśvam etat sva saṃvitti rasa nirbharitam rasāt
āviśya śuddhaḥ nikhilam
sita bhasmani dehasya majjanam snānam ucyate
ittham ca vihita snānaḥ tarpita ananta devataḥ
tatas api deha ārambhīṇi tattvāni pariśodhayet
śiva ātmakeṣu api eteṣu buddhiḥ yā vyatirekiṇī
sā eva aśuddhiḥ parākhyātā śuddhiḥ tad dhī vimardanam
evam sva deham bodha eka pātram galita bhedakam
paśyan saṃvitti mātra tve svatantre tiṣṭhati prabhuḥ
yat kiṃcid mānasa āhlādi yatra kvāpi indriya sthitau

original: AbhT_4.121a/. yojyate brahmasaddhāmni pūjopakaraṇaṃ hi tat /
analyzed: yojyate brahma sat dhāmni pūjā upakaraṇam hi tat

original: AbhT_4.121b/. pūjā nāma vibhinnasya bhāvaughasyāpi saṃgatiḥ // 121
analyzed: pūjā nāma vibhinnasya bhāva oghasya api saṃgatiḥ
tathā hi saṃvid eva iyam antar bāhya ubhaya ātmanā
svātantryāt vartamānā eva parāmarśa svarūpiṇī

original: AbhT_4.123b/. sa ca dvādaśadhā tatra sarvamantarbhavedyataḥ // 123
analyzed: sa ca dvādaśadhā tatra sarvam antarbhavet yatas

original: AbhT_4.124a/. sūrya eva hi somātmā sa ca viśvamayaḥ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: sūryaḥ eva hi soma ātmā sa ca viśva mayaḥ sthitaḥ
kalā dvādaśaka ātmā eva tat saṃvid paramārthataḥ

original: AbhT_4.125a/. sā ca mātari vijñāne māne karaṇagocare /
analyzed: sā ca mātari vijñāne māne karaṇa gocare

original: AbhT_4.125b/. meye caturvidhaṃ bhāti rūpamāśritya sarvadā // 125
analyzed: meye caturvidham bhāti rūpam āśritya sarvadā
karaṇe grahaṇa ākārāḥ yatas śrī yogasaṃcare

original: AbhT_4.127a/. ye cakṣurmaṇḍale śvete pratyakṣe parameśvari /
analyzed: ye cakṣuḥ maṇḍale śvete pratyakṣe parameśvari
ṣoḍaśa aram dvādaśa aram tatrastham cakram uttamam
prativāraṇa vat rakte tad bahis ye tat ucyate

original: AbhT_4.128b/. dvitīyaṃ madhyage ye te kṛṣṇaśvete ca maṇḍale // 128
analyzed: dvitīyam madhya ge ye te kṛṣṇa śvete ca maṇḍale
tad antarye sthite śuddhe bhinnāñjana sama prabhe

original: AbhT_4.129b/. caturdale tu te jñeye agnīṣomātmake priye // 129
analyzed: catur dale tu te jñeye agnīṣoma ātmake priye

original: AbhT_4.130a/. mithunatve sthite ye ca cakre dve parameśvari /
analyzed: mithuna tve sthite ye ca cakre dve parameśvari
saṃmīlana unmīlanam te anyonyam vidadhātake

original: AbhT_4.131a/. yathā yoniśca liṅgaṃ ca saṃyogātsravato@mṛtam /
analyzed: yathā yoniḥ ca liṅgam ca saṃyogāt sravataḥ umṛtam
tathā amṛta agni saṃyogāt dravataḥ te na saṃśayaḥ
tad cakra pīḍanāt rātrau jyotiḥ bhāti arka soma gam

original: AbhT_4.132b/. tāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramāṃ jyotsnāṃ kālajñānaṃ pravartate // 132
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā paramām jyotsnām kāla jñānam pravartate
sahasra aram bhavet cakram tābhyām upari saṃsthitam
tatas cakrāt samudbhūtam brahmāṇḍam tat udāhṛtam

original: AbhT_4.134a/. tatrasthāṃ muñcate dhārāṃ somo hyagnipradīpitaḥ /
analyzed: tatra sthām muñcate dhārām somaḥ hi agni pradīpitaḥ
sṛjati ittham jagat sarvam ātmani ātmani anantakam
ṣoḍaśa dvādaśa arābhyām aṣṭa āreṣu atha sarvaśas
evam krameṇa sarvatra cakreṣu amṛtam uttamam

original: AbhT_4.136a/. somaḥ sravati yāvacca pañcānāṃ cakrapaddhatiḥ /
analyzed: somaḥ sravati yāvat ca pañcānām cakra paddhatiḥ

original: AbhT_4.136b/. tatpunaḥ pibati prītyā haṃso haṃsa iti sphuran // 136
analyzed: tat punar pibati prītyā haṃsaḥ haṃsaḥ iti sphuran

original: AbhT_4.137a/. sakṛdyasya tu saṃśrutyā puṇyapāpairna lipyate /
analyzed: sakṛt yasya tu saṃśrutyā puṇya pāpaiḥ na lipyate
pañca are sa vikāraḥ utha bhūtvā soma srutā amṛtāt
dhāvati tris asārāṇi guhya cakrāṇi asau vibhuḥ

original: AbhT_4.138b/. yato jātaṃ jagallīnaṃ yatra ca svakalīlayā // 138
analyzed: yatas jātam jagat līnam yatra ca svaka līlayā

original: AbhT_4.139a/. tatrānandaśca sarvasya brahmacārī ca tatparaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ānandaḥ ca sarvasya brahmacārī ca tad paraḥ

original: AbhT_4.139b/. tatra siddhiśca muktiśca samaṃ saṃprāpyate dvayam // 139
analyzed: tatra siddhiḥ ca muktiḥ ca samam saṃprāpyate dvayam

original: AbhT_4.140a/. ata ūrdhvaṃ punaryāti yāvadbrahmātmakaṃ padam /
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam punar yāti yāvat brahma ātmakam padam

original: AbhT_4.140b/. agnīṣomau samau tatra sṛjyete cātmanātmani // 140
analyzed: agnīṣomau samau tatra sṛjyete ca ātmanā ātmani

original: AbhT_4.141a/. tatrasthastāpitaḥ somo dvedhā jaṅghe vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: tatrasthaḥ tāpitaḥ somaḥ dvedhā jaṅghe vyavasthitaḥ
adhas tam pātayet agniḥ amṛtam sravati kṣaṇāt
gulpha jānu ādiṣu vyaktam kuṭila arka pradīpitā

original: AbhT_4.142b/. sā śaktistāpitā bhūyaḥ pañcārādikramaṃ sṛjet // 142
analyzed: sā śaktiḥ tāpitā bhūyas pañca ārā ādi kramam sṛjet
evam śrotre pi vijñeyam yāvat pāda anta gocaram
pādāṅguṣṭhāt samārabhya yāvat brahmāṇḍa darśanam
iti a jānan na eva yogī jānan viśva prabhuḥ bhavet
jvalat nivāsau brahma ādyaiḥ dṛśyate parameśvaraḥ
atra tātparyataḥ proktam akṣe krama catuṣṭayam
eka ekatra yatas tena dvādaśa ātmaka tā uditā

original: AbhT_4.146a/. na vyākhyātaṃ tu nirbhajya yato@tisarahasyakam /
analyzed: na vyākhyātam tu nirbhajya yatas ūti sa rahasyakam
devī tiṣṭhantī māsa rāśi ādi rūpiṇī
atas eṣā sthitā saṃvid antar bāhya ubhaya ātmanā
svayam nirbhāsya tatra anyat bhāsayantī iva bhāsate
tatas ca prāk iyam śuddhā tathā ābhāsana sa utsukā

original: AbhT_4.148b/. sṛṣṭiṃ kalayate devī tannāmnāgama ucyate // 148
analyzed: sṛṣṭim kalayate devī tad nāmnā āgamaḥ ucyate
tathā bhāsita vastu aṃśa rañjanām sā bahis mukhī
sva vṛtti cakreṇa samam tatas api kalayanti alam
sthitiḥ eṣā eva bhāvasya tām antar mukha tā rasāt
saṃjihīrṣuḥ sthiteḥ nāśam kalayantī nirucyate

original: AbhT_4.151a/. tato@pi saṃhārarase pūrṇe vighnakarīṃ svayam /
analyzed: tatas api saṃhāra rase pūrṇe vighna karīm svayam

original: AbhT_4.151b/. śaṅkāṃ yamātmikāṃ bhāge sūte saṃharate@pi ca // 151
analyzed: śaṅkām yama ātmikām bhāge sūte ca

original: AbhT_4.152a/. saṃhṛtya śaṅkāṃ śaṅkyārthavarjaṃ vā bhāvamaṇḍale /
analyzed: saṃhṛtya śaṅkām śaṅkya artha varjam vā bhāva maṇḍale
saṃhṛtim kalayati eva sva ātma vahnau vilāpanāt
vilāpana ātmikām tām ca bhāva saṃhṛtim ātmani

original: AbhT_4.153b/. āmṛśatyeva yenaiṣā mayā grastamiti sphuret // 153
analyzed: āmṛśati eva yena eṣā mayā grastam iti sphuret
saṃhārya upādhiḥ etasyāḥ sva svabhāvaḥ hi saṃvidaḥ
nirupādhini saṃśuddhe

original: AbhT_4.155a/. vilāpite@pi bhāvaughe kaṃcidbhāvaṃ tadaiva sā /
analyzed: vilāpite api bhāva oghe kaṃcid bhāvam tadā eva sā
āśyānayet yaḥ eva āste śaṅkā saṃskāra rūpakaḥ
śubha aśubha tayā saḥ uyam soṣyate phala saṃpadam

original: AbhT_4.156b/. pūrvaṃ hi bhogātpaścādvā śaṅkeyaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate // 156
analyzed: pūrvam hi bhogāt paścāt vā śaṅkā iyam vyavatiṣṭhate
anyat āśyānitam api tadā eva drāvayet iyam
prāyaścitta ādi karmabhyaḥ brahmahatyā ādi karma vat
rodhanāt drāvaṇāt rūpam ittham kalayate citiḥ
tat api drāvayet eva tat api āśyānayet atha

original: AbhT_4.159a/. itthaṃ bhogye@pi saṃbhukte sati tatkaraṇānyapi /
analyzed: ittham bhogye api saṃbhukte sati tad karaṇāni api
saṃharantī kalayate dvādaśa eva aham ātmani
karma buddhi akṣa vargaḥ hi buddhi antaḥ dvādaśa ātmakaḥ
prakāśaka tvāt sūrya ātmā bhinne vastuni jṛmbhate
ahaṃkāraḥ tu karaṇam abhimāna eka sādhanam

original: AbhT_4.161b/. avicchinnaparāmarśī līyate tena tatra saḥ // 161
analyzed: avicchinna parāmarśī līyate tena tatra saḥ
yathā hi khaṅga pāśa ādeḥ karaṇasya vibhedinaḥ
abhedini sva hasta ādau layaḥ tadvat ayam vidhiḥ
tena indriya ogha mārtaṇḍa maṇḍalam kalayet svayam
saṃvid devī svatantra tvāt kalpita ihaṃkṛta ātmani
saḥ eva paramādityaḥ pūrṇa kalpaḥ trayodaśaḥ
karaṇa tvāt prayāti eva kartari pralayam sphuṭam

original: AbhT_4.165a/. kartā ca dvividhaḥ proktaḥ kalpitākalpitātmakaḥ /
analyzed: kartā ca dvividhaḥ proktaḥ kalpita a kalpita ātmakaḥ
kalpitaḥ deha buddhi ādi vyavacchedena carcitaḥ
kālāgni rudra saṃjñā asya śāstreṣu paribhāṣitā

original: AbhT_4.166b/. kālo vyavacchittadyukto vahnirbhoktā yataḥ smṛtaḥ // 166
analyzed: kālaḥ vyavacchid tad yuktaḥ vahniḥ bhoktā yatas smṛtaḥ
saṃsāra aklṛpti klṛptibhyām rodhanāt drāvaṇāt prabhuḥ
anivṛtta paśūbhāvaḥ tatra ahaṃkṛt pralīyate
saḥ api kalpita vṛtti tvāt viśva abheda eka śālini
vikāsini mahākāle līyate iham idaṃmaye
etasyām sva ātma saṃvittau idam sarvam aham vibhuḥ
iti pravikasat rūpā saṃvittiḥ avabhāsate
tatas antar sthita sarva ātma bhāva bhoga uparāgiṇī
paripūrṇā api saṃvittiḥ akule dhāmni līyate

original: AbhT_4.171a/. pramātṛvargo mānaughaḥ pramāśca bahudhā sthitāḥ /
analyzed: pramātṛ vargaḥ māna oghaḥ pramāḥ ca bahudhā sthitāḥ

original: AbhT_4.171b/. meyaugha iti yatsarvamatra cinmātrameva tat // 171
analyzed: meya oghaḥ iti yat sarvam atra cit mātram eva tat
iyatīm rūpa vaicitrīm āśrayantyāḥ sva saṃvidaḥ
svācchandyam anapekṣam yat sā parā parameśvarī
imāḥ prāc ukta kalanāḥ tad vijṛmbhā ucyate yatas

original: AbhT_4.173b/. kṣepo jñānaṃ ca saṃkhyānaṃ gatirnāda iti kramāt // 173
analyzed: kṣepaḥ jñānam ca saṃkhyānam gatiḥ nādaḥ iti kramāt
sva ātmanaḥ bhedanam kṣepaḥ bheditasya avikalpanam
jñānam vikalpaḥ saṃkhyānam anyatas vyatibhedanāt
gatiḥ sva rūpa ārohi tvam pratibimba vat eva yat

original: AbhT_4.176a/. iti pañcavidhāmenāṃ kalanāṃ kurvatī parā /
analyzed: iti pañcavidhām enām kalanām kurvatī parā

original: AbhT_4.176b/. devī kālī tathā kālakarṣiṇī ceti kathyate // 176
analyzed: devī kālī tathā kālakarṣiṇī ca iti kathyate
mātṛsadbhāva saṃjñā asyāḥ tena uktā yat pramātṛṣu
ittham dvādaśadhā saṃvid tiṣṭhantī viśva mātṛṣu

original: AbhT_4.179a/. ekaiveti na ko@pyasyāḥ kramasya niyamaḥ kvacit /
analyzed: ekā evā iti na kopi asyāḥ kramasya niyamaḥ kvacid
krama abhāvāt na yugapad tad abhāvāt kramaḥ api na

original: AbhT_4.180b/. tadasyāḥ saṃvido devyā yatra kvāpi pravartanam // 180
analyzed: tat asyāḥ saṃvidaḥ devyāḥ yatra kvāpi pravartanam

original: AbhT_4.181a/. tatra tādātmyayogena pūjā pūrṇaiva vartate /
analyzed: tatra tādātmya yogena pūjā pūrṇā eva vartate
parāmarśa svabhāva tvāt etasyāḥ yaḥ svayam dhvaniḥ

original: AbhT_4.182a/. sadoditaḥ sa evoktaḥ paramaṃ hṛdayaṃ mahat /
analyzed: sadā uditaḥ saḥ eva uktaḥ paramam hṛdayam mahat
hṛdaye sva vimarśa usau drāvita aśeṣa viśvakaḥ

original: AbhT_4.183b/. spandaḥ sa kathyate śāstre svātmanyucchalanātmakaḥ // 183
analyzed: spandaḥ sa kathyate śāstre sva ātmani ucchalana ātmakaḥ
kiṃcid calanam etāvat ananya sphuraṇam hi yat
ūrmiḥ eṣā vibodha abdheḥ na saṃvid anayā vinā
nistaraṅga taraṅga ādi vṛttiḥ eva hi sindhu tā
sāram etat samastasya yat cit sāram jaḍam jagat
tad adhīna pratiṣṭha tvāt tad sāram hṛdayam mahat

original: AbhT_4.186b/. tathā hi sadidaṃ brahmamūlaṃ māyāṇḍasaṃjñitam // 186
analyzed: tathā hi sat idam brahma mūlam māyā aṇḍa saṃjñitam
icchā jñāna kriyā āroham vinā nā eva sat ucyate
visṛjyate hi tat tasmāt bahis vā atha visṛjyate
evam sat rūpa tā eva eṣām satām śakti traya ātma tām
visargam para bodhena samākṣipya eva vartate
tat sat eva bahīrūpam prāk bodha agni vilāpitam
antar nadat parāmarśa śeṣībhūtam tatas api alam
kha ātma tvam eva saṃprāptam śakti tritaya gocarāt
vedanā ātmaka tām etya saṃhāra ātmani līyate

original: AbhT_4.191b/. idaṃ saṃhārahṛdayaṃ prācyaṃ sṛṣṭau ca hṛnmatam // 191
analyzed: idam saṃhāra hṛdayam prācyam sṛṣṭau ca hṛd matam
etad rūpa parāmarśam akṛtrimam anābilam
aham iti āhuḥ eṣā eva prakāśasya prakāśa tā

original: AbhT_4.193a/. etadvīryaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ mantrāṇāṃ hṛdayātmakam /
analyzed: etat vīryam hi sarveṣām mantrāṇām hṛdaya ātmakam

original: AbhT_4.193b/. vinānena jaḍāste syurjīvā iva vinā hṛdā // 193
analyzed: vinā anena jaḍāḥ te syuḥ jīvāḥ iva vinā hṛdā
akṛtrimā etat hṛdaya ārūḍhaḥ yat kiṃcid ācaret

original: AbhT_4.194b/. prāṇyādvā mṛśate vāpi sa sarvo@sya japo mataḥ // 194
analyzed: prāṇyāt vā mṛśate vā api sa sarvaḥ sya japaḥ mataḥ
yat eva sva icchayā sṛṣṭi svābhāvyāt bahis antarā
nirmīyate tat eva asya dhyānam syāt pāramārthikam

original: AbhT_4.196a/. nirākāre hi ciddhāmni viśvākṛtimaye sati /
analyzed: nirākāre hi cit dhāmni viśva ākṛti maye sati
phala arthinām kācid eva dhyeya tvena ākṛtiḥ sthitā
yathā hi abhedāt pūrṇe api bhāve jalam upāharan
anya ākṛti apahānena ghaṭam arthayate rasāt
tathā eva parameśāna niyati pravijṛmbhaṇāt
kācid eva ākṛtiḥ kāṃcid sūte phala vikalpanām

original: AbhT_4.199a/. yastu saṃpūrṇahṛdayo na phalaṃ nāma vāñchati /
analyzed: yaḥ tu saṃpūrṇa hṛdayaḥ na phalam nāma vāñchati
tasya viśva ākṛtiḥ devī sā ca avaccheda varjanāt
kule yoginaḥ udrikta bhairavīya parāsavāt

original: AbhT_4.200b/. ghūrṇitasya sthitirdehe mudrā yā kācideva sā // 200
analyzed: ghūrṇitasya sthitiḥ dehe mudrā yā kācid eva sā
antar indhana saṃbhāram an apekṣya eva nityaśas

original: AbhT_4.202a/. bodhāgnau tādṛśe bhāvā viśantastasya sanmahaḥ /
analyzed: bodha agnau tādṛśe bhāvāḥ viśantaḥ tasya sat mahaḥ
udrecayantaḥ gacchanti homa karma nimitta tām
yam kaṃcid parameśāna śaktipāta pavitritam
puras bhāvya svayam tiṣṭhet ukta vat dīkṣitaḥ tu saḥ
japya ādau homa paryante yadi api ekaika karmaṇi

original: AbhT_4.204b/. udeti rūḍhiḥ paramā tathāpītthaṃ nirūpitam // 204
analyzed: udeti rūḍhiḥ paramā tathā api ittham nirūpitam
yathā hi tatra tatra aśvaḥ sama nimna unnata ādiṣu
citre deśe vāhyamānaḥ yāti icchā mātra kalpitām
tathā saṃvid vicitrābhiḥ śānta ghoratara ādibhiḥ
bhaṅgībhiḥ abhitas dvaitam tyājitā bhairavāyate

original: AbhT_4.207a/. yathā puraḥsthe mukure nijaṃ vaktraṃ vibhāvayan /
analyzed: yathā puraḥsthe mukure nijam vaktram vibhāvayan

original: AbhT_4.207b/. bhūyo bhūyastadekātma vaktraṃ vetti nijātmanaḥ // 207
analyzed: bhūyas bhūyas tat ekātma vaktram vetti nija ātmanaḥ
tathā vikalpa mukure dhyāna pūjā arcana ātmani
ātmānam bhairavam paśyan nacirāt tanmayībhavet
tanmayībhavanam nāma prāptiḥ sā anuttara ātmani

original: AbhT_4.209b/. pūrṇatvasya parā kāṣṭhā setyatra na phalāntaram // 209
analyzed: pūrṇa tvasya parā kāṣṭhā sā iti atra na phala antaram

original: AbhT_4.210a/. phalaṃ sarvamapūrṇatve tatra tatra prakalpitam /
analyzed: phalam sarvam apūrṇa tve tatra tatra prakalpitam
a kalpite hi pūrṇa tve phalam anyat kim ucyatām

original: AbhT_4.211a/. eṣa yāgavidhiḥ ko@pi kasyāpi hṛdi vartate /
analyzed: eṣa yāga vidhiḥ kaḥ api kasya api hṛdi vartate
yasya prasīdet cit cakram drāk apaścima janmanaḥ

original: AbhT_4.212a/. atra yāge gato rūḍhiṃ kaivalyamadhigacchati /
analyzed: atra yāge gataḥ rūḍhim kaivalyam adhigacchati
lokaiḥ ālokyamānaḥ hi deha bandha vidhau sthitaḥ
atra nāthaḥ samācāram
na atra śuddhiḥ na ca aśuddhiḥ na bhakṣya ādi vicāraṇam

original: AbhT_4.214a/. na dvaitaṃ nāpi cādvaitaṃ liṅgapūjādikaṃ na ca /
analyzed: na dvaitam na api ca advaitam liṅga pūjā ādikam na ca

original: AbhT_4.214b/. na cāpi tatparityāgo niṣparigrahatāpi vā // 214
analyzed: na ca api tad parityāgaḥ niṣparigraha tā api vā
sa parigraha tā vā api jaṭā bhasma ādi saṃgrahaḥ

original: AbhT_4.215b/. tattyāgo na vratādīnāṃ caraṇācaraṇaṃ ca yat // 215
analyzed: tad tyāgaḥ na vrata ādīnām caraṇa ācaraṇam ca yat
kṣetra ādi saṃpraveśaḥ ca samaya ādi prapālanam
para svarūpa liṅga ādi nāma gotra ādikam ca yat
na asmin vidhīyate kiṃcid na ca api pratiṣidhyate
vihitam sarvam eva atra pratiṣiddham atha api ca

original: AbhT_4.218a/. kiṃ tvetadatra deveśi niyamena vidhīyate /
analyzed: kim tu etat atra deveśi niyamena vidhīyate

original: AbhT_4.218b/. tattve cetaḥ sthirīkāryaṃ suprasannena yoginā // 218
analyzed: tattve cetaḥ sthirīkāryam su prasannena yoginā

original: AbhT_4.219a/. tacca yasya yathaiva syātsa tathaiva samācaret /
analyzed: tat ca yasya yathā eva syāt sa tathā eva samācaret
tattve niścala cittaḥ tu bhuñjānaḥ viṣayān api

original: AbhT_4.220a/. na saṃspṛśyeta doṣaiḥ sa padmapatramivāmbhasā /
analyzed: na saṃspṛśyeta doṣaiḥ sa padma patram iva ambhasā
viṣa apahāri mantra ādi saṃnaddhaḥ bhakṣayan api

original: AbhT_4.221a/. viṣaṃ na muhyate tena tadvadyogī mahāmatiḥ /
analyzed: viṣam na muhyate tena tadvat yogī mahāmatiḥ

original: AbhT_4.221b/. aśuddhaṃ hi kathaṃ nāma dehādyaṃ pāñcabhautikam // 221
analyzed: aśuddham hi katham nāma deha ādyam pāñcabhautikam

original: AbhT_4.222a/. prakāśatātirikte kiṃ śuddhyaśuddhī hi vastunaḥ /
analyzed: prakāśa tā atirikte kim śuddhi aśuddhī hi vastunaḥ

original: AbhT_4.222b/. aśuddhasya ca bhāvasya śuddhiḥ syāttādṛśaiva kim // 222
analyzed: aśuddhasya ca bhāvasya śuddhiḥ syāt tādṛśā eva kim
anyonya āśraya vaiyarthya anavasthāḥ ittham atra hi
pṛthivī jalataḥ śuddhyet jalam dharaṇitaḥ tathā
anyonya āśraya tā sā iyam aśuddha tve pi ayam kramaḥ
aśuddhāt jalataḥ śuddhyā id harā iti vyartha tā bhavet
vāyutaḥ vāriṇaḥ vāyoḥ tejasaḥ tasya vā anyatas
bahu rūpa ādikāḥ mantrāḥ pāvanāt teṣu śuddha tā

original: AbhT_4.226a/. mantrāḥ svabhāvataḥ śuddhā yadi te@pi na kiṃ tathā /
analyzed: mantrāḥ svabhāvataḥ śuddhāḥ yadi te api na kim tathā

original: AbhT_4.226b/. śivātmatā teṣu śuddhiryadi tatrāpi sā na kim // 226
analyzed: śiva ātma tā teṣu śuddhiḥ yadi tatra api sā na kim
śiva ātma tva aparijñānam na mantreṣu dharā ādi vat

original: AbhT_4.227b/. te tena śuddhā iti cettajjñaptistarhi śuddhatā // 227
analyzed: te tena śuddhāḥ iti ced tad jñaptiḥ tarhi śuddha tā

original: AbhT_4.228a/. yoginaṃ prati sā cāsti bhāveṣviti viśuddhatā /
analyzed: yoginam prati sā ca asti bhāveṣu iti viśuddha tā
ittham astu tathā api eṣā codanā eva śivā uditā
kā syāt satī iti ced etat anyatra pravitānitam

original: AbhT_4.230a/. vaidikyā bādhiteyaṃ cedviparītaṃ na kiṃ bhavet /
analyzed: vaidikyā bādhitā iyam ced viparītam na kim bhavet
samyak ced manyase bādhaḥ viśiṣṭa viṣaya tvataḥ
apavādena kartavyaḥ sāmānya vihite vidhau
śuddhi aśuddhī ca sāmānya vihite tattva bodhini

original: AbhT_4.232a/. puṃsi te bādhite eva tathā cātreti varṇitam /
analyzed: puṃsi te bādhite eva tathā ca atrā iti varṇitam

original: AbhT_4.232b/. nārthavādādiśaṅkā ca vākye māheśvare bhavet // 232
analyzed: na arthavāda ādi śaṅkā ca vākye māheśvare bhavet

original: AbhT_4.233a/. abuddhipūrvaṃ hi tathā saṃsthite satataṃ bhavet /
analyzed: a buddhi pūrvam hi tathā saṃsthite satatam bhavet

original: AbhT_4.233b/. vyomādirūpe nigame śaṅkā mithyārthatāṃ prati // 233
analyzed: vyoma ādi rūpe nigame śaṅkā mithyā artha tām prati

original: AbhT_4.234b/. śāstrātmanā sthito devo mithyātvaṃ kvāpi nārhati // 234
analyzed: śāstra ātmanā sthitaḥ devaḥ mithyātvam kvāpi nā arhati
icchāvān bhāva rūpeṇa yathā tiṣṭhāsuḥ īśvaraḥ

original: AbhT_4.235b/. tatsvarūpābhidhānena tiṣṭhāsuḥ sa tathā sthitaḥ // 235
analyzed: tad svarūpa abhidhānena tiṣṭhāsuḥ sa tathā sthitaḥ
arthavādaḥ api yatra anya vidhi ādi mukham īkṣate

original: AbhT_4.236b/. tatrāstvasatyaḥ svātantrye sa eva tu vidhāyakaḥ // 236
analyzed: tatra astu asatyaḥ svātantrye saḥ eva tu vidhāyakaḥ
vidhi vākya antare gacchan aṅga bhāvam atha api vā
na nirarthakam eva ayam saṃnidheḥ gajaḍa ādi vat
sva artha pratyāyanam ca asya sva saṃvittyā eva bhāsate
tad apahnavanam kartum śakyam vidhi niṣedhayoḥ
yuktiḥ ca atra asti vākyeṣu sva saṃvid ca api abādhitā

original: AbhT_4.240a/. mṛtadehe@tha dehotthe yā cāśuddhiḥ prakīrtitā /
analyzed: deha utthe yā ca aśuddhiḥ prakīrtitā
anyatra nā iti buddhi antām aśuddham saṃvidaḥ cyutam
saṃvid tādātmyam āpannam sarvam śuddham atas sthitam
śrīmat vīrāvalau ca uktam śuddhi aśuddhi nirūpaṇe

original: AbhT_4.242a/. sarveṣāṃ vāhako jīvo nāsti kiṃcidajīvakam /
analyzed: sarveṣām vāhakaḥ jīvaḥ na asti kiṃcid ajīvakam
yat kiṃcid jīva rahitam aśuddham tat vijānata
tasmāt yat saṃvidaḥ na ati dūre tat śudvim āvahet
avikalpena bhāvena munayaḥ api tathā abhavan

original: AbhT_4.244a/. lokasaṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ tu tattattvaṃ taiḥ pragopitam /
analyzed: loka saṃrakṣaṇa artham tu tat tattvam taiḥ pragopitam

original: AbhT_4.244b/. bahiḥ satsvapi bhāveṣu śuddhyaśuddhī na nīlavat // 244
analyzed: bahis satsu api bhāveṣu śuddhi aśuddhī na nīla vat
yadi vā vastu dharmaḥ api mātṛ apekṣā nibandhanaḥ

original: AbhT_4.246a/. sautrāmaṇyāṃ surā hotuḥ śuddhānyasya viparyayaḥ /
analyzed: sautrāmaṇyām surā hotuḥ śuddhā anyasya viparyayaḥ

original: AbhT_4.246b/. anena codanānāṃ ca svavākyairapi bādhanam // 246
analyzed: anena codanānām ca sva vākyaiḥ api bādhanam
kvacid saṃdarśitam brahmahatyā vidhi niṣedha vat
bhakṣya ādi vidhayā upi enam nyāyam āśritya carcitāḥ

original: AbhT_4.248a/. sarvajñānottarādau ca bhāṣate sma maheśvaraḥ /
analyzed: sarvajñānottara ādau ca bhāṣate sma maheśvaraḥ
na śaivam vaiṣṇavaiḥ vākyaiḥ bādhanīyam kadācana
vaiṣṇavam brahma saṃbhūtaiḥ na ityādi paricarcayet
bādhate yaḥ vaiparītyāt samūḍhaḥ pāpa bhāj bhavet
tasmāt mukhya tayā skanda loka dharmān na ca ācaret
na anya śāstra samuddiṣṭam srotasi uktam nije caret

original: AbhT_4.252a/. yato yadyapi devena vedādyapi nirūpitam /
analyzed: yatas yadi api devena veda ādi api nirūpitam
tathā api kila saṃkoca bhāva abhāva vikalpataḥ
saṃkoca tāratamyena pāśavam jñānam īritam
vikāsa tāratamyena pati jñānam tu bādhakam
idam dvaitam idam na iti paraspara niṣedhataḥ
māyīya bheda klṛptam tat syāt akālpanike katham
uktam bhargaśikhāyām ca mṛtyu kāla kalā ādikam
dvaita advaita vikalpa uttham grasate kṛta dhīḥ iti
kula ādiṣu niṣiddhā asau dehe viśva ātma tā vide
iha sarvātmake kasmāt tad vidhi pratiṣedhane
niyama anupraveśena tādātmya pratipattaye
jaṭā ādi kaule tyāgaḥ usya sukha upāya upadeśataḥ
vrata caryā ca mantra artha tādātmya pratipattaye
tad niṣedhaḥ tu mantra artha sārvātmya pratipattaye
kṣetra pīṭha upapīṭheṣu praveśaḥ vighna śāntaye
mantra ādi ārādhakasya atha tad lābhāya upadiśyate
kṣetra ādi gamana abhāva vidhiḥ tu sva ātmanaḥ tathā
vaiśvarūpyeṇa pūrṇa tvam jñātum iti api varṇitam
bheda prāṇa tayā tad tad tyāgāt tattva viśuddhaye
samaya ādi niṣedhaḥ tu mata śāstreṣu kathyate
nirmaryādam sva saṃbodham saṃpūrṇam buddhyatām iti

original: AbhT_4.263b/. parakīyamidaṃ rūpaṃ dhyeyametattu me nijam // 263
analyzed: parakīyam idam rūpam dhyeyam etat tu me nijam

original: AbhT_4.264a/. jvālādiliṅgaṃ cānyasya kapālādi tu me nijam /
analyzed: jvālā ādi liṅgam ca anyasya kapāla ādi tu me nijam
ādi śabdāt tapaḥ caryā velā atithi ādi kathyate
nāma śakti śiva ādi antam etasya mama na anyathā
gotram ca guru saṃtānaḥ maṭhikākula śabditaḥ
śrī saṃtatiḥ tryambaka ākhyā tad ardhāmarda saṃjñitā
ittham ardha catasraḥ utra maṭhikāḥ śāṃkare krame
yuga krameṇa kūrma ādyā mīna antā siddha saṃtatiḥ

original: AbhT_4.267b/. ādiśabdena ca gharaṃ pallī pīṭhopapīṭhakam // 267
analyzed: ādi śabdena ca gharam pallī pīṭha upapīṭhakam

original: AbhT_4.268a/. mudrā chummeti teṣāṃ ca vidhānaṃ svaparasthitam /
analyzed: mudrā chummā iti teṣām ca vidhānam sva para sthitam

original: AbhT_4.268b/. tādātmyapratipattyai hi svaṃ saṃtānaṃ samāśrayet // 268
analyzed: tādātmya pratipattyai hi svam saṃtānam samāśrayet
bhuñjīta pūjayet cakram para saṃtāninā nahi

original: AbhT_4.269b/. etacca mataśāstreṣu niṣiddhaṃ khaṇḍanā yataḥ // 269
analyzed: etat ca mata śāstreṣu niṣiddham khaṇḍanā yatas

original: AbhT_4.270a/. akhaṇḍe@pi pare tattve bhedenānena jāyate /
analyzed: akhaṇḍe api pare tattve bhedena anena jāyate
evam kṣetra praveśa ādi saṃtāna niyama antataḥ
na asmin vidhīyate tat hi sākṣāt na aupayikam śive

original: AbhT_4.271b/. na tasya ca niṣodho ya nna tattattvasya khaṇḍanam // 271
analyzed: na tasya ca niṣodhaḥ yat na tat tattvasya khaṇḍanam

original: AbhT_4.272a/. viśvātmano hi nāthasya svasminrūpe vikalpitau /
analyzed: viśvātmanaḥ hi nāthasya svasmin rūpe vikalpitau

original: AbhT_4.272b/. vidhirniṣedho vā śaktau na svarūpasya khaṇḍane // 272
analyzed: vidhiḥ niṣedhaḥ vā śaktau na svarūpasya khaṇḍane

original: AbhT_4.273a/. paratattvapraveśe tu yameva nikaṭaṃ yadā /
analyzed: para tattva praveśe tu yam eva nikaṭam yadā

original: AbhT_4.273b/. upāyaṃ vetti sa grāhyastadā tyājyo@tha vā kvacit // 273
analyzed: upāyam vetti sa grāhyaḥ tadā tyājyaḥ utha vā kvacid

original: AbhT_4.274a/. na yantraṇātra kāryeti proktaṃ śrītrikaśāsane /
analyzed: na yantraṇā atra kāryā iti proktam śrī trikaśāsane
sama tā sarva devānām ovallī mantra varṇayoḥ

original: AbhT_4.275a/. āgamanāṃ gatīnāṃ ca sarvaṃ śivamayaṃ yataḥ /
analyzed: āgamanām gatīnām ca sarvam śiva mayam yatas
sa hi akhaṇḍita sadbhāvam śivatattvam prapaśyati
yaḥ hi akhaṇḍita sadbhāvam ātma tattvam prapadyate

original: AbhT_4.276b/. ketakīkusumasaurabhe bhṛśaṃ bhṛṅga eva rasiko na makṣikā /
analyzed: ketakī kusuma saurabhe bhṛśam bhṛṅgaḥ eva rasikaḥ na makṣikā
bhairavīya parama advaya arcane kaḥ api rajyati maheśa coditaḥ

original: AbhT_4.277a/. asmiṃśca yoge viśrāntiṃ kurvatāṃ bhavaḍambaraḥ /
analyzed: asmin ca yoge viśrāntim kurvatām bhava ḍambaraḥ
himāni iva mahā grīṣme svayam eva vilīyate
alam vā atiprasaṅgena bhūyasā ati prapañcite
yogyaḥ abhinavaguptaḥ asmin kaḥ api yāga vidhau budhaḥ
iti anuttara pada pravikāse śāktam aupayikam adya viviktam
atha śrī tantrāloke pañcamam āhnikam

original: AbhT_5.1b/. āṇavena vidhinā paradhāma prepsatāmatha nirūpyata etat // 1b
analyzed: āṇavena vidhinā para dhāma prepsatām atha nirūpyate etat
vikalpasya eva saṃskāre jāte niṣpratiyogini
abhīṣṭe vastuni prāptiḥ niścitā bhoga mokṣayoḥ
vikalpaḥ kasyacid sva ātma svātantryāt eva su sthiraḥ
upāya antara sa apekṣya viyogena eva jāyate
kasyacid tu vikalpaḥ asau sva ātma saṃskaraṇam prati
upāya antara sāpekṣaḥ tatra uktaḥ pūrvakaḥ vidhiḥ

original: AbhT_5.5a/. vikalpo nāma cinmātrasvabhāvo yadyapi sthitaḥ /
analyzed: vikalpaḥ nāma cit mātra svabhāvaḥ yadi api sthitaḥ
tathā api niścaya ātmā asau aṇoḥ svātantrya yojakaḥ

original: AbhT_5.6a/. niścayo bahudhā caiṣa tatropāyāśca bhedinaḥ /
analyzed: niścayaḥ bahudhā ca eṣa tatra upāyāḥ ca bhedinaḥ
aṇu śabdena te ca uktāḥ dūra antika vibhedataḥ

original: AbhT_5.7a/. tatra buddhau tathā prāṇe dehe cāpi pramātari /
analyzed: tatra buddhau tathā prāṇe dehe ca api pramātari
apāramārthike api asmin parama arthaḥ prakāśate
yatas prakāśāt cit mātrāt prāṇa ādi a vyatirekavat
tasya eva tu svatantra tvāt dviguṇam jaḍa cit vapuḥ
uktam traiśirase ca etat devyai candra ardha maulinā

original: AbhT_5.9b/. jīvaḥ śaktiḥ śivasyaiva sarvatraiva sthitāpi sā // 9
analyzed: jīvaḥ śaktiḥ śivasya eva sarvatra eva sthitā api sā
sva rūpa pratyaye rūḍhā jñānasya unmīlanāt parā
tasya cit rūpa tām satyām svātantrya ullāsa kalpanāt
paśyan jaḍa ātma tā bhāgam tirodhāya advayaḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_5.11b/. tatra svātantryadṛṣṭyā vā darpaṇe mukhabimbavat // 11
analyzed: tatra svātantrya dṛṣṭyā vā darpaṇe mukha bimba vat
viśuddham nija caitanyam niścinoti a tad ātmakam

original: AbhT_5.12b/. buddhiprāṇādito bhinnaṃ caitanyaṃ niścitaṃ balāt // 12
analyzed: buddhi prāṇa āditaḥ bhinnam caitanyam niścitam balāt
satyataḥ tat abhinnam syāt tasya anyonya vibhedataḥ
viśva rūpa a vibhedi tvam śuddha tvāt eva jāyate
niṣṭhita eka sphurat mūrteḥ mūrti antara virodhataḥ

original: AbhT_5.14b/. antaḥ saṃvidi satsarvaṃ yadyapyaparathā dhiyi // 14
analyzed: antar saṃvidi sat sarvam yadi api aparathā dhiyi

original: AbhT_5.15a/. prāṇe dehe@thavā kasmātsaṃkrāmetkena vā katham /
analyzed: prāṇe kasmāt saṃkrāmet kena vā katham

original: AbhT_5.15b/. tathāpi nirvikalpe@sminvikalpo nāsti taṃ vinā // 15
analyzed: tathā api nirvikalpe ismin vikalpaḥ nā asti tam vinā
dṛṣṭe ipi adṛṣṭa kalpa tvam vikalpena tu niścayaḥ
buddhi prāṇa śarīreṣu pārameśvaryam añjasā

original: AbhT_5.17a/. vikalpyaṃ śūnyarūpe na pramātari vikalpanam /
analyzed: vikalpyam śūnya rūpe na pramātari vikalpanam
buddhiḥ dhyāna mayī tatra prāṇaḥ uccāraṇa ātmakaḥ

original: AbhT_5.18a/. uccāraṇaṃ ca prāṇādyā vyānāntāḥ pañca vṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: uccāraṇam ca prāṇa ādyāḥ vyāna antāḥ pañca vṛttayaḥ
ādyā tu prāṇana abhikhyā para uccāra ātmikā bhavet
śarīrasya akṣa viṣayā etat piṇḍa tvena saṃsthitiḥ
tatra dhyāna mayam tāvat anuttaram iha ucyate

original: AbhT_5.20a/. yaḥ prakāśaḥ svatantro@yaṃ citsvabhāvo hṛdi sthitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ prakāśaḥ svatantraḥ yam cit svabhāvaḥ hṛdi sthitaḥ
sarva tattva mayaḥ proktam etat ca triśiromate
kadalī saṃpuṭa ākāram sa bāhya abhyantara antaram
īkṣate hṛdaya antar stham tat puṣpam iva tattva vid
soma sūrya agni saṃghaṭṭam tatra dhyāyet an anya dhīḥ

original: AbhT_5.23a/. hṛdayākhye mahākuṇḍe jājvalan sphītatāṃ vrajet /

analyzed: tasya śaktimataḥ sphīta śakteḥ bhairava tejasaḥ
mātṛmān aprameya ākhyam dhāma abhedena bhāvayet
vahni arka soma śaktīnām tat eva tritayam bhavet

original: AbhT_5.25a/. parā parāparā ceyamaparā ca sadoditā /
analyzed: parā parāparā ca iyam aparā ca sadā uditā
sṛṣṭi saṃsthiti saṃhāraiḥ tāsām pratyekataḥ tridhā
caturtham ca anavacchinnam rūpam āsām akalpitam

original: AbhT_5.26b/. evaṃ dvādaśa tā devyaḥ sūryabimbavadāsthitāḥ // 26
analyzed: evam dvādaśa tāḥ devyaḥ sūrya bimba vat āsthitāḥ
ekaikam āsām vahni arka soma tad śānti bhāsanam
etat ā anuttaram cakram hṛdayāt cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ
vyomabhiḥ niḥsarati eva tad tad viṣaya gocare
tad cakra bhābhiḥ tatra arthe sṛṣṭi sthiti laya kramāt
soma sūrya agni bhāsa ātma rūpam samavatiṣṭhate
evam śabda ādi viṣaye śrotra ādi vyoma vartmanā
cakreṇa anena patatā tādātmyam paribhāvayet

original: AbhT_5.30b/. anena kramayogena yatra yatra patatyadaḥ // 30
analyzed: anena krama yogena yatra yatra patati adaḥ
cakram sarva ātmakam tat tat sārvabhauma mahī īśa vat
ittham viśva adhva paṭalam ayatnena eva līyate
tatas saṃskāra mātreṇa viśvasya api parikṣaye
sva ātma ucchalat tayā bhrāmyat cakram saṃcintayet mahat
tatas tad dāhya vilayāt tad saṃskāra parikṣayāt

original: AbhT_5.34a/. praśāmyadbhāvayeccakraṃ tataḥ śāntaṃ tataḥ śamam /
analyzed: praśāmyat bhāvayet cakram tatas śāntam tatas śamam

original: AbhT_5.34b/. anena dhyānayogena viśvaṃ cakre vilīyate // 34
analyzed: anena dhyāna yogena viśvam cakre vilīyate
tad saṃvidi tatas saṃvid vilīna arthā eva bhāsate
cit svābhāvyāt tatas bhūyas sṛṣṭiḥ yat cit maheśvarī

original: AbhT_5.36a/. evaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ viśvaṃ svasaṃvidi vilāpayan /
analyzed: evam pratikṣaṇam viśvam sva saṃvidi vilāpayan

original: AbhT_5.36b/. visṛjaṃśca tato bhūyaḥ śaśvadbhairavatāṃ vrajet // 36
analyzed: visṛjan ca tatas bhūyas śaśvat bhairava tām vrajet
evam triśūlāt prabhṛti catuṣpañca araka kramāt
catuḥṣaṣṭi śata aram vā sahasra aram atha api vā
asaṃkhyāra sahasram vā cakram dhyāyet an anya dhīḥ
saṃvid nāthasya mahataḥ devasya ullāsi saṃvidaḥ
na eva asti kācid kalanā viśva śakteḥ maheśituḥ

original: AbhT_5.40a/. śaktayo@sya jagat kṛtsnaṃ śaktimāṃstu maheśvaraḥ /
analyzed: śaktayā usya jagat kṛtsnam śaktimān tu maheśvaraḥ

original: AbhT_5.40b/. iti māṅgalaśāstre tu śrīśrīkaṇṭho nyarūpayat // 40
analyzed: iti māṅgalaśāstre tu śrī śrīkaṇṭhaḥ nyarūpayat
iti etat prathama upāya rūpam dhyānam nyarūpayat
śrī śaṃbhunāthaḥ me tuṣṭaḥ tasmai śrī sumati prabhuḥ
anayā eva diśā anyāni dhyānāni api samāśrayet
anuttara upāya dhurām yāni āyānti kramam vinā

original: AbhT_5.43a/. atha prāṇasya yā vṛttiḥ prāṇanādyā nirūpitā /
analyzed: atha prāṇasya yā vṛttiḥ prāṇana ādyā nirūpitā
tad upāya tayā brūmaḥ anuttara pravikāsanam

original: AbhT_5.44a/. nijānande pramātraṃśamātre hṛdi purā sthitaḥ /
analyzed: nija ānande pramātṛ aṃśa mātre hṛdi purā sthitaḥ

original: AbhT_5.45a/. prāṇodaye prameye tu parānandaṃ vibhāvayet /

analyzed: para ānanda gataḥ tiṣṭhet apāna śaśi śobhitaḥ
tatas ananta sphurat meya saṃghaṭṭa ekānta nirvṛtaḥ
samāna bhūmim āgatya brahma ānanda mayaḥ bhavet
tatas api māna meya ogha kalanā grāsa tatparaḥ
udāna vahnau viśrāntaḥ mahā ānandam vibhāvayat
tatra viśrāntim abhyetya śāmyati asmin mahā arciṣi
nirupādhiḥ mahāvyāptiḥ vyāna ākhya upādhi varjitā

original: AbhT_5.49b/. tadā khalu cidānando yo jaḍānupabṛṃhitaḥ // 49
analyzed: tadā khalu cit ānandaḥ yaḥ jaḍa an upabṛṃhitaḥ

original: AbhT_5.50a/. nahyatra saṃsthitiḥ kāpi vibhaktā jaḍarūpiṇaḥ /
analyzed: na hi atra saṃsthitiḥ kā api vibhaktā jaḍa rūpiṇaḥ

original: AbhT_5.50b/. yatra ko@pi vyavacchedo nāsti yadviśvataḥ sphurat // 50
analyzed: yatra kaḥ api vyavacchedaḥ na asti yat viśvatas sphurat
yat anāhata saṃvitti parama amṛta bṛṃhitam

original: AbhT_5.51b/. yatrāsti bhāvanādīnāṃ na mukhyā kāpi saṃgatiḥ // 51
analyzed: yatra asti bhāvanā ādīnām na mukhyā kā api saṃgatiḥ
tat eva jagat ānandam asmabhyam śaṃbhuḥ ūcivān
tatra viśrāntiḥ ādheyā hṛdaya uccāra yogataḥ

original: AbhT_5.53a/. yā tatra samyagviśrāntiḥ sānuttaramayī sthitiḥ /
analyzed: yā tatra samyak viśrāntiḥ sā anuttara mayī sthitiḥ
iti etat hṛdaya ādi eka svabhāve api sva dhāmani
ṣaṣ prāṇa uccāra jam rūpam atha vyāptyā tat ucyate
prāṇa daṇḍa prayogena pūrva apara samīkṛteḥ
catuṣkikā ambuja ālambi lambikā saudham āśrayet
triśūla bhūmim krāntvā atas nāḍi tritaya saṅga tām
ekām vikāsinīm bhūyas tva saṃkocām vikasvarām
śrayet bhrū bindu nāda anta śakti sopāna mālikām
tatra ūrdhva kuṇḍalī bhūmau spandana udara sundaraḥ
visargaḥ tatra viśrāmyet matsya udara daśā juṣi
rāsabhī vaḍavā yadvat svadhām ānanda mandiram
vikāsa saṃkoca mayam praviśya hṛdi hṛṣyati
tadvat muhur līna sṛṣṭa bhāva vrāta su nirbharām
śrayet vikāsa saṃkoca rūḍha bhairava yāmalām
ekīkṛta mahā mūla śūla vaisargike hṛdi
atra tad pūrṇa vṛttyā eva viśva āveśa mayam sthitam
prakāśasya ātma viśrāntau aham iti eva dṛśyatām
tatas udyoga saktena sa dvādaśa kalā ātmanā
sūryeṇa ābhāsayet bhāvam pūrayet atha carcayet
atha induḥ ṣoḍaśa kalaḥ visarga grāsa mantharaḥ
tat evam a tat amṛtam divyam saṃvid devīṣu tarpakam
visarga amṛtam etāvat bodha ākhye huta bhojini
visṛṣṭam ced bhavet sarvam hutam ṣoḍhā adhva maṇḍalam
tad kṣobhaḥ ka ādi ha antam tad prasaraḥ tattva paddhatiḥ

original: AbhT_5.68a/. aṃa iti kuleśvaryā sahito hi kuleśitā /
analyzed: iti kuleśvaryā sahitaḥ hi kula īśitā
paraḥ visarga viśleṣaḥ tad mayam viśvam ucyate
vid prāṇa guṇa deha antar bahis dravya mayīm imām
arcayet juhuyāt dhyāyet ittham saṃjīvanīm kalām
ānanda nāḍī yugala spandana avahitau sthitaḥ
enām visarga niḥṣyanda saudha bhūmim prapadyate
śākte kṣobhe kula āveśe sarva nāḍī agra gocare
vyāptau sarva ātma saṃkoce hṛdayam praviśet sudhīḥ
soma sūrya kalā jāla paraspara nigharṣataḥ
alam rahasya kathayā guptam etat svabhāvataḥ

original: AbhT_5.73b/. yoginīhṛdayaṃ tatra viśrāntaḥ syātkṛtī budhaḥ // 73
analyzed: yoginīhṛdayam tatra viśrāntaḥ syāt kṛtī budhaḥ
hāna ādāna tiraskāra vṛttau rūḍhim upāgataḥ
abheda vṛttitaḥ paśyet viśvam citi camatkṛteḥ
artha kriyā arthita adainyam tyaktvā bāhya antara ātmani

original: AbhT_5.75b/. kharūpe nirvṛtiṃ prāpya phullāṃ nādadaśāṃ śrayet // 75
analyzed: kha rūpe nirvṛtim prāpya phullām nāda daśām śrayet
vaktram antar tayā samyak saṃvidaḥ pravikāsayet
tat jñeyam saṃvid ākhyena vahninā pravilīyate
vilīnam tat trikoṇe ismin śakti vahnau vilīyate
tatra saṃvedana udāra bindu sattā su nirvṛtaḥ
saṃhāra bīja viśrāntaḥ yogī para mayaḥ bhavet
a saṃkoca vikāsaḥ api tad ābhāsanataḥ tathā
antar lakṣyaḥ bahis dṛṣṭiḥ paramam padam aśnute
tatas svātantrya nirmeye vicitra artha kriyā ākṛti
vimarśanam viśeṣa ākhyaḥ spandaḥ aunmukhya saṃjñitaḥ
tatra viśrāntim āgacchet yat vīryam mantra maṇḍale
śānti ādi siddhayaḥ tad tad rūpa tādātmyataḥ yatas
divyaḥ yaḥ ca akṣa saṃghaḥ yam bodha svātantrya saṃjñakaḥ
saḥ nimīlitaḥ eva etat kuryāt sva ātma mayam jagat
puñjībhūte sva raśmi oghe nirbharībhūya tiṣṭhati
a kiṃcid cintakaḥ tatra spaṣṭa dṛś yāti saṃvidam
yat visphuliṅgāḥ saṃsāra bhasma dāha eka hetavaḥ
tat uktam parameśena triśirobhairavāgame

original: AbhT_5.86b/. śṛṇu devi pravakṣyāmi mantrabhūmyāṃ praveśanam // 86
analyzed: śṛṇu devi pravakṣyāmi mantra bhūmyām praveśanam
adhas pravāha saṃrodhāt ūrdhva kṣepa vivarjanāt

original: AbhT_5.89a/. anubhūya pare dhāmni mātrāvṛttyā puraṃ viśet /
analyzed: anubhūya pare dhāmni mātrā vṛttyā puram viśet
nistaraṅga avatīrṇā sā vṛttiḥ ekā śiva ātmikā

original: AbhT_5.90b/. tatsthaṃ [tstho] vicārayet khaṃ khaṃ khasthaṃ khasthena saṃviśet // 90
analyzed: tad stham tsthaḥ vicārayet khaṃ khaṃ kha stham kha sthena saṃviśet

original: AbhT_5.91a/. khaṃ khaṃ tyaktvā khamāruhya khasthaṃ khaṃ coccarediti /
analyzed: kham kham tyaktvā kham āruhya kha stham kham ca uccaret iti
kham adhyāsya adhikāreṇa pada sthāḥ cit marīcayaḥ
bhāvayet bhāvam antar stham bhāva sthaḥ bhāva niḥspṛhaḥ
bhāva abhāva gatīḥ ruddhvā bhāva abhāva avarodha dṛś
ātma aṇu kula mūlāni śaktiḥ bhūtiḥ citiḥ ratiḥ
etat kham daśadhā proktam uccāra uccāra lakṣaṇam

original: AbhT_5.95a/. dhāmnā tu bodhayeddhāma dhāma dhāmāntagaṃ kuru /
analyzed: dhāmnā tu bodhayet dhāma dhāma dhāma anta gam kuru

original: AbhT_5.95b/. taddhāma dhāmagatyā tu bhedyaṃ dhāmāntamāntaram // 95
analyzed: tat dhāma dhāma gatyā tu bhedyam dhāma antam āntaram
bheda upabheda bhedena bhedaḥ kāryaḥ tu madhyataḥ
iti praveśa upāyaḥ yamāṇavaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
śrī maheśvara nāthena yaḥ hṛd sthena mama uditaḥ

original: AbhT_5.97b/. śrībrahmayāmale coktaṃ śrīmān rāvo daśātmakaḥ // 97
analyzed: śrī brahmayāmale ca uktam śrīmān rāvaḥ daśa ātmakaḥ

original: AbhT_5.98a/. sthūlaḥ sūkṣmaḥ paro hṛdyaḥ kaṇṭhyastālavya eva ca /
analyzed: sthūlaḥ sūkṣmaḥ paraḥ hṛdyaḥ kaṇṭhyaḥ tālavyaḥ eva ca
sarvatas ca vibhuḥ yaḥ asau vibhu tva pada dāyakaḥ
jita rāvaḥ mahā yogī saṃkrāmet para deha gaḥ

original: AbhT_5.99b/. parāṃ ca vindati vyāptiṃ pratyahaṃ hyabhyaseta tam // 99
analyzed: parām ca vindati vyāptim pratyaham hi abhyaseta tam
tāvat yāvat a rāve sā rāvāt līyeta rāviṇī

original: AbhT_5.100b/. atra bhāvanayā dehagatopāyaiḥ pare pathi // 100
analyzed: atra bhāvanayā deha gata upāyaiḥ pare pathi
vivikṣoḥ pūrṇa tā sparśāt prāk ānandaḥ prajāyate
tatas api vidyut āpāta sadṛśe deha varjite

original: AbhT_5.102a/. dhāmni kṣaṇaṃ samāveśādudbhavaḥ prasphuṭaṃ plutiḥ /
analyzed: dhāmni kṣaṇam samāveśāt udbhavaḥ prasphuṭam plutiḥ
jala pāṃsu vat abhyasta saṃvid deha aikya hānitaḥ
sva bala ākramaṇāt deha śaithilyāt kampam āpnuyāt
galite deha tādātmya niścaye antar bhukha tvataḥ

original: AbhT_5.104a/. nidrāyate purā yāvanna rūḍhaḥ saṃvidātmani /
analyzed: nidrāyate purā yāvat na rūḍhaḥ saṃvid ātmani

original: AbhT_5.104b/. tataḥ satyapade rūḍho viśvātmatvena saṃvidam // 104
analyzed: tatas satya pade rūḍhaḥ viśva ātma tvena saṃvidam
saṃvidan ghūrṇate ghūrṇiḥ mahāvyāptiḥ yatas smṛtā
ātmani anātma abhimatau satyām eva hi anātmani

original: AbhT_5.106a/. ātmābhimāno dehādau bandho muktistu tallayaḥ /
analyzed: ātma abhimānaḥ deha ādau bandhaḥ muktiḥ tu tad layaḥ
ādau anātmani ātma tve līne labdhe nija ātmani
ātmani anātma tā nāśe mahāvyāptiḥ pravartate

original: AbhT_5.107b/. ānanda udbhavaḥ kampo nindrā ghūrṇiśca pañcakam // 107
analyzed: ānandaḥ udbhavaḥ kampaḥ nindrā ghūrṇiḥ ca pañcakam
iti uktam atas eva śrīmālinīvijayottare
pradarśite ismin ānanda prabhṛtau pañcake yadā
yogī viśet tadā tad tad cakra īśa tvam haṭhāt vrajet

original: AbhT_5.109b/. yathā sarveśinā bodhenākrāntāpi tanuḥ kvacit // 109
analyzed: yathā sarva īśinā bodhena ākrāntā api tanuḥ kvacid
kiṃcid kartum prabhavati cakṣuṣā rūpa saṃvidam

original: AbhT_5.110b/. tathaiva cakre kutrāpi praveśātko@pi saṃbhavet // 110
analyzed: tathā eva cakre kutra api praveśāt kopi saṃbhavet

original: AbhT_5.111a/. ānandacakraṃ vahnyaśri kanda udbhava ucyate /
AbhT_5.111b/. kampo hṛttālu nidrā ca ghūrṇiḥ syādūrdhvakuṇḍalī // 111
analyzed: kampaḥ hṛd tālu nidrā ca ghūrṇiḥ syāt ūrdhva kuṇḍalī
etat ca sphuṭam evā uktam śrī mantraiśirase mate
evam pradarśita uccāra viśrānti hṛdayam param
yat tat avyakta liṅgam nṛ śiva śakti a vibhāgavat

original: AbhT_5.113b/. atra viśvamidaṃ līnamatrāntaḥsthaṃ ca gamyate // 113
analyzed: atra viśvam idam līnam atra antar stham ca gamyate
idam tad lakṣaṇam pūrṇa śakti bhairava saṃvidaḥ
deha ga adhva samunmeṣe samāveśaḥ tu yaḥ sphuṭaḥ
ahantā ācchādita unmeṣi bhāva idaṃbhāva yuj sa ca
vyakta avyaktam idam liṅgam mantra vīryam parāparam
nara śakti samunmeṣi śiva rūpāt vibheditam
yat nyakkṛta śiva ahaṃtā samāveśam vibheda vat

original: AbhT_5.117a/. viśeṣaspandarūpaṃ tad vyaktaṃ liṅgaṃ cidātmakam /
analyzed: viśeṣa spanda rūpam tat vyaktam liṅgam cit ātmakam
vyaktāt siddhi prasavaḥ vyakta avyaktāt dvayam vimokṣaḥ ca

original: AbhT_5.117c/. avyaktādbalamādyaṃ parasya nānuttare tviyaṃ carcā // 117
analyzed: avyaktāt balam ādyam parasya na anuttare tu iyam carcā

original: AbhT_5.118a/. ātmākhyaṃ yadvyaktaṃ naraliṅgaṃ tatra viśvamarpayataḥ /
analyzed: ātma ākhyam yat vyaktam nara liṅgam tatra viśvam arpayataḥ
vyakta avyaktam tasmāt galite tasmin tat avyaktam
tena ātma liṅgam etat parame śiva śakti aṇu svabhāva maye

original: AbhT_5.119b/. avyakte viśrāmyati nānuttaradhāmagā tviyaṃ carcā // 119
analyzed: avyakte viśrāmyati na anuttara dhāma gā tu iyam carcā
ekasya spandanasya eṣā traidham bheda vyavasthitiḥ

original: AbhT_5.120b/. atra liṅge sadā tiṣṭhet pūjāviśrāntitatparaḥ // 120
analyzed: atra liṅge sadā tiṣṭhet pūjā viśrānti tatparaḥ
bīja yoni samāpattyā sūte kām api saṃvidam
atra prayāsa virahāt sarvaḥ asau devatā gaṇaḥ
ānanda pūrṇe dhāmni āste nitya udita cit ātmakaḥ
atra bhairava nāthasya sa saṃkoca vikāsikā
bhāsate durghaṭā śaktiḥ a saṃkoca vikāsinaḥ
siktam tat eva sat viśvam śaśvat navanavāyate
anuttara ibhyupāyaḥ utra tādrūpyāt eva varṇitaḥ

original: AbhT_5.125b/. jvaliteṣvapi dīpeṣu gharmāṃśuḥ kiṃ na bhāsate // 125
analyzed: jvaliteṣu api dīpeṣu gharmāṃśuḥ kim na bhāsate

original: AbhT_5.126a/. artheṣu tadbhogavidhau tadutthe duḥkhe sukhe vā galitābhiśaṅkam /
analyzed: artheṣu tad bhoga vidhau tad utthe duḥkhe sukhe vā galita abhiśaṅkam
an āviśantaḥ api nimagna cittāḥ jānanti vṛtti kṣaya saukhyam antar

original: AbhT_5.127a/. satyevātmani citsvabhāvamahasi svānte tathopaktiyāṃ tasmai kurvati tatpracāravivaśe satyakṣavarge@pi ca /
analyzed: sati eva ātmani cit svabhāva mahasi svānte tathā upaktiyām tasmai kurvati tad pracāra vivaśe sati akṣa varge api ca

original: AbhT_5.127b/. satsvartheṣu sukhādiṣu sphuṭataraṃ yadbhedavandhyodayaṃ yogī tiṣṭhati pūrṇaraśmivibhavastattattvamācīyatām // 127
analyzed: satsu artheṣu sukha ādiṣu sphuṭataram yat bheda vandhya udayam yogī tiṣṭhati pūrṇa raśmi vibhavaḥ tat tattvam ācīyatām
iti uccāra vidhiḥ proktaḥ karaṇam pravivicyate
tat ca ittham triśiraḥśāstre parameśeṇa bhāṣitam
karaṇam saptadhā prāhuḥ abhyāsam bodha pūrvakam
tad vyāpti pūrvam ākṣepe karaṇam sva pratiṣṭhatā

original: AbhT_5.130b/. guruvaktrācca boddhavyaṃ karaṇaṃ yadyapi sphuṭam // 130
analyzed: guru vaktrāt ca boddhavyam karaṇam yadi api sphuṭam
tathā api āgama rakṣā artham tat agre varṇayiṣyate

original: AbhT_5.131b/. ukto ya eṣa uccārastatra yo@sau sphuran sthitaḥ // 131
analyzed: uktaḥ yaḥ eṣaḥ uccāraḥ tatra yaḥ asau sphuran sthitaḥ
avyakta anukṛti prāyaḥ dhvaniḥ varṇaḥ sa kathyate

original: AbhT_5.132b/. sṛṣṭisaṃhārabījaṃ ca tasya mukhyaṃ vapurviduḥ // 132
analyzed: sṛṣṭi saṃhāra bījam ca tasya mukhyam vapuḥ viduḥ
tad abhyāsa vaśāt yāti kramāt yogī cit ātma tām

original: AbhT_5.133b/. tathā hyanacke sācke vā kādau sānte punaḥpunaḥ // 133
analyzed: tathā hi anacke sācke vā ka ādau sa ante punar punar

original: AbhT_5.134a/. smṛte proccārite vāpi sā sā saṃvitprasūyāte /
analyzed: smṛte proccārite vā api sā sā saṃvid prasūyāte
bāhya artha samaya apekṣāḥ ghaṭa ādyāḥ dhvanayaḥ api ye
te api artha bhāvanām kuryuḥ manaḥ rājya vat ātmani
tat uktam parameśena bhairavaḥ vyāpakaḥ ukhile
iti bhairava śabdasya saṃtata uccāraṇāt śivaḥ
śrīmat traiśirase pi uktam mantra uddhārasya pūrvatas

original: AbhT_5.137a/. smṛtiśca smaraṇaṃ pūrvaṃ sarvabhāveṣu vastutaḥ /
analyzed: smṛtiḥ ca smaraṇam pūrvam sarva bhāveṣu vastutas
aneka ākāra rūpeṇa sarvatra avasthitena tu
sva svabhāvasya saṃprāptiḥ saṃvittiḥ paramārthataḥ

original: AbhT_5.139b/. vyaktiniṣṭhā tato viddhi sattā sā kīrtitā parā // 139
analyzed: vyakti niṣṭhā tatas viddhi sattā sā kīrtitā parā

original: AbhT_5.140a/. kiṃ punaḥ samayāpekṣāṃ vinā ye bījapiṇḍakāḥ /
analyzed: kim punar samaya apekṣām vinā ye bīja piṇḍakāḥ
saṃvidam na iyuḥ saṃvid upāya tām
vācya abhāvāt udāsīna saṃvid spandāt sva dhām atas
saṃvedanam hi prathamam sparśaḥ unuttara saṃvidaḥ
hṛd kaṇṭhya oṣṭhya tri dhāma antar nitarām pravikāsini
tatas visarga uccāra aṃśe dvādaśānta pathau ubhau
hṛdayena saha aikadhyam nayate japa tatparaḥ
ānanda madhyanāḍī antar spandanam bījam āvahet

original: AbhT_5.146a/. saṃhārabījaṃ khaṃ hṛtsthamoṣṭhyaṃ phullaṃ svamūrdhani /

analyzed: tejaḥ tri aśram tālu kaṇṭhe binduḥ ūrdhva pade sthitaḥ
iti enayā budhaḥ yuktyā varṇa japya parāyaṇaḥ

original: AbhT_5.147b/. anuttaraṃ paraṃ dhāma praviśedacirāt sudhīḥ // 147
analyzed: anuttaram param dhāma praviśet acirāt sudhīḥ

original: AbhT_5.148a/. varṇaśabdena nīlādi yadvā dīkṣottare yathā /
analyzed: varṇa śabdena nīla ādi yat vā dīkṣottare yathā
saṃhāra nṛ agni marutaḥ rudra bindu yutān smaret
hṛdaye tad mayaḥ lakṣyam paśyet sapta dināt atha
visphuliṅga agni vat nīla pīta rakta ādi citritam
jājvalīti hṛd ambhoje bīja dīpa prabodhitam
dīpa vat jvalitaḥ binduḥ bhāsate vighana arka vat
svayam bhāsa ātmanā anena tādātmyam yāti an anya dhīḥ

original: AbhT_5.151b/. śivena hematāṃ yadvattāmraṃ sūtena vedhitam // 151
analyzed: śivena hema tām yadvat tāmram sūtena vedhitam
upalakṣaṇam etat ca sarva mantreṣu lakṣayet
yat yat saṃkalpa saṃbhūtam varṇa jālam hi bhautikam
tat saṃvid ādhikya vaśāt abhautikam iva sthitam

original: AbhT_5.153b/. atastathāvidhe rūpe rūḍho rohati saṃvidi // 153
analyzed: atas tathāvidhe rūpe rūḍhaḥ rohati saṃvidi
an ācchādita rūpāyām an upādhau prasanna dhīḥ

original: AbhT_5.154b/. nīle pīte sukhe duḥkhe saṃvidrūpamakhaṇḍitam // 154
analyzed: nīle pīte sukhe duḥkhe saṃvid rūpam akhaṇḍitam
gurubhiḥ bhāṣitam tasmāt upāyeṣu vicitra tā
uccāra karaṇa dhyāna varṇaiḥ ebhiḥ pradarśitaḥ
anuttara pada prāptau abhyupāya vidhi kramaḥ

original: AbhT_5.156b/. akiṃciccintanaṃ vīryaṃ bhāvanāyāṃ ca sā punaḥ // 156
analyzed: a kiṃcid cintanam vīryam bhāvanāyām ca sā punar

original: AbhT_5.157a/. dhyāne tadapi coccāre karaṇe so@pi taddhvanau /
analyzed: dhyāne tat api ca uccāre karaṇe saḥ upi tad dhvanau
sa sthāna kalpane bāhyam iti kramam upāśrayet

original: AbhT_5.158a/. laṅghanena paro yogī mandabuddhiḥ krameṇa tu /
analyzed: laṅghanena paraḥ yogī manda buddhiḥ krameṇa tu

original: AbhT_5.158b/. vīryaṃ vinā yathā ṣaṇṭhastasyāpyastyatha vā balam /
analyzed: vīryam vinā yathā ṣaṇṭhaḥ tasya api asti atha vā balam
