mṛta dehe iva iyam syāt bāhya antar parikalpanā

original: AbhT_5.159a/. ityāṇave@nuttaratābhyupāyaḥ prokto nayaḥ spaṣṭapathena bāhyaḥ // 159a
analyzed: iti āṇavena uttara tā abhyupāyaḥ proktaḥ nayaḥ spaṣṭa pathena bāhyaḥ
atha śrī tantrāloke
sthāna prakalpa ākhya tayā sphuṭaḥ tu bāhyaḥ abhyupāyaḥ

original: AbhT_6.2a/. sthānabhedastridhā proktaḥ prāṇe dehe bahistathā /
analyzed: sthāna bhedaḥ tridhā proktaḥ prāṇe dehe bahis tathā

original: AbhT_6.2b/. prāṇaśca pañcadhā dehe dvidhā bāhyāntaratvataḥ // 2
analyzed: prāṇaḥ ca pañcadhā dehe dvidhā bāhya antara tvataḥ
maṇḍalam sthaṇḍilam pātram akṣasūtram sa pustakam

original: AbhT_6.3b/. liṅgaṃ tūraṃ paṭaḥ pustaṃ pratimā mūrtireva ca // 3
analyzed: liṅgam tūram paṭaḥ pustam pratimā mūrtiḥ eva ca
iti ekādaśadhā bāhyam punar tat bahudhā bhavet
tatra prāṇa āśrayam tāvat vidhānam upadiśyate
adhvā samastaḥ eva ayam ṣaḍvidhaḥ api ati vistṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_6.5b/. yo vakṣyate sa ekatra prāṇe tāvatpratiṣṭhitaḥ // 5
analyzed: yaḥ vakṣyate saḥ ekatra prāṇe tāvat pratiṣṭhitaḥ
adhvanaḥ kalanam yat tat kramākrama tayā sthitam
kramākramau hi citra eka kalanā bhāva gocare

original: AbhT_6.7a/. kramākramātmā kālaśca paraḥ saṃvidi vartate /
analyzed: kramākrama ātmā kālaḥ ca paraḥ saṃvidi vartate

original: AbhT_6.7b/. kālī nāma parā śaktiḥ saiva devasya gīyate // 7
analyzed: kālī nāma parā śaktiḥ sā eva devasya gīyate
sā eva saṃvid bahis sva ātma garbhībhūtau kramākramau
sphuṭayantī prarohaṇa prāṇa vṛttiḥ iti sthitā
saṃvid mātram hi yat śuddham prakāśa parama arthakam

original: AbhT_6.9b/. tanmeyamātmanaḥ projjhya viviktaṃ bhāsate nabhaḥ // 9
analyzed: tat meyam ātmanaḥ projjhya viviktam bhāsate nabhaḥ
tat eva śūnya rūpa tvam saṃvidaḥ parigīyate

original: AbhT_6.10b/. neti neti vimarśena yogināṃ sā parā daśā // 10
analyzed: na iti na iti vimarśena yoginām sā parā daśā

original: AbhT_6.11a/. sa eva khātmā meye@sminbhedite svīkriyonmukhaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva kha ātmā meye ismin bhedite svīkriyā unmukhaḥ
patan samucchalat tvena prāṇa spanda ūrmi saṃjñitaḥ

original: AbhT_6.12a/. tenāhuḥ kila saṃvitprākprāṇe pariṇatā tathā /
analyzed: tena āhuḥ kila saṃvid prāk prāṇe pariṇatā tathā
antaḥkaraṇa tattvasya vāyuḥ āśraya tām gataḥ
iyam sā prāṇanā śaktiḥ āntara udyoga dohadā

original: AbhT_6.13b/. spandaḥ sphurattā viśrāntirjīvo hṛtpratibhā matā // 13
analyzed: spandaḥ sphurat tā viśrāntiḥ jīvaḥ hṛd pratibhā matā

original: AbhT_6.14a/. sā prāṇavṛttiḥ prāṇādyai rūpaiḥ pañcabhirātmasāt /
analyzed: sā prāṇa vṛttiḥ prāṇa ādyaiḥ rūpaiḥ pañcabhiḥ ātmasāt
deham yat kurute saṃvid pūrṇaḥ tena eṣa bhāsate

original: AbhT_6.15b/. ceṣṭāṃ paśyantyato mugdhā nāstyanyaditi manvate // 15
analyzed: ceṣṭām paśyanti atas mugdhāḥ na asti anyat iti manvate
tām eva bāla mūrkha strī prāya veditṛ saṃśritām
matim pramāṇīkurvantaḥ cārvākāḥ tattva darśinaḥ

original: AbhT_6.17a/. teṣāṃ tathā bhāvanā caddārḍhyameti nirantaram /
analyzed: teṣām tathā bhāvanā ca dārḍhyam eti nirantaram
tad dehabhaṅge suptāḥ syuḥ ā tādṛś vāsanā kṣayāt
tad vāsanā kṣaye tu eṣām akṣīṇam vāsanā antaram
buddham kutaścid saṃsūte vicitrām phala sampadam
a dārḍhya śaṅkanāt prācya vāsanā tādavasthyataḥ
anya kartavya śaithilyāt saṃbhāvya anuśaya tvataḥ
a tad rūḍha anya jana tā kartavya parilopanāt
nāstikya vāsanām āhuḥ pāpāt pāpīyasīm imām
alam aprastutena atha prakṛtam pravivicyate
yāvān samastaḥ eva ayam adhvā prāṇe pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: AbhT_6.22a/. dvidhā ca so@dhvā kriyayā mūrtyā ca pravibhajyate /
analyzed: dvidhā ca sodhvā kriyayā mūrtyā ca pravibhajyate

original: AbhT_6.22b/. prāṇa eva śikhā śrīmattriśirasyuditā hi sā // 22
analyzed: prāṇaḥ eva śikhā śrīmat triśirasi uditā hi sā
baddhā yāga ādi kāle tum niṣkala tvāt śiva ātmikā
yatas horātra madhye syāḥ caturviṃśatidhā gatiḥ

original: AbhT_6.24b/. kṣapā śaśī tathāpāno nāda ekatra tiṣṭhati // 24
analyzed: kṣapā śaśī tathā apānaḥ nādaḥ ekatra tiṣṭhati
jīva ādityaḥ na ca udgacchet tuṭi ardham sāndhyam īdṛśam
ūrdhva vaktraḥ raviḥ candra adhomukhaḥ vahniḥ antare

original: AbhT_6.27a/. binduḥ prāṇo hyahaścaiva ravirekatra tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: binduḥ prāṇaḥ hi ahar ca eva raviḥ ekatra tiṣṭhati

original: AbhT_6.27b/. mahāsandhyā tṛtīyā tu supraśāntātmikā sthitā // 27
analyzed: mahā sandhyā tṛtīyā tu su praśānta ātmikā sthitā

original: AbhT_6.28a/. evaṃ baddhā śikhā yatra tattatphalaniyojikā /
analyzed: evam baddhā śikhā yatra tad tad phala niyojikā

original: AbhT_6.28b/. ataḥ saṃvidi sarvo@yamadhvā viśramya tiṣṭhati // 28
analyzed: atas saṃvidi sarvaḥ ayam adhvā viśramya tiṣṭhati
amūrtāyāḥ sarva ga tvāt niṣkriyāyāḥ ca saṃvidaḥ
mūrti kriyā bhāsanam yat saḥ eva adhvā maheśituḥ

original: AbhT_6.30a/. adhvā krameṇa yātavye pade saṃprāptikāraṇam /
analyzed: adhvā krameṇa yātavye pade saṃprāpti kāraṇam
dvaitinām bhogya bhāvāt tu prabuddhānām yatas udyate
iha sarvatra śabdānām anvartham carcayet yatas

original: AbhT_6.31b/. uktaṃ śrīmanniśācāre saṃjñātra trividhā matā // 31
analyzed: uktam śrīmat niśācāre saṃjñā atra trividhā matā

original: AbhT_6.32a/. naimittikī prasiddhā ca tathānyā pāribhāṣikī /
analyzed: naimittikī prasiddhā ca tathā anyā pāribhāṣikī
pūrva tve vā pradhānam syāt tatra antar bhāvayet tatas
atas dhva śabdasya uktā iyam niruktiḥ na uditā api ced

original: AbhT_6.33b/. kvacitsvabuddhyā sāpyūhyā kiyallekhyaṃ hi pustake // 33
analyzed: kvacid sva buddhyā sā api ūhyā kiyat lekhyam hi pustake

original: AbhT_6.34a/. tatra kriyābhāsanaṃ yatso@dhvā kālāhva ucyate /
analyzed: tatra kriyā bhāsanam yat sodhvā kāla āhvaḥ ucyate
varṇa mantra pada abhikhyam atra asta idhva trayam sphuṭam

original: AbhT_6.35a/. yastu mūrtyavabhāsāṃśaḥ sa deśādhvā nigadyate /
analyzed: yaḥ tu mūrti avabhāsa aṃśaḥ sa deśa adhvā nigadyate
kalā tattva pura abhikhyam antarbhūtam iha trayam

original: AbhT_6.36a/. trikadvaye@tra pratyekaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ paraṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: trika dvayā itra pratyekam sthūlam sūkṣmam param vapuḥ

original: AbhT_6.36b/. yato@sti tena sarvo@yamadhvā ṣaḍvidha ucyate // 36
analyzed: yatas asti tena sarvaḥ yaḥ adhvā ṣaḍvidhaḥ ucyate
ṣaḍvidhāt adhvanaḥ prācyam yat etat tritayam punar

original: AbhT_6.37b/. eṣa eva sa kālādhvā prāṇe spaṣṭaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // 37
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva sa kāla adhvā prāṇe spaṣṭam pratiṣṭhitaḥ
tad tava madhya sthitāt kālāt anyaḥ ayam kālaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_6.38b/. eṣa kālo hi devasya viśvābhāsanakāriṇī // 38
analyzed: eṣa kālaḥ hi devasya viśva ābhāsana kāriṇī

original: AbhT_6.39a/. kriyāśaktiḥ samastānāṃ tattvānāṃ ca paraṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: kriyāśaktiḥ samastānām tattvānām ca param vapuḥ
etat īśvara tattvam tat śivasya vapuḥ ucyate
udrikta ābhoga kārya ātma viśva aikātmyam idam yatas
etat īśvara rūpa tvam paramātmani yat kila
tad pramātari māyīye kāla tattvam nigadyate
śiva ādi śuddhavidyā antam yat śivasya svakam vapuḥ
tat eva puṃsaḥ māyā ādi rāga antam kañcukībhavet

original: AbhT_6.42b/. anāśritaṃ yato māyā kalāvidye sadāśivaḥ // 42
analyzed: anāśritam yatas māyā kalā vidye sadāśivaḥ

original: AbhT_6.43a/. īśvaraḥ kālaniyatī sadvidyā rāga ucyate /
analyzed: īśvaraḥ kāla niyatī sat vidyā rāgaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_6.44a/. īśvaraḥ prāṇamātā ca vidyā dehapramātṛtā /
analyzed: īśvaraḥ prāṇa mātā ca vidyā deha pramātṛ tā

original: AbhT_6.44b/. anāśrayo hi śūnyatvaṃ jñānameva hi buddhitā // 44
analyzed: anāśrayaḥ hi śūnya tvam jñānam eva hi buddhi tā

original: AbhT_6.45a/. viśvātmatā ca prāṇatvaṃ dehe vedyaikatānatā /
analyzed: viśva ātma tā ca prāṇa tvam dehe vedya eka tāna tā
tena prāṇa pathe viśvākalanā iyam virājate
yena rūpeṇa tat vacmaḥ sadbhiḥ tat avadhīyatām
dvādaśānta avadhau asmin dehe yadi api sarvatas
ota prota ātmakaḥ prāṇaḥ tathā api ittham na su sphuṭaḥ

original: AbhT_6.47b/. yatno jīvanamātrātmā tatparaśca dvidhā mataḥ // 47
analyzed: yatnaḥ jīvana mātra ātmā tad paraḥ ca dvidhā mataḥ
saṃvedyaḥ ca api asaṃvedyaḥ dvidhā ittham bhidyate punar
sphuṭa asphuṭa tvāt dvaividhyam pratyekam paribhāvayet

original: AbhT_6.49b/. prāṇaḥ kandātprabhṛtyeva tathāpyatra na susphuṭaḥ // 49
analyzed: prāṇaḥ kandāt prabhṛti eva tathā api atra na su sphuṭaḥ
kanda ādhārāt prabhṛti eva vyavasthā tena kathyate

original: AbhT_6.51a/. tatrāpi tu prayatno@sau na saṃvedyatayā sthitaḥ /
analyzed: tatra api tu prayatna usau na saṃvedya tayā sthitaḥ
vedya yatnāt tu hṛdayāt prāṇa cāraḥ vibhajyate

original: AbhT_6.52a/. prabhoḥ śivasya yā śaktirvāmā jyeṣṭhā ca raudrikā /
analyzed: prabhoḥ śivasya yā śaktiḥ vāmā jyeṣṭhā ca raudrikā
sa tad anyatamau ātma prāṇau yatna vidhāyinau
prabhu śaktiḥ kvacid mukhyā yathā aṅga marut īraṇe
ātma śaktiḥ kvacid kanda saṃkoca spandane yathā

original: AbhT_6.54a/. prāṇaśaktiḥ kvacitprāṇacāre hārde yathā sphuṭam /
AbhT_6.54b/. trayaṃ dvayaṃ vā mukhyaṃ syādyogināmavadhāninām // 54
analyzed: trayam dvayam vā mukhyam syāt yoginām avadhāninām
avadhānāt adṛṣṭa aṃśāt balavat tvāt atha īraṇāt
viparyayaḥ api prāṇa ātma śaktīnām mukhya tām prati
vāmā saṃsāriṇām īśā prabhu śaktiḥ vidhāyinī

original: AbhT_6.56b/. jyeṣṭhā tu suprabuddhānāṃ bubhutsūnāṃ ca raudrikā // 56
analyzed: jyeṣṭhā tu su prabuddhānām bubhutsūnām ca raudrikā

original: AbhT_6.57a/. vāmā saṃsāravamanā jyeṣṭhā śivamayī yataḥ /
AbhT_6.57b/. drāvayitrī rujāṃ raudrī roddhrī cākhilakarmaṇām // 57
analyzed: drāvayitrī rujām raudrī roddhrī ca akhila karmaṇām

original: AbhT_6.58a/. sṛṣṭyāditattvamajñātvā na mukto nāpi mocayet /
analyzed: sṛṣṭi ādi tattvam a jñātvā na muktaḥ na api mocayet

original: AbhT_6.58b/. uktaṃ ca śrīyogacāre mokṣaḥ sarvaprakāśanāt // 58
analyzed: uktam ca śrī yogacāre mokṣaḥ sarva prakāśanāt

original: AbhT_6.59a/. utpattisthitisaṃhārān ye na jānanti yoginaḥ /
analyzed: utpatti sthiti saṃhārān ye na jānanti yoginaḥ
na muktāḥ te tad ajñāna bandhana eka adhivāsitāḥ

original: AbhT_6.60a/. sṛṣṭyādayaśca te sarve kālādhīnā na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: sṛṣṭi ādayaḥ ca te sarve kāla adhīnāḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: AbhT_6.60b/. sa ca prāṇātmakastasmāduccāraḥ kathyate sphuṭaḥ // 60
analyzed: sa ca prāṇa ātmakaḥ tasmāt uccāraḥ kathyate sphuṭaḥ
hṛdayāt prāṇa cāraḥ ca nāsikya dvādaśāntataḥ
ṣaṭtriṃśat aṅgulaḥ jantoḥ sarvasya sva aṅgula kramāt

original: AbhT_6.62a/. kṣodiṣṭhe vā mahiṣṭhe vā dehe tādṛśa eva hi /
analyzed: kṣodiṣṭhe vā mahiṣṭhe vā dehe tādṛśe eva hi

original: AbhT_6.62b/. vīryamojo balaṃ spandaḥ prāṇacāraḥ samaṃ tataḥ // 62
analyzed: vīryam ojaḥ balam spandaḥ prāṇa cāraḥ samam tatas
ṣaṭtriṃśat aṅgule cāre yat gama āgama yugmakam
sphuṭam sthitaḥ
tuṭiḥ sa pāda aṅgula yuj prāṇaḥ tāḥ ṣoḍaśa ucchvasan
niḥśvasan ca atra caṣakaḥ sa pañca aṃśa iṅgula iṅgule
śvāsa praśvāsayoḥ nālī proktā ahorātraḥ ucyate
nava aṅgula ambudhi tuṭau praharāḥ te ibdhayaḥ dinam
nirgame antarniśena indū tayoḥ saṃdhye tuṭeḥ dale
ketuḥ sūrye vidhau rāhuḥ bhauma ādeḥ vāra bhāginaḥ
prahara dvayam anyeṣām grahāṇām udayaḥ untarā
siddhiḥ davīyasī mokṣaḥ abhicāraḥ pāralaukikī
nakṣatrāṇām tad anyeṣām udayaḥ madhyataḥ kramāt
nāgāḥ lokeśa mūrti īśāḥ gaṇeśāḥ jala tattvataḥ
pradhāna antam nāyakāḥ ca vidyā tattva adhināyakāḥ
sakala ādyāḥ ca kaṇṭhya oṣṭhya paryantāḥ bhairavāḥ tathā
śaktayaḥ pārameśvaryaḥ vāmaśāḥ vīra nāyakāḥ

original: AbhT_6.71b/. aṣṭāvaṣṭau ye ya itthaṃ vyāpyavyāpakatājuṣaḥ // 71
analyzed: aṣṭau aṣṭau ye ye ittham vyāpya vyāpaka tā juṣaḥ
sthūla sūkṣmāḥ kramāt teṣām udayaḥ prahara aṣṭake

original: AbhT_6.72b/. dine krūrāṇi saumyāni rātrau karmāṇyasaṃśayam // 72
analyzed: dine krūrāṇi saumyāni rātrau karmāṇi asaṃśayam
krūra tā saumya tā vā abhisandheḥ api nirūpitā
te ca uktāḥ parameśeṇa śrīmat vīrāvalīkule
sita asitau dīrgha hrasvau dharma adharmau dina kṣape

original: AbhT_6.75a/. kṣīyete yadi taddīkṣā vyāptyā dhyānena yogataḥ /
analyzed: kṣīyete yadi tad dīkṣā vyāptyā dhyānena yogataḥ

original: AbhT_6.75b/. ahorātraḥ prāṇacāre kathito māsa ucyate // 75
analyzed: ahorātraḥ prāṇa cāre kathitaḥ māsaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_6.76a/. dinaṃ kṛṣṇo niśā śuklaḥ pakṣau karmasu pūrvavat /
analyzed: dinam kṛṣṇaḥ niśā śuklaḥ pakṣau karmasu pūrvavat
yāḥ ṣoḍaśa uktāḥ tithayaḥ tāsu ye pūrva paścime
tayoḥ tu viśrama ūrdhva īrdhe tithyaḥ pañcadaśā itarāḥ

original: AbhT_6.77b/. sapāde dvyaṅgule tithyā ahorātro vibhajyate // 77
analyzed: sa pāde dvi aṅgule tithyāḥ ahorātraḥ vibhajyate
prakāśa viśrama vaśāt tau eva hi dina kṣape
saṃvid pratikṣaṇam yasmāt prakāśa ānanda yoginī

original: AbhT_6.79a/. tau klṛptau yāvati tayā tāvatyeva dinakṣape /
analyzed: tau klṛptau yāvati tayā tāvatī eva dina kṣape
yāvatī eva hi saṃvittiḥ udita udita su sphuṭā

original: AbhT_6.80a/. tāvāneva kṣaṇaḥ kalpo nimeṣo vā tadastvapi /
analyzed: tāvān eva kṣaṇaḥ kalpaḥ nimeṣaḥ vā tat astu api
yāvān eva udayaḥ vitteḥ vedya eka graha tatparaḥ
tāvat eva astamayanam veditṛ sva ātma carvaṇam

original: AbhT_6.81b/. vedye ca bahirantarvā dvaye vātha dvayojjhite // 81
analyzed: vedye ca bahis antar vā dvaye vā atha dvaya ujjhite
sarvathā tanmayībhūtiḥ dinam vettṛ stha tā niśā
veditā vedya viśrāntaḥ vettā tu antarmukha sthitiḥ
purā vicārayan paścāt sattā mātra svarūpakaḥ
jāgrat veditṛ tā svapnaḥ vettṛ bhāvaḥ purātanaḥ
paraḥ suptam kṣaye rātri dinayoḥ turyam advayam

original: AbhT_6.85b/. vedye viśrāntiradhikā dinadairghyāya tatra tu // 85
analyzed: vedye viśrāntiḥ adhikā dina dairghyāya tatra tu
nyūnā syāt sva ātma viśrāntiḥ viparīte viparyayaḥ
sva ātma autsukye prabuddhe hi vedya viśrāntiḥ alpikā
ittham eva divā rātri nyūna ādhikya kramam vadet
yathā deheṣu ahar rātra nyūna ādhikya ādi no samam
tathā pureṣu api iti evam tat viśeṣeṇa na uditam
dina rātri kramam me śrī śaṃbhuḥ ittham apaprathat
śrī santāna guruḥ tu āha sthānam buddha aprabuddhayoḥ
hṛdaḥ ārabhya yat tena rātrin diva vibhājanam
tat asat sita pakṣa intar praveśa ullāsa bhāgini
abuddha sthānam eva etat dina tvena katham bhavet

original: AbhT_6.91b/. alaṃ vānena nedaṃ vā mama prāṅmatamatsaraḥ // 91
analyzed: alam vā anena na idam vā mama prāk mata matsaraḥ

original: AbhT_6.92a/. heye tu darśite śiṣyāḥ satpathaikāntadarśinaḥ /
analyzed: heye tu darśite śiṣyāḥ sat patha ekānta darśinaḥ

original: AbhT_6.92b/. vyākhyātaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣo ya statra prāṇagataḥ śaśī // 92
analyzed: vyākhyātaḥ kṛṣṇa pakṣaḥ yaḥ statra prāṇa gataḥ śaśī
āpyāyana ātmanā ekaikām kalām pratitithi tyajet

original: AbhT_6.93b/. dvādaśāntasamīpe tu yāsau pañcadaśī tuṭiḥ // 93
analyzed: dvādaśānta samīpe tu yā asau pañcadaśī tuṭiḥ
sā amāvasyā atra sa kṣīṇaḥ candraḥ prāṇa arkam āviśet

original: AbhT_6.94b/. uktaṃ śrīkāmikāyāṃ ca nordhve@dhaḥ prakṛtiḥ parā /
analyzed: uktam śrī kāmikāyām ca na ūrdhvedhaḥ prakṛtiḥ parā

original: AbhT_6.94c/. ardhārdhe kramate māyā dvikhaṇḍā śivarūpiṇī // 94
AbhT_6.95b/. amṛtaṃ candrarūpeṇa dvidhā ṣoḍaśadhā punaḥ // 95
analyzed: amṛtam candra rūpeṇa dvidhā ṣoḍaśadhā punar

original: AbhT_6.96a/. pivanti ca surāḥ sarve daśapañca parāḥ kalāḥ /
analyzed: pivanti ca surāḥ sarve daśa pañca parāḥ kalāḥ
amā śeṣa guhā antaḥsthā amāvāsyā viśva tarpiṇī

original: AbhT_6.97a/. evaṃ kalāḥ pañcadaśa kṣīyante śaśinaḥ kramāt /
analyzed: evam kalāḥ pañcadaśa kṣīyante śaśinaḥ kramāt
āpyāyinī amṛta ap rūpa tādātmyāt ṣoḍaśī na tu

original: AbhT_6.98a/. tatra pañcadaśī yāsau tuṭiḥ prakṣīṇacandramāḥ /
analyzed: tatra pañcadaśī yā asau tuṭiḥ prakṣīṇa candramāḥ

original: AbhT_6.98b/. tadūrdhvagaṃ yattuṭyardhaṃ pakṣasaṃdhiḥ sa kīrtitaḥ // 98
analyzed: tad ūrdhva gam yat tuṭi ardham pakṣa saṃdhiḥ sa kīrtitaḥ
tasmāt viśrama tuṭi ardhāt āmāvasyam purādalam

original: AbhT_6.99b/. paraṃ prātipadaṃ cārdhamiti saṃdhiḥ sa kalpyate // 99
analyzed: param prātipadam ca ardham iti saṃdhiḥ sa kalpyate
tatra prātipade tasmin tuṭi ardha ardhe purādalam
āmāvasyam tithi chedāt kuryāt sūrya graham viśat

original: AbhT_6.101a/. tatrārkamaṇḍale līnaḥ śaśī sravati yanmadhu /
analyzed: tatra arka maṇḍale līnaḥ śaśī sravati yat madhu
tapta tvāt tat pibet indu saha bhūḥ siṃhikāsutaḥ

original: AbhT_6.102a/. arkaḥ pramāṇaṃ somastu meyaṃ jñānakriyātmakau /
analyzed: arkaḥ pramāṇam somaḥ tu meyam jñāna kriyā ātmakau
rāhuḥ māyā pramātā syāt tad ācchādana kovidaḥ
tatas eva tamaḥ rūpaḥ vilāpayitum akṣamaḥ
arka indu rāhu saṃghaṭṭāt pramāṇam vedya vedakau

original: AbhT_6.104b/. advayena tatastena puṇya eṣa mahāgrahaḥ // 104
analyzed: advayena tatas tena puṇyaḥ eṣa mahāgrahaḥ
amāvasyām vinā api eṣa saṃghaṭṭaḥ ced mahāgrahaḥ
yathā arke meṣa ge rāhau aśvinī stha iśvinī dine

original: AbhT_6.106a/. āmāvāsyaṃ yadā tvardhaṃ līnaṃ prātipade dale /
analyzed: āmāvāsyam yadā tu ardham līnam prātipade dale

original: AbhT_6.106b/. pratipacca viśuddhā syāttanmokṣo dūrage vidhau // 106
analyzed: pratipad ca viśuddhā syāt tad mokṣaḥ dūra ge vidhau
laukika alaukikam bhūyaḥ phalam syāt pāralaukikam
grāsya grāsaka tā kṣobha prakṣaye kṣaṇam āviśan
mokṣa bhāj dhyāna pūjā ādi kurvan candra arkayoḥ grahe

original: AbhT_6.109a/. tithiccheda ṛṇaṃ kāso vṛddhirniḥśvasanaṃ dhanam /
analyzed: tithi chedaḥ ṛṇam kāsaḥ vṛddhiḥ niḥśvasanam dhanam

original: AbhT_6.109b/. ayatnajaṃ yatnajaṃ tu recanādatha rodhanāt // 109
analyzed: a yatna jam yatna jam tu recanāt atha rodhanāt

original: AbhT_6.110a/. evaṃ prāṇe viśati citsūrya induṃ sudhāmayam /
analyzed: evam prāṇe viśati cit sūryaḥ indum sudhā mayam
eka aikadhyena bodha aṃśu kalayā paripūrayet
tuṭyaḥ pañcadaśā etāḥ syuḥ tithayaḥ sita pakṣa gāḥ
antyāyām pūrṇa mas tuṭyām pūrvavat pakṣa sandhi tā
indu grahaḥ ca pratipad sandhau pūrva praveśataḥ

original: AbhT_6.113a/. aihikaṃ grahaṇe cātra sādhakānāṃ mahāphalam /
analyzed: aihikam grahaṇe ca atra sādhakānām mahā phalam
prāgvat anyat ayam māsaḥ prāṇa cāra ibdaḥ ucyate
ṣaṭsu ṣaṭsu aṅguleṣu arkaḥ hṛdayāt makara ādiṣu
tiṣṭhat māgha āḍhikam ṣaṭkam kuryāt tat ca uttarāyaṇam
saṃkrānti tritaye vṛtte bhukte ca aṣṭādaśa aṅgule

original: AbhT_6.115b/. meṣaṃ prāpte ravau puṇyaṃ viṣuvatpāralaukikam // 115
analyzed: meṣam prāpte ravau puṇyam viṣuvat pāralaukikam

original: AbhT_6.116a/. praveśe tu tulāsthe@rke tadeva viṣuvadbhavet /
analyzed: praveśe tu tulā stha irke tat eva viṣuvant bhavet
iha siddhi pradam ca etat dakṣiṇāyana gam tatas
garbha tā prodbubhūṣiṣyat bhāvaḥ ca atha udbubhūṣu tā
udbhaviṣyat tvam udbhūti prārambhaḥ upi udbhava sthitiḥ

original: AbhT_6.118a/. janma sattā pariṇatirvṛddhirhrāsaḥ kṣayaḥ kramāt /
analyzed: janma sattā pariṇatiḥ vṛddhiḥ hrāsaḥ kṣayaḥ kramāt

original: AbhT_6.118b/. makarādīni tenātra kriyā sūte sadṛkphalam // 118
analyzed: makara ādīni tena atra kriyā sūte sadṛś phalam

original: AbhT_6.119a/. āmutrike jhaṣaḥ kumbho mantrādeḥ pūrvasevane /
analyzed: āmutrike jhaṣaḥ kumbhaḥ mantra ādeḥ pūrva sevane
catuṣkam kila mīna ādyam antikam ca uttarottaram
praveśe khalu tatra eva śānti puṣṭi ādi sundaram

original: AbhT_6.120b/. karma syādaihikaṃ tacca dūradūraphalaṃ kramāt // 120
analyzed: karma syāt aihikam tat ca dūra dūra phalam kramāt
nirgame dina vṛddhiḥ syāt viparīte viparyayaḥ
varṣe ismin tithayaḥ pañca pratyaṅgulam iti kramaḥ
tatra api ahar rātra vidhiḥ iti sarvam hi pūrvavat
prāṇīye varṣe etasmin kārtika ādiṣu dakṣataḥ
pitāmaha antam rudrāḥ syuḥ dvādaśa agre itra bhāvinaḥ
prāṇe varṣa udayaḥ proktaḥ dvādaśa abda udayaḥ udhunā
kha rasāḥ tithyaḥ ekasmin ekasmin aṅgule kramāt

original: AbhT_6.124b/. dvādaśābdodaye te ca caitrādyā dvādaśoditāḥ // 124
analyzed: dvādaśa abda udaye te ca caitra ādyāḥ dvādaśā uditāḥ

original: AbhT_6.125a/. caitre mantroditiḥ so@pi tālunyukto@dhunā punaḥ /
analyzed: caitre mantra uditiḥ saḥ api tāluni uktaḥ adhunā punar

original: AbhT_6.125b/. hṛdi caitroditistena tatra mantrodayo@pi hi // 125
analyzed: hṛdi caitra uditiḥ tena tatra mantra udayaḥ api hi

original: AbhT_6.126a/. pratyaṅgulaṃ tithīnāṃ tu triśate parikalpite /
analyzed: pratyaṅgulam tithīnām tu tri śate parikalpite
sa pañca aṃśa aṅgula ibdaḥ syāt prāṇe ṣaṣṭi abda tā punar
śatāni ṣaḍ sahasrāṇi ca ekaviṃśatiḥ iti ayam
vibhāgaḥ prāṇa gaḥ ṣaṣṭi varṣa ahorātraḥ ucyate
prahara ahar niśā māsa ṛtu abda ravi ṣaṣṭi gaḥ

original: AbhT_6.128b/. yaśchedastatra yaḥ sandhiḥ sa puṇyo dhyānapūjane // 128
analyzed: yaḥ chedaḥ tatra yaḥ sandhiḥ sa puṇyaḥ dhyāna pūjane

original: AbhT_6.129a/. iti prāṇodaye yo@yaṃ kālaḥ śaktyekavigrahaḥ /
analyzed: iti prāṇa udaye yaḥ yam kālaḥ śakti eka vigrahaḥ
viśva ātma antar sthitaḥ tasya bāhye rūpam nirūpyate

original: AbhT_6.130a/. ṣaṭ prāṇāścaṣakasteṣāṃ ṣaṣṭirnālī ca tāstathā /
analyzed: ṣaṭ prāṇāḥ caṣakaḥ teṣām ṣaṣṭiḥ nālī ca tāḥ tathā

original: AbhT_6.130b/. tithistattriṃśatā māsaste dvādaśa tu vatsaraḥ // 130
analyzed: tithiḥ tad triṃśatā māsaḥ te dvādaśa tu vatsaraḥ
abdam pitryaḥ tu ahorātraḥ udak dakṣiṇa toyanāt
pitṝṇām yat sva mānena varṣam tat divyam ucyate

original: AbhT_6.132a/. ṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ ca triśataṃ varṣāṇāmatra mānuṣam /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭi adhikam ca tri śatam varṣāṇām atra mānuṣam
tat ca dvādaśabhiḥ hatvā māsa saṃkhyā atra labhyate
tām punar triṃśatā hatvā ahorātra kalpanā vadet

original: AbhT_6.133b/. hatvā tāṃ caikaviṃśatyā sahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatena ca // 133
analyzed: hatvā tām ca ekaviṃśatyā sahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatena ca
prāṇa saṃkhyām vadet tatra ṣaṣṭi ādi abda udayam punar
uktam ca gurubhiḥ śrīmat raurava ādi sva vṛttiṣu

original: AbhT_6.135a/. devānāṃ yadahorātraṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ sa hāyanaḥ /
analyzed: devānām yat ahorātram mānuṣāṇām sa hāyanaḥ

original: AbhT_6.135b/. śatatrayeṇa ṣaṣṭyā ca nṝṇāṃ vibudhavatsaraḥ // 135
analyzed: śata trayeṇa ṣaṣṭyā ca nṝṇām vibudha vatsaraḥ
śrīmat svacchandaśāstre ca tat eva matam īkṣyate
pitṝṇām tat ahar rātram iti upakramya pṛṣṭhatas
evam daivaḥ tu ahorātraḥ iti hi aikya upasaṃhṛtiḥ
tena ye guravaḥ śrīmat svacchanda ukti dvaya āditaḥ

original: AbhT_6.138a/. pitryaṃ varṣaṃ divyadinamūcurbhrāntā hi te mudhā /
analyzed: pitryam varṣam divya dinam ūcuḥ bhrāntāḥ hi te mudhā
divya arka abda sahasrāṇi yugeṣu catur ādeḥ
ekaika hānyā tāvadbhiḥ śataiḥ teṣu aṣṭa saṃdhayaḥ
catur yuga ekasaptatyā manu antar te caturdaśa
brahmaṇā ūhaḥ tatra ca indrāḥ kramāt yānti caturdaśa
dagdhvā lokatrayam dhūmāt tu anyat prasvāpayet trayam
nirayebhyaḥ purā kāla vahneḥ vyaktiḥ yatas tatas
vibhuḥ adhas sthitaḥ upi īśaḥ iti śrī rauravam matam
tadīyena āplutam viśvam tiṣṭhet tāvat niśā āgame
tasmin niśā avadhau sarve pudgalāḥ sūkṣma deha gāḥ
agni vega īritāḥ loke jane syuḥ laya kevalāḥ
kūṣmāṇḍa hāṭaka ādyāḥ tu krīḍanti mahat ālaye

original: AbhT_6.145a/. niśākṣaye punaḥ sṛṣṭiṃ kurute tāmasāditaḥ /
analyzed: niśā kṣaye punar sṛṣṭim kurute tāmasa āditaḥ
svaka varṣa śata ante sya kṣayaḥ tat vaiṣṇavam dinam
rātriḥ ca tāvatī iti evam viṣṇu rudra śata abhidhāḥ
kramāt sva sva śata anteṣu naśyanti atra aṇḍa lopataḥ
ap ādi avyakta tattva anteṣu ittham varṣa śatam kramāt
brahmaṇaḥ pralaya ullāsa sahasraiḥ tu rasa agnibhiḥ

original: AbhT_6.148b/. avyaktastheṣu rudreṣu dinaṃ rātriśca tāvatī // 148
analyzed: avyakta stheṣu rudreṣu dinam rātriḥ ca tāvatī
tadā śrīkaṇṭhaḥ eva syāt sākṣāt saṃhāra kṛt prabhuḥ
sarve rudrāḥ tathā mūle māyā garbha adhikāriṇaḥ
avyakta ākhye hi ā viriñcāt śrīkaṇṭhena saha āsate

original: AbhT_6.150b/. nivṛttādhaḥsthakarmā hi brahmā tatrādhare dhiyaḥ // 150
analyzed: nivṛtta adhas stha karmā hi brahmā tatra adhare dhiyaḥ

original: AbhT_6.151a/. na bhoktā jño@dhikāre tu vṛtta eva śivībhavet /
analyzed: na bhoktā jña udhikāre tu vṛtte eva śivībhavet
saḥ eṣa uvāntara layaḥ tad kṣaye sṛṣṭiḥ ucyate
sāṃkhya veda ādi saṃsiddhān śrīkaṇṭhaḥ tad ahar mukhe
sṛjati eva punar tena na samyak muktiḥ īdṛśī

original: AbhT_6.153a/. pradhāne yadahorātraṃ tajjaṃ varṣaśataṃ vibhoḥ /
analyzed: pradhāne yat ahorātram tad jam varṣa śatam vibhoḥ
śrīkaṇṭhasya āyuḥ etat ca dinam kañcuka vāsinām

original: AbhT_6.154a/. tatkramānniyatiḥ kālo rāgo vidyā kaletyamī /
analyzed: tat kramāt niyatiḥ kālaḥ rāgaḥ vidyā kalā iti amī
yānti anyonyam layam teṣām āyuḥ gāhanikam dinam
tad dina prakṣaye viśvam māyāyām pravilīyate

original: AbhT_6.155b/. kṣīṇāyāṃ niśi tāvatyāṃ gahaneśaḥ sṛjetpunaḥ // 155
analyzed: kṣīṇāyām niśi tāvatyām gahaneśaḥ sṛjet punar
evam avyakta kālam tu parārdhaiḥ daśabhiḥ jahi
māyā ahar tāvatī rātriḥ bhavet pralayaḥ eṣa saḥ

original: AbhT_6.157a/. māyākālaṃ parārdhānāṃ guṇayitvā śatena tu /
analyzed: māyā kālam parārdhānām guṇayitvā śatena tu

original: AbhT_6.157b/. aiśvaro divaso nādaḥ prāṇātmātra sṛjejjagat // 157
analyzed: aiśvaraḥ divasaḥ nādaḥ prāṇa ātmā atra sṛjet jagat

original: AbhT_6.158a/. tāvatī caiśvarī rātriryatra prāṇaḥ praśāmyati /
analyzed: tāvatī ca aiśvarī rātriḥ yatra prāṇaḥ praśāmyati
prāṇa garbha stham api atra viśvam sauṣumna vartmanā
prāṇe brahma vile śānte saṃvid yā api avaśiṣyate
sūkṣma sūkṣmataraḥ layaḥ

original: AbhT_6.160a/. guṇayitvaiśvaraṃ kālaṃ parārdhānāṃ śatena tu /
analyzed: guṇayitvā aiśvaram kālam parārdhānām śatena tu

original: AbhT_6.160b/. sādāśivaṃ dinaṃ rātrirmahāpralaya eva ca // 160
analyzed: sādāśivam dinam rātriḥ mahāpralayaḥ eva ca

original: AbhT_6.161b/. ākramya nāde līyeta gṛhītvā sacarācaram // 161
analyzed: ākramya nāde līyeta gṛhītvā sacarācaram

original: AbhT_6.162a/. nādo nādāntavṛttyā tu bhittvā brahmabilaṃ haṭhāt /
analyzed: nādaḥ nāda anta vṛttyā tu bhittvā brahmabilam haṭhāt
śakti tattve layam yāti nija kāla parikṣaye
etāvat śakti tattve tu vijñeyam khalu aharniśam

original: AbhT_6.163b/. śaktiḥ svakālavilaye vyāpinyāṃ līyate punaḥ // 163
analyzed: śaktiḥ sva kāla vilaye vyāpinyām līyate punar
vyāpinyā tat divārātram līyate sā api anāśrite
parārdha koṭyā hatvā api śakti kālam anāśrite

original: AbhT_6.165a/. dinaṃ rātriśca tatkāle parārdhaguṇite@pi ca /
analyzed: dinam rātriḥ ca tad kāle parārdha guṇite api ca

original: AbhT_6.165b/. so@pi yāti layaṃ sāmyasaṃjñe sāmanase pade // 165
analyzed: saḥ api yāti layam sāmya saṃjñe sāmanase pade

original: AbhT_6.166a/. sa kālaḥ sāmyasaṃjñaḥ syānnityo@kalyaḥ kalātmakaḥ /
analyzed: sa kālaḥ sāmya saṃjñaḥ syāt nityokalyaḥ kalā ātmakaḥ

original: AbhT_6.166b/. yattatsāmanasaṃ rūpaṃ tatsāmyaṃ brahma viśvagam // 166
analyzed: yat tat sāmanasam rūpam tat sāmyam brahma viśva gam
atas sāmanasāt kālāt nimeṣa unmeṣa mātrataḥ

original: AbhT_6.167b/. tuṭyādikaṃ parārdhāntaṃ sūte saivātra niṣṭhitam // 167
analyzed: tuṭi ādikam parārdha antam sūte sā eva atra niṣṭhitam
daśa śata sahasram ayutam sa arbudam vṛndam
kharva nikharve śaṃkha abja jaladhi madhya antam atha parārdham ca

original: AbhT_6.169a/. ityekasmātprabhṛti hi daśadhā daśadhā krameṇa kalayitvā /
analyzed: iti ekasmāt prabhṛti hi daśadhā daśadhā krameṇa kalayitvā
eka ādi parārdha anteṣu aṣṭādaśasu sthitim brūyāt

original: AbhT_6.170a/. catvāra ete pralayā mukhyāḥ sargāśca tatkalāḥ /
analyzed: catvāraḥ ete pralayāḥ mukhyāḥ sargāḥ ca tad kalāḥ
bhū mūla naiśa śakti sthāḥ tat eva aṇḍa catuṣṭayam
tad layaḥ vā āntaraḥ tasmāt ekaḥ sṛṣṭi laya īśitā

original: AbhT_6.172b/. śrīmānaghoraḥ śaktyante saṃhartā sṛṣṭikṛcca saḥ // 172
analyzed: śrīmān aghoraḥ śakti ante saṃhartā sṛṣṭi kṛt ca saḥ

original: AbhT_6.173a/. tatsṛṣṭau sṛṣṭisaṃhārā niḥsaṃkhyā jagatāṃ yataḥ /
analyzed: tad sṛṣṭau sṛṣṭi saṃhārāḥ niḥsaṃkhyāḥ jagatām yatas
antarbhūtāḥ tatas śāktī mahā sṛṣṭiḥ udāhṛtā
iti anyonyam kramāt yānti layam māyā antaka idhvani

original: AbhT_6.175a/. māyātattvalaye tvete prayānti paramaṃ padam /
analyzed: māyā tattva laye tu ete prayānti paramam padam

original: AbhT_6.175b/. māyordhve ye sitādhvasthāsteṣāṃ paraśive layaḥ // 175
analyzed: māyā ūrdhve ye sita adhva sthāḥ teṣām para śive layaḥ
tatra api aupādhikāt bhedāt laye bhedam pare viduḥ

original: AbhT_6.176b/. evaṃ tāttveśvare varge līne sṛṣṭau punaḥ pare // 176
analyzed: evam tāttva īśvare varge līne sṛṣṭau punar pare
tad sādhakāḥ śiva iṣṭāḥ vā tad sthānam adhiśerate

original: AbhT_6.177b/. brāhmī nāma parasyaiva śaktistāṃ yatra pātayet // 177
analyzed: brāhmī nāma parasya eva śaktiḥ tām yatra pātayet

original: AbhT_6.178a/. sa brahmā viṣṇurudrādyā vaiṣṇavyāderataḥ kramāt /
analyzed: sa brahmā viṣṇu rudra ādyāḥ vaiṣṇavī ādeḥ atas kramāt

original: AbhT_6.178b/. śaktimantaṃ vihāyānyaṃ śaktiḥ kiṃ yāti nedṛśam // 178
analyzed: śaktimantam vihāya anyam śaktiḥ kim yāti na īdṛśam
chādita prathita aśeṣa śaktiḥ ekaḥ śivaḥ tathā

original: AbhT_6.179b/. evaṃ visṛṣṭipralayāḥ prāṇa ekatra niṣṭhitāḥ // 179
analyzed: evam visṛṣṭi pralayāḥ prāṇe ekatra niṣṭhitāḥ

original: AbhT_6.180a/. so@pi saṃvidi saṃvicca cinmātre jñeyavarjite /
analyzed: sā upi saṃvidi saṃvid ca cit mātre jñeya varjite

original: AbhT_6.180b/. cinmātrameva devī ca sā parā parameśvarī // 180
analyzed: cit mātram eva devī ca sā parā parameśvarī

original: AbhT_6.181a/. aṣṭātriṃśaṃ ca tattattvaṃ hṛdayaṃ tatparāparam /
analyzed: aṣṭātriṃśam ca tat tattvam hṛdayam tad parāparam
tena saṃvid tvam eva etat spandamānam svabhāvataḥ

original: AbhT_6.183a/. kālaśaktistato bāhye naitasyā niyataṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: kāla śaktiḥ tatas bāhye na etasyāḥ niyatam vapuḥ

original: AbhT_6.183b/. svapnasvapne tathā svapne supte saṃkalpagocare // 183
analyzed: svapna svapne tathā svapne supte saṃkalpa gocare

original: AbhT_6.184b/. mito@pi kila kālāṃśo vitatatvena bhāsate // 184
analyzed: mitaḥ api kila kāla aṃśaḥ vitata tvena bhāsate
pramātṛ abhede citraḥ vitatimā api asau

original: AbhT_6.185b/. evaṃ prāṇe yathā kālaḥ kriyāvaicitryaśaktijaḥ // 185
analyzed: evam prāṇe yathā kālaḥ kriyā vaicitrya śakti jaḥ
tathā apāne pi hṛdayāt mūla pīṭha visarpiṇi
mūla abhidha mahā pīṭha saṅkoca pravikāsayoḥ
brahma ādi anāśrita antānām cinute sṛṣṭi saṃhṛtī
śaśvat yadi api apānoyam mittham vahati kiṃtu asau
avedya yatnaḥ yatnena yogibhiḥ samupāsyate
brahma ādayaḥ na āśrita antāḥ sevyante itra su yogibhiḥ
ete ca parameśāna śakti tvāt viśva vartinaḥ
deham api aśnuvānāḥ tad kāraṇāni iti kāmike
bālya yauvana vṛddha tva nidhaneṣu punarbhave

original: AbhT_6.191a/. muktau ca dehe brahmādyāḥ ṣaḍadhiṣṭhānakāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: muktau ca dehe brahma ādyāḥ ṣaṣ adhiṣṭhāna kāriṇaḥ

original: AbhT_6.191b/. tasyānte tu parā devī yatra yukto na jāyate // 191
analyzed: tasya ante tu parā devī yatra yuktaḥ na jāyate
anena jñāta mātreṇa dīkṣā anugraha kṛt bhavet
akāraṇam śivam vindet yat tat viśvasya kāraṇam
kṣīyate tad upāsāyām yena ūrdhva adhara ḍambaraḥ
atra apāna udaye prāgvat ṣaṣṭi abda udaya yojanām
yāvat kurvīta tuṭi ādeḥ yukta aṅgula vibhāgataḥ

original: AbhT_6.195b/. evaṃ samāne@pi vidhiḥ sa hi hārdīṣu nāḍiṣu // 195
analyzed: evam samāne api vidhiḥ sa hi hārdīṣu nāḍiṣu
saṃcaran sarvatodikkam daśadhā eva vibhāvyate

original: AbhT_6.196b/. daśa mukhyā mahānāḍīḥ pūrayanneṣa tadgatāḥ // 196
analyzed: daśa mukhyāḥ mahā nāḍīḥ pūrayan eṣa tad gatāḥ
nāḍī antara śritāḥ nāḍīḥ krāman dehe sama sthitiḥ
aṣṭāsu diś daleṣu eṣa krāman tad dikpateḥ kramāt
ceṣṭitāni anukurvāṇaḥ raudraḥ saumyaḥ ca bhāsate
saḥ eva nāḍī tritaye vāma dakṣiṇa madhya ge
indu arka agni maye mukhye caran tiṣṭhati aharniśam
sārdha nālī dvayam prāṇa śatāni nava yat sthitam
tāvat vahan ahorātram caturviṃśatidhā caret

original: AbhT_6.200b/. viṣuvadvāsare prātaḥ sāṃśāṃ nālīṃ sa madhyagaḥ // 200
analyzed: viṣuvat vāsare prātar sa aṃśām nālīm sa madhya gaḥ
vāmetara udak savya anyaiḥ yāvat saṃkrānti pañcakam
evam kṣīṇāsu pādona caturdaśasu nāliṣu
madhyāhne dakṣa viṣuvat nava prāṇa śatīm vahet
dakṣa udak anya udak dakṣaiḥ punar saṃkrānti pañcakam
nava asu śatam ekaikam tatas viṣuvat uttaram
pañcake pañcaka itīte saṃkrānteḥ viṣuvat bahis
yadvat tathā antar saṅkrāntiḥ nava prāṇa śatāni sā
evam rātrau api iti evam viṣuvat divasāt samāt
ārabhya ahar niśā vṛddhi hrāsa saṅkrānti gopī asau
sa śarvarī udayaḥ madhyam udaktaḥ viṣu tā īdṛśī

original: AbhT_6.206b/. vyāptau viṣeryato vṛttiḥ sāmyaṃ ca vyāptirucyate // 206
analyzed: vyāptau viṣeḥ yataḥ vṛttiḥ sāmyam ca vyāptiḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_6.207a/. tadarhati ca yaḥ kālo viṣuvattadihoditaḥ /
analyzed: tat arhati ca yaḥ kālaḥ viṣuvant tat iha uditaḥ
viṣuvat prabhṛti hrāsa vṛddhī ye dina rātri ge
tad krameṇa eva saṃkrānti hrāsa vṛddhī divā
ittham samāna marutaḥ varṣa dvaya vikalpanam
cāraḥ ekatra na hi atra śvāsa praśvāsa carcanam
samāne api tuṭeḥ pūrvam yāvat ṣaṣṭi abda gocaram
kāla saṃkhyā su sūkṣmā eka cāra gā gaṇyate budhaiḥ
saṃdhyā pūrvāhṇa madhyāhna madhyarātra ādi yat kila
antar saṃkrānti gam grāhyam tat mukhyam tad phala uditeḥ

original: AbhT_6.211b/. uktaḥ samānagaḥ kāla udāne tu nirūpyate // 211
analyzed: uktaḥ samāna gaḥ kālaḥ udāne tu nirūpyate
prāṇa vyāptau yat uktam tat udāne api atra kevalam
tena udāna itra hṛdayāt mūrdhanya dvādaśānta gam
tuṭi ādi ṣaṣṭi varṣa antam viśvam kālam vicārayet

original: AbhT_6.214a/. vyāne tu viśvātmamaye vyāpake kramavarjite /
analyzed: vyāne tu viśva ātma maye vyāpake krama varjite
sūkṣma sūkṣma ucchalat rūpa mātraḥ kālaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: AbhT_6.215a/. sṛṣṭiḥ pravilayaḥ sthemā saṃhāro@nugraho yataḥ /
analyzed: sṛṣṭiḥ pravilayaḥ sthemā saṃhāraḥ anugrahaḥ yatas

original: AbhT_6.215b/. kramātprāṇādike kāle taṃ taṃ tatrāśrayettataḥ // 215
analyzed: kramāt prāṇa ādike kāle tam tam tatra āśrayet tatas
yaḥ varṇa pada mantra udayaḥ sthitaḥ

original: AbhT_6.216b/. yatnajo@yatnajaḥ sūkṣmaḥ paraḥ sthūlaḥ sa kathyate // 216
analyzed: yatna jaḥ yatna jaḥ sūkṣmaḥ paraḥ sthūlaḥ sa kathyate
ekaḥ nāda ātmakaḥ varṇaḥ sarva varṇa a vibhāgavān
saḥ ūna stamita rūpa tvāt anāhataḥ iha uditaḥ

original: AbhT_6.218a/. sa tu bhairavasadbhāvo mātṛsadbhāva eṣa saḥ /
analyzed: sa tu bhairava sadbhāvaḥ mātṛsadbhāvaḥ eṣa saḥ

original: AbhT_6.218b/. parā saikākṣarā devī yatra līnaṃ carācaram // 218
analyzed: parā sā ekākṣarā devī yatra līnam carācaram
hrasva arṇa trayam ekaikam ravi aṅgulam atha itarat

original: AbhT_6.219b/. praveśa iti ṣaḍvarṇāḥ sūryendupathagāḥ kramāt // 219
analyzed: praveśaḥ iti ṣaṣ varṇāḥ sūrya indu patha gāḥ kramāt
ikāra ukārayoḥ ādi sandhau saṃdhi akṣara dvayam

original: AbhT_6.220b/. e+o iti praveśe tu ai+au iti dvayaṃ viduḥ // 220
analyzed: iti praveśe tu   iti dvayam viduḥ
ṣaṇṭha arṇāni praveśe tu dvādaśānta lalāṭayoḥ

original: AbhT_6.221b/. gale hṛdi ca bindvarṇavisargau paritaḥsthitau // 221
analyzed: gale hṛdi ca bindu arṇa visargau paritas sthitau
ka ādi pañcakam ādyasya varṇasya antar sadā uditam
evam sa sthāna varṇānām antar sā sa arṇa santatiḥ
hṛdi eṣa prāṇa rūpaḥ tu sakāraḥ jīvana ātmakaḥ

original: AbhT_6.223b/. binduḥ prakāśo hārṇaśca pūraṇātmatayā sthitaḥ // 223
analyzed: binduḥ prakāśaḥ ha arṇaḥ ca pūraṇa ātma tayā sthitaḥ

original: AbhT_6.224a/. uktaḥ paro@yamudayo varṇānāṃ sūkṣma ucyate /
analyzed: uktaḥ paraḥ yam udayaḥ varṇānām sūkṣmaḥ ucyate
praveśe ṣoḍaśa aunmukhye ravayaḥ ṣaṇṭha varjitāḥ
tat eva indu arkam atra anye varṇāḥ sūkṣma udayaḥ tu ayam
kāla ūrdhva mātraḥ ka ādīnām trayastriṃśataḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_6.226a/. mātrā hrasvāḥ pañca dīrghāṣṭakaṃ dvistriḥ plutaṃ tu lṝ /
analyzed: mātrāḥ hrasvāḥ pañca dīrgha aṣṭakam dvis tris plutam tu lṝ
ekāśītim imām ardha mātrāṇām āha naḥ guruḥ
yad vaśāt bhagavān ekāśītikam mantram abhyadhāt

original: AbhT_6.227b/. ekāśītipadā devī śaktiḥ proktā śivātmikā // 227
analyzed: ekāśīti padā devī śaktiḥ proktā śiva ātmikā

original: AbhT_6.228a/. śrīmātaṅge tathā dharmasaṃghātātmā śivo yataḥ /
analyzed: śrī mātaṅge tathā dharma saṃghāta ātmā śivaḥ yatas
tathā tathā parāmarśa śakti cakra īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
sthūla ekāśīti pada ja parāmarśaiḥ vibhāvyate

original: AbhT_6.229b/. tata eva parāmarśo yāvatyekaḥ samāpyate // 229
analyzed: tatas eva parāmarśaḥ yāvati ekaḥ samāpyate
tāvat tat padam uktam no sup tiṅ niyamayā antritam
sthūla upāyaḥ para upāyaḥ tu eṣa mātrā kṛtaḥ layaḥ

original: AbhT_6.231b/. ardhamātrā nava nava syuścaturṣu caturṣu yat // 231
analyzed: ardha mātrāḥ nava nava syuḥ caturṣu caturṣu yat
aṅguleṣu iti ṣaṭtriṃśati ekāśīti pada udayaḥ
aṅgule nava bhāgena vibhakte nava māśakāḥ
vedāḥ mātrā ardham anyat tu dvi catur ṣaṅguṇam trayam
evam aṅgula randhra aṃśa catuṣka dvaya gam laghu

original: AbhT_6.234a/. dīrghaṃ plutaṃ kramāddvitriguṇamardhaṃ tato@pi hal /
analyzed: dīrgham plutam kramāt dvi tri guṇam ardham tatas api ha l
kṣakāraḥ tri ardha mātrā ātmā mātrikaḥ sa tathā antarā
viśrāntau ardha mātrā asya tasmin tu kalite sati
aṅgula ardhedri bhāgena tu ardha mātrā purā punar
kṣakāraḥ sarva saṃyoga grahaṇa ātmā tu sarva gaḥ

original: AbhT_6.237a/. itthaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśake cāre varṇānāmudayaḥ phale /
analyzed: ittham ṣaṭtriṃśake cāre varṇānām udayaḥ phale

original: AbhT_6.237b/. krūre saumye vilomena hādi yāvadapaścimam // 237
analyzed: krūre saumye vilomena ha ādi yāvat apaścimam
hṛdi akāraḥ dvādaśānte hakāraḥ tat idam viduḥ
aham ātmakam advaitam yaḥ prakāśa ātma viśramaḥ
śiva śakti avibhāgena mātrā ekāśītikā tu iyam
dvāsaptatau aṅguleṣu dviguṇa tvena saṃsaret
uktaḥ sūkṣma udayaḥ traidham dvidhā uktaḥ tu para udayaḥ
atha sthūla udaya ūrṇānām bhaṇyate guruṇā uditaḥ
ekaikam ardha praharam dine varga aṣṭaka udayaḥ

original: AbhT_6.241b/. rātrau ca hrāsavṛddhyatra kecidāhurna ke@pi tu // 241
analyzed: rātrau ca hrāsa vṛddhī atra kecid āhuḥ na ke pi tu

original: AbhT_6.242a/. eṣa vargodayo rātrau divā cāpyardhayāmagaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa varga udayaḥ rātrau divā ca api ardha yāma gaḥ
prāṇa trayodaśa śatī pañcāśat adhikā ca sā

original: AbhT_6.243a/. adhyardhā kila saṃkrāntirvarge varge divāniśoḥ /
analyzed: adhyardhā kila saṃkrāntiḥ varge varge divāniśoḥ
tad aikye tu udayaḥ cāra śatānām saptaviṃśatiḥ

original: AbhT_6.244a/. nava vargāṃstu ye prāhusteṣāṃ prāṇaśatī svīn[viḥ] /
analyzed: nava vargān tu ye prāhuḥ teṣām prāṇa śatī
sa tri bhāgā eva saṃkrāntiḥ varge pratyekam ucyate

original: AbhT_6.245a/. aharniśaṃ tadaikye tu śatānāṃ śruticakṣuṣī /
analyzed: aharniśam tad aikye tu śatānām śruti cakṣuṣī
sthūlaḥ varga udayaḥ saḥ uyam atha arṇa udayaḥ ucyate
ekaika varṇe prāṇānām dviśatam ṣoḍaśa adhikam
bahis caṣaka ṣaṭtriṃśat dine ittham tathā niśi
śatam aṣṭa uttaram tatra raudram śāktam atha uttaram
dina rātri avibhāge tu dṛś vahni abdhi asu cāraṇāḥ

original: AbhT_6.248b/. sapañcamāṃśā nāḍī ca bahirvarṇodayaḥ smṛtaḥ // 248
analyzed: sa pañcama aṃśā nāḍī ca bahis varṇa udayaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_6.249a/. iti pañcāśikā seyaṃ varṇānāṃ paricarcitā /
analyzed: iti pañcāśikā sā iyam varṇānām paricarcitā

original: AbhT_6.249b/. ekonāṃ ye tu tāmāhustanmataṃ saṃpracakṣmahe // 249
analyzed: eka ūnām ye tu tām āhuḥ tat matam saṃpracakṣmahe
vedāḥ cārāḥ pañcama aṃśa nyūnam cāra ardham ekaśas
varṇa idhikam tat dviguṇam avibhāge

original: AbhT_6.251a/. sthūlo varṇodayaḥ so@yaṃ purā sūkṣmo nigadyate // 251
analyzed: sthūlaḥ varṇa udayaḥ saḥ ayam purā sūkṣmaḥ nigadyate
iti kāla tattvam uditam śāstra mukha āgama nija anubhava siddham
atha śrī tantrāloke
atha cakrāṇām bhaṇyate abhyudayaḥ
iti ayatna jam ākhyātam yatna jam tu nigadyate
bīja piṇḍa ātmakam sarvam saṃvidaḥ spandana ātma tām
vidadhat para saṃvittau upāyaḥ iti varṇitam
yathā araghaṭṭa cakra agra ghaṭīyantra ogha vāhanam
eka anusaṃdhi yatnena citram yantra udayam bhajet
eka anusaṃdhāna balāt jāte mantra udaye niśam
tad mantradevatā yatnāt tādātmyena prasīdati

original: AbhT_7.5b/. khe rasaikākṣi nityotthe tadardhaṃ dvikapiṇḍake // 5
AbhT_7.6a/. trike sapta sahasrāṇi dviśatītyudayo mataḥ /
analyzed: trike sapta sahasrāṇi dviśatā iti udayaḥ mataḥ

original: AbhT_7.6b/. catuṣke tu sahasrāṇi pañca caiva catuḥśatī // 6
analyzed: catuṣke tu sahasrāṇi pañca ca eva catuḥśatī
pañca arṇa ibdhi sahasrāṇi triśatī viṃśatiḥ tathā

original: AbhT_7.7b/. ṣaṭke sahasratritayaṃ ṣaṭśatī codayo bhavet // 7
analyzed: ṣaṭke sahasra tritayam ṣaṭśatī ca udayaḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_7.8a/. saptake trisahasraṃ tu ṣaḍaśītyadhikaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: saptake tri sahasram tu ṣaṣ aśīti adhikam smṛtam
śataiḥ tu saptaviṃśatyā varṇa aṣṭaka vikalpite
caturviṃśati śatyā tu nava arṇeṣu udayaḥ bhavet
adhi ṣaṣṭi ekaviṃśatyā śatānām daśa varṇake
aṣṭādaśa śatāni syuḥ udayaḥ dvādaśa arṇake

original: AbhT_7.11a/. trayodaśārṇe dvāṣaṣṭyā śatāni kila ṣoḍaśa /
analyzed: trayodaśa arṇe dvāṣaṣṭyā śatāni kila ṣoḍaśa
tricatvāriṃśatā pañcadaśa iti bhuvana arṇake

original: AbhT_7.12b/. trayodaśaśatī sārdhā ṣoḍaśārṇe tu kathyate // 12
analyzed: trayodaśa śatī sa ardhā ṣoḍaśa arṇe tu kathyate
śata dvādaśikā saptadaśa arṇe sā ekasaptatiḥ
aṣṭādaśa arṇe vijñeyā śata dvādaśikā budhaiḥ
caturviṃśati saṃkhyāke cakre nava śatī bhavet
saptaviṃśati saṃkhyāte tu udaya uṣṭaśata ātmakaḥ
dvātriṃśake mahācakre ṣaṭśatī pañcasaptatiḥ
dvi caturviṃśake cakre sa ardhām śata catuṣṭayīm

original: AbhT_7.16b/. catuṣpañcāśake cakre śatānāṃ tu catuṣṭayam // 16
analyzed: catuṣpañcāśake cakre śatānām tu catuṣṭayam
saptatriṃśat saha ardhena triśatī aṣṭa aṣṭake bhavet
ardham ardha tri bhāgaḥ ca ṣaṣ ṣaṣṭiḥ dviśatī bhavet

original: AbhT_7.18b/. cakre tu ṣaṇṇavatyākhye sapādā dviśatī bhavet // 18
analyzed: cakre tu ṣaṇṇavati ākhye sa pādā dviśatī bhavet
aṣṭottaraśate cakre dvi śataḥ tu udayaḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_7.19b/. krameṇetthamidaṃ cakraṃ ṣaṭkṛtvo dviguṇaṃ yadā // 19
analyzed: krameṇa ittham idam cakram ṣaṣ kṛtvas dviguṇam yadā
tatas api dviguṇa iṣṭa aṃśasya ardham adhyardham ekakam
tatas api sūkṣma kuśalaiḥ ardha ardha ādi prakalpane
bhāga ṣoḍaśaka sthityā sūkṣmaḥ ca āraḥ abhilakṣyate
evam prayatna saṃruddha prāṇa cārasya yoginaḥ
krameṇa prāṇa cārasya grāsaḥ eva upajāyate
saṃvid ekā eva pūrṇā syāt jñāna bheda vyapohanāt

original: AbhT_7.23b/. tathā hi prāṇacārasya navasyānudaye sati // 23
analyzed: tathā hi prāṇa cārasya navasya anudaye sati
na kāla bheda janitaḥ jñāna bhedaḥ prakalpate
saṃvedya bhedāt na jñānam bhinnam śikhari vṛtta vat

original: AbhT_7.25a/. kālastu bhedakastasya sa tu sūkṣmaḥ kṣaṇo mataḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ tu bhedakaḥ tasya sa tu sūkṣmaḥ kṣaṇaḥ mataḥ

original: AbhT_7.25b/. saukṣmyasya cāvadhirjñānaṃ yāvattiṣṭhati sa kṣaṇaḥ // 25
analyzed: saukṣmyasya ca avadhiḥ jñānam yāvat tiṣṭhati sa kṣaṇaḥ

original: AbhT_7.26a/. anyathā na sa nirvaktuṃ nipuṇairapi pāryate /
analyzed: anyathā na sa nirvaktum nipuṇaiḥ api pāryate
jñānam kiyat bhavet tāvat tad abhāvaḥ na bhāsate
tad abhāvaḥ ca no tāvat yāvat tatra akṣa vartmani

original: AbhT_7.27b/. arthe vātmapradeśe vā na saṃyogavibhāgitā // 27
analyzed: arthe vā ātma pradeśe vā na saṃyoga vibhāgi tā

original: AbhT_7.28a/. sā cedudayate spandamayī tatprāṇagā dhruvam /
analyzed: sā ced udayate spanda mayī tad prāṇa gā dhruvam

original: AbhT_7.28b/. bhavedeva tataḥ prāṇaspandābhāve na sā bhavet // 28
analyzed: bhavet eva tatas prāṇa spanda abhāve na sā bhavet

original: AbhT_7.29a/. tadabhāvānna vijñānābhāvaḥ saivaṃ tu saiva dhīḥ /
analyzed: tad abhāvāt na vijñāna abhāvaḥ sā evam tu sā eva dhīḥ

original: AbhT_7.29b/. na cāsau vastuto dīrghā kālabhedavyapohanāt // 29
analyzed: na ca asau vastutas dīrghā kāla bheda vyapohanāt

original: AbhT_7.30a/. vastuto hyata eveyaṃ kālaṃ saṃvinna saṃspṛśet /
analyzed: vastutas hi atas eva iyam kālam saṃvid na saṃspṛśet
atas ekā eva saṃvittiḥ nānā rūpe tathā tathā
vindānā nirvikalpā api vikalpaḥ bhāva gocare

original: AbhT_7.31b/. spandāntaraṃ na yāvattaduditaṃ tāvadeva saḥ // 31
analyzed: spanda antaram na yāvat tat uditam tāvat eva saḥ

original: AbhT_7.32a/. tāvāneko vikalpaḥ syādvividhaṃ vastu kalpayan /
analyzed: tāvān ekaḥ vikalpaḥ syāt vividham vastu kalpayan

original: AbhT_7.32b/. ye tvitthaṃ na vidusteṣāṃ vikalpo nopapadyate // 32
analyzed: ye tu ittham na viduḥ teṣām vikalpaḥ na upapadyate

original: AbhT_7.33a/. sa hyeko na bhavetkaścit trijagatyāpi jātucit /
analyzed: sa hi ekaḥ na bhavet kaścid trijagatyā api jātucit

original: AbhT_7.33b/. śabdārūṣaṇayā jñānaṃ vikalpaḥ kila kathyate // 33
analyzed: śabda ārūṣaṇayā jñānam vikalpaḥ kila kathyate

original: AbhT_7.34a/. sā ca syātkramikaivetthaṃ kiṃ kathaṃ ko vikalpayet /
analyzed: sā ca syāt kramikā evā ittham kim katham kaḥ vikalpayet

original: AbhT_7.34b/. ghaṭa ityapi neyānsyādvikalpaḥ kā kathā sthitau // 34
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ iti api na iyān syāt vikalpaḥ kā kathā sthitau

original: AbhT_7.35a/. na vikalpaśca ko@pyasti yo mātrāmātraniṣṭhitaḥ /
analyzed: na vikalpaḥ ca kopī asti yaḥ mātrā mātra niṣṭhitaḥ
na ca jñāna samūhaḥ usti teṣām ayugapad sthiteḥ
tena astaṅgataḥ eva eṣa vyavahāraḥ vikalpa jaḥ
tasmāt spanda antaram yāvat na udiyāt tāvat ekakam
vijñānam tad vikalpa ātma dharma koṭīḥ api spṛśet
ekāśīti pada udāra śakti āmarśa ātmakaḥ tatas
vikalpaḥ śiva tā dāyī pūrvam eva nirūpitaḥ

original: AbhT_7.38b/. yathā karṇau nartayāmītyevaṃ yatnāttathā bhavet // 38
analyzed: yathā karṇau nartayāmi iti evam yatnāt tathā bhavet
cakra cāra gatāt yatnāt tadvat tad cakra gā eva dhīḥ
japa homa arcana ādīnām prāṇa sāmyam atas vidhiḥ
uktam ca yoginīkaule tat etat parameśinā
pada mantra akṣare cakre vibhāgam śakti tattva gam

original: AbhT_7.41b/. padeṣu kṛtvā mantrajño japādau phalabhāgbhavet // 41
analyzed: padeṣu kṛtvā mantra jñaḥ japa ādau phala bhāj bhavet
dvi tri sapta aṣṭa saṃkhyātam lopayet śatika udayam

original: AbhT_7.42b/. iti śaktisthitā mantrā vidyā vā cakranāyakāḥ // 42
analyzed: iti śakti sthitāḥ mantrāḥ vidyā vā cakra nāyakāḥ

original: AbhT_7.43a/. padapiṇḍasvarūpeṇa jñātvā yojyāḥ sadā priye /

analyzed: nitya udaye mahā tattve udaya sthe sadāśive

original: AbhT_7.44a/. ayuktāḥ śaktimārge tu na japtāścodayena ye /
analyzed: ayuktāḥ śakti mārge tu na japtāḥ ca udayena ye

original: AbhT_7.44b/. te na siddhyanti yatnena japtāḥ koṭiśatairapi // 44
analyzed: te na siddhyanti yatnena japtāḥ koṭi śataiḥ api

original: AbhT_7.45a/. mālāmantreṣu sarveṣu mānaso japa ucyate /
analyzed: mālāmantreṣu sarveṣu mānasaḥ japaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_7.45b/. upāṃśurvā śaktyudayaṃ teṣāṃ na parikalpayet // 45
analyzed: upāṃśuḥ vā śakti udayam teṣām na parikalpayet
pada mantreṣu sarveṣu yāvat tad pada śakti gam

original: AbhT_7.46b/. śakyate satataṃ yuktaistāvajjapyaṃ tu sādhakaiḥ // 46
analyzed: śakyate satatam yuktaiḥ tāvat japyam tu sādhakaiḥ

original: AbhT_7.47a/. tāvatī teṣu vai saṃkhyā padeṣu padasaṃjñitā /
analyzed: tāvatī teṣu vai saṃkhyā padeṣu pada saṃjñitā
tāvantam udayam kṛtvā tripada ukti āditaḥ kramāt

original: AbhT_7.48a/. dvādaśākhye dvādaśite cakre sārdhaṃ śataṃ bhavet /
analyzed: dvādaśa ākhye dvādaśite cakre sa ardham śatam bhavet
udayaḥ tat hi sa catuścatvāriṃśat śatam bhavet
ṣoḍaśa ākhye dvādaśite dvānavati adhike śate

original: AbhT_7.49b/. cārārdhena samaṃ proktaṃ śataṃ dvādaśakādhikam // 49

analyzed: ṣoḍaśa ākhye ṣoḍaśite bhavet caturaśīti gaḥ
udayaḥ dviśatam tat hi ṣaṭpañcāśat samuttaram
cāra aṣṭa bhāgān trīn atra kathayanti adhikān budhāḥ

original: AbhT_7.51b/. aṣṭāṣṭake dvādaśite pādārdhaṃ viṃśatiṃ vasūn // 51
analyzed: aṣṭa aṣṭake dvādaśite pāda ardham viṃśatim vasūn

original: AbhT_7.52a/. udayaḥ saptaśatikā sāṣṭā ṣaṣṭiryato hi saḥ /
analyzed: udayaḥ saptaśatikā sa aṣṭā ṣaṣṭiḥ yatas hi saḥ

original: AbhT_7.52b/. eṣa cakrodayaḥ proktaḥ sādhakānāṃ hitāvahaḥ // 52
analyzed: eṣa cakra udayaḥ proktaḥ sādhakānām hita āvahaḥ
niruddhya mānasīḥ vṛttīḥ cakre viśrāntim āgataḥ
vyutthāya yāvat viśrāmyet tāvat cāra udayaḥ hi ayam
pūrṇe samudaye tu atra praveśa aikātmya nirgamāḥ

original: AbhT_7.54b/. traya ityata evoktaḥ siddhau madhyodayo varaḥ // 54
analyzed: trayaḥ iti atas eva uktaḥ siddhau madhya udayaḥ varaḥ
ādi anta udaya nirmuktāḥ madhyama udaya saṃyutāḥ
mantra vidyā cakra gaṇāḥ siddhi bhājaḥ bhavanti hi
mantra cakra udaya jñaḥ tu vidyā cakra udaya artha vid

original: AbhT_7.56b/. kṣipraṃ siddhyediti proktaṃ śrīmaddviṃśatike trike // 56
analyzed: kṣipram siddhyet iti proktam śrīmat dviṃśatike trike

original: AbhT_7.57a/. dvistriścaturvā mātrābhirvidyāṃ vā cakrameva vā /
analyzed: dvis tris catuḥ vā mātrābhiḥ vidyām vā cakram eva vā
tattva udaya yutam nityam pṛthak bhūtam japet sadā
piṇḍa akṣara padaiḥ mantram ekaikam śakti tattva gam

original: AbhT_7.58b/. bahvakṣarastu yo mantro vidyā vā cakrameva vā // 58
analyzed: bahu akṣaraḥ tu yaḥ mantraḥ vidyā vā cakram eva vā

original: AbhT_7.59a/. śaktisthaṃ naiva taṃ tatra vibhāgastvoṃnamontagaḥ /
analyzed: śakti stham nā eva tam tatra vibhāgaḥ tu om namaḥ nta gaḥ
asmin tattva udaye tasmāt ahorātraḥ triśas triśas
vibhajyate vibhāgaḥ ca punar eva triśas triśas
pūrva udaye tu viśramya dvitīyena ullaset yadā
viśet ca ardhardhikā yogāt tadā ukta ardha udayaḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_7.61b/. yadā pūrṇodayātmā tu samaḥ kālastrike sphuret // 61
analyzed: yadā pūrṇa udaya ātmā tu samaḥ kālaḥ trike sphuret
praveśa viśrānti ullāse syāt sva tri aṃśa udayaḥ tadā

original: AbhT_7.62b/. etyeṣa kālavibhavaḥ prāṇa eva pratiṣṭhitaḥ // 62
analyzed: eti eṣa kāla vibhavaḥ prāṇe eva pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: AbhT_7.63a/. sa spade khe sa taccityāṃ tenāsyāṃ viśvaniṣṭhiatiḥ /
analyzed: sa khe sa tat cityām tena asyām viśva niṣṭhiatiḥ
atas saṃvid pratiṣṭhānau yatas viśva laya udayau
śakti anta idhvani tad spanda asaṃkhyātā vāstavī tatas

original: AbhT_7.64b/. uktaṃ śrīmālinītantre gātre yatraiva kutracit // 64
analyzed: uktam śrī mālinītantre gātre yatra eva kutracid
vikāraḥ upajāyeta tat tattvam tattvam uttamam

original: AbhT_7.65b/. prāṇe pratiṣṭhitaḥ kālastadāviṣṭā ca yattanuḥ // 65
analyzed: prāṇe pratiṣṭhitaḥ kālaḥ tad āviṣṭā ca yat tanuḥ

original: AbhT_7.66a/. dehe pratiṣṭhitasyāsya tato rūpaṃ nirūpyate /
analyzed: dehe pratiṣṭhitasya asya tatas rūpam nirūpyate
cit spanda prāṇa vṛttīnām antyā yā sthūla tā suṣiḥ
sā nāḍī rūpa tām etya deham saṃtānayet imam

original: AbhT_7.67b/. śrīsvacchande@ta evoktaṃ yathā parṇaṃ svatantubhiḥ // 67
analyzed: śrī svacchanda itas eva uktam yathā parṇam sva tantubhiḥ
vyāptam tadvat tanuḥ dvāra dvāri bhāvena nāḍibhiḥ
kālaḥ samastaḥ caturaśītau eva aṅguleṣu itas
ṣaṇṇavatyām adhas ṣaṣ dvi kramāt ca aṣṭa uttaram śatam
atra madhyama saṃcāri prāṇa udaya laya antare

original: AbhT_7.71a/. viśve sṛṣṭilayāste tu citrā vāyvantarakramāt /
analyzed: viśve sṛṣṭi layāḥ te tu citrāḥ vāyu antara kramāt
iti eṣa sūkṣma parimarśana śīlanīyaḥ cakra udayaḥ unubhava śāstra dṛśā mayā uktaḥ
atha śītantrāloke aṣṭamam āhnikam
deśa adhvanā upi atha samāsa vikāsa yogāt saṃgīyate vidhiḥ ayam śivaśāstra dṛṣṭaḥ
vicāritaḥ uyam kāla adhvā kriyā śakti mayaḥ prabhoḥ
mūrti vaicitrya jaḥ tad jaḥ deśa adhvā atha nirūpyate

original: AbhT_8.3a/. adhvā samasta evāyaṃ cinmātre saṃpratiṣṭhitaḥ /
analyzed: adhvā samastaḥ eva ayam cit mātre saṃpratiṣṭhitaḥ
yat tatra na hi viśrāntam tat nabhaḥkusumāyate

original: AbhT_8.4a/. saṃviddvāreṇa tatsṛṣṭe śūnye dhiyi marutsu ca /
analyzed: saṃvid dvāreṇa tad sṛṣṭe śūnye dhiyi marutsu ca
tatra adhvā evam nirūpyaḥ ūyam yatas tad prakriyā kramam

original: AbhT_8.5b/. anusaṃdadhadeva drāg yogī bhairavatāṃ vrajet // 5
analyzed: anusaṃdadhat eva drāk yogī bhairava tām vrajet
didṛkṣayā eva sarva arthān yadā vyāpya avatiṣṭhate

original: AbhT_8.6b/. tadā kiṃ bahunoktena ityuktaṃ spandaśāsane // 6
analyzed: tadā kim bahunā uktena iti uktam spandaśāsane
jñātvā samastam adhvānam tad īśeṣu vilāpayet
tān deha prāṇa dhī cakre pūrvavat gālayet kramāt
tat samastam sva saṃvittau sā saṃvid bharita ātmikā
upāsyamānā saṃsāra sāgara pralaya analaḥ
śrī mahīkṣottare ca etān adhva īśān guruḥ abravīt

original: AbhT_8.10a/. rudro granthau ca māyāyāmīśaḥ sādākhyagocare /
analyzed: rudraḥ granthau ca māyāyām īśaḥ sādākhya gocare
anāśritaḥ śivaḥ tasmāt vyāptā tad vyāpakaḥ paraḥ
evam śiva tvam āpannam iti matvā nyarūpyata
na prakriyā param jñānam iti svacchandaśāsane
avyāhata vibhāga ūsmi bhāvaḥ mūlam tu bodha gam
samasta tattva bhāvaḥ yam sva ātmani eva a vibhāgakaḥ
bodha madhyam bhavet kiṃcid ādhāra ādheya lakṣaṇam
tattva bheda vibhāgena svabhāva sthiti lakṣaṇam

original: AbhT_8.15a/. bodhāgraṃ tattu vidbodhaṃ nistaraṅgaṃ bṛhatsukham /
analyzed: bodha agram tat tu vid bodham nistaraṅgam bṛhat sukham
śrī devyāyāmale ca uktam ṣaṭtriṃśat tattva sundaram

original: AbhT_8.17a/. adhvānaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ dhyāyansadyaḥ śivamayo bhavet /
analyzed: adhvānam ṣaḍvidham dhyāyan sadyas śiva mayaḥ bhavet
yadi api amuṣya nāthasya saṃvitti an atirekiṇaḥ
pūrṇasya ūrdhva ādi madhya anta vyavasthā na asti vāstavī
tathā api pratipattṝṇām pratipādayituḥ tathā
tatas pramātṛ saṃkalpa niyamāt pārthivam viduḥ
tattvam sarva antarāla stham yat sarva āvaraṇaiḥ vṛtam

original: AbhT_8.20b/. tadatra pārthive tattve kathyate bhuvanasthitiḥ // 20
analyzed: tat atra pārthive tattve kathyate bhuvana sthitiḥ
netā kaṭāha rudrāṇām anantaḥ kāma sevinām
pota ārūḍhaḥ jalasya antar madya pāna vighūrṇitaḥ

original: AbhT_8.22a/. sa devaṃ bhairavaṃ dhyāyan nāgaiśca parivāritaḥ /
analyzed: sa devam bhairavam dhyāyan nāgaiḥ ca parivāritaḥ
kālāgreḥ bhuvanam ca ūrdhve koṭi yojanam ucchritam
lokānām bhasmasāt bhāva bhayāt na ūrdhva sa vīkṣate

original: AbhT_8.23b/. sa ca vyāptāpi viśvasya yasmātpluṣyannimāṃ bhuvam // 23
analyzed: sa ca vyāptā api viśvasya yasmāt pluṣyan imām bhuvam

original: AbhT_8.24a/. narakebhyaḥ purā vyaktastenāsau tadadho mataḥ /
analyzed: narakebhyaḥ purā vyaktaḥ tena asau tad adhas mataḥ

original: AbhT_8.24b/. daśa koṭyo vibhorjvālā tadardha śūnyamūrdhvataḥ // 24
analyzed: daśa koṭyaḥ vibhoḥ jvālā śūnyam ūrdhvatas
tad ūrdhve naraka adhīśāḥ kramāt duḥkha eka vedanāḥ

original: AbhT_8.25b/. śdho madhye tadūrdhve ca sthitā bhedāntarairvṛtāḥ // 25
analyzed: madhye tad ūrdhve ca sthitāḥ bheda antaraiḥ vṛtāḥ
avīci kumbhīpāka ākhya rauravāḥ teṣu anukramāt

original: AbhT_8.26b/. ekādaśaikādaśa ca daśetyantaḥ śarāgni tat // 26
analyzed: ekādaśa ekādaśa ca daśa iti antar śara agni tat
pratyekam eṣām eka ūnā koṭiḥ ucchritiḥ antaram
lakṣam atra kha veda asya saṃkhyānām antarā sthitiḥ
kūṣmāṇḍe ūrdhve lakṣa ūna koṭi sthānaḥ tad īśitā

original: AbhT_8.28b/. śāstraviruddhācaraṇāt kṛṣṇaṃ ye karma vidadhate // 28
analyzed: śāstra viruddha ācaraṇāt kṛṣṇam ye karma vidadhate
tatra bhīmaiḥ loka puruṣaiḥ pīḍyante bhoga paryantam

original: AbhT_8.29b/. ye sakṛdapi parameśaṃ śivamekāgreṇa cetasā śaraṇam // 29
analyzed: ye sakṛt api parameśam śivam ekāgreṇa cetasā śaraṇam

original: AbhT_8.30a/. yānti na te narakayujaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ teṣāṃ sukhālpatādāyi /
analyzed: yānti na te naraka yujaḥ kṛṣṇam teṣām sukha alpa tā dāyi
sahasra navaka utsedham eka antaram atha kramāt
pātāla aṣṭakam ekaikam aṣṭame hāṭakaḥ prabhuḥ

original: AbhT_8.31b/. pratilokaṃ niyuktātmā śrīkaṇṭho haṭhato bahūḥ // 31
analyzed: prati lokam niyukta ātmā śrīkaṇṭhaḥ haṭhataḥ
siddhīḥ dadāti asau evam śrīmat raurava śāsane
vratinaḥ ye cikarma sthāḥ niṣiddha ācāra kāriṇaḥ

original: AbhT_8.33a/. dīkṣitā api ye luptasamayā naca kurvate /
analyzed: dīkṣitāḥ api ye lupta samayāḥ na ca kurvate
prāyaścittān tathā tad sthāḥ vāmācārasya dūṣakāḥ
deva agni dravya vṛtti aṃśa jīvinaḥ ca uttama sthitāḥ
adhas stha gāruḍa ādi anya mantra sevā parāyaṇāḥ
te hāṭaka vibhoḥ agre kiṅkarāḥ vividha ātmakāḥ

original: AbhT_8.35b/. te tu tatrāpi deveśaṃ bhaktyā cetparyupāsate // 35
analyzed: te tu tatra api deveśam bhaktyā ced paryupāsate

original: AbhT_8.36a/. tadīśatattve līyante kramācca parame śive /
analyzed: tad īśa tattve līyante kramāt ca parame śive

original: AbhT_8.36b/. anyathā ye tu vartante tadbhoganiratātmakāḥ // 36
analyzed: anyathā ye tu vartante tad bhoga nirata ātmakāḥ
te kāla vahni saṃtāpa dīna ākranda parāyaṇāḥ

original: AbhT_8.37b/. guṇatattve nilīyante tataḥ sṛṣṭimukhe punaḥ // 37
analyzed: guṇa tattve nilīyante tatas sṛṣṭi mukhe punar
pātyante mātṛbhiḥ ghora yātanā ogha purassaram
adhama adhama deheṣu nija karma anurūpataḥ
mānuṣa anteṣu tatra api kecid mantra vidaḥ kramāt
mucyante inye tu badhyante pūrva kṛtyā anusārataḥ
iti eṣa gaṇa vṛttāntaḥ nāmnā hulahula ādinā
pātāla ūrdhve sahasrāṇi viṃśatiḥ bhū kaṭāhakaḥ
siddhātantre tu pātāla pṛṣṭhe yakṣī samāvṛtam

original: AbhT_8.42a/. bhadrakālyāḥ puraṃ yatra tābhiḥ krīḍanti sādhakāḥ /
analyzed: bhadrakālyāḥ puram yatra tābhiḥ krīḍanti sādhakāḥ
tatas tamaḥ tapta bhūmiḥ tatas śūnyam tatas hayaḥ
etāni yātanā sthānam guru mantra ādi dūṣiṇām

original: AbhT_8.43b/. tato bhūmyūrdhva [madhya] to meruḥ sahasrāṇi sa ṣoḍaśa // 43
analyzed: tatas meruḥ sahasrāṇi sa ṣoḍaśa
magnaḥ tad mūla vistāraḥ tad dvayena ūrdhva vistṛtiḥ
madhya ūrdhva adhas samudvṛtta śarāva caturaśrakaḥ

original: AbhT_8.45b/. bhairavīyaṃ ca talliṅgaṃ dharaṇī cāsya pīṭhikā // 45
analyzed: bhairavīyam ca tat liṅgam dharaṇī ca asya pīṭhikā

original: AbhT_8.46a/. sarve devā nilīnā hi tatra tatpūjitaṃ sadā /
analyzed: sarve devāḥ nilīnāḥ hi tatra tat pūjitam sadā
madhye meru sabhā dhātuḥ tad īśa diśi ketanam

original: AbhT_8.47a/. jyotiṣkaśikharaṃ śaṃbhoḥ śrīkaṇṭhāṃśaśca sa prabhuḥ /
analyzed: jyotiṣka śikharam śaṃbhoḥ śrīkaṇṭha aṃśaḥ ca sa prabhuḥ
avaruhya sahasrāṇi manovatyāḥ caturdaśa
cakravāṭaḥ catur dikkaḥ meruḥ atra tu lokapāḥ
amarāvatī kendrasya pūrvasyām dakṣiṇena tām
atsaraḥ siddha sādhyāḥ tām uttareṇa vināyakāḥ

original: AbhT_8.49b/. tejovatī svadiśyagneḥ purī tāṃ paścimena tu // 49
analyzed: tejovatī sva diśi agneḥ purī tām paścimena tu
viśvedevāḥ viśvakarmā kramāt tad anugāḥ ca ye

original: AbhT_8.50b/. yāmyāṃ saṃyamanī tāṃ tu paścimena kramāt sthitāḥ // 50
analyzed: yāmyām saṃyamanī tām tu paścimena kramāt sthitāḥ

original: AbhT_8.51b/. kṛṣṇāṅgārā nirṛtiśca tāṃ pūrveṇa piśācakāḥ // 51
analyzed: kṛṣṇa aṅgārā nirṛtiḥ ca tām pūrveṇa piśācakāḥ
rakṣāṃsi siddha gandharvāḥ tu uttareṇa uttareṇa tām

original: AbhT_8.52b/. vāruṇī śuddhavatyākhyā bhūtaugho dakṣiṇena tām // 52
analyzed: vāruṇī śuddhavatī ākhyā bhūta oghaḥ dakṣiṇena tām
uttareṇa uttareṇa enām vasu vidyādharāḥ kramāt

original: AbhT_8.53b/. vāyorgandhavatī tasyā dakṣiṇe kinnarāḥ punaḥ // 53
analyzed: vāyoḥ gandhavatī tasyāḥ dakṣiṇe kinnarāḥ punar
vīṇā sarasvatī devī nāradaḥ tumburuḥ tathā

original: AbhT_8.54b/. mahodayendorguhyāḥ syuḥ paścime@syāḥ punaḥ punaḥ // 54
analyzed: mahodayā indoḥ guhyāḥ syuḥ paścima īsyāḥ punar punar

original: AbhT_8.55a/. kuberaḥ karmadevāśca tathā tatsādhakā api /
analyzed: kuberaḥ karma devāḥ ca tathā tad sādhakāḥ api

original: AbhT_8.55b/. yaśasvinī maheśasya tasyāḥ paścimato hariḥ // 55
analyzed: yaśasvinī maheśasya tasyāḥ paścimatas hariḥ

original: AbhT_8.56a/. dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇe brahmāśvinau dhanvantariḥ kramāt /
analyzed: dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇe brahma aśvinau dhanvantariḥ kramāt
mairave cakravāṭe esmin evam mukhyāḥ purā uṣṭadhā
antarāla gatāḥ tu anyāḥ punar ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ smṛtāḥ

original: AbhT_8.57b/. iṣṭāpūrtaratāḥ puṇye varṣeye bhārate narāḥ // 57
analyzed: iṣṭāpūrta ratāḥ puṇye varṣeye bhārate narāḥ

original: AbhT_8.58a/. te merugāḥ sakṛcchambhuṃ ye vārcanti yathocitam /
analyzed: te meru gāḥ sakṛt śambhum ye vā arcanti yathocitam
meroḥ pradakṣiṇa āpya udak dikṣu viṣkambha parvatāḥ
mandaraḥ gandhamādaḥ ca vipulaḥ atha supārśvakaḥ
sita pīta nīla raktāḥ te kramāt pāda parvatāḥ
etaiḥ bhuvam avaṣṭabhya meruḥ tiṣṭhati niścalaḥ
caitraratha nandana ākhye vaiśrājam pitṛvanam vanāni āhuḥ
raktoda mānasa sitam bhadram ca etat catuṣṭayam sarasām
vṛkṣāḥ kadamba jambu aśvattha nyagrodhakāḥ kramaśas

original: AbhT_8.62a/. eṣu ca caturṣvacaleṣu trayaṃ trayaṃ kramaśa etadāmnātam /
analyzed: eṣu ca caturṣu acaleṣu trayam trayam kramaśas etat āmnātam
meru adhas lavaṇābdhi antam jambudvīpaḥ samantataḥ

original: AbhT_8.63a/. lakṣamātraḥ sa navadhā jāto maryādaparvataiḥ /
analyzed: lakṣa mātraḥ sa navadhā jātaḥ maryāda parvataiḥ
niṣadhaḥ hemakūṭaḥ ca himavān dakṣiṇe trayaḥ
lakṣam sahasra navatiḥ tad aśītiḥ iti kramāt

original: AbhT_8.64b/. nīlaḥ śvetastriśṛṅgaśca tāvantaḥ savyataḥ punaḥ // 64
analyzed: nīlaḥ śvetaḥ triśṛṅgaḥ ca tāvantaḥ savyatas punar
meroḥ ṣaṭ ete maryādā acalāḥ pūrva apara āyatāḥ
pūrvatas mālyavān paścāt gandhamādana saṃjñitaḥ
savya uttara āyatau tau tu catustriṃśat sahasrakau

original: AbhT_8.66b/. aṣṭāvete tato@pyanyau dvau dvau pūrvādiṣu kramāt // 66
analyzed: aṣṭau ete tatas api anyau dvau dvau pūrva ādiṣu kramāt
jāṭharaḥ kūṭa himavat yātra jārudhi śṛṅgiṇaḥ

original: AbhT_8.67b/. evaṃ sthito vibhāgo@tra varṣasiddhyai nirūpyate // 67
analyzed: evam sthitaḥ vibhāgaḥ utra varṣa siddhyai nirūpyate
samantāt cakravāṭa adhas narka indu caturaśrakam
sahasra nava vistīrṇam ilā ākhyam tri mukha āyuṣam

original: AbhT_8.69a/. meroḥ paścimato gandhamādo yastasya paścime /
analyzed: meroḥ paścimatas gandhamādaḥ yaḥ tasya paścime
ketumālam kula adrīṇām saptakena vibhūṣitam

original: AbhT_8.70a/. meroḥ pūrva mālyavānyo bhadrāśvastasya pūrvataḥ /
analyzed: meroḥ mālyavān yaḥ bhadrāśvaḥ tasya pūrvatas
sahasra daśaka āyuḥ tat sa pañca kula parvatam
pūrva paścimatas savya uttaratas ca kramāt ime
dvātriṃśat ca catustriṃśat sahasrāṇi nirūpite
meroḥ udak śṛṅgavān yaḥ tad bahis kuru varṣakam
cāpa vat nava sāhasram āyuḥ tatra trayodaśa
kuru varṣasya uttarā itha vāyavya ibdhau kramāt śarāḥ

original: AbhT_8.73b/. daśa ceti sahasrāṇi dvīpau candro@tha bhadrakaḥ // 73
analyzed: daśa ca iti sahasrāṇi dvīpau candraḥ utha bhadrakaḥ

original: AbhT_8.74a/. yau śvetaśṛṅgiṇau merorvāme madhye hiraṇmayam /
analyzed: yau śveta śṛṅgiṇau meroḥ vāme madhye hiraṇmayam
tayoḥ navaka vistīrṇam āyuḥ ca ardha trayodaśa

original: AbhT_8.75a/. tatra vai vāmataḥ śvetanīlayo ramyako@ntare /
analyzed: tatra vai vāmatas śveta nīlayoḥ
sahasra nava vistīrṇam āyuḥ dvādaśa tāni ca
meroḥ dakṣiṇatas hema niṣadhau yau tad antare
hari ākhyam nava sāhasram tat sahasra adhika āyuṣam
tatra eva dakṣiṇe hema himavat dvitaya antare
kainnaram nava sāhasram tat sahasra adhika āyuṣam
tatra eva dakṣiṇe meroḥ himavān yasya dakṣiṇe
bhāratam nava sāhasram cāpa vat karma bhoga bhūḥ

original: AbhT_8.79b/. harikinnaravarṣe ca bhogabhūrna tu karmabhūḥ // 79
analyzed: hari kinnara varṣe ca bhoga bhūḥ na tu karma bhūḥ
atra bāhulyataḥ
paśūnām karma saṃskāraḥ syāt tādṛś dṛḍha saṃskṛteḥ
saṃbhavanti api a saṃskārāḥ
dṛḍha prāktana saṃskārāt īśa icchātaḥ śubha aśubham

original: AbhT_8.82a/. sthānāntare@pi karmāsti dṛṣṭaṃ tacca purātane /
analyzed: sthāna antare pi karma asti dṛṣṭam tat ca purātane

original: AbhT_8.82b/. tatra tretā sadā kālo bhārate tu caturyugam // 82
analyzed: tatra tretā sadā kālaḥ bhārate tu caturyugam

original: AbhT_8.83a/. bhārate navakhaṇḍaṃ ca sāmudreṇāmbhasātra ca /
analyzed: bhārate nava khaṇḍam ca sāmudreṇa ambhasā atra ca

original: AbhT_8.83b/. sthalaṃ pañcaśatī tadvajjalaṃ ceti vibhajyate // 83
analyzed: sthalam pañcaśatā tadvat jalam ca iti vibhajyate
indraḥ kaśeruḥ tāmra ābhaḥ nāgīyaḥ prāk gabhastimān
saumya gāndharva vārāhāḥ kanyā ākhyam ca ā samudrataḥ
kanyā dvīpe ca navame dakṣiṇena abdhi madhya gāḥ
upadvīpāḥ ṣaṭ kula adri saptakena vibhūṣite
aṅga yava malaya śaṅkuḥ kumuda varāhau ca malaya go gastya

original: AbhT_8.86b/. tatraiva ca trikūṭe laṅkā ṣaḍamī hyupadvīpāḥ // 86
analyzed: tatra eva ca trikūṭe laṅkā ṣaṭ amī hi upadvīpāḥ

original: AbhT_8.87a/. dvīpopadvīpagāḥ prāyo mlecchā nānāvidhā janāḥ /
analyzed: dvīpa upadvīpa gāḥ prāyas mlecchāḥ nānāvidhāḥ janāḥ
muktā kāñcana ratna āḍhyāḥ iti śrī ruruśāsane

original: AbhT_8.88a/. bhārate yatkṛtaṃ karma kṣapitaṃ vāpyavīcitaḥ /
analyzed: bhārate yat kṛtam karma kṣapitam vā api avīcitaḥ

original: AbhT_8.88b/. śivāntaṃ tena muktirvā kanyākhye tu viśeṣataḥ // 88
analyzed: śiva antam tena muktiḥ vā kanyā ākhye tu viśeṣataḥ
mahākāla ādikā rudrakoṭiḥ atra eva bhārate
gaṅgā ādi pañcaśatikā janma tena atra durlabham
anya varṣeṣu paśu vat bhogāt karma ati vāhanam
prāpyam manoratha atītam api bhārata janmanām
nānā varṇa āśrama ācāra sukha duḥkha vicitra tā
kanyā dvīpe yatas tena karma bhūḥ sā iyam uttamā

original: AbhT_8.92a/. puṃsā sitāsitānyatra kurvatāṃ kila siddhyataḥ /
analyzed: puṃsā sita asitāni atra kurvatām kila siddhyataḥ
para aparau svar nirayau iti rauravavārtike

original: AbhT_8.93a/. evaṃ meroradho jambūrabhito yaḥ sa vistarāt /
analyzed: evam meroḥ adhas jambūḥ abhitas yaḥ sa vistarāt
syāt saptadaśadhā khaṇḍaiḥ navabhiḥ tu samāsatas

original: AbhT_8.94a/. manoḥ svāyaṃbhuvasyāsan sutā daśa tatastrayaḥ /
analyzed: manoḥ svāyaṃbhuvasya āsan sutāḥ daśa tatas trayaḥ
prāvrajan atha jambu ākhye rājā yaḥ ugnīdhra nāmakaḥ
tasya abhavat nava sutāḥ tatas yam nava khaṇḍakaḥ

original: AbhT_8.95b/. nābhiryo navamastasya naptā bharata ārṣabhiḥ // 95
analyzed: nābhiḥ yaḥ navamaḥ tasya naptā bharataḥ ārṣabhiḥ

original: AbhT_8.96a/. tasyāṣṭau tanayāḥ sākaṃ kanyayā navamoṃ@śakaḥ /
analyzed: tasya aṣṭau tanayāḥ sākam kanyayā navamaḥ oṃśakaḥ
bhuktaiḥ taiḥ navadhā tasmāt lakṣa yojana mātrakāt
lakṣa eka mātraḥ lavaṇaḥ tad bāhye sya purā udrayaḥ
ṛṣabhaḥ dundubhiḥ dhūmraḥ kaṅka droṇa indavaḥ hi udak
varāha nandana aśokāḥ paścāt saha balāhakau
dakṣiṇa cakra mainākau vāḍabontaḥ tayoḥ sthitaḥ
abdheḥ dakṣiṇatas kha akṣi sahasra atikramāt giriḥ
vidyutvān tri sahasra ucchrit āyāmaḥ utra phala āśinaḥ
mala digdhāḥ dīrgha keśa śmaśravaḥ go sadharmakāḥ
nagnāḥ saṃvatsara aśīti jīvinaḥ tṛṇa bhojinaḥ

original: AbhT_8.101a/. niryantrāṇi sadā tatra dvārāṇi bilasiddhaye /
analyzed: niryantrāṇi sadā tatra dvārāṇi bila siddhaye
iti etat gurubhiḥ gītam śrīmat raurava śāsane

original: AbhT_8.102a/. itthaṃ ya eṣa lavaṇasamudraḥ pratipāditaḥ /
analyzed: ittham yaḥ eṣa lavaṇa samudraḥ pratipāditaḥ

original: AbhT_8.102b/. tadbahiḥ ṣaḍamī dvīpāḥ pratyekaṃ svārṇavairvṛtāḥ // 102
analyzed: tad bahis ṣaṭ amī dvīpāḥ pratyekam sva arṇavaiḥ vṛtāḥ
krama dvi guṇitāḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ manu putraiḥ adhiṣṭhitāḥ
śāka kuśa krauñcāḥ śalmali gomedha abjam iti ṣaṭ dvīpāḥ
kṣīra dadhi sarpiḥ aikṣava madirā madhura ambukāḥ ṣaṭ ambudhayaḥ
medhātithiḥ vapuṣmān jyotiṣmān dyutimatā haviḥ rājā

original: AbhT_8.104b/. saṃvara iti śākādiṣu jambudvīpe nyarūpi cāgnīdhraḥ // 104
analyzed: saṃvaraḥ iti śāka ādiṣu jambudvīpe nyarūpi ca agnīdhraḥ
giri saptaka parikalpita tāvat khaṇḍāḥ tu pañca śāka ādyāḥ
puṣkara saṃjñaḥ dvi dalaḥ pūrva ādau
tripañcāśat ca lakṣāṇi dvi koṭi ayuta pañcakam
svādu arṇava antam meru ardhāt yojananām iyam pramā

original: AbhT_8.107a/. saptamajaladherbāhye haimī bhūḥ koṭidaśakamatha lakṣam /
analyzed: saptama jaladheḥ bāhye haimī bhūḥ koṭi daśakam atha lakṣam
ucchrityā vistārāt ayutam loka itara acalaḥ kathitaḥ
kevalam iti api kecid lokāloka antare raviḥ na bahis
pitṛ deva pathau asya udak dakṣiṇa gau sva jāt pare vīthyau
bhānoḥ uttara dakṣiṇam ayana dvayam etat eva kathayanti
sarveṣām uttaraḥ meruḥ lokālokaḥ ca dakṣiṇaḥ
udaya astamayau ittham sūryasya paribhāvayet
ardharātra umarāvatyām yāmyāyām astam eva ca

original: AbhT_8.111b/. madhyandinaṃ tadvāruṇyāṃ saumye sūryodayaḥ smṛtaḥ // 111
analyzed: madhyandinam tat vāruṇyām saumye sūrya udayaḥ smṛtaḥ
udayaḥ yomarāvatyām saḥ ūrdharātraḥ yama ālaye

original: AbhT_8.112b/. ke@staṃ saumye ca madhyāhna itthaṃ sūryagatāgate // 112
analyzed: saumye ca madhyāhne ittham sūrya gatāgate
pañcatriṃśat koṭi saṃkhyā lakṣāṇi ekonaviṃśatiḥ
catvāriṃśat sahasrāṇi dhvāntam loka acalāt bahis
sapta sāgara mānaḥ tu garbhoda ākhyaḥ samudra rāj

original: AbhT_8.114b/. lokālokasya parato yadgarbhe nikhilaiva bhūḥ // 114
analyzed: lokālokasya paratas yat garbhe nikhilā eva bhūḥ
siddhātantre itra garbha abdheḥ tīre kauśeya saṃjñitam
maṇḍalam garuḍaḥ tatra siddha pakṣa samāvṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_8.116a/. krīḍantiṃ parvatāgre te nava cātra kulādrayaḥ /
analyzed: krīḍantim parvata agre te nava ca atra kula adrayaḥ
tatas uṣṇa udakāḥ triṃśat nadyaḥ pātāla gāḥ tatas
catur diś naimira udyānam yoginī sevitam sadā

original: AbhT_8.117b/. tato merustato nāgā meghā hemāṇḍakaṃ tataḥ // 117
analyzed: tatas meruḥ tatas nāgāḥ meghāḥ hema aṇḍakam tatas
brahmaṇā uṇḍa kaṭāhena meroḥ ardhena koṭayaḥ
pañcāśat evam daśasu dicu bhūrloka saṃjñitam
paśu khaga mṛga taru mānuṣa sarīsṛpaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ eṣa bhūḥ lokaḥ
vyāptaḥ piśāca rakṣaḥ gandharvāṇām sa yakṣāṇām

original: AbhT_8.120a/. vidyābhṛtāṃ ca kiṃ vā bahunā sarvasya bhūtasargasya /
analyzed: vidyābhṛtām ca kim vā bahunā sarvasya bhūta sargasya
abhimānataḥ yathā iṣṭam bhoga sthānam nivāsaḥ ca
bhuvarlokaḥ tathā tu ārkāt lakṣam ekam tad antare
daśa vāyupathāḥ te ca pratyekam ayuta antarāḥ
ādyaḥ vāyupathaḥ tatra vitataḥ paricarcyate
pañcāśat yojana ūrdhve syāt ṛtarddhiḥ nāma mārutaḥ

original: AbhT_8.123a/. āpyāyakaḥ sa jantūnāṃ tataḥ prācetaso bhavet /
analyzed: āpyāyakaḥ sa jantūnām tatas prācetasaḥ bhavet
pañcāśat yojanāt ūrdhva tasmāt ūrdhva śatena tu
senā nī vāyuḥ atra ete mūka meghāḥ taḍit mucaḥ

original: AbhT_8.124b/. ye mahyāḥ krośamātreṇa tiṣṭhanti jalavarṣiṇaḥ // 124
analyzed: ye mahyāḥ krośa mātreṇa tiṣṭhanti jala varṣiṇaḥ
tebhyaḥ ūrdhva śatāt meghāḥ bheka ādi prāṇi varṣiṇaḥ
viṣa vāri pravarṣiṇaḥ
meghāḥ skanda udbhavāḥ ca anye piśācāḥ ogha mārute
tatas pañcāśat ūrdhvam syuḥ meghāḥ māraka saṃjñakāḥ
tatra sthāne mahādeva janmānaḥ te vināyakāḥ

original: AbhT_8.127b/. ye haranti kṛtaṃ karma narāṇāmakṛtātmanām // 127
analyzed: ye haranti kṛtam karma narāṇām akṛtātmanām
pañcāśat ūrdhvam vajrāṅkaḥ vāyuḥ atra upala ambudāḥ
vidyādhara adhamāḥ ca atra vajra aṅke saṃpratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: AbhT_8.129a/. ye vidyāpauruṣe ye ca śmaśānādiprasādhane /
analyzed: ye vidyā pauruṣe ye ca śmaśāna ādi prasādhane
mṛtāḥ tad siddhi siddhāḥ te vajra aṃke maruti sthitāḥ
pañcāśat ūrdhvam vajrāṃkāt vaidyuta uśani varṣiṇaḥ

original: AbhT_8.130b/. abdā apsarasaścātra ye ca puṇyakṛto narāḥ // 130
analyzed: abdāḥ apsarasaḥ ca atra ye ca puṇya kṛtaḥ narāḥ

original: AbhT_8.131a/. bhṛgau vahnau jale ye ca saṃgrāme cānivartinaḥ /
analyzed: bhṛgau vahnau jale ye ca saṃgrāme ca anivartinaḥ

original: AbhT_8.131b/. gograhe vadhyamokṣe vā mṛtāste vaidyute sthitāḥ // 131
analyzed: gograhe vadhya mokṣe vā mṛtāḥ te vaidyute sthitāḥ
vaidyutāt raivataḥ tāvān tatra puṣṭi vaha ambudāḥ
ūrdhvam ca roga ambumucaḥ saṃvartāḥ tad anantare
rocanā añjana bhasma ādi siddhāḥ tatra eva raivate

original: AbhT_8.133b/. krodhodakamucāṃ sthānaṃ viṣāvartaḥ sa mārutaḥ // 133
analyzed: krodha udaka mucām sthānam viṣāvartaḥ sa mārutaḥ
pañcāśat ūrdhvam tatra eva durdina abdāḥ hutāśa jāḥ
vidyādhara viśeṣāḥ ca tathā ye parameśvaram

original: AbhT_8.135a/. gāndharveṇa sadārcanti viṣāvarte@tha te sthitāḥ /
analyzed: gāndharveṇa sadā arcanti te sthitāḥ
viṣāvartāt śatāt ūrdhva durjayaḥ śvāsa saṃbhavaḥ

original: AbhT_8.136a/. brahmaṇo@tra sthitā meghāḥ pralaye vātakāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: brahmaṇā utra sthitāḥ meghāḥ pralaye vāta kāriṇaḥ
puṣkara abdāḥ vāyu gamāḥ gandharvāḥ ca parāvahe
jīmūta meghāḥ tad saṃjñāḥ tathā vidyādhara uttamāḥ

original: AbhT_8.137b/. ye ca rūpavratā lokā āvahe te pratiṣṭhitāḥ // 137
analyzed: ye ca rūpa vratāḥ lokāḥ āvahe te pratiṣṭhitāḥ
mahāvahe tu īśa kṛtāḥ prajā hita kara ambudāḥ
mahāparivaha antaḥ yamṛtarddheḥ prāk marut pathaḥ
agni kanyāḥ mātaraḥ ca rudra śaktyā tu adhiṣṭhitāḥ
dvitīye tad pare siddha cāraṇāḥ nija karma jāḥ

original: AbhT_8.140b/. turye devāyudhānyaṣṭau diggajāḥ pañcame punaḥ // 140
analyzed: turye deva āyudhāni aṣṭau diggajāḥ pañcame punar
ṣaṣṭhe garutmān anyasmin gaṅgā anyatra vṛṣaḥ vibhuḥ
dakṣaḥ tu navame brahma śaktyā

original: AbhT_8.142a/. daśame vasavo rudrā ādityāśca marutpathe /
analyzed: daśame vasavaḥ rudrāḥ ādityāḥ ca marut pathe
nava yojana sāhasraḥ vigraha ūrkasya maṇḍalam

original: AbhT_8.143a/. triguṇaṃ jñānaśaktiḥ sā tapatyarkatayā prabhoḥ /
analyzed: triguṇam jñānaśaktiḥ sā tapati arka tayā prabhoḥ
svarlokaḥ tu bhuvarlokāt dhruva antam paribhāṣyate

original: AbhT_8.144a/. sūryāllakṣeṇa śītāṃśuḥ kriyāśaktiḥ śivasya sā /
analyzed: sūryāt lakṣeṇa śītāṃśuḥ kriyā śaktiḥ śivasya sā

original: AbhT_8.144b/. candrāllakṣeṇa nākṣatraṃ tato lakṣadvayena tu // 144
analyzed: candrāt lakṣeṇa nākṣatram tatas lakṣa dvayena tu

original: AbhT_8.145a/. pratyekaṃ bhaumataḥ sūryasutānte pañcakaṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: pratyekam bhaumataḥ sūryasuta ante pañcakam viduḥ
saurāt lakṣeṇa saptarṣi vargaḥ tasmāt dhruvaḥ tathā
brahmā eva apara rūpeṇa brahma sthāne dhruva ucalaḥ
medhībhūtaḥ vimānānām sarveṣām upari dhruvaḥ
atra baddhāni sarvāṇi api ūhyante nila maṇḍale
svar sapta māruta skandhāḥ ā megha ādyāḥ pradhānataḥ
itas ca kratu hotṛ ādi kṛtvā jñāna vivarjitāḥ

original: AbhT_8.148b/. svaryānti tatkṣaye lokaṃ mānuṣyaṃ puṇyaśeṣataḥ // 148
analyzed: svar yānti tad kṣaye lokam mānuṣyam puṇya śeṣataḥ

original: AbhT_8.149a/. evaṃ bhūmerdhruvāntaṃ syāllakṣāṇi daśa pañca ca /
analyzed: evam bhūmeḥ dhruva antam syāt lakṣāṇi daśa pañca ca

original: AbhT_8.149b/. dve koṭī pañca cāśītirlakṣāṇi svargato mahān // 149
analyzed: dve koṭī pañca ca aśītiḥ lakṣāṇi svargataḥ mahān
mārkaṇḍa ādyāḥ ṛṣi muni siddhāḥ tatra pratiṣṭhitāḥ
nivartita adhikārāḥ ca devāḥ mahati saṃsthitāḥ
mahā antarāle tatra anye tu adhikāra bhujaḥ janāḥ
aṣṭau koṭyaḥ kapila ādayaḥ
tiṣṭhanti sādhyāḥ tatra eva bahavaḥ sukha bhāginaḥ
janāt tapaḥ ṛka koṭyā utra sanaka ādyāḥ mahā dhiyaḥ
prajāpatīnām tatra adhikāraḥ brahma ātmajanmanām

original: AbhT_8.153b/. brahmālayastu tapasaḥ satyaḥ ṣoḍaśa koṭayaḥ // 153
analyzed: brahma ālayaḥ tu tapasaḥ satyaḥ ṣoḍaśa koṭayaḥ
tatra sthitaḥ sa svayambhūḥ viśvam āviṣkaroti adaḥ

original: AbhT_8.154b/. satye vedāstathā cānye karmadhyānena bhāvitāḥ // 154
analyzed: satye vedāḥ tathā ca anye karma dhyānena bhāvitāḥ
ānanda niṣṭhāḥ tatra ūrdhve koṭiḥ vairiñcam āsanam
brahmāsanāt koṭi yugmam puram viṣṇoḥ nirūpitam
dhyāna pūjā japaiḥ viṣṇoḥ bhaktāḥ gacchanti tat padam
vaiṣṇavāt sapta koṭībhiḥ bhuvanam parameśituḥ
rudrasya sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kartuḥ brahmāṇḍa vartmani
dīkṣā jñāna vihīnāḥ ye liṅga ārādhana tatparāḥ

original: AbhT_8.158a/. te yāntyaṇḍāntare raudraṃ puraṃ nādhaḥ kadācana /
analyzed: te yānti aṇḍa antare raudram puram na adhas kadācana

original: AbhT_8.158b/. tatsthāḥ sarve śivaṃ yānti rudrāḥ śrīkaṇṭhadīkṣitāḥ // 158
analyzed: tad sthāḥ sarve śivam yānti rudrāḥ śrīkaṇṭha dīkṣitāḥ
adhikāra kṣaye sākam rudra kanyā gaṇena te
puram puram ca rudra ūrdhvam uttara uttara vṛddhitaḥ

original: AbhT_8.160a/. brahmāṇḍādhaśca rudrordhva daṇḍapāṇeḥ puraṃ sa ca /
analyzed: brahmāṇḍa adhas ca rudra ūrdhva daṇḍapāṇeḥ puram sa ca

original: AbhT_8.160b/. śivecchayā dṛṇātyaṇḍaṃ mokṣamārga karoti ca // 160
analyzed: śiva icchayā dṛṇāti aṇḍam mokṣa mārga karoti ca
śarva rudrau bhīma bhavau ugraḥ devaḥ mahān atha

original: AbhT_8.161b/. īśāna iti bhūrlokāt sapta lokeśvarāḥ śivāḥ // 161
analyzed: īśānaḥ iti bhūrlokāt sapta loka īśvarāḥ śivāḥ

original: AbhT_8.162a/. sthūlairviśeṣairārabdhāḥ sapta lokāḥ pare punaḥ /
analyzed: sthūlaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ ārabdhāḥ sapta lokāḥ pare punar
sūkṣmaiḥ iti guruḥ ca eva rurau samyak nyarūpayat
ye brahmaṇā ādisarge sva śarīrāt nirmitāḥ prabhūta ākhyāḥ

original: AbhT_8.163b/. sthūlāḥ pañca viśeṣāḥ saptāmī tanmayā lokāḥ // 163
analyzed: sthūlāḥ pañca viśeṣāḥ sapta amī tad mayāḥ lokāḥ
paratas liṅga ādhāraiḥ sūkṣmaiḥ tanmātra jaiḥ mahābhūtaiḥ
lokānām āvaraṇaiḥ viṣṭabhya gandha ādyaiḥ
kālāgneḥ daṇḍapāṇi antam aṣṭānavati koṭayaḥ

original: AbhT_8.165b/. ata ūrdhvaṃ kaṭāho@ṇḍe sa ghanaḥ koṭiyojanam // 165
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam kaṭāha uṇḍe sa ghanaḥ koṭi yojanam
pañcāśat koṭayaḥ ca ūrdhvam bhū pṛṣṭhāt adharam tathā

original: AbhT_8.166b/. evaṃ koṭiśataṃ bhūḥ syāt sauvarṇastaṇḍulastataḥ // 166
analyzed: evam koṭi śatam bhūḥ syāt sauvarṇaḥ taṇḍulaḥ tatas
śata rudra avadhiḥ huphaṭ bhedayet tat tu duḥśamam

original: AbhT_8.167b/. pratidikkaṃ daśa daśetyevaṃ rudraśataṃ bahiḥ // 167
analyzed: pratidikkam daśa daśa iti evam rudra śatam bahis
brahmāṇḍa ādhārakam tat ca sva prabhāveṇa sarvatas
aṇḍa svarūpam gurubhiḥ ca uktam śrī raurava ādiṣu
vyakteḥ abhimukhībhūtaḥ pracyutaḥ śakti rūpataḥ
āvāpavān a nirbhaktaḥ vastu piṇḍoṇḍaḥ ucyate
tamaḥ leśa anuviddhasya kapālam sattvam uttaram
rajaḥ anuviddham nirmṛṣṭam sattvam asya adharam tamaḥ

original: AbhT_8.171b/. aṇḍaḥ syāditi tadvyaktau saṃmukhībhāva ucyate // 171
analyzed: aṇḍaḥ syāt iti tad vyaktau saṃmukhībhāvaḥ ucyate
tathā api śiva magnānām śaktīnām aṇḍa tā bhavet

original: AbhT_8.172b/. tadartha vākyamaparaṃ tā hi na cyutaśaktitaḥ // 172
analyzed: tad artha vākyam aparam tāḥ hi na cyuta śaktitaḥ
tanu akṣa ādau mā prasāṅkṣīt aṇḍa tā iti pada antaram
tanu akṣa ādiṣu na eva āste kasya api āvāpanam yatas
tanu akṣa samudāya tve katham ekatvam iti atas
vinā api vastu piṇḍa ākhya padena ekaikaśas bhavet

original: AbhT_8.175b/. tattveṣvaṇḍasvabhāvatvaṃ nanvevamapi kiṃ na tat // 175
analyzed: tattveṣu aṇḍa svabhāva tvam nanu evam api kim na tat
guṇa tanmātra bhūta ogha maye tattve prasajyate
ucyate vastu śabdena tanu akṣa bhuvana ātmakam
rūpam uktam yatas tena tat samūha uṇḍaḥ ucyate
bhavet ca tad samūha tvam patyuḥ viśva vapuḥ bhṛtaḥ
tad artha bhedakāni anyāni upāttāni iti darśitam
tāvat mātrāsu avasthāsu
mā bhūt aṇḍa tvam iti āhuḥ anye bhedaka yojanam

original: AbhT_8.179b/. itthamuktaviriñcāṇḍamṛto rudrāḥ śataṃ hi yat // 179
analyzed: ittham ukta viriñca aṇḍa mṛtaḥ rudrāḥ śatam hi yat

original: AbhT_8.180a/. teṣāṃ sve patayo rudrā ekādaśa mahārciṣaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām sve patayaḥ rudrāḥ ekādaśa mahā arciṣaḥ
anantā utha kapālyā agniḥ yama nairṛtakau balaḥ

original: AbhT_8.181a/. śīghro nidhīśo vidyeśaḥ śambhuḥ savīrabhadrakaḥ /
AbhT_8.181b/. madhu madhukṛtaḥ kadambaṃ kesarajālāni yadvadāvṛṇate // 181
analyzed: madhu madhukṛtaḥ kadambam kesara jālāni yadvat āvṛṇate
tadvat te śiva rudrāḥ brahmāṇḍam asaṃkhya parivārāḥ
śara aṣṭa niyutam koṭiḥ iti eṣām sanniveśanam

original: AbhT_8.183a/. śrīkaṇṭhādhiṣṭhitāste ca sṛjanti saṃharanti ca /
analyzed: śrīkaṇṭha adhiṣṭhitāḥ te ca sṛjanti saṃharanti ca
īśvara tvam diviṣadām iti rauravavārtike
siddhātantre tu hema aṇḍāt śata koṭeḥ bahis śatam
aṇḍānām kramaśas dvi dviguṇam rūpya ādi yojitam
teṣu krameṇa brahmāṇaḥ saṃsyuḥ dviguṇa jīvitāḥ

original: AbhT_8.185b/. kṣīyante kramaśaste ca tadante tattvamammayam // 185
analyzed: kṣīyante kramaśas te ca tad ante tattvam ap mayam
dharātas utra jala ādi syāt uttara uttaratas kramāt
daśadhā ahaṅkṛta antam dhīḥ tasyāḥ syāt śatadhā tatas
sahasradhā vyaktam atas pauṃsnam daśa sahasradhā
niyatiḥ lakṣadhā tasmāt tasyāḥ tu daśa lakṣadhā
kalā antam koṭidhā tasmāt māyā vid daśa koṭidhā
īśvaraḥ śata koṭiḥ syāt tasmāt koṭi sahasradhā

original: AbhT_8.189a/. sādākhyaṃ vyaśnute tacca śaktirvṛndena saṃkhyayā /
analyzed: sādākhyam vyaśnute tat ca śaktiḥ vṛndena saṃkhyayā
vyāpinī sarvam adhvānam vyāpya devī vyavasthitā

original: AbhT_8.190a/. aprameyaṃ tataḥ śuddhaṃ śivatattvaṃ paraṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: aprameyam tatas śuddham śivatattvam param viduḥ

original: AbhT_8.190b/. jalādeḥ śivatattvāntaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ kenacicchivāt // 190
analyzed: jala ādeḥ śivatattva antam na dṛṣṭam kenacid śivāt

original: AbhT_8.191a/. ṛte tataḥ śivajñānaṃ paramaṃ mokṣakāraṇam /
analyzed: ṛte tatas śiva jñānam paramam mokṣa kāraṇam
tathā ca āha mahādevaḥ śrīmat svacchandaśāsane
na anyathā mokṣam āyāti paśuḥ jñāna śataiḥ api

original: AbhT_8.192b/. śivajñānaṃ na bhavati dīkṣāmaprāpya śāṅkarīm // 192
analyzed: śiva jñānam na bhavati dīkṣām a prāpya śāṅkarīm

original: AbhT_8.193a/. prāktanī pārameśī sā pauruṣeyī ca sā punaḥ /
analyzed: prāktanī pārameśī sā pauruṣeyī ca sā punar
śatarudrā ūrdhvatas bhadrakālyāḥ nīla prabham jayam

original: AbhT_8.194a/. na yajñadānatapasā prāpyaṃ kālyāḥ puraṃ jayam /
analyzed: na yajña dāna tapasā prāpyam kālyāḥ puram jayam
tad bhaktāḥ tatra gacchanti tad maṇḍala su dīkṣitāḥ
dadāti

original: AbhT_8.195b/. vidyeśāvaraṇe dīkṣāṃ yāvatīṃ kurute nṛṇām // 195
analyzed: vidyeśa āvaraṇe dīkṣām yāvatīm kurute nṛṇām
tāvatīm gatim āyānti bhuvana itra niveśitāḥ
tatas koṭyā vīrabhadraḥ yuga anta agni sama prabhaḥ

original: AbhT_8.197a/. vijayākhyaṃ puraṃ cāsya ye smaranto maheśvaram /
analyzed: vijaya ākhyam puram ca asya ye smarantaḥ maheśvaram

original: AbhT_8.197b/. jaleṣu maruṣu cāgnau śiraśchedena vā mṛtāḥ // 197
analyzed: jaleṣu maruṣu ca agnau śiraḥ chedena vā mṛtāḥ

original: AbhT_8.198a/. te yānti bodhamaiśānaṃ vīrabhadraṃ mahādyutim /
analyzed: te yānti bodham aiśānam vīrabhadram mahā dyutim
vairabhadra ūrdhvatas koṭiḥ viṣkambhāt vistṛtam tridhā

original: AbhT_8.199a/. rudrāṇḍaṃ sālilaṃ tvaṇḍaṃ śakracāpākṛti sthitam /
analyzed: rudra aṇḍam sālilam tu aṇḍam śakracāpa ākṛti sthitam
ā vīrabhadra bhuvanāt bhadrakālī ālayāt tathā
trayodaśabhiḥ anyaiḥ ca bhuvanaiḥ upaśobhitam
tatas bhuvaḥ saha adreḥ pūḥ gandha tanmātra dhāraṇāt

original: AbhT_8.201a/. mṛtā gacchanti tāṃ bhūmiṃ dharitryāḥ paramāṃ budhāḥ /
analyzed: mṛtāḥ gacchanti tām bhūmim dharitryāḥ paramām budhāḥ
abdheḥ puram tatas tu āpyam rasa tanmātra dhāraṇāt
tatas śriyaḥ puram rudra krīḍā avataraṇeṣu atha

original: AbhT_8.202b/. prayāgādau śrīgirau ca viśeṣānmaraṇena tat // 202
analyzed: prayāga ādau śrīgirau ca viśeṣāt maraṇena tat
sārasvatam puram tasmāt śabda brahma vidām padam
rudra ucitāḥ tāḥ mukhya tvāt rudrebhyaḥ nyāḥ tathā sthitāḥ

original: AbhT_8.204a/. pureṣu bahudhā gaṅgā devādau śrīḥ sarasvatī /
analyzed: pureṣu bahudhā gaṅgā deva ādau śrīḥ sarasvatī
lakula ādi amara īśa antāḥ aṣṭa apsu sura adhipāḥ

original: AbhT_8.205a/. tatastu taijasaṃ tattvaṃ śivāgneratra saṃsthitiḥ /
analyzed: tatas tu taijasam tattvam śiva agneḥ atra saṃsthitiḥ

original: AbhT_8.205b/. te cainaṃ vahnimāyānti vāhnīṃ ye dhāraṇāṃ śritāḥ // 205
analyzed: te ca enam vahnim āyānti vāhnīm ye dhāraṇām śritāḥ

original: AbhT_8.206b/. prāṇasya bhuvanaṃ vāyordaśadhā daśadhā tu tat // 206
analyzed: prāṇasya bhuvanam vāyoḥ daśadhā daśadhā tu tat

original: AbhT_8.207a/. dhyātvā tyaktvātha vā prāṇān kṛtvā tatraiva dhāraṇām /
analyzed: dhyātvā tyaktvā atha vā prāṇān kṛtvā tatra eva dhāraṇām

original: AbhT_8.207b/. taṃ viśanti mahātmāno vāyubhūtāḥ khamūrtayaḥ // 207
analyzed: tam viśanti mahātmānaḥ vāyu bhūtāḥ kha mūrtayaḥ
bhīma ādi gaya paryantam aṣṭakam vāyu tattva gam

original: AbhT_8.208b/. khatattve bhuvanaṃ vyomnaḥ prāpyaṃ tadvyomadhāraṇāt // 208

analyzed: a dīkṣitāḥ ye bhūteṣu śiva tattva abhimāninaḥ
jñāna hīnāḥ api prauḍha dhāraṇāḥ teṇḍataḥ bahis
