dharā abdhi tejaḥ nila kha pura gāḥ dīkṣitāḥ ca vā
tāvat saṃskāra yoga artham na param padam īhitum
tathāvidha avatāreṣu mṛtāḥ ca āyataneṣu ye

original: AbhT_8.212a/. tatpadaṃ te samāsādya kramādyānti śivātmatām /
analyzed: tat padam te samāsādya kramāt yānti śiva ātma tām
punar punar idam ca uktam śrīmat devī ākhya yāmale
śrī kāmikāyām kaśmīra varṇane ca uktavān vibhuḥ

original: AbhT_8.213b/. sureśvarīmahādhāmni ye mriyante ca tatpure // 213
analyzed: sureśvarī mahā dhāmni ye mriyante ca tad pure
brāhmaṇa ādyāḥ saṅkara antāḥ paśavaḥ sthāvara anta gāḥ
rudra jātayaḥ eva ete iti āha bhagavān śivaḥ
ākāśa āvaraṇāt ūrdhvam ahaṅkārāt adhas priye
tanmātra ādi manaḥ ntānām purāṇi śiva śāsane
pañca varṇa yutam gandha tanmātra maṇḍalam mahat
ācchādya yojana aneka koṭibhiḥ sthitam antarā
evam rasa ādi mātrāṇām maṇḍalāni

original: AbhT_8.217b/. śarvo bhavaḥ paśupatirīśo bhīma iti kramāt // 217
analyzed: śarvaḥ bhavaḥ paśupatiḥ īśaḥ bhīmaḥ iti kramāt
tanmātra īśāḥ yat icchātaḥ śabda ādyāḥ kha ādi kāriṇaḥ
tatas sūrya indu vedānām maṇḍalāni vibhuḥ mahān
ugraḥ cetyeṣu patayaḥ tebhyaḥ ūrka indū sa yājakau

original: AbhT_8.219b/. ityaṣṭau tanavaḥ śaṃbhoryāḥ parāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // 219
analyzed: iti aṣṭau tanavaḥ śaṃbhoḥ yāḥ parāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: AbhT_8.220a/. aparā brahmaṇo@ṇḍe tā vyāpya sarvaṃ vyavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: aparāḥ brahmaṇaḥ uṇḍe tāḥ vyāpya sarvam vyavasthitāḥ

original: AbhT_8.220b/. kalpe kalpe prasūyante dharādyāstābhya eva tu // 220
analyzed: kalpe kalpe prasūyante dharā ādyāḥ tābhyaḥ eva tu
tatas vāc ādi karma akṣa yuktam karaṇa maṇḍalam
agni indra viṣṇu mitrāḥ sa brahmāṇaḥ teṣu nāyakāḥ
prakāśa maṇḍalam tasmāt śrutam buddhi akṣa pañcakam
diś vidyut arka varuṇa bhuvaḥ śrotra ādi devatāḥ
prakāśa maṇḍalāt ūrdhvam sthitam pañca artha maṇḍalam
manaḥ maṇḍalam etasmāt somena adhiṣṭhitam yatas
manaḥ devaḥ tatas divyaḥ somaḥ vibhuḥ udīritaḥ
tatas api sakala akṣāṇām yoneḥ buddhi akṣa janmanaḥ
sthūla ādi chagala anta aṣṭa yuktam ca ahaṅkṛteḥ puram
buddhi tattvam tatas devayoni aṣṭaka pura adhipam
paiśāca prabhṛti brāhma paryantam tat ca kīrtitam
etāni devayonīnām sthānāni eva purāṇi atas
avatīrya ātmajanmānam dhyāyantaḥ saṃbhavanti te
parameśa niyogāt ca codyamānāḥ ca māyayā
niyāmitāḥ niyatyā ca brahmaṇaḥ vyakta janmanaḥ
vyajyante tena sarga ādau nāma rūpaiḥ anekadhā

original: AbhT_8.229b/. svāṃśanaiva mahātmāno na tyajanti svaketanam // 229
analyzed: sva aṃśanā eva mahātmānaḥ na tyajanti sva ketanam

original: AbhT_8.230a/. uktaṃ ca śivatanāvidamadhikārapadasthitena guruṇā naḥ /
analyzed: uktam ca śivatanau idam adhikāra pada sthitena guruṇā naḥ
aṣṭānām devānām śakti āvirbhāva yonayaḥ hi etāḥ
tanu bhogāḥ punar eṣām adhas prabhūta ātmakāḥ proktāḥ
catvāriṃśat tulya upabhoga deśa adhikāni bhuvanāni
sādhana bhedāt kevalam aṣṭaka pañcaka tayā uktāni
teṣu umāpatiḥ eva prabhuḥ svatantra indriyaḥ vikaraṇa ātmā

original: AbhT_8.233b/. taratamayogena tato@pi devayonyaṣṭakaṃ lakṣyaṃ tu // 233
analyzed: taratama yogena devayoni aṣṭakam lakṣyam tu
lokānām akṣāṇi ca viṣaya paricchitti karaṇāni
gandha ādeḥ mahat antāt eka ādhikyena jātam aiśvaryam
aṇima ādi ātmakam asmin paiśāca ādye viriñca ante
jñātvā evam śodhayet buddhim sārdham puryaṣṭaka indriyaiḥ
teja uṣṭakam balādhyakṣa prabhṛti krodha nāṣtakāt
akṛta ādi tatas buddhau yoga aṣṭakam udāhṛtam
svacchandaśāsane tat tu mūle śrī pūrvaśāsane

original: AbhT_8.238a/. yogāṣṭakapade yattu some śraikaṇṭhameva ca /
analyzed: yoga aṣṭaka pade yat tu some śraikaṇṭham eva ca

original: AbhT_8.238b/. tato māyāpuraṃ bhūyaḥ śrīkaṇṭhasya ca kathyate // 238
analyzed: tatas māyā puram bhūyas śrīkaṇṭhasya ca kathyate

original: AbhT_8.239a/. tena dvitīyaṃ bhuvanaṃ tayoḥ pratyekamucyate /
analyzed: tena dvitīyam bhuvanam tayoḥ pratyekam ucyate

original: AbhT_8.239b/. tatra māyāpuraṃ devyā yayā viśvamadhiṣṭhitam // 239
analyzed: tatra māyā puram devyā yayā viśvam adhiṣṭhitam
pratikalpam nāma bhedaiḥ bhaṇyate sā maheśvarī
umāpateḥ puram paścāt mātṛbhiḥ parivāritam
śrīkaṇṭhaḥ eva parayā mūrtyā umāpatiḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_8.241b/. brāhmyaiśī skandajā hārī vārāhyaindrī saviccikā [carcikā] // 241
analyzed: brāhmī aiśī skanda jā hārī vārāhī aindrī sa viccikā carcikā

original: AbhT_8.242a/. pītā śuklā pītanīle nīlā śuklāruṇā kramāt /
analyzed: pītā śuklā pīta nīle nīlā śuklā aruṇā kramāt
agni īśa saumya yāmya āpya pūrva nairṛta gāḥ tu tāḥ

original: AbhT_8.243a/. aṃśena mānuṣe loke dhātrā tā hyavatāritāḥ /
analyzed: aṃśena mānuṣe loke dhātrā tāḥ hi avatāritāḥ

original: AbhT_8.243b/. svacchandāstāḥ parāścānyāḥ pare vyomni vyavasthitāḥ // 243
analyzed: svacchandāḥ tāḥ parāḥ ca anyāḥ pare vyomni vyavasthitāḥ

original: AbhT_8.244a/. svacchandaṃ tā niṣevante saptadheyamumā yataḥ /
analyzed: svacchandam tāḥ niṣevante saptadhā iyam umā yatas
umāpati purasya ūrdhva sthitam mūrti aṣṭakam param
śarva ādikam yasya sṛṣṭiḥ dharā ādyāḥ yājaka antataḥ

original: AbhT_8.245b/. tābhya īśānamūrtiryā sā merau saṃpratiṣṭhitā // 245
analyzed: tābhyaḥ īśāna mūrtiḥ yā sā merau saṃpratiṣṭhitā

original: AbhT_8.246a/. śrīkaṇṭhaḥ sphaṭikādrau sā vyāptā tanvaṣṭakairjagat /
AbhT_8.246b/. ye yogaṃ saguṇaṃ śambhoḥ saṃyatāḥ paryupāsate // 246
analyzed: ye yogam sa guṇam śambhoḥ saṃyatāḥ paryupāsate

original: AbhT_8.247a/. tanmaṇḍalaṃ vā dṛṣṭvaiva muktadvaitā hṛtatrayāḥ /
analyzed: tat maṇḍalam vā dṛṣṭvā eva mukta dvaitāḥ hṛta trayāḥ
guṇānām ādhara auttaryāt śuddha a śuddha tva saṃsthiteḥ
tāratamyāt ca yogasya bhedāt phala vicitra tā
tatas bhoga phala avāpti bhedāt bhedaḥ yam ucyate
mūrti aṣṭaka upariṣṭāt tu su śivāḥ dvādaśa uditāḥ
vāma ādi eka śiva antāḥ te kuṅkuma ābhāḥ su tejasaḥ
tad ūrdhva vīrabhadra ākhyaḥ maṇḍala adhipatiḥ sthitaḥ

original: AbhT_8.250b/. yatta [sta] tsāyujyamāpannaḥ sa tena saha modate // 250
analyzed: yattaḥ tad sāyujyam āpannaḥ sa tena saha modate
tatas api aṅguṣṭha mātra antam mahādeva aṣṭakam bhavet
buddhi tattvam idam proktam devayoni aṣṭaka ādeḥ
mahādeva aṣṭaka ante tat yoga aṣṭakam iha uditam
tatra śraikaṇṭham uktam yat tasya eva umāpatiḥ tathā

original: AbhT_8.253a/. mūrtayaḥ suśivā vīro mahādevāṣṭakaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: mūrtayaḥ su śivāḥ vīraḥ mahādeva aṣṭakam vapuḥ
upariṣṭāt hi yodhaḥ ca prakṛteḥ guṇa saṃjñitam

original: AbhT_8.254a/. tattvaṃ tatra tu saṃkṣubdhā guṇāḥ prasuvate dhiyam /
analyzed: tattvam tatra tu saṃkṣubdhāḥ guṇāḥ prasuvate dhiyam
na vaiṣamyam an āpannam kāraṇam kārya sūtaye

original: AbhT_8.255a/. guṇasāmyatmikā tena prakṛtiḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: guṇa sāmyatmikā tena prakṛtiḥ kāraṇam bhavet

original: AbhT_8.255b/. nanvevaṃ sāpi saṃkṣobhaṃ vinā tānviṣamānguṇān // 255
analyzed: nanu evam sā api saṃkṣobham vinā tān viṣamān guṇān

original: AbhT_8.256a/. kathaṃ suvīta tatrādye kṣobhe syādanavasthitiḥ /
analyzed: katham suvīta tatra ādye kṣobhe syāt anavasthitiḥ

original: AbhT_8.256b/. sāṃkhyasya doṣa evāyaṃ yadi vā tena te guṇāḥ // 256
analyzed: sāṃkhyasya doṣaḥ eva ayam yadi vā tena te guṇāḥ

original: AbhT_8.257a/. avyaktamiṣṭāḥ sāmyaṃ tu saṅgamātraṃ na cetarat /
analyzed: avyaktam iṣṭāḥ sāmyam tu saṅga mātram na ca itarat
asmākam tu svatantra īśa tathā icchā kṣobha saṃgatam

original: AbhT_8.258a/. avyaktaṃ buddhitattvasya kāraṇaṃ kṣobhitā guṇāḥ /
analyzed: avyaktam buddhi tattvasya kāraṇam kṣobhitāḥ guṇāḥ

original: AbhT_8.258b/. nanu tattveśvarecchāto yaḥ kṣobhaḥ prakṛteḥ purā // 258
analyzed: nanu tattva īśvara icchātaḥ yaḥ kṣobhaḥ prakṛteḥ purā

original: AbhT_8.259a/. tadeva buddhitattvaṃ syāt kimanyaiḥ kalpitairguṇaiḥ /
analyzed: tat eva buddhi tattvam syāt kim anyaiḥ kalpitaiḥ guṇaiḥ
na etat kāraṇa tā rūpa parāmarśa avarodhi yat
kṣobha antaram tatas kārya bīja ucchūna aṅkura ādi vat
kramāt tamaḥ rajaḥ sattve gurūṇām paṅktayaḥ sthitāḥ
tisraḥ dvātriṃśat ekā atas triṃśat api ekaviṃśatiḥ
sva jña na yoga balataḥ krīḍantaḥ daiśika uttamāḥ
tri netrāḥ pāśa nirmuktāḥ tetra anugraha kāriṇaḥ
buddheḥ ca guṇa paryantam ubhe sapta adhike śate

original: AbhT_8.263a/. rudrāṇāṃ bhuvanānāṃ ca mukhyato@nye tadantare /
analyzed: rudrāṇām bhuvanānām ca mukhyatas nye tad antare

original: AbhT_8.263b/. yogāṣṭakaṃ guṇaskandhe proktaṃ śivatanau punaḥ // 263

analyzed: yonīḥ atītya gauṇe skandhe syuḥ yoga dātāraḥ
akṛta kṛta vibhu viriñcāḥ hariḥ guhaḥ krama vaśāt tatas devī
karaṇāni aṇima ādi guṇāḥ kāryāṇi pratyaya prapañcaḥ ca
avyaktāt utpannāḥ guṇāḥ ca sattvādayaḥ umīṣām
dharma jñāna virāga anaiśvaryam tad phalāni vividhāni
yacchanti guṇebhyaḥ amī puruṣebhyaḥ yoga dātāraḥ

original: AbhT_8.267a/. tebhyaḥ parato bhuvanaṃ sattvādiguṇāsanasya devasya /
analyzed: tebhyaḥ paratas bhuvanam sattva ādi guṇa āsanasya devasya
yena umā guha nīla brahma ṛbhukṣa kṛta akṛta ādi bhuvaneṣu
graha rūpiṇyā śaktyā prābhvyā adhiṣṭhāni bhūtāni
upasaṃjihīrṣuḥ iha yaḥ caturānana paṅkajam samāviśya
dagdhvā caturaḥ lokān janalokān nirmiṇoti punar
yasya icchātaḥ sattva ādi guṇa śarīrā visṛjati rudrāṇī
anukalpaḥ rudrāṇyāḥ vedī tatra ijyatenukalpena
paśupatiḥ indra upendra viriñcaiḥ atha tad upalambhataḥ devaiḥ
gandharva yakṣa rākṣasa pitṛ munibhiḥ citritāḥ tathā yāgāḥ

original: AbhT_8.272a/. guṇānāṃ yatparaṃ sāmyaṃ tadavyaktaṃ guṇordhvataḥ /
analyzed: guṇānām yat param sāmyam tat avyaktam guṇa ūrdhvatas
krodha īśa caṇḍa saṃvartāḥ jyotiḥ piṅgala sūrakau

original: AbhT_8.273a/. pañcāntakaikavīrau ca śikhodaścāṣṭa tatra te /
analyzed: pañcāntaka ekavīrau ca śikhodaḥ ca aṣṭa tatra te
gahanam puruṣa nidhānam prakṛtiḥ mūlam pradhānam avyaktam
guṇa kāraṇam iti ete māyā prabhavasya paryāyāḥ
yāvantaḥ kṣetrajñāḥ sahaja āgantu kamala upadigdha citaḥ

original: AbhT_8.275a/. te sarve@tra vinihitā rudrāśca tadutthabhogabhujaḥ /
analyzed: te sarve itra vinihitāḥ rudrāḥ ca tad uttha bhoga bhujaḥ
mūḍha vivṛtta vilīnaiḥ karaṇaiḥ kecid tu vikaraṇakāḥ
akṛta adhiṣṭhāna tayā kṛtyā śaktāni mūḍhāni
pratiniyata viṣaya bhāñji sphuṭāni śāstre vivṛttāni

original: AbhT_8.277a/. bhagnāni mahāpralaye sṛṣṭau notpāditāni līnāni /
analyzed: bhagnāni mahāpralaye sṛṣṭau na utpāditāni līnāni
icchā adhīnāni punar vikaraṇa saṃjñāni kāryam api evam

original: AbhT_8.278a/. puṃstattve tuṣṭinavakaṃ siddhayo@ṣṭau ca tatpuraḥ /
analyzed: puṃs tattve tuṣṭi navakam siddhayaḥ ṣṭau ca tat puras
tāvatyaḥ eva aṇima ādi bhuvana aṣṭakam eva ca

original: AbhT_8.279a/. atattve tattvabuddhyā yaḥ santoṣastuṣṭiratra sā /
analyzed: atattve tattva buddhyā yaḥ santoṣaḥ tuṣṭiḥ atra sā

original: AbhT_8.279b/. heye@pyādeyadhīḥ siddhiḥ tathā coktaṃ hi kāpilaiḥ // 279
analyzed: heya ipi ādeya dhīḥ siddhiḥ tathā ca uktam hi kāpilaiḥ
ādhyātmikāḥ catasraḥ prakṛti upādāna kāla bhāgya ākhyāḥ
pañca
ūhaḥ śabda udhyayanam duḥkha vighātāḥ trayaḥ suhṛd prāptiḥ

original: AbhT_8.281b/. dānaṃ ca siddhayo@ṣṭau siddheḥ pūrvo@ṅkuśastrividhaḥ // 281
analyzed: dānam ca siddhayā uṣṭau siddheḥ pūrva uṅkuśaḥ trividhaḥ
aṇima ādi ūrdhvataḥ tisraḥ paṅktayaḥ guru śiṣya gāḥ
tatra api triguṇa chāyā yogāt tritvam udāhṛtam

original: AbhT_8.283b/. puṃsi nādamayī śaktiḥ prasarākhyā ca yatsthitā // 283
analyzed: puṃsi nāda mayī śaktiḥ prasara ākhyā ca yat sthitā

original: AbhT_8.284a/. na hyakartā pumānkartuḥ kāraṇatvaṃ ca saṃsthitam /
analyzed: na hi akartā pumān kartuḥ kāraṇa tvam ca saṃsthitam

original: AbhT_8.284b/. akartaryapi vā puṃsi sahakāritayā sthite // 284
analyzed: akartari api vā puṃsi sahakāri tayā sthite
śeṣa kārya ātma tā eṣṭavyān yathā satkārya hānitaḥ

original: AbhT_8.285b/. tasmāttathāvidhe kārye yā śaktiḥ puruṣasya sā // 285
analyzed: tasmāt tathāvidhe kārye yā śaktiḥ puruṣasya sā
tāvanti rūpāṇi ādāya pūrṇa tām adhigacchati
nāḍī aṣṭaka ūrdhve kathitam vigraha aṣṭakam ucyate

original: AbhT_8.287a/. kāryaṃ heturduḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ ca vijñānasādhyakaraṇāni /
analyzed: kāryam hetuḥ duḥkham sukham ca vijñāna sādhya karaṇāni
sādhanam iti vigraha tā yuj aṣṭakam bhavati puṃs tattve
bhuvanam deha dharmāṇām daśānām vigraha aṣṭakāt
ahiṃsā satyam asteyam brahma a kalka a krudhaḥ guroḥ
śuśrūṣā śauca santoṣāḥ ṛju tā iti daśa uditāḥ

original: AbhT_8.289b/. puṃstattva eva gandhāntaṃ sthitaṃ ṣoḍaśakaṃ punaḥ // 289
analyzed: puṃstattve eva gandha antam sthitam ṣoḍaśakam punar
ārabhya deha pāśa ākhyam puram buddhi guṇāḥ tatas
tatra eva aṣṭau ahaṃkāraḥ tridhā kāma ādikāḥ tathā
pāśāḥ āgantuka gāṇeśa vaidya īśvara bheditāḥ
trividhāḥ te sthitāḥ puṃsi mokṣa mārga uparodhakāḥ
yat kiṃcid parama advaita saṃvid svātantrya sundarāt
parāt śivāt ukta rūpāt anyat tat pāśaḥ ucyate
tat evam puṃs tvam āpanne pūrṇe api parameśvare
tad svarūpa aparijñānam citram hi puruṣāḥ tatas
ukta anuktāḥ tu ye pāśāḥ paratantra ukta lakṣaṇāḥ

original: AbhT_8.294b/. te puṃsi sarve tāṃstatra śodhayanmucyate bhavāt // 294
analyzed: te puṃsi sarve tān tatra śodhayat mucyate bhavāt

original: AbhT_8.295a/. puṃsa ūrdhva tu niyatistatrasthāḥ śaṃkarā daśa /
analyzed: puṃsaḥ ūrdhva tu niyatiḥ tatra sthāḥ śaṃkarāḥ daśa

original: AbhT_8.295b/. hemābhāḥ susitāḥ kālatattve tu daśa te śivāḥ // 295
analyzed: hema ābhāḥ su sitāḥ kāla tattve tu daśa te śivāḥ
koṭiḥ ṣoḍaśa sāhasram pratyekam parivāriṇaḥ
rāge vīra īśa bhuvanam guru antevāsinām puram
puram ca aśuddhavidyāyām syāt śakti navaka ujjvalam
manonmanī anta gāḥ tāḥ ca vāmā ādyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
kalāyām syāt mahādeva trayasya puram uttamam
tatas māyā tri puṭikā mukhyatas ananta koṭibhiḥ

original: AbhT_8.299a/. ākrāntā sā bhagabilaiḥ proktaṃ śaivyāṃ tanau punaḥ /
analyzed: ākrāntā sā bhaga bilaiḥ proktam śaivyām tanau punar
aṅguṣṭha mātra paryantam mahādeva aṣṭakam niśi
cakra aṣṭaka ādhipatyena tathā śrī mālinīmate

original: AbhT_8.300b/. vāmādyāḥ puruṣādau ye proktāḥ śrīpūrvaśāsane // 300
analyzed: vāmā ādyāḥ puruṣa ādau ye proktāḥ śrī pūrvaśāsane
te māyā tattve eva uktāḥ tanau śaivyām anantataḥ
kapāla vratinaḥ sva aṅga hotāraḥ kaṣṭa tāpasāḥ
sarva abhayāḥ khaḍga dhārā vratāḥ tad tattva vedinaḥ
kramāt tat tattvam āyānti yatra īśaḥ nantaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_8.303a/. uktaṃ ca tasya parataḥ sthānamanantādhipasya devasya /
analyzed: uktam ca tasya paratas sthānam ananta adhipasya devasya
sthiti vilaya sarga kartuḥ guhā bhaga dvārapālasya
dharmān aṇima ādi guṇān jñānāni tapaḥ sukhāni yogān ca
māyā bilāt pradatte puṃsām niṣkṛṣya niṣkṛṣya
tad śakti iddha sva balāḥ guhā adhikāra andhakāra guṇa dīpāḥ
sarva inanta pramukhāḥ dīpyante śata bhava pramukha antāḥ
saḥ vyaktam adhiṣṭhāya prakaroti jagat niyogataḥ śambhoḥ

original: AbhT_8.307a/. śivaguṇayoge tasmin mahati pade ye pratiṣṭhitāḥ prathamam /
analyzed: śiva guṇa yoge tasmin mahati pade ye pratiṣṭhitāḥ prathamam
tenanta ādeḥ jagataḥ sarga sthiti vilaya kartāraḥ
māyā bilam idam uktam paratas tu guhā jagat yoniḥ
utpattyā teṣu asyāḥ pati śakti kṣobham anuvidhīyamāneṣu
yoni vivareṣu nānā kāma samṛddheṣu bhaga saṃjñā
kāmayate patiḥ enām icchā anuvidhāyinīm yadā devīm
prati bhagam avyakta ādyāḥ prajāḥ tadā asyāḥ prajāyante
teṣām ati sūkṣmāṇām etāvat tvam na varṇyate vidhiṣu
avavarakāṇi ekasmin yadvat sāle bahūni baddhāni
yoni bilāni ekasmin tadvat māyā śiraḥ sāle

original: AbhT_8.312a/. māyāpaṭalaiḥ sūkṣmaiḥ kuḍyaiḥ pihitāḥ parasparamadṛśyāḥ /
analyzed: māyā paṭalaiḥ sūkṣmaiḥ kuḍyaiḥ pihitāḥ parasparam adṛśyāḥ

original: AbhT_8.312b/. nivasanti tatra rudrāḥ sukhinaḥ pratibilamasaṃkhyātāḥ // 312
analyzed: nivasanti tatra rudrāḥ sukhinaḥ prati bilam asaṃkhyātāḥ

original: AbhT_8.313a/. sthāne sāyujyagatāḥ sāmīpyagatāḥ pare salokasthāḥ /
analyzed: sthāne sāyujya gatāḥ sāmīpya gatāḥ pare sa loka sthāḥ
prati bhuvanam evam ayam nivāsinām gurubhiḥ uddiṣṭaḥ
api sarva siddha vācaḥ kṣīyeran dīrgha kālam udgīrṇāḥ
na punar yoni ānantyāt ucyante srotasām saṃkhyāḥ
tasmāt niraya ādi ekam yat proktam dvārapāla paryantam
srotaḥ tena anyāni api tulya vidhānāni vedyāni

original: AbhT_8.316a/. avyaktakale guhayā prakṛtikalābhyāṃ vikāra ātmīyaḥ /
analyzed: avyakta kale guhayā prakṛti kalābhyām vikāraḥ ātmīyaḥ

original: AbhT_8.316b/. otaḥ proto vyāptaḥ kalitaḥ pūrṇaḥ parikṣiptaḥ // 316
analyzed: otaḥ protaḥ vyāptaḥ kalitaḥ pūrṇaḥ parikṣiptaḥ

original: AbhT_8.317a/. madhye puṭatrayaṃ tasyā rudrāḥ ṣaḍadhare@ntare /
AbhT_8.317b/. eka ūrdhve ca pañceti dvādaśaite nirūpitāḥ // 317
analyzed: ekasmin ūrdhve ca pañca iti dvādaśā ete nirūpitāḥ
gahana asādhyau harihara daśeśvarau trikala gopatī ṣaṭ ime

original: AbhT_8.319a/. iti pañca teṣu pañcasu ṣaṭsu ca puṭageṣu tatparāvṛttyā /
analyzed: iti pañca teṣu pañcasu ṣaṭsu ca puṭa geṣu tad parāvṛttyā

original: AbhT_8.319b/. parivarttate sthitiḥ kila devo@nantastu sarvathā madhye // 319
analyzed: parivarttate sthitiḥ kila devaḥ ūnantaḥ tu sarvathā madhye
ūrdhva adhara ga kapālaka puṭa ṣaṭka yugena tad parāvṛttyā
madhyataḥ aṣṭābhiḥ diś sthaiḥ vyāptaḥ granthiḥ mataṅga śāstra uktaḥ
śrī sāraśāsane punar eṣā ṣaṣ puṭa tayā vinirdiṣṭā

original: AbhT_8.321b/. granthyākhyamidaṃ tattvaṃ māyākāryaṃ tato māyā // 321
analyzed: granthi ākhyam idam tattvam māyā kāryam tatas māyā

original: AbhT_8.322a/. māyātattvaṃ vibhu kila gahanamarūpaṃ samastavilayapadam /
analyzed: māyā tattvam vibhu kila gahanam arūpam samasta vilaya padam

original: AbhT_8.322b/. tatra na bhuvanavibhāgo yukto granthāvasau tasmāt // 322
analyzed: tatra na bhuvana vibhāgaḥ yuktaḥ granthau asau tasmāt
māyā tattva adhipatiḥ saḥ unantaḥ samuditān vicārya aṇūn

original: AbhT_8.323b/. yugapatkṣobhayati niśāṃ sā sūte saṃpuṭairanantaiḥ svaiḥ // 323
analyzed: yugapad kṣobhayati niśām sā sūte saṃpuṭaiḥ anantaiḥ svaiḥ
tena kalā ādi dharā antam yat uktam āvaraṇa jālam akhilam tat

original: AbhT_8.324b/. niḥsaṃkhyaṃ ca vicitraṃ māyaivaikā tvabhinneyam // 324
analyzed: niḥsaṃkhyam ca vicitram māyā eva ekā tu abhinnā iyam

original: AbhT_8.325a/. uktaṃ śrīpūrvaśāstre ca dharāvyaktātmakaṃ dvayam /
analyzed: uktam śrī pūrvaśāstre ca dharā vyakta ātmakam dvayam
asaṃkhyātam niśā śakti saṃjñam tu eka svarūpakam

original: AbhT_8.326a/. pāśāḥ puroktāḥ praṇavāḥ pañcamānāṣṭakaṃ muneḥ /
analyzed: pāśāḥ purā uktāḥ praṇavāḥ pañca māna aṣṭakam muneḥ

original: AbhT_8.326b/. kulaṃ yoniśca vāgīśī yasyāṃ jāto na jāyate // 326
analyzed: kulam yoniḥ ca vāgīśī yasyām jātaḥ na jāyate
dīkṣā kāledhara adhva stha śuddhau yat ca adhara adhva gam

original: AbhT_8.327b/. anantasya samīpe tu tatsarvaṃ pariniṣṭhitam // 327
analyzed: anantasya samīpe tu tat sarvam pariniṣṭhitam

original: AbhT_8.328a/. sādhyo dātā damano dhyāno bhasmeti bindavaḥ pañca /
analyzed: sādhyaḥ dātā damanaḥ dhyānaḥ bhasma iti bindavaḥ pañca
ākarṣa ādarśau ca iti aṣṭakam etat pramāṇānām
a lupta vibhavāḥ sarve māyā tattva adhikāriṇaḥ
māyā maya śarīrāḥ te bhogam svam paribhuñjate
pralaya ante hi anantena saṃhṛtāḥ te tu ahar mukhe

original: AbhT_8.331a/. anyānantaprasādena vibudhā api taṃ param /
analyzed: anya ananta prasādena vibudhāḥ api tam param
supta buddham manyamānāḥ svatantraṃmanya tā jaḍāḥ
sva ātmānam eva jānanti hetum māyā antarāla gāḥ

original: AbhT_8.332b/. ataḥ paraṃ sthitā māyā devī jantuvimohinī // 332
analyzed: atas param sthitā māyā devī jantu vimohinī
devadevasya sā śaktiḥ ati durghaṭa kāritā
nirvaira paripanthinyā tayā bhramita buddhayaḥ

original: AbhT_8.334a/. idaṃ tattvamidaṃ neti vivadantīha vādinaḥ /
analyzed: idam tattvam idam na iti vivadanti iha vādinaḥ

original: AbhT_8.334b/. gurudevāgniśāstreṣu ye na bhaktā narādhamāḥ // 334
analyzed: guru deva agni śāstreṣu ye na bhaktāḥ nara adhamāḥ

original: AbhT_8.335a/. satpathaṃ tānparityājya sotpathaṃ nayati dhruvam /
analyzed: sat patham tān parityājya sa utpatham nayati dhruvam
asat yukti vicāra jñān śuṣka tarka avalambinaḥ
bhramayati eva tān māyā hi amokṣe mokṣa lipsayā
śiva dīkṣā asinā chinnā śiva jñāna asinā tathā
na prarohet punar na anyaḥ hetuḥ tad chedanam prati
mahāmāyā ūrdhvatas śuddhā mahāvidyā atha mātṛkā
vāgīśvarī ca tatrastham vāma ādi nava sat puram

original: AbhT_8.338b/. vāmā jyeṣṭhā raudrī kālī kalavikaraṇībalavikārike tathā // 338
analyzed: vāmā jyeṣṭhā raudrī kālī kalavikaraṇī balavikārike tathā

original: AbhT_8.339a/. mathanī damanī manonmanī ca tridṛśaḥ pītāḥ samastāstāḥ /
analyzed: mathanī damanī manonmanī ca   pītāḥ samastāḥ tāḥ
sapta koṭyaḥ mukhya mantrāḥ saṃsthitāḥ
ekaika arbuda lakṣa aṃśāḥ padma ākāra purāḥ iha
vidyā rājñyaḥ tri guṇi ādyāḥ sapta sapta arbuda īśvarāḥ

original: AbhT_8.341a/. vidyātattvordhvamaiśaṃ tu tattvaṃ tatra kramordhvagam /
analyzed: vidyā tattva ūrdhvam aiśam tu tattvam tatra krama ūrdhva gam
śikhaṇḍi ādyam ananta antam pura aṣṭaka yutam puram
kramāt ūrdhva ūrdhva saṃsthānam saptānām nāyakaḥ vibhuḥ
anantaḥ eva dhyeyaḥ ca pūjyaḥ ca api uttarottaraḥ

original: AbhT_8.344a/. mukhyamantreśvarāṇāṃ yat sārdhaṃ koṭitrayaṃ sthitam /
analyzed: mukhya mantreśvarāṇām yat sa ardham koṭi trayam sthitam
tad nāyakāḥ ime tena vidyeśāḥ cakravartinaḥ

original: AbhT_8.345a/. uktaṃ ca gurubhiritthaṃ śivatanvādyeṣu śāsaneṣvetat /
analyzed: uktam ca gurubhiḥ ittham śivatanu ādyeṣu śāsaneṣu etat

original: AbhT_8.346a/. gahanādyaṃ nirayāntaṃ sṛjati ca rudrāṃśca viniyuṅkte /
analyzed: gahana ādyam niraya antam sṛjati ca rudrān ca viniyuṅkte

original: AbhT_8.346b/. uddharati manonmanyā puṃsasteṣveva bhavati madhyasthaḥ // 346
analyzed: uddharati manonmanyā puṃsaḥ teṣu eva bhavati madhya sthaḥ
te tena udasta citaḥ para tattva ālocanā ibhiniviśante

original: AbhT_8.347b/. sa punaradhaḥ pathavartiṣvadhikṛta evāṇuṣu śivena // 347
analyzed: sa punar adhas patha vartiṣu adhikṛtaḥ eva aṇuṣu śivena
avasita pati viniyogaḥ sārdham aneka ātma mantra koṭībhiḥ
nirvāti ananta nāthaḥ tat dhām āviśati sūkṣmarudraḥ tu

original: AbhT_8.349a/. anugṛhyāṇumapūrvaṃ sthāpayati patiḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ sthāne /
analyzed: anugṛhya aṇum apūrvam sthāpayati patiḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ sthāne

original: AbhT_8.349b/. ityaṣṭau paripāṭyā yāvaddhāmāni yāti gururekaḥ // 349
analyzed: iti aṣṭau paripāṭyā yāvat dhāmāni yāti guruḥ ekaḥ
tāvat asaṃkhyātānām jantūnām nirvṛtim kurute
teṣṭau api śakti aṣṭaka yoga amala jalaruha āsana āsīnāḥ

original: AbhT_8.351a/. ālokayanti devaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ kāraṇaṃ paramam /
analyzed: ālokayanti devam hṛdaya stham kāraṇam paramam

original: AbhT_8.351b/. taṃ bhagavantamanantaṃ dhyāyantaḥ svahṛdi kāraṇaṃ śāntam // 351
analyzed: tam bhagavantam anantam dhyāyantaḥ sva hṛdi kāraṇam śāntam
sapta anudhyāyanti api mantrāṇām koṭayaḥ śuddhāḥ
māyā ādiḥ avīci antaḥ bhavaḥ tu ananta ādiḥ ucyate ipi abhavaḥ
śiva śuddha guṇa adhīkāra antaḥ saḥ upi eṣa heyaḥ ca

original: AbhT_8.353b/. atrāpi yato dṛṣṭānugrāhyāṇāṃ niyojyatā śaivī // 353
analyzed: atra api yatas dṛṣṭa anugrāhyāṇām niyojya tā śaivī

original: AbhT_8.354a/. iṣṭā ca tannivṛttirhyabhavastvadhare na bhūyate yasmāt /
analyzed: iṣṭā ca tad nivṛttiḥ hi abhavaḥ tu adhare na bhūyate yasmāt

original: AbhT_8.354b/. patyurapasarpati yataḥ kāraṇatā kāryatā ca siddhebhyaḥ // 354
analyzed: patyuḥ apasarpati yatas kāraṇa tā kārya tā ca siddhebhyaḥ
kañcuka vat śiva siddhau tau atibhava saṃjñayā ati madhya sthau
dharma jñāna virāga aiśya catuṣṭaya puram tu yat
rūpa āvaraṇa saṃjñam tat tattve asmin aiśvare viduḥ

original: AbhT_8.356b/. vāmā jyeṣṭhā ca raudrīti bhuvanatrayaśobhitam // 356
analyzed: vāmā jyeṣṭhā ca raudrī iti bhuvanatraya śobhitam
sūkṣma āvaraṇam ākhyātam īśa tattve guru uttamaiḥ
śuddha āvaraṇam iti āhuḥ uktā śuddha āvṛteḥ param
vidyā āvṛtiḥ tatas bhāva abhāva śakti dvaya ujjvalā

original: AbhT_8.359a/. śaktyāvṛtiḥ pramāṇākhyā tataḥ śāstre nirūpitā /
analyzed: śakti āvṛtiḥ pramāṇa ākhyā tatas śāstre nirūpitā
śakti āvṛteḥ tu tejasvi dhruva īśābhyām alaṅkṛtam
tejasvi āvaraṇam veda purā māna āvṛtiḥ tatas
su śuddha āvaraṇāt ūrdhva śaivam eka puram bhavet
śiva āvṛteḥ ūrdhvam āhuḥ mokṣa āvaraṇa saṃjñitam

original: AbhT_8.362a/. asyāṃ mokṣāvṛtau rudrā ekādaśa nirūpitāḥ /
analyzed: asyām mokṣa āvṛtau rudrāḥ ekādaśa nirūpitāḥ
mokṣa āvaraṇataḥ tu eka puram āvaraṇam dhruvam

original: AbhT_8.363a/. ūrdhve dhruvāvṛtericchāvaraṇaṃ tatra te śivāḥ /
analyzed: ūrdhve dhruva āvṛteḥ icchā āvaraṇam tatra te śivāḥ
īśvara icchā gṛha antasthāḥ tat puram ca ekam ucyate
prabuddha āvaraṇāt ūrdhva samaya āvaraṇam mahat
bhuvanaiḥ pañcabhiḥ garbhīkṛta ananta sama āvṛti

original: AbhT_8.365b/. sāmayātsauśivaṃ tatra sādākhyaṃ bhuvanaṃ mahat // 365
analyzed: sāmayāt sauśivam tatra sādākhyam bhuvanam mahat
tasmin sadāśivaḥ devaḥ tasya savya apasavyayoḥ
jñāna kriye parā icchā tu śaktiḥ utsaṅga gāminī
sṛṣṭi ādi pañca kṛtyāni kurute sa tayā icchayā

original: AbhT_8.368a/. daśāṣṭādaśa rudrāśca taireva suśivo vṛtaḥ /
analyzed: daśa aṣṭādaśa rudrāḥ ca taiḥ eva suśivaḥ vṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_8.368b/. sadyo vāmāghorau puruṣeśau brahmapañcakaṃ hṛdayam // 368
analyzed: sadyas vāma aghorau puruṣa īśau brahmapañcakam hṛdayam
mūrdha śikhā varma dṛś astram aṅgāni ṣaḍ prāhuḥ
sakala akala śūnyaiḥ saha kalā āḍhya kham alaṅkṛte kṣapaṇam antyam
kaṇṭhya oṣṭhyam aṣṭamam kila sakala aṣṭakam etat āmnātam

original: AbhT_8.370b/. oṃ kāraśivau dīpto hetvīśadaśeśakau suśivakālau // 370
analyzed: om kāra śivau dīptaḥ hetu īśa daśa īśa kau suśiva kālau
sūkṣma sutejaḥ śarvāḥ śivāḥ daśa ete itra pūrvādeḥ
vijayaḥ niḥśvāsaḥ ca svāyambhuvaḥ vahni vīra rauravakāḥ
mukuṭa visara indu vindu prodgītāḥ lalita siddha rudrau ca

original: AbhT_8.372b/. santānaśivau parakiraṇapārameśā iti smṛtā rudrāḥ // 372
analyzed: santāna śivau para kiraṇa pārameśāḥ iti smṛtāḥ rudrāḥ
sarveṣām eteṣām jñānāni viduḥ sva tulya nāmāni
vibhu vāma ādi rudra tad śakti yutam
tārā ādi śakti juṣṭam suśiva āsanam ati sitaka jam asaṃkhya dalam

original: AbhT_8.374b/. yaḥ śaktirudravargaḥ parivāre viṣṭare ca suśivasya // 374
analyzed: yaḥ śakti rudra vargaḥ parivāre viṣṭare ca suśivasya
pratyekam asya nija nija parivāre
māyā mala nirmuktāḥ kevalam adhikāra mātra saṃrūḍhāḥ
suśiva āvaraṇe rudrāḥ sarva jñāḥ sarva śakti sampūrṇāḥ
adhikāra bandha vilaye śāntāḥ punarbhavinaḥ

original: AbhT_8.377a/. ūrdhve bindvāvṛtirdīptā tatra tatra padmaṃ śaśiprabham /
analyzed: ūrdhve bindu āvṛtiḥ dīptā tatra tatra padmam śaśi prabham
śānti atītaḥ śivaḥ tatra tad śakti utsaṅga bhūṣitaḥ
asaṃkhya rudra tad śakti pura koṭibhiḥ āvṛtaḥ
śrīmat mataṅgaśāstre ca laya ākhyam tattvam uttamam
pāribhāṣikam iti etat nāmnā binduḥ iha ucyate
catur mūrti mayam śubhram yat tat sakala niṣkalam

original: AbhT_8.380b/. tasminbhogaḥ samuddiṣṭa ityatredaṃ ca varṇitam // 380
analyzed: tasmin bhogaḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ iti atrā idam ca varṇitam
nivṛtti ādeḥ su sūkṣma tvāt dharā ādi ārabdha deha tā
mātuḥ sphūrjat mahā jñāna līna tvāt na vibhāvyate
udrikta taijasa tvena hemnaḥ bhū paramāṇavaḥ
yathā pṛthak na bhānti evam ūrdhva adhas rudra deha gāḥ

original: AbhT_8.383a/. bindūrdhve@rdhenduretasya kalā jyotsnā ca tadvatī /
analyzed: bindu ūrdhva īrdhā induḥ etasya kalā jyotsnā ca tadvatī

original: AbhT_8.383b/. kāntiḥ prabhā ca vimalā pañcaitā rodhikāstataḥ // 383
analyzed: kāntiḥ prabhā ca vimalā pañca etāḥ rodhikāḥ tatas

original: AbhT_8.384a/. rundhanī rodhanī roddhrī jñānabodhā tamopahā /
AbhT_8.384b/. etāḥ pañca kalāḥ prāhurnirodhinyāṃ gurūttamāh // 384
analyzed: etāḥ pañca kalāḥ prāhuḥ nirodhinyām guru uttama āh
ardha mātraḥ smṛtaḥ binduḥ vyoma rūpī catuṣkalaḥ
tad ardham ardhacandraḥ tad aṣṭa aṃśena nirodhikā

original: AbhT_8.386a/. hetūnbrahmādikān runddhe rodhikāṃ tāṃ tyajettataḥ /
analyzed: hetūn brahma ādikān runddhe rodhikām tām tyajet tatas

original: AbhT_8.386b/. nirodhikāmimāṃ bhittvā sādākhyaṃ bhuvanaṃ param // 386
analyzed: nirodhikām imām bhittvā sādākhyam bhuvanam param
para rūpeṇa yatra āste pañca mantra mahā tanuḥ
nādaḥ kiñjalka sadṛśaḥ mahadbhiḥ puruṣaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_8.388b/. catvāri bhuvanānyatra dikṣu madhye ca pañcamam // 388
analyzed: catvāri bhuvanāni atra dikṣu madhye ca pañcamam

original: AbhT_8.389a/. indhikā dīpikā caiva rodhikā mocikordhvagā /
analyzed: indhikā dīpikā ca eva rodhikā mocikā ūrdhva gā
madhyetra padmam tatra ūrdhva gāmī tad śaktibhiḥ vṛtaḥ
nāda ūrdhvataḥ tu sauṣumnam tatra tad śakti bhṛt prabhuḥ
tad īśaḥ piṅgalā ilābhyām vṛtaḥ savya apasavyayoḥ

original: AbhT_8.391a/. yā prabhoraṅkagā devī suṣumnā śaśisaprabhā /
analyzed: yā prabhoḥ aṅka gā devī suṣumnā śaśi saprabhā
grathitā udhvā tayā sarvaḥ ūrdhvaḥ ca adhastanaḥ tathā
nādaḥ suṣumnā ādhāraḥ tu bhittvā viśvam idam jagat
adhas śaktyā vinirgacchet ūrdhva śaktyā ca mūrdhataḥ
nāḍyā brahmabile līnaḥ saḥ vyakta dhvaniḥ akṣaraḥ
nadan sarveṣu bhūteṣu śiva śaktyā hi adhiṣṭhitaḥ

original: AbhT_8.394b/. tatra brahmā sitaḥ śūlī pañcāsyaḥ śaśiśekharaḥ // 394
analyzed: tatra brahmā sitaḥ śūlī pañcāsyaḥ śaśiśekharaḥ

original: AbhT_8.395a/. tasyotsaṅge parā devī brahmāṇī mokṣamārgagā /
analyzed: tasya utsaṅge parā devī brahmāṇī mokṣa mārga gā

original: AbhT_8.395b/. roddhrī dātrī ca mokṣasya tāṃ bhittvā cordhvakuṇḍalī // 395
analyzed: roddhrī dātrī ca mokṣasya tām bhittvā ca ūrdhva kuṇḍalī

original: AbhT_8.396a/. śaktiḥ suptāhisadṛśī sā viśvādhāra ucyate /
analyzed: śaktiḥ supta ahi sadṛśī sā viśvādhāraḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_8.396b/. tasyāṃ sūkṣmā susūkṣmā ca tathānye amṛtāmite // 396
analyzed: tasyām sūkṣmā susūkṣmā ca tathā anye amṛtā amite

original: AbhT_8.397a/. madhyato vyāpinī tasyāṃ vyāpīśo vyāpinīdharaḥ /

analyzed: śakti tattvam idam yasya prapañcaḥ yam dharā antakaḥ
śivatattvam tatas tatra caturdikkam vyavasthitāḥ
vyāpī vyoma ātmakaḥ anantaḥ nāthaḥ tad śakti bhāginaḥ

original: AbhT_8.399a/. madhye tvanāśritaṃ tatra devadevo hyanāśritaḥ /
analyzed: madhye tu anāśritam tatra devadevaḥ hi anāśritaḥ
tad śakti utsaṅga bhṛt sūrya śata koṭi sama prabhaḥ

original: AbhT_8.400a/. śivatattvordhvataḥ śaktiḥ parā sā samanāhvayā /
AbhT_8.400b/. sarveṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ sā kartṛbhūtā vyavasthitā // 400
analyzed: sarveṣām kāraṇānām sā kartṛ bhūtā vyavasthitā
bibharti aṇḍāni anekāni śivena samadhiṣṭhitā

original: AbhT_8.401b/. tadārūḍhaḥ śivaḥ kṛtyapañcakaṃ kurute prabhuḥ // 401
analyzed: tad ārūḍhaḥ śivaḥ kṛtya pañcakam kurute prabhuḥ
samanā karaṇam tasya hetu kartuḥ mahā uśituḥ

original: AbhT_8.402b/. anāśritaṃ tu vyāpāre nimittaṃ heturucyate // 402
analyzed: anāśritam tu vyāpāre nimittam hetuḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_8.403a/. tayādhitiṣṭhati vibhuḥ kāraṇānāṃ tu pañcakam /
analyzed: tayā adhitiṣṭhati vibhuḥ kāraṇānām tu pañcakam
anāśrita unātha mayam anantam kha vapuḥ sadā

original: AbhT_8.404a/. sa vyāpinaṃ prerayati svaśaktyā karaṇena tu /
analyzed: sa vyāpinam prerayati sva śaktyā karaṇena tu

original: AbhT_8.404b/. karmarūpā sthitā māyā yadadhaḥ śaktikuṇḍalī // 404
analyzed: karma rūpā sthitā māyā yad adhas śakti kuṇḍalī
yat sadāśiva paryantam pārthiva ādyam ca śāsane
tat sarva prākṛtam proktam vināśa utpatti saṃyutam

original: AbhT_8.406b/. atha sakalabhuvanamānaṃ yanmahyaṃ nigaditaṃ nijairgurubhiḥ // 406
analyzed: atha sakala bhuvana mānam yat mahyam nigaditam nijaiḥ gurubhiḥ
tat vakṣyate samāsāt buddhau yena āśu saṅkrāmet
aṇḍasya antar anantaḥ kālaḥ kūṣmāṇḍa hāṭakau brahma harī

original: AbhT_8.408a/. rudrāḥ śataṃ savīraṃ bahirnivṛttistu sāṣṭaśatabhuvanā syāt /
analyzed: rudrāḥ śatam sa vīram bahis nivṛttiḥ tu sa aṣṭaśata bhuvanā syāt
jala tejaḥ samīra nabhaḥ haṃkṛt dhī mūla saptake pratyekam

original: AbhT_8.409a/. aṣṭau ṣaṭpañcāśadbhuvanā tena pratiṣṭheti kalā kathitā /
analyzed: aṣṭau ṣaṭpañcāśat bhuvanā tena pratiṣṭhā iti kalā kathitā
atra prāhuḥ śodhyān aṣṭau kecid nija aṣṭaka adhipatīn

original: AbhT_8.410a/. anye tu samastānāṃ śodhyatvaṃ varṇayanti bhuvanānām /
analyzed: anye tu samastānām śodhya tvam varṇayanti bhuvanānām

original: AbhT_8.410b/. śrībhūtirājamiśrā guravaḥ prāhuḥ punarbahī rudraśatam // 410
analyzed: śrī bhūtirāja miśrāḥ guravaḥ prāhuḥ punar bahis rudra śatam

original: AbhT_8.411a/. aṣṭāvantaḥ sākaṃ śarveṇetīdṛśī nivṛttiriyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: aṣṭau antar sākam śarveṇa iti īdṛśī nivṛttiḥ iyam syāt

original: AbhT_8.411b/. rudrāḥ kālī vīro dharābdhilakṣmyaḥ sarasvatī guhyam // 411
analyzed: rudrāḥ kālī vīraḥ dharā abdhi lakṣmyaḥ sarasvatī guhyam

original: AbhT_8.412a/. ityaṣṭakaṃ jale@nau vahnyatiguhyadvayaṃ maruti vāyoḥ /
analyzed: iti aṣṭakam vahni ati guhya dvayam maruti vāyoḥ

original: AbhT_8.412b/. svapuraṃ gayādi khe ca vyoma pavitrāṣṭakaṃ ca bhuvanayugam // 412
analyzed: sva puram gayā ādi khe ca vyoma pavitra aṣṭakam ca bhuvana yugam
abhimāna ihaṅkāra chagala ādi aṣṭakam atha antarā nabhaḥ uhaṃkṛt
daśa tanmātra samūhe bhuvanam punar akṣa varga vinipatite
manasaḥ ca iti abhimāne dvāviṃśatiḥ eva bhuvanānām

original: AbhT_8.415a/. dhiyi daivīnāmaṣṭau kruttejoyogasaṃjñakaṃ trayaṃ tadumā /
analyzed: dhiyi daivīnām aṣṭau krudh tejaḥ yoga saṃjñakam trayam tat umā
tad patiḥ atha mūrti aṣṭaka suśiva dvādaśaka vīrabhadrāḥ syuḥ

original: AbhT_8.416a/. tadatha mahādevāṣṭakamiti buddhau saptadaśa saṃkhyā /
analyzed: tat atha mahādeva aṣṭakam iti buddhau saptadaśa saṃkhyā

original: AbhT_8.416b/. guṇatattve paṅktitrayamiti ṣaṭpañcāśataṃ purāṇi viduḥ // 416
analyzed: guṇa tattve paṅkti trayam iti ṣaṭpañcāśatam purāṇi viduḥ

original: AbhT_8.417a/. yadyapi guṇasāmyātmani mūle krodheśvarāṣṭakaṃ tathāpi dhiyi /
analyzed: yadi api guṇa sāmya ātmani mūle krodha īśvara aṣṭakam tathā api dhiyi

original: AbhT_8.417b/. tacchodhitamiti gaṇanāṃ na punaḥ prāptaṃ pratiṣṭhāyām // 417
analyzed: tat śodhitam iti gaṇanām na punar prāptam pratiṣṭhāyām
iti jala tattvāt mūlam tattva caturviṃśatiḥ pratiṣṭhāyām

original: AbhT_8.419a/. guravo guruśiṣyā ṛṣivarga iḍādiśca vigrahāṣṭakayuk /
analyzed: guravaḥ guru śiṣyāḥ ṛṣi vargaḥ iḍā ādiḥ ca vigraha aṣṭaka yuj
gandha ādi vikāra puram buddhi guṇa aṣṭakam ahaṃkriyā viṣaya guṇāḥ
kāma ādi saptaviṃśakam āgantu tathā gaṇeśa vidyeśa mayau

original: AbhT_8.420b/. iti pāśeṣu puratrayamitthaṃ puruṣe@tra bhuvanaṣoḍaśakam // 420
analyzed: iti pāśeṣu pura trayam ittham puruṣa itra bhuvana ṣoḍaśakam

original: AbhT_8.421a/. niyatau śaṅkaradaśakaṃ kāle śivadaśakamiti puradvitayam /
analyzed: niyatau śaṅkara daśakam kāle śiva daśakam iti pura dvitayam

original: AbhT_8.421b/. rāge suhṛṣṭabhuvanaṃ guruśiṣyapuraṃ ca vitkalāyugale // 421
analyzed: rāge su hṛṣṭa bhuvanam guru śiṣya puram ca vid kalā yugale

original: AbhT_8.422a/. bhuvanaṃ bhuvanaṃ niśi puṭapuratrayaṃ vākpuraṃ pramāṇapuram /
analyzed: bhuvanam bhuvanam niśi puṭa pura trayam vāc puram pramāṇa puram
iti saptaviṃśati purā vidyā puruṣa ādi tattva saptaka
vāmā īśa rūpa sūkṣmam śuddham vidyā atha śakti tejasvi mitiḥ
mokṣa dhuva iṣi saṃbuddha samaya sauśiva saṃjñāḥ
saptadaśa purā śāntā vidyeśa sadāśiva pura tritaya yuktā
vyāpi vyoma ananta anātha anāśrita purāṇi pañca tatas

original: AbhT_8.426a/. ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca paramamanāśritamatha samanābhuvanaṣoḍaśī yadi vā /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭham ca paramam anāśritam atha samanā bhuvana ṣoḍaśī yadi vā

original: AbhT_8.427a/. sauṣumnaṃ brahmabilaṃ kuṇḍalinī vyāpipañcakaṃ samanā /
analyzed: sauṣumnam brahmabilam kuṇḍalinī vyāpi pañcakam samanā

original: AbhT_8.427b/. iti ṣoḍaśabhuvaneyaṃ tattvayugaṃ śāntyatītā syāt // 427
analyzed: iti ṣoḍaśa bhuvanā iyam tattva yugam śānti atītā syāt
śrīmat mataṅgaśāstre ca kramaḥ yam pura pūga gaḥ
kālāgniḥ narakāḥ kha abdhi yutam mukhya tayā śatam

original: AbhT_8.429b/. ityaṇḍamadhyaṃ tadbāhye śataṃ rudrā iti sthitāḥ // 429
analyzed: iti aṇḍa madhyam tad bāhye śatam rudrāḥ iti sthitāḥ

original: AbhT_8.430a/. sthānānāṃ dviśatī bhūmiḥ saptapañcāśatā yutā /
analyzed: sthānānām dviśatī bhūmiḥ saptapañcāśatā yutā
pañca aṣṭakasya madhyāt dvātriṃśat bhūta catuṣṭaye
tanmātreṣu ca pañca syuḥ viśvedevāḥ tatas ūṣṭakam

original: AbhT_8.431b/. pañcamaṃ sendriye garve buddhau devāṣṭakaṃ guṇe // 431
analyzed: pañcamam sa indriye garve buddhau deva aṣṭakam guṇe

original: AbhT_8.432a/. yogāṣṭakaṃ krodhasaṃjñaṃ mūle kāle sanaiyate /
analyzed: yoga aṣṭakam krodha saṃjñam mūle kāle sa naiyate
patat ruj ādyāḥ ca aṅguṣṭha mātra ādyāḥ rāga tattva gāḥ
dvādaśa eka śiva ādyāḥ syuḥ vidyāyām kalane daśa
vāmā ādyāḥ triśatī sā iyam tri parvaṇi abdhiḥ asya yuj

original: AbhT_8.434a/. śaivāḥ kecidihānantāḥ śraikaṇṭhā iti saṃgrahaḥ /
analyzed: śaivāḥ kecid iha anantāḥ śraikaṇṭhāḥ iti saṃgrahaḥ

original: AbhT_8.434b/. yatra yadā parabhogān bubhukṣate tatra yojanaṃ kāryam // 434
analyzed: yatra yadā para bhogān bubhukṣate tatra yojanam kāryam

original: AbhT_8.435a/. śodhanamatha taddhānau śeṣaṃ tvantargataṃ kāryam /
analyzed: śodhanam atha tad hānau śeṣam tu antargatam kāryam
iti āgamam prathayitum darśitam etat vikalpitam tena
anye api bahu vikalpāḥ sva dhiyā ācāryaiḥ samabhyūhyāḥ
śrī pūrvaśāsane punar aṣṭādaśa adhikam śatam kathitam
tat iha pradhānam adhikam saṃkṣepeṇa ucyate śodhyam

original: AbhT_8.437b/. kālāgniḥ kūṣmāṇḍo narakeśo hāṭako@tha bhūtalapaḥ // 437

analyzed: brahmā muni loka īśaḥ rudrāḥ pañca antarāla sthāḥ
prācyāḥ kapāli vahni anta nirṛti bala ākhyāḥ
ekādaśabhiḥ bāhye brahmāṇḍam pañcabhiḥ tathā āntarikaiḥ
iti ṣoḍaśa puram etat nivṛtti kalayā iha kalanīyam
lakulīśa bhārabhūtī diṇḍi āṣāḍhī ca puṣkara nimeṣau
prabhāsa sureśau iti salile pratyātmakam sa parivāre
śrīśaila hariścandrau iti guhya aṣṭakam idam mahasi

original: AbhT_8.443a/. atiguhyāṣṭakametanmaruti ca satanmātrake ca sākṣe ca /
analyzed: ati guhya aṣṭakam etat maruti ca sa tanmātrake ca sa akṣe ca

original: AbhT_8.443b/. sthāṇusuvarṇākhyau kila bhadro gokarṇako mahālayakaḥ // 443
analyzed: sthāṇu suvarṇa ākhyau kila bhadraḥ gokarṇakaḥ mahālayakaḥ

original: AbhT_8.444a/. avimuktarudrakoṭī vastrāpada ityadaḥ pavitraṃ khe /
analyzed: avimukta rudrakoṭī vastrāpadaḥ iti adaḥ pavitram khe
sthūla sthūleśa śaṅkuśruti kālañjarāḥ ca maṇḍalabhṛt
mākoṭa aṇḍadvitaya chagalāṇḍāḥ aṣṭakam hi ahaṅkāre
anya ihaṅkāra antar tanmātrāṇi indriyāṇi ca api āhuḥ

original: AbhT_8.446a/. dhiyi yonyaṣṭakamuktaṃ prakṛtau yogāṣṭakaṃ kilākṛtaprabhṛti /
analyzed: dhiyi yoni aṣṭakam uktam prakṛtau yoga aṣṭakam kila akṛta prabhṛti

original: AbhT_8.446b/. iti saptāṣṭakabhuvanā pratiṣṭhitiḥ salilato hi mūlāntā // 446
analyzed: iti sapta aṣṭaka bhuvanā pratiṣṭhitiḥ salilataḥ hi mūla antā  /

original: AbhT_8.447a/. nari vāmo bhīmograu bhaveśavīrāḥ pracaṇḍagaurīśau /
analyzed: nari vāmaḥ bhīma ugrau bhaveśa vīrāḥ pracaṇḍa gaurīśau

original: AbhT_8.448a/. saṃvarto jyotiratho kalāniyatyāṃ ca sūrapañcāntau /
analyzed: saṃvartaḥ jyotiḥ atho kalā niyatyām ca sūra pañcāntau
vīra śikhi īśa śrīkaṇṭha saṃjñam etat trayam ca kāle syāt
sa mahātejāḥ vāmaḥ bhavodbhavaḥ ca ekapiṅgala īśānau

original: AbhT_8.449b/. bhuvaneśapuraḥsarakāvaṅguṣṭha ime niśi sthitā hyaṣṭau // 449
analyzed: bhuvaneśa puraḥsarakau aṅguṣṭhe ime niśi sthitāḥ hi aṣṭau
aṣṭāviṃśati bhuvanā vidyā puruṣāt niśā antam iyam
hālāhala rudra krudh ambikā ghorikāḥ sa vāmāḥ syuḥ
vidyāyām vidyeśāḥ tu aṣṭau īśe sadāśive pañca

original: AbhT_8.451b/. vāmā jyeṣṭhā raudrī śaktiḥ sakalā ca śontayam // 451
analyzed: vāmā jyeṣṭhā raudrī śaktiḥ sakalā ca

original: AbhT_8.452a/. aṣṭādaśa bhuvanā syāt śāntyatītā tvabhuvanaiva /
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa bhuvanā syāt śānti atītā tu a bhuvanā eva

original: AbhT_8.452b/. iti deśādhvavibhāgaḥ kathitaḥ śrīśambhunā samādiṣṭaḥ // 452
analyzed: iti deśa adhva vibhāgaḥ kathitaḥ śrī śambhunā samādiṣṭaḥ
śrī tantrālokasya navamam āhnikam

original: AbhT_9.1b/. atha tattvapravibhāgo vistarataḥ kathyate kramaprāptaḥ // 1b
analyzed: atha tattva pravibhāgaḥ vistarataḥ kathyate krama prāptaḥ

original: AbhT_9.2a/. yānyuktāni purāṇyamūni vividhaibhadairyadeṣvanvitaṃ rūpaṃ bhāti paraṃ prakāśaniviḍaṃ devaḥ sa ekaḥ śivaḥ /
analyzed: yāni uktāni purāṇi amūni rūpam bhāti param prakāśa nibiḍam devaḥ saḥ ekaḥ śivaḥ

original: AbhT_9.2b/. tatsvātantryarasātpunaḥ śivapadādbhede vibhāte paraṃ yadrūpaṃ bahudhānugāmi tadidaṃ tattvaṃ vibhoḥ śāsane // 2
analyzed: tad svātantrya rasāt punar śiva padāt bhede vibhāte param yat rūpam bahudhā anugāmi tat idam tattvam vibhoḥ śāsane
tathā hi kāla sadanāt vīrabhadra pura antagam
evam jala ādi tattveṣu vācyam yāvat sadāśive
dharma oghe yat vā api sva sadṛś guṇe
āste sāmānya kalpena tananāt vyāptṛ bhāvataḥ
tat tattvam kramaśas pṛthvī pradhānam pum śiva ādayaḥ

original: AbhT_9.6a/. dehānāṃ bhuvanānāṃ ca na prasaṅgastato bhavet /
analyzed: dehānām bhuvanānām ca na prasaṅgaḥ tatas bhavet
śrīmat mataṅgaśāstra ādau tat uktam parameśinā
tatra eṣām darśyate dṛṣṭaḥ siddhayogīśvarīmate
kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ yaḥ śiva icchā parikalpitaḥ

original: AbhT_9.8a/. vastutaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ karteśānaḥ paraḥ śivaḥ /
analyzed: vastutas sarva bhāvānām kartā īśānaḥ paraḥ śivaḥ
asvatantrasya kartṛ tvam nahi jātu upapadyate
svatantra tā ca cit mātra vapuṣaḥ parameśituḥ

original: AbhT_9.9b/. svatantraṃ ca jaḍaṃ ceti tadanyonyaṃ virudhyate // 9
analyzed: svatantram ca jaḍam ca iti tat anyonyam virudhyate

original: AbhT_9.10b/. na kartṛtvādṛte cānyat kāraṇatvaṃ hi labhyate // 10
analyzed: na kartṛ tvāt ṛte ca anyat kāraṇa tvam hi labhyate
tasmin sati hi tad bhāvaḥ iti apekṣā eka jīvitam
nirapekṣeṣu bhāveṣu sva ātma niṣṭha tayā katham

original: AbhT_9.12a/. sa pūrvamatha paścātsa iti cetpūrvapaścimau /
analyzed: sa pūrvam atha paścāt saḥ iti ced pūrva paścimau
svabhāvena atiriktau ced samaḥ iti avaśiṣyate
bījam aṅkuraḥ iti asmin sa tattve hetu tadvatoḥ

original: AbhT_9.13b/. ghaṭaḥ paṭaśceti bhavet kāryakāraṇatā na kim // 13
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ ca iti bhavet kārya kāraṇatā na kim
bījam aṅkura patra ādi tayā pariṇameta ced

original: AbhT_9.14b/. atatsvabhāvavapuṣaḥ sa svabhāvo na yujyate // 14
analyzed: a tad svabhāva vapuṣaḥ sa svabhāvaḥ na yujyate

original: AbhT_9.15a/. sa tatsvabhāva iti cet tarhi bījāṅkurā nije /
analyzed: sa tad svabhāvaḥ iti ced tarhi bīja aṅkurāḥ nije
tāvati eva na viśrāntau tad anya atyanta saṃbhavāt
tatas ca citra ākāraḥ asau tāvān kaścid prasajyate
astu ced na jaḍa inyonya viruddha ākāra saṃbhavaḥ

original: AbhT_9.17a/. krameṇa citrākāro@stu jaḍaḥ kiṃ nu viruddhyate /
analyzed: krameṇa citra ākāroḥ tu jaḍaḥ kim nu

original: AbhT_9.17b/. kramo@kramo vā bhāvasya na svarūpādhiko bhavet // 17
analyzed: kramokramaḥ vā bhāvasya na svarūpa adhikaḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_9.18a/. tathopalambhamātraṃ tau upalambhaśca kiṃ tathā /
analyzed: tathā upalambha mātram tau upalambhaḥ ca kim tathā

original: AbhT_9.18b/. upalabdhāpi vijñānasvabhāvo yo@sya so@pi hi // 18
analyzed: upalabdha api vijñāna svabhāvaḥ yaḥ asya saḥ api hi
krama upalambha rūpa tvāt krameṇa upalabheta ced

original: AbhT_9.19b/. tasya tarhi kramaḥ ko@sau tadanyānupalambhataḥ // 19
analyzed: tasya tarhi kramaḥ kaḥ asau tad anya anupalambhataḥ

original: AbhT_9.20a/. svabhāva iti cennāsau svarūpādadhiko bhavet /
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ iti ced na asau svarūpāt adhikaḥ bhavet
svarūpa anadhikasya api kramasya sva svabhāvataḥ
svātantryāt bhāsanam syāt ced kim anyat brūmahe vayam

original: AbhT_9.21b/. itthaṃ śrīśiva evaikaḥ karteti paribhāṣyate // 21
analyzed: ittham śrī śivaḥ eva ekaḥ kartā iti paribhāṣyate
kartṛ tvam ca etat etasya tathāmātra avabhāsanam
tathā avabhāsanam ca asti kārya kāraṇa bhāva gam
yathā hi ghaṭa sāhityam paṭasya api avabhāsate

original: AbhT_9.23b/. tathā ghaṭānantaratā kiṃ tu sā niyamojjhitā // 23
analyzed: tathā ghaṭa anantara tā kim tu sā niyama ujjhitā
atas yad niyamena eva yasmāt ābhāti anantaram

original: AbhT_9.24b/. tattasya kāraṇaṃ brūmaḥ sati rūpānvaye@dhike // 24
analyzed: tat tasya kāraṇam brūmaḥ sati rūpa anvaya īdhike
niyamaḥ ca tathārūpa bhāsanā mātra sārakaḥ

original: AbhT_9.25b/. bījādaṅkura ityevaṃ bhāsanaṃ nahi sarvadā // 25
analyzed: bījāt aṅkuraḥ iti evam bhāsanam na hi sarvadā
yogi icchā anantara udbhūta tathābhūta aṅkuraḥ yatas

original: AbhT_9.26b/. iṣṭe tathāvidhākāre niyamo bhāsate yataḥ // 26
analyzed: iṣṭe tathāvidha ākāre niyamaḥ bhāsate yatas
svapne ghaṭa paṭa ādīnām hetu tadvat svabhāva tā
bhāsate niyamena eva bādhā śūnyena tāvati
tatas yāvati yādrūpyāt niyamaḥ bādha varjitaḥ
bhāti tāvati tādrūpyāt dṛḍha hetu phala ātma tā
tathābhūte ca niyame hetu tadvat tva kāriṇi
vastutas cit mayasya eva hetutā tat hi sarvagam

original: AbhT_9.30a/. ata eva ghaṭodbhūtau sāmagrī heturucyate /
analyzed: atas eva ghaṭa udbhūtau sāmagrī hetuḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_9.30b/. sāmagrī ca samagrāṇāṃ yadyekaṃ neṣyate vapuḥ // 30
analyzed: sāmagrī ca samagrāṇām yadi ekam na iṣyate vapuḥ

original: AbhT_9.31a/. hetubhedānna bhedaḥ syāt phale taccāsamañjasam /
analyzed: hetu bhedāt na bhedaḥ syāt phale tat ca asamañjasam
yat yasya anuvidhatte tām anvaya vyatireki tām

original: AbhT_9.32a/. tattasya hetu cetso@yaṃ kuṇṭhatarko na naḥ priyaḥ /
analyzed: tat tasya hetu ced sā uyam kuṇṭha tarkaḥ na naḥ priyaḥ
samagrāḥ ca yathā daṇḍa sūtra cakra kara ādayaḥ
dūrāḥ ca bhāvinaḥ ca ittham hetu tvena iti manmahe
yadi tatra bhavet meruḥ bhaviṣyan vā api kaścana

original: AbhT_9.34a/. na jāyeta ghaṭo nūnaṃ tatpratyūhavyapohitaḥ /
analyzed: na jāyeta ghaṭaḥ nūnam tad pratyūha vyapohitaḥ

original: AbhT_9.34b/. yathā ca cakraṃ niyate deśe kāle ca hetutām // 34
analyzed: yathā ca cakram niyate deśe kāle ca hetu tām
yāti karki sumeru ādyāḥ tadvat svastha avadhi sthitāḥ

original: AbhT_9.35b/. tathā ca teṣāṃ hetunāṃ saṃyojanaviyojane // 35
analyzed: tathā ca teṣām hetunām saṃyojana viyojane

original: AbhT_9.36a/. niyate śiva evaikaḥ svatantraḥ kartṛtāmiyāt /
analyzed: niyate śivaḥ eva ekaḥ svatantraḥ kartṛtām iyāt
kumbhakārasya yā saṃvid cakra daṇḍa ādi yojane

original: AbhT_9.37a/. śiva eva hi sā yasmāt saṃvidaḥ kā viśiṣṭatā /
analyzed: śivaḥ eva hi sā yasmāt saṃvidaḥ kā viśiṣṭa tā
kaumbha kārī tu saṃvittiḥ avaccheda avabhāsanāt
bhinna kalpāḥ yadi kṣepyāḥ daṇḍa cakra ādi madhyataḥ
tasmāt ekaika nirmāṇe śivaḥ viśva eka vigrahaḥ

original: AbhT_9.39a/. karteti puṃsaḥ kartṛtvābhimāno@pi vibhoḥ kṛtiḥ /
analyzed: kartā iti puṃsaḥ kartṛ tva abhimānaḥ api vibhoḥ kṛtiḥ
atas eva tathā ābhāna parama artha tayā sthiteḥ

original: AbhT_9.40a/. kāryakāraṇabhāvasya loke śāstre ca citratā /
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya loke śāstre ca citra tā
māyā atas vyakta kalayoḥ iti rauravasaṃgrahe
śrī pūrve tu kalā tattvāt avyaktam iti kathyate
tatas eva niśā ākhyānāt kalībhūtāt aliṅgakam
iti vyākhyā asmad uktā ismin sati nyāya iti niṣphalā

original: AbhT_9.42b/. loke ca gomayātkīṭāt saṃkalpātsvapnataḥ smṛteḥ // 42
analyzed: loke ca gomayāt kīṭāt saṃkalpāt svapnataḥ smṛteḥ
yogi icchātaḥ dravya mantra prabhāva ādeḥ ca vṛścikaḥ

original: AbhT_9.43b/. anya eva sa cet kāmaṃ kutaścitsvaviśeṣataḥ // 43
analyzed: anyaḥ eva sa ced kāmam kutaścid sva viśeṣataḥ

original: AbhT_9.44a/. sa tu sarvatra tulyastatparāmarśaikyamasti tu /
analyzed: sa tu sarvatra tulyaḥ tad parāmarśa aikyam asti tu

original: AbhT_9.44b/. tata eva svarūpe@pi krame@pyanyādṛśī sthitiḥ // 44
analyzed: tatas eva svarūpe api krame pi anyādṛśī sthitiḥ
śāstreṣu yujyate citrāt tathā bhāva svabhāvataḥ

original: AbhT_9.46a/. niyatirnāsti vairiñce kalordhve niyatiḥ śratā /
analyzed: niyatiḥ na asti vairiñce kalā ūrdhve niyatiḥ

original: AbhT_9.47a/. kālo māyeti kathitaḥ kramaḥ kiraṇaśāstragaḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ māyā iti kathitaḥ kramaḥ kiraṇa śāstra gaḥ
pumān niyatyā kālaḥ ca rāga vidyā kalā anvitaḥ

original: AbhT_9.48a/. ityeṣa krama uddiṣṭo mātaṅge pārameśvare /
analyzed: iti eṣa kramaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ mātaṅge pārameśvare
kārya kāraṇa bhāvīye tattve ittham vyavasthite
śrī pūrvaśāstre kathitām vacmaḥ kāraṇa kalpanām
eka ekatra api tattve smin sarva śakti su nirbhare

original: AbhT_9.52a/. tattatprādhānyayogena sa sa bhedo nirūpyate /
analyzed: tad tad prādhānya yogena sa sa bhedaḥ nirūpyate
tathā hi sva svatantra tva paripūrṇa tayā vibhuḥ
niḥsaṃkhyaiḥ bahubhiḥ rūpaiḥ bhāti avaccheda varjanāt
śāṃbhavāḥ śakti jāḥ mantramaheśāḥ mantranāyakāḥ

original: AbhT_9.54a/. mantrā iti viśuddhāḥ syuramī pañca gaṇāḥ kramāt /
analyzed: mantrāḥ iti viśuddhāḥ syuḥ amī pañca gaṇāḥ kramāt

original: AbhT_9.54b/. svasminsvasmin gaṇe bhāti yadyadrūpaṃ samanvayi // 54
analyzed: svasmin svasmin gaṇe bhāti yat yat rūpam samanvayi
tat eṣu tattvam iti uktam kālāgni ādeḥ dharā ādi vat
tena yat prāhuḥ ākhyāna sādṛśyena viḍambitāḥ
guru upāsām vinā eva ātta pustaka abhīṣṭa dṛṣṭayaḥ

original: AbhT_9.56b/. brahmā nivṛttyadhipatiḥ pṛthaktattvaṃ na gaṇyate // 56
analyzed: brahmā nivṛtti adhipatiḥ pṛthak tattvam na gaṇyate

original: AbhT_9.57a/. sadāśivādyāstu pṛthag gaṇyanta iti ko nayaḥ /
analyzed: sadāśiva ādyāḥ tu pṛthak gaṇyante iti kaḥ nayaḥ
brahma viṣṇu hara īśāna suśiva anāśrita ātmani
ṣaṭke kāraṇa saṃjñā irdhajaratī iyam iyam kutas

original: AbhT_9.58b/. iti tanmūlato dhvastaṃ gaṇitaṃ nahi kāraṇam // 58
analyzed: iti tat mūlataḥ dhvastam gaṇitam nahi kāraṇam
yathā pṛthivī adhipatiḥ nṛpaḥ tattva antaram nahi

original: AbhT_9.59b/. tathā tattatkaleśānaḥ pṛthak tattvāntaraṃ katham // 59
analyzed: tathā tat tat kalā īśānaḥ pṛthak tattva antaram katham
tat evam pañcakam idam śuddha ūdhvā paribhāṣyate
tatra sākṣāt śiva icchā eva kartri ābhāsita bhedikā
saṃvibhaktum aghora īśaḥ sṛjati iha sitetaram

original: AbhT_9.62a/. aṇūnāṃ lolikā nāma niṣkarmā yābhilāṣitā /
analyzed: aṇūnām lolikā nāma niṣkarmā yā abhilāṣitā
apūrṇaṃmanya tā jñānam malam
yogyatā mātram eva etat bhāvi avaccheda saṃgrahe
malaḥ tena asya na pṛthak tattva bhāvaḥ asti rāga vat
niravaccheda karma aṃśa mātra avacchedataḥ tu sā

original: AbhT_9.64b/. rāgaḥ puṃsi dhiyo dharmaḥ karmabhedavicitratā // 64
analyzed: rāgaḥ puṃsi dhiyaḥ dharmaḥ karma bheda vicitra tā
apūrṇam anya tā ca iyam tathārūpa avabhāsanam

original: AbhT_9.65b/. svatantrasya śivasyecchā ghaṭarūpo yathā ghaṭaḥ // 65
analyzed: svatantrasya śivasya icchā ghaṭa rūpaḥ yathā ghaṭaḥ
sva ātma pracchādana icchā eva vastu bhūtaḥ tathā malaḥ
yathā eva avyatiriktasya dharā ādeḥ bhāvitātma tā

original: AbhT_9.67a/. tathaivāsyeti śāstreṣu vyatiriktaḥ sthito malaḥ /
analyzed: tathā eva asya iti śāstreṣu vyatiriktaḥ sthitaḥ malaḥ

original: AbhT_9.67b/. vyatiriktaḥ svatantrastu na ko@pi śakaṭādivat // 67
analyzed: vyatiriktaḥ svatantraḥ tu na kaḥ api śakaṭa ādi vat

original: AbhT_9.68a/. tatsadvitīyā sāśuddhiḥ śivamuktāṇugā na kim /
analyzed: tad sa dvitīyā sā aśuddhiḥ śiva mukta aṇugā na kim

original: AbhT_9.68b/. malasya roddhrī kāpyasti śaktiḥ sa cāpyamuktagā // 68
analyzed: malasya roddhrī kā api asti śaktiḥ sa ca api amukta gā
iti nyāya ujjhitaḥ vādaḥ śraddhā mātra eka kalpitaḥ

original: AbhT_9.69b/. roddhrī śaktirjaḍasyāsau svayaṃ naiva pravartate // 69
analyzed: roddhrī śaktiḥ jaḍasya asau svayam nā eva pravartate

original: AbhT_9.70a/. svayaṃ pravṛttau viśvaṃ syāttathā ceśanikā pramā /
analyzed: svayam pravṛttau viśvam syāt tathā ca īśanikā pramā

original: AbhT_9.70b/. malasya roddhrīṃ tāṃ śaktimīśaścetsaṃyunakti tat // 70
analyzed: malasya roddhrīm tām śaktim īśaḥ ced saṃyunakti tat

original: AbhT_9.71a/. kīdṛśaṃ pratyaṇumiti praśne nāstyuttaraṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: kīdṛśam pratyaṇum iti praśne na asti uttaram vacaḥ
malaḥ ca āvaraṇam tat ca na āvāryasya viśeṣakam
upalambham vihanti etat ghaṭasya iva paṭa āvṛtiḥ
malena āvṛta rūpāṇām aṇūnām yat sa tattvakam

original: AbhT_9.73a/. śiva eva ca tatpaśyettasyaivāsau malo bhavet /
analyzed: śive eva ca tat paśyet tasya eva asau malaḥ bhavet
vibhoḥ jñāna kriyā mātra sārasya aṇu gaṇasya ca
tad abhāvaḥ malaḥ rūpa dhvaṃsāya eva prakalpate

original: AbhT_9.74b/. dharmāddharmiṇi yo bhedaḥ samavāyena caikatā // 74
analyzed: dharmāt dharmiṇi yaḥ bhedaḥ samavāyena ca eka tā
na tat bhavadbhiḥ uditam kaṇabhojana śiṣya vat

original: AbhT_9.75b/. nāmūrtena na mūrtena prāvarītuṃ ca śakyate // 75
analyzed: na amūrtena na mūrtena prāvarītum ca śakyate
jñānam cākṣuṣa raśmīnām tathā abhāve sarati api

original: AbhT_9.76b/. sa eva ca malo mūrtaḥ kiṃ jñānena na vedyate // 76
analyzed: saḥ eva ca malaḥ mūrtaḥ kim jñānena na vedyate

original: AbhT_9.77a/. sarvageṇa tataḥ sarvaḥ sarvajñatvaṃ na kiṃ bhajet /
analyzed: sarvageṇa tatas sarvaḥ sarvajña tvam na kim bhajet
yaḥ ca dhvāntāt prakāśasya āvṛtiḥ tad pratighātibhiḥ
mūrtānām pratighaḥ tejaḥ ṇūnām na amūrtaḥ īdṛśam

original: AbhT_9.78b/. na ca cetanamātmānamasvatantro malaḥ kṣamaḥ // 78
analyzed: na ca cetanam ātmānam asvatantraḥ malaḥ kṣamaḥ

original: AbhT_9.79a/. āvarītuṃ na cācyaṃ ca madyāvṛtinidarśanam /
analyzed: āvarītum na ca ācyam ca madya āvṛti nidarśanam

original: AbhT_9.79b/. uktaṃ bhavadbhirevetthaṃ jaḍaḥ kartā nahi svayam // 79
analyzed: uktam bhavadbhiḥ evā ittham jaḍaḥ kartā na hi svayam
svatantrasya īśvarasya etāḥ śaktayaḥ prerikāḥ kila
atas karma vipāka jña prabhu śakti bala īritam
sūte

original: AbhT_9.81b/. na ceśapreritaḥ puṃso mala āvṛṇuyādyataḥ // 81
analyzed: na ca īśa preritaḥ puṃsaḥ malaḥ āvṛṇuyāt yatas

original: AbhT_9.82a/. nirmale puṃsi neśasya prerakatvaṃ tathocitam /
analyzed: nirmale puṃsi na īśasya preraka tvam tathā ucitam

original: AbhT_9.82b/. tulye nirmalabhāve ca prerayeyurna te katham // 82
analyzed: tulye nirmala bhāve ca prerayeyuḥ na te katham

original: AbhT_9.83a/. tamīśaṃ prati yuktaṃ yad bhūyasāṃ syātsadharmatā /
analyzed: tam īśam prati yuktam yat bhūyasām syāt sadharma tā
tena svarūpa svātantrya mātram mala vijṛmbhitam
nirṇītam vitatam ca etat mayā anyatra iti alam punar
mala abhilāṣaḥ ca ajñānam avidyā lolikā prathā
bhava doṣa unuplavaḥ ca glāniḥ śoṣaḥ vimūḍha tā
aham mama ātma tā ātaṅkaḥ māyā śaktiḥ atha āvṛtiḥ
ityādi anvartha saṃjñābhiḥ tatra tatra eṣa bhaṇyate

original: AbhT_9.87a/. asmin sati bhavati bhavo duṣṭo bhedātmaneti bhavadoṣaḥ /
analyzed: asmin sati bhavati bhavaḥ duṣṭaḥ bheda ātmanā iti bhava doṣaḥ
mañca vat asmin duḥkha srotaḥ ṇūn vahati yat plavaḥ tena
śeṣāḥ tu sugama rūpāḥ śabdāḥ tatra artham ūhayet ucitam
caturdaśavidham bhūta vaiciatryam karma jam yatas
atas eva sāṃkhya yoga pāñcarātra ādi śāsane
aham mama iti saṃtyāgaḥ naiṣkarmyāya upadiśyate
niṣkarmā hi sthite mūlam alepya jñāna nāmani
vaicitrya kāraṇa abhāvāt na ūrdhva sarati na api adhas
kevalam pārimityena śiva abhedam a saṃspṛśan

original: AbhT_9.92b/. sa punaḥ śāṃbhavecchātaḥ śivābhedaṃ parāmṛśan // 92
analyzed: sa punar śāṃbhava icchātaḥ śiva abhedam parāmṛśan
kramāt mantreśa tad netṛ rūpaḥ yāti śiva ātma tām
nanu kāraṇam etasya karmaṇaḥ ced malaḥ katham

original: AbhT_9.94a/. sa vijñānākalasyāpi na sūte karmasaṃtatim /
analyzed: sa vijñānākalasya api na sūte karma saṃtatim

original: AbhT_9.94b/. maivaṃ sa hi malo jñānākale didhvaṃsiṣuḥ katham // 94
analyzed: mā evam sa hi malaḥ jñānākale didhvaṃsiṣuḥ katham
hetuḥ syāt dhvaṃsamāna tvam svātantryāt eva ca udbhavet
didhvaṃsi ṣudhvaṃsamāna dhvasta ākhyāsu tisṛṣu atha
daśāsu antar kṛta avasthā antarāsu sva krama sthiteḥ

original: AbhT_9.97a/. tataśca supte turye ca vakṣyate bahubhedatā /
analyzed: tatas ca supte turye ca vakṣyate bahu bheda tā
atas pradhvaṃsana aunmukhya khilībhūta sva śaktikaḥ
karmaṇaḥ hetutām etu malaḥ katham iva ucyatām

original: AbhT_9.98b/. kiṃ ca karmāpi na malādyataḥ karma kriyātmakam // 98
analyzed: kim ca karma api na mala ādi atas karma kriyā ātmakam

original: AbhT_9.99a/. kriyā ca kartṛtārūpāt svātantryānna punarmalāt /
analyzed: kriyā ca kartṛ tā rūpāt svātantryāt na punar malāt
yā tu asya karmaṇaḥ citra phalada tvena karma tā

original: AbhT_9.100a/. prasiddhā sā na saṃkocaṃ vinātmani malaśca saḥ /
analyzed: prasiddhā sā na saṃkocam vinā ātmani malaḥ ca saḥ

original: AbhT_9.100b/. vicitraṃ hi phalaṃ bhinnaṃ bhogyatvenābhimanyate // 100
analyzed: vicitram hi phalam bhinnam bhogya tvena abhimanyate
bhoktari ātmani tena iyam bheda rūpā vyavasthitiḥ
iti sva kārya prasave sahakāri tvam āśrayan
sāmarthya vyañjaka tvena karmaṇaḥ kāraṇam malaḥ
nanu evam karma sadbhāvāt malasya api sthiteḥ katham

original: AbhT_9.103a/. vijñānākalatā tasya saṃkoco hyasti tādṛśaḥ /
analyzed: vijñānākala tā tasya saṃkocaḥ hi asti tādṛśaḥ
mā evam adhvasta saṃkocā upi asau bhāvanayā dṛḍham
na aham kartā iti manvānaḥ karma saṃskāram ujjhati

original: AbhT_9.104b/. phaliṣyatīdaṃ karmeti yā dṛḍhā vṛttirātmani // 104
analyzed: phaliṣyati idam karma iti yā dṛḍhā vṛttiḥ ātmani

original: AbhT_9.105a/. sa saṃskāraḥ phalāyeha na tu smaraṇakāraṇam /
analyzed: sa saṃskāraḥ phalāya iha na tu smaraṇa kāraṇam

original: AbhT_9.105b/. apradhvaste@pi saṃkoce nāhaṃ karteti bhāvanāt // 105
analyzed: a pradhvasta ipi saṃkoce na aham kartā iti bhāvanāt

original: AbhT_9.106a/. na phalaṃ kṣīvamūḍhādeḥ prāyaścitte@tha vā kṛte /
analyzed: na phalam kṣīva mūḍha ādeḥ vā kṛte

original: AbhT_9.106b/. yanmayādya tapastaptaṃ tadasmai syāditi sphuṭam // 106
analyzed: yat mayā adya tapaḥ taptam tat asmai syāt iti sphuṭam
abhisaṃdhimataḥ karma na phalet abhisandhitaḥ

original: AbhT_9.107b/. tathābhisaṃdhānākhyāṃ tu mānase karma saṃskriyām // 107
analyzed: tathā abhisaṃdhāna ākhyām tu mānase karma saṃskriyām
phala uparaktām vidadhat kalpate phala sampade
yaḥ tu tatra api dārḍhyena phala saṃskāram ujjhati
sa tad phala tyāga kṛtam viśiṣṭam phalam aśnute

original: AbhT_9.109b/. anayā paripāṭyā yaḥ samastāṃ karmasaṃtatim // 109
analyzed: anayā paripāṭyā yaḥ samastām karma saṃtatim
an ahaṃyu tayā projjhet sa saṃkocaḥ api sa ukalaḥ
nanu ittham duṣkṛtam kiṃcid ātmīyam abhisaṃdhitaḥ

original: AbhT_9.111a/. parasmai syānna vijñātaṃ bhavatā tāttvikaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: parasmai syāt na vijñātam bhavatā tāttvikam vacaḥ
tasya bhoktuḥ tathā ced syāt abhisaṃdhiḥ yathā ātmani
tat avaśyam parasya api sataḥ tat duṣkṛtam bhavet
para abhisaṃdhi saṃvittau sva abhisaṃdhiḥ dṛḍhībhavet
abhisaṃdhāna virahe tu asya no phala yogi tā

original: AbhT_9.113b/. na me duṣkṛtamityeṣā rūḍhistasyāphalāya sā // 113
analyzed: na me duṣkṛtam iti eṣā rūḍhiḥ tasya aphalāya sā
para abhisandhi vicchede sva ātmanā anabhisaṃhitau
dvayoḥ api phalam na syāt nāśa hetu vyavasthiteḥ
sukha hetau sukhe ca asya sāmānyāt abhisaṃdhitaḥ
nirviśeṣāt api nyāyyā dharma ādi phala bhoktṛ tā

original: AbhT_9.116a/. duḥkhaṃ me duḥkhaheturvā stādityeṣa punarna tu /
analyzed: duḥkham me duḥkha hetuḥ vā stād iti eṣa punar na tu
sāmānyaḥ api abhisaṃdhiḥ syāt tad adharmasya na āgamaḥ
prakṛtam brūmahe jñānākalasya ukta carasya yat
an ahaṃyu tayā sarvāḥ vilīnāḥ karma saṃskriyāḥ

original: AbhT_9.118a/. tasmādasya na karmāsti kasyāpi sahakāritām /
analyzed: tasmāt asya na karma asti kasya api sahakāri tām
malaḥ karotu tena ayam dhvaṃsamāna tvam aśnute
apadhvasta malaḥ tu antar śiva āveśa vaśīkṛtaḥ
ahaṃbhāva paropyeti na karma adhīna vṛtti tām
uktam śrī pūrvaśāstre ca tat etat parameśinā
malam ajñānam icchanti saṃsāra aṅkura kāraṇam
dharma adharma ātmakam karma sukha duḥkha ādi lakṣaṇam
lakṣayet sukha duḥkha ādi svam kārya hetu bhāvataḥ

original: AbhT_9.122a/. nahi hetuḥ kadāpyāste vinā kārya nijaṃ kvacit /
analyzed: nahi hetuḥ kadāpi āste vinā kārya nijam kvacid
hetutā yogyatā eva asau phala ānantarya bhāvitā

original: AbhT_9.123a/. pūrvakasya tu hetutvaṃ pāramparyeṇa kiṃ ca tat /
analyzed: pūrvakasya tu hetu tvam pāramparyeṇa kim ca tat
lakṣyate sukha duḥkha ādyaiḥ samāne dṛṣṭa kāraṇe
citraiḥ hetu antaram kiṃcid tat ca karma iha darśanāt
sva aṅge prasāda raukṣya ādi jāyamānam sva karmaṇā
dṛṣṭam iti anya deha stham kāraṇam karma kalpyāte
iha api anya anya deha sthe sphuṭam karma phale yatas

original: AbhT_9.126a/. kṛṣikarma madhau bhogaḥ śaradyanyā ca sā tanuḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣi karma madhau bhogaḥ śaradi anyā ca sā tanuḥ
anusaṃdhātuḥ ekasya saṃbhavaḥ tu yatas tatas

original: AbhT_9.127a/. tasyaiva tatphalaṃ citraṃ karma yasya purātanam /
analyzed: tasya eva tat phalam citram karma yasya purātanam
rājā sūdam ced ādiśet prātar īdṛśam
bhojaya iti anusaṃdhānāt vinā prāpnoti tad phalam
ittham janma antara upātta karmā api adya anusaṃdhinā

original: AbhT_9.129a/. vinā bhuṅkte phalaṃ hetustatra prācyā hyakampatā /
analyzed: vinā bhuṅkte phalam hetuḥ tatra prācyā hi akampatā

original: AbhT_9.129b/. ata eva kṛtaṃ karma karmaṇā tapasāpi vā // 129
analyzed: atas eva kṛtam karma karmaṇā tapasā api vā
jñānena vā nirudhyeta phala pākeṣu an unmukham

original: AbhT_9.130b/. ārabdhakāryaṃ dehe@smin yatpunaḥ karma tatkatham // 130
analyzed: ārabdha kāryam dehe ismin yat punar karma tat katham
ucchidyatām antya daśam niroddhum nahi śakyate

original: AbhT_9.131b/. tatraiva dehe yattvanyadadyagaṃ vā purātanam // 131
analyzed: tatra eva dehe yat tu anyat adya gam vā purātanam
karma tad jñāna dīkṣā ādyaiḥ śaṇḍhīkartum prasahyate

original: AbhT_9.132b/. tathā saṃskāradārḍhya hi phalāya dṛḍhatā punaḥ // 132
analyzed: tathā saṃskāra dārḍhya hi phalāya dṛḍha tā punar

original: AbhT_9.133a/. yadā yadā vinaśyeta karmadhvastaṃ tadā tadā /
analyzed: yadā yadā vinaśyeta karma dhvastam tadā tadā
atas moha para adhīnaḥ yadi api akṛta kiṃcana
tathā api jñāna kāle tat sarvam eva pradahyate
uktam ca sarva dṛś ulvaṇaḥ
muhūrtāt nirdahet sarva deha stham akṛtam kṛtam
deha stham iti dehena saha tādātmyam āśritā
svācchandyāt saṃvid eva uktā tatrastham karma dahyate
deha aikya vāsanā tyāgāt sa ca viśva ātma tā sthiteḥ

original: AbhT_9.137a/. akālakalite vyāpinyabhinne yā hi saṃskriyā /
analyzed: akāla kalite vyāpini abhinne yā hi saṃskriyā

original: AbhT_9.137b/. saṃkoca eva sānena so@pi dehaikatāmayaḥ // 137
analyzed: saṃkocaḥ eva sā anena saḥ api deha eka tā mayaḥ

original: AbhT_9.138a/. etatkārmamalaṃ proktaṃ yena sākaṃ layākalāḥ /
analyzed: etat kārma malam proktam yena sākam layākalāḥ
syuḥ guhā gahana antar sthāḥ suptāḥ iva sarīsṛpāḥ
tatas prabuddha saṃskārāḥ te yathā ucita bhāginaḥ
brahma ādi sthāvara ante smin punar punar
ye punar karma saṃskāra hānyai prārabdha bhāvanāḥ
bhāvanā pariniṣpattim a prāpya pralayam gatāḥ
mahāntam te tathā antaḥstha bhāvanā pāka sauṣṭhavāt

original: AbhT_9.141b/. mantratvaṃ pratipadyante citrāccitraṃ ca karmataḥ // 141
analyzed: mantra tvam pratipadyante citrāt citram ca karmataḥ
asya kārma malasya iyat māyā anta adhva visāriṇaḥ
pradhānam kāraṇam proktam ajñāna ātmā āṇavaḥ malaḥ
kṣobhaḥ usya lolikā ākhyasya sahakāri tayā sphuṭam
tiṣṭhā sā yogya tā aunmukhyam īśvara icchā vaśāt ca tat

original: AbhT_9.144a/. na jaḍaścidadhiṣṭhānaṃ vinā kvāpi kṣamo yataḥ /
analyzed: na jaḍaḥ cit adhiṣṭhānam vinā kvāpi kṣamaḥ yatas
aṇavaḥ nāma na eva anya prakāśa ātmā maheśvaraḥ

original: AbhT_9.145b/. cidrūpatvācca sa vyāpī nirguṇo niṣkriyastataḥ // 145
analyzed: cit rūpa tvāt ca sa vyāpī nirguṇaḥ niṣkriyaḥ tatas
yoga upāya īpsakaḥ nityaḥ mūrtivandhyaḥ prabhāṣyate
acit tvāt ajña tā bhedaḥ bhogyāt bhoktṛ antarāt atha
teṣām aṇūnām sa malaḥ īśvara icchā vaśāt bhṛśam

original: AbhT_9.147b/. prabudhyate tathā coktaṃ śāstre śrīpūrvanāmani // 147
analyzed: prabudhyate tathā ca uktam śāstre śrī pūrva nāmani
īśvara icchā vaśāt asya bhoga icchā saṃprajāyate
bhoga icchoḥ upakāra artham ādyaḥ mantramaheśvaraḥ

original: AbhT_9.149a/. māyāṃ vikṣobhya saṃsāraṃ nirmimīte vicitrakam /
analyzed: māyām vikṣobhya saṃsāram nirmimīte vicitrakam

original: AbhT_9.149b/. māyā ca nāma devasya śaktiravyatirekiṇī // 149
analyzed: māyā ca nāma devasya śaktiḥ avyatirekiṇī

original: AbhT_9.150a/. bhedāvabhāsasvātantryaṃ tathāhi sa tayā kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: bheda avabhāsa svātantryam tathā hi sa tayā kṛtaḥ
ādyaḥ bheda avabhāsaḥ yaḥ vibhāgam anupeyivān
garbhīkṛta ananta bhāvi vibhāsā sā parā niśā

original: AbhT_9.151b/. sā jaḍā bhedarūpatvāt kāryaṃ cāsyā jaḍaṃ yataḥ // 151
analyzed: sā jaḍā bheda rūpa tvāt kāryam ca asyāḥ jaḍam yatas
vyāpinī viśva hetu tvāt sūkṣmā kārya eka kalpanāt
śiva śakti avinābhāvāt nityā ekā mūla kāraṇam

original: AbhT_9.153a/. acetanamanekātma sarva kārya yathā ghaṭaḥ /
analyzed: acetanam aneka ātma yathā ghaṭaḥ

original: AbhT_9.153b/. pradhānaṃ ca tathā tasmāt kārya nātmā tu cetanaḥ // 153
analyzed: pradhānam ca tathā tasmāt kārya na ātmā tu cetanaḥ

original: AbhT_9.154a/. ata evādhvani proktā pūrvaṃ māyā dvidhā sthitā /
analyzed: atas eva adhvani proktā pūrvam māyā dvidhā sthitā

original: AbhT_9.154b/. yathā ca māyā devasya śaktirabhyeti bhedinam // 154
analyzed: yathā ca māyā devasya śaktiḥ abhyeti bhedinam
tattva bhāvam tathā anyaḥ api kalā ādiḥ tattva vistaraḥ
niruddha śakteḥ yā kiṃcitkartṛtā udvalana ātmikā

original: AbhT_9.156a/. nāthasya śaktiḥ sādhastātpuṃsaḥ kṣeptrī kalocyate /
analyzed: nāthasya śaktiḥ sā adhastāt puṃsaḥ kṣeptrī kalā ucyate
evam vidyā ādayaḥ upyete dharā antāḥ paramārthataḥ
tathā api yat pṛthak bhānam kalā ādeḥ īśvara icchayā

original: AbhT_9.158a/. tato jaḍatve kāryatve pṛthaktattvasthitau dhruvam /
analyzed: tatas jaḍa tve kārya tve pṛthak tattva sthitau dhruvam

original: AbhT_9.158b/. upādānaṃ smṛtā māyā kvacittatkāryameva ca // 158
analyzed: upādānam smṛtā māyā kvacid tad kāryam eva ca
tathā avabhāsa citram ca rūpam anyonya varjitam

original: AbhT_9.159b/. yadbhāti kila saṃkalpe tadasti ghaṭavadvahiḥ // 159
analyzed: yat bhāti kila saṃkalpe tat asti ghaṭa vat vahis
khapuṣpa ādi astitām brūmaḥ tatas na vyabhicāri tā
dharā ādi vat tathā atyanta abhāvaḥ api evam vivicyatām

original: AbhT_9.161b/. yatsaṃkalpyaṃ tathā tasya bahirdeho@sti cetanaḥ // 161
analyzed: yat saṃkalpyam tathā tasya bahis dehaḥ usti cetanaḥ
caitra vat sauśiva antam tat sarva tādṛśa dehavat

original: AbhT_9.162b/. yasya deho yathā tasya tajjātīyaṃ puraṃ bahiḥ // 162
analyzed: yasya dehaḥ yathā tasya tad jātīyam puram bahis
ātmanām tat puram prāpyam deśa tvāt anya deśa vat
ātmanām adhva bhoktṛ tvam tatas yatnena siddhi ati

original: AbhT_9.164b/. sā māyā kṣobhamāpannā viśvaṃ sūte samantataḥ // 164
analyzed: sā māyā kṣobham āpannā viśvam sūte samantataḥ
daṇḍa āhatā iva āmalakī phalāni kila yadi api
tathā api tu tathā citra paurvāparya avabhāsanāt
māyā kārye api tattva oghe kārya kāraṇa tā mithas

original: AbhT_9.166b/. sā yadyapyanyaśāstreṣu bahudhā dṛśyate sphuṭam // 166
analyzed: sā yadi api anya śāstreṣu bahudhā dṛśyate sphuṭam
tathā api mālinīśāstra dṛśā tām saṃpracakṣmahe
kalā ādi vasudhā antam yat māyā antar saṃpracakṣate
pratyātma bhinnam eva etat sukha duḥkha ādi bhedataḥ
ekasyām eva jagati bhoga sādhana saṃhatau

original: AbhT_9.169a/. sukhādīnāṃ samaṃ vyakterbhogabhedaḥ kuto bhavet /
analyzed: sukha ādīnām samam vyakteḥ bhoga bhedaḥ kutas bhavet
na ca asau karma bhedena tasya eva anupapattitaḥ

original: AbhT_9.170a/. tasmāt kalādiko vargo bhinna eva kadācana /
analyzed: tasmāt kalā ādikaḥ vargaḥ bhinnaḥ eva kadācana
aikyam eti īśvara icchātaḥ nṛtta gīta ādi vādane
eṣām kalā ādi tattvānām sarveṣām api bhāvinām
śuddha tvam asti teṣām ye śaktipāta pavitritāḥ

original: AbhT_9.172a/. kalā hi śuddhā tattādṛk karmatvaṃ saṃprasūyate /
analyzed: kalā hi śuddhā tat tādṛś karma tvam saṃprasūyate
mitam api āśu yena asmāt saṃsārāt eṣa mucyate
rāga vidyā kāla yati prakṛti akṣa artha saṃcayaḥ

original: AbhT_9.173b/. itthaṃ śuddha iti procya gururmānastutau vibhuḥ // 173
analyzed: ittham śuddhaḥ iti procya guruḥ māna stutau vibhuḥ
evam eṣā kalā ādīnām utpattiḥ pravivicyate

original: AbhT_9.175a/. māyā hi cinmayādbhedaṃ śivādvidadhatī paśoḥ /
analyzed: māyā hi cit mayāt bhedam śivāt vidadhatī paśoḥ
suṣupta tām iva ādhatte tatas eva hi adṛkkriyaḥ

original: AbhT_9.176a/. kalā hi kiṃcitkartṛtvaṃ sūte svāliṅganādaṇoḥ /
analyzed: kalā hi kiṃcitkartṛtvam sūte sva āliṅganāt aṇoḥ
tasyāḥ ca api aṇunā anyonyam hi añjane sā prasūyate

original: AbhT_9.177b/. śliṣyantyapi ca no sūte tathāpi svaphalaṃ kvacit // 177
analyzed: śliṣyanti api ca no sūte tathā api sva phalam kvacid
ucchūna tā iva prathamā sūkṣma aṅkura kalā iva ca
bījasya ambu agni mṛd kambu tuṣa yogāt prasūti kṛt
kalā māyā aṇu saṃyoga jā api eṣā nirvikārakam

original: AbhT_9.179b/. nāṇuṃ kuryādupādānaṃ kiṃtu māyāṃ vikāriṇīm // 179
analyzed: na aṇum kuryāt upādānam kiṃtu māyām vikāriṇīm
malaḥ ca āvārakaḥ māyā bhāva upādāna kāraṇam

original: AbhT_9.180b/. karma syāt sahakāryeva sukhaduḥkhodbhavaṃ prati // 180
analyzed: karma syāt sahakāri eva sukha duḥkha udbhavam prati
kalā eva ananta nāthasya śaktyā saṃpreritā jaḍā
na ca īśa śaktiḥ evā asya caitanyam balayiṣyati

original: AbhT_9.182b/. tadupodbalitaṃ taddhi na kiṃcitkartṛtāṃ vrajet // 182
analyzed: tat upodbalitam tat hi na kiṃcitkartṛtām vrajet

original: AbhT_9.183a/. seyaṃ kalā na karaṇaṃ mukhyaṃ vidyādikaṃ yathā /
analyzed: sā iyam kalā na karaṇam mukhyam vidyā ādikam yathā

original: AbhT_9.183b/. puṃsi kartari sā kartrī prayojakatayā yataḥ // 183
analyzed: puṃsi kartari sā kartrī prayojaka tayā yatas
alakṣya antarayoḥ ittham yadā puṃs kalayoḥ bhavet
tadā māyā puṃs vivekaḥ sarva karma kṣayāt bhavet
vijñānāka latā māyā adhastāt no yāti adhas pumān
dhī puṃs viveke vijñāte pradhāna puruṣa antare

original: AbhT_9.186b/. api na kṣīṇakarmā syāt kalāyāṃ taddhi saṃbhavet // 186
analyzed: api na kṣīṇa karmā syāt kalāyām tat hi saṃbhavet

original: AbhT_9.187a/. ataḥ sāṃkhyadṛśā siddhaḥ pradhānādho na saṃsaret /
analyzed: atas sāṃkhya dṛśā siddhaḥ pradhāna adhas na saṃsaret

original: AbhT_9.187b/. kalāpuṃsorviveke tu māyādho naiva gacchati // 187
analyzed: kalā puṃsoḥ viveke tu māyā adhas nā eva gacchati
malāt viviktam ātmānam paśyan tu śiva tām vrajet
sarvatra ca aiśvaraḥ śaktipātaḥ utra sahakāraṇam
sā iyam kalā kārya bhedāt anyā eva hi anumīyate
anyathā ekam bhavet viśvam kāryāya iti anya nihnavaḥ

original: AbhT_9.190b/. iti mataṅgaśāstrādau yā proktā sā kalā svayam // 190
analyzed: iti mataṅgaśāstra ādau yā proktā sā kalā svayam
kiṃcid rūpa tayā ākṣipya kartṛ tvam iti bhaṅgitaḥ

original: AbhT_9.191b/. kiṃcidrūpaviśiṣṭaṃ yat kartṛtvaṃ tatkathaṃ bhavet // 191
analyzed: kiṃcid rūpa viśiṣṭam yat kartṛ tvam tat katham bhavet

original: AbhT_9.192a/. ajñasyeti tataḥ sūte kiṃcijjñatvātmikāṃ vidam /
analyzed: ajñasya iti tatas sūte kiṃcid jña tva ātmikām vidam

original: AbhT_9.192b/. buddhiṃ paśyati sā vidyā buddhidarpaṇacāriṇaḥ // 192
analyzed: buddhim paśyati sā vidyā buddhi darpaṇa cāriṇaḥ
sukha ādīn pratyayān moha prabhṛtīn kārya kāraṇe

original: AbhT_9.193b/. karmajālaṃ ca tatrasthaṃ vivinakti nijātmanā // 193
analyzed: karma jālam ca tatrastham vivinakti nija ātmanā

original: AbhT_9.194a/. buddhistu guṇasaṃkīrṇā vivekena kathaṃ sukham /
analyzed: buddhiḥ tu guṇa saṃkīrṇā vivekena katham sukham

original: AbhT_9.194b/. duḥkhaṃ mohātmakaṃ vāpi viṣayaṃ darśayedapi // 194
analyzed: duḥkham moha ātmakam vā api viṣayam darśayet api

original: AbhT_9.195a/. svacchāyāṃ dhiyi saṃkrāmanbhāvaḥ saṃvedyatāṃ katham /
analyzed: svacchāyām dhiyi saṃkrāman bhāvaḥ saṃvedya tām katham

original: AbhT_9.195b/. tayā vinaiti sāpyanyatkaraṇaṃ puṃsi kartari // 195
analyzed: tayā vinā eti sā api anyat karaṇam puṃsi kartari
nanu ca ubhayatas śubhra ādarśa daśīya dhī gatāt
puṃsprakāśāt bhāti bhāvaḥ mā evam tat pratibimbanam

original: AbhT_9.197a/. jaḍameva hi mukhyo@tha puṃsprakāśo@sya bhāsanam /
analyzed: jaḍam eva hi bhāsanam

original: AbhT_9.197b/. bahiḥsthasyaiva tasyāstu buddheḥ kiṃkalpanā kṛtā // 197
analyzed: bahis sthasya eva tasyāḥ tu buddheḥ kiṃkalpanā kṛtā
abheda bhūmiḥ eṣā ca bhedaḥ ca iha vicāryate
tasmāt buddhi gataḥ bhāvaḥ vidyā karaṇa gocaraḥ

original: AbhT_9.199a/. bhāvānāṃ pratibimbaṃ ca vedyaṃ dhīkalpanā tataḥ /
analyzed: bhāvānām pratibimbam ca vedyam dhī kalpanā tatas

original: AbhT_9.199b/. kiṃcittu kurute tasmānnūnamastyaparaṃ tu tat // 199
analyzed: kiṃcid tu kurute tasmāt nūnam asti aparam tu tat
rāgatattvam iti proktam yat tatra eva uparañjakam
na ca avairāgya mātram tat tatra api āsakti vṛttitaḥ
viraktau api tṛptasya sūkṣma rāga vyavasthiteḥ
kālaḥ tuṭi ādibhiḥ ca etat kartṛ tvam kalayati atas
kārya avacchedi kartṛ tvam kāla uvaśyam kaliṣyati
niyatiḥ yojanām dhatte viśiṣṭe kārya maṇḍale
vidyā rāgaḥ utha niyatiḥ kālaḥ ca etat catuṣṭayam

original: AbhT_9.204a/. māyā kalā rāgavidye kālo niyatireva ca /
analyzed: māyā kalā rāga vidye kālaḥ niyatiḥ eva ca
kañcukāni ṣaḍ uktāni saṃvidaḥ tad sthitau paśuḥ
deha puryaṣṭaka ādyeṣu vedyeṣu kila vedanam
etat ṣaṭka sa saṃkocam yat avedyam asau aṇuḥ

original: AbhT_9.206a/. uktaṃ śivatanuśāstre tadidaṃ bhaṅgyantareṇa punaḥ /
analyzed: uktam śivatanuśāstre tat idam bhaṅgī antareṇa punar
āvaraṇam sarva ātma gama śuddhiḥ anyā api ananya rūpā iva
śiva dahana kiraṇa jālaiḥ dāhya tvāt sā yatas nya rūpā eva
an idam pūrva tayā yat rañjayati nija ātmanā tatas unanyā

original: AbhT_9.208b/. tasya dvitīyacitiriva svacchasya niyujyate kalā ślakṣṇā // 208
analyzed: tasya dvitīya citiḥ iva su acchasya niyujyate kalā ślakṣṇā
anayā vidvasya paśoḥ upabhoga samartha tā bhavati
vidyā ca asya kalātaḥ śaraṇa antar dīpaka prabhā iva abhūt
sukha duḥkha saṃvidam yā vivinakti paśoḥ vibhāgena
rāgaḥ ca kalā tattvāt śuci vastra kaṣāya vat samutpannaḥ

original: AbhT_9.211a/. tyaktuṃ vāñchati na yataḥ saṃsṛtisukhasaṃvidānandam /
analyzed: tyaktum vāñchati na yatas saṃsṛti sukha saṃvid ānandam
evam avidyā malinaḥ samarthitaḥ triguṇa kañcuka balena
gahana upabhoga garbhe paśuḥ avaśam adhomukhaḥ patati

original: AbhT_9.212b/. etena malaḥ kathitaḥ kambukavadaṇoḥ kalādikaṃ tuṣavat // 212
analyzed: etena malaḥ kathitaḥ kambuka vat aṇoḥ kalā ādikam tuṣa vat
evam kalā ākhya tattvasya kiṃcitkartṛtva lakṣaṇe
viśeṣaṇa tayā yaḥ atra kiñcid bhāgaḥ tadā utthitam

original: AbhT_9.214b/. vedyamātraṃ sphuṭaṃ bhinnaṃ pradhānaṃ sūyate kalā // 214
analyzed: vedya mātram sphuṭam bhinnam pradhānam sūyate kalā

original: AbhT_9.215a/. samameva hi bhogyaṃ ca bhoktāraṃ ca prasūyate /
analyzed: samam eva hi bhogyam ca bhoktāram ca prasūyate
kalā bheda abhisaṃdhānāt a viyuktam parasparam
bhoktṛ bhogya ātma tā na syāt viyogāt ca parasparam

original: AbhT_9.216b/. vilīnāyāṃ ca tasyāṃ syānmāyāsyāpi na kiṃcana // 216
analyzed: vilīnāyām ca tasyām syāt māyā asya api na kiṃcana

original: AbhT_9.217b/. sūte kalā hi yugapattato@vyaktamiti sthitiḥ // 217
analyzed: sūte kalā hi yugapad tatas vyaktam iti sthitiḥ

original: AbhT_9.218a/. uktamatra vibhātyeṣa kramaḥ satyaṃ tathā hyalam /
analyzed: uktam atra vibhāti eṣa kramaḥ satyam tathā hi alam

original: AbhT_9.218b/. rajyamāno veda sarva vidaṃścāpyatra rajyate // 218
analyzed: rajyamānaḥ veda sarva vidan ca api atra rajyate
tathā api vastu sattā iyam iha asmābhiḥ nirūpitā

original: AbhT_9.219b/. tasyāṃ ca na kramaḥ ko@pi syādvā so@pi viparyayāt // 219
analyzed: tasyām ca na kramaḥ kaḥ api syāt vā saḥ api viparyayāt
tasmāt vipratipattim no kuryāt śāstra udite vidhau
evam saṃvedya mātram yat sukha duḥkha vimohataḥ
bhotsyate yat tatas proktam tad sāmya ātmakam āditas

original: AbhT_9.221b/. sukhaṃ sattvaṃ prakāśatvāt prakāśo hlāda ucyate // 221
analyzed: sukham sattvam prakāśa tvāt prakāśaḥ hlādaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_9.222a/. duḥkhaṃ rajaḥ kriyātmatvād kriyā hi tadatatkramaḥ /
analyzed: duḥkham rajaḥ kriyā ātma tvāt kriyā hi tad a tad kramaḥ
mohaḥ tamaḥ varaṇakaḥ prakāśa abhāva yogataḥ

original: AbhT_9.223a/. ta ete kṣobhamāpannā guṇāḥ kārya pratanvate /
analyzed: te ete kṣobham āpannāḥ guṇāḥ kārya pratanvate

original: AbhT_9.223b/. akṣubdhasya vijātīyaṃ na syāt kāryamadaḥ purā // 223
analyzed: akṣubdhasya vijātīyam na syāt kāryam adaḥ purā
uktam eva iti śāstre smin guṇān tattva antaram viduḥ
bhuvanam pṛthak eva atra darśitam guṇa bhedataḥ
īśvara icchā vaśa kṣubdha lolikam puruṣam prati

original: AbhT_9.225b/. bhoktṛtvāya svatantreśaḥ prakṛtiṃ kṣobhayed bhṛśam // 225
analyzed: bhoktṛ tvāya svatantra īśaḥ prakṛtim kṣobhayet bhṛśam

original: AbhT_9.226a/. tena yaccodyate sāṃkhyaṃ muktāṇuṃ prati kiṃ na sā /
analyzed: tena yat codyate sāṃkhyam mukta aṇum prati kim na sā

original: AbhT_9.226b/. sūte puṃso vikāritvāditi tannātra bādhakam // 226
analyzed: sūte puṃsaḥ vikāri tvāt iti tat na atra bādhakam

original: AbhT_9.227a/. guṇebhyo buddhitattvaṃ tat sarvato nirmalaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: guṇebhyaḥ buddhi tattvam tat sarvatas nirmalam tatas
puṃsprakāśaḥ sa pratibimba tvam ārchati
viṣaya pratibimbam ca tasyām akṣa kṛtam bahis

original: AbhT_9.229a/. vṛttirbodho bhavedbuddheḥ sā cāpyālambanaṃ dhruvam /
analyzed: vṛttiḥ bodhaḥ bhavet buddheḥ sā ca api ālambanam dhruvam
ātma saṃvid prakāśasya bodhaḥ usau tad jaḍaḥ api alam
buddheḥ ahaṃkṛt tādṛkṣe pratibimbita puṃskṛteḥ
prakāśe vedya kaluṣe yat aham manana ātma tā
tayā pañcavidhaḥ ca eṣa vāyuḥ saṃrambha rūpayā

original: AbhT_9.231b/. prerito jīvanāya syādanyathā maraṇaṃ punaḥ // 231
analyzed: preritaḥ jīvanāya syāt anyathā maraṇam punar
atas eva viśuddha ātma svātantrya ahaṃsvabhāvataḥ
akṛtrimāt idam tu anyat iti uktam kṛti śabdataḥ
iti ayam karaṇa skandhaḥ uhaṃkārasya nirūpitaḥ
tridhā asya prakṛti skandhaḥ sāttva rājasa tāmasaḥ
sattva pradhāna ahaṃkārāt bhoktṛ aṃśa sparśinaḥ sphuṭam

original: AbhT_9.234b/. manobuddhyakṣaṣaṭkaṃ tu jātaṃ bhedastu kathyate // 234
analyzed: manaḥ buddhi akṣa ṣaṭkam tu jātam bhedaḥ tu kathyate
manaḥ yat sarva viṣayam tena atra pravivakṣitam
sarva tanmātra kartṛ tvam viśeṣaṇam ahaṃkṛteḥ
buddhi ahaṃkṛt manaḥ prāhuḥ bodha saṃrabhaṇa eṣaṇe
karaṇam bāhya devaiḥ yat na eva api antar mukhaiḥ kṛtam
prāṇaḥ ca na antaḥkaraṇam jaḍa tvāt preraṇa ātmanaḥ

original: AbhT_9.238a/. avasāyo@bhimānaśca kalpanā ceti na kriyā /
analyzed: avasāya abhimānaḥ ca kalpanā ca iti na kriyā
eka rūpā tatas tri tvam yuktam antaḥkṛtau sphuṭam

original: AbhT_9.239a/. na ca buddhirasaṃvedyā karaṇatvānmano yathā /
analyzed: na ca buddhiḥ asaṃvedyā karaṇa tvāt manaḥ yathā
śabda tanmātra hetutva viśiṣṭā yā tu ahaṃkṛtiḥ

original: AbhT_9.240b/. sā śrotre karaṇaṃ yāvadghrāṇe gandhatvabhoditā // 240
analyzed: sā śrotre karaṇam yāvat ghrāṇe gandha tva bhoditā
bhautika tvam atas upi astu niyamāt viṣayeṣu alam
aham śṛṇomi paśyāmi jighrāmi ityādi saṃvidi
ahaṃtā anugamāt āhaṃkārika tvam sphuṭam sthitam
karaṇa tvam atas yuktam kartṛ aśa spṛś tva yogataḥ

original: AbhT_9.243a/. karturvibhinnaṃ karaṇaṃ preryatvāt karaṇaṃ kutaḥ /
analyzed: kartuḥ vibhinnam karaṇam prerya tvāt karaṇam kutas
karaṇa antara vāñchāyām bhavet tatra anavasthitiḥ

original: AbhT_9.244a/. tasmāt svātantryayogena kartā svaṃ bhedayan vapuḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt svātantrya yogena kartā svam bhedayan vapuḥ
karma āśa sparśinam sva aṃśam karaṇīkurute svayam
karaṇīkuruta iti anta vyatiriktam kuṭhāra vat

original: AbhT_9.246a/. tenāśuddhaiva vidyāsya sāmānyaṃ karaṇaṃ purā /
analyzed: tena aśuddhā eva vidyā asya sāmānyam karaṇam purā

original: AbhT_9.246b/. jñaptau kṛtau tu sāmānyaṃ kalā karaṇamucyate // 246
analyzed: jñaptau kṛtau tu sāmānyam kalā karaṇam ucyate
nanu śrīmat mataṅga ādau kalāyāḥ kartṛ tā uditā

original: AbhT_9.247b/. tasyāṃ satyāṃ hi vidyādyāḥ karaṇatvārhatājuṣaḥ // 247
analyzed: tasyām satyām hi vidyā ādyāḥ karaṇa tva arha tā juṣaḥ
ucyate kartṛtā evā uktā karaṇa tve prayojikā

original: AbhT_9.248b/. tayā vinā tu nānyeṣāṃ karaṇānāṃ sthitiryataḥ // 248
analyzed: tayā vinā tu nā anyeṣām karaṇānām sthitiḥ yatas
atas sāmānya karaṇa vargāt tatra pṛthak kṛtā

original: AbhT_9.249b/. vidyāṃ vinā hi nānyeṣāṃ karaṇānāṃ nijā sthitiḥ // 249
analyzed: vidyām vinā hi na anyeṣām karaṇānām nijā sthitiḥ

original: AbhT_9.250a/. kalāṃ vinā na tasyāśca kartṛtve jñātṛtā yataḥ /
analyzed: kalām vinā na tasyāḥ ca kartṛ tve jñātṛ tā yatas

original: AbhT_9.250b/. kalāvidye tataḥ puṃso mukhyaṃ tatkaraṇaṃ viduḥ // 250
analyzed: kalā vidye tatas puṃsaḥ mukhyam tat karaṇam viduḥ

original: AbhT_9.251a/. ata eva vihīne@pi buddhikarmendriyaiḥ kvacit /
analyzed: atas eva vihīne api buddhi karma indriyaiḥ kvacid

original: AbhT_9.251b/. andhe paṅgau rūpagatiprakāśo na na bhāsate // 251
analyzed: andhe paṅgau rūpa gati prakāśaḥ na na bhāsate
kiṃtu sāmānya karaṇa balāt vedye api tādṛśi
rūpa sāmānye eva andhaḥ pratipattim prapadyate
tatas eva tu ahaṃkārāt tanmātra sparśinā udhikam
karmendriyāṇi vāc pāṇi pāyu upastha aṅghri jajñire

original: AbhT_9.254a/. vacmyādade tyajāmyāśu visṛjāmi vrajāmi ca /
analyzed: vacmi ādade tyajāmi āśu visṛjāmi vrajāmi ca

original: AbhT_9.254b/. iti yāhaṃkriyā kāryakṣamā karmendriyaṃ tu tat // 254
analyzed: iti yā ahaṃkriyā kārya kṣamā karmendriyam tu tat
tena chinna karasya asti hastaḥ karmendriya ātmakaḥ

original: AbhT_9.255b/. tasya pradhānādhiṣṭhānaṃ paraṃ pañcāṅguliḥ karaḥ // 255
analyzed: tasya pradhāna adhiṣṭhānam param pañca aṅguliḥ karaḥ

original: AbhT_9.256a/. mukhenāpi yadādānaṃ tatra yat karaṇaṃ sthitam /
analyzed: mukhena api yat ādānam tatra yat karaṇam sthitam

original: AbhT_9.256b/. sa pāṇireva karaṇaṃ vinā kiṃ saṃbhavet kriyā // 256
analyzed: sa pāṇiḥ eva karaṇam vinā kim saṃbhavet kriyā

original: AbhT_9.257a/. tathābhāve tu buddhyakṣairapi kiṃ syātprayojanam /
analyzed: tathā abhāve tu buddhi akṣaiḥ api kim syāt prayojanam
darśanam karaṇa apekṣam kriyā tvāt iti ca ucyate

original: AbhT_9.258a/. parairgamau tu karaṇaṃ neṣyate ceti vismayaḥ /
analyzed: paraiḥ gamau tu karaṇam na iṣyate ca iti vismayaḥ
gamana utkṣepaṇa ādīni mukhyam karma upalambhanam
punar guṇaḥ kriyā tu eṣā vaiyākaraṇa darśane
kriyā karaṇa pūrvā iti vyāptyā karaṇa pūrvakam
jñānam na ādānam iti etat sphuṭam āndhya vijṛmbhitam
tasmāt karmendriyāṇi āhuḥ tvac vat vyāptṝṇi mukhyatas

original: AbhT_9.261a/. tatsthāne vṛttimantīti mataṅge guravo mama /
analyzed: tad sthāne vṛttimanti iti mataṅge guravaḥ mama

original: AbhT_9.261b/. nanvanyānyapi karmāṇi santi bhūyāṃsi tatkṛte // 261
analyzed: nanu anyāni api karmāṇi santi bhūyāṃsi tad kṛte
karaṇāni api vācyāni tathā ca akṣeṣu aniṣṭhitiḥ
nanu etat kheṭa pāla ādyaiḥ nirākāri na karmaṇām

original: AbhT_9.263a/. yatsādhanaṃ tadakṣaṃ syāt kiṃtu kasyāpi karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: yat sādhanam tat akṣam syāt kiṃtu kasya api karmaṇaḥ
etat na asmad kṛta praśna tṛṣṇā saṃtāpa śāntaye
nahi asvacchamita prāyaiḥ jalaiḥ tṛpyanti barhiṇaḥ
ucyate śrīmatā ādiṣṭam śaṃbhunā atra mama uttaram
svaccha saṃvedana udāra vikalā prabalīkṛtam
iha karma anusaṃdhāna bhedāt ekam vibhidyate
tatra anusaṃdhiḥ pañca ātmā pañca karmendriyāṇi atas
tyāgāya ādāna saṃpattyai dvayāya dvitayam vinā
