sva rūpa viśrānti kṛte caturdhā karma yat bahis
pāyu pāṇi aṅghri jananam karaṇam tat caturvidham

original: AbhT_9.268a/. antaṃ prāṇāśrayaṃ yattu karmātra karaṇaṃ hi vāk /
analyzed: antam prāṇa āśrayam yat tu karma atra karaṇam hi vāc

original: AbhT_9.268b/. uktāḥ samāsataścaiṣāṃ citrāḥ kāryeṣu vṛttayaḥ // 268
analyzed: uktāḥ samāsatas ca eṣām citrāḥ kāryeṣu vṛttayaḥ

original: AbhT_9.269a/. tadetadvyatiriktaṃ hi na karma kvāpi dṛśyate /
analyzed: tat etad vyatiriktam hi na karma kvāpi dṛśyate
tat kasya arthe prakalpyā iyam indriyāṇām aniṣṭhitiḥ
etat kartavya cakram tat asāṃkaryeṇa kurvate

original: AbhT_9.270b/. akṣāṇi sahavṛttyā tu buddhyante saṃkaraṃ jaḍāḥ // 270
analyzed: akṣāṇi sahavṛttyā tu buddhi ante saṃkaram jaḍāḥ
uktaḥ indriya vargaḥ ūyam ahaṃkārāt tu rājasāt
tamaḥ pradhāna ahaṃkārāt bhoktṛ aṃśa chādana ātmanaḥ
iti atra rājasa ahaṃkṛt yogaḥ saṃśleṣakaḥ dvaye
anye tu āhuḥ manaḥ jātam rājasa ahaṃkṛteḥ yatas
samasta indriya saṃcāra caturam laghu vegavat

original: AbhT_9.274b/. anye tu sāttvikāt svāntaṃ buddhikarmendriyāṇi tu // 274
analyzed: anye tu sāttvikāt svāntam buddhi karma indriyāṇi tu
rājasāt grāhaka grāhya bhāga sparśīni manvate
kheṭapālāḥ tu manyante karmendriya gaṇaḥ sphuṭam
rājasa ahaṃkṛteḥ jātaḥ rajasaḥ karma tā yatas

original: AbhT_9.276b/. śrīpūrvaśāstre tu mano rājasāt sāttvikātpunaḥ // 276
analyzed: śrī pūrvaśāstre tu manaḥ rājasāt sāttvikāt punar

original: AbhT_9.277a/. indriyāṇi samastāni yuktaṃ caitadvibhāti naḥ /
analyzed: indriyāṇi samastāni yuktam ca etat vibhāti naḥ
tathā hi bāhya vṛttīnām akṣāṇām vṛtti bhāsane
ālocane śaktiḥ antar yojane manasaḥ punar

original: AbhT_9.278b/. uktaṃ ca guruṇā kuryānmano@nuvyavasāyi sat // 278
analyzed: uktam ca guruṇā kuryāt manaḥ anuvyavasāyi sat
tad dvaya ālambanāḥ mātṛ vyāpāra ātma kriyāḥ iti
tānmātraḥ tu gaṇaḥ dhvānta pradhānāyāḥ ahaṃkṛteḥ

original: AbhT_9.280a/. atrāvivādaḥ sarvasya grāhyopakrama eva hi /
analyzed: atra avivādaḥ sarvasya grāhya upakramaḥ eva hi
pṛthivyām saurabhāni ādi vicitre gandha maṇḍale

original: AbhT_9.281a/. yatsāmānyaṃ hi gandhatvaṃ gandhatanmātranāma tat /
analyzed: yat sāmānyam hi gandha tvam gandha tanmātra nāma tat

original: AbhT_9.281b/. vyāpakaṃ tata evoktaṃ sahetutvāttu na dhruvam // 281
analyzed: vyāpakam tatas eva uktam sa hetu tvāt tu na dhruvam
sva kāraṇe tirobhūtiḥ dhvasaḥ yat tena na adhruvam
evam rasa ādi śabda anta tanmātreṣu api yojanā
viśeṣāṇām yatas vaśyam daśā prāk aviśeṣiṇī
kṣubhitam śabda tanmātram citra ākārāḥ śratīḥ dadhat
nabhaḥ śabda uvakāśa ātmā vācya adhyāsa sahaḥ yatas
tat etat sparśa tanmātra yogāt prakṣobham āgatam
vāyu tām eti tena atra śabda sparśa ubhaya ātma tā
anye tu āhuḥ dhvaniḥ kha eka guṇaḥ tat api yujyate

original: AbhT_9.286a/. yato vāyurnijaṃ rūpaṃ labhate na vināmbarāt /
analyzed: yatas vāyuḥ nijam rūpam labhate na vinā ambarāt
uttara uttara bhūteṣu pūrva pūrva sthitiḥ yatas

original: AbhT_9.287a/. tata eva marudvyomnoraviyogo mithaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tatas eva marut vyomnoḥ aviyogaḥ mithas smṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_9.287b/. śabdasparśau tu rūpeṇa samaṃ prakṣobhamāgatau // 287
analyzed: śabda sparśau tu rūpeṇa samam prakṣobham āgatau

original: AbhT_9.288a/. tejastattvaṃ tribhirdharmaiḥ prāhuḥ pūrvavadeva tat /
analyzed: tejaḥ tattvam tribhiḥ dharmaiḥ prāhuḥ pūrvavat eva tat
taiḥ tribhiḥ sa rasaiḥ āpaḥ sa gandhaiḥ bhūḥ iti kramaḥ
tatra pratyakṣatas siddhaḥ dharā ādi guṇa saṃcayaḥ
nahi gandha ādi dharma ogha vyatiriktā vibhāti bhūḥ
yathā guṇa guṇi dvaita vādinām ekam api adaḥ

original: AbhT_9.290b/. citraṃ rūpaṃ paṭe bhāti kramāddharmāstathā bhuvi // 290
analyzed: citram rūpam paṭe bhāti kramāt dharmāḥ tathā bhuvi

original: AbhT_9.291a/. yathā ca vistṛte vastre yugapadbhāti citratā /
analyzed: yathā ca vistṛte vastre yugapad bhāti citra tā
tathā eva yoginām dharma sāmastyena avabhāti bhūḥ
gandha ādi śabda paryanta citra rūpā dharā tatas
upāya bhedāt bhāti eṣā kramākrama vibhāgataḥ

original: AbhT_9.293a/. tata eva kramavyaktikṛto dhībheda ucyate /
analyzed: tatas eva krama vyakti kṛtaḥ dhī bhedaḥ ucyate
ṣaṣṭhī prayogaḥ dhī bhedāt bhedya bhedaka tā tathā

original: AbhT_9.294a/. tena dharmātirikto@tra dharmī nāma na kaścana /
analyzed: tena dharma atiriktā utra dharmī nāma na kaścana
tatra aneka prakārāḥ syuḥ gandha rūpa rasāḥ kṣitau
saṃsparśaḥ pāka jaḥ unuṣṇa aśītaḥ śabdaḥ vicitrakaḥ

original: AbhT_9.295b/. śauklyaṃ mādhuryaśītatve citrāḥ śabdāśca vāriṇi // 295
analyzed: śauklyam mādhurya śīta tve citrāḥ śabdāḥ ca vāriṇi
śukla bhāsvara tā uṣṇa tvam citrāḥ śabdāḥ ca pāvake
apāka jaḥ ca aśīta uṣṇaḥ dhvaniḥ citraḥ ca mārute
varṇa ātmakaḥ dhvaniḥ śabda pratibimba anyathā ambare

original: AbhT_9.297b/. yattu na sparśavaddharmaḥ śabda ityādi bhaṇyate // 297
analyzed: yat tu na sparśavat dharmaḥ śabdaḥ ityādi bhaṇyate
kāṇādaiḥ tat sva pratīti viruddham kena gṛhyatām
paṭahe dhvaniḥ iti eva bhāti abādhitam eva yat
na ca hetu tva mātreṇa tad ādāna tva vedanāt

original: AbhT_9.299b/. śrotraṃ cāsmanmate@haṃkṛtkāraṇaṃ tatra tatra tat // 299
analyzed: śrotram ca asmad mata ihaṃkṛt kāraṇam tatra tatra tat

original: AbhT_9.300a/. vṛttibhāgīti taddeśaṃ śabdaṃ gṛhṇātyalaṃ tathā /
analyzed: vṛtti bhāgī iti tad deśam śabdam gṛhṇāti alam tathā
yaḥ tu āha śrotram ākāśam karṇa saṃyoga bheditam

original: AbhT_9.301a/. śabdajaḥ śabda āgatya śabdabuddhiṃ prasūyate /
analyzed: śabda jaḥ śabdaḥ āgatya śabda buddhim prasūyate
tasya mande pi muraja dhvanau ākarṇake sati

original: AbhT_9.302a/. amutra śrutireṣeti dūre saṃvedanaṃ katham /
analyzed: amutra śrutiḥ eṣā iti dūre saṃvedanam katham
na hi śabda ja śabdasya dūra adūra rava uditeḥ
śrotra ākāśa gatasya asti dūra adūra svabhāva tā

original: AbhT_9.303b/. na cāsau prathamaḥ śabdastāvadvyāpīti yujyate // 303
analyzed: na ca asau prathamaḥ śabdaḥ tāvat vyāpī iti yujyate

original: AbhT_9.304a/. tatrasthaiḥ saha tīvrātmā śrūyamāṇastvanena tu /
analyzed: tatrasthaiḥ saha tīvra ātmā śrūyamāṇaḥ tu anena tu
katham śrūyeta mandaḥ san ahi dharma antara āśrayaḥ
etat ca anyaiḥ apākāri bahudhā iti vṛthā punar

original: AbhT_9.305b/. nāyastaṃ patitāghātadāne ko hi na paṇḍitaḥ // 305
analyzed: na āyastam patita āghāta dāne kaḥ hi na paṇḍitaḥ

original: AbhT_9.306a/. amīṣāṃ tu dharādīnāṃ yāvāṃstattvagaṇaḥ purā /
analyzed: amīṣām tu dharā ādīnām yāvān tattva gaṇaḥ purā

original: AbhT_9.306b/. guṇādhikatayā tiṣṭhan vyāptā tāvān prakāśate // 306
analyzed: guṇa adhika tayā tiṣṭhan vyāptā tāvān prakāśate

original: AbhT_9.307a/. vyāpyavyāpakatā yaiṣā tattvānāṃ darśitā kila /
analyzed: vyāpya vyāpaka tā yā eṣā tattvānām darśitā kila

original: AbhT_9.307b/. sā guṇādhikyataḥ siddhā na hetutvānna lāghavāt // 307
analyzed: sā guṇa ādhikyataḥ siddhā na hetu tvāt na lāghavāt

original: AbhT_9.308a/. ahetunāpi rāgo hi vyāpto vidyādinā sphuṭam /
analyzed: ahetunā api rāgaḥ hi vyāptaḥ vidyā ādinā sphuṭam
tat vinā na bhavet yat tat vyāptam iti ucyate yatas

original: AbhT_9.309a/. na lāghavaṃ ca nāmāsti kiṃcidatra svadarśane /
analyzed: na lāghavam ca nāma asti kiṃcid atra sva darśane
guṇa ādhikyāt atas jñeyā vyāpya vyāpaka tā sphuṭā

original: AbhT_9.310a/. yo hi yasmādguṇotkṛṣṭaḥ sa tasmādūrdhva ucyate /
analyzed: yaḥ hi yasmāt guṇa utkṛṣṭaḥ sa tasmāt ūrdhvaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_9.311a/. ataḥ śivatvātprabhṛti prakāśatāsvarūpamādāya nijātmani dhruvam /
analyzed: atas śiva tvāt prabhṛti prakāśa tā svarūpam ādāya nija ātmani dhruvam
samasta tattva āvali dharma saṃcayaiḥ vibhāti bhūḥ vyāptṛ tayā sthitaiḥ alam

original: AbhT_9.312a/. evaṃ jalāderapi śaktitattvaparyantadhāmno vapurasti tādṛk /
analyzed: evam jala ādeḥ api śakti tattva paryanta dhāmnaḥ vapuḥ asti tādṛś

original: AbhT_9.312b/. kiṃ tūttaraṃ śaktitayaiva tattvaṃ pūrva tu taddharmatayeti bhedaḥ // 312
analyzed: kim tu uttaram śakti tayā eva tattvam tu tad dharma tayā iti bhedaḥ
anuttara prakriyāyām vaitatyena pradarśitam

original: AbhT_9.313b/. etat tasmāt tataḥ paśyedvistarārthī vivecakaḥ // 313
analyzed: etat tasmāt tatas paśyet vistara arthī vivecakaḥ

original: AbhT_9.314a/. iti tattvasyarūpasya kṛtaṃ samyak prakāśanam // 314
analyzed: iti kṛtam samyak prakāśanam
atha śrī tantrāloke daśamam āhnikam
ucyate trikaśāstra eka rahasyam tattva bhedanam
teṣām amīṣām tattvānām sva vargeṣu anugāminām
bheda antaram api proktam śāstre itra śrī trika abhidhe
śaktimat śakti bhedena dharā ādyam mūla paścimam
bhidyate pañcadaśadhā sva rūpeṇa saha anarāt

original: AbhT_10.4b/. tadvanmāyā ca navadhā jñākalāḥ saptadhā punaḥ // 4
analyzed: tadvat māyā ca navadhā jñākalāḥ saptadhā punar
mantrāḥ tad īśāḥ pāñcadhye mantreśa patayaḥ tridhā
śivaḥ na bhidyate sva eka prakāśa ghana cit mayaḥ
śaktimantaḥ sapta tathā śaktayaḥ tad caturdaśa

original: AbhT_10.7a/. svaṃ svarūpaṃ pañcadaśaṃ tadbhūḥ pañcadaśātmikā /
analyzed: svam svarūpam pañcadaśam tad bhūḥ pañcadaśa ātmikā

original: AbhT_10.7b/. tathāhi tisro devasya śaktayo varṇitāḥ purā // 7
analyzed: tathā hi tisraḥ devasya śaktayaḥ varṇitāḥ purā
tāḥ eva mātṛ māmeya trairūpyeṇa vyavasthitāḥ
para aṃśaḥ mātṛ rūpaḥ utra pramāṇa aṃśaḥ parāparaḥ

original: AbhT_10.9a/. meyo@paraḥ śaktimāṃśca śaktiḥ svaṃ rūpamityadaḥ /
analyzed: meya uparaḥ śaktimān ca śaktiḥ svam rūpam iti adaḥ
tatra svarūpam bhūmeḥ yat pṛthak jaḍam avasthitam
mātṛ māna ādi upadhibhiḥ asaṃjāta uparāgakam
sakala ādi śiva antaiḥ tu mātṛbhiḥ vedya tā asya yā
śaktimadbhiḥ anudbhūta śaktibhiḥ sapta tad bhidaḥ
sakala ādi śiva antānām śaktiṣu udrecita ātmasu

original: AbhT_10.12a/. vedyatājanitāḥ sapta bhedā iti caturdaśa /
analyzed: vedya tā janitāḥ sapta bhedāḥ iti caturdaśa
sakalasya pramāṇa aṃśaḥ yaḥ asau vidyākalā ātmakaḥ

original: AbhT_10.13a/. sāmānyātmā sa śaktitve gaṇito natu tadbhidaḥ /
analyzed: sāmānya ātmā sa śakti tve gaṇitaḥ na tu tad bhidaḥ

original: AbhT_10.13b/. layākalasya mānāṃśaḥ sa eva paramasphuṭaḥ // 13
AbhT_10.15a/. prabubhutsuḥ śuddhavidyā santrāṇāṃ karaṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: prabubhutsuḥ śuddhavidyā santrāṇām karaṇam bhavet

original: AbhT_10.15b/. prabuddhā śuddhavidyā tu tatsaṃskāreṇa saṃgatā // 15
analyzed: prabuddhā śuddhavidyā tu tad saṃskāreṇa saṃgatā
mānam mantreśvarāṇām syāt tad saṃskāra vivarjitā
mānam mantramaheśānām karaṇam śaktiḥ ucyate
svātantrya mātra sadbhāvā yā tu icchā śaktiḥ aiśvarī

original: AbhT_10.17b/. śivasya saiva karaṇaṃ tayā vetti karoti ca // 17
analyzed: śivasya sā eva karaṇam tayā vetti karoti ca

original: AbhT_10.18a/. ā śivātsakalāntaṃ ye mātāraḥ sapta te dvidhā /
analyzed: ā śivāt sakala antam ye mātāraḥ sapta te dvidhā
nyagbhūta udrikta śakti tvāt tad bhedaḥ vedya bhedakaḥ

original: AbhT_10.19a/. tathāhi vedyatā nāma bhāvasyaiva nijaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi vedya tā nāma bhāvasya eva nijam vapuḥ

original: AbhT_10.19b/. caitreṇa vedyaṃ vedmīti kiṃhyatra pratibhāsatām // 19
analyzed: caitreṇa vedyam vedmi iti kim hi atra pratibhāsatām
nanu caitrīya vijñāna mātram atra prakāśate

original: AbhT_10.20b/. vedyatākhyastu no dharmo bhāti bhāvasya nīlavat // 20
analyzed: vedya tā ākhyaḥ tu no dharmaḥ bhāti bhāvasya nīla vat

original: AbhT_10.21a/. vedyatā ca svabhāvena dharmo bhāvasya cettataḥ /
analyzed: vedya tā ca svabhāvena dharmaḥ bhāvasya ced tatas
sarvān prati eva vedyaḥ syāt dhaṭa nīla ādi dharma vat
atha vedaka saṃvitti balāt vedya tva dharma bhāj
bhāvaḥ tathā api doṣaḥ asau kuvinda kṛta vastra vat
vedya tā ākhyaḥ tu yaḥ dharmaḥ saḥ vedyaḥ ced khapuṣpa vat
vedyaḥ ced asti tatra api vedya itati anavasthitiḥ

original: AbhT_10.24a/. tato na kiṃcidvedyaṃ syānmūrchitaṃ tu jagadbhavet /
analyzed: tatas na kiṃcid vedyam syāt mūrchitam tu jagat bhavet

original: AbhT_10.24b/. nanu vijñātrupādhyaṃ śo paskṛtaṃ vapurucyatām // 24
analyzed: nanu vijñātṛ upādhyam vapuḥ ucyatām
bhāvasya artha prakāśa ātma yathā jñānam idam tu asat
eka vijñātṛ vedya tve na jñātṛ antara vedya tā
samasta jñātṛ vedya tve na eka vijñātṛ vedya tā

original: AbhT_10.26b/. tasmānna vedyatā nāma bhāvadharmo@sti kaścana // 26
analyzed: tasmāt na vedya tā nāma bhāva dharmaḥ asti kaścana

original: AbhT_10.27a/. bhāvasya vedyatā saiva saṃvido yaḥ samudbhavaḥ /
analyzed: bhāvasya vedya tā sā eva saṃvidaḥ yaḥ samudbhavaḥ
artha grahaṇa rūpam hi yatra vijñānam ātmani
samavaiti prakāśya ūrthaḥ tam prati eṣā eva vedya tā

original: AbhT_10.28b/. atra brūmaḥ padārthānāṃ na dharmo yadi vedyatā // 28
analyzed: atra brūmaḥ padārthānām na dharmaḥ yadi vedya tā

original: AbhT_10.29a/. avedyā eva te saṃsyurjñāne satyapi varṇite /
analyzed: avedyāḥ eva te saṃsyuḥ jñāne sati api varṇite
yathā hi pṛthu budhna ādi rūpe kumbhasya sati api
a tad ātmā paṭaḥ na eti pṛthu budhna ādi rūpa tām
tathā sati api vijñāne vijñātṛ samavāyini
avedya dharmakāḥ bhāvāḥ katham vedya tvam āpnuyuḥ

original: AbhT_10.31b/. anarthaḥ sumahāṃścaiṣa dṛśyatāṃ vastu yatsvayam // 31
analyzed: anarthaḥ su mahān ca eṣa dṛśyatām vastu yat svayam
prakāśa ātma na tat saṃvid ca aprakāśā tad āśrayaḥ
aprakāśaḥ manaḥ dīpa cakṣuḥ ādi tathā eva tat

original: AbhT_10.33a/. kiṃ tatprakāśatāṃ nāma supte jagati sarvataḥ /
analyzed: kim tat prakāśatām nāma supte jagati sarvatas
jñānasya artha prakāśa tvam nanu rūpam pradīpa vat
apūrvam atra viditam narīnṛtyāmahe tatas
artha prakāśaḥ jñānasya yat rūpam tat nirūpyatām

original: AbhT_10.35a/. arthaḥ prakāśaścedrūpamartho vā jñānameva vā /
analyzed: arthaḥ prakāśaḥ ced rūpam arthaḥ vā jñānam eva vā
atha arthasya prakāśaḥ yaḥ tat rūpam iti bhaṇyate

original: AbhT_10.36a/. ṣaṣṭhī kartari cedukto doṣa eva duruddharaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhī kartari ced uktaḥ doṣaḥ eva duruddharaḥ

original: AbhT_10.36b/. atha karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhyeṣā ṇyarthastatra hṛdi sthitaḥ // 36
analyzed: atha karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī eṣā ṇi arthaḥ tatra hṛdi sthitaḥ

original: AbhT_10.37a/. tathā cedaṃ darśayāmaḥ kiṃ prakāśaḥ prakāśate /
analyzed: tathā ca idam darśayāmaḥ kim prakāśaḥ prakāśate

original: AbhT_10.37b/. aprakāśo@pi naivāsau tathāpi ca na kiṃcana // 37
analyzed: aprakāśaḥ api nā eva asau tathā api ca na kiṃcana

original: AbhT_10.38a/. tarhi loke kathaṃ ṇyarthaḥ ucyate cetanasthitau /
analyzed: tarhi loke katham ṇyarthaḥ ucyate cetana sthitau

original: AbhT_10.38b/. mukhyo ṇyarthasya viṣayo jaḍeṣu tvaupacārikaḥ // 38
analyzed: mukhyaḥ ṇi arthasya viṣayaḥ jaḍeṣu tu aupacārikaḥ

original: AbhT_10.39a/. tathāhi gantuṃ śakto@pi caitro@nyāyattatāṃ gateḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi gantum śaktaḥ api caitraḥ nyāyatta tām gateḥ

original: AbhT_10.39b/. manvāna eva vaktyasmi gamitaḥ svāmineti hi // 39
analyzed: manvānaḥ eva vakti asmi gamitaḥ svāminā iti hi

original: AbhT_10.40a/. svāmyapyasya gatau śaktiṃ buddhvā svādhīnatāṃ sphuṭam /
analyzed: svāmī api asya gatau śaktim buddhvā svādhīna tām sphuṭam
paśyat nivṛttim āśaṃkya gamayāmi iti bhāṣate
prerya prerakayoḥ evam maulikī ṇi artha saṃgatiḥ
tad abhiprāyataḥ nyaḥ api loke vyavaharet tathā
śaram gamayati iti atra punar vega ākhya saṃskriyām
vidadhat prera kammanyaḥ upacāreṇa jāyate

original: AbhT_10.43a/. vāyuradriṃ pātayatītyatra dvāvapi tau jaḍau /
analyzed: vāyuḥ adrim pātayati iti atra dvau api tau jaḍau
draṣṭṛbhiḥ preraka prerya vapuṣā parikalpitau

original: AbhT_10.44a/. itthaṃ jaḍena saṃbandhe na mukhyā ṇyarthasaṃgatiḥ /
analyzed: ittham jaḍena saṃbandhe na mukhyā
āstām anyatra vitatam etat vistarataḥ mayā
arthe prakāśanā sā iyam upacāraḥ tatas bhavet

original: AbhT_10.45b/. astu cedbhāsate tarhi sa eva patadadrivat // 45
analyzed: astu ced bhāsate tarhi saḥ eva patat adri vat

original: AbhT_10.46a/. upacāre nimittena kenāpi kila bhūyate /
analyzed: upacāre nimittena kena api kila bhūyate

original: AbhT_10.46b/. vāyuḥ pātayatītyatra nimittaṃ tatkṛtā kriyā // 46
analyzed: vāyuḥ pātayati iti atra nimittam tad kṛtā kriyā
girau yena eṣa saṃyoga nāśāt bhraṃśam prapadyate

original: AbhT_10.47b/. iha tu jñānamarthasya na kiṃcitkarameva tat // 47
analyzed: iha tu jñānam arthasya na kiṃcitkaram eva tat

original: AbhT_10.48a/. upacāraḥ kathaṃ nāma bhavetso@pi hyavastusan /
analyzed: upacāraḥ katham nāma bhavet saḥ api hi avastu san
aprakāśitaḥ eva arthaḥ prakāśa tva upacārataḥ

original: AbhT_10.49a/. tādṛgeva śiśuḥ kiṃ hi dahatyagnyupacārataḥ /
analyzed: tādṛś eva śiśuḥ kim hi dahati agni upacārataḥ

original: AbhT_10.49b/. śiśau vahnyupacāre yadbījaṃ taikṣṇyādi tacca sat // 49
analyzed: śiśau vahni upacāre yat bījam taikṣṇya ādi tat ca sat

original: AbhT_10.50a/. prakāśatvopacāre tu kiṃ bījaṃ yatra satyatā /
analyzed: prakāśa tva upacāre tu kim bījam yatra satya tā

original: AbhT_10.50b/. siddhe hi cetane yukta upacāraḥ sa hi sphuṭam // 50
analyzed: siddhe hi cetane yuktaḥ upacāraḥ sa hi sphuṭam
adhyāropa ātmakaḥ saḥ api pratisaṃdhāna jīvitaḥ

original: AbhT_10.51b/. na cādyāpi kimapyasti cetanaṃ jñānamapyadaḥ // 51
analyzed: na ca adya api kim api asti cetanam jñānam api adaḥ
aprakāśam tad anyena tad prakāśe pi ayam vidhiḥ

original: AbhT_10.52b/. nanu pradīpo rūpasya prakāśaḥ kathamīdṛśam // 52
analyzed: nanu pradīpaḥ rūpasya prakāśaḥ katham īdṛśam

original: AbhT_10.53a/. atrāpi na vahantyetāḥ kiṃ nu yuktivikalpanāḥ /
analyzed: atrā api na vahanti etāḥ kim nu yukti vikalpanāḥ

original: AbhT_10.53b/. yādṛśā svena rūpeṇa dīpo rūpaṃ prakāśayet // 53
analyzed: svena rūpeṇa dīpaḥ rūpam prakāśayet

original: AbhT_10.54a/. tādṛśā svayamapyeṣa bhāti jñānaṃ tu no tathā /
analyzed: svayam api eṣa bhāti jñānam tu no tathā
pradīpaḥ ca eṣa bhāvānām prakāśa tvam dadādhāti alam

original: AbhT_10.55a/. anyathā na prakāśerannabhede cedṛśo vidhiḥ /
analyzed: anyathā na prakāśeran abhede ca īdṛśaḥ vidhiḥ

original: AbhT_10.55b/. tasmātprakāśa evāyaṃ pūrvoktaḥ paramaḥ śivaḥ // 55
analyzed: tasmāt prakāśaḥ eva ayam pūrva uktaḥ paramaḥ śivaḥ

original: AbhT_10.56a/. yathā yathā prakāśeta tattadbhāvavapuḥ sphuṭam /
analyzed: yathā yathā prakāśeta tad tad bhāva vapuḥ sphuṭam

original: AbhT_10.56b/. evaṃ ca nīlatā nāma yathā kācitprakāśate // 56
analyzed: evam ca nīla tā nāma yathā kācid prakāśate
tadvat cakāsti vedya tvam tat ca bhāva aṃśa pṛṣṭha gam

original: AbhT_10.57b/. phalaṃ prakaṭatārthasya saṃvidveti dvayaṃ tataḥ // 57
analyzed: phalam prakaṭa tā arthasya saṃvid vā iti dvayam tatas

original: AbhT_10.58a/. vipakṣato rakṣitaṃ ca saṃdhānaṃ cāpi tanmithaḥ /
analyzed: vipakṣataḥ rakṣitam ca saṃdhānam ca api tat mithas
tathā hi nibhṛtaḥ cauraḥ caitra vedyam iti sphuṭam

original: AbhT_10.59a/. buddhvā nādatta evāśu parīpsāvivaśo@pi san /
analyzed: buddhvā na ādatte eva āśu parīpsā vivaśaḥ api san

original: AbhT_10.59b/. seyaṃ paśyati māṃ netratribhāgeneti sādaram // 59
analyzed: sā iyam paśyati mām netra tri bhāgena iti sa ādaram

original: AbhT_10.60a/. svaṃ dehamamṛteneva siktaṃ paśyati kāmukaḥ /
analyzed: svam deham amṛtena iva siktam paśyati kāmukaḥ
na ca etat jñāna saṃvitti mātram bhāva aṃśa pṛṣṭha gam

original: AbhT_10.61a/. arthakriyākaraṃ taccenna dharmaḥ konvasau bhavet /
analyzed: artha kriyā karam tat ced na dharmaḥ kaḥ nu asau bhavet

original: AbhT_10.61b/. yaccoktaṃ vedyatādharmā bhāvaḥ sarvānapi prati // 61
analyzed: yat ca uktam vedya tā dharmāḥ bhāvaḥ sarvān api prati
syāt iti etat sva pakṣa ghnam duṣprayoga astra vat tava
asmākam tu sva prakāśa śiva tā mātra vādinām

original: AbhT_10.63a/. anyaṃ prati cakāstīti vaca eva na vidyate /
analyzed: anyam prati cakāsti iti vacaḥ eva na vidyate

original: AbhT_10.63b/. sarvānprati ca tannīlaṃ sa ghaṭaśceti yadvacaḥ // 63
analyzed: sarvān prati ca tat nīlam sa ghaṭaḥ ca iti yat vacaḥ
tat api avidita prāyam gṛhītam mugdha buddhibhiḥ
nahi kālāgni rudrīyakāya avagata nīlimā

original: AbhT_10.65a/. tava nīlaḥ kiṃ nu pīto maivaṃ bhūnnatu nīlakaḥ /
analyzed: tava nīlaḥ kim nu pītaḥ mā evam bhūt na tu nīlakaḥ

original: AbhT_10.65b/. na kaṃcitprati nīlo@sau nīlo vā yaṃ prati sthitaḥ // 65
analyzed: na kaṃcid prati nīlaḥ asau nīlaḥ vā yam prati sthitaḥ

original: AbhT_10.66a/. taṃ pratyeva sa vedyaḥ syātsaṃkalpadvārako@ntataḥ /
analyzed: tam prati eva sa vedyaḥ syāt saṃkalpa dvārakā untataḥ

original: AbhT_10.66b/. yathā cārthaprakāśātma jñānaṃ saṃgīryate tvayā // 66
analyzed: yathā ca artha prakāśa ātma jñānam saṃgīryate tvayā
tathā tad jñātṛ vedya tvam bhāvīyam rūpam ucyatām

original: AbhT_10.67b/. na ca jñātātra niyataḥ kaścijjñāne yathā tava // 67
analyzed: na ca jñātā atra niyataḥ kaścid jñāne yathā tava

original: AbhT_10.68a/. arthe jñātā yadā yo yastadvedyaṃ vapurucyatām /
analyzed: arthe jñātā yadā yaḥ yaḥ tat vedyam vapuḥ ucyatām
tad tad vijñātṛ vedya tvam sarvān prati eva bhāsatām
iti evam codayan manye vrajet badhira dhurya tām

original: AbhT_10.69b/. nahyanyaṃ prati vai kaṃcidbhāti sā vedyatā tathā // 69
analyzed: na hi anyam prati vai kaṃcid bhāti sā vedya tā tathā
bhāvasya rūpam iti ukte kā iyam asthāna vaidhurī
anena nīti mārgeṇa nirmūlam apasāritā

original: AbhT_10.71a/. anavasthā tathā hyanyairnīlādyaiḥ sadṛśī na sā /
analyzed: anavasthā tathā hi anyaiḥ nīla ādyaiḥ sadṛśī na sā
vedya tā kiṃtu dharmaḥ asau yat yogāt sarva dharmavān
dharmī vedya tvam abhyeti sa sattā samavāya vat

original: AbhT_10.72b/. brūṣe yathā hi kurute sattā satyasataḥ sataḥ // 72
analyzed: brūṣe yathā hi kurute sattā satya sataḥ sataḥ
samavāyaḥ api saṃśliṣṭaḥ śliṣṭa anaśliṣṭa tā juṣaḥ

original: AbhT_10.74a/. vyāvṛttān śvetimā śuklamaśuklaṃ gamanaṃ tathā /
analyzed: vyāvṛttān śuklam aśuklam gamanam tathā
tadvat nīla ādi dharma aṃśa yuktaḥ dharmī svayam sthitaḥ
avedyaḥ vedya tā rūpāt dharmāt vedya tvam āgataḥ

original: AbhT_10.75b/. vedyatā bhāsamānā ca svayaṃ nīlādidharmavat // 75
analyzed: vedya tā bhāsamānā ca svayam nīla ādi dharma vat
aprakāśā sva prakāśāt dharmāt eti prakāśa tām

original: AbhT_10.76b/. prakāśe khalu viśrāntiṃ viśvaṃ śrayati cettataḥ // 76
analyzed: prakāśe khalu viśrāntim viśvam śrayati ced tatas
na anyā kācid apekṣā asya kṛtakṛtyasya sarvatas

original: AbhT_10.77b/. yathā ca śivanāthena svātantryādbhāsyate bhidā // 77
analyzed: yathā ca śiva nāthena svātantryāt bhāsyate bhidā
nīla ādi vat tathā eva ayam vedya tā dharmaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_10.78b/. evaṃ siddhaṃ hi vedyatvaṃ bhāvadharmo@stu kā ghṛṇā // 78
analyzed: evam siddham hi vedya tvam bhāva dharmaḥ ustu kā ghṛṇā
idam tu cintyam sakala paryanta ukta pramātṛbhiḥ
vedya tvam eka rūpam syāt cāturdaśyam atas kutas
ucyate paripūrṇam ced bhāvīyam rūpam ucyate
tat vibhuḥ bhairavaḥ devaḥ bhagavān eva bhaṇyate

original: AbhT_10.81b/. sahyate kiṃ kṛtaṃ tarhi proktakalpanayānayā // 81
analyzed: sahyate kim kṛtam tarhi prokta kalpanayā anayā

original: AbhT_10.82a/. ata eva yadā yena vapuṣā bhāti yadyathā /
analyzed: atas eva yadā yena vapuṣā bhāti yat yathā
tadā tathā tat tat rūpam iti eṣā upaniṣad parā

original: AbhT_10.83a/. caitreṇa vedyaṃ jānāmi dvābhyāṃ bahubhirapyatha /
analyzed: caitreṇa vedyam jānāmi dvābhyām bahubhiḥ api atha
mantreṇa tat maheśena śivena udrikta śaktinā

original: AbhT_10.84a/. anyādṛśena vetyevaṃ bhāvo bhāti yathā tathā /
analyzed: anyādṛśena vā iti evam bhāvaḥ bhāti yathā tathā
arthakriyā ādi vaicitryam abhyeti aparisaṃkhyayā
tathā hi ekāgra sakala sāmājika janaḥ khalu
nṛttam gītam sudhā sāra sāgara tvena manyate
tatas evā ucyate malla naṭa prekṣā upadeśane
tāvat mātra artha saṃvitti tuṣṭāḥ pratyekaśaḥ yadi

original: AbhT_10.87b/. kaḥ saṃbhūya guṇasteṣāṃ pramātraikyaṃ bhavecca kim // 87
analyzed: kaḥ saṃbhūya guṇaḥ teṣām pramātṛ aikyam bhavet ca kim
yadā tu tad tad vedya tva dharma saṃdarbha garbhitam
tat vastu śuṣkāt prāgrūpāt anyat yuktam idam tadā
bhūyasā eva tathā ca śrīmālinīvijayottare
tathā ṣaḍvidham adhvānam anena adhiṣṭhitam smaret

original: AbhT_10.90b/. adhiṣṭhānaṃ hi devena yadviśvasya pravedanam // 90
analyzed: adhiṣṭhānam hi devena yat viśvasya pravedanam
tad īśa vedya tvena ittham jñātam prakṛta kārya kṛt

original: AbhT_10.91b/. evaṃ siddhaṃ vedyatākhyo dharmo bhāvasya bhāsate // 91
analyzed: evam siddham vedya tā ākhyaḥ dharmaḥ bhāvasya bhāsate
tad an ābhāsa yoge tu svarūpam iti bhaṇyate
upādhi yogitā śaṅkām apahastayataḥ usphuṭam

original: AbhT_10.93a/. svātmano yena vapuṣā bhātyarthastatsvakaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: sva ātmanaḥ yena vapuṣā bhāti arthaḥ tat svakam vapuḥ
jānāmi ghaṭam iti atra vedya tā anuparāgavān

original: AbhT_10.94a/. ghaṭa eva svarūpeṇa bhāta ityapadiśyate /
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ eva sva rūpeṇa bhātaḥ iti apadiśyate
nanu tatra svayam vedya bhāvaḥ mantra ādi apekṣayā

original: AbhT_10.95a/. api cāstyeva nanvastu natu sanpratibhāsate /
analyzed: api ca asti eva nanu astu na tu san pratibhāsate
avedyam eva kālāgni vapuḥ meroḥ parāḥ diśaḥ

original: AbhT_10.96a/. mameti saṃvidi paraṃ śuddhaṃ vastu prakāśate /
analyzed: mama iti saṃvidi param śuddham vastu prakāśate
bhāta tvāt vedyam api tat na vedya tvena bhāsanāt

original: AbhT_10.97a/. avedyameva bhānaṃ hi tathā kamanuyuñjmahe /
analyzed: a vedyam eva bhānam hi tathā kam anuyuñjmahe
evam pañcadaśa ātmā iyam dharā tadvat jala ādayaḥ

original: AbhT_10.98a/. avyaktāntā yato@styeṣāṃ sakalaṃ prati vedyatā /
analyzed: avyakta antāḥ yatas asti eṣām sakalam prati vedya tā
yat tu ucyate kalā ādyena dharā antena samanvitāḥ
sakalāḥ iti tad kośa ṣaṭka udreka upalakṣaṇam
sakala ālaya saṃjñāḥ tu nyagbhūta akhila kañcukāḥ
jñānākalāḥ tu dhvasta etad kañcukā iti nirṇayaḥ
tena pradhāne vedye api pumān udbhūta kañcukaḥ
pramātā asti eva sakalaḥ pāñcadaśyam atas sthitam
pāñcadaśyam sakale api ca
sakala antaram asti eva mātṛ hi
pīta ādyāḥ sthira kampra tvāt caturdaśa dharā ādiṣu
svarūpībhūta jaḍa tāḥ prāṇa deha pathe tatas
pramātṛ tā juṣaḥ proktā dhāraṇā vijayottare

original: AbhT_10.105a/. yadā tu meyatā puṃsaḥ kalāntasya prakalpyate /
analyzed: yadā tu meya tā puṃsaḥ kalā antasya prakalpyate

original: AbhT_10.105b/. tadudbhūtaḥ kañcukāṃśo meyo nāsya pramātṛtā // 105
analyzed: tad udbhūtaḥ kañcuka aṃśaḥ meyaḥ na asya pramātṛ tā

original: AbhT_10.106a/. ataḥ sakalasaṃjñasya pramātṛtvaṃ na vidyate /
analyzed: atas sakala saṃjñasya pramātṛ tvam na vidyate
trayodaśa tvam tad śakti śaktimat dvaya varjanāt
nyagbhūta kañcukaḥ mātā yukta yatas tatra layākalaḥ
māyā tattve jñeya rūpe kañcuka nyagbhavaḥ api yaḥ

original: AbhT_10.108b/. so@pi meyaḥ kañcukaikyaṃ yato māyā susūkṣmikā // 108
analyzed: saḥ api meyaḥ kañcuka aikyam yatas māyā su sūkṣmikā
vijñānākalaḥ evā atra tatas mātā apakañcukaḥ
māyā niviṣṭe api akale tathā iti ekādaśa ātma tā
vijñāna kevale vedye kañcuka dhvaṃsa su sthite
udbubhūṣu prabodhānām mantrāṇām eva mātṛ tā

original: AbhT_10.111a/. te@pi mantrā yadā meyāstadā mātā tadīśvaraḥ /
analyzed: te api mantrāḥ yadā meyāḥ tadā mātā tad īśvaraḥ
sa hi udbhavāt pūrṇa bodhaḥ tasmin prāpte tu meya tām
udbhūta pūrṇa rūpā usau mātā mantramaheśvaraḥ

original: AbhT_10.112b/. tasminvijñeyatāṃ prāpte svaprakāśaḥ paraḥ śivaḥ // 112
analyzed: tasmin vijñeya tām prāpte sva prakāśaḥ paraḥ śivaḥ

original: AbhT_10.113b/. śivaḥ pramātā no meyo hyanyādhīnaprakāśatā // 113
analyzed: śivaḥ pramātā no meyaḥ hi anya adhīna prakāśa tā

original: AbhT_10.114a/. meyatā sā na tatrāsti svaprakāśo hyasau prabhuḥ /
analyzed: meya tā sā na tatra asti sva prakāśaḥ hi asau prabhuḥ
sva prakāśe itra kasmiṃścid anabhyupagate sati
aprakāśāt prakāśa tve hi anavasthā duruttarā

original: AbhT_10.115b/. tataśca suptaṃ viśvaṃ syānna caivaṃ bhāsate hi tat // 115
analyzed: tatas ca suptam viśvam syāt na ca evam bhāsate hi tat
anya adhīna prakāśam hi tat bhāti anyaḥ tu asau śivaḥ
iti asya sva prakāśa tve kim anyaiḥ yukti ḍambaraiḥ

original: AbhT_10.117a/. mānānāṃ hi paro jīvaḥ sa evetyuktamāditaḥ /
analyzed: mānānām hi paraḥ jīvaḥ saḥ eva iti uktam āditas
nanu asti sva prakāśe api śive vedya tvam īdṛśaḥ

original: AbhT_10.118b/. satyaṃ sa tu tathā sṛṣṭaḥ parameśena vedyatām // 118
analyzed: satyam sa tu tathā sṛṣṭaḥ parameśena vedya tām
nītaḥ mantramaheśa ādi kakṣyām samadhiśāyyate
tathābhūtaḥ ca vedyā asau na anavacchinna saṃvidaḥ
pūrṇasya vedya tā yuktā paraspara virodhataḥ

original: AbhT_10.120b/. tathā vedyasvabhāve@pi vastuto na śivātmatām // 120
analyzed: tathā vedya svabhāve api vastutas na śiva ātma tām

original: AbhT_10.121a/. ko@pi bhāvaḥ projjhatīti satyaṃ tadbhāvanā phalet /
analyzed: kaḥ api bhāvaḥ projjhati iti satyam tad bhāvanā phalet

original: AbhT_10.121b/. śrīpūrvaśāstre tenoktaṃ śivaḥ sākṣānna bhidyate // 121
analyzed: śrī pūrvaśāstre tena uktam śivaḥ sākṣāt na bhidyate
sākṣāt padena ayam arthaḥ samastaḥ prasphuṭīkṛtaḥ
nanu eka rūpa tā yuktaḥ śivaḥ tad vaśatas bhavet
tri veda tā mantra mahā nāthe kā atra vivādi tā
maheśvara īśa mantrāṇām tathā kevalinoḥ dvayoḥ
ananta bheda tā ekaikam sthitā sakala vat kila

original: AbhT_10.124b/. tato layākale meye pramātāsti layākalaḥ // 124
analyzed: tatas layākale meye pramātā asti layākalaḥ
atas trayodaśa tvam syāt ittham na ekādaśa ātma tā
vijñānākala vedya tve pi anyaḥ jñānākalaḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_10.126a/. mātā tadekādaśatā syānnaiva tu navātmatā /
analyzed: mātā tad ekādaśa tā syāt nā eva tu nava ātma tā
evam mantra tad īśānām mantreśa antara saṃbhave

original: AbhT_10.127a/. vedyatvānnava sapta syuḥ sapta pañca tu te katham /
analyzed: vedya tvāt nava sapta syuḥ sapta pañca tu te katham

original: AbhT_10.127b/. ucyate satyamastyeṣā kalanā kiṃtu susphuṭaḥ // 127
analyzed: ucyate satyam asti eṣā kalanā kiṃtu su sphuṭaḥ

original: AbhT_10.128a/. yathātra sakale bhedo na tathā tvakalādike /
analyzed: yathā atra sakale bhedaḥ na tathā tu akala ādike
ananta avāntara īdṛkṣa yoni bhedavataḥ sphuṭam
caturdaśavidhasya asya sakalasya asti bhedi tā
akalena viśeṣāya sakalasya eva yujyate

original: AbhT_10.130b/. vijñānakevalādīnāṃ tāvatyapi na vai bhidā // 130
analyzed: vijñāna kevala ādīnām tāvatī api na vai bhidā
śiva svācchandya mātram tu bhedāya eṣām vijṛmbhate
iti āśayena saṃpaśyan viśeṣam sakalāt iha

original: AbhT_10.132b/. nanvastu vedyatā bhāvadharmaḥ kiṃtu layākalau // 132
analyzed: nanu astu vedya tā bhāva dharmaḥ kiṃtu laya akalau

original: AbhT_10.133a/. manvāte neha vai kiṃcittadapekṣā tvasau katham /
analyzed: manvāte na iha vai kiṃcid tad apekṣā tu asau katham
śrūyatām saṃvid aikātmya tattve smin saṃvyavasthite

original: AbhT_10.134a/. jaḍe@pi citirastyeva bhotsyamāne tu kā kathā /
analyzed: jaḍe api citiḥ asti eva bhotsyamāne tu kā kathā
sva bodha avasare tāvat bhotsyate laya kevalī

original: AbhT_10.135a/. dvividhaśca prabodho@sya mantratvāya bhavāya ca /
analyzed: dvividhaḥ ca prabodhaḥ asya mantra tvāya bhavāya ca
bhāvanā ādi balāt anya vaiṣṇava ādi naya uditāt
yathāsvam ādhara auttarya vicitrāt saṃskṛtaḥ tathā

original: AbhT_10.136b/. līnaḥ prabuddho mantratvaṃ tadīśatvamathaiti vā // 136
analyzed: līnaḥ prabuddhaḥ mantra tvam tad īśa tvam atha eti vā
svātantrya varjitāḥ ye tu balāt moha vaśīkṛtāḥ
layākalāt sva saṃskārāt prabuddhi ante bhavāya te
jñānākalaḥ upi mantreśa maheśa tvāya budhyate

original: AbhT_10.138b/. mantrāditvāya vā jātu jātu saṃsṛtaye@pi vā // 138
analyzed: mantra ādi tvāya vā jātu jātu saṃsṛtaye api vā
avatāraḥ hi bhidyate

original: AbhT_10.139b/. uktaṃ ca bodhayāmāsa sa sisṛkṣurjagatprabhuḥ // 139
analyzed: uktam ca bodhayāmāsa sa sisṛkṣuḥ jagatprabhuḥ
vijñāna kevalān aṣṭau iti śrī pūrvaśāsane
atas prabhotsyamāna tve yā anayoḥ bodha yogya tā
tad balāt vedya tā yogya bhāvena eva atra vedya tā
tathā hi gāḍha nidrā ipi priyena āśaṅkitā āgatām

original: AbhT_10.142a/. māṃ drakṣyatīti nāṅgeṣu sveṣu mātyabhisārikā /
analyzed: mām drakṣyati iti na aṅgeṣu sveṣu mātī abhisārikā
evam śivaḥ api manute etasya etad pravedya tām

original: AbhT_10.143a/. yāsyatīti sṛjāmīti tadānīṃ yogyataiva sā /
analyzed: yāsyati iti sṛjāmi iti tadānīm yogyatā eva sā

original: AbhT_10.143b/. vedyatā tasya bhāvasya bhoktṛtā tāvatī ca sā // 143
analyzed: vedya tā tasya bhāvasya bhoktṛ tā tāvatī ca sā

original: AbhT_10.144a/. layākalasya citro hi bhogaḥ kena vikalpyate /
analyzed: layākalasya citraḥ hi bhogaḥ kena vikalpyate

original: AbhT_10.144b/. yathā yathā hi samvittiḥ sa hi bhogaḥ sphuṭo@sphuṭaḥ // 144
analyzed: yathā yathā hi samvittiḥ sa hi bhogaḥ sphuṭaḥ usphuṭaḥ

original: AbhT_10.145a/. smṛtiyogyo@pyanyathā vā bhogyabhāvaṃ na tūjjhati /
analyzed: smṛti yogyaḥ api anyathā vā bhogya bhāvam na tu ujjhati
gāḍha nidrā vimūḍhaḥ api kāntā āliṅgita vigrahaḥ

original: AbhT_10.146a/. bhoktaiva bhaṇyate so@pi manute bhoktṛtāṃ purā /
analyzed: bhoktā eva bhaṇyate saḥ upi manute bhoktṛ tām purā
utprekṣā mātra hīnaḥ api kāṃcid kula vadhūm puras
saṃbhokṣyamāṇām dṛṣṭvā eva rabhasāt yāti saṃmadam

original: AbhT_10.147b/. tāmeva dṛṣṭvā ca tadā samānāśayabhāgapi // 147
analyzed: tām eva dṛṣṭvā ca tadā samāna āśaya bhāj api
anyaḥ tathā na saṃvitte kam atra upalabhāmahe
loke rūḍham idam dṛṣṭiḥ asmin kāraṇam antarā
prasīdati iva magnā iva nirvāti iva iti vādini
ittham vistarataḥ tattva bhedaḥ yam samudāhṛtaḥ
śakti śaktimatām bhedāt anyonyam tad kṛteṣu api
bhedeṣu anyonyataḥ bhedāt tathā tattva antaraiḥ saha
bheda upabheda gaṇanām karvataḥ na avadhiḥ kvacid

original: AbhT_10.151b/. tata eva vicitro@yaṃ bhuvanādividhiḥ sthitaḥ // 151
analyzed: tatas eva vicitraḥ yam bhuvana ādi vidhiḥ sthitaḥ
pārthiva tve api no sāmyam rudra vaiṣṇava lokayoḥ

original: AbhT_10.152b/. kā kathānyatra tu bhavedbhoge vāpi svarūpake // 152
analyzed: kā kathā anyatra tu bhavet bhoge vā api svarūpake

original: AbhT_10.153a/. sa ca no vistaraḥ sākṣācchakyo yadyapi bhāṣitum /
analyzed: sa ca naḥ vistaraḥ sākṣāt śakyaḥ yadi api bhāṣitum
tathā api mārga mātreṇa kathyamānaḥ vivicyatām
saptānām mātṛśaktīnām anyonyam bhedane sati
rūpam eka anna pañcāśat svarūpam ca adhikam tatas
sarvam sarva ātmakam yasmāt tasmāt sakala mātari
layākalā ādi śaktīnām saṃbhavaḥ asti eva tattvataḥ

original: AbhT_10.156a/. sa tvasphuṭo@stu bhedāṃśaṃ dātuṃ tāvatprabhurbhavet /
analyzed: sa tu asphuṭoḥ tu bheda aṃśam dātum tāvat prabhuḥ bhavet
teṣām api ca bhedānām anyonyam bahu bheda tā
mukhyānām bheda bhedānām jala ādyaiḥ bhedane sati
mukhya bheda prakāreṇa vidheḥ ānantyam ucyate
sakalasya samudbhūtāḥ cakṣuḥ ādi sva śaktayaḥ
nyagbhūtāḥ ca pratanvanti bheda antaram api sphuṭam
evam layākalā ādīnām tad saṃskāra pada uditāt
pāṭavāt prakṣayāt vā api bheda antaram udīyate
nyakkṛtām śaktim āsthāya api udāsīna tayā sthitim

original: AbhT_10.160b/. anāviśyeva yadvetti tatrānyā vedyatā khalu // 160
analyzed: an āviśya iva yat vetti tatra anyā vedya tā khalu

original: AbhT_10.161a/. āviśyeva nimajjyeva vikāsyeva vighūrṇya ca /
analyzed: āviśya iva nimajjya iva vikāsya iva vighūrṇya ca
vidataḥ vedya tā anyā eva
anya śakti tirobhāve kasyāścid su sphuṭa udaye
bheda antaram api jñeyam vīṇā vādaka dṛṣṭi vat
tirobhāva udbhavau śakteḥ sva śakti antarataḥ nyatas
cetyamānāt acetyāt vā tanvāte bahu bheda tām
evam etat dharā ādīnām tattvānām yāvatī daśā

original: AbhT_10.164b/. kācidasti ghaṭākhyāpi tatra saṃdarśitā bhidaḥ // 164
analyzed: kācid asti ghaṭa ākhyā api tatra saṃdarśitāḥ bhidaḥ

original: AbhT_10.165a/. atrāpi vedyatā nāma tādātmyaṃ vedakaiḥ saha /
analyzed: atrā api vedya tā nāma tādātmyam vedakaiḥ saha

original: AbhT_10.165b/. tataḥ sakalavedyo@sau ghaṭaḥ sakala eva hi // 165
analyzed: tatas sakala vedya usau ghaṭaḥ sakalaḥ eva hi
yāvat śiva eka vedyā usau śivaḥ eva avabhāsate

original: AbhT_10.166b/. tāvadekaśarīro hi bodho bhātyeva yāvatā // 166
analyzed: tāvat eka śarīraḥ hi bodhaḥ bhāti eva yāvatā
adhunā atra samastasya dharā tattvasya darśyate
sāmastye eva abhihitam pāñcadaśyam purā uditam
dharā tattva a vibhedena yaḥ prakāśaḥ prakāśate

original: AbhT_10.168b/. sa eva śivanātho@tra pṛthivī brahma tanmatam // 168
analyzed: saḥ eva śiva nāthā utra pṛthivī brahma tat matam
dharā tattva gatāḥ siddhīḥ vitarītum samudyatān

original: AbhT_10.169b/. prerayanti śivecchāto ye te mantramaheśvarāḥ // 169
analyzed: prerayanti śiva icchātaḥ ye te mantramaheśvarāḥ
preryamāṇāḥ tu mantreśāḥ mantrāḥ tad vācakāḥ sphuṭam
dharā tattva gatam yogam abhyasya śiva vidyayā
na tu pāśava sāṃkhyīya vaiṣṇava ādi dvi tādṛśā

original: AbhT_10.172a/. tāvattattvopabhogena ye kalpānte layaṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: tāvat tattva upabhogena ye kalpa ante layam gatāḥ
sauṣupta avasthayā upetāḥ te tra pralaya kevalāḥ

original: AbhT_10.173a/. sauṣupte tattvalīnatvaṃ sphuṭameva hi lakṣyate /
analyzed: sauṣupte tattva līna tvam sphuṭam eva hi lakṣyate
anyathā niyata svapna saṃdṛṣṭiḥ jāyate kutas

original: AbhT_10.174a/. sauṣuptamapi citraṃ ca svacchāsvacchādi bhāsate /
analyzed: sauṣuptam api citram ca svaccha asvaccha ādi bhāsate
asvāpsam sukham ityādi smṛti vaicitrya darśanāt

original: AbhT_10.175a/. yadaiva sa kṣaṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ nidrāyaiva prabuddhyate /
analyzed: yadā eva sa kṣaṇam sūkṣmam nidrāya eva prabuddhyate
tadā eva smṛtiḥ eṣā iti na artha ja jñāna jā smṛtiḥ
tena mūḍhaiḥ yat ucyeta prabuddhasya antarā antarā
tūlikā ādi sukha sparśa smṛtiḥ eṣā iti tat kutas

original: AbhT_10.177b/. dharādhirohiṇo jñeyāḥ sakalā iha pudgalāḥ // 177
analyzed: dharā adhirohiṇaḥ jñeyāḥ sakalāḥ iha pudgalāḥ
asya eva saptakasya sva sva vyāpāra prakalpane

original: AbhT_10.178b/. prakṣobho yastadevoktaṃ śaktīnāṃ saptakaṃ sphuṭam // 178
analyzed: prakṣobhaḥ yaḥ tat eva uktam śaktīnām saptakam sphuṭam
śivaḥ hi acyuta cit rūpaḥ tisraḥ tad śaktayaḥ tu yāḥ
tāḥ svātantrya vaśa upātta grahītṛ ākāra tā vaśāt

original: AbhT_10.180a/. tridhā mantrāvasānāḥ syurudāsīnā iva sthitāḥ /
analyzed: tridhā mantra avasānāḥ syuḥ udāsīnāḥ iva sthitāḥ
grāhya ākāra uparāgāt tu grahītṛ ākāra tā vaśāt
sakala antāḥ tu tāḥ tisraḥ icchā jñāna kriyāḥ matāḥ

original: AbhT_10.181b/. saptadhetthaṃ pramātṛtvaṃ tatkṣobho mānatā tathā // 181
analyzed: saptadhā ittham pramātṛ tvam tad kṣobhaḥ māna tā tathā
yat tu grahītṛ tā rūpa saṃvid saṃsparśa varjitam

original: AbhT_10.182b/. śuddhaṃ jaḍaṃ tatsvarūpamitthaṃ viśvaṃ trikātmakam // 182
analyzed: śuddham jaḍam tad svarūpam ittham viśvam trika ātmakam
evam jala ādi api vadet bhedaiḥ bhinnam mahāmatiḥ

original: AbhT_10.183b/. anayā tu diśā prāyaḥ sarvabhedeṣu vidyate // 183
analyzed: anayā tu diśā prāyas sarva bhedeṣu vidyate
bhedaḥ mantra maheśa anteṣu eṣa pañcadaśa ātmakaḥ
tathā api sphuṭatā abhāvāt san api eṣa na carcitaḥ

original: AbhT_10.185a/. etacca sūtritaṃ dhātrā śrīpūrve yadbravīti hi /
analyzed: etat ca sūtritam dhātrā śrī pūrve yat bravīti hi
abhinne api śive ntar stha sūkṣma bodha anusārataḥ
adhunā prāṇa śakti sthe tattva jāle vivicyate
bhedaḥ yam pāñcadaśya ādiḥ yathā śrī śaṃbhuḥ ādiśat

original: AbhT_10.187b/. samaste@rthe@tra nirgrāhye tuṭayaḥ ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇāḥ // 187
analyzed: nirgrāhye tuṭayaḥ ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇāḥ
ṣaṭtriṃśat aṅgule cāre sa aṃśa dvi aṅgula kalpitāḥ
tatra ādyaḥ parama advaitaḥ nirvibhāga rasa ātmakaḥ
antyaḥ tu grāhya tādātmyāt svarūpībhāvam āgataḥ

original: AbhT_10.190a/. pravibhāvyo na hi pṛthagupāntyo grāhakaḥ kṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: pravibhāvyaḥ na hi pṛthak upāntyaḥ grāhakaḥ kṣaṇaḥ

original: AbhT_10.190b/. tṛtīyaṃ kṣaṇamārabhya kṣaṇaṣaṭkaṃ tu yatsthitam // 190
analyzed: tṛtīyam kṣaṇam ārabhya kṣaṇa ṣaṭkam tu yat sthitam
tat nirvikalpam prodgacchat vikalpa ācchādana ātmakam

original: AbhT_10.191b/. tadeva śivarūpaṃ hi paraśaktyātmakaṃ viduḥ // 191
analyzed: tat eva śiva rūpam hi para śakti ātmakam viduḥ
vikalpa rūḍhiḥ api eṣā kramāt prasphuṭa tām gatā
prathame devyaḥ tisraḥ pronmeṣa vṛtti tām

original: AbhT_10.193b/. nimeṣavṛttitāṃ cāśu spṛśantyaḥ ṣaṭkatāṃ gatāḥ // 193
analyzed: nimeṣa vṛtti tām ca āśu spṛśantyaḥ ṣaṭka tām gatāḥ

original: AbhT_10.194a/. evaṃ dvitīyaṣaṭke@pi kiṃ tvatra grāhyavartmanā /
analyzed: evam dvitīya ṣaṭke api kim tu atra grāhya vartmanā
uparāga padam prāpya para apara tayā sthitāḥ

original: AbhT_10.195a/. ādye@tra ṣaṭke tā devyaḥ svātantryollāsamātrataḥ /
analyzed: ādyā itra ṣaṭke tāḥ devyaḥ svātantrya ullāsa mātrataḥ
jighṛkṣite pi upādhau syuḥ para rūpāt avicyutāḥ
asti ca atiśayaḥ kaścid tāsām api uttarottaram
yaḥ viveka dhanaiḥ dhīraiḥ sphuṭīkṛtya api darśyate

original: AbhT_10.197a/. kecittvekāṃ tuṭiṃ grāhye caikāmapi grahītari /
analyzed: kecid tu ekām tuṭim grāhye ca ekām api grahītari

original: AbhT_10.197b/. tādātmyena vinikṣipya saptakaṃ saptakaṃ viduḥ // 197
analyzed: tādātmyena vinikṣipya saptakam saptakam viduḥ
tat asyām sūkṣma saṃvittau kalanāya samudyatāḥ

original: AbhT_10.198b/. saṃvedayante yadrūpaṃ tatra kiṃ vāgvikatthanaiḥ // 198
analyzed: saṃvedayante yat rūpam tatra kim vāc vikatthanaiḥ
evam dharā ādi mūla antam prakriyā prāṇa gāminī
guru parva kramāt proktā bhede pañcadaśa ātmake
kramāt tu bheda nyūna tve nyūna tā syāt tuṭiṣu api

original: AbhT_10.200b/. tasyāṃ hrāso vikalpasya sphuṭatā cāvikalpinaḥ // 200
analyzed: tasyām hrāsaḥ vikalpasya sphuṭa tā ca avikalpinaḥ
yathā hi cira duḥkha ārtaḥ paścāt ātta sukha sthitiḥ
vismarati eva tad duḥkham sukha viśrānti vartmanā

original: AbhT_10.202a/. tathā gatavikalpe@pi rūḍhāḥ saṃvedane janāḥ /
analyzed: tathā gata vikalpe api rūḍhāḥ saṃvedane janāḥ
vikalpa viśrānti balāt tām sattām na abhimanvate
saṃvid sva rūpa prakaṭa tvam ittham tatra avadhāne yatatām su buddhiḥ
grāhya grāhaka saṃvittau saṃbandhe sāvadhāna tā

original: AbhT_10.204b/. iyaṃ sā tatra tatroktā sarvakāmadughā yataḥ // 204
analyzed: iyam sā tatra tatra uktā sarva kāmadughā yatas

original: AbhT_10.205a/. evaṃ dvayaṃ dvayaṃ yāvannyūnībhavati bhedagam /
analyzed: evam dvayam dvayam yāvat nyūnībhavati bheda gam

original: AbhT_10.205b/. tāvattuṭidvayaṃ yāti nyūnatāṃ kramaśaḥ sphuṭam // 205
analyzed: tāvat tuṭi dvayam yāti nyūna tām kramaśas sphuṭam

original: AbhT_10.206a/. ata eva śivāveśe dvituṭiḥ parigīyate /
analyzed: atas eva śiva āveśe dvi tuṭiḥ parigīyate

original: AbhT_10.206b/. ekā tu sā tuṭistatra pūrṇā śuddhaiva kevalam // 206
analyzed: ekā tu sā tuṭiḥ tatra pūrṇā śuddhā eva kevalam
rūpā eva sarva jñāna kriyā ātmikā

original: AbhT_10.207b/. tasyāmavahito yogī kiṃ na vetti karoti vā // 207
analyzed: tasyām avahitaḥ yogī kim na vetti karoti vā

original: AbhT_10.208a/. tathā coktaṃ kallaṭena śrīmatā tuṭipātagaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca uktam kallaṭena śrīmatā tuṭi pāta gaḥ

original: AbhT_10.208b/. lābhaḥ sarvajñakartṛtve tuṭeḥ pāto@parā tuṭiḥ // 208
analyzed: lābhaḥ sarvajña kartṛ tve tuṭeḥ pāta uparā tuṭiḥ

original: AbhT_10.209a/. ādyāyāṃ tu tuṭau sarvaṃ sarvataḥ pūrṇamekatām /
analyzed: ādyāyām tu tuṭau sarvam sarvatas pūrṇam eka tām

original: AbhT_10.209b/. gataṃ kiṃ tatra vedyaṃ vā kāryaṃ vā vyapadeśabhāk // 209
analyzed: gatam kim tatra vedyam vā kāryam vā vyapadeśa bhāj
atas bheda samullāsa kalām prāthamikīm budhāḥ
cinvanti pratibhām devīm sarvajña tva ādi siddhaye
sā eva śaktiḥ śivasya uktā tṛtīya ādi tuṭiṣu atha
mantra ādidhi
nātha tad śakti mantreśa ādyāḥ krama uditāḥ
tāsu saṃdadhataḥ cittam avadhāna eka dharmakam
tad tad siddhi samāveśaḥ svayam eva upajāyate

original: AbhT_10.213a/. ata eva yathā bhedabahutvaṃ dūratā tathā /
analyzed: atas eva yathā bheda bahu tvam dūra tā tathā
saṃvittau tuṭi bāhulyāt akṣa artha asaṃnikarṣa vat

original: AbhT_10.214a/. yathā yathā hi nyūnatvaṃ tuṭīnāṃ hrāsato bhidaḥ /
analyzed: yathā yathā hi nyūna tvam tuṭīnām hrāsataḥ bhidaḥ
tathā tathā ati naikaṭyam saṃvidaḥ syāt śiva avadhi
śiva tattvam atas proktam antikam sarvatomutaḥ

original: AbhT_10.215b/. ata eva prayatno@yaṃ tatpraveśe na vidyate // 215
analyzed: atas eva prayatnaḥ uyam tad praveśe na vidyate

original: AbhT_10.216a/. yathā yathā hi dūratvaṃ yatnayogastathā tathā /
analyzed: yathā yathā hi dūra tvam yatna yogaḥ tathā tathā
bhāvanā karaṇa ādīnām śive niravakāśa tām

original: AbhT_10.217a/. ata eva hi manyante saṃpradāyadhanā janāḥ /
analyzed: atas eva hi manyante saṃpradāya dhanāḥ janāḥ

original: AbhT_10.217b/. tathā hi dṛśyatāṃ loko ghaṭādervedane yathā // 217
analyzed: tathā hi dṛśyatām lokaḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ vedane yathā
prayatnavān iva ābhāti tathā kim sukha vedane
āntara tvam idam prāhuḥ saṃvid naikaṭya śāli tām

original: AbhT_10.219a/. tāṃ ca cidrūpatonmeṣaṃ bāhyatvaṃ tannimeṣatām /
analyzed: tām ca cit rūpa tā unmeṣam bāhya tvam tad nimeṣa tām
bhavinām tu antikā upi evam na bhāti iti ati dūra tā

original: AbhT_10.220a/. dūre@pi hyantikībhūte bhānaṃ syāttvatra tatkatham /
analyzed: dūre api hi antikībhūte bhānam syāt tu atra tat katham
na ca bīja aṅkura latā dala puṣpa phala ādi vat
bījāt latā tu aṅkurāt no bījāt iha sarvatas

original: AbhT_10.222a/. saṃvittattvaṃ bhāsamānaṃ paripūrṇaṃ hi sarvataḥ /
analyzed: saṃvid tattvam bhāsamānam paripūrṇam hi sarvatas

original: AbhT_10.222b/. sarvasya kāraṇaṃ proktaṃ sarvatraivoditaṃ yataḥ // 222
analyzed: sarvasya kāraṇam proktam sarvatra eva uditam yatas

original: AbhT_10.223a/. tata eva ghaṭe@pyeṣā prāṇavṛttiryadi sphuret /
analyzed: tatas eva ghaṭe pi eṣā prāṇa vṛttiḥ yadi sphuret

original: AbhT_10.223b/. viśrāmyeccāśu tatraiva śivabīje layaṃ vrajet // 223
analyzed: viśrāmyet ca āśu tatra eva śivabīje layam vrajet

original: AbhT_10.224a/. na tu kramikatā kācicchivātmatve kadācana /
analyzed: na tu kramikatā kācid śiva ātma tve kadācana
anyat mantra ādidhi
nātha ādi kāraṇam tat tu saṃnidheḥ

original: AbhT_10.225a/. śivābhedācca kiṃ cātha dvaite naikaṭyavedanāt /
analyzed: śiva abhedāt ca kim ca atha dvaite naikaṭya vedanāt

original: AbhT_10.225b/. anayā ca diśā sarva sarvadā pravivecayan // 225
analyzed: anayā ca diśā

original: AbhT_10.226a/. bhairavāyata eva drāk ciccakreśvaratāṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: bhairavāyataḥ eva drāk ciccakra īśvara tām gataḥ

original: AbhT_10.226b/. sa itthaṃ prāṇago bhedaḥ khecarīcakragopitaḥ // 226
analyzed: saḥ ittham prāṇa gaḥ bhedaḥ khecarī cakra gopitaḥ
mayā prakaṭitaḥ śrīmat śāmbhava ājñā anuvartinā

original: AbhT_10.227b/. atraivādhvani vedyatvaṃ prāpte yā saṃvidudbhavet // 227
analyzed: atra eva adhvani vedya tvam prāpte yā saṃvid udbhavet
tasyāḥ svakam yat vaicitryam tat avasthā pada abhidham

original: AbhT_10.228b/. jāgratsvapnaḥ suṣuptaṃ ca turyaṃ ca tadatītakam // 228
analyzed: jāgrat svapnaḥ suṣuptam ca turyam ca tad atītakam
iti pañca padāni āhuḥ ekasmin vedake sati
tatra yā eṣā dharā tattvāt śiva antā tattva paddhatiḥ
tasyām ekaḥ pramātā ced avaśyam jāgrat ādikam
tat darśyate śaṃbhunātha prasādāt viditam mayā
yat adhiṣṭheyam eva iha na adhiṣṭhātṛ kadācana
saṃvedana gatam vedyam tat jāgrat samudāhṛtam
caitra maitra ādi bhūtāni tattvāni ca dharā āditaḥ

original: AbhT_10.232b/. abhidhākaraṇībhūtāḥ śabdāḥ kiṃ cābhidhā pramā // 232
analyzed: abhidhā karaṇībhūtāḥ śabdāḥ kim ca abhidhā pramā
viśvam etat adhiṣṭheyam yadā jāgrat tadā smṛtam

original: AbhT_10.234a/. tathā hi bhāsate yattannīlamantaḥ pravedane /
analyzed: tathā hi bhāsate yat tat nīlam antar pravedane
saṃkalpa rūpe bāhyasya tat adhiṣṭhātṛ bodhakam

original: AbhT_10.235a/. yattu bāhyatayā nīlaṃ cakāstyasya na vidyate /
analyzed: yat tu bāhya tayā nīlam cakāsti asya na vidyate
kathaṃcid api adhiṣṭhātṛ bhāvaḥ tat jāgrat ucyate

original: AbhT_10.236a/. tatra caitre bhāsamāne yo dehāṃśaḥ sa kathyate /
analyzed: tatra caitre bhāsamāne yaḥ deha aṃśaḥ sa kathyate

original: AbhT_10.236b/. abuddho yastu mānāṃśaḥ sa buddho mitikārakaḥ // 236
analyzed: abuddhaḥ yaḥ tu māna aṃśaḥ sa buddhaḥ miti kārakaḥ

original: AbhT_10.237a/. prabuddhaḥ suprabuddhaśca pramāmātreti ca kramaḥ /
analyzed: prabuddhaḥ suprabuddhaḥ ca pramā mātrā iti ca kramaḥ

original: AbhT_10.237b/. cāturvidhyaṃ hi piṇḍasthanāmni jāgrati kīrtitam // 237
analyzed: cāturvidhyam hi piṇḍa stha nāmni jāgrati kīrtitam

original: AbhT_10.238a/. jāgradādi catuṣkaṃ hi pratyekamiha vidyate /
analyzed: jāgrat ādi catuṣkam hi pratyekam iha vidyate
jāgrat jāgrat abuddham tat jāgrat svapnaḥ tu buddha tā
ityādi turyātītam tu sarvaga tvāt pṛthak kutas

original: AbhT_10.239b/. uktaṃ ca piṇḍagaṃ jāgradabuddhaṃ buddhameva ca // 239
analyzed: uktam ca piṇḍa gam jāgrat abuddham buddham eva ca

original: AbhT_10.240a/. prabuddhaṃ suprabuddhaṃ ca caturvidhamidaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: prabuddham suprabuddham ca caturvidham idam smṛtam
meya bhūmiḥ iyam mukhyā jāgrat ākhyā anyat antarā
bhūtatattva abhidhānānām yaḥ oṃśaḥ adhiṣṭheyaḥ ucyate
piṇḍa stham iti tam prāhuḥ iti śrī mālinīmate
laukikī jāgrat iti eṣā saṃjñā piṇḍa stham iti api
yoginām yoga siddhi artham saṃjñā iyam paribhāṣyate
adhiṣṭheya samāpattim adhyāsīnasya yoginaḥ

original: AbhT_10.243b/. tādātmyaṃ kila piṇḍasthaṃ mitaṃ piṇḍaṃ hi piṇḍitam // 243
analyzed: tādātmyam kila piṇḍa stham mitam piṇḍam hi piṇḍitam
prasaṃkhyāna eka rūḍhānām jñāninām tu tat ucyate
sarvatobhadram āpūrṇam sarvatas vedya sattayā
sarva sattā samāpūrṇa viśvam paśyet yatas yatas
jñānī tatas tatas saṃvitta tvam asya prakāśate
loka yoga prasaṃkhyāna trairūpya vaśataḥ kila

original: AbhT_10.246b/. nāmāni trīṇi bhaṇyante svapnādiṣvapyayaṃ vidhiḥ // 246
analyzed: nāmāni trīṇi bhaṇyante svapna ādiṣu api ayam vidhiḥ
yat tu adhiṣṭhāna karaṇa bhāvam adhyāsya vartate
vedyam sat pūrva kathitam bhūta tattva abhidhā mayam

original: AbhT_10.248a/. tatsvapno mukhyato jñeyaṃ tacca vaikalpike pathi /
analyzed: tat svapnaḥ mukhyatas jñeyam tat ca vaikalpike pathi
vaikalpika patha ārūḍha vedya sāmya avabhāsanāt
loka rūḍhaḥ api asau svapnaḥ sāmyam ca abāhya rūpa tā
utprekṣā svapna saṃkalpa smṛti unmāda ādi dṛṣṭiṣu
vispaṣṭam yat vedya jātam jāgrat mukhya tayā eva tat
yat tu tatra api avispaṣṭam spaṣṭa adhiṣṭhātṛ bhāsate
vikalpa antara gam vedyam tat svapna padam ucyate

original: AbhT_10.251b/. tadaiva tasya vettyeva svayameva hyabāhyatām // 251
analyzed: tadā eva tasya vetti eva svayam eva hi abāhyatām

original: AbhT_10.252b/. tatrāpi cāturvidhyaṃ tat prāgdiśaiva prakalpayet // 252
analyzed: tatra api cāturvidhyam tat prāc diśā eva prakalpayet
gatāgatam su vikṣiptam saṃgatam su samāhitam

original: AbhT_10.253b/. atrāpi pūrvavannāma laukikaṃ svapna ityadaḥ // 253
analyzed: atra api pūrvavat nāma laukikam svapnaḥ iti adaḥ
bāhya abhimata bhāvānām svāpaḥ hi agrahaṇam matam
sarva adhvanaḥ padam prāṇaḥ saṃkalpa uvagama ātmakaḥ

original: AbhT_10.255a/. padaṃ ca tatsamāpatti padasthaṃ yogino viduḥ /
analyzed: padam ca tad samāpatti pada stham yoginaḥ viduḥ
vedya sattām bahis bhūtām an apekṣya eva sarvatas

original: AbhT_10.256a/. vedye svātantryabhāg jñānaṃ svapnaṃ vyāptitayā bhajet /
analyzed: bhajet
māna bhūmiḥ iyam mukhyā svapnaḥ hi āmarśana ātmakaḥ
vedya chāyā uvabhāsaḥ hi meya adhiṣṭhānam ucyate
yat tu adhiṣṭhātṛ bhūta ādeḥ pūrva uktasya vapuḥ dhruvam
bījam viśvasya tat tūṣṇīṃbhūtam sauṣuptam ucyate

original: AbhT_10.258b/. anubhūtau vikalpe ca yo@sau draṣṭā sa eva hi // 258
analyzed: anubhūtau vikalpe ca yaḥ asau draṣṭā saḥ eva hi

original: AbhT_10.259a/. na bhāvagrahaṇaṃ tena suṣṭhu suptatvamucyate /
analyzed: na bhāva grahaṇam tena suṣṭhu supta tvam ucyate

original: AbhT_10.259b/. tatsāmyāllaukikīṃ nidrāṃ suṣuptaṃ manvate budhāḥ // 259
analyzed: tad sāmyāt laukikīm nidrām suṣuptam manvate budhāḥ
sāmyam tūṣṇīṃsvabhāva tā

original: AbhT_10.260b/. mukhyā mātṛdaśā seyaṃ suṣuptākhyā nigadyate // 260
analyzed: mukhyā mātṛ daśā sā iyam suṣupta ākhyā nigadyate

original: AbhT_10.261a/. rūpakatvācca rūpaṃ tattādātmyaṃ yoginaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: rūpaka tvāt ca rūpam tat tādātmyam yoginaḥ punar
rūpa stham tad samāpattyā audāsīnyam rūpiṇām viduḥ
prasaṃkhyānavataḥ kā api vedya saṃkocanā atra yat
nā asti tena mahāvyāptiḥ iyam tad anusārataḥ

original: AbhT_10.263a/. udāsīnasya tasyāpi vedyaṃ yena caturvidham /
analyzed: udāsīnasya tasya api vedyam yena caturvidham
uditam vipulam śāntam su prasannam atha aparam

original: AbhT_10.264b/. yattu pramātmakaṃ rūpaṃ pramāturupari sthitam // 264
analyzed: yat tu pramā ātmakam rūpam pramātuḥ upari sthitam
pūrṇa tā gamana aunmukhyam audāsīnyāt paricyutiḥ
tat turyam ucyate śakti samāveśaḥ hi asau mataḥ

original: AbhT_10.266a/. sā saṃvitsvaprakāśā tu kaiściduktā prameyataḥ /
analyzed: sā saṃvid sva prakāśā tu kaiścid uktā prameyataḥ

original: AbhT_10.266b/. mānānmātuśca bhinnaiva tadarthaṃ tritayaṃ yataḥ // 266
analyzed: mānāt mātuḥ ca bhinnā eva tad artham tritayam yatas

original: AbhT_10.267a/. meyaṃ māne mātari tat so@pi tasyāṃ mitau sphuṭam /
analyzed: meyam māne mātari tat sā upi tasyām mitau sphuṭam
viśrāmyati iti sā eva eṣā devī viśva eka jīvitam
rūpam dṛśā aham iti aṃśa trayam uttīrya vartate
dvāra mātra āśrita upāyā paśyāmi iti anupāyikā
pramātṛ tā svatantra tva rūpā sā iyam prakāśate

original: AbhT_10.269b/. saṃvitturīyarūpaivaṃ prakāśātmā svayaṃ ca sā // 269
analyzed: saṃvid turīya rūpā evam prakāśa ātmā svayam ca sā
bhavati
tad samāveśa uparāgāt māna tvam meya tā punar
tad samāveśa naikaṭyāt trayam tad tad anugrahāt
vedi ādi bheda galanāt uktā sā iyam anāmayā
mātṛ ādi anugrahāt ādhā
nāt sa vyāpārā iti bhaṇyate
jāgrat ādi api devasya śakti tvena vyavasthitam

original: AbhT_10.273a/. aparaṃ parāparaṃ ca dvidhā tatsā parā tviyam /
analyzed: aparam parāparam ca dvidhā tat sā parā tu iyam
rūpaka tvāt udāsīnāt cyutā iyam pūrṇa tā unmukhī

original: AbhT_10.274a/. daśā tasyāṃ samāpattī rūpātītaṃ tu yoginaḥ /
analyzed: daśā tasyām samāpattiḥ rūpātītam tu yoginaḥ
pūrṇa tā aunmukhya yogi tvāt viśvam paśyati tad mayaḥ
prasaṃkhyātā pracayataḥ tena iyam pracayaḥ matā
na etasyām aparā turya daśā saṃbhāvyate kila

original: AbhT_10.276a/. saṃvinna kila vedyā sā vittvenaiva hi bhāsate /
analyzed: saṃvid na kila vedyā sā vid tvena eva hi bhāsate
jāgrat ādyāḥ tu saṃbhāvyāḥ tisraḥ syāḥ prāc daśā yatas
tritaya anugrahāt sā iyam tena uktā trikaśāsane
manonmanam anantam ca sarvārtham iti bhedataḥ
yat tu pūrṇa anavacchinna vapuḥ ānanda nirbharam

original: AbhT_10.278b/. turyātītaṃ tu tatprāhustadeva paramaṃ padam // 278
analyzed: turyātītam tu tat prāhuḥ tat eva paramam padam
na atra yogasya sadbhāvaḥ bhāvanā ādeḥ abhāvataḥ
aprameye paricchinne svatantre bhāvya tā kutas
yoga ādi abhāvataḥ tena nām asmin ādiśat vibhuḥ
prasaṃkhyāna balāt tu etat rūpam pūrṇa tva yogataḥ
anuttarāt iha proktam mahāpracaya saṃjñitam

original: AbhT_10.281b/. pūrṇatvādeva bhedānāmasyāṃ saṃbhāvanā na hi // 281
analyzed: pūrṇa tvāt eva bhedānām asyām saṃbhāvanā na hi

original: AbhT_10.282a/. tannirāsāya naitasyāṃ bheda ukto viśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: tad nirāsāya na etasyām bhedaḥ uktaḥ viśeṣaṇam
satata uditam iti etat sarva vyāpi tva sūcakam

original: AbhT_10.283a/. na hyeka eva bhavati bhedaḥ kvacana kaścana /
analyzed: na hi ekaḥ eva bhavati bhedaḥ kvacana kaścana

original: AbhT_10.283b/. turyātīte bheda ekaḥ satatodita ityayam // 283
analyzed: turyātīte bhedaḥ ekaḥ satata uditaḥ iti ayam
mūḍha vādaḥ tena siddham avibhedi tvam asya tu
śrī pūrvaśāstre tena uktam pada stham aparam viduḥ
mantrāḥ tad patayaḥ sa īśāḥ rūpa stham iti kīrtyate
rūpātītam parā śaktiḥ sa vyāpārā api anāmayā
niṣprapañcaḥ nirābhāsaḥ śuddhaḥ sva ātmani avasthitaḥ

original: AbhT_10.286b/. sarvātītaḥ śivo jñeyo yaṃ viditvā vimucyate // 286
analyzed: sarva atītaḥ śivaḥ jñeyaḥ yam viditvā vimucyate
iti śrī sumati prajñācandrikā śānta tāmasaḥ

original: AbhT_10.288a/. anye tu kathayantyeṣāṃ bhaṅgīmanyādṛśīṃ śritāḥ /
analyzed: anye tu kathayanti eṣām bhaṅgīm anyādṛśīm śritāḥ
yat rūpam jāgrat ādīnām tat idānīm nirūpyate
tatra akṣa vṛttim āśritya bāhya ākāra grahaḥ hi yaḥ
tat jāgrat sphuṭam āsīnam anubandhi punar punar
ātma saṃkalpa nirmāṇam svapnaḥ jāgrat viparyayaḥ
sthirībhavet niśā bhāvāt suptam saukhya ādya vedane
jñānākalasya malataḥ kevalāt bhoga mātrataḥ
bhedavantaḥ svatas bhinnāḥ cikīrṣyante jaḍa a jaḍāḥ
turye tatra sthitāḥ mantra tad nātha adhīśvarāḥ trayaḥ
yāvat bhairava bodha antar praveśana sahiṣṇavaḥ
bhāvāḥ vigalat ātmīya sārāḥ svayam abhedinaḥ
turyātīta pade saṃsyuḥ iti pañcadaśa ātmake

original: AbhT_10.294b/. yasya yadyatsphuṭaṃ rūpaṃ tajjāgraditi manyatām // 294
analyzed: yasya yat yat sphuṭam rūpam tat jāgrat iti manyatām
yat eva asthiram ābhāti sa pūrvam svapnaḥ īdṛśaḥ

original: AbhT_10.295b/. asphuṭaṃ tu yadābhāti suptaṃ tattatpuro@pi yat // 295
analyzed: asphuṭam tu yat ābhāti suptam tat tat purā upi yat
trayasya asya anusaṃdhiḥ tu yad vaśāt upajāyate
sraj sūtra kalpam tat turyam sarva bhedeṣu gṛhyatām
yat tu advaita bhara ullāsa drāvita aśeṣa bhedakam

original: AbhT_10.297b/. turyātītaṃ tu tatprāhuritthaṃ sarvatra yojayet // 297
analyzed: turyātītam tu tat prāhuḥ ittham sarvatra yojayet

original: AbhT_10.298a/. layākale tu svaṃ rūpaṃ jāgrattatpūrvavṛtti tu /

analyzed: svapna ādi iti kramam sarvam sarvatra anusaret budhaḥ
ekatra api prabhau pūrṇe cit turya atītam ucyate
ānandaḥ turyam icchā eva bīja bhūmiḥ suṣupta tā

original: AbhT_10.300a/. jñānaśaktiḥ svapna uktaḥ kriyāśaktistu jāgṛtiḥ /
analyzed: jñāna śaktiḥ svapnaḥ uktaḥ kriyā śaktiḥ tu jāgṛtiḥ

original: AbhT_10.300b/. na caivamupacāraḥ syātsarvaṃ tatraiva vastutaḥ // 300
analyzed: na ca evam upacāraḥ syāt sarvam tatra eva vastutas

original: AbhT_10.301a/. na cenna kvāpi mukhyatvaṃ nopacāro@pi tatkvacit /
analyzed: na ced na kvāpi mukhya tvam na upacāraḥ api tat kvacid
etat śrī pūrvaśāstre ca sphuṭam uktam maheśinā

original: AbhT_10.302a/. tatra svarūpaṃ śaktiśca sakalaśceti tattrayam /
analyzed: tatra svarūpam śaktiḥ ca sakalaḥ ca iti tat trayam
iti jāgrat avastheyam bhede pañcadaśa ātmake
turyātītam śakti śaṃbhū trayodaśa abhidhe punar
sva rūpam jāgrat anyat tu prāgvat pralaya kevale

original: AbhT_10.304b/. svaṃ jāgratsvapnasupte dve turyādyatra ca pūrvavat // 304
analyzed: svam jāgrat svapna supte dve turyāt yatra ca pūrvavat
vijñānākala bhede pi svam mantrāḥ mantranāyakāḥ
tad īśāḥ śakti śaṃbhu ittham pañca syuḥ jāgrat ādayaḥ

original: AbhT_10.306a/. saptabhede tu mantrākhye svaṃ mantreśā maheśvarāḥ /
analyzed: sapta bhede tu mantra ākhye svam mantreśāḥ maheśvarāḥ

original: AbhT_10.306b/. śaktiḥ śaṃbhuśca pañcoktā avasthā jāgradādayaḥ // 306
analyzed: śaktiḥ śaṃbhuḥ ca pañca uktāḥ avasthāḥ jāgrat ādayaḥ
svarūpam mantra māheśī śaktiḥ mantramaheśvaraḥ

original: AbhT_10.307b/. śaktiḥ śaṃbhurimāḥ pañca mantreśe pañcabhedake // 307
analyzed: śaktiḥ śaṃbhuḥ imāḥ pañca mantreśe pañca bhedake

original: AbhT_10.308a/. svaṃ kriyā jñānamicchā ca śaṃbhuratra ca pañcamī /
analyzed: svam kriyā jñānam icchā ca śaṃbhuḥ atra ca pañcamī
vyāpārāt ādhipatyāt ca tat dhānyā preraka tvataḥ
icchā nivṛtteḥ svastha tvāt śivaḥ ekaḥ api pañcadhā
iti eṣa darśitaḥ smābhiḥ tattvādhvā vistarāt atha
atha śrī tantrāloke ekādaśam āhnikam
yathā pūrva ukta bhuvana madhye nija nijam gaṇam

original: AbhT_11.2b/. anuyatparato bhinnaṃ tattvaṃ nāmeti bhaṇyate // 2
analyzed: anuyat paratas bhinnam tattvam nāma iti bhaṇyate
tathā teṣu api tattveṣu sva varga inugama ātmakam
vyāvṛttam para vargāt ca kalā iti śiva śāsane
kecid āhuḥ punar yā asau śaktiḥ antar su sūkṣmikā

original: AbhT_11.4b/. tattvānāṃ sā kaletyuktā dharaṇyāṃ dhārikā yathā // 4
analyzed: tattvānām sā kalā iti uktā dharaṇyām dhārikā yathā

original: AbhT_11.5a/. atra pakṣadvaye vastu na bhinnaṃ bhāsate yataḥ /
analyzed: atra pakṣa dvaye vastu na bhinnam bhāsate yatas
anugāmi na sāmānyam iṣṭam naiyāyika ādi vat
anye vadanti dīkṣā ādau sukha saṃgrahaṇa arthataḥ

original: AbhT_11.6b/. śivena kalpito vargaḥ kaleti samayāśrayaḥ // 6
analyzed: śivena kalpitaḥ vargaḥ kalā iti samaya āśrayaḥ
kṛtaḥ ca devadevena samaya uparama artha tām

original: AbhT_11.7b/. na gacchatīti nāsatyo na cānyasamayodayaḥ // 7
analyzed: na gacchati iti na asatyaḥ na ca anya samaya udayaḥ

original: AbhT_11.8b/. vidyā niśānte śāntā ca śaktyante@ṇḍamidaṃ catuḥ // 8
analyzed: vidyā niśā ante śāntā ca śakti anta iṇḍam idam catuḥ

original: AbhT_11.9a/. śāntātītā śive tattve kalātītaḥ paraḥ śivaḥ /
AbhT_11.9b/. nahyatra vargīkaraṇaṃ samayaḥ kalanāpi vā // 9
analyzed: na hi atra vargīkaraṇam samayaḥ kalanā api vā
yujyate sarvatodikkam svātantrya ullāsa dhāmani
svātantryāt tu nijam rūpam boddhṛ dharmāt avicyutam
bodhya tām ānayan devaḥ sphuṭam eva vibhāvyate
yatas utas śivatattve pi kalā saṃgatiḥ ucyate
aṇḍam ca nāma bhuvana vibhāga sthiti kāraṇam

original: AbhT_11.13a/. prāhurāvaraṇaṃ tacca śaktyantaṃ yāvadasti hi /
analyzed: prāhuḥ āvaraṇam tat ca śakti antam yāvat asti hi

original: AbhT_11.13b/. yadyapi prāk śivākhye@pi tattve bhuvanapaddhatiḥ // 13
analyzed: yadi api prāk śiva ākhye api tattve bhuvana paddhatiḥ
uktā tathā api apratighe na asmin āvṛti saṃbhavaḥ

original: AbhT_11.14b/. nanvevaṃ dharaṇīṃ muktvā śaktau prakṛtimāyayoḥ // 14
analyzed: nanu evam dharaṇīm muktvā śaktau prakṛti māyayoḥ
api ca apratigha tve pi katham aṇḍasya saṃbhavaḥ
atra asmat guravaḥ prāhuḥ yat pṛthivī ādi pañcakam
pratyakṣam idam ābhāti tatonyat na asti kiṃcana

original: AbhT_11.17b/. triṃśattattvaṃ vibhedātma tadabhedo niśā matā // 17
analyzed: triṃśat tattvam vibheda ātma tat abhedaḥ niśā matā
vikāsa utka svatantra tve śiva antam pañcakam jaguḥ

original: AbhT_11.19a/. śrīmatkālottarādau ca kathitaṃ bhūyasā tathā /
analyzed: śrīmat kālottara ādau ca kathitam bhūyasā tathā

original: AbhT_11.19b/. pañcaitāni tu tattvāni yairvyāptamakhilaṃ jagat // 19
analyzed: pañca etāni tu tattvāni yaiḥ vyāptam akhilam jagat
īśāna antam tatra tatra dharā ādi gagana antakam
yat tu sarva a vibhāga ātma svatantram bodha sundaram
saptatriṃśam tu tat prāhuḥ tattvam para śiva abhidham
tasya api ukta nayāt vedya bhāve itra parikalpite
yat āste hi anavacchinnam tat aṣṭātriṃśam ucyate

original: AbhT_11.23b/. na cānavasthā hyevaṃ syāddṛśyatāṃ hi mahātmabhiḥ // 23
analyzed: na ca anavasthā hi evam syāt dṛśyatām hi mahātmabhiḥ
yat vedyam kiṃcid ābhāti tad kṣaye yat prakāśate

original: AbhT_11.24b/. tattattvamiti nirṇītaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśaṃ hṛdi bhāsate // 24
analyzed: tat tattvam iti nirṇītam ṣaṭtriṃśam hṛdi bhāsate

original: AbhT_11.25a/. tatkiṃ na kiṃcidvā kiṃcidityākāṅkṣāvaśe vapuḥ /
analyzed: tat kim na kiṃcid vā kiṃcid iti ākāṅkṣā vaśe vapuḥ

original: AbhT_11.26a/. saptatriṃśaṃ samābhāti tatrākāṅkṣā ca nāparā /
analyzed: saptatriṃśam samābhāti tatra ākāṅkṣā ca na aparā

original: AbhT_11.26b/. taccāpi klṛptavedyatvaṃ yatra bhāti sa cinmayaḥ // 26
analyzed: tat ca api klṛpta vedya tvam yatra bhāti sa cit mayaḥ
aṣṭātriṃśattamaḥ saḥ api bhāvanāya upadiśyate

original: AbhT_11.27b/. yadi nāma tataḥ saptatriṃśa eva punarbhavet // 27
analyzed: yadi nāma tatas saptatriṃśaḥ eva punar bhavet

original: AbhT_11.28b/. samaiva vedyīkaraṇaṃ kevalaṃ tvadhikaṃ yataḥ // 28
analyzed: samā eva vedyīkaraṇam kevalam tu adhikam yatas

original: AbhT_11.29a/. dharāyāṃ guṇatattvānte māyānte kramaśaḥ sthitāḥ /
analyzed: dharāyām guṇa tattva ante māyā ante kramaśas sthitāḥ

original: AbhT_11.29b/. gandho raso rūpamantaḥ sūkṣmabhāvakrameṇa tu // 29
analyzed: gandhaḥ rasaḥ rūpam antar sūkṣma bhāva krameṇa tu

original: AbhT_11.30a/. iti sthite naye śaktitattvānte@pyasti saukṣmyabhāk /
analyzed: iti sthite naye śakti tattva ante pi asti saukṣmya bhāj

original: AbhT_11.30b/. sparśaḥ ko@pi sadā yasmai yoginaḥ spṛhayālavaḥ // 30
analyzed: sparśaḥ kaḥ api sadā yasmai yoginaḥ spṛhayālavaḥ
tad sparśa ante tu saṃvittiḥ śuddha cit vyoma rūpiṇī

original: AbhT_11.31b/. yasyāṃ rūḍhaḥ samabhyeti svaprakāśātmikāṃ parām // 31
analyzed: yasyām rūḍhaḥ samabhyeti sva prakāśa ātmikām parām

original: AbhT_11.32a/. ato vindurato nādo rūpamasmādato rasaḥ /
analyzed: atas vinduḥ atas nādaḥ rūpam asmāt atas rasaḥ

original: AbhT_11.32b/. ityuktaṃ kṣobhakatvena spande sparśastu no tathā // 32
analyzed: iti uktam kṣobhaka tvena spande sparśaḥ tu no tathā
matam ca etat maheśasya śrī pūrve yat abhāṣata
dhārikā āpyāyinī boddhrī pavitrī ca avakāśa dā
ebhiḥ śabdaiḥ vyavaharan nivṛttya ādeḥ nijam vapuḥ
pañcatattva vidhiḥ proktaḥ tri tattvam adhunā ucyate

original: AbhT_11.35b/. śeṣe śivastritattve syādekatattve śivaḥ param // 35
analyzed: śeṣe śivaḥ tri tattve syāt eka tattve śivaḥ param
imau bhedau ubhau tattva bheda mātra kṛtau iti

original: AbhT_11.36b/. tattvādhvaivāyamitthaṃ ca na ṣaḍadhvasthiteḥ kṣatiḥ // 36
analyzed: tattvādhvā eva ayam ittham ca na ṣaḍadhva sthiteḥ kṣatiḥ

original: AbhT_11.37a/. prakṛt pumānyatiḥ kālo māyā vidyeśasauśivau /

analyzed: śivaḥ ca nava tattve pi vidhau tattvādhva rūpa tā
evam aṣṭādaśa ākhye api vidhau nyāyam vadet sudhīḥ

original: AbhT_11.38b/. yatra yatra hi bhogecchā tatprādhānyopayogataḥ // 38
analyzed: yatra yatra hi bhoga icchā tad prādhānya upayogataḥ
anya antar bhāvanātaḥ ca dīkṣā ananta vibheda bhāj
tena ṣaṭtriṃśataḥ yāvat eka tattva vidhiḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_11.40a/. tattvādhvaiva sa devena prokto vyāsasamāsataḥ /
analyzed: tattvādhvā eva sa devena proktaḥ vyāsa samāsataḥ
eka tattva vidhiḥ ca eṣa su prabuddham gurum prati

original: AbhT_11.41a/. śiṣyaṃ ca gatabhogāśamuditaḥ śaṃbhunā yataḥ /
analyzed: śiṣyam ca gata bhoga āśam uditaḥ śaṃbhunā yatas

original: AbhT_11.41b/. bhedaṃ visphārya visphārya śaktyā svacchandarūpayā // 41
analyzed: bhedam visphārya visphārya śaktyā svacchanda rūpayā
sva ātmani abhinne bhagavān nityam viśramayan sthitaḥ
ittham tri ātma adhvanaḥ bhedaḥ sthūla sūkṣma para tvataḥ

original: AbhT_11.43b/. adhunā mātṛbhāgasthaṃ rūpaṃ tredhā nirūpyate // 43
analyzed: adhunā mātṛ bhāga stham rūpam tredhā nirūpyate
yat pramāṇa ātmakam rūpam adhvanaḥ mātṛ bhāga gam
padam hi avagama ātma tva samāveśāt tat ucyate

original: AbhT_11.45a/. tadeva ca padaṃ mantraḥ prakṣobhātpracyutaṃ yadā /
analyzed: tat eva ca padam mantraḥ prakṣobhāt pracyutam yadā

original: AbhT_11.45b/. guptabhāṣī yato mātā tūṣṇīṃbhūto vyavasthitaḥ // 45
analyzed: gupta bhāṣī yatas mātā tūṣṇīṃbhūtaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: AbhT_11.46a/. tathāpi na vimarśātma rūpaṃ tyajati tena saḥ /
analyzed: tathā api na vimarśa ātma rūpam tyajati tena saḥ
pramāṇa ātma vimarśa ātmā mānavat kṣobha bhāj na tu

original: AbhT_11.47a/. mantrāṇāṃ ca padānāṃ ca tenoktaṃ trikaśāsane /
analyzed: mantrāṇām ca padānām ca tena uktam trikaśāsane

original: AbhT_11.47b/. abhinnameva svaṃ rūpaṃ niḥspandakṣobhite param // 47
analyzed: abhinnam eva svam rūpam niḥspanda kṣobhite param
audāsīnya parityāge prakṣobha an avarohaṇe

original: AbhT_11.48b/. varṇādhvā mātṛbhāge syāt pūrvaṃ yā kathitā pramā // 48
analyzed: varṇādhvā mātṛ bhāge syāt pūrvam yā kathitā pramā
sā tu pūrṇa svarūpa tvāt avibhāga mayī yatas

original: AbhT_11.49b/. tata ekaikavarṇatvaṃ tattve tattve kṣamāditaḥ // 49
analyzed: tatas ekaika varṇa tvam tattve tattve kṣamā āditaḥ

original: AbhT_11.50a/. kṛtvā śaive pare proktāḥ ṣoḍaśārṇā visargataḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā śaive pare proktāḥ ṣoḍaśa arṇāḥ visargataḥ

original: AbhT_11.50b/. tatra śaktiparispandastāvān prāk ca nirūpitaḥ // 50
analyzed: tatra śakti parispandaḥ tāvān prāk ca nirūpitaḥ
saṃkalayya ucyate sarvam adhunā sukha saṃvide

original: AbhT_11.51b/. padamantravarṇamekaṃ puraṣoḍaśakaṃ dhareti ca nivṛttiḥ /
analyzed: pada mantra varṇam ekam pura ṣoḍaśakam dharā iti ca nivṛttiḥ
tattva arṇam agni nayanam rasa śara puram astra mantra padam anyā
agni arṇa tattvam ekaka pada mantram sainya bhuvanam iti turyā

original: AbhT_11.53a/. ṣoḍaśa varṇāḥ padamantratattvamekaṃ ca śāntyatīteyam /
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa varṇāḥ pada mantra tattvam ekam ca śānti atītā iyam
abhinavaguptena āryā trayam uktam saṃgrahāya śiṣyebhyaḥ
saḥ ayam samastaḥ eva adhvā bhairavāḥ bheda vṛttimān
tad svātantryāt svatantra tvam aśnuvānā uvabhāsate
tathā hi mātṛ rūpa sthaḥ mantrādhvā iti nirūpitaḥ

original: AbhT_11.55b/. tathāhi cidvimarśena grastā vācyadaśā yadā // 55
analyzed: tathā hi cit vimarśena grastā vācya daśā yadā
aśeṣa śakti paṭala līlā lāmpaṭya pāṭavāt
cyutā māna mayāt rūpāt saṃvid mantrādhva tām gatā
pramāṇa rūpa tām etya prayāti adhvā pada ātma tām
tathā hi mātuḥ viśrāntiḥ varṇān saṃghaṭya tān bahūn

original: AbhT_11.58b/. saṃghaṭṭanaṃ ca kramikaṃ saṃjalpātmakameva tat // 58
analyzed: saṃghaṭṭanam ca kramikam saṃjalpa ātmakam eva tat

original: AbhT_11.59a/. vikalpasya svakaṃ rūpaṃ bhogāveśamayaṃ sphuṭam /
analyzed: vikalpasya svakam rūpam bhoga āveśa mayam sphuṭam
atas pramāṇa tā rūpam padam asmad guruḥ jagau
pramāṇa rūpa tā āveśam a parityajya meya tām
gacchan kalanayā yogāt adhvā proktaḥ kalā ātmakaḥ
śuddhe prameya tā yoge sūkṣma sthūla tva bhāgini
prameya māna mātṝṇām yat rūpam upari sthitam

original: AbhT_11.63a/. pramātmātra sthito@dhvāyaṃ varṇātmā dṛśyatāṃ kila /
analyzed: pramā ātmā atra sthitaḥ udhvā ayam varṇa ātmā dṛśyatām kila
sarva abhidhāna sāmarthyāt a niyantrita śaktayaḥ
sṛṣṭāḥ sva ātma sahottha ṛthe dharā paryanta bhāgini
āmṛśantaḥ sva cit bhūmau tāvataḥ ṛthān abhedataḥ

original: AbhT_11.65b/. varṇaughāste pramārūpāṃ satyāṃ bibhrati saṃvidam // 65
analyzed: varṇa oghāḥ te pramā rūpām satyām bibhrati saṃvidam
bālāḥ tiryak pramātāraḥ ye pya saṃketa bhāginaḥ
te api akṛtrima saṃskāra sārām enām sva saṃvidam
bhinna bhinnām upāśritya yānti citrām pramātṛ tām
asyā ca akṛtrima ananta varṇa saṃvidi rūḍha tām
saṃketāḥ yānti ced te api yā antya saṃketa vṛtti tām

original: AbhT_11.68b/. anayā tu vinā sarve saṃketā bahuśaḥ kṛtāḥ // 68
analyzed: anayā tu vinā sarve saṃketāḥ bahuśas kṛtāḥ
aviśrānta tayā kuryuḥ anavasthām duruttarām

original: AbhT_11.69b/. bālo vyutpādyate yena tatra saṃketamārgaṇāt // 69
analyzed: bālaḥ vyutpādyate yena tatra saṃketa mārgaṇāt
aṅguli ādeśane ipi asya na avikalpā tathā matiḥ
vikalpaḥ śabda mūlaḥ ca śabdaḥ saṃketa jīvitaḥ

original: AbhT_11.71a/. tenānanto hyamāyīyo yo varṇagrāma īdṛśaḥ /
analyzed: tena anantaḥ hi a māyīyaḥ yaḥ varṇa grāmaḥ īdṛśaḥ

original: AbhT_11.71b/. saṃvidvimarśasacivaḥ sadaiva sa hi jṛmbhate // 71
analyzed: saṃvid vimarśa sacivaḥ sadā eva sa hi jṛmbhate

original: AbhT_11.72a/. yata eva ca māyīyā varṇāḥ sūtiṃ vitenire /
analyzed: yatas eva ca māyīyāḥ varṇāḥ sūtim vitenire

original: AbhT_11.72b/. ye ca māyīyavarṇeṣu vīryatvena nirūpitāḥ // 72
analyzed: ye ca māyīya varṇeṣu vīrya tvena nirūpitāḥ
saṃketa nirapekṣāḥ te pramā iti parigṛhyatām

original: AbhT_11.73b/. tathā hi paravākyeṣu śruteṣvāvriyate nijā // 73
analyzed: tathā hi para vākyeṣu śruteṣu āvriyate nijā

original: AbhT_11.74a/. pramā yasya jaḍo@sau no tatrārthe@bhyeti mātṛtām /
analyzed: pramā yasya jaḍā usau no tatra arthebhyaḥ eti mātṛ tām
śuka vat sa paṭhati eva param tad kramita eka bhāj
svātantrya lābhataḥ svākya pramā lābhe tu boddhṛ tā
yasya hi sva pramā bodhaḥ vipakṣa udbheda nigrahāt

original: AbhT_11.76a/. vākyādivarṇapuñje sve sa pramātā vaśībhavet /
analyzed: vākya ādi varṇa puñje sve sa pramātā vaśībhavet
yathā yathā ca akṛtakam tat rūpam atiricyate
tathā tathā camatkāra tāratamyam vibhāvyate
ādya a māyīya varṇa antar nimagne ca uttara uttare
ādya udreka mahā tve pi pratibhā ātmani niṣṭhitāḥ
dhruvam kavi tva vaktṛ tva śāli tām yānti sarvatas
yāvat dhāmani saṃketa nikāra kalanā ujjhite

original: AbhT_11.80a/. viśrāntaścinmaye kiṃ kiṃ na vetti kurute na vā /
analyzed: viśrāntaḥ cit maye kim kim na vetti kurute na vā

original: AbhT_11.80b/. ata eva hi vāksiddhau varṇānāṃ samupāsyatā // 80
analyzed: atas eva hi vāc siddhau varṇānām samupāsya tā

original: AbhT_11.81a/. sarvajñatvādisiddhau vā kā siddhiryā na tanmayī /
analyzed: sarvajña tva ādi siddhau vā kā siddhiḥ yā na tad mayī
tat uktam varadena śrī siddhayogīśvarīmate

original: AbhT_11.82a/. tena guptena guptāste śeṣā varṇāstviti sphuṭam /
analyzed: tena guptena guptāḥ te śeṣāḥ varṇāḥ tu iti sphuṭam
evam mā mātṛ māna tva meya tvaiḥ yaḥ u bhāsate
ṣaḍvidhaḥ sva vapuḥ śuddhau śuddhim sodhvā adhigacchati
ekena vapuṣā śuddhau tatra eva anya prakāra tām
antar bhāvya ācaret śuddhim anusaṃdhānavān guruḥ

original: AbhT_11.84b/. anantarbhāvaśaktau tu sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tu śodhayet // 84
analyzed: anantarbhāva śaktau tu sūkṣmam sūkṣmam tu śodhayet
tat viśuddham bīja bhāvāt sūte na uttara saṃtatim
tad ādhipatyam tad tyāgaḥ tad śiva ātma tva vedanam

original: AbhT_11.87a/. ata eva ca te mantrāḥ śodhakāścitrarūpiṇaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva ca te mantrāḥ śodhakāḥ citra rūpiṇaḥ
siddhānta vāma dakṣa ādau citrām śuddhim vitanvate
anuttara trikānām akrama mantrāḥ tu ye kila

original: AbhT_11.88b/. te sarve sarvadāḥ kintu kasyācit kvāpi mukhyatā // 88
analyzed: te sarve sarva dāḥ kintu kasyācid kvāpi mukhya tā
atas śodhaka bhāvena śāstre śrī pūrva saṃjñite

original: AbhT_11.90a/. śodhakatvaṃ ca mālinyā devīnāṃ tritayasya ca /
analyzed: śodhaka tvam ca mālinyāḥ devīnām tritayasya ca
deva trayasya vaktrāṇām aṅgānām aṣṭakasya ca
kim vā ati bahunā dvāra vāstu ādhāra guru krame

original: AbhT_11.91b/. lokapāstravidhau mantrān muktvā sarvaṃ viśodhakam // 91
AbhT_11.92a/. yaccaitadadhvanaḥ proktaṃ śodhyatvaṃ śoddhṛtā ca yā /
analyzed: yat ca etat adhvanaḥ proktam śodhya tvam śoddhṛ tā ca yā

original: AbhT_11.92b/. sā svātantryācchivābhede yuktetyuktaṃ ca śāsane // 92
analyzed: sā svātantryāt śiva abhede yuktā iti uktam ca śāsane
sarvam etat vibhāti eva parameśitari dhruve

original: AbhT_11.93b/. pratibimbasvarūpeṇa na tu bāhyatayā yataḥ // 93
analyzed: pratibimba svarūpeṇa na tu bāhya tayā yatas
cit vyomni eva śive tad tad deha ādi matiḥ īdṛśī
bhinnā saṃsāriṇām rajjau sarpa sraj vīci buddhi vat
yatas prāk deha maraṇa siddhāntaḥ svapna gocaraḥ
deha antara ādiḥ maraṇe kīdṛś vā deha saṃbhavaḥ
svapne pi pratibhā mātra sāmānya prathana abalāt

original: AbhT_11.96b/. viśeṣāḥ pratibhāsante na bhāvyante@pi te yathā // 96
analyzed: viśeṣāḥ pratibhāsante na bhāvyante ipi te yathā
śālagrāma upalāḥ kecid citra ākṛti bhṛtaḥ yathā
tathā māyā ādi bhūmi anta lekhā citra hṛdaḥ citaḥ
nagara arṇava śaila ādyāḥ tad icchā anuvidhāyinaḥ

original: AbhT_11.98b/. na svayaṃ sadasanto no kāraṇākāraṇātmakāḥ // 98
analyzed: na svayam sat asantaḥ no kāraṇa akāraṇa ātmakāḥ
niyateḥ cira rūḍhāyāḥ samucchedāt pravartanāt
a rūḍhāyāḥ svatantraḥ yam sthitaḥ cit vyoma bhairavaḥ
evam asmi iti an āmarśaḥ bhedakaḥ bhāva maṇḍale

original: AbhT_11.101a/. sarvapramāṇairno siddhaṃ svapne kartrantaraṃ yathā /
analyzed: sarva pramāṇaiḥ no siddham svapne kartṛ antaram yathā
sva saṃvidaḥ sva siddhāyāḥ tathā sarvatra

original: AbhT_11.102a/. cittacitrapurodyāne krīḍedevaṃ hi vetti yaḥ /
analyzed: citta citra pura udyāne krīḍet evam hi vetti yaḥ
aham eva sthitaḥ bhūta bhāva tattva puraiḥ iti
evam jātaḥ mṛtaḥ asmi iti janma mṛtyu vicitra tāḥ
a janmani a mṛtau bhānti citta bhittau sva nirmitāḥ
parehasaṃvidā mātram

original: AbhT_11.104b/. vastutaḥ saṃvido deśaḥ kālo vā naiva kiṃcana // 104
analyzed: vastutas saṃvidaḥ deśaḥ kālaḥ vā nā eva kiṃcana

original: AbhT_11.105a/. abhaviṣyadayaṃ sargo mūrtaścenna tu cinmayaḥ /
analyzed: abhaviṣyat ayam sargaḥ mūrtaḥ ced na tu cit mayaḥ
tat avekṣyata tad madhyāt kena ekaḥ api dharādharaḥ
bhūta tanmātra varga ādeḥ ādhāra ādheya tā krame

original: AbhT_11.106b/. ante saṃvinmayī śaktiḥ śivarūpaiva dhāriṇī // 106
analyzed: ante saṃvid mayī śaktiḥ śiva rūpā eva dhāriṇī

original: AbhT_11.107a/. tasmātpratītirevetthaṃ kartrī dhartrī ca sā śivaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt pratītiḥ evā ittham kartrī dhartrī ca sā śivaḥ

original: AbhT_11.107b/. tato bhāvāstatra bhāvāḥ śaktirādhārikā tataḥ // 107
analyzed: tatas bhāvāḥ tatra bhāvāḥ śaktiḥ ādhārikā tatas
sāṃkalpikam nirādhāram api nā eva patati adhas
sva ādhāra śaktau viśrāntam viśvam ittham vimṛśyatām
asyāḥ ghanā aham ityādi rūḍhiḥ eva dharā ādi tā
yāvat ante cit asmi iti nirvṛttā bhairava ātma tā

original: AbhT_11.110a/. maṇāvindrāyudhe bhāsa iva nīlādayaḥ śive /
analyzed: maṇau indrāyudhe bhāsaḥ iva nīla ādayaḥ śive

original: AbhT_11.110b/. paramārthata eṣāṃ tu nodayo na vyayaḥ kvacit // 110
analyzed: paramārthataḥ eṣām tu na udayaḥ na vyayaḥ kvacid
deśe kāle itra vā sṛṣṭiḥ iti etat asamañjasam
cit ātmanā hi devena sṛṣṭiḥ diś kālayoḥ api
jāgara abhimate sārdha hasta tritaya gocare
prahare ca pṛthak svapnāḥ citra diś kāla māninaḥ

original: AbhT_11.113a/. ata eva kṣaṇaṃ nāma na kiṃcidapi manmahe /
analyzed: atas eva kṣaṇam nāma na kiṃcid api manmahe

original: AbhT_11.113b/. kriyākṣaṇe vāpyekasmin bahvyaḥ saṃsyurdrutāḥ kriyāḥ // 113
analyzed: kriyā kṣaṇe vā api ekasmin bahvyaḥ saṃsyuḥ drutāḥ kriyāḥ

original: AbhT_11.114a/. tena ye bhāvasaṃkocaṃ kṣaṇāntaṃ pratipedire /
analyzed: tena ye bhāva saṃkocam kṣaṇa antam pratipedire
te nūnam enayā nāḍyā śūnya dṛṣṭi avalambinaḥ

original: AbhT_11.115a/. tadya eṣa sato bhāvāñ śūnyīkartuṃ tathāsataḥ /
analyzed: tat yaḥ eṣa sataḥ śūnyīkartum tathā asataḥ
sphuṭīkartum svatantra tvāt īśaḥ saḥ usmad prabhuḥ śivaḥ
tat ittham parameśānaḥ viśva rūpaḥ pragīyate

original: AbhT_11.116b/. na tu bhinnasya kasyāpi dharāderupapannatā // 116
analyzed: na tu bhinnasya kasya api dharā ādeḥ upapanna tā

original: AbhT_11.117a/. uktaṃ caitatpuraiveti na bhūyaḥ pravivicyate /
analyzed: uktam ca etat purā eva iti na bhūyas pravivicyate
bhūyobhiḥ ca api bāhya artha dūṣaṇaiḥ pravyaramyata
tat ittham eṣa nirṇītaḥ kalā ādeḥ vistara udhvanaḥ
atha śrī tantrāloke dvādaśama āhnikam
atha adhvanaḥ asya prakṛtaḥ upayogaḥ prakāśyate

original: AbhT_12.2a/. itthamadhvā samasto@yaṃ yathā saṃvidi saṃsthitaḥ /
analyzed: ittham adhvā samastaḥ yam yathā saṃvidi saṃsthitaḥ
tad dvārā śūnya dhī prāṇa nāḍī cakra tanuṣu atho
bahis ca liṅga mūrti agni sthaṇḍila ādiṣu sarvatas

original: AbhT_12.3b/. tathā sthitaḥ samastaśca vyastaścaiṣa kramākramāt // 3
analyzed: tathā sthitaḥ samastaḥ ca vyastaḥ ca eṣa kramākramāt
ā saṃvid tattvam ā bāhyam yaḥ yam adhvā vyavasthitaḥ

original: AbhT_12.4b/. tatra tatrocitaṃ rūpaṃ svaṃ svātantryeṇa bhāsayet // 4
analyzed: tatra tatra ucitam rūpam svam svātantryeṇa bhāsayet

original: AbhT_12.5a/. sarvaṃ sarvatra rūpaṃ ca tasyāpi na na bhāsate /
analyzed: sarvam sarvatra rūpam ca tasya api na na bhāsate
na hi avaccheditām kvāpi svapne pi viṣahāmahe
evam viśva adhva saṃpūrṇam kāla vyāpāra citritam
deśa kāla maya spanda sadma deham vilokayet
tathā vilokyamānā asau viśva antar devatā mayaḥ

original: AbhT_12.7b/. dhyeyaḥ pūjyaśca tarpyaśca tadāviṣṭo vimucyate // 7
analyzed: dhyeyaḥ pūjyaḥ ca tarpyaḥ ca tad āviṣṭaḥ vimucyate

original: AbhT_12.8a/. itthaṃ ghaṭaṃ paṭaṃ liṅgaṃ sthaṇḍilaṃ pustakaṃ jalam /
analyzed: ittham ghaṭam paṭam liṅgam sthaṇḍilam pustakam jalam
yat vā kiṃcid kvacid paśyet tatra tad maya tām vrajet
tatra arpaṇam hi vastūnām abhedena arcanam matam
tathā saṃpūrṇa rūpa tva anusaṃdhiḥ dhyānam ucyate
saṃpūrṇa tva anusaṃdhānam a kampam dārḍhyam ānayan
tathā antar jalpa yogena vimṛśan japa bhājanam
tatra arpitānām bhāvānām svaka bheda vilāpanam
kurvan tad raśmi sadbhāvam dadyāt homa kriyā paraḥ
tathā evaṃkurvataḥ sarvam sama bhāvena paśyataḥ

original: AbhT_12.12b/. niṣkampatā vrataṃ śuddhaṃ sāmyaṃ nandiśikhoditam // 12
analyzed: niṣkampa tā vratam śuddham sāmyam nandiśikhā uditam
tathā arcana japa dhyāna homa vrata vidhi kramāt

original: AbhT_12.13b/. paripūrṇāṃ sthitiṃ prāhuḥ samādhiṃ guravaḥ purā // 13
analyzed: paripūrṇām sthitim prāhuḥ samādhim guravaḥ purā
atra pūjā japa ādyeṣu bahis antar dvaya sthitau

original: AbhT_12.14b/. dravyaughe na vidhiḥ ko@pi na kāpi pratiṣiddhatā // 14
analyzed: dravya oghe na vidhiḥ kaḥ api na kā api pratiṣiddha tā
kalpanā śuddhi saṃdhi ādeḥ na upayogaḥ utra kaścana

original: AbhT_12.15b/. uktaṃ śrītrikasūtre ca jāyate yajanaṃ prati // 15
analyzed: uktam śrī trikasūtre ca jāyate yajanam prati
a vidhi jñaḥ vidhi jñaḥ ca iti evamādi su vistaram

original: AbhT_12.16b/. yadā yathā yena yatra svā samvittiḥ prasīdati // 16
analyzed: yadā yathā yena yatra svā samvittiḥ prasīdati

original: AbhT_12.17a/. tadā tathā tena tatra tattadbhogyaṃ vidhiśca saḥ /
analyzed: tadā tathā tena tatra tad tad bhogyam vidhiḥ ca saḥ
laukika alaukikam sarvam tena atra viniyojayet
niṣkampa tve sa kampaḥ tu kampam nirhrāsayet balāt
yathā yena abhyupāyena kramāt akramatas api vā
vicikitsā galati antar tathā asau yatnavān bhavet
dhī karma akṣa gatāḥ devīḥ niṣiddhaiḥ eva tarpayet
vīra vratam ca abhinandet iti bhargaśikhā vacaḥ

original: AbhT_12.20b/. tathāhi śaṅkā mālinyaṃ glāniḥ saṃkoca ityadaḥ // 20
analyzed: tathā hi śaṅkā mālinyam glāniḥ saṃkocaḥ iti adaḥ
saṃsāra kārā āgāra antar sthūlasthūṇāghaṭāyate

original: AbhT_12.21b/. mantrā varṇasvabhāvā ye dravyaṃ yatpāñcabhautikam // 21
analyzed: mantrāḥ varṇa svabhāvāḥ ye dravyam yat pāñcabhautikam

original: AbhT_12.22a/. yaccidātma prāṇijātaṃ tatra kaḥ saṃkaraḥ katham /
analyzed: yat cit ātma prāṇi jātam tatra kaḥ saṃkaraḥ katham

original: AbhT_12.22b/. saṃkarābhāvataḥ keyaṃ śaṅkā tasyāmapi sphuṭam // 22
analyzed: saṃkara abhāvataḥ kā iyam śaṅkā tasyām api sphuṭam

original: AbhT_12.23a/. na śaṅketa tathā śaṅkā vilīyetāvahelayā /
analyzed: na śaṅketa tathā śaṅkā vilīyeta avahelayā

original: AbhT_12.24a/. śāstreṣu vitataṃ caitattatra tatrocyate yataḥ /
analyzed: śāstreṣu vitatam ca etat tatra tatra ucyate yatas

original: AbhT_12.24b/. śaṅkayā jāyate glāniḥ śaṅkayā vighnabhājanam // 24
analyzed: śaṅkayā jāyate glāniḥ śaṅkayā vighna bhājanam
uvāca utpaladevaḥ ca śrīmān asmad guroḥ guruḥ

original: AbhT_12.25b/. sarvāśaṅkāśaniṃ mārgaṃ numo māheśvaraṃ tviti // 25
analyzed: sarva āśaṅkā aśanim mārgam numaḥ māheśvaram tu iti

original: AbhT_12.26a/. anuttarapadāptaye tadidamāṇavaṃ darśitābhyupāyamativistarānnanu vidāṃkurudhvaṃ budhāḥ /
analyzed: anuttara pada āptaye tat idam āṇavam darśita abhyupāyam ati vistarāt nanu budhāḥ
atha śrī tantrāloke trayodaśam āhnikam

original: AbhT_13.1b/. athādhikṛtibhāhanaṃ ka iha vā kathaṃ vetyalaṃ vivecayitumucyate vividhaśaktipātakramaḥ // 1b
analyzed: atha adhikṛti bhāhanam kaḥ iha vā katham vā iti alam vivecayitum ucyate vividha śaktipāta kramaḥ

original: AbhT_13.2a/. tatra kecidiha prāhuḥ śaktipāta imaṃ vidhim /
analyzed: tatra kecid iha prāhuḥ śaktipāte imam vidhim

original: AbhT_13.2b/. taṃ pradarśya nirākṛtya svamataṃ darśayiṣyate // 2
analyzed: tam pradarśya nirākṛtya sva matam darśayiṣyate
