tatra idam dṛśyamānam sat sukha duḥkha vimoha bhāj

original: AbhT_13.3b/. viṣamaṃ sattathābhūtaṃ samaṃ hetuṃ prakalpayet // 3
analyzed: viṣamam sat tathābhūtam samam hetum prakalpayet
saḥ u vyaktam tat ca sattva ādi nānā rūpam acetanam
ghaṭa ādi vat kāryam iti hetuḥ ekaḥ asya sā niśā

original: AbhT_13.5a/. sā jaḍā kāryatādrūpyātkāryaṃ cāsyāṃ sadeva hi /
analyzed: sā jaḍā kārya tādrūpyāt kāryam ca asyām sat eva hi
kalā ādi dharaṇī prāntam jāḍyāt sā sūtayā ikṣamā
tena īśaḥ kṣobhayet enām kṣobhaḥ usyāḥ sūti yogyatā

original: AbhT_13.6b/. puṃsaḥ prati ca sā bhogyaṃ sūte@nādīn pṛthagvidhān // 6
analyzed: puṃsaḥ prati ca sā bhogyam sūtena ādīn pṛthagvidhān

original: AbhT_13.7a/. puṃsaśca nirviśeṣatve muktāṇūn prati kiṃ na tat /
analyzed: puṃsaḥ ca nirviśeṣa tve mukta aṇūn prati kim na tat

original: AbhT_13.7b/. nimittaṃ karmasaṃskāraḥ sa ca teṣu na vidyate // 7
analyzed: nimittam karma saṃskāraḥ sa ca teṣu na vidyate
iti ced karma saṃskāra abhāvaḥ teṣām kutas kila
na bhogāt anya karma aṃśa prasaṅgaḥ hi duratyayaḥ

original: AbhT_13.9a/. yugapatkarmaṇāṃ bhogo naca yuktaḥ krameṇa hi /
analyzed: yugapad karmaṇām bhogaḥ na ca yuktaḥ krameṇa hi
phalet yat karma tat kasmāt svam rūpam saṃtyajet kvacid
jñānāt karma kṣayaḥ ced tat kutas īśvara coditāt
dharmāt yadi kutas saḥ api karmataḥ ced tat ucyatām

original: AbhT_13.11a/. nahi karmāsti tādṛkṣaṃ yena jñānaṃ pravartate /
analyzed: nahi karma asti tādṛkṣam yena jñānam pravartate

original: AbhT_13.11b/. karmajatve ca tajjñānaṃ phalarāśau pateddhruvam // 11
analyzed: karma ja tve ca tat jñānam phala rāśau patet dhruvam

original: AbhT_13.12a/. anyakarmaphalaṃ prācyaṃ karmarāśiṃ ca kiṃ dahet /
analyzed: anya karma phalam prācyam karma rāśim ca kim dahet
īśasya dveṣa rāga ādi śūnyasya api katham kvacid
tathā abhisaṃdhiḥ na anyatra bheda hetoḥ abhāvataḥ

original: AbhT_13.13b/. nanvitthaṃ pradahejjñānaṃ karmajālāni karma hi // 13
analyzed: nanu ittham pradahet jñānam karma jālāni karma hi
ajñānam jñānataḥ naśyet anya karma phalāt api
upavāsa ādikam ca anyat duṣṭa karma phalam bhavet
niṣphalīkurute duṣṭam karma iti aṅgīkṛtam kila

original: AbhT_13.16a/. ajñānamiti yatproktaṃ jñānābhāvaḥ sa cetsa kim /
analyzed: ajñānam iti yat proktam jñāna abhāvaḥ sa ced sa kim

original: AbhT_13.16b/. prāgabhāvo@thavā dhvaṃsa ādye kiṃ sarvasaṃvidām // 16
analyzed: dhvaṃsaḥ ādye kim sarva saṃvidām

original: AbhT_13.17a/. kasyāpi vātha jñānasya prācyaḥ pakṣastvasaṃbhavī /
analyzed: kasya api vā atha jñānasya prācyaḥ pakṣaḥ tu asaṃbhavī
na kiṃcid yasya vijñānam udapādi tathāvidhaḥ

original: AbhT_13.18a/. nāṇurasti bhave hyasminnanādau ko@nvayaṃ kramaḥ /
analyzed: na aṇuḥ asti bhave hi asmin anādau kaḥ nu ayam kramaḥ

original: AbhT_13.18b/. bhāvinaḥ prāgabhāvaśca jñānasyeti sthite sati // 18
analyzed: bhāvinaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ ca jñānasya iti sthite sati

original: AbhT_13.19a/. muktāṇorapi so@styeva janmataḥ prāgasau naca /
analyzed: mukta aṇoḥ api saḥ asti eva janmataḥ prāk asau na ca
jñānam bhāvi vimukte ismin iti ced carcyatām idam

original: AbhT_13.20a/. kasmājjñānaṃ na bhāvyatra nanu dehādyajanmataḥ /
analyzed: kasmāt jñānam na bhāvi atra nanu deha ādya janmataḥ
tat kasmāt karmaṇaḥ kṣaiṇyāt tat kutas jñāna hānitaḥ

original: AbhT_13.21a/. ajñānasya kathaṃ hāniḥ prāgabhāve hi saṃvidaḥ /
analyzed: ajñānasya katham hāniḥ prāgabhāve hi saṃvidaḥ
ajñānam prāgabhāvaḥ asau na bhāvi utpatti asaṃbhavāt

original: AbhT_13.22a/. kasmānna bhāvi tajjñānaṃ nanu dehādyajanmataḥ /
analyzed: kasmāt na bhāvi tat jñānam nanu deha ādya janmataḥ
iti eṣa sarva pakṣa ghnaḥ niśitaḥ cakraka bhramaḥ

original: AbhT_13.23a/. atha pradhvaṃsa evedamajñānaṃ tatsadā sthitam /
analyzed: atha pradhvaṃse eva idam ajñānam tat sadā sthitam
mukta aṇuṣu iti teṣu astu māyā kārya vijṛmbhitam

original: AbhT_13.24a/. athājñānaṃ nahyabhāvo mithyājñānaṃ tu tanmatam /
analyzed: atha ajñānam na hi abhāvaḥ mithyājñānam tu tat matam
tat eva karmaṇām svasmin kartavye sahakāraṇam

original: AbhT_13.25a/. vaktavyaṃ tarhi kiṃ karma yadā sūte svakaṃ phalam /
analyzed: vaktavyam tarhi kim karma yadā sūte svakam phalam
tadā eva mithyājñānena satā hetu tvam āpyate

original: AbhT_13.26a/. atha yasminkṣaṇe karma kṛtaṃ tatra svarūpasat /
analyzed: atha yasmin kṣaṇe karma kṛtam tatra sva rūpa sat
mithyā jñānam yadi tatas tādṛśāt kamarṇaḥ phalam
prāc pakṣe pralaye vṛtte prācya sṛṣṭi pravartane
deha ādi abhāvāt no mithyājñānasya kvāpi saṃbhavaḥ

original: AbhT_13.28a/. uttarasminpunaḥ pakṣe yadā yadyena yatra vā /
analyzed: uttarasmin punar pakṣe yadā yat yena yatra vā
kriyate karma tat sarvam ajñāna sacivam tadā

original: AbhT_13.29a/. avaśyamiti kasyāpi na karmaprakṣayo bhavet /
analyzed: avaśyam iti kasya api na karma prakṣayaḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_13.29b/. yadyapi jñānavānbhūtvā vidhatte karma kiṃcana // 29
analyzed: yadi api jñānavān bhūtvā vidhatte karma kiṃcana

original: AbhT_13.30a/. viphalaṃ syāttu tatpūrvakarmarāśau tu kā gatiḥ /
analyzed: viphalam syāt tu tad pūrva karma rāśau tu kā gatiḥ
atha pralaya kāle pi cit svabhāva tva yogataḥ

original: AbhT_13.31a/. aṇūnā saṃbhavatyeva jñānaṃ mithyeti tatkutaḥ /
analyzed: saṃbhavati eva jñānam mithyā iti tat kutas

original: AbhT_13.31b/. svabhāvāditi cenmukte śive vā kiṃ tathā nahi // 31
analyzed: svabhāvāt iti ced mukte śive vā kim tathā nahi
yat ca adarśanam ākhyātam nimittam pariṇāmini
pradhāne tat hi saṃkīrṇa vaivittayā ubhaya yogataḥ
darśanāya pumartha eka yogya tā sacivam dhiyaḥ

original: AbhT_13.33b/. ārabhya sate dharaṇīparyantaṃ tatra yaccitaḥ // 33
analyzed: ārabhya sate dharaṇī paryantam tatra yat citaḥ

original: AbhT_13.34b/. prakāśanāddhiyo@rthena saha bhogaḥ sa bhaṇyate // 34
analyzed: prakāśanāt dhiyā arthena saha bhogaḥ sa bhaṇyate
buddhiḥ evā asmi vikṛti dharmikā anyaḥ tu kopī asau
mad vilakṣaṇaḥ ekātmā iti evam
pumarthasya kṛta tvena sahakāri viyogataḥ

original: AbhT_13.36b/. taṃ pumāṃsaṃ prati naiva sūte kiṃtvanyameva hi // 36
analyzed: tam pumāṃsam prati na eva sūte kiṃtu anyam eva hi

original: AbhT_13.37a/. atra puṃso@tha mūlasya dharmo@darśanatā dvayoḥ /
analyzed: atra puṃsaḥ utha mūlasya dharmaḥ darśana tā dvayoḥ
athavā iti vikalpaḥ yam āstām etat tu bhaṇyatām

original: AbhT_13.38a/. bhogo vivekaparyanta iti yattatra ko@vadhiḥ /
analyzed: bhogaḥ viveka paryantaḥ iti yat tatra kaḥ uvadhiḥ
viveka lābhe nikhila sūti dṛś yadi sā api kim
sāmānyena viśeṣaiḥ vā prācye syāt eka janmataḥ
uttare na kadācid syāt bhāvi kālasya yogataḥ
kaiścid eva viśeṣaiḥ ced sarveṣām yugapad bhavet
viveka ūna ādi saṃyogāt kā hi anyonyam vicitra tā
tasmāt sāṃkhya dṛśā api idam ajñānam nā eva yujyate

original: AbhT_13.41b/. ajñānena vinā bandhamokṣau naiva vyavasthayā // 41
analyzed: ajñānena vinā bandha mokṣau nā eva vyavasthayā
yujyete tat ca kathita yuktibhiḥ nā upapadyate
bhāyā karma aṇu deva icchā sadbhāve api sthite tatas
na bandha mokṣayoḥ yogaḥ bheda hetoḥ asaṃbhavāt
tasmāt ajñāna śabdena jña tva kartṛ tva dharmaṇām
cit aṇūnām āvaraṇam kiṃcid vācyam vipaścitā
āvāraṇa ātmanā siddham tad svarūpāt abheda vat
bhede pramāṇa abhāvāt ca tat ekam nikhila ātmasu

original: AbhT_13.45b/. tacca kasmātprasūtaṃ syānmāyātaścetkathaṃ nu sā // 45
analyzed: tat ca kasmāt prasūtam syāt māyātaḥ ced katham nu sā
kvacid eva suvīta etat na tu mukta ātmani iti ayam

original: AbhT_13.46b/. prācyaḥ paryanuyogaḥ syānnimittaṃ cenna labhyate // 46
analyzed: prācyaḥ paryanuyogaḥ syāt nimittam ced na labhyate
utpatti abhāvataḥ tena nityam na ca vinaśyati
tatas eva eka tāyām ca anya ātma sādhāraṇa tvataḥ
na vā avastu artha kāri tvāt na cit tad saṃvṛti tvataḥ
na ca etena ātmanām yogaḥ hetumān tad asaṃbhavāt
tena ekam vastu sat nityam nitya saṃbaddham ātmabhiḥ

original: AbhT_13.50a/. tasya roddhrī yadā śaktirudāste śivaraśmibhiḥ /
analyzed: tasya roddhrī yadā śaktiḥ udāste śiva raśmibhiḥ

original: AbhT_13.50b/. tadāṇuḥ spṛśyate spṛṣṭaḥ svake jñānakriye sphuṭe // 50
analyzed: tadā aṇuḥ spṛśyate spṛṣṭaḥ svake jñāna kriye sphuṭe
samāviśet ayam sūrya kānta ūrkeṇa iva coditaḥ
roddhryāḥ ca śakteḥ
vicitra tvam atas prāhuḥ abhivyaktau sva saṃvidaḥ

original: AbhT_13.52b/. sa eṣa śaktipātākhyaḥ śāstreṣu paribhāṣyate // 52
analyzed: saḥ eṣa śaktipāta ākhyaḥ śāstreṣu paribhāṣyate
atrā ucyate malaḥ tāvat ittham eṣa na yujyate

original: AbhT_13.53b/. iti pūrvāhṇike proktaṃ punaruktau tu kiṃ phalam // 53
analyzed: iti pūrvāhṇike proktam punaruktau tu kim phalam
malasya pākaḥ kaḥ yam syāt nāśaḥ ced itarātmanām
saḥ ekaḥ malaḥ iti ukteḥ nairmalyam anuṣajyate
atha pratyātma niyataḥ ūna ādiḥ ca prāgabhāva vat

original: AbhT_13.55b/. malo naśyettathāpyeṣa nāśo yadi sahetukaḥ // 55
analyzed: malaḥ naśyet tathā api eṣa nāśaḥ yadi sa hetukaḥ

original: AbhT_13.56a/. hetuḥ karmeśvarecchā vā karma tāvanna tādṛśam /
analyzed: hetuḥ karma īśvara icchā vā karma tāvat na tādṛśam

original: AbhT_13.56b/. īśvarecchā svatantrā ca kvacideva tathaiva kim // 56
analyzed: īśvara icchā svatantrā ca kvacid eva tathā eva kim
ahetukaḥ sya nāśaḥ ced prāk eva eṣa vinaśyatu

original: AbhT_13.57b/. kṣaṇāntaraṃ sadṛk sūte iti cetsthirataiva sā // 57
analyzed: kṣaṇa antaram sadṛś sūte iti ced sthira tā eva sā

original: AbhT_13.58a/. na ca nityasya bhāvasya hetvanāyattajanmanaḥ /
analyzed: na ca nityasya bhāvasya hetu anāyatta janmanaḥ

original: AbhT_13.58b/. nāśo dṛṣṭaḥ prāgabhāvastvavastviti tathāstu saḥ // 58
analyzed: nāśaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ tu avastu iti tathā astu saḥ
atha asya pākaḥ nāma eṣa sva śakti pratibaddha tā
sarvān prati tathā eṣa syāt ruddha śaktiḥ viṣa agni vat
punar udbhūta śaktau ca sva kāryam syāt viṣa agni vat

original: AbhT_13.60b/. muktā api na muktāḥ syuḥ śaktiṃ cāsya na manmahe // 60
analyzed: muktāḥ api na muktāḥ syuḥ śaktim ca asya na manmahe
roddhrī iti ced kasya nṛṇām jña tva kartṛ tvayoḥ yadi

original: AbhT_13.62a/. saṃnidhānātiriktaṃ ca na kiṃcitkurute malaḥ /
analyzed: saṃnidhāna atiriktam ca na kiṃcid kurute malaḥ
ātmanā pariṇāmi tvāt anitya tva prasaṅgataḥ

original: AbhT_13.63a/. jñatvakartṛtvamātraṃ ca pudgalā na tadāśrayāḥ /
analyzed: jña tva kartṛ tva mātram ca pudgalāḥ na tad āśrayāḥ
tat ced āvāritam hanta rūpa nāśaḥ prasajyate

original: AbhT_13.64a/. āvāraṇaṃ cādṛśyatvaṃ na ca tadvastuno@nyatām /
analyzed: āvāraṇam ca adṛśya tvam na ca tad vastunā unyatām

original: AbhT_13.64b/. karoti ghaṭavajjñānaṃ nāvarītuṃ ca śakyate // 64
analyzed: karoti ghaṭa vat jñānam na āvarītum ca śakyate
jñānena āvaraṇīyena tat eva āvaraṇam katham

original: AbhT_13.65b/. na jñāyate tathā ca syādāvṛtirnāmamātrataḥ // 65
analyzed: na jñāyate tathā ca syāt āvṛtiḥ nāma mātrataḥ

original: AbhT_13.66a/. roddhryāśca śakteḥ kastasya pratibandhaka īśvaraḥ /
analyzed: roddhryāḥ ca śakteḥ kaḥ tasya pratibandhakaḥ īśvaraḥ
yadi apekṣā virahitaḥ tatra prāk dattam uttaram
karma sāmyam apekṣya atha tasya icchā saṃpravartate

original: AbhT_13.67b/. tasyāpi rūpaṃ vaktavyaṃ samatā karmaṇāṃ hi kā // 67
analyzed: tasya api rūpam vaktavyam sama tā karmaṇām hi kā
bhoga paryāya māhātmyāt kāle kvāpi phalam prati
virodhāt karmaṇī ruddhe tiṣṭhataḥ sāmyam īdṛśam

original: AbhT_13.69a/. taṃ ca kālāṃśakaṃ devaḥ sarvajño vīkṣya taṃ malam /
analyzed: tam ca kāla aṃśakam devaḥ sarvajñaḥ vīkṣya tam malam

original: AbhT_13.69b/. runddhe lakṣyaḥ sa kālaśca sukhaduḥkhādivarjanaiḥ // 69
analyzed: runddhe lakṣyaḥ sa kālaḥ ca sukha duḥkha ādi varjanaiḥ
na etat kramika saṃśuddha vyāmiśra ākāra karmabhiḥ
tathā eva deye sva phale kā iyam anyonya roddhṛtā

original: AbhT_13.71a/. rodhe tayośca jātyāyurapi na syādataḥ patet /
analyzed: rodhe tayoḥ ca jāti āyuḥ api na syāt atas patet

original: AbhT_13.71b/. deho bhogadayoreva nirodha iti cennanu // 71
analyzed: dehaḥ bhoga dayoḥ eva nirodhaḥ iti ced nanu
jāti āyuṣprada karma aṃśa saṃnidhau yadi śaṃkaraḥ

original: AbhT_13.72b/. malaṃ runddhe bhogadātuḥ karmaṇaḥ kiṃ bibheti saḥ // 72
analyzed: malam runddhe bhoga dātuḥ karmaṇaḥ kim bibheti saḥ
śataśas upi hlāda tāpa śūnyām saṃcinvate daśām

original: AbhT_13.73b/. na ca bhaktirasāveśamiti bhūmnā vilokitam // 73
analyzed: na ca bhakti rasa āveśam iti bhūmnā vilokitam
atha api kāla māhātmyam apekṣya parameśvaraḥ

original: AbhT_13.74b/. tathā karoti vaktavyaṃ kālo@sau kīdṛśastviti // 74
analyzed: tathā karoti vaktavyam kālaḥ asau kīdṛśaḥ tu iti

original: AbhT_13.75a/. kiṃ cānādirayaṃ bhogaḥ karmānādi sapudgalam /
analyzed: kim ca anādiḥ ayam bhogaḥ karma anādi sa pudgalam
tatas ca bhogaparyāya kālaḥ sarvasya niḥsamaḥ
ādimat tve hi kasya api vargāt asmāt bhavet iyam

original: AbhT_13.76b/. vaicitrī bhuktametena kalpametena tu dvayam // 76
analyzed: vaicitrī bhuktam etena kalpam etena tu dvayam
iyataḥ bhogaparyāyāt syāt sāmyam karmaṇām iti
anena naya bījena manye vaicitrya kāraṇam

original: AbhT_13.78a/. jagataḥ karma yatklaptaṃ tattathā nāvakalpate /
analyzed: jagataḥ karma yat klaptam tat tathā na avakalpate
anādi mala saṃcchannāḥ aṇavaḥ dṛkkriyā ātmanā

original: AbhT_13.79a/. sarve tulyāḥ kathaṃ citrāṃ śritāḥ karmaparamparām /
analyzed: sarve tulyāḥ katham citrām śritāḥ karma paramparām

original: AbhT_13.79b/. bhogalolikayā cetsā vicitreti kuto nanu // 79
analyzed: bhoga lolikayā ced sā vicitrā iti kutas nanu
anādi karma saṃskāra vaicitryāt iti ced punar

original: AbhT_13.80b/. vācyaṃ tadeva vaicitryaṃ kuto niyatirāgayoḥ // 80
analyzed: vācyam tat eva vaicitryam kutas niyati rāgayoḥ

original: AbhT_13.81a/. mahimā cedayaṃ tau kiṃ nāsamañjasyabhāginau /
analyzed: mahimā ced ayam tau kim na asamañjasya bhāginau
īśvara icchā anapekṣā tu bheda hetuḥ na kalpate
atha anādi tva mātreṇa yukti hīnena sādhyate
vyavastheyam alam tarhi malena astu vṛthā amunā

original: AbhT_13.83a/. tathāhi karma tāvanno yāvanmāyā na pudgale /
analyzed: tathā hi karma tāvat no yāvat māyā na pudgale
vyāpriyeta na ca ahetuḥ tad vṛttiḥ tad mitaḥ malaḥ

original: AbhT_13.84a/. itthaṃ ca kalpite māyākārye karmaṇi hetutām /
analyzed: ittham ca kalpite māyā kārye karmaṇi hetu tām
anādi karma ced gacchet kim malasya upakalpanam
nanu mā abhūt malaḥ tarhi citra ākāreṣu karmasu
santatya āvartamāneṣu vyavasthā na prakalpate

original: AbhT_13.86a/. ādau madhye ca citratvātkarmaṇāṃ na yathā samaḥ /
analyzed: ādau madhye ca citra tvāt karmaṇām na yathā samaḥ

original: AbhT_13.86b/. ātmākāro@pi ko@pyeṣa bhāvikāle tathā bhavet // 86
analyzed: ātma ākāraḥ api kaḥ upi eṣa bhāvi kāle tathā bhavet
ittham ucchinnaḥ eva ayam bandha mokṣa ādikaḥ kramaḥ
ajñānāt bandhanam mokṣaḥ jñānāt iti parīkṣitam

original: AbhT_13.88a/. virodhe svaphale caite karmaṇī samaye kvacit /
analyzed: virodhe sva phale ca ete karmaṇī samaye kvacid
udāsāte yadi tatas karma etat pratibudhyatām
śiva śakti nipātasya kaḥ u akāśaḥ tu tāvatā

original: AbhT_13.89b/. kvāpi kāle tayoretadaudāsīnyaṃ yadā tataḥ // 89
analyzed: kvāpi kāle tayoḥ etat audāsīnyam yadā tatas
kāla antare tayoḥ tadvat virodhasya anivṛttitaḥ

original: AbhT_13.90b/. ataśca na phaletānte tābhyāṃ karmāntaraṇi ca // 90
analyzed: atas ca na phaleta ante tābhyām karma antaraṇi ca
ruddhāni prāpta kāla tvāt gatābhyām upabhogya tām

original: AbhT_13.91b/. evaṃ sadaiva vārtāyāṃ dehapāte tathaiva ca // 91
analyzed: evam sadā eva vārtāyām dehapāte tathā eva ca
jāte vimokṣe iti āstām śaktipāta ādi kalpanā
atha udāsīna tad karma dvaya yogakṣaṇa antare

original: AbhT_13.93a/. karmāntaraṃ phalaṃ sūte tatkṣaṇe@pi tathā na kim /
analyzed: karma antaram phalam sūte tad kṣaṇe pi tathā na kim
te eva pratibandha vivarjite

original: AbhT_13.94a/. phalataḥ pratibandhasya varjanaṃ kiṃkṛtaṃ tayoḥ /
analyzed: phalataḥ pratibandhasya varjanam kim kṛtam tayoḥ

original: AbhT_13.94b/. karmasāmyaṃ svarūpeṇa na ca tattāratamyabhāk // 94
AbhT_13.95a/. na śiveccheti tatkārye śaktipāte na tadbhavet /
analyzed: na śiva icchā iti tad kārye śaktipāte na tat bhavet
tirobhāvaḥ ca nāma ayam sa kasmāt udbhavet punar
karma sāmyena yat kṛtyam prāk eva etat kṛtam kila

original: AbhT_13.96b/. hetutve ceśvarecchāyā vācyaṃ pūrvavadeva tu // 96
analyzed: hetu tve ca īśvara icchāyāḥ vācyam pūrvavat eva tu
etena anye api ye ipekṣyāḥ īśa icchāyām prakalpitāḥ
dhvastāḥ te api hi nityāni ahetu ahetu ādi dūṣaṇāt

original: AbhT_13.98a/. vairāgyaṃ bhogavairasyaṃ dharmaḥ ko@pi vivekitā /
analyzed: vairāgyam bhoga vairasyam dharmaḥ kaḥ pi viveki tā
āpad prāptiḥ tad nirīkṣā dehe kiṃcid ca lakṣaṇam
śāstra sevā bhoga saṃgha pūrṇa tā jñānam aiśvaram
iti apekṣyam yat īśasya dūṣyam etat ca pūrvavat
vyabhicāraḥ ca sāmastya vyasta tvābhyām svarūpataḥ
anyonya anupraveśaḥ ca anupapattiḥ ca bhūyasī

original: AbhT_13.101b/. tasmānna manmahe ko@yaṃ śaktipātavidheḥ kramaḥ // 101
analyzed: tasmāt na manmahe kā uyam śaktipāta vidheḥ kramaḥ
ittham bhrānti viṣa āveśa mūrcchā nirmoka dāyinīm
śrī śaṃbhu vadana udgīrṇām vacmi āgama mahā oṣadhīm
devaḥ svatantraḥ cit rūpaḥ prakāśa ātmā svabhāvataḥ
rūpa pracchādana krīḍā yogāt aṇuḥ anekakaḥ
sa svayam kalpita ākāra vikalpa ātmaka karmabhiḥ
badhnāti ātmānam eva iha svātantryāt iti varṇitam
svātantrya mahimā eva ayam devasya yat asau punar
svam rūpam pariśuddham sat spṛśati api aṇu tā mayaḥ

original: AbhT_13.106a/. na vācyaṃ tu kathaṃ nāma kasmiṃścitpuṃsyasau tathā /
analyzed: na vācyam tu katham nāma kasmiṃścid puṃsi asau tathā
na hi nāma pumān kaścid yasmin paryanuyujyate

original: AbhT_13.107a/. deva eva tathāsau cet svarūpaṃ cāsya tādṛśam /
analyzed: devaḥ eva tathā asau ced svarūpam ca asya tādṛśam
tādṛś prathā svabhāvasya svabhāve kā anuyojya tā
āha asmat parameṣṭhī ca śiva dṛṣṭau guru uttamaḥ
pañca prakāra kṛtyā ukti śiva tvāt nija karmaṇe
pravṛttasya nimittānām apareṣām kva mārgaṇam

original: AbhT_13.110a/. tatrāṇoḥ sata evāsti svātantryaṃ karmatohi tat /
analyzed: tatra aṇoḥ sataḥ eva asti svātantryam karmataḥ hi tat

original: AbhT_13.110b/. īśvarasya ca yā svātmatirodhitsā nimittatām // 110
analyzed: īśvarasya ca yā sva ātma tirodhitsā nimitta tām
sā abhyeti karma malayoḥ atas na ādi vyavasthitiḥ
tirodhiḥ pūrṇa rūpasya a pūrṇa tvam tat ca pūraṇam

original: AbhT_13.112a/. prati bhinnena bhāvena spṛhāto lolikā malaḥ /
analyzed: prati bhinnena bhāvena spṛhātaḥ lolikā malaḥ
viśuddha sva prakāśa ātma śiva rūpa tayā vinā

original: AbhT_13.113a/. na kiṃcidyujyate tena heturatra maheśvaraḥ /
analyzed: na kiṃcid yujyate tena hetuḥ atra maheśvaraḥ
ittham sṛṣṭi sthiti dhvaṃsa traye māyām apekṣate

original: AbhT_13.114a/. kṛtyai malaṃ tathā karma śivecchaiveti susthitam /
analyzed: malam tathā karma śiva icchā eva iti susthitam

original: AbhT_13.114b/. yattu kasmiṃścana śivaḥ svena rūpeṇa bhāsate // 114
analyzed: yat tu kasmiṃścana śivaḥ svena rūpeṇa bhāsate
tatra asya na aṇu ge tāvat apekṣye mala karmaṇī
aṇu svarūpa tā hānau tad gatam hetutām katham
vrajet māyā anapekṣa tvam atas eva upapādayet

original: AbhT_13.116b/. tena śuddhaḥ svaprakāśaḥ śiva evātra kāraṇam // 116
analyzed: tena śuddhaḥ sva prakāśaḥ śivaḥ eva atra kāraṇam
sa ca svācchandya mātreṇa tāratamya prakāśakaḥ
kula jāti vapuḥ karma vayaḥ anuṣṭhāna saṃpadaḥ
an apekṣya śive bhaktiḥ

original: AbhT_13.118b/. yā phalārthitayā bhaktiḥ sā karmādyamapekṣate // 118
analyzed: yā phala arthi tayā bhaktiḥ sā karma ādyam apekṣate

original: AbhT_13.119a/. tato@tra syātphale bhedo nāpavarge tvasau tathā /
analyzed: tatas utra syāt phale bhedaḥ na apavarge tu asau tathā
bhoga apavarga dvitaya abhisaṃdhātuḥ api sphuṭam
prāgbhāga ipekṣate karma citra tvāt na uttare punar
an ābhāsita rūpā upi tad ābhāsitayā iva yat

original: AbhT_13.121a/. sthitvā mantrādi saṃgṛhya tyajetso@sya tirobhavaḥ /
analyzed: sthitvā mantra ādi saṃgṛhya tyajet saḥ asya tirobhavaḥ
śrī sāraśāstre bhagavān vastu etat samabhāṣata
dharma adharma ātmakaiḥ bhāvaiḥ anekaiḥ veṣṭayet svayam
asandeham svam ātmānam avīci ādi śiva antake

original: AbhT_13.123a/. tadvacchaktisamūhena sa eva tu viveṣṭayet /
analyzed: tadvat śakti samūhena saḥ eva tu viveṣṭayet

original: AbhT_13.123b/. svayaṃ badhnāti deveśaḥ svayaṃ caiva vimuñcati // 123
analyzed: svayam badhnāti deveśaḥ svayam ca eva vimuñcati

original: AbhT_13.124a/. svayaṃ bhoktā svayaṃ jñātā svayaṃ caivopalakṣayet /
analyzed: svayam bhoktā svayam jñātā svayam ca eva upalakṣayet

original: AbhT_13.124b/. svayaṃ bhuktiśca muktiśca svayaṃ devī svayaṃ prabhuḥ // 124
analyzed: svayam bhuktiḥ ca muktiḥ ca svayam devī svayam prabhuḥ
svayam eka akṣarā ca eva yathā ūṣmā kṛṣṇavartmanaḥ
vastu uktam atra svātantryāt sva ātma rūpa prakāśanam
śrīmat niśākule pi uktam mithyā bhāvita cetasaḥ
mala māyā vicāreṇa kliśyante su alpabuddhayaḥ

original: AbhT_13.127a/. sphaṭikopalago reṇuḥ kiṃ tasya kurutāṃ priye /
analyzed: sphaṭika upala gaḥ reṇuḥ kim tasya kurutām priye

original: AbhT_13.127b/. vyomnīva nīlaṃ hi malaṃ malaśaṃkāṃ tatastyajet // 127
analyzed: vyomni iva nīlam hi malam mala śaṃkām tatas tyajet
śrīmān vidyā guruḥ ca āha pramāṇa stuti darśane

original: AbhT_13.128b/. dharmādharmavyāptivināśāntarakāle śakteḥ pāto gāhanikairyaḥ pratipannaḥ // 128
analyzed: dharma adharma vyāpti vināśa antara kāle śakteḥ pātaḥ gāhanikaiḥ yaḥ pratipannaḥ

original: AbhT_13.129a/. taṃ svecchātaḥ saṃgiramāṇāḥ stavakādyāḥ svātantryaṃ tattvayyanapekṣaṃ kathayeyuḥ /
analyzed: tam sva icchātaḥ saṃgiramāṇāḥ stavaka ādyāḥ svātantryam tat tvayi anapekṣam kathayeyuḥ
tāratamya prakāśaḥ yaḥ tīvra madhyama manda tāḥ

original: AbhT_13.130a/. tā eva śaktipātasya pratyekaṃ traidhamāsthitāḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ eva śaktipātasya pratyekam traidham āsthitāḥ
tīvra tīvraḥ śaktipātaḥ deha pāta vaśāt svayam
mokṣa pradaḥ tadā eva anya kāle vā tāratamyataḥ
madhya tīvrāt punar sarvam ajñānam vinivartate
svayam eva yatas vetti bandha mokṣa tayā ātmatām
tat prātibham mahā jñānam śāstra ācārya anapekṣi yat
pratibhā candrikā śānta dhvāntaḥ ca ācārya candramāḥ
tamaḥ tāpau hanti dṛśam visphārya ānanda nirbharām
sa śiṣṭaḥ karma kartṛ tvāt śiṣyaḥ anyaḥ karma bhāvataḥ
śiṣṭaḥ sarvatra ca smārta pada kāla kula ādiṣu
uktaḥ svayaṃbhūḥ śāstra artha pratibhā pariniṣṭhitaḥ

original: AbhT_13.135b/. yanmūlaṃ śāsanaṃ tena na riktaḥ ko@pi jantukaḥ // 135
analyzed: yad mūlam śāsanam tena na riktaḥ kaḥ api jantukaḥ
tatra api tāratamya uttham ānantyam dārḍhya kamprate
yuktiḥ śāstram guruḥ vādaḥ abhyāsaḥ ityādi apekṣate

original: AbhT_13.137a/. kampamānaṃ hi vijñānaṃ svayameva punarvrajet /
analyzed: kampamānam hi vijñānam svayam eva punar vrajet
kasya api dārḍhyam anyasya yukti ādyaiḥ kevala itaraiḥ

original: AbhT_13.138a/. yathā yathā parāpekṣātānavaṃ prātibhe bhavet /
analyzed: yathā yathā para apekṣā tānavam prātibhe bhavet

original: AbhT_13.138b/. tathā tathā gururasau śreṣṭho vijñānapāragaḥ // 138
analyzed: tathā tathā guruḥ asau śreṣṭhaḥ vijñāna pāragaḥ
anyatas pratibhā balāt

original: AbhT_13.139b/. yadvetti tatra tatrāsya śivatā jyāyasī ca sā // 139
analyzed: yat vetti tatra tatra asya śiva tā jyāyasī ca sā
na ca asya samayi tva ādi kramaḥ na api abhiṣecanam

original: AbhT_13.140b/. na santānādi no vidyāvrataṃ prātibhavartmanaḥ // 140
analyzed: na santāna ādi naḥ vidyā vratam prātibha vartmanaḥ
ādi vidvān mahādevaḥ tena eṣa adhiṣṭhitaḥ yatas
saṃskārāḥ tad adhiṣṭhāna siddhyai tat tasya tu svatas
devībhiḥ dīkṣitaḥ tena sa bhaktiḥ śiva śāsane
dṛḍha tā kampra tā bhedaiḥ saḥ api svayam atha vratāt
tapaḥ japa ādeḥ gurutaḥ sva saṃskāram prakalpayet

original: AbhT_13.143b/. yato vājasineyākhya uktaṃ siñcetsvayaṃ tanum // 143
analyzed: yatas vājasineya ākhyaḥ uktam siñcet svayam tanum
ityādi upakramam yāvat ante tat pariniṣṭhitam
abhiṣiktaḥ bhavet evam na bāhya kalaśa ambuṣu
śrī sarva vīra śrī brahmayāmala ādau ca tat tathā
nirūpitam maheśena kiyat vā likhyatām idam

original: AbhT_13.146a/. itthaṃ prātibhavijñānaṃ kiṃ kiṃ kasya na sādhayet /
analyzed: ittham prātibhavi jñānam kim kim kasya na sādhayet
yad prātibhāt vā sarvam ca iti ūce śeṣa mahā muniḥ
anye tu āhuḥ akāmasya prātibhaḥ guruḥ īdṛśaḥ
sāmagrī janya tā kāmye tena ariman saṃskṛtaḥ guruḥ

original: AbhT_13.148a/. niyatermahimā naiva phale sādhye nivartate /
analyzed: niyateḥ mahimā nā eva phale sādhye nivartate
abhiṣiktaḥ cīrṇa vidyā vrataḥ tena phala pradaḥ
asat etat iti prāhuḥ guravaḥ tattva darśinaḥ
śrī somānanda kalyāṇa bhavabhūti purogamāḥ
tathā hi trīśikā śāstra vivṛtau tebhyadhuḥ budhāḥ
sāṃsiddhikam yat vijñānam tat cintā ratnam ucyate
tad abhāve tad artham tad āhṛtam jñānam ādṛtam

original: AbhT_13.151b/. evaṃ yo veda tattvena tasya nirvāṇagāminī // 151
analyzed: evam yaḥ veda tattvena tasya nirvāṇa gāminī
dīkṣā bhavati asandigdhā tila ājya āhuti varjitā
adṛṣṭa maṇḍalaḥ upi evam yaḥ kaścid vetti tattvataḥ

original: AbhT_13.153a/. sa siddhibhāgbhavennityaṃ sa yogī sa ca dīkṣitaḥ /
analyzed: sa siddhi bhāj bhavet nityam sa yogī sa ca dīkṣitaḥ

original: AbhT_13.153b/. avidhijño vidhānajño jāyate yajanaṃ prati // 153
analyzed: a vidhi jñaḥ vidhāna jñaḥ jāyate yajanam prati
ityādibhiḥ trīśikā uktaiḥ vākyaiḥ māheśvaraiḥ sphuṭam
jñāna upāyaḥ tu dīkṣā ādi kriyā jñāna viyoginām
iti etat adhunā eva āstā sva prastāve bhaviṣyati
guru śāstra pramāṇa ādeḥ api upāya tvam aṃjasā
pratibhā param eva eṣā sarva kāmadughā yatas
upāya yoga kramataḥ nirupāyam athākramam

original: AbhT_13.157b/. yadrūpaṃ tatparaṃ tattvaṃ tatra tatra suniścitam // 157
analyzed: yat rūpam tat param tattvam tatra tatra su niścitam
yaḥ tu prātibha bāhya ātma saṃskāra dvaya sundaraḥ
uktaḥ ūna anya upakārya tvāt sa sākṣāt vara daḥ guruḥ
sva mukti mātre kasya api yāvat viśva vimocane
pratibhā udeti khadyota ratna tārā indu sūrya vat
tatas prātibha saṃvittyai śāstram asmad kṛtam tu idam

original: AbhT_13.160b/. yo@bhyasyetsa gururnaiva vastvarthā hi viḍambakāḥ // 160
analyzed: yaḥ bhyasyet sa guruḥ nā eva vastu arthāḥ hi viḍambakāḥ

original: AbhT_13.161a/. paropajīvitābuddhyā sarva itthaṃ na bhāsate /
analyzed: para upajīvita abuddhyā sarvaḥ ittham na bhāsate

original: AbhT_13.161b/. taduktyā na vinā vetti śaktipātasya māndyataḥ // 161
analyzed: tad uktyā na vinā vetti śaktipātasya māndyataḥ

original: AbhT_13.162a/. sphuṭametacca śāstreṣu teṣu teṣu nirūpyate /
analyzed: sphuṭam etat ca śāstreṣu teṣu teṣu nirūpyate

original: AbhT_13.162b/. kiraṇāyāṃ tathoktaṃ ca gurutaḥ śāstrataḥ svataḥ // 162
analyzed: kiraṇāyām tathā uktam ca gurutaḥ śāstrataḥ svatas
jñāna yogyāḥ tathā kecid caryā yogyāḥ tathā apare
śrīmat nandiśikhātantre vitatya etat nirūpitam
praśna uttara mukhena iti tat abhagnam nirūpyate
anirdeśyaḥ śivaḥ tatra kaḥ abhi upāyaḥ nirūpyatām

original: AbhT_13.165a/. iti praśne kṛte devyā śrīmāñchaṃbhurnyarūpayam /
analyzed: iti praśne kṛte devyā śrīmān śaṃbhuḥ nyarūpayam

original: AbhT_13.165b/. upāyo@tra vivekaikaḥ sa hi heyaṃ vihāpayan // 165
analyzed: upāyaḥ utra viveka ekaḥ sa hi heyam vihāpayan

original: AbhT_13.166a/. dadātyasya ca suśroṇi prātibhaṃ jñānamuttamam /
analyzed: dadāti asya ca suśroṇi prātibham jñānam uttamam

original: AbhT_13.166b/. yadā pratibhayā yuktastadā muktaśca mocayet // 166
analyzed: yadā pratibhayā yuktaḥ tadā muktaḥ ca mocayet
para śakti nipātena dhvasta māyā amalaḥ pumān

original: AbhT_13.167b/. nanu prāgdīkṣayā mokṣo@dhunā tu prātibhātkatham // 167
analyzed: nanu prāk dīkṣayā mokṣaḥ adhunā tu prātibhāt katham

original: AbhT_13.168a/. iti devyā kṛte praśne prāvartata vibhorvacaḥ /
analyzed: iti devyā kṛte praśne prāvartata vibhoḥ vacaḥ

original: AbhT_13.168b/. dīkṣayā mucyate jantuḥ prātibhena tathā priye // 168
analyzed: dīkṣayā mucyate jantuḥ prātibhena tathā priye

original: AbhT_13.169a/. gurvāyattā tu sā dīkṣā badhyabandhanamokṣaṇe /
analyzed: guru āyattā tu sā dīkṣā badhya bandhana mokṣaṇe
prātibhaḥ svabhāvaḥ tu kevalībhāva siddhi daḥ

original: AbhT_13.170a/. kevalasya dhruvaṃ muktiḥ paratattvena sā nanu /
analyzed: kevalasya dhruvam muktiḥ para tattvena sā nanu
nṛ śakti śivam uktam hi tattva trayam idam tvayā

original: AbhT_13.171a/. nā badhyo bandhane śaktiḥ karaṇaṃ kartṛtāṃ spṛśat /
analyzed: nā badhyaḥ bandhane śaktiḥ karaṇam kartṛ tām spṛśat

original: AbhT_13.171b/. śivaḥ karteti tatproktaṃ sarvaṃ gurvāgamādaṇoḥ // 171
analyzed: śivaḥ kartā iti tat proktam sarvam guru āgamāt aṇoḥ
punar vivekāt uktam tat uttarottaram ucyatām

original: AbhT_13.172b/. kathaṃ vivekaḥ kiṃ vāsya devadeva vivicyate // 172
analyzed: katham vivekaḥ kim vā asya devadeva vivicyate
iti ukte parameśānyā jagāda ādi guruḥ śivaḥ
śiva ādi tattva tritayam tad āgama vaśāt guroḥ
adhra uttara gaiḥ vākyaiḥ siddham prātibha tām vrajet
dīkṣā asi chinna pāśa tvāt bhāvanā bhāvitasya hi
vikāsam tattvam āyāti prātibham tat udāhṛtam
bhasma channa agni vat sphauṭyam prātibhe gaurava āgamāt

original: AbhT_13.176a/. bījaṃ kāloptasaṃsiktaṃ yathā vardheta tattathā /
analyzed: bījam kāla upta saṃsiktam yathā vardheta tat tathā
yoga yāga japaiḥ uktaiḥ guruṇā prātibham sphuṭet
viveka utīndriyaḥ tu eṣa yadā āyāti vivecanam
paśu pāśa pati jñānam svayam nirbhāsate tadā

original: AbhT_13.178a/. prātibhe tu samāyāte jñānamanyattu sendriyam /
analyzed: prātibhe tu samāyāte jñānam anyat tu sa indriyam
vāc akṣi śruti gamyam ca api anya apekṣam varānane

original: AbhT_13.179a/. tattyajedbuddhimāsthāya pradīpaṃ tu yathā divā /
analyzed: tat tyajet buddhim āsthāya pradīpam tu yathā divā
prādurbhūta vivekasya syāt cit indriya gocare
sarva bhāva vivekāt tu sarva bhāva parāṅmukhaḥ
krīḍāsu su virakta ātmā śiva bhāva eka bhāvitaḥ
māhātmyam etat suśroṇi prātibhasya vidhīyate
sva chāyā ādarśa vat paśyet bahis antargatam śivam
heya upādeya tattva jñaḥ tadā dhyāyet nijām citim

original: AbhT_13.183b/. ihaiva siddhāḥ kāyānte mucyeranniti bhāvanāt // 183
analyzed: iha eva siddhāḥ kāya ante mucyeran iti bhāvanāt
para bhāvana dārḍhyāt tu jīvanmuktaḥ nigadyate

original: AbhT_13.184b/. etatte prātibhe bhede lakṣaṇaṃ samudāhṛtam // 184
analyzed: etat te prātibhe bhede lakṣaṇam samudāhṛtam
śāpa anugraha kāryeṣu tathā abhyāsena śaktayā
teṣu udāsīna tāyām tu mucyate mocayet parān
bhūta indriya ādi yogena baddha uṇuḥ saṃsaret dhruvam

original: AbhT_13.186b/. sa eva pratibhāyuktaḥ śaktitattvaṃ nigadyate // 186
analyzed: saḥ eva pratibhā yuktaḥ śakti tattvam nigadyate

original: AbhT_13.187a/. tatpātāveśato muktaḥ śiva eva bhavārṇavāt /
analyzed: tad pāta āveśataḥ muktaḥ śivaḥ eva bhava arṇavāt
nanu ācāryāt sa indriyam tat jñānam uktam atīndriyam

original: AbhT_13.188a/. vivekajaṃ ca tadbuddhyā tatkathaṃ syānnirindriyam /
analyzed: viveka jam ca tat buddhyā tat katham syāt nirindriyam
iti pṛṣṭaḥ abhyadhāt svānta dhiyoḥ jāḍya eka vāsanāt

original: AbhT_13.189a/. akṣatvaṃ pravivekena tacchittau bhāsakaḥ śivaḥ /

analyzed: saṃskāraḥ sarva bhāvānām para tā parikīrtitā

original: AbhT_13.190a/. manobuddhī na bhinne tu kasmiṃścitkāraṇāntare /
analyzed: manaḥ buddhī na bhinne tu kasmiṃścid kāraṇa antare
viveke kāraṇe hi ete prabhu śakti upavṛṃhite
na manaḥ buddhi hīnaḥ tu jñānasya adhigamaḥ priye
para bhāvāt tu tat sūkṣmam śakti tattvam nigadyate
vivekaḥ sarva bhāvānām śuddha bhāvāt mahā āśayaḥ
buddhi tattvam tu triguṇam uttama adhama madhyamam
aṇima ādi gatam ca api bandhakam jaḍam indriyam

original: AbhT_13.193b/. nanu prātibhato muktau dīkṣayā kiṃ śivādhvare // 193
analyzed: nanu prātibhataḥ muktau dīkṣayā kim śiva adhvare
ūce jñānāḥ hi dīkṣāyām bāla vāliśa yoṣitaḥ
pāśa chedāt vimucyante prabuddhi ante śiva adhvare
tasmāt dīkṣā bhavati eṣu kāraṇa tvena sundari
dīkṣayā pāśa mokṣe tu śuddha bhāvāt viveka jam

original: AbhT_13.196a/. ityeṣa paṭhito granthaḥ svayaṃ ye boddhumakṣamāḥ /
analyzed: iti eṣa paṭhitaḥ granthaḥ svayam ye boddhum akṣamāḥ
teṣām śiva ukti saṃvādāt bodhaḥ dārḍhyam vrajet iti
śrīmat niśāṭane ca ātma guru śāstra vaśāt tridhā
śaṃkā vikalpa mūlā hi śāmyet sva pratyayāt iti
enam eva artham antar stham gṛhītvā mālinīmate
evam asya ātmanaḥ kāle kasmiṃścid yogya tā vaśāt

original: AbhT_13.200a/. śaivī saṃbadhyate śaktiḥ śāntā muktiphalapradā /

analyzed: tad saṃbandhāt tatas kaścid tad kṣaṇāt apavṛjyate
iti uktvā tīvra tīvra ākhya viṣayam bhāṣate punar
ajñānena saha ekatvam kasyacid vinivartate
rudra śakti samāviṣṭaḥ sa yiyāsuḥ śiva icchayā
bhukti mukti prasiddhi artham nīyate sat gurum prati
tam ārādhya tatas tuṣṭāt dīkṣām āsādya śāṅkarīm
tad kṣaṇāt vā upabhogāt vā dehapātāt śivam vrajet
asya arthāḥ ātmanaḥ kācid kalanā marśana ātmikā

original: AbhT_13.204b/. svaṃ rūpaṃ prati yā saiva ko@pi kāla ihoditaḥ // 204
analyzed: svam rūpam prati yā sā eva kā upi kālaḥ iha uditaḥ
yogyatā śiva tādātmya yoga arha tvam iha ucyate

original: AbhT_13.205b/. pūrvaṃ kiṃ na tathā kasmāttadaiveti na saṃgatam // 205
analyzed: pūrvam kim na tathā kasmāt tadā eva iti na saṃgatam

original: AbhT_13.206a/. tathābhāsanamujjhitvā na hi kālo@sti kaścana /
analyzed: tathā ābhāsanam ujjhitvā na hi kālaḥ asti kaścana
svātantryāt tu tathā ābhāse kāla śaktiḥ vijṛmbhatām

original: AbhT_13.207a/. natu paryanuyuktyai sā śive tanmahimoditā /
analyzed: na tu paryanuyuktyai sā śive tad mahimā uditā

original: AbhT_13.207b/. nanu śaivī mahāśaktiḥ saṃbaddhaivātmabhiḥ sthitā /
analyzed: nanu śaivī mahā śaktiḥ saṃbaddhā eva ātmabhiḥ sthitā

original: AbhT_13.207c/. satyaṃ sācchādanātmā tu śāntā tveṣā svarūpadṛk // 207
analyzed: satyam sa ācchādana ātmā tu śāntā tu eṣā sva rūpa dṛś

original: AbhT_13.208a/. kṣobho hi bheda evaikyaṃ praśamastanmayī tataḥ // 208
analyzed: kṣobhaḥ hi bhedaḥ eva aikyam praśamaḥ tanmayī tatas

original: AbhT_13.209a/. tayā śāntyā tu saṃbaddhaḥ sthitaḥ śaktisvarūpabhāk /
analyzed: tayā śāntyā tu saṃbaddhaḥ sthitaḥ śakti sva rūpa bhāj
tyakta aṇu bhāvaḥ bhavati śivaḥ tad śakti dārḍhyataḥ
tatra api tāratamya ādi vaśāt śīghra cira āditaḥ
dehapātaḥ bhavet asya yat vā kāṣṭha ādi tulya tā
samasta vyavahāreṣu
tīvra tīvra mahā śakti samāviṣṭaḥ sa sidhyati

original: AbhT_13.212a/. evaṃ prāgviṣayo grantha iyānanyatra tu sphuṭam /
analyzed: evam prāc viṣayaḥ granthaḥ iyān anyatra tu sphuṭam

original: AbhT_13.213a/. ajñānarūpatā puṃsi bodhaḥ saṃkocite hṛdi /
analyzed: ajñāna rūpa tā puṃsi bodhaḥ saṃkocite hṛdi

original: AbhT_13.213b/. saṃkoce vinivṛtte tu svasvabhāvaḥ prakāśate // 213
analyzed: saṃkoce vinivṛtte tu sva svabhāvaḥ prakāśate
rudra śakti samāviṣṭaḥ iti anena asya varṇyate

original: AbhT_13.214b/. cihnavargo ya ukto@tra rudre bhaktiḥ suniścalā // 214
analyzed: cihna vargaḥ yaḥ uktaḥ utra rudre bhaktiḥ su niścalā
kavi tvam sarva śāstra artha boddhṛ tvam iti tat kramāt
sva tāratamya yogāt syāt eṣām vyasta samasta tā

original: AbhT_13.216b/. tatrāpi bhuktau muktau ca prādhānyaṃ carcayedbudhaḥ // 216
analyzed: tatra api bhuktau muktau ca prādhānyam carcayet budhaḥ

original: AbhT_13.217a/. sa ityanto grantha eṣa dvitīyaviṣayaḥ sphuṭaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ iti antaḥ granthaḥ eṣa dvitīya viṣayaḥ sphuṭaḥ
anyaḥ tu manda tīvra ākhya śaktipāta vidhim prati
manda tīvrāt śakti balāt yiyāsā asya upajāyate

original: AbhT_13.218b/. śivecchāvaśayogena sadguruṃ prati so@pi ca // 218
analyzed: śiva icchā vaśa yogena sat gurum prati saḥ api ca

original: AbhT_13.219a/. atraiva lakṣitaḥ śāstre yaduktaṃ parameṣṭhinā /
analyzed: atrā eva lakṣitaḥ śāstre yat uktam parameṣṭhinā

original: AbhT_13.219b/. yaḥ punaḥ sarvatattvāni vettyetāni yathārthataḥ // 219
analyzed: yaḥ punar sarva tattvāni vetti etāni yathārthataḥ
sa guruḥ mad samaḥ proktaḥ mantra vīrya prakāśakaḥ
dṛṣṭāḥ saṃbhāvitāḥ tena spṛṣṭāḥ ca prīta cetasā
narāḥ pāpaiḥ pramucyante sapta janma kṛtaiḥ api
ye punar dīkṣitāḥ tena prāṇinaḥ śiva coditāḥ

original: AbhT_13.222a/. te yatheṣṭaṃ phalaṃ prāpya padaṃ gacchantyanāmayam /
analyzed: te yathā iṣṭam phalam prāpya padam gacchanti anāmayam

original: AbhT_13.222b/. kiṃ tattvaṃ tattvavedī ka ityāmarśanayogataḥ // 222
analyzed: kim tattvam tattva vedī kaḥ iti āmarśana yogataḥ

original: AbhT_13.223b/. evaṃ jigamiṣāyogādācāryaḥ prāpyate sa ca // 223
analyzed: evam jigamiṣā yogāt ācāryaḥ prāpyate sa ca
tāratamya ādi yogena saṃsiddhaḥ saṃskṛtaḥ api ca
ityādi bheda bhinnaḥ hi guroḥ lābhaḥ iha uditaḥ

original: AbhT_13.225b/. tasmāddīkṣāṃ sa labhate sadya eva śivapradām // 225
analyzed: tasmāt dīkṣām sa labhate sadyas eva śiva pradām

original: AbhT_13.226a/. jñānarūpāṃ yathā vetti sarvameva yathārthataḥ /
analyzed: jñāna rūpām yathā vetti sarvam eva yathārthataḥ
jīvanmuktaḥ śivībhūtaḥ tadā eva asau nigadyate
deha saṃbandhi tā api asya śiva tāyai yatas sphuṭā
asyām bhedaḥ hi kathanāt saṅgamāt avalokanāt
śāstrāt saṃkramaṇāt sāmya caryā saṃdarśanāt caroḥ
mantra mudrā ādi māhātmyāt samasta vyasta bhedataḥ
kriyayā vāntara ākāra rūpa prāṇa praveśataḥ

original: AbhT_13.229b/. tadā ca dehasaṃstho@pi sa mukta iti bhaṇyate // 229
analyzed: tadā ca deha saṃsthaḥ api sa muktaḥ iti bhaṇyate
uktam ca śāstrayoḥ śrīmat ratnamālā āgama ākhyayoḥ

original: AbhT_13.230b/. yasminkāle tu guruṇā nirvikalpaṃ prakāśitam // 230
analyzed: yasmin kāle tu guruṇā nirvikalpam prakāśitam

original: AbhT_13.231a/. tadaiva kila mukto@sau yantraṃ tiṣṭhati kevalam /
analyzed: tadā eva kila muktā asau yantram tiṣṭhati kevalam
prārabdhṛ karma saṃbandhāt dehasya sukhi duḥkhite

original: AbhT_13.232a/. na viśaṅketa tacca śrīgamaśāstre nirūpitam /
analyzed: na viśaṅketa tat ca śrī gamaśāstre nirūpitam
avidyā upāsitaḥ dehaḥ hi anya janma samudbhuvā

original: AbhT_13.233a/. karmaṇā tena bādhyante jñānino@pi kalevare /
analyzed: karmaṇā tena bādhyante jñāninaḥ api kalevare
jāti āyuḥ bhoga dasya eka praghaṭṭaka tayā sthitiḥ
ukta ekavacanāt hiḥ ca yatas tena iti saṃgatiḥ
huteḥ vā mantra sāmarthyāt pāśa cheda prayogataḥ

original: AbhT_13.236a/. tatra tveṣo@sti niyama āsanne maraṇakṣaṇe /
analyzed: tatra tu eṣaḥ asti niyamaḥ āsanne maraṇa kṣaṇe

original: AbhT_13.236b/. tāṃ kuryānnānyathārabdhṛ karma yasmānna śuddhyati // 236
analyzed: tām kuryāt na anyathā ārabdhṛ karma yasmāt na śuddhi ati
uktam ca pūrvam eva etat maṃtra sāmarthya yogataḥ
prāṇaiḥ viyojitaḥ api eṣa bhuṅkte śeṣa phalam yatas
tad janma śeṣam vividham ativāhya tatas sphuṭam
karma antara nirodhena śīghram eva apavṛjyate
tasmāt prāṇa harīm dīkṣām na a jñātvā maraṇa kṣaṇam
vidadhyāt parameśa ājñā laṅghana eka phalā hi sā
ekaḥ trikaḥ yam nirṇītaḥ śaktipāte pi atha aparaḥ

original: AbhT_13.240b/. tīvramadhye tu dīkṣāyāṃ kṛtāyāṃ na tathā dṛḍhām // 240
analyzed: tīvra madhye tu dīkṣāyām kṛtāyām na tathā dṛḍhām

original: AbhT_13.241a/. svātmano vetti śivatāṃ dehānte tu śivo bhavet /
analyzed: sva ātmanaḥ vetti śivatām dehānte tu śivaḥ bhavet
uktam ca niśisaṃcāra yoga saṃcāra śāstrayoḥ

original: AbhT_13.242a/. vikalpāttu tanau sthitvā dahānte śivatāṃ vrajet /
analyzed: vikalpāt tu tanau sthitvā daha ante śiva tām vrajet
madhya madhye śaktipāte śiva lābha utsukaḥ api san
bubhukṣuḥ yatra yuktaḥ tat bhuktvā dehakṣaye śivaḥ

original: AbhT_13.243b/. mandamadhye tu tatraiva tattve kvāpi niyojitaḥ // 243
analyzed: manda madhye tu tatra eva tattve kvāpi niyojitaḥ

original: AbhT_13.244a/. dehānte tattvagaṃ bhogaṃ bhuktvā paścācchivaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: bhuktvā     vrajet
tatra api tāratamyasya saṃbhavāt cira śīghra tā
bahu alpa bhoga yogaḥ ca deha bhūma alpa tā kramaḥ
tīvra mande madhya mande manda mande bubhukṣu tā
kramāt mukhya atimātreṇa vidhinā eti antatas śivam
anye yiyāsuḥ ityādi grantham prāk grantha saṃgatam
kurvanti madhya tīvra ākhya śakti saṃpāta gocaram
yadā pratibhayā āviṣṭaḥ upi eṣa saṃvāda yojanām
icchan yiyāsuḥ bhavati tadā nīyeta sat gurum

original: AbhT_13.248b/. na sarvaḥ pratibhāviṣṭaḥ śaktyā nīyeta sadgurum // 248
analyzed: na sarvaḥ pratibhā āviṣṭaḥ śaktyā nīyeta sat gurum

original: AbhT_13.249a/. iti brūte yiyāsutvaṃ vaktavyaṃ nānyathā dhruvam /
analyzed: iti brūte yiyāsu tvam vaktavyam na anyathā dhruvam
rudra śakti samāviṣṭaḥ nīyate sat gurum prati
tena prāpta viveka uttha jñāna saṃpūrṇa mānasaḥ
dārḍhya saṃvāda rūḍhi ādeḥ yiyāsuḥ bhavati sphuṭam

original: AbhT_13.251b/. abhilāṣaḥ śive deve paśūnāṃ bhavate tadā // 251
analyzed: abhilāṣaḥ śive deve paśūnām bhavate tadā

original: AbhT_13.252a/. yadā śaivābhimānena yuktā vai paramāṇavaḥ /
analyzed: yadā śaiva abhimānena yuktāḥ vai paramāṇavaḥ

original: AbhT_13.252b/. tadaiva te vimuktāstu dīkṣitā guruṇā yataḥ // 252
analyzed: tadā eva te vimuktāḥ tu dīkṣitāḥ guruṇā yatas

original: AbhT_13.253a/. prāptimātrācca te siddhasādhyā iti hi gamyate /
analyzed: prāpti mātrāt ca te siddha sādhyāḥ iti hi gamyate
tam ārādhya iti tu granthaḥ manda tīvra eka gocaraḥ
navadhā śaktipātaḥ yam śaṃbhu nāthena varṇitaḥ
idam sāram iha jñeyam paripūrṇa cit ātmanaḥ
prakāśaḥ paramaḥ
tathāvidhaḥ api bhoga aṃśa avacchedena upalakṣitaḥ
aparaḥ śaktipātaḥ asau paryante śiva tā pradaḥ
ubhayatra api karma ādeḥ māyā antarvartinaḥ yatas

original: AbhT_13.257a/. nāsti vyāpāra ityevaṃ nirapekṣaḥ sa sarvataḥ /
analyzed: na asti vyāpāraḥ iti evam nirapekṣaḥ sa sarvatas

original: AbhT_13.257b/. tena māyāntarāle ye rudrā ye ca tadūrdhvataḥ // 257
analyzed: tena māyā antarāle ye rudrāḥ ye ca tad ūrdhvatas
sva adhikāra kṣaye taiḥ taiḥ bhairavībhūyate haṭhāt
ye māyayā hi an ākrāntāḥ te karma ādi anapekṣiṇaḥ
śaktipāta vaśāt eva tām tām siddhim upāśritāḥ
nanu pūjā japa dhyāna śaṃkara āsevana ādibhiḥ
te mantra ādi tvam āpannāḥ katham karma anapekṣiṇaḥ
mā evam tathāvidha uttīrṇa śiva dhyāna japa ādiṣu
pravṛttiḥ eva prathamam eṣām kasmāt vivicyatām
īśvara icchā nimittam ced śaktipāta eka hetutā

original: AbhT_13.262b/. japādikā kriyāśaktirevetthaṃ natu karma tat // 262
analyzed: japa ādikā kriyāśaktiḥ evā ittham na tu karma tat

original: AbhT_13.263a/. karma tallokarūḍhaṃ hi yadbhogamavaraṃ dadat /
analyzed: karma tat loka rūḍham hi yat bhogam avaram dadat

original: AbhT_13.263b/. tirodhatte bhoktṛrūpaṃ saṃjñāyā tu na no bharaḥ // 263
analyzed: tirodhatte bhoktṛ rūpam saṃjñāyā tu na naḥ bharaḥ
teṣām bhoga utka tā kasmāt iti ced dattam uttaram
citra ākāra prakāśaḥ yam svatantraḥ parameśvaraḥ
svātantryāt tu tirobhāva bandhaḥ bhoga isya bhoktṛ tām
puṣṇan svam rūpam eva syāt mala karma ādi varjitam

original: AbhT_13.266a/. uktaṃ seyaṃ kriyāśaktiḥ śivasya paśuvartinī /
analyzed: uktam sā iyam kriyāśaktiḥ śivasya paśu vartinī
bandhayitrī iti tat karma kathyate rūpa lopa kṛt

original: AbhT_13.267a/. jñātā sā ca kriyāśaktiḥ sadyaḥ siddhyupapādikā /
analyzed: jñātā sā ca kriyāśaktiḥ sadyas siddhi upapādikā
avicchinna sva ātma saṃvid prathā siddhiḥ iha ucyate
sā bhoga mokṣa svātantrya mahā lakṣmīḥ iha akṣayā

original: AbhT_13.268b/. viṣṇvādirūpatā deve yā kācitsā nijātmanā // 268
analyzed: viṣṇu ādi rūpa tā deve yā kācid sā nija ātmanā
bheda yoga vaśāt māyā pada madhya vyavasthitā
tena tad rūpa tā yogāt śaktipātaḥ sthitaḥ api san

original: AbhT_13.270a/. tāvantaṃ bhogamādhatte paryante śivatāṃ natu /
analyzed: tāvantam bhogam ādhatte paryante śiva tām na tu
yathā svātantryataḥ rājā api anugṛhṇāti kaṃcana
īśa śakti samāveśāt tathā viṣṇu ādayaḥ api alam
māyā garbha adhikārīya śaktipāta vaśāt tatas
kaḥ api pradhāna puruṣa vivekī prakṛteḥ gataḥ

original: AbhT_13.272b/. utkṛṣṭāttata evāśu ko@pi buddhā vivekitām // 272
analyzed: utkṛṣṭāt tatas eva āśu kopi buddhāḥ viveki tām
kṣaṇāt puṃsaḥ kalāyāḥ ca pum māyā antara vedakaḥ
kalā āśrayasya api atyantam karmaṇaḥ vinivartanāt
jñānākalaḥ prāktanaḥ tu karmī tasya āśraya sthiteḥ

original: AbhT_13.274b/. sa paraṃ prakṛterbudhne sṛṣṭiṃ nāyāti jātucit // 274
analyzed: sa param prakṛteḥ budhne sṛṣṭim na āyāti jātucit
māyādhare tu sṛjyeta ananta īśena pracodanāt
vijñānākala tām prāptaḥ kevalāt adhikārataḥ
malāt mantra tad īśa ādi bhāvam eti sadā śivāt

original: AbhT_13.276b/. patyuḥ parasmādyastveṣa śaktipātaḥ sa vai malāt // 276
analyzed: patyuḥ parasmāt yaḥ tu eṣa śaktipātaḥ sa vai malāt
na anyena śiva bhāvaḥ hi kenacid saṃprakāśate

original: AbhT_13.278a/. svacchandaśāstre tenoktaṃ vādināṃ tu śatatrayam /
analyzed: svacchandaśāstre tena uktam vādinām tu śata trayam
triṣaṣṭi abhyadhikam bhrāntam vaiṣṇava ādyam niśā antare
śiva tā āpatti paryantaḥ śaktipātaḥ ca carcyate

original: AbhT_13.280a/. anyathā kiṃ hi tatsyādyacchaivyā śaktyānadhiṣṭhitam /
analyzed: anyathā kim hi tat syāt yat śaivyā śaktyā anadhiṣṭhitam
tena iha vaiṣṇava ādīnām na adhikāraḥ kathaṃcana
te hi bheda eka vṛtti tvāt abhede dūra varjitāḥ
svātantryāt tu maheśasya te pi ced śiva tā unmukhāḥ
dviguṇā saṃskriyā asti eṣām liṅga uddhṛtya atha dīkṣayā
duṣṭa adhivāsa vigame puṣpaiḥ kumbhaḥ adhivāsyate

original: AbhT_13.283a/. dviguṇo@sya sa saṃskāro netthaṃ śuddhe ghaṭe vidhiḥ /
analyzed: dviguṇaḥ usya sa saṃskāraḥ na ittham śuddhe ghaṭe vidhiḥ
ittham śrī śaktipātaḥ yam nirapekṣaḥ iha uditaḥ
anayā eva diśā neyam mataṅga kiraṇa ādikam

original: AbhT_13.284b/. granthagauravabhītyā tu tallikhitvā na yojitam // 284
analyzed: grantha gaurava bhītyā tu tat likhitvā na yojitam
purāṇe api ca tasya eva prasādāt bhaktiḥ iṣyate

original: AbhT_13.285b/. yayā yānti parāṃ siddhiṃ tadbhāvagatamānasāḥ // 285
analyzed: yayā yānti parām siddhim tad bhāva gata mānasāḥ
evakāreṇa karma ādi sāpekṣa tvam niṣidhyate
prasādaḥ nirmalībhāvaḥ tena saṃpūrṇa rūpa tā

original: AbhT_13.287a/. ātmanā tena hi śivaḥ svayaṃ pūrṇaḥ prakāśate /
analyzed: ātmanā tena hi śivaḥ svayam pūrṇaḥ prakāśate
śivībhāva mahā siddhi sparśa vandhye tu kutracid

original: AbhT_13.288a/. vaiṣṇavādau hi yā bhaktirnāsau kevalataḥ śivāt /
analyzed: vaiṣṇava ādau hi yā bhaktiḥ na asau kevalatas śivāt

original: AbhT_13.288b/. śivo bhavati tatraiṣa kāraṇaṃ na tu kevalaḥ // 288
analyzed: śivaḥ bhavati tatra eṣa kāraṇam na tu kevalaḥ
nirmalaḥ ca api tu prāpta avacchid karma ādi apekṣakaḥ

original: AbhT_13.289b/. yayā yānti parāṃ siddhimityasyedaṃ tu jīvitam // 289
analyzed: yayā yānti parām siddhim iti asya idam tu jīvitam
śrīmān utpaladevaḥ ca api asmākam paramaḥ guruḥ

original: AbhT_13.290b/. śaktipātasamaye vicāraṇaṃ prāptamīśa na karoṣi karhicit // 290
analyzed: śaktipāta samaye vicāraṇam prāptam īśa na karoṣi karhicit

original: AbhT_13.291a/. adya māṃ prati kimāgataṃ yataḥ svaprakāśanavidhau vilambase /
analyzed: adya mām prati kim āgatam yatas sva prakāśana vidhau vilambase
karhicit prāpta śabdābhyām anapekṣi tvam ūcivān
durlabha tvam arāgi tvam śaktipāta vidhau vibhoḥ
apara ardhena tasya eva śaktipātasya citra tām
vyavadhāna cira kṣipra bheda ādyaiḥ upavarṇitaiḥ
śrīmatā api aniruddhena śaktim unmīlinīm vibhoḥ
vyācakṣāṇena mātaṅge varṇitā nirapekṣatā

original: AbhT_13.295a/. śaktiḥ patantī sāpekṣā na kvāpīti suvistarāt /
analyzed: śaktiḥ patantī sāpekṣā na kvāpi iti su vistarāt
evam vicitre api etasmin śaktipāte sthite sati
tāratamya ādibhiḥ bhedaiḥ samayi ādi vicitra tā
kaścid rudrā śatā mātrā pādanāt tad prasādataḥ

original: AbhT_13.297a/. śivatvaṃ kramaśo gacchet samayī yo nirūpyate /
analyzed: śiva tvam kramaśas gacchet samayī yaḥ nirūpyate
kaścid śuddha adhva bandhaḥ san putrakaḥ śīghram akramāt
bhoga vyavadhinā kaḥ api sādhakaḥ cira śīghrataḥ
kaścid saṃpūrṇa kartavyaḥ kṛtya pañcaka bhāgini

original: AbhT_13.299a/. rūpe sthito guruḥ so@pi bhogamokṣādibhedabhāk /
analyzed: rūpe sthitaḥ guruḥ saḥ api bhoga mokṣa ādi bheda bhāj
kramākrama ādibhiḥ bhedaiḥ śaktipātasya citra tā

original: AbhT_13.300b/. kramikaḥ śaktipātaśca siddhānte vāmake tataḥ // 300
analyzed: kramikaḥ śaktipātaḥ ca siddhānte vāmake tatas

original: AbhT_13.301a/. dakṣe mate kule kaule ṣaḍardhe hṛdaye tataḥ /
analyzed: dakṣe mate kule kaule ṣaṣ ardhe hṛdaye tatas
ullaṅghana vaśāt vā api jhaṭiti akramam eva vā
guruḥ ullaṅghita adhas stha srotāḥ vai trika śāstra gaḥ
jñāna ācāra ādi bhedena hi uttara adhara tā vibhuḥ
śāstreṣu adīdṛśat śrīmat sarva ācāra hṛd ādiṣu
vāma mārga abhiṣiktaḥ tu daiśikaḥ para tattva vid

original: AbhT_13.304b/. tathāpi bhairave tantre punaḥ saṃskāramarhati // 304
analyzed: tathā api bhairave tantre punar saṃskāram arhati
śaiva vaimala siddhāntāḥ ārhatāḥ kārukāḥ ca ye

original: AbhT_13.305b/. sarve te paśavo jñeyā bhairave mātṛmaṇḍale // 305
analyzed: sarve te paśavaḥ jñeyāḥ bhairave mātṛ maṇḍale
kulakālī vidhau ca uktam vaiṣṇavānām viśeṣataḥ
bhasma niṣṭhā prapannānām ityādau nā eva yogyatā
svacchandaśāstre saṃkṣepāt uktam ca śrī maheśinā
anya śāstra rataḥ yaḥ tu na asau siddhi phala pradaḥ
samayi ādi kramāt labdha abhiṣekaḥ hi guruḥ mataḥ

original: AbhT_13.308b/. sa ca śaktivaśāditthaṃ vaiṣṇavādiṣu ko@nvayaḥ // 308
analyzed: sa ca śakti vaśāt ittham vaiṣṇava ādiṣu kaḥ nvayaḥ
chadma apaśravaṇa ādyaiḥ tu tat jñānam gṛhṇataḥ bhavet
prāyaścittam atas tādṛś adhikārī atra kim bhavet
phala ākāṅkṣā yutaḥ śiṣyaḥ tad eka āyatta siddhikaḥ
dhruvam pacyeta narake prāyaścitti upasevanāt
tirobhāva prakāraḥ yat tādṛśi niyojitaḥ

original: AbhT_13.311b/. gurau śivena tadbhaktiḥ śaktipāto@sya nocyate // 311
analyzed: gurau śivena tad bhaktiḥ śaktipātaḥ asya na ucyate
yadā tu vaicitrya vaśāt jānīyāt tasya tādṛśam
viparīta pravṛtta tvam jñānam tasmāt upāharet

original: AbhT_13.313a/. taṃ ca tyajetpāpavṛttiṃ bhavettu jñānatatparaḥ /
analyzed: tam ca tyajet pāpa vṛttim bhavet tu jñāna tatparaḥ

original: AbhT_13.313b/. yathā caurādgṛhītvārthaṃ taṃ nigṛhṇāti bhūpatiḥ // 313
analyzed: yathā caurāt gṛhītvā artham tam nigṛhṇāti bhūpatiḥ
vaiṣṇava ādeḥ tathā śaivam jñānam āhṛtya sat matiḥ

original: AbhT_13.314b/. sa hi bhedaikavṛttitvaṃ śivajñāne śrute@pyalam // 314
analyzed: sa hi bheda eka vṛtti tvam śiva jñāne śrute api alam
na ujjhati iti dṛḍham vāma dhiṣṭhitaḥ tad paśu uttamaḥ
śivena eva tirobhāvya sthāpitaḥ niyateḥ balāt
kathaṅkāram pati padam prayātu paratantritaḥ

original: AbhT_13.316b/. svacchandaśāstre proktaṃ ca vaiṣṇavādiṣu ye ratāḥ // 316
analyzed: svacchandaśāstre proktam ca vaiṣṇava ādiṣu ye ratāḥ
bhramayati eva tān māyā hi amokṣe mokṣa lipsayā
vaiṣṇava ādiḥ śaiva śāstram melayan nija śāsane
dhruvam saṃśayam āpannaḥ ubhaya bhraṣṭa tām vrajet
sva dṛṣṭau para dṛṣṭau ca samaya ullaṅghanāt asau
pratyavāyam yatas abhyeti caret tat na īdṛśam kramam

original: AbhT_13.319b/. uktaṃ śrīmadgahvare ca parameśena tādṛśam // 319
analyzed: uktam śrīmat gahvare ca parameśeṇa tādṛśam
na anya śāstra abhiyuktaṣu śiva jñānam prakāśate

original: AbhT_13.320b/. tanna saiddhāntiko vāme nāsau dakṣe sa no mate // 320
analyzed: tat na saiddhāntikaḥ vāme na asau dakṣe sa naḥ mate

original: AbhT_13.321a/. kulakaule trike nāsau pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ paratra tu /
analyzed: kula kaule trike na asau pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ paratra tu
avacchinnaḥ na avacchedam no vetti ānantya saṃsthitaḥ
ūrdhva sthaḥ ūdhi kṛtaḥ guruḥ
sva ātmīya adhara saṃsparśāt prāṇayan adharāḥ kriyāḥ
saphalīkurute yat tat ūrdhva sthaḥ guruḥ uttamaḥ
adhas stha dṛś sthaḥ upi etādṛś guru sevī bhavet sa yaḥ
tādṛś śakti nipāta iddhaḥ yaḥ drāk ūrdhvam imam nayet
tad tad giri nadī prāya avacchinne kṣetra pīṭhake
uttarottaram ācāryam vidan api adharodharaḥ
kurvan adhikriyām śāstra laṅghī nigraha bhājanam
śaktipāta balāt eva jñāna yogya vicitra tā

original: AbhT_13.327a/. śrautaṃ cintāmayaṃ dvyātma bhāvanāmayameva ca /
analyzed: śrautam cintā mayam dvi ātma bhāvanā mayam eva ca

original: AbhT_13.327b/. jñānaṃ taduttaraṃ jyāyo yato mokṣaikakāraṇam // 327
analyzed: jñānam tat uttaram jyāyaḥ yatas mokṣa eka kāraṇam

original: AbhT_13.328a/. tattvebhya uddhṛtiṃ kvāpi yojanaṃ sakale@kale /
analyzed: tattvebhyaḥ uddhṛtim kvāpi yojanam sakala ikale
katham kuryāt vinā jñānam bhāvanā mayam uttamam
yogī tu prāpta tad tattva siddhiḥ api uttame pade

original: AbhT_13.330a/. adhareṣu ca tattveṣu yā siddhiryogajāsya sā /
analyzed: adhareṣu ca tattveṣu yā siddhiḥ yoga jā asya sā
vimocanāyām na upāyaḥ sthitā api dhanadāra vat
yaḥ tu utpanna samasta adhva siddhiḥ sa hi sadāśivaḥ
sākṣāt eṣa katham martyān mocayet guru tām vrajan
tena uktam mālinītantre vicārya jñāna yogite
yatas ca mokṣa daḥ proktaḥ su abhyasta jñānavān budhaiḥ
tasmāt su abhyasta vijñāna tā eva ekam guru lakṣaṇam

original: AbhT_13.333b/. vibhāgastveṣa me proktaḥ śaṃbhunāthena darśyate // 333
analyzed: vibhāgaḥ tu eṣa me proktaḥ śaṃbhunā athena darśyate
mokṣa jñāna paraḥ kuryāt gurum su abhyasta vedanam

original: AbhT_13.334b/. anyaṃ tyajetprāptamapi tathācoktaṃ śivena tat // 334
analyzed: anyam tyajet prāptam api tathā ca uktam śivena tat

original: AbhT_13.335a/. āmodārthī yathā bhṛṅgaḥ puṣpātpuṣpāntaraṃ vrajet /
analyzed: āmoda arthī yathā bhṛṅgaḥ puṣpāt puṣpa antaram vrajet

original: AbhT_13.335b/. vijñānārthī tathā śiṣyo gurorgurvantaraṃ vrajet // 335
analyzed: vijñāna arthī tathā śiṣyaḥ guroḥ guru antaram vrajet

original: AbhT_13.336a/. śaktihīnaṃ guruṃ prāpya mokṣajñāne kathaṃ śrayet /
analyzed: śakti hīnam gurum prāpya mokṣa jñāne katham śrayet

original: AbhT_13.336b/. naṣṭamūle drume devi kutaḥ puṣpaphalādikam // 336
analyzed: naṣṭa mūle drume devi kutas puṣpa phala ādikam
uttarottaram utkarṣa lakṣmīm paśyan api sthitaḥ

original: AbhT_13.337b/. adhame yaḥ pade tasmātko@nyaḥ syāddaivadagdhakaḥ // 337
analyzed: adhame yaḥ pade tasmāt kaḥ nyaḥ syāt daiva dagdhakaḥ

original: AbhT_13.338a/. yastu bhogaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca vāñchedvijñānameva ca /
analyzed: yaḥ tu bhogam ca mokṣam ca vāñchet vijñānam eva ca
su abhyasta jñāninam yoga siddham sa gurum āśrayet
tad abhāve tu vijñāna mokṣayoḥ jñāninam śrayet

original: AbhT_13.339b/. bhuktyaṃśe yoginaṃ yastatphalaṃ dātuṃ bhavetkṣamaḥ // 339
analyzed: bhukti aṃśe yoginam yaḥ tad phalam dātum bhavet kṣamaḥ
phala dāna akṣame yogini apāya eka upadeśini

original: AbhT_13.340b/. varaṃ jñānī yo@bhyupāyaṃ diśedapica mocayet // 340
analyzed: varam jñānī yaḥ abhi upāyam diśet api ca mocayet

original: AbhT_13.341a/. jñānī na pūrṇa evaiko yadi hyaṃśāṃśikākramāt /
analyzed: jñānī na pūrṇaḥ eva ekaḥ yadi hi aṃśa aṃśikā kramāt
jñānāni ādāya vijñānam kurvīta akhaṇḍa maṇḍalam
tena asaṃkhyān gurūn kuryāt pūraṇāya sva saṃvidaḥ

original: AbhT_13.342b/. dhanyastu pūrṇavijñānaṃ jñānārthī labhate gurum // 342
analyzed: dhanyaḥ tu pūrṇa vijñānam jñāna arthī labhate gurum
nānā guru āgama srotaḥ pratibhā mātra miśritam

original: AbhT_13.343b/. kṛtvā jñānārṇavaṃ svābhirvipruṅgiḥ plāvayenna kim // 343
analyzed: kṛtvā jñāna arṇavam svābhiḥ vipruṅgiḥ plāvayet na kim

original: AbhT_13.344a/. ā tapanānmoṭakāntaṃ yasya me@sti gurukramaḥ /
analyzed: tapanāt moṭaka antam yasya mā isti guru kramaḥ
tasya me sarva śiṣyasya na upadeśa daridra tā

original: AbhT_13.345a/. śrīmatā kallaṭenetthaṃ guruṇā tu nyarūpyata /
analyzed: śrīmatā kallaṭena ittham guruṇā tu nyarūpyata
aham api atas eva adhas śāstra dṛṣṭi kutūhalāt
tārkika śrauta bauddha arha dvaiṣṇava ādīn na seviṣi
saṃbodha utkarṣa bāhulyāt krama utkṛṣṭān vibhāvayet
śrī pūrvaśāstre praṣṭāraḥ munayaḥ nārada ādayaḥ
prāk vaiṣṇavāḥ saugatāḥ ca siddhānta ādi vidaḥ tatas
tasmāt na guru bhūyastve viśaṅketa kadācana
guru antara rate mūḍhe āgama antara sevake

original: AbhT_13.350a/. pratyavāyo ya āmnātaḥ sa itthamiti gṛhyatām /
analyzed: pratyavāyaḥ yaḥ āmnātaḥ saḥ ittham iti gṛhyatām

original: AbhT_13.350b/. yo yatra śāstre@dhikṛtaḥ sa tatra gururucyate // 350
analyzed: yaḥ yatra śāstra idhikṛtaḥ sa tatra guruḥ ucyate
tatra anadhikṛtaḥ yaḥ tu tad guru antaram ucyate
yathā tad maṇḍala āsīnaḥ maṇḍala antara bhūpatim
sva maṇḍala jigīṣuḥ san sevamānaḥ vinaśyati
tathā uttarottara jñāna siddhi prepsuḥ samāśrayan
adhara adharam ācāryam vināśam adhigacchati
evam eva ūrdhva vartiṣṇoḥ āgamāt siddhi vāñchakaḥ
māyīya śāstra nirataḥ vināśam pratipadyate

original: AbhT_13.354b/. uktaṃ ca śrīmadānande karma saṃśritya bhāvataḥ // 354
analyzed: uktam ca śrīmat ānande karma saṃśritya bhāvataḥ
jugupsate tat tasmin ca viphalenyat samāśrayet
dināt dinam hrasan tu evam pacyate raurava ādiṣu
yaḥ tu ūrdhva ūrdhva patha prepsuḥ adharam gurum āgamam
jihāset śaktipātena sa dhanyaḥ pronmukhīkṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_13.357a/. ata eveha śāstreṣu śaiveṣveva nirūpyate /
analyzed: atas eva iha śāstreṣu śaiveṣu eva nirūpyate
śāstra antara arthān āśvastān prati saṃskārakaḥ vidhiḥ

original: AbhT_13.358a/. ataścāpyuttamaṃ śaivaṃ yo@nyatra patitaḥ sahi /
analyzed: atas ca api uttamam śaivam yaḥ nī atra patitaḥ sahi

original: AbhT_13.358b/. ihānugrāhya ūrdhvordhvaṃ netastu patitaḥ kvacit // 358
analyzed: iha anugrāhyaḥ ūrdhva ūrdhvam na itas tu patitaḥ kvacid
atas eva hi sarvajñaiḥ brahma viṣṇu ādibhiḥ nije

original: AbhT_13.359b/. na śāsane samāmnātaṃ liṅgoddhārādi kiṃcana // 359
analyzed: na śāsane samāmnātam liṅga uddhāra ādi kiṃcana
ittham viṣṇu ādayaḥ śaiva parama artha eka vedinaḥ
kāṃścid prati tathā adikṣuḥ te mohāt vimatim śritāḥ
tathāvidhām eva matim satya saṃsparśana akṣamām
dṛṣṭvā eṣām brahma viṣṇu ādyaiḥ buddhaiḥ api tathā uditam
iti eṣa yukti āgamataḥ śaktipātaḥ vivecitaḥ
atha śrī tantrāloke caturdaśama āhnikam
tirobhāva svarūpam tu kathyamānam vivicyatām
svabhāvāt parameśānaḥ niyati aniyati kramam

original: AbhT_14.2a/. spṛśanprakāśate yena tataḥ svacchanda ucyate /
analyzed: spṛśan prakāśate yena tatas svacchandaḥ ucyate
niyatim karma phalayoḥ āśritya eṣa maheśvaraḥ
sṛṣṭi saṃsthiti saṃhārān vidhattā iva antara sthitīn

original: AbhT_14.4a/. ekaḥ sa devo viśvātmā niyatityāgataḥ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ sa devaḥ viśvātmā niyati tyāgataḥ prabhuḥ

original: AbhT_14.4b/. avāntare yā ca sṛṣṭiḥ sthitiścātrāpyayantritam // 4
analyzed: avāntare yā ca sṛṣṭiḥ sthitiḥ ca atra api a yantritam
na ujjhati eṣa vapuḥ tyakta niyatiḥ ca sthitaḥ utra tat
niyatyā eva yadā ca eṣa sva rūpa ācchādana kramāt
bhuṅkte duḥkha vimoha ādi tadā karma phala kramaḥ

original: AbhT_14.6b/. tyaktvā tu niyamaṃ kārmaṃ duḥkhamohaparītatām // 6
analyzed: tyaktvā tu niyamam kārmam duḥkha moha parīta tām
bibhāsayiṣuḥ āsteyam tirodhānena apekṣakaḥ
yathā prakāśa svātantryāt pratibuddhaḥ upi abuddha vat
āste tadvat anuttīrṇaḥ api uttīrṇaḥ iva ceṣṭate

original: AbhT_14.8b/. yathā ca buddhastāṃ mūḍhaceṣṭāṃ kurvannapi dviṣan // 8
analyzed: yathā ca buddhaḥ tām mūḍha ceṣṭām kurvan api dviṣan

original: AbhT_14.9a/. hṛdyāste mūḍha evaṃ hi prabuddhānāṃ viceṣṭitam /
analyzed: hṛdyāḥ te mūḍhaḥ evam hi prabuddhānām viceṣṭitam
śrī vidyā adhipatiḥ ca āha māna stotre tat īdṛśam

original: AbhT_14.10a/. ye yauṣmāke śāsanamārge kṛtadīkṣāḥ saṃgacchanto mohavaśādvipratipattim /
analyzed: ye yauṣmāke śāsana mārge kṛta dīkṣāḥ saṃgacchantaḥ moha vaśāt vipratipattim

original: AbhT_14.10b/. nūnaṃ teṣā nāsti bhavadbhānuniyogaḥ saṅkocaḥ kiṃ sūryakaraistāmarasānām // 10
analyzed: nūnam teṣām nā asti bhavat bhānu niyogaḥ saṅkocaḥ kim sūrya karaiḥ tāmarasānām

original: AbhT_14.11a/. jñātajñeyā dhātṛpadasthā api santo ye tvanmārgātkāpathagāste@pi na samyaka /
analyzed: jñāta jñeyāḥ dhātṛ pada sthāḥ api santaḥ ye tvad mārgāt kāpatha gāḥ te api na
prāyas teṣām laiṅgika buddhi ādi samutthaḥ mithyā bodhaḥ sarpa vasā dīpa ja kalpaḥ

original: AbhT_14.12a/. yasmādviddhaṃ sūtakamukhyena nu tāmraṃ tadyadbhūyaḥ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ no samupeyāt /
analyzed: yasmāt viddham sūtaka mukhyena nu tāmram tat yat bhūyas svām prakṛtim no samupeyāt

original: AbhT_14.12b/. no taiḥ pītaṃ bhūtalasaṃsthairamṛtaṃ tadyeṣāṃ tṛṭkṣudduḥkhavibādhāḥ punarasmin // 12
analyzed: no taiḥ pītam bhū tala saṃsthaiḥ amṛtam tat yeṣām tṛṣ kṣudh duḥkha vibādhāḥ punar asmin
tatas prabuddha ceṣṭā asau mantra caryā arcana ādikā

original: AbhT_14.13b/. dveṣeddhāntardahatyenaṃ dāhaḥ śaṅkaiva sā yataḥ // 13
analyzed: dveṣa iddha antar dahati enam dāhaḥ śaṅkā eva sā yatas

original: AbhT_14.14a/. na cāsya karmamahimā tādṛgyenetthamāsta saḥ /
analyzed: na ca asya karma mahimā tādṛś yena ittham āsta saḥ

original: AbhT_14.14b/. kiṃ hi tatkarma kasmādvā pūrveṇātra samo vidhiḥ // 14
analyzed: kim hi tat karma kasmāt vā pūrveṇa atra samaḥ vidhiḥ
tasmāt sā parameśa icchā yayā ayam mohitaḥ tathā
ananta kāla saṃvedya duḥkha pātra tvam īhate
tatra api ca icchā vaicitryāt iha amutra ubhaya ātmakaḥ
duḥkhasya api vibhedaḥ asti cira śaighrya kṛtaḥ tathā
kāla kāma andhaka ādīnām paulastya pura vāsinām
tathā anyeṣām tirobhāvaḥ tāvat duḥkhaḥ hi amutra ca
anyaḥ api ca tirobhāvaḥ samaya ullaṅghana ātmakaḥ
yat uktam parameśeṇa śrīmat ānandagahvare
samaya ullaṅghanāt devi kravyāda tvam śatam samāḥ
tatra api manda tīvra ādi bhedāt bahuvidhaḥ kramaḥ
svātantryāt ca maheśasya tirobhūtā upi asau svayam
para dvāreṇa vā abhyeti bhūyas nugraham api alam
anusāreṇa dīkṣā ādau kṛte syāt śiva tā mayaḥ
tirobhūtaḥ paretāsuḥ api bandhu suhṛd gurūn
ālambya śaktipātena dīkṣā ādyaiḥ anugṛhyate
tatra api kāla śīghra tva cira tva ādi vibheda tām
tathā eti śaktipātaḥ asau yena āyāti śiva ātma tām
ittham sṛṣṭi sthiti dhvaṃsa tirobhāvam anugrahaḥ

original: AbhT_14.24b/. iti pañcasu kartṛtvaṃ śivatvaṃ saṃvidātmanaḥ // 24
analyzed: iti pañcasu kartṛ tvam śiva tvam saṃvid ātmanaḥ
yoginaḥ ūrcā japa dhyāna yogāḥ saṃsyuḥ sadā uditāḥ
aindrajālika vṛttānte na rajyeta kadācana

original: AbhT_14.26b/. sādāśivo@pi yo bhogo bandhaḥ so@pyucitātmanām // 26
analyzed: sādāśivaḥ api yaḥ bhogaḥ bandhaḥ saḥ api ucita ātmanām
jñātṛ tvam eva śiva tā svātantryam tat iha ucyate

original: AbhT_14.27b/. kulālavattu kartṛtvaṃ na mukhyaṃ tadadhiṣṭhiteḥ // 27
analyzed: kulāla vat tu kartṛ tvam na mukhyam tad adhiṣṭhiteḥ

original: AbhT_14.28a/. iti jñātvā grahītavyā naiva jātvapi khaṇḍanā /
analyzed: iti jñātvā grahītavyā nā eva jātu api khaṇḍanā

original: AbhT_14.28b/. śivo@haṃ cenmadicchānuvarti kiṃ na jagattviti // 28
analyzed: śivaḥ uham ced mad icchā anuvarti kim na jagat tu iti
mama icchām anuvartantām iti atra ahaṃvidi sphuret

original: AbhT_14.29b/. śivo vā parameśāno dehādiratha nirmitaḥ // 29
analyzed: śivaḥ vā parameśānaḥ deha ādiḥ atha nirmitaḥ
śivasya tāvat asti etat dehaḥ tu eṣa tathā tvayā

original: AbhT_14.30b/. kṛtaḥ kānyā dehatāsya tatkiṃ syādvācyatāpadam // 30
analyzed: kṛtaḥ kā anyā deha tā asya tat kim syāt vācya tā padam
uktam ca siddha santāna śrīmat ūrmi mahā kule
pavana bhramaṇa prāṇa vikṣepa ādi kṛta śramāḥ

original: AbhT_14.32a/. kuhakādiṣu ye bhrāntāste bhrāntāḥ parame pade /
analyzed: kuhaka ādiṣu ye bhrāntāḥ te bhrāntāḥ parame pade
sarvatra bahu mānena yā api utkrāntiḥ vimuktaye
proktā sā sāra śāstreṣu bhoga upāya tayā uditā

original: AbhT_14.33b/. yadi sarvagatā devo vadotkramya kva yāsyati // 33
analyzed: yadi sarva gatā devaḥ vada utkramya kva yāsyati
atha a sarva gataḥ tarhi ghaṭa tulyaḥ tadā bhavet
utkrānti vidhi yogaḥ uyam eka deśena kathyate
niraṃśe śivatattve tu katham utkrānti saṃgatiḥ
ātmanaḥ yojanam vyomni tadvat utkrānti vartanā
tasmāt na utkramayet jīvam para tattva samīhayā

original: AbhT_14.37a/. śrīpūrvaśāstre tūktaṃ yadutkrānterlakṣaṇaṃ na tat /
analyzed: śrī pūrvaśāstre tu uktam yat utkrānteḥ lakṣaṇam na tat
mukti upāya tayā kiṃtu bhoga hānyai tathā eṣaṇāt
japa dhyāna ādi saṃsiddhaḥ svātantryāt śaktipātataḥ

original: AbhT_14.38b/. bhogaṃ prati viraktaśceditthaṃ dehaṃ tyajediti // 38
analyzed: bhogam prati viraktaḥ ced ittham deham tyajet iti

original: AbhT_14.39a/. svacchandamṛtyorapi yad bhīṣmādeḥ śrūyate kila /
analyzed: svacchanda mṛtyoḥ api yat bhīṣma ādeḥ śrūyate kila
bhoga vairasya saṃprāptau jīvitānta upasarpaṇam
yoga mantra amṛta dravya vara ādyaiḥ siddhi bhāj tanuḥ
hātum na hi anyathā śakyāḥ vinā ukta krama yogataḥ

original: AbhT_14.41a/. uktaṃ ca mālinītantre parameśena tādṛśam /
analyzed: uktam ca mālinītantre parameśena tādṛśam
sarvam api athavā bhogam manyamānaḥ virūpakam
ityādi vadatā sarvaiḥ alakṣya antar sa tattvakam
evam sṛṣṭi ādi kartavya sva svātantrya upadeśanam
yat sā eva mukhya dīkṣā syāt śiṣyasya śiva dāyinī

original: AbhT_14.43b/. uktaṃ śrīniśicāre ca bhairavīyeṇa tejasā // 43
analyzed: uktam śrī niśicāre ca bhairavīyeṇa tejasā
vyāptam viśvam prapaśyanti vikalpa ujjhita cetasaḥ
vikalpa yukta cittaḥ tu piṇḍa pātāt śivam vrajet
avikalpaḥ tathā adya eva jīvanmuktaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: AbhT_14.46b/. syurvisphuliṅgakaṇikā api cettadante dedīpyate vimalabodhahutāśarāśiḥ // 46
analyzed: syuḥ visphuliṅga kaṇikāḥ api ced tad ante dedīpyate vimala bodha hutāśa rāśiḥ
ittham dīkṣā upakramaḥ yam darśitaḥ śāstra saṃmataḥ
atha śrī tantrāloke pañcadaśam āhnikam
atha etad upayogāya yāgaḥ tāvat nirūpyate

original: AbhT_15.1b/. tatra dīkṣaiva bhoge ca muktau cāyātyupāyatām // 1
analyzed: tatra dīkṣā eva bhoge ca muktau ca āyāti upāya tām
svayam saṃskāra yogāt vā tat aṅgam tat pradarśyate

original: AbhT_15.2b/. yo yatrābhilaṣedbhogān sa tatraiva niyojitaḥ // 2
analyzed: yaḥ yatra abhilaṣet bhogān sa tatra eva niyojitaḥ
siddhi bhāj mantra śaktyā iti śrīmat svāyaṃbhuve vibhuḥ

original: AbhT_15.3b/. yogyatāvaśato yatra vāsanā yasya tatra saḥ // 3
analyzed: yogyatā vaśataḥ yatra vāsanā yasya tatra saḥ

original: AbhT_15.4a/. yojyo na cyavate tasmāditi śrīmālinīmate /
analyzed: yojyaḥ na cyavate tasmāt iti śrī mālinīmate

original: AbhT_15.4b/. vadanbhogādyupāyatvaṃ dīkṣāyāḥ prāha no guruḥ // 4
analyzed: vadan bhoga ādi upāya tvam dīkṣāyāḥ prāha no guruḥ

original: AbhT_15.5a/. na cādhikāritā dīkṣāṃ vinā yoge@sti śāṅkare /
analyzed: na ca adhikāri tā dīkṣām vinā yoga īsti śāṅkare
na ca yoga adhikāri tvam ekam eva anayā bhavet
api mantra adhikāri tvam muktiḥ ca śiva dīkṣayā
iti asmin mālinī vākye sākṣāt mokṣa abhyupāya tā
dīkṣāyāḥ kathitā prācya granthena punar ucyate
yeṣām adhyavasāyaḥ usti na vidyām prati aśaktitaḥ
sukha upāyam idam teṣām vidhānam uditam guroḥ
iti śrīmat mataṅga ākhye hi uktā mokṣa abhyupāya tā
samyak jñāna svabhāvā hi vidyā sākṣāt vimocikā
uktam tatra eva tattvānām kārya kāraṇa bhāvataḥ
tatra aśaktāḥ tu ye teṣām dīkṣā caryā samādhayaḥ
te vidyā pūrvakāḥ yasmāt tasmāt jñāni uttamottamaḥ

original: AbhT_15.12a/. jñānaṃ ca śāstrāttaccāpi śrāvyo nādīkṣito yataḥ /
analyzed: jñānam ca śāstrāt tat ca api śrāvyaḥ na a dīkṣitaḥ yatas
atas asya saṃskriyā mātra upayogaḥ dīkṣayā kṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_15.13a/. yatra tatrāstu guruṇā yojito@sau phalaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: yatra tatra astu guruṇā yojitā asau phalam punar

original: AbhT_15.13b/. svavijñānocitaṃ yāti jñānītyuktaṃ purā kila // 13
analyzed: sva vijñāna ucitam yāti jñānī iti uktam purā kila

original: AbhT_15.14a/. yasya tvīśaprasādena divyā kācana yogyatā /
analyzed: yasya tu īśa prasādena divyā kācana yogyatā

original: AbhT_15.14b/. guroḥ śiśośca tau naiva prati dīkṣopayogitā // 14
analyzed: guroḥ śiśoḥ ca tau nā eva prati dīkṣā upayogi tā
jñānam eva tadā dīkṣā śrī traiśika nirūpaṇāt
sarva śāstra artha vettṛ tvam akasmāt ca asya jāyate
iti śrī mālinīnītyā yaḥ sāṃsiddhika saṃvidaḥ
saḥ uttama adhikārī syāt jñānavān hi guruḥ mataḥ

original: AbhT_15.17a/. ātmane vā parebhyo vā hitārthī cetayedidam /
analyzed: ātmane vā parebhyaḥ vā hita arthī cetayet idam
iti uktyā mālinīśāstre tat sarvam prakaṭīkṛtam
jñāna yogyāḥ tathā kecid caryā yogyāḥ tathā apare

original: AbhT_15.18b/. dīkṣāyogyā yogayogyā iti śrīkairaṇe vidhau // 18
analyzed: dīkṣā yogyāḥ yoga yogyāḥ iti śrī kairaṇe vidhau
tatra ukta lakṣaṇaḥ karma yoga jñāna viśāradaḥ
uttara uttara tā bhūmi utkṛṣṭaḥ guruḥ udīritaḥ
sa ca prāc ukta śakti anyatama pāta pavitritam

original: AbhT_15.20b/. parīkṣya pṛṣṭvā vā śiṣyaṃ dīkṣākarma samācaret // 20
analyzed: parīkṣya pṛṣṭvā vā śiṣyam dīkṣā karma samācaret

original: AbhT_15.21a/. uktaṃ svacchandaśāstre ca śiṣyaṃ pṛcchedguruḥ svayam /
analyzed: uktam svacchandaśāstre ca śiṣyam pṛcchet guruḥ svayam
phalam prārthayase yādṛś tādṛś sādhanam ārabhe
vāsanā bhedataḥ sādhya prāptiḥ mantra pracoditā

original: AbhT_15.23a/. vāsanābhedato bhinnaṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ ca guroḥ phalam /
analyzed: vāsanā bhedataḥ bhinnam śiṣyāṇām ca guroḥ phalam
loka dharmī phala ākāṃkṣī śubha sthaḥ ca aśubha ujjhitaḥ
dvidhā mumukṣuḥ nirbījaḥ samaya ādi vivarjitaḥ
bāla bāliśa vṛddha strī bhoga bhuj vyādhita ādikaḥ

original: AbhT_15.25b/. anyaḥ sabījo yasyetthaṃ dīkṣoktā śivaśāsane // 25
analyzed: anyaḥ sa bījaḥ yasya ittham dīkṣā uktā śiva śāsane
vidvas dvandva sahānām tu sa bījā samaya ātmikā
dīkṣā anugrāhikā pālyā viśeṣa samayāḥ tu taiḥ
abhāvam bhāvayet samyak karmaṇām prācya bhāvinām
mumukṣoḥ nirapekṣasya prārabdhṛ ekam na śādhayet
sādhakasya tu bhūti artham ittham eva viśodhayet
śiva dharmiṇī asau dīkṣā loka dharma apahāriṇī

original: AbhT_15.29a/. adharmarūpiṇāmeva na śubhānāṃ tu śodhanam /
analyzed: adharma rūpiṇām eva na śubhānām tu śodhanam
loka dharmiṇī asau dīkṣā mantra ārādhana varjitā
prārabdha dehabhede tu bhuṅkte saḥ avaṇima ādikam

original: AbhT_15.30b/. bhuktvordhvaṃ yāti yatraiṣa yukto@tha sakale@kale // 30
analyzed: bhuktvā ūrdhvam yāti yatra eṣa yuktā utha sakala ikale
samayācāra pāśam tu nirbījāyām viśodhayet

original: AbhT_15.31b/. dīkṣāmātreṇa muktiḥ syādbhaktyā deve gurau sadā // 31
analyzed: dīkṣā mātreṇa muktiḥ syāt bhaktyā deve gurau sadā

original: AbhT_15.32a/. sadyonirvāṇadā seyaṃ nirbījā yeti bhaṇyate /
analyzed: sadyas nirvāṇa dā sā iyam nirbījā yā iti bhaṇyate

original: AbhT_15.33a/. dīkṣāvasāne śuddhasya dehatyāge paraṃ padam /
analyzed: dīkṣā avasāne śuddhasya dehatyāge param padam
dehatyāge sa bījāyām karma abhāvāt vipadyate
samayācāra pāśam tu dīkṣitaḥ pālayet sadā

original: AbhT_15.34b/. evaṃ pṛṣṭvā parijñāya vicārya ca guruḥ svayam // 34
analyzed: evam pṛṣṭvā parijñāya vicārya ca guruḥ svayam

original: AbhT_15.35a/. ucitāṃ saṃvidhitsustāṃ vāsanāṃ tādṛśīṃ śrayet /
analyzed: ucitām saṃvidhitsuḥ tām vāsanām tādṛśīm śrayet

original: AbhT_15.35b/. āyātaśaktipātasya dīkṣāṃ prati na daiśikaḥ // 35
analyzed: āyāta śaktipātasya dīkṣām prati na daiśikaḥ
avajñām vidadhīta iti śaṃbhunā ājñā nirūpitā

original: AbhT_15.36b/. svadhanena daridrasya kuryāddīkṣāṃ guruḥ svayam // 36
analyzed: sva dhanena daridrasya kuryāt dīkṣām guruḥ svayam

original: AbhT_15.37a/. api dūrvāmbubhiryadvā dīkṣāyai bhikṣate śiśuḥ /
analyzed: api dūrvā ambubhiḥ yat vā dīkṣāyai bhikṣate śiśuḥ

original: AbhT_15.37b/. bhikṣopāttaṃ nijaṃ vātha dhanaṃ prāggurave śiśuḥ // 37
analyzed: bhikṣā upāttam nijam vā atha dhanam prāk gurave śiśuḥ
dadyāt yena viśuddham tad yāga yogya tvam aśnute

original: AbhT_15.39a/. sa eva hi guruḥ kāryastato@sau dīkṣaṇe kṣamaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva hi guruḥ kāryaḥ tatas asau dīkṣaṇe kṣamaḥ
śiva tā āveśitā ca asya bahu upāyā pradarśitā

original: AbhT_15.40b/. bahvīṣu tāsu tāsveṣa kriyāsu śivatāṃ hṛdi // 40
analyzed: bahvīṣu tāsu tāsu eṣa kriyāsu śiva tām hṛdi
saṃdadhat dṛḍham abhyeti śiva bhāvam prasanna dhīḥ
śivībhūtaḥ yat yat icchet tat tat kartum samīhate
śiva abhimānita upāyaḥ bāhyaḥ hetuḥ na mokṣa daḥ
śivaḥ yam śivaḥ eva asmi iti evam ācārya śiṣyayoḥ
hetu tadvat tayā dārḍhya abhimānaḥ mocakaḥ hi aṇoḥ

original: AbhT_15.43b/. nādhyātmena vinā bāhyaṃ nādhyātmaṃ bāhyavarjitam // 43
analyzed: na adhyātmena vinā bāhyam na adhyātmam bāhya varjitam
siddhyet jñāna kriyābhyām tat dvitīyam saṃprakāśate

original: AbhT_15.44b/. śrībrahmayāmale deva iti tena nyarūpayat // 44
analyzed: śrī brahmayāmale devaḥ iti tena nyarūpayat
śrīmat ānandaśāstre ca nā aśuddhiḥ syāt vipaścitaḥ

original: AbhT_15.45b/. kintu snānaṃ suvastratvaṃ tuṣṭisaṃjananaṃ bhavet // 45
analyzed: kintu snānam su vastra tvam tuṣṭi saṃjananam bhavet
tatra prasiddha deha ādi mātṛ nirmala tā kramāt
syāt nairmalya snāyatām tatas
snānam ca devadevasya yat mūrti aṣṭakam ucyate
tatra evam nimajjanam
tatra iṣṭa mantra hṛdayaḥ go rajaḥ ntaḥ pada trayam
gatvā āgatya bhajet snānam pārthivam dhṛti dāyakam
jalaiḥ mūrdha ādi pāda antam kramāt ākṣālayet tatas
nimajjet sāṅga mūla ākhyam japan nā tad maya tvataḥ
utthāya aśeṣa sat jyotiḥ devatā garbham ambare
sūryam jalena mālinyā tarpayet viśva tarpakam
devān pitṝn munīn yakṣān rakṣāṃsi anyat ca bhautikam

original: AbhT_15.52a/. sarvaṃ saṃtarpayetprāṇo vīryātmā sa ca bhāskaraḥ /
analyzed: sarvam saṃtarpayet prāṇaḥ vīrya ātmā sa ca bhāskaraḥ
tatas japet parām ekām prāc ukta uccāra yogataḥ
tanmaya tva saṃvitteḥ jala snānam idam matam

original: AbhT_15.53b/. agnyutthaṃ bhasma śastreṇa japtvā malanivarhaṇam // 53

analyzed: ka vaktra hṛd guhya pade pañcāṅgaiḥ bhasma mantritam
bhasma muṣṭim sa aṅga mūla japtām mūrdhni kṣipet tatas
hasta pādau jalena eva prakṣālya ācamana ādikam

original: AbhT_15.55b/. tarpaṇaṃ japa ityevaṃ bhasmasnānaṃ hi taijasam // 55
analyzed: tarpaṇam japaḥ iti evam bhasma snānam hi taijasam
go rajovati anudrikte vāyau hlādini mantra vāc
gati āgati prayoge vā vāyavyam snānam ācaret
amale gagane vyāpini ekāgrībhūta dṛṣṭikaḥ

original: AbhT_15.57b/. smaranmantraṃ yadāsīta kānyā nirmalatā tataḥ // 57
analyzed: smaran mantram yadā āsīta kā anyā nirmala tā tatas

original: AbhT_15.58a/. yadi vā nirmalādvyomnaḥ patatā vāriṇā tanum /
analyzed: yadi vā nirmalāt vyomnaḥ patatā vāriṇā tanum
sparśayet mantra japa yuj nābhasam snānam īdṛśam
evam soma arka tejaḥsu śiva bhāvena bhāvanāt

original: AbhT_15.59b/. nimajjandhautamālinyaḥ kva vā yogyo na jāyate // 59
analyzed: nimajjan dhauta mālinyaḥ kva vā yogyaḥ na jāyate
ātmā eva parameśānaḥ nirācāra mahā hradaḥ

original: AbhT_15.60b/. viśvaṃ nimajjya tatraiva tiṣṭhecchuddhaśca śodhakaḥ // 60
analyzed: viśvam nimajjya tatra eva tiṣṭhet śuddhaḥ ca śodhakaḥ
iti snāna aṣṭakam śuddhau uttarottaram uttamam
sarvatra paścāt tam mantram ekībhūtam upāharet
ghṛti āpyāya mala ploṣa vīrya vyāpti mṛji sthitīḥ

original: AbhT_15.62b/. abhedaṃ ca kramādeti snānāṣṭakaparo muniḥ // 62
analyzed: abhedam ca kramāt eti snāna aṣṭaka paraḥ muniḥ
etāḥ hi anugraha ātmānaḥ mūrta yoṣṭau śiva ātmikāḥ
sva rūpa śiva rūpābhyām dhyānāt tad tad phala pradāḥ
anena vidhinā arcāyām kanda ādhāra ādi yojanām
kurvan vyāsa samāsābhyām dharā ādeḥ tad phalam bhajet

original: AbhT_15.65a/. tathāhi yogasaṃcāre mantrāḥ syurbhuvi pārthivāḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi yoga saṃcāre mantrāḥ syuḥ bhuvi pārthivāḥ

original: AbhT_15.65b/. āpye āpyā yāvadamī śive śivamayā iti // 65
analyzed: āpye āpyāḥ yāvat amī śive śiva mayāḥ iti
śrī nirmaryādaśāstre api tat ittham su nirūpitam
dharā ādeḥ ca viśeṣaḥ asti vīrasādhaka saṃmataḥ
śmaśāna araṇya gaganam candra arkau tad upāhitau
ātmā nirdhūta niḥśeṣa vikalpa ātaṅka susthitaḥ
snāna arcā ādau iti upāsyam vīrāṇām vigraha aṣṭakam
su svādunā prasannena tanunā su sugandhinā
kṛtvā nirīkṣaṇam prokṣya tāḍana āpyāya guṇṭhanam
mantra cakrasya tad madhye pūjām vipruṣ pratarpaṇam
tena ātma sekaḥ kalaśa mudrayā ca abhiṣecanam
devatā tarpaṇam deha prāṇa ubhaya patha āśritam
sarva tīrtha tapaḥ yajña dāna ādi phalam aśnute

original: AbhT_15.73b/. yataḥ śivamayaṃ madyaṃ sarve mantrāḥ śivodbhavāḥ // 73
analyzed: yatas śiva mayam madyam sarve mantrāḥ śiva udbhavāḥ
śiva śaktyoḥ na bhedaḥ asti śakti utthāḥ tu marīcayaḥ
tāsām ānanda janakam madyam śiva mayam tatas
prabuddhe saṃvidaḥ pūrṇe rūpedhi kṛti bhājanam
mantra dhyāna samādhāna bhedāt snānam tu yat na tat

original: AbhT_15.76a/. yuktaṃ snānaṃ yato nyāsakarmādau yogyatāvaham /
analyzed: yuktam snānam yatas nyāsa karma ādau yogya tā āvaham
asya snāna aṣṭakasya asti bāhya antara tayā dvitā
āntaram tat yathā ūrdhva indu dhārā amṛta pariplavaḥ

original: AbhT_15.77b/. yato randhrordhvagāḥ sārdhamaṅgulaṃ vyāpya saṃsthitāḥ // 77
analyzed: yatas randhra ūrdhva gāḥ sārdham aṅgulam vyāpya saṃsthitāḥ
eṣām ekatamam snānam kuryāt dvi tri ādi śopi vā
iti snāna vidhiḥ proktaḥ bhairaveṇa amalīkṛtau
snāna anantara kartavyam atha idam upadiśyate
bhāvam prasannam ālocya vrajet yāga gṛham tatas
parvata agra nadī tīra eka liṅga ādi yat ucyate
tat bāhyam iha tat siddhi viśeṣāya na muktaye
ābhyantaram naga agra ādi deha antar prāṇa yojanam
sādhakānām upāyaḥ syāt siddhaye na tu muktaye

original: AbhT_15.82b/. pīṭhasthānaṃ sadā yāgayogyaṃ śāstreṣu bhaṇyate // 82
analyzed: pīṭhasthānam sadā yāga yogyam śāstreṣu bhaṇyate
tat ca bāhya antarāt rūpāt bahis dehe ca su sphuṭam
tasya icchā pīṭham ādhāraḥ yatrastham sacarācaram
agryam tat kāmarūpam syāt bindu nāda dvayam tatas
nādapīṭham pūrṇagiriḥ dakṣiṇe vāmatas punar
pīṭham uḍḍayanam binduḥ mukhyam pīṭha trayam tu idam
jñeyam saṃkalpanā rūpam ardha pīṭham atas param

original: AbhT_15.86b/. śāktaṃ kuṇḍalinī vedakalaṃ ca tryupapīṭhakam // 86
analyzed: śāktam kuṇḍalinī vedakalam ca tri upapīṭhakam

original: AbhT_15.87a/. devīkoṭṭojjayinyau dve tathā kulagiriḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: devī koṭṭa ujjayinyau dve tathā kulagiriḥ paraḥ
navadhā kathitam pīṭham antar bāhya krameṇa tat
prayāgaḥ varaṇā paścāt aṭṭahāsaḥ jayantikā

original: AbhT_15.90a/. vārāṇasī ca kāliṅgaṃ kulūtā lāhulā tathā /
analyzed: vārāṇasī ca kāliṅgam kulūtā lāhulā tathā
upakṣetra aṣṭakam prāhuḥ hṛd padma agra dala aṣṭakam

original: AbhT_15.91a/. virajairuḍikā hālā elā pūḥ kṣīrikā purī /

analyzed: māyā ākhyā maru deśaḥ ca bāhya abhyantara rūpataḥ
hṛd padma dala sandhīnām upasaṃdohaka aṣṭa tā

original: AbhT_15.92b/. jālandharaṃ ca naipālaṃ kaśmīrā gargikā haraḥ // 92
analyzed: jālandharam ca naipālam kaśmīrāḥ gargikāḥ haraḥ
mleccha diś dvāra vṛttiḥ ca kurukṣetram ca kheṭakam
dvi patham dvaya saṃghaṭṭāt tri patham traya melakāt
catuṣpatham śaktimataḥ layāt tatra eva manvate
nāsā anta tālu randhra antam etat dehe vyavasthitam
bhrū madhya kaṇṭha hṛd saṃjñam madhyamam tat udāhṛtam
parvata agram nadī tīram eka liṅgam tat eva ca

original: AbhT_15.96b/. kiṃ vātibahunā sarvaṃ saṃvittau prāṇagaṃ tataḥ // 96
analyzed: kim vā ati bahunā sarvam saṃvittau prāṇa gam tatas
tatas deha sthitam tasmāt deha āyatana gaḥ bhavet
bāhye tu tādṛśa antar stha yoga mārga viśāradāḥ
devyaḥ svabhāvāt jāyante pīṭham tat vāhyam ucyate
yathā svabhāvataḥ mlecchāḥ adharma patha vartinaḥ

original: AbhT_15.99a/. tatra deśe niyatyetthaṃ jñānayogau sthitau kvacit /
analyzed: tatra deśe niyatyā ittham jñāna yogau sthitau kvacid
yathā ca a tat mayā upyeti pāpi tām taiḥ samāgamāt
tathā pīṭha sthitaḥ upyeti jñāna yoga ādi pātra tām

original: AbhT_15.100b/. mukhyatvena śarīre@ntaḥ prāṇe saṃvidi paśyataḥ // 100
analyzed: mukhya tvena prāṇe saṃvidi paśyataḥ
viśvam etat kim anyaiḥ syāt bahis bhramaṇa ḍambaraiḥ
iti evam antar bāhye ca tad tad cakra phala arthinām

original: AbhT_15.102a/. sthānabhedo vicitraśca sa śāstre saṃkhyayojjhitaḥ /
analyzed: sthāna bhedaḥ vicitraḥ ca sa śāstre saṃkhyayā ujjhitaḥ
surapatha catuṣpatha ākhya śmaśānam ekānta śūnya vṛkṣau ca
iti nirvacana guṇa sthiti upacāra dṛśā vibodhaḥ eva uktaḥ

original: AbhT_15.104a/. tadadhiṣṭhite ca cakre śārīre bahiratho bhavedyāgaḥ /
analyzed: tad adhiṣṭhite ca cakre śārīre bahis atho bhavet yāgaḥ

original: AbhT_15.104b/. muktaye tanna yāgasya sthānabhedaḥ prakalpyate // 104
analyzed: muktaye tat na yāgasya sthāna bhedaḥ prakalpyate

original: AbhT_15.105a/. deśopāyā na sā yasmātsā hi bhāvaprasādataḥ /
analyzed: deśa upāyā na sā yasmāt sā hi bhāva prasādataḥ
uktam ca śrī niśācāre siddhi sādhana kāṅkṣiṇām
sthānam mumukṣuṇā tyājyam sarpa kañcuka vat tu idam

original: AbhT_15.106b/. muktirna sthānajanitā yadā śrotrapathaṃ gatam // 106
analyzed: muktiḥ na sthāna janitā yadā śrotra patham gatam

original: AbhT_15.107a/. gurostattvaṃ tadā muktistaddārḍhyāya tu pūjanam /
analyzed: guroḥ tattvam tadā muktiḥ tad dārḍhyāya tu pūjanam

original: AbhT_15.107b/. yatra yatra hṛdambhojaṃ vikāsaṃ pratipadyate // 107
analyzed: yatra yatra hṛd ambhojam vikāsam pratipadyate
tatra eva dhāmni bāhya intaryāga śrīḥ pratitiṣṭhati
na anyatra gatyā mokṣaḥ usti saḥ jñāna granthi kartanāt
tat ca saṃvid vikāsena śrīmat vīrāvalī pade

original: AbhT_15.109b/. guravastu vimuktau vā siddhau vā vimalā matiḥ // 109
analyzed: guravaḥ tu vimuktau vā siddhau vā vimalā matiḥ
hetuḥ iti ubhayatra api yāgaukaḥ yat manoramam
niyati prāṇa tā yogāt sāmagrītaḥ tu yadi api
siddhayaḥ bhāva vaimalyam tathā api nikhila uttamam
vimalībhūta hṛdayaḥ yat tatra pratibimbayet

original: AbhT_15.112a/. sādhyaṃ tadasya dārḍhyena saphalatvāya kalpate /
analyzed: sādhyam tat asya dārḍhyena saphala tvāya kalpate

original: AbhT_15.112b/. uktaṃ śrīsāraśāstre ca nirvikalpo hi sidhyati // 112
analyzed: uktam śrī sāraśāstre ca nirvikalpaḥ hi sidhyati

original: AbhT_15.113a/. kliśyante savikalpāstu kalpokte@pi kṛte sati /
analyzed: kliśyante sa vikalpāḥ tu kalpa ukte pi kṛte sati

original: AbhT_15.113b/. tadākramya balaṃ mantrā ayamevodayaḥ sphuṭaḥ // 113
analyzed: tat ākramya balam mantrāḥ ayam eva udayaḥ sphuṭaḥ
ityādibhiḥ spanda vākyaiḥ etat eva nirūpitam
tasmāt siddhyai vimuktyai vā pūjā japa samādhiṣu

original: AbhT_15.115a/. tatsthānaṃ yatra viśrāntisundaraṃ hṛdayaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tat sthānam yatra viśrānti sundaram hṛdayam bhavet

original: AbhT_15.115b/. yāgaukaḥ prāpya śuddhātmā bahireva vyavasthitaḥ // 115
analyzed: yāgaukaḥ prāpya śuddha ātmā bahis eva vyavasthitaḥ
nyāsam sāmānyatas kuryāt bahis yāga prasiddhaye

original: AbhT_15.116b/. mātṛkāṃ mālinīṃ vātha dvitayaṃ vā kramākramāt // 116
analyzed: mātṛkām mālinīm vā atha dvitayam vā kramākramāt
sṛṣṭi apyaya dvayaiḥ kuryāt ekaikam saṃghaśas dviśas

original: AbhT_15.118a/. dvaye dvaye śikhājihve visargāntāstu ṣoḍaśa /
analyzed: dvaye dvaye śikhā jihve visarga antāḥ tu ṣoḍaśa
dakṣa anyayoḥ skandha bāhu kara aṅguli nakhe kacau
vargau ṭa tau kramāt kaṭyām ūrvā ādiṣu niyojayet

original: AbhT_15.119b/. pavargaṃ pārśvayoḥ pṛṣṭhe jaṭhare hṛdyatho nava // 119
analyzed: pavargam pārśvayoḥ pṛṣṭhe jaṭhare hṛdi atho nava  /
tvak rakta māṃsa sūtra asthi vasā śukra purogamān
iti eṣa mātṛkā nyāsaḥ mālinyāḥ tu nirūpyate

original: AbhT_15.121a/. na śikhā ṛ ṝ ḷ ḷḷ ca śiromālā tha mastakam /
analyzed: na śikhā ca śiromālā mastakam

original: AbhT_15.121b/. netrāṇi cordhve dho@nye ī ghrāṇaṃ mudre ṇu ṇū śrutī // 121
analyzed: netrāṇi ca ūrdhve ghrāṇam mudre ṇu ṇu śrutī
baka vargaiḥ vaktra danta jihvā giri kramāt
va bha yāḥ kaṇṭha dakṣa ādi skandhayoḥ bhujayoḥ ḍa ḍhau

original: AbhT_15.123a/. ṭho hastayorjhañau śākhā jraṭau śūlakapālake /
analyzed: ṭhaḥ hastayoḥ jhañau śākhā jraṭau śūla kapālake

original: AbhT_15.123b/. pa hṛcchalau stanau kṣīramā sa jīvo visargayuk // 123
