analyzed: prāṇaḥ ha varṇaḥ kathitaḥ ṣakṣau udara nābhi gau

original: AbhT_15.125a/. eaikārau tatparau tu jaṅghe caraṇagau daphau /
analyzed: e ai kārau tad parau tu jaṅghe caraṇa gau daphau

original: AbhT_15.125b/. ityeṣā mālinī devī śaktimatkṣobhitā yataḥ // 125
analyzed: iti eṣā mālinī devī śaktimat kṣobhitā yatas

original: AbhT_15.126a/. kṛtyāveśāttataḥ śāktī tanuḥ sā paramārthataḥ /
analyzed: kṛtyā āveśāt tatas śāktī tanuḥ sā paramārthataḥ
anyonyam bīja yonīnām kṣobhāt vaisargika udayāt

original: AbhT_15.127a/. kāṃ kāṃ siddhiṃ na vitaretkiṃ vā nyūnaṃ na pūrayet /
analyzed: kām kām siddhim na vitaret kim vā nyūnam na pūrayet
yoni bīja arṇa sāṃkaryam bahudhā yadi api sthitam

original: AbhT_15.128a/. tathāpi nādiphānto@yaṃ kramo mukhyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api kramaḥ mukhyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
phakāra ādi samuccārāt nakāra anta idhva maṇḍalam

original: AbhT_15.129a/. saṃhṛtya saṃvidyā pūrṇā sā śabdairvarṇyate katham /
analyzed: saṃhṛtya saṃvidyā pūrṇā sā śabdaiḥ varṇyate katham
atas śāstreṣu bahudhā kula puttalikā ādibhiḥ

original: AbhT_15.130a/. bhedairgītā hi mukhyeyaṃ nādiphānteti mālinī /
analyzed: bhedaiḥ gītā hi mukhyā iyam nādi pha antā iti mālinī
śabdarāśeḥ bhairavasya yā an ucchūna tayā antarī
sā mātā iva bhaviṣyat tvāt tena asau mātṛkā uditā
mālinī mālitā rudraiḥ dhārikā siddhi mokṣayoḥ
saṃhāra dāna ādāna ādi śakti yuktāḥ yatas ralau
eka tvena smaranti iti śaṃbhunā atho nirūcivān
śabdarāśiḥ mālinī ca śiva śakti ātmakam tu idam
eka ekatra api pūrṇa tvāt śiva śakti svabhāva tā

original: AbhT_15.134b/. tena bhraṣṭe vidhau vīrye svarūpe vānayā param // 134
analyzed: tena bhraṣṭe vidhau vīrye sva rūpe vā anayā param
mantrāḥ nyastāḥ punar nyāsāt pūryante tad phala pradāḥ
nyasyet śākta śarīra artham bhinnayoni tu mālinīm
viśeṣaṇam idam hetau hetvarthaḥ ca nirūpitaḥ
yathā iṣṭa phala siddhyai ca iti atra eva idam abhāṣata

original: AbhT_15.137b/. sāñjanā api ye mantrā gāruḍādyā na te param // 137
analyzed: sa añjanāḥ api ye mantrāḥ gāruḍa ādyāḥ na te param

original: AbhT_15.138a/. mālinyā pūritāḥ sidhdyai balādeva tu muktaye /
analyzed: mālinyā pūritāḥ sidhdyai balāt eva tu muktaye
tasmāt phala īpsuḥ api anya mantram nyasya atra mālinīm
nyasyet japtvā api ca japet ayatnāt apavṛktaye

original: AbhT_15.139b/. ityevaṃ mātṛkāṃ nyasyenmālinīṃ vā kramāddvayam // 139
analyzed: iti evam mātṛkām nyasyet mālinīm vā kramāt dvayam
siddhi mukti anusārāt vā varṇān vā yugapad dvayoḥ
akṣa hrīm napha hrīm etau piṇḍau saṃghau ihānayoḥ

original: AbhT_15.141a/. vācakau nyāsa etābhyāṃ kṛte nyāse@thavaikakaḥ /
analyzed: vācakau nyāse etābhyām kṛte
eṣa ca aṅga tanu brahma yuktaḥ vā tad viparyayaḥ
sāmudāyika vinyāse pṛthak piṇḍau imau kramāt
akramāt athavā nyasyet ekam eva atha yojayet

original: AbhT_15.143a/. kriyayā siddhikāmo yaḥ sa kriyāṃ bhūyasīṃ caret /
analyzed: kriyayā siddhi kāmaḥ yaḥ sa kriyām bhūyasīm caret

original: AbhT_15.143b/. anīpsurapi yastasmai bhūyase svaphalāya sā // 143
analyzed: an īpsuḥ api yaḥ tasmai bhūyase sva phalāya sā

original: AbhT_15.144a/. yastu dhyānajapābhyāsaiḥ siddhīpsuḥ sa kriyāṃ param /
analyzed: yaḥ tu dhyāna japa abhyāsaiḥ siddhi īpsuḥ sa kriyām param

original: AbhT_15.144b/. saṃskṛtyai svecchayā kuryāt prāṅnayenātha bhūyasīm // 144
analyzed: saṃskṛtyai sva icchayā kuryāt prāc nayena atha bhūyasīm

original: AbhT_15.145a/. mumukṣuratha tasmai vā yathābhīṣṭaṃ samācaret /
analyzed: mumukṣuḥ atha tasmai vā yathā abhīṣṭam samācaret
śiva tā āpattiḥ eva arthaḥ hi eṣām nyāsa ādi karmaṇām
evam nyāsam vidhāya arghapātre vidhim upācaret
ukta nītyā eva tat paścāt pūjayet nyasta vācakaiḥ
yatas samasta bhāvānām śivāt siddhi mayāt atho
pūrṇāt avyatireki tvam kārakāṇām iha arcayā
samastam kāraka vrātam śiva abhinnam pradarśitam
pūjā udāharaṇe sarvam vyaśnute gamana ādi api
yathā hi vāha kaṭaka bhrama svātantryam āgataḥ

original: AbhT_15.149b/. aśvaḥ saṃgrāmarūḍho@pi tāṃ śikṣāṃ nātivartate // 149
analyzed: aśvaḥ saṃgrāma rūḍhaḥ api tām śikṣām na ativartate
gacchan tiṣṭhan api dvaitam kārakāṇām vyapojjhati
tathā aikya abhyāsa niṣṭhasya akramāt viśvam idam haṭhāt
saṃpūrṇa śiva tā kṣobhana rīnartat iva sphuret

original: AbhT_15.152a/. uvāca pūjanastotre hyasmākaṃ paramo guruḥ /
analyzed: uvāca pūjana stotre hi asmākam paramaḥ guruḥ
aho svādu rasaḥ kaḥ api śiva pūjā maya utsavaḥ
ṣaṭtriṃśatā upi tattvānām kṣobhaḥ yatra ullasati alam
tat etādṛś pūrṇa śiva viśva āveśāya yā īrcanam

original: AbhT_15.154a/. kurvanti te śivā eva tānpūrṇānprati kiṃ phalam /
analyzed: kurvanti te śivāḥ eva tān pūrṇān prati kim phalam
vinā api jñāna yogābhyām kriyā nyāsa arcana ādikā
ittham aikya samāpatti dānāt para phala pradā
sādhakasya api tat sat vipra da mantra eka tām gatam

original: AbhT_15.156a/. viśvaṃ vrajadavighnatvaṃ svāṃ siddhiṃ śīghramāvahet /
AbhT_15.156b/. uktaṃ ca parameśena na vidhirnārcanakramaḥ // 156
analyzed: uktam ca parameśena na vidhiḥ na arcana kramaḥ
tat evam tanmayībhāva dāyinī arcā kriyā yatas
samasta kāraka aikātmyam tena asyāḥ paramam vapuḥ
yaṣṭṛ yājya tad ādhāra karaṇa ādāna saṃpradāḥ
nyāsa krameṇa śiva tā tādātmyam adhiśerate
arghapātram apādānam tasmāt ādīyate yatas
yat ca tad stham jala ādi etat karaṇam śodhana īrcane

original: AbhT_15.161a/. arghapātrāmbuvipruḍbhiḥ spṛṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ hi śudhyati /
analyzed: arghapātra ambu   spṛṣṭam sarvam hi śudhyati
śiva arka kara saṃsparśāt kā anyā śuddhiḥ bhaviṣyati
ūce śrī pūrvaśāstre tad arghapātra vidhau vibhuḥ
na ca asaṃśodhitam vastu kiṃcid api upakalpayet

original: AbhT_15.163a/. tena śuddhaṃ tu sarvaṃ yadaśuddhamapi tacchuci /
analyzed: tena śuddham tu sarvam yat aśuddham api tat śuci
aśuddha tā ca vijñeyā paśu tad śāsana āśayāt
sva tādavasthyāt pūrvasmāt athavā api upakalpitāt
tena yat yat iha āsannam saṃvidaḥ cit anugrahāt

original: AbhT_15.165a/. kiyato@pi tadatyantaṃ yogyaṃ yāge@tra jīvavat /
analyzed: kiyataḥ api tat atyantam yogyam jīva vat
anena naya yogena
saṃvidā iti tadā tatra yogya ayogya tvam ādiśet
vīrāṇām atas eva iha mithas sva pratimā amṛtam
tad tad yāga vidhau iṣṭam gurubhiḥ bhāvitātmabhiḥ

original: AbhT_15.167b/. unmajjayati nirmagnāṃ saṃvidaṃ yattu suṣṭhu tat // 167
analyzed: unmajjayati nirmagnām saṃvidam yat tu suṣṭhu tat
arcāyai yogyam ānandaḥ yasmāt unmagna tā citaḥ
tena a cit rūpa deha ādi prādhānya vinimajjakam
ānanda jananam pūjā yogyam hṛdaya hāri yat
atas kula krama uttīrṇa trika sāra mata ādiṣu
loka sthitim racayitum madya ādeḥ paśu śāsane

original: AbhT_15.171a/. proktā hyaśuddhistatraiva tasya kvāpi viśuddhatā /
analyzed: proktā hi aśuddhiḥ tatra eva tasya kvāpi viśuddha tā
pañcagavye pavitra tvam soma carṇana pātrayoḥ
vidhiḥ ca avabhṛthasnānam haste kṛṣṇa viṣāṇi tā

original: AbhT_15.172b/. na patnyā ca vinā yāgaḥ sarvadaivatatulyatā // 172
analyzed: na patnyā ca vinā yāgaḥ sarva daivata tulya tā
surā āhutiḥ brahma satre vapā antra hṛdaya āhutiḥ
pāśaveṣu api śāstreṣu tat adarśi maheśinā
ghora āndhya haimana niśā madhya ga acira dīpti vat

original: AbhT_15.174b/. bhakṣyo haṃso na bhakṣyo@sāviti ripratipattiṣu // 174
analyzed: bhakṣyaḥ haṃsaḥ na bhakṣya usau iti ri pratipattiṣu
smārtīṣu vijayati ekaḥ yaḥ śiva abheda śuddhikaḥ
ajña tva veda adarśi tva rāga dveṣa ādayaḥ hi amī
munīnām vacasi svasmin prāmāṇya unmūlana kṣamāḥ
vede api yat abhakṣyam tat bhakṣyam iti upadiśyate
na vidhi pratiṣedha ākhya dharmayoḥ ekam āspadam

original: AbhT_15.177b/. atha tatra na tadbhakṣyaṃ tadā tena tathā tataḥ // 177
analyzed: atha tatra na tat bhakṣyam tadā tena tathā tatas
evam viṣaya bhedāt no śiva ukteḥ bādhikā śrutiḥ
kvacid viṣaya tulya tvāt bādhya bādhaka tā yadi
tad bādhyā śrutiḥ evā iti prāk eva etat nirūpitam

original: AbhT_15.179b/. prakṛtaṃ brūmahe kṛtvā nyāsaṃ dehārghapātrayoḥ // 179
analyzed: prakṛtam brūmahe kṛtvā nyāsam deha arghapātrayoḥ
sāmānyam arghapātra ambhaḥ   prokṣya ca akhilam
yāga upakaraṇam paścāt bāhya yāgam samācaret

original: AbhT_15.181a/. prabhāmaṇḍalake khe vā suliptāyāṃ ca vā bhuvi /
analyzed: prabhā maṇḍalake khe vā su liptāyām ca vā bhuvi
triśūla arka vṛṣa andika sthāḥ mātaraḥ kṣetrapam yajet
yoginīḥ ca pṛthak mantraiḥ om namaḥ nāma yojitaiḥ
eka uccāreṇa vā bāhya parivāra iti śabditāḥ

original: AbhT_15.183a/. tāro nāma caturthyantaṃ namaścetyarcane manuḥ /
analyzed: tāraḥ nāma caturthī antam namaḥ ca iti arcane manuḥ

original: AbhT_15.183b/. evaṃ bahiḥ pūjayitvā dvāraṃ prokṣya prapūjayet // 183
analyzed: evam bahis pūjayitvā dvāram prokṣya prapūjayet

original: AbhT_15.184a/. triśiraḥśāsanādau ca sa dṛṣṭo vidhirucyate /
analyzed: triśiraḥśāsana ādau ca sa dṛṣṭaḥ vidhiḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_15.184b/. gaṇeśalakṣmyau dvārordhve dakṣe vāme tayoḥ punaḥ // 184
analyzed: gaṇeśa lakṣmyau dvāra ūrdhve dakṣe vāme tayoḥ punar
madhye vāgīśvarīm diṇḍi mahodara yugam tathā
kramāt sva dakṣa vāma stham tathā etena krameṇa ca
ekaikam pūjayet samyak nandi kālau tri mārga gām
kālindīm chāga meṣa āsyau sva dakṣāt dvāḥstha śākhayoḥ
adhas dehalī ananta īśa ādhāra śaktīḥ ca pūjayet
dvāra madhye sarasvatyāḥ mahā astram pūjayet amī
padma ādhāra gatāḥ sarve pi uditāḥ vighna nāśakāḥ
pūjane pūrvavat mantraḥ dīpaka dvaya kalpitaḥ
argha puṣpa samālambha dhūpa naivedya vandanaiḥ
pūjām kuryāt iha arghaḥ ca api uttama dravya yojitaḥ
eka uccāreṇa vā kuryāt dvāḥstha daivata pūjanam
rahasya pūjām ced kuryāt tad bāhya parivārakam
dvāḥsthān ca pūjayet antar deva agre kalpanā kramāt
kṣiptvā astra japtam kusumam jvalat veśmani
praviśya śiva raśmi iddha dṛśā veśma avalokayet
diśā ustreṇa ca badhnīyāt ācchādayet varmaṇā akhilāḥ
tatra uttara āśā abhimukhaḥ mumukṣuḥ tādṛśāya vā
viśet tathā hi aghora agniḥ pāśān pluṣyati bandhakān
yadi api asti na diś nāma kācid pūrva apara ādikā

original: AbhT_15.194b/. pratyayo hi na tasyāḥ syādekasyā anupāhiteḥ // 194
analyzed: pratyayaḥ hi na tasyāḥ syāt ekasyāḥ anupāhiteḥ

original: AbhT_15.195a/. upādhiḥ pūrvatādiṣṭa iti cettatkṛtaṃ diśā /
analyzed: upādhiḥ pūrvatā ādiṣṭaḥ iti ced tat kṛtam diśā

original: AbhT_15.195b/. upādhimātraṃ tu tathā vaicitryāya kathaṃ bhavet // 195
analyzed: upādhi mātram tu tathā vaicitryāya katham bhavet
tasmāt saṃvid prakāśaḥ yam mūrti ābhāsana bhāgataḥ

original: AbhT_15.197a/. tatra yadyatprakāśena sadā svīkaraṇe kṣamam /
analyzed: tatra yat yat prakāśena sadā svīkaraṇe kṣamam
tat eva ūrdhvam prakāśa ātma sparśa ayogyam adhas punar

original: AbhT_15.198a/. kiṃcitprakāśatā madhyaṃ tato vai diksamudbhavaḥ /
analyzed: kiṃcid prakāśa tā madhyam tatas vai diś samudbhavaḥ
kiṃcid prakāśa yogyasya saṃmukham prasarat puras
parāṅmukham tu tat paścāt iti diś dvayam āgatam
prakāśaḥ saṃmukham vastu gṛhītvā udrikta raśmikaḥ
yatra tiṣṭha uddakṣiṇam tad prakāśasya ānukūlyataḥ
dakṣiṇasya puras saṃstham vāmam iti upadiśyate
tad prakāśita meya indu sparśa saumyam tat eva hi
evam āśā catuṣke ismin madhya viśrānti yogataḥ
catuṣkam anyat tena aṣṭau diśaḥ tad tad adhiṣṭhitāḥ
evam prakāśa mātre asmin vara de parame śive

original: AbhT_15.203a/. digvibhāgaḥ sthito loke śāstre@pica tathocyate /
analyzed: diś vibhāgaḥ sthitaḥ loke śāstre pi ca tathā ucyate
kramāt sadāśiva adhīśaḥ pañca mantra tanuḥ yatas
īśan raghoḥ avāma ākhya sat yaḥ dhaḥ bhedataḥ diśaḥ

original: AbhT_15.204b/. īśa ūrdhvaṃ prakāśatvātpūrvaṃ vaktraṃ prasāri yat // 204
analyzed: īśaḥ ūrdhvam prakāśa tvāt pūrvam vaktram prasāri yat

original: AbhT_15.205a/. puruṣo dakṣiṇācaṇḍo vāmā vāmastu saumyakaḥ /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ dakṣiṇācaṇḍaḥ vāmā vāmaḥ tu saumyakaḥ
parāṅmukha tayā sadyas paścimā paribhāṣyate
pātāla vaktram adharam aprakāśa tayā sthiteḥ
kha marut vahni jala bhū khāni vaktrāṇi amuṣya hi
mukhya tvena kham eva ūrdhvam prakāśa mayam ucyate
tat eva mukhyatas dhastāt aprakāśam yatas sphuṭam

original: AbhT_15.208a/. madhye tu yatprakāśaṃ tanna prakāśyaṃ na cetarat /
analyzed: madhye tu yat prakāśam tat na prakāśyam na ca itarat
prakāśa tvāt diśyamānam atas smin diś catuṣṭayam
pañca mantra tanuḥ nāthaḥ ittham viśva diś īśvaraḥ

original: AbhT_15.209b/. tato@pīśastathā rudro viṣṇurbrahmā tathā sthitaḥ // 209
analyzed: tatas upa īśaḥ tathā rudraḥ viṣṇuḥ brahmā tathā sthitaḥ
ūrdhva abhivyakti ayogya tvāt viṣṇoḥ dhātuḥ ca pañcamam

original: AbhT_15.210b/. na vaktraṃ tau bhedamayau sṛṣṭisthitiprabhū yataḥ // 210
analyzed: na vaktram tau bheda mayau sṛṣṭi sthiti prabhū yatas
diś vibhāgaḥ tu vadanānām catuṣṭayāt
pañcamasya yuji tve tau parityakta nija ātmakau
tatas brahmāṇḍa madhye api jñānaśaktiḥ vibhoḥ raviḥ
diśām vibhāgam kurute prakāśa ghana vṛttimān

original: AbhT_15.213a/. tathāhi viṣuvadyoge yataḥ pūrvaṃ pradṛśyate /
analyzed: tathā hi viṣuvat yoge yatas pūrvam pradṛśyate
tad pūrva yatra tat chāyā tat paścimam udāhṛtam
tasmin jigamiṣoḥ asya yat savyam tat tu dakṣiṇam
tatra eṣa caṇḍa tejobhiḥ bhāti jājvalyamāna vat

original: AbhT_15.215a/. tatpurovarti vāmaṃ tu tadbhāsā khacitaṃ manāk /
analyzed: tad purovarti vāmam tu tad bhāsā khacitam manāk

original: AbhT_15.215b/. tata eva hi somyaṃ tannacāpi hyaprakāśakam // 215
analyzed: tatas eva hi somyam tat na ca api hi aprakāśakam
yatra asau astam abhyeti tat paścimam iti sthitiḥ
tatra eva paścime yeṣām prāc prakāśa avalokanam
tat eva pūrvam eteṣām yathā adhvani nirūpitam

original: AbhT_15.217b/. sā sā dikca tathā tasya phaladāpi viparyaye // 217
analyzed: sā sā diś ca tathā tasya phala dā api viparyaye
vicitre phala saṃpattiḥ prakāśa ādhīnikā yatas

original: AbhT_15.218b/. itthaṃ sūryāśrayā diksyātsā vicitrāpi tādṛśī // 218
analyzed: ittham sūrya āśrayā diś syāt sā vicitrā api tādṛśī
adhiṣṭhitāḥ maheśena citra tad rūpa dhāriṇā

original: AbhT_15.219b/. kiṃ vātibahunā yo@sau yaṣṭā tatsaṃmukhāditaḥ // 219
analyzed: kim vā ati bahunā yaḥ asau yaṣṭā tad saṃmukhāt itas
diśaḥ api pravibhajyante prāc savya uttara paścimāḥ

original: AbhT_15.220b/. svānusārakṛtaṃ taṃ ca digvibhāgaṃ sadā śivaḥ // 220
analyzed: sva anusāra kṛtam tam ca diś vibhāgam sadā śivaḥ
adhitiṣṭhati arkam iva sa vicitra vapuḥ yatas

original: AbhT_15.221b/. svotthā api diśaḥ sveśāḥ śakrādyā hyadhiśerate // 221
analyzed: sva utthāḥ api diśaḥ sva īśāḥ śakra ādyāḥ hi adhiśerate
te hi prakāśa śakti aṃśāḥ prakāśa anuvidhāyinaḥ

original: AbhT_15.222b/. prakāśasya yadaiśvaryaṃ sa indro yattu tanmahaḥ // 222
analyzed: prakāśasya yat aiśvaryam saḥ indraḥ yat tu tat mahaḥ
saḥ ugniḥ yantṛ tva bhīma tve yamaḥ rakṣaḥ tad ūnimā
prakāśyam varuṇaḥ tat ca cāñcalyāt vāyuḥ ucyate
bhāva sañcaya yogena vitteśaḥ tad kṣaye vibhuḥ
prakāśasya eva śakti aṃśāḥ lokapāḥ tena kīrtitāḥ
ittham svādhīna rūpā api diś saurī tu upadiśyate

original: AbhT_15.226a/. tatra sarvo hi niṣkampaṃ prakāśatvaṃ prapadyate /
analyzed: tatra sarvaḥ hi niṣkampam prakāśa tvam prapadyate
sarva gopī anilaḥ yadvat vyajanena upavījitaḥ
prabuddhaḥ svām kriyām kuryāt dharma nirṇodana ādikām

original: AbhT_15.227b/. tadvatsarvagatāḥ sarvā aindyādyāḥ śaktayaḥ sphuṭam // 227
analyzed: tadvat sarva gatāḥ sarvāḥ aindī ādyāḥ śaktayaḥ sphuṭam
sādhaka āśvāsa saṃbuddhāḥ tad tad sva iṣṭa phala pradāḥ
evam saurī diś īśāna brahma viṣṇu īśa sauśivaiḥ
adhiṣṭhitā samāśvāsa dārḍhyāt tad tad phala pradā

original: AbhT_15.229b/. sādhako yacca vā kṣetraṃ maṇḍalaṃ veśma vā bhajet // 229
analyzed: sādhakaḥ yat ca vā kṣetram maṇḍalam veśma vā bhajet
sthitaḥ tad anusāreṇa madhyībhavati śaṃkaraḥ

original: AbhT_15.230b/. sa hi sarvamadhiṣṭhātā mādhyasthyeneti tasya yaḥ // 230
analyzed: sa hi sarvam adhiṣṭhātā mādhyasthyena iti tasya yaḥ
sauraḥ prakāśaḥ tat pūrvam ittham syāt diś vyavasthitiḥ
tad madhya sthita nāthasya grahītum dakṣiṇam mahaḥ

original: AbhT_15.232a/. udaṅmukhaḥ syāt pāścātyaṃ grahītuṃ pūrvatomukhaḥ /
analyzed: udak mukhaḥ syāt pāścātyam grahītum pūrvatomukhaḥ
upaviśya nija sthāne deha śuddhim samācaret
aṅguṣṭha agrāt kāla vahni jvālā bhāsvaram utthitam
astram dhyātvā tad śikhābhiḥ bahis antar dahet tanum

original: AbhT_15.234a/. dāhaśca dhvaṃsa evokto dhvaṃsakaṃ mantrasaṃjñitam /
analyzed: dāhaḥ ca dhvaṃsaḥ eva uktaḥ dhvaṃsakam mantra saṃjñitam
tejaḥ tathā abhilāpa ākhya sva vikalpa

original: AbhT_15.235a/. tena mantrāgninā dāho dehe puryaṣṭake tathā /
analyzed: tena mantra agninā dāhaḥ dehe puryaṣṭake tathā
deha puryaṣṭakā hantā vidhvaṃsāt eva jāyate
nahi sadbhāva mātreṇa dehaḥ usau anya deha vat

original: AbhT_15.236b/. ahantāyāṃ hi dehatvaṃ sā dhvastā taddaheddhruvam // 236
analyzed: ahantāyām hi deha tvam sā dhvastā tat dahet dhruvam
tad deha saṃskāra bharaḥ bhasma tvena atha yaḥ sthitaḥ
tam varma vāyunā ādhūya tiṣṭhet śuddha cit ātmani
tasmin dhruve nistaraṅge samāpattim upāgataḥ
saṃvidaḥ sṛṣṭi dharmi tvāt ādyām eti taraṅgi tām
sā eva mūrtiḥ iti khyātā tāra sat bindu ha ātmikā
tatas nava ātma devena nyāsaḥ tattva udaya ātmakaḥ
aṅga vaktrāṇi tasya eva sva sthāneṣu niyojayet
atha mātṛkayā prāgvat tad tattva sphuṭa tā ātmakaḥ
tri tattva nyāsa tā ca asya pṛṣṭhe kakṣyā traya āgate
tatas ghora aṣṭaka nyāsaḥ śiraḥ tad caraṇa ātmakam
tatas api śiva sadbhāva nyāsaḥ sva aṃgasya saṃyutaḥ
kṛte pañcake ismin yat tat mukhya tayā bhavet

original: AbhT_15.243a/. upāsyamarcyaṃ tatsāṅgaṃ ṣaṣṭhe nyāse niyojayet /
analyzed: upāsyam arcyam tat sa aṅgam ṣaṣṭhe nyāse niyojayet
tena atra nyāsa yogyā asau bhagavān ratiśekharaḥ
ūrdhve nyāsyaḥ nava ākhyasya mukhya tve nyonya dhāma tā
evam bhairava sadbhāva nāthe mukhya tayā yadi
upāsya tā tad tad sthāna prāc nyāsyaḥ rati śekharaḥ

original: AbhT_15.245b/. itthaṃ śrīpūrvaśāstre me saṃpradāyaṃ nyarūpayat // 245
analyzed: ittham śrī pūrvaśāstre me saṃpradāyam nyarūpayat

original: AbhT_15.246a/. śaṃbhunātho nyāsavidhau devo hi kathamanyathā /
analyzed: śaṃbhunā atho nyāsa vidhau devaḥ hi katham anyathā
nyāsa vivarjyate amuṣmin aṅgāni api asya santi hi
mūrtiḥ sṛṣṭiḥ tri tattvam ca iti aṣṭau mūrti aṅga saṃyutāḥ

original: AbhT_15.247b/. śivaḥ sāṅgaśca vijñeyo nyāsaḥ ṣoḍhā prakīrtitaḥ // 247
analyzed: śivaḥ sa aṅgaḥ ca vijñeyaḥ nyāsaḥ ṣoḍhā prakīrtitaḥ

original: AbhT_15.248a/. asyopari tataḥ śāktaṃ nyāsaṃ kuryācca ṣaḍvidham /
analyzed: asya upari tatas śāktam nyāsam kuryāt ca ṣaḍvidham

original: AbhT_15.248b/. parāparāṃ savaktrāṃ prāktataḥ prāgiti mālinīm // 248
analyzed: parāparām sa vaktrām prāk tatas prāk iti mālinīm
tatas ka vaktra kaṇṭheṣu hṛd nābhī guhya ūroḥ
tatas tu āvāhayet śaktim mātṛsadbhāva rūpiṇīm

original: AbhT_15.251a/. yogeśvarīṃ parāṃ pūrṇāṃ kālasaṃkarṣiṇīṃ dhruvām /
analyzed: yogeśvarīm parām pūrṇām kāla saṃkarṣiṇīm dhruvām
aṅga vaktra parīvāra śakti dvādaśaka adhikām
sādhya anuṣṭhāna bhedena nyāsa kāle smaret guruḥ
parā eva devī tritaya madhye yā a bhedinī sthitā
sā anavaccheda cit mātra sadbhāvā iyam prakīrtitā

original: AbhT_15.253b/. sāraśāstre yāmale ca devyāstena prakīrtitaḥ // 253
analyzed: sāra śāstre yāmale ca devyāḥ tena prakīrtitaḥ
mūrtiḥ sa vaktrā śaktiḥ ca śakti trayam atha aṣṭakam

original: AbhT_15.254b/. pañcāṅgāni parā śaktirnyāsaḥ śākto@pi ṣaḍvidhaḥ // 254
analyzed: pañcāṅgāni parā śaktiḥ nyāsaḥ śāktaḥ api ṣaḍvidhaḥ

original: AbhT_15.255b/. muktyekārthī punaḥ pūrvaṃ śāktaṃ nyāsaṃ samācaret // 255
analyzed: mukti eka arthī punar pūrvam śāktam nyāsam samācaret
guravaḥ tu āhuḥ ittham yat nyāsa dvayam udāhṛtam

original: AbhT_15.256b/. mumukṣuṇā tu pādādi tatkāryaṃ saṃhṛtikramāt // 256
analyzed: mumukṣuṇā tu pāda ādi tat kāryam saṃhṛti kramāt
yāvantaḥ kīrtitāḥ bhedāḥ śaṃbhu śakti aṇu vācakāḥ

original: AbhT_15.257b/. tāvatsvapyeṣu mantreṣu nyāsaḥ ṣoḍhaiva kīrtitaḥ // 257
analyzed: tāvatsu api eṣu mantreṣu nyāsaḥ ṣoḍhā eva kīrtitaḥ

original: AbhT_15.258a/. kiṃtvāvāhyastu yo mantraḥ sa tatrāṅgasamanvitaḥ /
analyzed: kiṃtu āvāhyaḥ tu yaḥ mantraḥ sa tatra aṅga samanvitaḥ
ṣaṣṭhaḥ syāt iti sarvatra ṣoḍhā eva ayam udāhṛtaḥ
mudrā pradarśanam paścāt kāyena manasā girā
ṣaṣ kāraṇa ṣaṣ ātma tvāt ṣaṭtriṃśat tattva yojanam

original: AbhT_15.260b/. evaṃ ṣoḍhāmahānyāse kṛte viśvamidaṃ haṭhāt // 260
analyzed: evam ṣoḍhā mahānyāse kṛte viśvam idam haṭhāt

original: AbhT_15.261a/. dehe tādātmyamāpannaṃ śuddhāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ prakāśayet /
analyzed: dehe tādātmyam āpannam śuddhām sṛṣṭim prakāśayet

original: AbhT_15.261b/. mūrtinyāsātsamārabhya yā sṛṣṭiḥ prasṛtātra sā // 261
analyzed: mūrti nyāsāt samārabhya yā sṛṣṭiḥ prasṛtā atra sā
abhedam ānīya kṛtā śuddhā nyāsa bala kramāt
tena pāśa dāha vidhūnane

original: AbhT_15.263a/. kṛte śānte śive rūḍhaḥ punaḥ kimavarohati /
analyzed: kṛte śānte śive rūḍhaḥ punar kim avarohati

original: AbhT_15.263b/. iti te dūrato dhvastāḥ paramārthaṃ hi śāṃbhavam // 263
analyzed: iti te dūratas dhvastāḥ parama artham hi śāṃbhavam
na sva saṃvitti sphurat tā sāra varjitāḥ

original: AbhT_15.264b/. na khalveṣa śivaḥ śānto nāma kaścidvibhedavān // 264
analyzed: na khalu eṣa śivaḥ śāntaḥ nāma kaścid vibhedavān
sarva itara adhva vyāvṛttaḥ ghaṭa tulyaḥ asti kutracid
mahā prakāśa rūpā hi yā iyam saṃvid vijṛmbhate
sa śivaḥ śiva tā eva asya vaiśvarūpya avabhāsi tā
tathā ābhāsana yoga utas sva rasena asya jṛmbhate

original: AbhT_15.267a/. bhāsyamāno@tra cābhedaḥ svātmano bheda eva ca /
analyzed: bhāsyamānaḥ utra ca abhedaḥ sva ātmanaḥ bhedaḥ eva ca
bhede vijṛmbhite māyā māyā mātuḥ vijṛmbhate
abhede māyā mātuḥ śiva ātma tā

original: AbhT_15.269a/. śiva eva tadabhyāsaphalaṃ nyāsādi kīrtitam /
analyzed: śivaḥ eva tad abhyāsa phalam nyāsa ādi kīrtitam
yathā hi duṣṭa karmā asmi iti evam bhāvayataḥ tathā
tathā śivaḥ ham na anyaḥ asmi iti evam bhāvayataḥ tathā
etat eva ucyate dārḍhyam vimarśa hṛdayaṅgamam
anyathā tasya śuddhasya vimarśa prāṇa vartinaḥ
katham nāma avimṛṣṭam syāt rūpam bhāsana dharmaṇaḥ
tena ati durghaṭa ghaṭa asvatantra icchā vaśāt ayam

original: AbhT_15.273a/. bhānapi prāṇabuddhyādiḥ svaṃ tathā na vikalpayet /
analyzed: prāṇa buddhi ādiḥ svam tathā na vikalpayet
pratyuta ati svatantra ātma viparīta svadharma tām
vināśya anīśa āyattatva rūpām niścitya majjati
tatas saṃsāra bhāgīya tathā niścaya śātinīm
śrayet
ye tu tīvra tama udrikta śakti nirmala tā juṣaḥ
na te dīkṣām anunyāsa kāriṇaḥ ca iti varṇitam

original: AbhT_15.276b/. evaṃ viśvaśarīraḥ sanviśvātmatvaṃ gataḥ sphuṭam // 276
analyzed: evam viśva śarīraḥ san viśva ātma tvam gataḥ sphuṭam
nyāsa mātrāt tathābhūtam deham puṣpa ādinā arcayet
pṛthak mantraiḥ vistareṇa saṃkṣepāt mūlamantrataḥ
dhūpa naivedya tṛpti ādyaiḥ tathā vyāsa samāsataḥ
saṃsāra vāma ācāra tvāt sarvam vāma kareṇa tu
kuryāt tarpaṇa yogam ca daiśikaḥ tat anāmayā
vāma śabdena guhyam śrī mataṅga ādau apīritam

original: AbhT_15.280a/. vāmācāraparo mantrī yāgaṃ kuryāditi sphuṭam /
analyzed: vāma ācāra paraḥ mantrī yāgam kuryāt iti sphuṭam
śrīmat bhargaśikhāśāstre tathā śrī gamaśāsane
sarva tīrtheṣu yat puṇyam sarva yajñeṣu yat phalam
tat phalam koṭi guṇitam anāmā tarpaṇāt priye
śrīmat nandiśikhāyām ca śrīmat ānandaśāsane

original: AbhT_15.282b/. taduktaṃ srukca pūrṇāyāṃ sruvaśvājyāhutau bhavet // 282
analyzed: tat uktam sruc ca pūrṇāyām sruva śva ājya āhutau bhavet
śeṣam vāma kareṇa eva pūjā homa japa ādikam
evam ānanda saṃpūrṇam sarva aunmukhya vivarjitam

original: AbhT_15.284a/. yāgena dehaṃ miṣpādya bhāvayeta śivātmakam /
analyzed: yāgena deham bhāvayeta śiva ātmakam
galite viṣaya aunmukhye pārimitye vilāpite
dehe kim avaśiṣyeta śiva ānanda rasāt ṛte
deham divāniśam paśyan arcayan syāt śiva ātmakaḥ
bāhyam liṅga vrata kṣetra caryā ādi nahi vāñchati

original: AbhT_15.288a/. uttarā bāhyayāgāntāḥ sādhyā tvatra śivātmatā /
analyzed: uttarā bāhya yāga antāḥ sādhyā tu atra śiva ātma tā
tatas ṛghapātram kartavyam śiva abheda mayam param

original: AbhT_15.289b/. yathaiva dehe dāhādipūjāntaṃ tadvadeva hi // 289
analyzed: yathā eva dehe dāha ādi pūjā antam tadvat eva hi
arghapātre pi kartavyam samāsa vyāsa yogataḥ

original: AbhT_15.290b/. kāni dravyāṇi yāgāya ko nvargha iti noditam // 290
analyzed: kāni dravyāṇi yāgāya kaḥ nu arghaḥ iti na uditam

original: AbhT_15.291a/. siddhikāmasya tatsiddhau sādhanaiva hi kāraṇam /
analyzed: siddhi kāmasya tad siddhau sādhanā eva hi kāraṇam

original: AbhT_15.291b/. muktikāmasya no kiṃcinniṣiddhaṃ vihitaṃ ca no // 291
analyzed: mukti kāmasya no kiṃcid niṣiddham vihitam ca no
yat eva hṛdyam tat yogyam śiva saṃvid abhedane
kṛtvā arghapātram tat vipruṣ prokṣitam kusuma ādikam

original: AbhT_15.293a/. kṛtvā ca tena svātmānaṃ pūjayetparamaṃ śivam /
analyzed: kṛtvā ca tena sva ātmānam pūjayet paramam śivam
arghapātra arcana datta puṣpa saṃkīrṇa tā bhayāt
na arghapātra itra kusumam kuryāt deva arcana kṛte
arghapātre tat amṛtībhūtam ambu eva pūjitam

original: AbhT_15.295a/. mantrāṇāṃ tṛptaye yāgadravyaśuddhyai ca kevalam /
analyzed: mantrāṇām tṛptaye yāga dravya śuddhyai ca kevalam
evam deham pūjayitvā prāṇa dhī śūnya vigrahān
anyonya tanmayībhūtān pūjayet śiva tādṛśe

original: AbhT_15.296b/. tatra prāṇāśraye nayāse buddhyā viracite sati // 296
analyzed: tatra prāṇa āśraye buddhyā viracite sati
śūnya adhiṣṭhānataḥ sarvam eka yatnena pūjyate
nyasyet ādhāra śaktim tu nābhi adhas catur aṅgulām
dharām sura udam tejaḥ ca meya pāra pratiṣṭhiteḥ
pratyekam aṅgulam nyasyet catuṣkam vyoma garbhakam
īṣat samantāt amalam idam āmalasārakam
tatas daṇḍam ananta ākhyam kalpayet lambikā avadhi
tanmātra ādi kalā antam tad ūrdhve granthiḥ niśā ātmakaḥ
tatra māyā maye granthau dharma adharma ādyam aṣṭakam

original: AbhT_15.301b/. vahniprāgādi māyā hi tatsūtirvibhavastu dhīḥ // 301
analyzed: vahni prāc ādi māyā hi tad sūtiḥ vibhavaḥ tu dhīḥ
māyā grantheḥ ūrdhva bhūmau triśūla adhas catuṣkikām
śuddhavidyā ātmikām dhyāyet chadana dvaya saṃyutām

original: AbhT_15.303a/. tacca tattvaṃ sthitaṃ bhāvyaṃ lambikābrahmarandhrayoḥ /
analyzed: tat ca tattvam sthitam bhāvyam lambikā brahmarandhrayoḥ
prakāśa yogaḥ hi atra evam dṛś śrotra rasana ādikaḥ
vidyāpadmā itra tat ca uktam api prāk darśyate punar

original: AbhT_15.305a/. vāmā jyeṣṭhā raudrī kālī kalabalavikarike balamathanī /
analyzed: vāmā jyeṣṭhā raudrī kālī kalabalavikarike balamathanī

original: AbhT_15.305b/. bhūtadamanī ca manonmanikā śāntā śakracāparuciratra syāt // 305
analyzed: bhūtadamanī ca manonmanikā śāntā śakracāparuciḥ atra syāt

original: AbhT_15.306a/. vibhvī jñaptikṛtīcchā vāgīśī jvālinī tathā vāmā /

analyzed: jyeṣṭhā raudrī iti etāḥ prāk dalataḥ kāladahana vat sarvāḥ
nija adhipaiḥ brahma viṣṇu haraiḥ ca adhiṣṭhitam smaret

original: AbhT_15.308a/. māyottīrṇaṃ hi yadrūpaṃ brahmādīnāṃ puroditam /
analyzed: māyā uttīrṇam hi yat rūpam brahma ādīnām purā uditam
āsanam tu etat eva syāt na tu māyā añjana añjitam

original: AbhT_15.309a/. rudrordhve ceśvaraṃ devaṃ tadūrdhve ca sadāśivam /
analyzed: rudra ūrdhve ca īśvaram devam tad ūrdhve ca sadāśivam

original: AbhT_15.309b/. nyasyetsa ca mahāpreta iti śāstreṣu bhaṇyate // 309
analyzed: nyasyet sa ca mahāpretaḥ iti śāstreṣu bhaṇyate
samasta tattva vyāptṛ tvāt mahāpretaḥ prabodhataḥ
prakarṣa gamanāt ca eṣa līnaḥ yat na adharam vrajet
vidyā avidyā īśinaḥ sarve hi uttarottara tām gatāḥ
sadāśivībhūya tatas param śivam upāśritāḥ
atas sadāśivaḥ nityam ūrdhva dṛś bhāsvara ātmakaḥ
kṛśaḥ meya tva daurbalyāt preta uṭṭahasana āditaḥ
tasya na abhyutthitam mūrdha randhra traya vinirgatam
paṅkajānām sitam saptatriṃśat ātmā idam āsanam

original: AbhT_15.315a/. atra sarvāṇi tattvāni bhedaprāṇāni yattataḥ /
analyzed: atra sarvāṇi tattvāni bheda prāṇāni yat tatas

original: AbhT_15.315b/. āsanatvena bhinnaṃ hi saṃvido viṣayaḥ smṛtaḥ // 315
analyzed: āsana tvena bhinnam hi saṃvidaḥ viṣayaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_15.316a/. etānyeva tu tattvāni līnāni parabhairave /
analyzed: etāni eva tu tattvāni līnāni para bhairave
tādātmyena atha sṛṣṭāni bhidā iva arcya tva yojane

original: AbhT_15.317b/. etānyeva tu tattvāni pūjakatvaṃ prayāntyalam // 317
analyzed: etāni eva tu tattvāni pūjaka tvam prayānti alam

original: AbhT_15.318a/. pūjakaḥ paratattvātmā pūjyaṃ tattvaṃ parāparam /

analyzed: sṛṣṭa tvāt aparam tattva jālam āsana tā āspadam
unmanā antam iha ākhyātam iti etat parama āsanam
arcayitvā āsanam pūjyā guru paṅktiḥ tu bhāvi vat

original: AbhT_15.321a/. tatrāsane purā mūrtibhūtāṃ sārdhākṣarāṃ dvayīm /
analyzed: tatra āsane purā mūrti bhūtām sārdha akṣarām dvayīm
nyasyet vyāptṛ tayā iti uktam siddhayogīśvarīmate

original: AbhT_15.322a/. sadāśivaṃ mahāpretaṃ mūrtiṃ sārdhākṣarāṃ yajet /
analyzed: yajet
para tvena parām ūrdhve gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ tu iti
vidyā mūrtim atha ātma ākhyām dvitīyām parikalpayet
nava ātmānam vāmatas tat devī vat bhairava trayam

original: AbhT_15.324b/. madhye parāṃ pūrṇacandrapratimāṃ dakṣiṇe punaḥ // 324
analyzed: madhye parām pūrṇa candra pratimām dakṣiṇe punar

original: AbhT_15.325a/. parāparāṃ raktavarṇāṃ kiṃcidagrāṃ na bhīṣaṇām /
analyzed: para aparām rakta varṇām kiṃcid agrām na bhīṣaṇām

original: AbhT_15.325b/. aparāṃ vāmaśṛṅge tu bhīṣaṇāṃ kṛṣṇapiṅgalām // 325
analyzed: aparām vāma śṛṅge tu bhīṣaṇām kṛṣṇa piṅgalām

original: AbhT_15.326a/. prāgvaddvidhātra ṣoḍhaiva nyāso dehe yathā kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: prāgvat dvidhā atra ṣoḍhā eva nyāsaḥ dehe yathā kṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_15.326b/. tataḥ sāṃkalpikaṃ yuktaṃ vapurāsāṃ vicintayet // 326
analyzed: tatas sāṃkalpikam yuktam vapuḥ āsām vicintayet
kṛtya bheda anusāreṇa dvi catur ṣaṣ bhuja ādikam
vāma dakṣiṇa saṃsthāna citra tvāt parikalpayet

original: AbhT_15.328b/. vastuto viśvarūpāstā devyo bodhātmikā yataḥ // 328
analyzed: vastutas viśva rūpāḥ tāḥ devyaḥ bodha ātmikāḥ yatas
anavacchinna cit mātra sārāḥ syuḥ apavṛktaye
sarvam tatas ūṅga vaktra ādi lokapāla astra paścimam

original: AbhT_15.330a/. madhye devyabhidhā pūjyā trayaṃ bhavati pūjitam /
analyzed: madhye devī abhidhā pūjyā trayam bhavati pūjitam
tatas madhya gatāt tasmāt bodha rāśeḥ sa daivatāt

original: AbhT_15.331a/. aṅgādi niḥsṛtaṃ pūjyaṃ visphuliṅgātmakaṃ pṛthak /
analyzed: aṅga ādi niḥsṛtam pūjyam visphuliṅga ātmakam pṛthak

original: AbhT_15.331b/. madhyagā kila yā devī saiva sadbhāvarūpiṇī // 331
analyzed: madhya gā kila yā devī sā eva sadbhāva rūpiṇī

original: AbhT_15.332a/. kālasaṃkarṣiṇī ghorā śāntā miśrā ca sarvataḥ /
analyzed: kālasaṃkarṣiṇī ghorā śāntā miśrā ca sarvatas

original: AbhT_15.332b/. siddhātantre ca saikārṇā parā devīti kīrtitā // 332
analyzed: siddhātantre ca sā ekārṇā parā devī iti kīrtitā

original: AbhT_15.333a/. parā tu mātṛkā devī mālinī madhyagoditā /
analyzed: parā tu mātṛkā devī mālinī madhya gā uditā
madhye nyasyet sūrya rucim sarva akṣara mayīm parām

original: AbhT_15.334a/. tasyāḥ śikhāgre tvaikārṇāṃ tasyāścāṅgādikaṃ tviti /
analyzed: tasyāḥ śikhā agre tu aika arṇām tasyāḥ ca aṅga ādikam tu iti

original: AbhT_15.334b/. tato viśvaṃ viniṣkrāntaṃ pūjitaṃ dakṣiṇottare // 334
analyzed: tatas viśvam viniṣkrāntam pūjitam dakṣiṇa uttare

original: AbhT_15.335a/. syādeva pūjitaṃ tena sakṛnmadhye prapūjayet /
analyzed: syāt eva pūjitam tena sakṛt madhye prapūjayet
śrī devyāyāmale ca uktam yāge ḍāmara saṃjñite

original: AbhT_15.336a/. nāsāgre trividhaṃ kālaṃ kālasaṃkarṣiṇī sadā /
analyzed: nāsā agre trividham kālam kāla saṃkarṣiṇī sadā
mukha sthā śvāsa niḥśvāsa kalanī hṛdi karṣati

original: AbhT_15.337a/. pūrakaiḥ kumbhakairdhatte grasate recakena tu /
analyzed: pūrakaiḥ kumbhakaiḥ dhatte grasate recakena tu

original: AbhT_15.337b/. kālaṃ saṃgrasate sarvaṃ recakenotthitā kṣaṇāt // 337
analyzed: kālam saṃgrasate sarvam recakena utthitā kṣaṇāt
yājyā karṣati yat sarvam kāla ādhāra prabhañjanam

original: AbhT_15.339a/. iha kila dṛkkarmecchāḥ śiva uktāstāstu vedyakhaṇḍanake /
analyzed: iha kila dṛkkarma icchāḥ śive uktāḥ tāḥ tu vedya khaṇḍanake

original: AbhT_15.339b/. sthūle sūkṣme kramaśaḥ sakalapralayākalau bhavataḥ // 339
analyzed: sthūle sūkṣme kramaśas sakala pralaya akalau bhavataḥ

original: AbhT_15.340a/. śuddhā eva tu suptā jñānākalatāṃ gatāḥ prabuddhāstu /
analyzed: śuddhāḥ eva tu suptāḥ jñāna akala tām gatāḥ prabuddhāḥ tu
pravibhinna katipaya ātmaka vedya vidaḥ mantraḥ ucyante
bhinne tu akhile vedye mantreśāḥ tad maheśāḥ tu
bhinna abhinne tat iyān suśiva antaḥ dhvā uditaḥ prete

original: AbhT_15.342a/. tā eva galati bhedaprasare kramaśo vikāsamāyāntyaḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ eva galati bheda prasare kramaśas vikāsam āyāntyaḥ
anyonya asaṃkīrṇāḥ tvarā trayam galita bhedikāḥ tu tatas
tāḥ eva anyonya ātmaka bheda avacchedana ajihāsu tayā
kila śakti tadvat ādi prabhidā pūjya tvam āyātāḥ

original: AbhT_15.344b/. bhedagalanādyakoṭerārabhya yato nijaṃ nijaṃ rūpam // 344
analyzed: bheda galana ādya koṭeḥ ārabhya yatas nijam nijam rūpam

original: AbhT_15.345a/. bibhrati tāstu tritvaṃ tāsāṃ sphuṭameva lakṣyeta /
analyzed: bibhrati tāḥ tu tritvam tāsām sphuṭam eva lakṣyeta
saṃbhāvya vedya kāluṣya yogataḥ nyonya labdha saṃkarataḥ

original: AbhT_15.346a/. prāk prasphuṭaṃ tribhāvaṃ nāgacchannatra tu tathā na /
analyzed: prāk prasphuṭam tri bhāvam na agacchan atra tu tathā na

original: AbhT_15.347a/. saiva ca bhūyaḥ svasmātsaṃkarṣati kālamiha bahiṣkurute /
analyzed: sā eva ca bhūyas svasmāt saṃkarṣati kālam iha bahiṣkurute
saṃkarṣiṇī iti kathitā mātṛṣu eteṣu sadbhāvaḥ

original: AbhT_15.348a/. tattvaṃ sattā prāptirmātṛṣu meyo@nayā saṃśca /
analyzed: tattvam sattā prāptiḥ mātṛṣu meyā unayā san ca

original: AbhT_15.348b/. viśvajananīṣu śaktiṣu paramārtho hi svatantratāmātram // 348
analyzed: viśva jananīṣu śaktiṣu paramārthaḥ hi svatantra tā mātram
eṣaṇa vidi kriyā ātmakam etat pūjyam yatas navacchinnam
yasmin sarva avaccheda diśaḥ api syuḥ samākṣiptāḥ

original: AbhT_15.350a/. avikalpamiha na yāti hi pūjyatvaṃ naca vikalpa ekatra /
analyzed: avikalpam iha na yāti hi pūjya tvam na ca vikalpaḥ ekatra

original: AbhT_15.350b/. bahavo dharmāstasmād yo dharmastāvato dharmān // 350
analyzed: bahavaḥ dharmāḥ tasmāt yaḥ dharmaḥ tāvataḥ dharmān
ākṣipati tatra rūḍhaḥ sarva utkṛṣṭa ūdhara sthitāḥ tu anye
iti bhairava para pūjā tattvam śrī ḍāmare mahāyāge
svayam eva su prasannaḥ śrīmān śaṃbhuḥ mama adikṣat

original: AbhT_15.352b/. bāhyayāge tu padmānāṃ tritaye@pi prapūjayet // 352
analyzed: bāhyayāge tu padmānām prapūjayet
astra antam parivāra ogham iti naḥ daiśika āgamaḥ
śakti aṅgāni śiva aṅgāni tathā eva atra punar dvaye
astram nyasyet caturdikkam madhye locana saṃjñakam
patra aṣṭaka iṣṭaka yugam aghora ādeḥ sva yāmalam

original: AbhT_15.355b/. tathā dvādaśakaṃ ṣaṭkaṃ catuṣkaṃ miśritaṃ dviśaḥ // 355
analyzed: tathā dvādaśakam ṣaṭkam catuṣkam miśritam dviśas
sarvaśas dviguṇa ādi ittham āvṛti tvena pūjayet
lokapālān tatas sa astrān sva dikṣu daśasu kramāt
ittham triśūla paryanta devī tādātmya vṛttitaḥ
tiṣṭhan atra arpayan viśvam tarpayet devatā gaṇam

original: AbhT_15.358a/. tato japaṃ prakurvīta pratimantraṃ dvipañcadhā /
analyzed: tatas japam prakurvīta pratimantram dvi pañcadhā
ekaikasya tri ātmaka tvāt abhedāt ca api sarvaśas
nābhi hṛd kaṇṭha tālu ūrdhva kuṇḍe jvalana vat smaran
mantra cakram tatra viśvam jvahvan saṃpādayet dhutim

original: AbhT_15.360a/. dīkṣākarmaṇi kartavye dīkṣāṃ yenādhvanā guruḥ /
analyzed: dīkṣā karmaṇi kartavye dīkṣām yena adhvanā guruḥ
cikīrṣuḥ dehe eva ādau bhūyas tam mukhya tā ūrpayet

original: AbhT_15.361a/. dvādaśāntamidaṃ prāgraṃ triśūlaṃ mūlataḥ smaran /
analyzed: dvādaśāntam idam prāgram triśūlam mūlataḥ smaran
amuṣmāt śāmbhavāt śūlāt hrāsayet catur aṅgulam
śākte tatas upi āṇave tat triśūla tritayam sthitam

original: AbhT_15.364b/. kiṃ kiṃ na jāyate kiṃ vā na vetti na karoti vā // 364
analyzed: kim kim na jāyate kim vā na vetti na karoti vā

original: AbhT_15.365a/. ekaikāmathavā devīṃ mantraṃ vā padmagaṃ yajet /
analyzed: ekaikām athavā devīm mantram vā padma gam yajet
ittham prāṇāt vyoma pada paryantam cetanam nijam
śivībhāvya arcanā yogāt tatas bāhyam vidhim caret
bahis yāgasya mukhya tve siddhi ādi parikalpite
antaryāgaḥ saṃskriyāyai hi anyathā arcayitā paśuḥ

original: AbhT_15.368a/. yastu siddhyādivimukhaḥ sa bahiryajati prabhum /
analyzed: yaḥ tu siddhi ādi vimukhaḥ sa bahis yajati prabhum
antar mahā yāga rūḍhyai tayā eva asau kṛtārthakaḥ
kṛtvā antaryāgam ādāya dhānya ādi astreṇa mantritam

original: AbhT_15.369b/. dikṣu kṣipedvighnanude saṃhṛtyaiśīṃ diśaṃ nayet // 369
analyzed: dikṣu kṣipet vighna   saṃhṛtya aiśīm diśam nayet

original: AbhT_15.370a/. nirīkṣaṇaṃ prokṣaṇaṃ ca tāḍanāpyāyane tathā /
analyzed: nirīkṣaṇam prokṣaṇam ca tāḍana āpyāyane tathā
viguṇṭhanam ca saṃskārāḥ sa ādhārāḥ triśiromate
go mūtra gomaya dadhi kṣīra ājyam mantrayet mukhaiḥ
ūrdhva antaiḥ aṅga ṣaṭkena kuśa ambu etena ca ukṣayet

original: AbhT_15.372a/. bhūmiṃ śeṣaṃ ca śiṣyārthaṃ sthāpayetpañcagavyakam /
analyzed: bhūmim śeṣam ca śiṣya artham sthāpayet pañcagavyakam
pañca gavyāni yatra asmin kuśa ambuni tat ucyate
laukikyām aviśuddhau hi mṛditāyām atha antarīm
aśuddhim dagdhum āstheyam mantra ādi yat alaukikam
smaret
puṣpa añjalim kṣipet madhye dhūpa gandha āsava ādi ca
tathā eva dadyāt yāgaukaḥ madhye tena āśu vigraham
samastam devatā cakram adhiṣṭhātṛ prakalpyate
ṣaḍutthe gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ gaṇeśam hi aiśagam yajet
vighna saṃśāntyai pūjayitvā visarjayet
tatas kumbham parāmodi drava dravya prapūritam
pūjitam carcitam mūlamanunā mantrayet śatam

original: AbhT_15.379b/. asinā karkarīṃ pūrvamastrayāgo na cetkṛtaḥ // 379
analyzed: asinā karkarīm pūrvam astra yāgaḥ na ced kṛtaḥ
tam aiśānyām yajet kumbham vāma stha kalaśa anvitam
tatas saura diś āśritya ā sa astrān loka īśvarān yajet
gandha puṣpa upahāra ādyaiḥ vidhinā mantra pūrvakam
tatas śiṣya usi kalaśī hastaḥ dhārām prapātayan
guruṇā kumbha hastena anuvrajyaḥ vadatā tu idam

original: AbhT_15.382b/. bho bhoḥ śakra tvayā svasyāṃ diśi vighnapraśāntaye // 382
analyzed: bho bhoḥ śakra tvayā svasyām diśi vighna praśāntaye
sa avadhānena karma antam bhavitavyam śiva ājñayā
tri akṣare nirṛti prāye nāmni bhoḥ śabdam ekakam
apāsayet yatas mantraḥ chandaḥ baddhaḥ ayam īritaḥ

original: AbhT_15.384b/. tata aiśyāṃ diśi sthāpyaḥ sa kumbho vikiropari // 384
analyzed: tata aiśyām diśi sthāpyaḥ sa kumbhaḥ vikira upari

original: AbhT_15.385a/. dakṣiṇe cāstravārdhānī sthāpyā kumbhasya sāṃpratam /
analyzed: dakṣiṇe ca astra vārdhānī sthāpyā kumbhasya sāṃpratam
tejaḥ mātra ātmanā dhyātam sarvam āpyāyayet vidhim

original: AbhT_15.386b/. ataḥ kumbhe mantragaṇaṃ sarvaṃ saṃpūjayedguruḥ // 386
analyzed: atas kumbhe mantra gaṇam sarvam saṃpūjayet guruḥ

original: AbhT_15.387a/. pūrveṇa vidhināstraṃ ca karkaryāṃ vighnanudyajet /
analyzed: pūrveṇa vidhinā astram ca karkaryām
madhyegṛham tatas gandha maṇḍale pūjayet guruḥ
trikam yāmala tā aikyābhyām ekam vā mantra daivatam
agni kārya vidhānāya tatas kuṇḍam prakalpayet
śivasya yā kriyāśaktiḥ tat kuṇḍam iti bhāvanāt

original: AbhT_15.390a/. paramaḥ khalu saṃskāro vināpyanyaiḥ kriyākramaiḥ /
analyzed: paramaḥ khalu saṃskāraḥ vinā api anyaiḥ kriyā kramaiḥ

original: AbhT_15.390b/. evaṃ dehe sthaṇḍile vā liṅge pātre jale@nale // 390
analyzed: evam dehe sthaṇḍile vā liṅge pātre jala inale

original: AbhT_15.391a/. puṣpādiṣu śiśau mukhyaḥ saṃskāraḥ śivatādṛśe /
analyzed: puṣpa ādiṣu śiśau mukhyaḥ saṃskāraḥ śiva tādṛśe
uktam śrī yogasaṃcāre tathā hi parameśinā

original: AbhT_15.392a/. caturdaśavidhe bhūte puṣpe dhūpe nivedane /
analyzed: caturdaśavidhe bhūte puṣpe dhūpe nivedane

original: AbhT_15.392b/. dīpe jape tathā home sarvatraivātra caṇḍikā // 392
analyzed: dīpe jape tathā home sarvatra eva atra caṇḍikā
juhoti japati preddhe pūjayet vihaset vrajet

original: AbhT_15.393b/. āhāre maithune saiva dehasthā karmakāriṇī // 393
analyzed: āhāre maithune sā eva deha sthā karma kāriṇī

original: AbhT_15.394a/. tādṛśīṃ ye tu no rūḍhāṃ saṃvittimadhiśerate /
analyzed: tādṛśīm ye tu no rūḍhām saṃvittim adhiśerate
akramāt tad prasiddhi artham kramikaḥ vidhiḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_15.395a/. ahaṃ śivo mantramayaḥ saṃkalpā me tadātmakāḥ /
analyzed: aham śivaḥ mantra mayaḥ saṃkalpāḥ me tad ātmakāḥ

original: AbhT_15.395b/. tajjaṃ ca kuṇḍavahnyādi śivātmeti sphuṭaṃ smaret // 395
analyzed: tad jam ca kuṇḍa vahni ādi śiva ātmā iti sphuṭam smaret

original: AbhT_15.396a/. ata eva hi tatrāpi dārḍhyādārḍhyāvalokanāt /
analyzed: atas eva hi tatra api dārḍhya a dārḍhya avalokanāt
kriyamāṇe kṛte vā api saṃskriyā alpā itarā api vā
yathā hi kaścid pratibhā daridraḥ abhyāsa pāṭavāt
vākyam gṛhṇāti kopya ādau tathā atra api avabudhyatām
ullekha seka kuṭṭana lepa catur mārgam akṣa vṛti parikalanam
stara paridhi viṣṭara sthiti saṃskārāḥ daśa āstrataḥ kuṇḍa gatāḥ
madhya grahaṇam darbha dvayena kuśa saṃvṛtiḥ ca bhittīnām
prāc mukha rekhā tritaya ūrdhva rekhikāḥ kuśa samāvṛtiḥ ca bahis
śasta latāḥ caturaśram daśa lokeśa arcana āsana vidhiḥ ca
sadma āsādanam astra agni tejasā rakṣaṇam ca kuṇḍasya
bhūmeḥ śiva agni dhṛtyai śaktiḥ vighna apasāraṇam ca arthāḥ

original: AbhT_15.401b/. tatastu pūjite kuṇḍe kriyāśaktitayā sphuṭam // 401
analyzed: tatas tu pūjite kuṇḍe kriyā śakti tayā sphuṭam
mātṛkām mālinīm vā api nyasyet saṃkalpa rūpiṇīm

original: AbhT_15.403a/. jñānaśukrakaṇaṃ tatra triḥ prakṣobhya vinikṣipet /

analyzed: rūḍham jña tva ādi pañcāṅga vispaṣṭam
tena aṅga pañcakaiḥ eva hutim dadyāt sakṛt sakṛt
janma ādi akhila saṃskāra śuddha ugniḥ tāvatā bhavet
pañcāṅgam eva pṛthvī ādi rūpam kaṭhina tā ādikāḥ
śaktīḥ dadhat vahni gatāḥ kuryāt garbha ādikāḥ kriyāḥ
tatas akhila adhvasat devī cakra garbhām parāparām
smaran pūrṇāhuti vaśāt pūrayet agni saṃskriyāḥ
tathā mantra īśa yuj satya saṃkalpa mahasā jvalan
vahniḥ tad śiva saṃkalpa tādātmyāt śiva tā ātmakaḥ
iti etat saṃskriyā tattvam śrī śaṃbhuḥ me nyarūpayat
mayā api darśitam śuddha buddhayaḥ praviviñcatām

original: AbhT_15.409b/. tenātra ye codayanti yathā bālasya saṃskriyā // 409
analyzed: tena atra ye codayanti yathā bālasya saṃskriyā
bahnau vahneḥ tathā anyatra iti anavasthā eva saṃskṛteḥ
te nirutthāna vihatāḥ naye smin guru darśane

original: AbhT_15.411a/. jāte@gnau saṃskṛte śaive śabdarāśiṃ ca mālinīm /
analyzed: jāta ignau saṃskṛte śaive śabdarāśim ca mālinīm

original: AbhT_15.411b/. pitarau pūjayitvā svaṃ śuddhaṃ dhāma visarjayet // 411
analyzed: pitarau pūjayitvā svam śuddham dhāma visarjayet
śuddha agneḥ bhāgam ādāya caru artham sthāpayet pṛthak
athavā agneḥ śikhām vāma prāṇena ādāya hṛd juṣā
cit agninā aikyam ānīya kṣipet dakṣeṇa saṃskṛtām

original: AbhT_15.413b/. śiva ityabhimānena dṛḍhena hi vilokanam // 413
analyzed: śivaḥ iti abhimānena dṛḍhena hi vilokanam

original: AbhT_15.414a/. sarvasya saṃskriyā tattvaṃ tattasmai yadyato@malam /
analyzed: sarvasya saṃskriyā tattvam tat tasmai yat yatas malam
nava āhutīḥ atho dadyāt nava ātma sahitena tu

original: AbhT_15.415a/. śivāgnaye tārapūrvaṃ svāhāntaṃ saṃskriyā bhavet /
analyzed: bhavet
tatas
prāgvat ādhāram ādheyam devī cakram ca yojayet

original: AbhT_15.416b/. sruvaṃ srucaṃ ca saṃpaśyedadhovaktrau kramādguruḥ // 416
analyzed: sruvam srucam ca saṃpaśyet adhas vaktrau kramāt guruḥ
śiva śakti tayā abhyarcyau tathā ittham saṃskriyā anayoḥ
tattva saṃdarśanāt na anyat saṃskārasya asti jīvitam

original: AbhT_15.418a/. iti vaktuṃ sruvādīśaḥ śrīpūrve na samaskarot /
analyzed: iti vaktum sruvāt īśaḥ śrī pūrve na samaskarot
tatas tilaiḥ mṛgīm madhyā nāma aṅguṣṭha vaśāt guruḥ
kṛtvā mūlam tarpayet śatena ājya sruvaiḥ tathā
aṅga vaktram ṣaṣ aṃśena śeṣān ca api daśa aṃśataḥ
sahasra ādika homaḥ api tṛptyai vitta anusārataḥ
sati vitte api lobha ādi grastaḥ bāhya pradhāna tām
prathayan cit guṇībhāvāt śaktipātam na vindati

original: AbhT_15.421b/. uktaṃ svacchandatantre taddīkṣito@pi na mokṣabhāk // 421
analyzed: uktam svacchandatantre tat dīkṣitaḥ api na mokṣa bhāj

original: AbhT_15.422a/. nanu yattasya dīkṣāyāṃ kṛtaṃ karmāsya kiṃ phalam /
analyzed: nanu yat tasya dīkṣāyām kṛtam karma asya kim phalam
tatra āhuḥ gama śāstra jñāḥ vāmā śakti mayāḥ tadā
mantrāḥ badhnanti tam

original: AbhT_15.423b/. yā tvanugrāhikā śaktisteṣāṃ sā gurudīpitā // 423
analyzed: yā tu anugrāhikā śaktiḥ teṣām sā guru dīpitā
śodhayeta sva śāstra stha niṣkāma ullaṅghana kriyām
tatas ūrdhva adhara nyāsāt anyonya aunmukhya sundaram
sruc sruvam śiva śakti ātma ādāya ajya amṛta pūritam

original: AbhT_15.426a/. vāmaṃ srugdaṇḍagaṃ hastaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ sopayāmakam /
analyzed: vāmam sruc daṇḍa gam hastam dakṣiṇam sa upayāmakam
kaṇṭha adhas gam vinikṣipya dṛḍham āpīḍya yatnavān
adhas kuryāt srucam prāṇam ūrdhva ūrdhvam saṃniyojayan
sruc agrāt paramam hlādi patet amṛtam uttamam

original: AbhT_15.428b/. tāvadvahnau mantramukhe vauṣaḍantāṃ hutiṃ kṣipet // 428
analyzed: tāvat vahnau mantra mukhe vauṣaṭ antām hutim kṣipet

original: AbhT_15.429a/. ya ūrdhve kila saṃbodhaḥ kuṇḍe sa pratibimbitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ūrdhve kila saṃbodhaḥ kuṇḍe sa pratibimbitaḥ

original: AbhT_15.429b/. vahniḥ prāṇaḥ sruksruvau ca snehaḥ saṃkalpacidrasaḥ // 429

analyzed: ittham jñātvā āditas kuṇḍa sruc sruva ājya manūn bhṛśam
yathā yathā hi gaganam utpatet kalahaṃsakaḥ

original: AbhT_15.431b/. jale binbaṃ bruḍatyasya tathetyatrāpyayaṃ vidhiḥ // 431
analyzed: jale binbam bruḍati asya tathā iti atra api ayam vidhiḥ

original: AbhT_15.432a/. svābhāvikaṃ sthiraṃ caiva dravaṃ dīptaṃ calaṃ nabhaḥ /
analyzed: svābhāvikam sthiram ca eva dravam dīptam calam nabhaḥ

original: AbhT_15.432b/. māyā bindustathaivātmā nādaḥ śaktiḥ śivastathā // 432
analyzed: māyā binduḥ tathā eva ātmā nādaḥ śaktiḥ śivaḥ tathā
ittham vyāpya vyāpakataḥ vibhedya abhyantara antam
tad adhas sthāni pṛthvī ādi mūla antāni tathā pumān
avidyā rāga niyati kāla māyā kalāḥ tathā
aṇuḥ vidyā tad īśa īśau sādākhyam śakti kuṇḍalī
vyāpinī samanaunmanyam tatonāmani yojayet
recaka sthaḥ madhya nāḍī sandhi vid guruḥ iti adaḥ
proktam traiśirase tantre para yojana varṇane
tatas prāc sthāpita anyasta mantra saṃskṛta vahninā
caruḥ sādhyaḥ athavā śiṣyaiḥ homena sama kālakaḥ
carau ca vīra dravyāṇi laukikāni athavā icchayā
caru siddhau samastāḥ ca kriyāḥ hṛd mantra yogataḥ
tatas carum samādāya guru rājyena pūritām

original: AbhT_15.439a/. srucaṃ sruvaṃ vā kṛtvaiva bhuktimuktyanusārataḥ /
analyzed: srucam sruvam vā kṛtvā eva bhukti mukti anusārataḥ

original: AbhT_15.439b/. devānāmatha śaktīnāṃ yantrāṇāṃ tu trayaṃ trayam // 439
analyzed: devānām atha śaktīnām yantrāṇām tu trayam trayam
saptamam mātṛsadbhāvam kramāt ekaikaśas paṭhan
svā iti amṛta varṇena vahnau hutvā ājya śeṣakam
carau ha iti agni rūpeṇa juhuyāt tat punar punar
bhojya bhojaka caru agnyoḥ ittham eka anusandhitaḥ
svāhā pratyavamarśāt syāt sa mantrāt advayam param
eṣa saṃpāta saṃskāraḥ caroḥ bhoktā hi adhiṣṭhitaḥ

original: AbhT_15.443a/. bhogyasya paramaṃ sāraṃ bhogyaṃ narnarti yatnataḥ /
analyzed: bhogyasya paramam sāram bhogyam narnarti yatnataḥ
samam eka anusandhānāt pātataḥ bhoktṛ bhogyayoḥ
anyonyatra ca saṃpātāt saṃgamāt ca ittham ucyate
sthaṇḍile kubhbha karkaryoḥ bhāgam bhāgam nivedayet
bhāgena agnau mantra tṛptiḥ dvayam śiṣya ātmanoḥ ratha
ittham vihita kartavyaḥ vijñāpya īśam tad īritaḥ
śaktipāta kramāt śiṣyān saṃskartum niḥsaret bahis

original: AbhT_15.446b/. tatraiṣāṃ pañcagavyaṃ ca caruṃ daśanamārjanam // 446
analyzed: tatra eṣām pañcagavyam ca carum daśana mārjanam
tasya pātaḥ śubhaḥ prācī saumya aiśāpya ūrdhva diś gataḥ
aśubhaḥ anyatra tatra astra homaḥ upi aṣṭaśatam bhavet
netra mantrita sat vastra baddha netrān acañcalān
ananya hṛdayībhūtān balāt ittham nirodhataḥ
muktā ratna ādi kusuma saṃpūrṇa añjalikān guruḥ
praveśya sthaṇḍila upāgre upaveśya eva jānubhiḥ
prakṣepayet añjalim tam taiḥ śiṣyaiḥ bhāvitātmabhiḥ

original: AbhT_15.450b/. añjali punarāpūrya teṣāṃ lāghavataḥ paṭam // 450
analyzed: añjali punar āpūrya teṣām lāghavataḥ paṭam
dṛśoḥ nivārayet saḥ api śiṣyaḥ jhaṭiti paśyati
jhaṭiti ālokite māntra prabhāva ullāsite sthale
tad āveśa vaśāt śiṣyaḥ tad maya tvam prapadyate
yathā hi rakta hṛdayaḥ tān tān kāntā guṇān svayam
paśyati evam śaktipāta saṃskṛtaḥ mantra sannidhim
cakṣuḥ ādi indriyāṇām hi sahakāriṇi tādṛśe
sati atyantam adṛṣṭe prāk api jāyeta yogyatā

original: AbhT_15.454b/. kṛtaprajñā hi vinyastamantraṃ dehaṃ jalaṃ sthalam // 454
analyzed: kṛtaprajñāḥ hi vinyasta mantram deham jalam sthalam

original: AbhT_15.455a/. pratimādi ca paśyanto viduḥ saṃnidhyasaṃnidhī /
analyzed: pratimā ādi ca paśyantaḥ viduḥ saṃnidhi asaṃnidhī
nyasta mantra aṃśu subhagāt kiṃcid bhūta ādi mudritāḥ
trasyanti iva iti tat tat cit akṣaiḥ tad sahakāribhiḥ

original: AbhT_15.456b/. tataḥ sa dakṣiṇe haste dīptaṃ sarvādhvapūritam // 456
analyzed: tatas sa dakṣiṇe haste dīptam sarva adhva pūritam

original: AbhT_15.457b/. taṃ śiṣyasya karaṃ mūrdhni dehanyastādhvasaṃtateḥ // 457
analyzed: tam śiṣyasya karam mūrdhni deha nyasta adhva saṃtateḥ

original: AbhT_15.458a/. nyasyetkrameṇa sarvāṃṅgaṃ tenaivāsya ca saṃspṛśet /
analyzed: nyasyet krameṇa sarva aṃṅgam tena eva asya ca saṃspṛśet
uktam dīkṣottare ca etat jvālā saṃpāta śobhinā

original: AbhT_15.459a/. dattena śivahastena samayī sa vidhīyate /
analyzed: dattena śivahastena samayī sa vidhīyate
sāyujyam īśvare tattve jīvataḥ dhīti yogyatā
śrī devyā atha amale tu uktam aṣṭa āra antar triśūlake
bāhya apare parānemau madhyaśūla para apare
jvālā ākula īruṇe bhrāmyat mātṛ praṇava bhīṣaṇe

original: AbhT_15.462a/. cintite tu bahirhaste saṃdṛṣṭe samayī bhavet /
analyzed: cintite tu bahis haste saṃdṛṣṭe samayī bhavet
pāśastobhāt yaḥ tu sadyas uccikramiṣuḥ asya tam
prāṇaiḥ viyojakam mūrdhni kṣipet saṃpūjya tat bahis

original: AbhT_15.463b/. anena śivahastena samayī bhavati sphuṭam // 463
analyzed: anena śivahastena samayī bhavati sphuṭam
tasya eva bhāvi vidhivat tattva pāśa viyojane

original: AbhT_15.464b/. putrakatvaṃ sa ca pare tattve yojyastu daiśikaiḥ // 464
analyzed: putraka tvam sa ca pare tattve yojyaḥ tu daiśikaiḥ
saḥ eva mantra jāti jñaḥ japa homa ādi tattva vid
nirvāṇa kalaśena ādau tatas īśvara saṃjñinā

original: AbhT_15.466a/. abhiṣiktaḥ sādhakaḥ syādbhogānte@sya pare layaḥ /
analyzed: abhiṣiktaḥ sādhakaḥ syāt bhoga ante sya pare layaḥ
etaiḥ guṇaiḥ samāyuktaḥ dīkṣitaḥ śiva śāsane
catuṣpād saṃhitā abhijñaḥ tantra aṣṭādaśa tatparaḥ
daśa tantra ati mārga jñaḥ ācāryaḥ sa vidhīyate
pṛthivīm āditas kṛtvā nirvāṇa anta isya yojanām
abhiṣeka vidhau kuryāt ācāryasya guru uttamaḥ
etaiḥ vākyaiḥ idam ca uktam samayī rāja putra vat
sarvatra eva adhikārī syāt putraka ādi pada traye

original: AbhT_15.470a/. putrako daiśikatve tu tulyayojaniko bhavet /
analyzed: putrakaḥ daiśika tve tu tulya yojanikaḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_15.470b/. adhikārī sa na punaḥ sādhane bhinnayojane // 470
analyzed: adhikārī sa na punar sādhane bhinna yojane
ācāryaḥ na punar bauddha vaiṣṇava ādiḥ kadācana

original: AbhT_15.472a/. evaṃ prasaṅgānnirṇītaṃ prakṛtaṃ tu nirūpyate /
analyzed: evam prasaṅgāt nirṇītam prakṛtam tu nirūpyate
śivahasta vidhim kṛtvā tena saṃpluṣṭa pāśakam
śiṣyam vidhāya viśrānti paryantam dhyāna yogataḥ

original: AbhT_15.473b/. tataḥ kumbhe@strakalaśe vahnau svātmani taṃ śiśum // 473
analyzed: tatas kumbha istra kalaśe vahnau sva ātmani tam śiśum
praṇāmam kārayet paścāt bhūta mātṛ balim kṣipet
tatas śaṃkaram abhyarcya śayyām astra abhimantritām

original: AbhT_15.475a/. kṛtvāsyāṃ śiṣyamāropya nyastamantraṃ vidhāya ca /
analyzed: kṛtvā asyām śiṣyam āropya nyasta mantram vidhāya ca
bhavet kṣīṇa kalā jālaḥ svara dvādaśaka udayāt
tatas praveśa pracita kalā ṣoḍaśaka ujjvalaḥ

original: AbhT_15.477b/. svayaṃ vyutthānaparyantaṃ dvādaśāntaṃ tato vrajet // 477
analyzed: svayam vyutthāna paryantam dvādaśāntam tatas vrajet
punar viśet ca hṛd cakram ittham nidrā vidhi kramaḥ
āyāta nidraḥ śiṣya usau nirmalau śaśi bhāskarau
hṛd cakre pratisaṃdhatte balāt pūrṇa kṛśa ātmakau
haṭha nirmala candra arka prakāśaḥ satyam īkṣate
svapnam bhāvi śubha anya tva sphuṭībhāvana kovidam

original: AbhT_15.480b/. uktaṃ ca pūrṇāṃ ca kṛśāṃ dhyātvā dvādaśagocare // 480
analyzed: uktam ca pūrṇām ca kṛśām dhyātvā dvādaśa gocare

original: AbhT_15.481a/. praviśya hṛdaye dhyāye tsuptaḥ svācchandyamāpnuyāt /
analyzed: praviśya hṛdaye dhyāye t suptaḥ svācchandyam āpnuyāt

original: AbhT_15.481b/. āyātanidre ca śiśau gururabhyarcya śaṅkaram // 481
analyzed: āyāta nidre ca śiśau guruḥ abhyarcya śaṅkaram
carum bhuñjīta sa sakhā tatas udyāt dantadhāvanam
svapyāt ca mantraraśmi iddha hṛd cakra arpita mānasaḥ
prātar guruḥ kṛta aśeṣa nitya ubhyarcita śaṃkaraḥ
śiṣya ātmanoḥ svapna dṛṣṭau arthau vitte bala abalāt
sva dṛṣṭam balavat na anyat saṃbodha udreka yogataḥ
bodha sāmye punar svapna sāmyam syāt guru śiṣyayoḥ
deva agni guru tad pūjā kāraṇa upaskara ādikam

original: AbhT_15.485b/. hṛdyā strī madyapānaṃ cāpyāmamāṃsasya bhakṣaṇam // 485
analyzed: hṛdyā strī madya pānam ca api āma māṃsasya bhakṣaṇam
rakta pānam śiraḥ chedaḥ rakta viṣ mūtra lepanam
parvata aśva gaja prāya hṛdya yugya adhirohaṇam
yad prītyai syāt api prāyas tat tat śubham udāhṛtam

original: AbhT_15.487b/. taṃ khyāpayettuṣṭivṛddhyai hlādo hi paramaṃ phalam // 487
analyzed: tam khyāpayet tuṣṭi vṛddhyai hlādaḥ hi paramam phalam
atas nyat aśubham tatra homa uṣṭaśataka ustrataḥ
aśubham na aśubham iti śiṣyebhyaḥ kathayet guruḥ

original: AbhT_15.489a/. rūḍhāṃ hi śaṅkāṃ vicchettuṃ yatnaḥ saṃghaṭate mahān /
analyzed: rūḍhām hi śaṅkām vicchettum yatnaḥ saṃghaṭate mahān
yeṣām tu śaṅkā vilayaḥ teṣām svapna vaśa utthitam

original: AbhT_15.490a/. śubhāśubhaṃ na kiṃcitsyāt syuścetthaṃ citratāvaśāt /
analyzed: śubha aśubham na kiṃcid syāt syuḥ ca ittham citra tā vaśāt

original: AbhT_15.490b/. sphuṭaṃ paśyati sattvātmā rājaso liṅgamātrataḥ // 490
analyzed: sphuṭam paśyati sattva ātmā rājasaḥ liṅga mātrataḥ
na kiṃcid tāmasaḥ tasya sukha duḥkhāt śubha aśubham

original: AbhT_15.491b/. nanvatra tāmaso nāma kathaṃ yogyo vidhau bhavet // 491
analyzed: nanu atra tāmasaḥ nāma katham yogyaḥ vidhau bhavet

original: AbhT_15.492a/. maiva mā vigrahaṃ kaścitkvacitkasyāpi vai guṇaḥ /
analyzed: mā eva mā vigraham kaścid kvacid kasya api vai guṇaḥ
sarva sāttvika ceṣṭaḥ api bhojane yadi tāmasaḥ
kim tatas saḥ dhamaḥ kivāpi utkṛṣṭaḥ tad viparyayaḥ
āyāta śaktipātaḥ api dīkṣitaḥ api guṇa sthiteḥ

original: AbhT_15.494a/. vicitrātmā bhavedeva mukhye tvarthe samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: vicitra ātmā bhavet eva mukhye tu arthe samāhitaḥ
tatas guruḥ śiśoḥ mantra pūrvakam devatā arcanam

original: AbhT_15.495a/. deśayetsa ca tatkuryātsaṃskuryāttaṃ tato guruḥ /
analyzed: deśayet sa ca tat kuryāt saṃskuryāt tam tatas guruḥ
hṛd ādi cakra ṣaṭka sthān brahma ādīn ṣaṭ samāhitaḥ

original: AbhT_15.496a/. spṛśecchiśoḥ prāṇavṛttyā pratyekaṃ cāṣṭa saṃskriyāḥ /
analyzed: spṛśet śiśoḥ prāṇa vṛttyā pratyekam ca aṣṭa saṃskriyāḥ
āhāra bīja bhāva ādi doṣa dhvaṃsāt bhavet dvijaḥ
vasu veda ākhya saṃskāra pūrṇaḥ ittham dvijaḥ sthitaḥ

original: AbhT_15.498a/. garbhādhānaṃ puṃsavanaṃ sīmanto jātakarma ca /
analyzed: garbhādhānam puṃsavanam sīmantaḥ jātakarma ca
nāma niṣkrāmaṇam ca anna praśaḥ cūḍā tathā aṣṭamī
vrata bandha aiṣṭike maujjībhautike saumikam kramāt
godānam iti veda indu saṃskriyā brahmacaryataḥ
pratyudvāhaḥ pañcadaśaḥ sapta pākamakhāḥ tu atas
aṣṭakāḥ pārvaṇī śrāddham śrāvaṇī āgrāyaṇī dvayam

original: AbhT_15.501a/. caitrī cāśvayujī paścāt saptaiva tu havirmakhāḥ /
analyzed: caitrī ca āśvayujī paścāt sapta eva tu haviḥ makhāḥ
ādheyam agnihotram ca paurṇamāsaḥ sa darśakaḥ

original: AbhT_15.502a/. cāturmāsyaṃ paśūdbandhaḥ sautrāmaṇyā saha tvamī /
analyzed: cāturmāsyam paśu udbandhaḥ sautrāmaṇyā saha tu amī
ṣoḍaśi vājapau
āptoryāma atirātrau ca saptā etāḥ soma saṃsthitāḥ
hiraṇyapāda ādi makhaḥ sahasreṇa samāvṛtaḥ
aṣṭatriṃśaḥ tu aśvamedhaḥ gārhasthyam iyatā bhavet
vānasthya pārivrājye ca catvāriṃśat amī matāḥ

original: AbhT_15.505a/. dayā kṣamānasūyā ca śuddhiḥ satkṛtimaṅgale /
analyzed: dayā kṣamā anasūyā ca śuddhiḥ satkṛti maṅgale
akārpaṇya aspṛhe ca ātma guṇa aṣṭakam idam smṛtam
mekhalāḥ daṇḍam ajina tri āyuṣe vahni upāsanam

original: AbhT_15.506b/. saṃdhyā bhikṣeti saṃskārāḥ sapta sapta vratāni ca // 506
analyzed: saṃdhyā bhikṣā iti saṃskārāḥ sapta sapta vratāni ca
bhauteśa pāśupatye dve gāṇeśam gāṇapatyakam

original: AbhT_15.508a/. ete tu vratabandhasya saṃskārā aṅginaḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: ete tu vrata bandhasya saṃskārāḥ aṅginaḥ smṛtāḥ
pārivrājyasya garbhe syāt antyeṣṭiḥ iti saṃskṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_15.509a/. dvijo bhavettato yogyo rudrāṃśāpādanāya saḥ /
analyzed: dvijaḥ bhavet tatas yogyaḥ rudra aṃśa āpādanāya saḥ
etān prāṇa krameṇa eva saṃskārān yojayet guruḥ
athavā āhuti yogena tila ādyaiḥ mantra pūrvakaiḥ
praṇavaḥ hṛdayam nāma śodhayāmi agni vallabhā
evam krameṇa mūrdha ādyaiḥ aṅgaiḥ a tat punar punar
yatas cit dharmaḥ eva asau śānti ādi ātmā dvi janma tā
tena rudra tayā saṃvid tad krameṇa eva jāyate
yathā hema ādi dhātūnām pāke krama vaśāt bhavet
rajata ādi tathā saṃvid saṃskāre dvijata antare

original: AbhT_15.513b/. yonirna kāraṇaṃ tatra śāntātmā dvija ucyate // 513
analyzed: yoniḥ na kāraṇam tatra śānta ātmā dvijaḥ ucyate
muninā mokṣa dharma ādau etat ca pravivecitam
mukuṭa ādiṣu śāstreṣu devena api nirūpitam
saṃvidaḥ deha saṃbhedāt sadṛśāt sadṛśa udayāt

original: AbhT_15.515b/. bhūmābhiprāyataḥ smārte dvijanmā dvijayoḥ sutaḥ // 515
analyzed: bhūma abhiprāyataḥ smārte dvijanmā dvijayoḥ sutaḥ

original: AbhT_15.516b/. utkṛṣṭacittā ṛṣayaḥ kiṃ brāhmaṇyena bhājanam // 516
analyzed: utkṛṣṭa cittāḥ ṛṣayaḥ kim brāhmaṇyena bhājanam
atas eva artha sat tattva deśinī asmin na diśyate
rahasya śāstre jāti ādi samācāraḥ hi śāmbhave
pāśavāni tu śāstrāṇi vāma śakti ātmakāni alam
śaṃbhoḥ śaṅkā tad phala kḷptaye
āpādita dvija tvasya dvādaśānte nija aikyataḥ
sparśa mātrāt na viśrāntyā jhaṭiti eva avarohataḥ

original: AbhT_15.520a/. rudrāṃśāpādanaṃ yena samayī saṃskṛto bhavet /
analyzed: rudra aṃśa āpādanam yena samayī saṃskṛtaḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_15.520b/. adhītau śravaṇe nityaṃ pūjāyāṃ gurusevane // 520
analyzed: adhītau śravaṇe nityam pūjāyām guru sevane
samayī adhikṛtaḥ anyatra guruṇā vibhum arcayet
tam āpādita rudra aṃśam samayān śrāvayet guruḥ
aṣṭa aṣṭaka ātmakān devyāyāmala ādau nirūpitān
a vādaḥ karaṇam gūḍhiḥ pūjā tarpaṇa bhāvane
hananam mohanam ca iti samaya aṣṭakam aṣṭadhā
svabhāvam mantra tantrāṇām samayācāra melakam
asat pralāpam paruṣam anṛtam na aṣṭadhā vadet
aphalam ceṣṭitam hiṃsām para dāra abhimarśanam
garvam dambham bhūta viṣa vyādhi tantram na ca ācaret

original: AbhT_15.525b/. svaṃ mantramakṣasūtraṃ ca vidyāṃ jñānasvarūpakam // 525
analyzed: svam mantram akṣasūtram ca vidyām jñāna svarūpakam
samācārān guṇān kleśān siddhi liṅgāni gūhayet

original: AbhT_15.526b/. guruṃ śāstraṃ devavahnī jñānavṛddhāṃstriyo vratam // 526
analyzed: gurum śāstram deva vahnī jñāna vṛddhān striyaḥ vratam
guru vargam yathāśaktyā pūjayet aṣṭakam tu idam
dīnān kliṣṭān pitṝn kṣetrapālān prāṇi gaṇān khagān
śmāśānikam bhūta gaṇam deha devīḥ ca tarpayet

original: AbhT_15.528b/. śivaṃ śaktiṃ tathātmānaṃ mudrāṃ mantrasvarūpakam // 528

analyzed: saṃsāra bhukti muktīḥ ca guru vaktrāt tu bhāvayet
rāgam dveṣam asūyām ca saṃkoca īrṣyā abhimāni tāḥ
samaya pratibhettṝn tad anācārān ca ghātayet
paśu mārga sthitān krūrān dveṣiṇaḥ piśunān jaḍān
rājñaḥ ca anucarān pāpān vighna kartṝn ca mohayet
śākinyaḥ pūjanīyāḥ ca tāḥ ca ittham śrī gama uditāḥ

original: AbhT_15.532a/. sāhasaṃ dviguṇaṃ yāsāṃ kāmaścaiva caturguṇaḥ /
analyzed: sāhasam dviguṇam yāsām kāmaḥ ca eva caturguṇaḥ
lobhaḥ ca aṣṭaguṇaḥ tāsām śaṅkyam śākinyaḥ iti alam

original: AbhT_15.533a/. kulāmnāyasthitā vīradravyabāhyāstu ye na taiḥ /
analyzed: kula āmnāya sthitāḥ vīra dravya bāhyāḥ tu ye na taiḥ

original: AbhT_15.533b/. paśubhiḥ saha vastavyamiti śrīmādhave kule // 533
analyzed: paśubhiḥ saha vastavyam iti śrī mādhave kule
devatā cakra guru agni śāstram sāmyāt sadā arcayet
a niveditam etebhyaḥ na kiṃcid api bhakṣayet
etat dravyam na apaharet guru vargam prapūjayet

original: AbhT_15.535b/. sa ca tadbhrātṛbhāryātukprāyo vidyākṛto bhavet // 535
analyzed: sa ca tad bhrātṛ bhāryā tuc prāyaḥ vidyā kṛtaḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_15.536a/. na yonisaṃbandhakṛto laukikaḥ sa paśuryataḥ /
analyzed: na yoni saṃbandha kṛtaḥ laukikaḥ sa paśuḥ yatas
tasya abhiṣvaṅga bhūmiḥ tu guru ārādhana siddhaye

original: AbhT_15.537a/. arcyo na svamahimnā tu tadvargo guruvatpunaḥ /
analyzed: arcyaḥ na sva mahimnā tu tad vargaḥ guru vat punar

original: AbhT_15.537b/. gurornindāṃ na kurvīta tasyai hetuṃ nacācaret // 537
analyzed: guroḥ nindām na kurvīta tasyai hetum na ca ācaret

original: AbhT_15.538a/. naca tāṃ śṛṇuyānnainaṃ kopayennāgrato@sya ca /
analyzed: na ca tām śṛṇuyāt na enam kopayet na agratas sya ca
vinā ājñayā prakurvīta kiṃcid tad sevanāt ṛte

original: AbhT_15.539a/. laukikālaukikaṃ kṛtyaṃ krodhaṃ krīḍāṃ tapo japam /
analyzed: laukika alaukikam kṛtyam krodham krīḍām tapaḥ japam
guru upabhuktam yat kiṃcid śayyā vastra āsana ādikam

original: AbhT_15.540a/. nopabhuñjīta tatpadbhyāṃ na spṛśetkiṃtu vandayet /
analyzed: na upabhuñjīta tad padbhyām na spṛśet kiṃtu vandayet
śrīmat traiśirase pi uktam kṛcchra cāndrāyaṇa ādibhiḥ
araṇye kāṣṭha vat tiṣṭhet asi dhārā vrataḥ api san

original: AbhT_15.541b/. niyamastho yamastho@pi tatpadaṃ nāśnute param // 541
analyzed: niyama sthaḥ yama sthaḥ upi tat padam na aśnute param
guru ārādhana saktaḥ tu manasā karmaṇā girā

original: AbhT_15.542b/. prāpnoti gurutastuṣṭāt pūrṇaṃ śreyo mahādbhutam // 542
analyzed: prāpnoti gurutaḥ tuṣṭāt pūrṇam śreyaḥ mahā adbhutam
hima pātaiḥ yathā bhūmiḥ chāditā sā samantataḥ
māruta śleṣa saṃyogāt aśma vat tiṣṭhate sadā

original: AbhT_15.544a/. yamādau niścale tadvadbhāva ekastu gṛhyate /
analyzed: yama ādau niścale tadvat bhāvaḥ ekaḥ tu gṛhyate
guroḥ tu ārādhitāt pūrṇam prasarat jñānam āpyate

original: AbhT_15.545a/. sarvato@vasthitaṃ cittvaṃ jñeyasthaṃ yasya tatkathā /
analyzed: sarvatas avasthitam cit tvam jñeya stham yasya tad kathā
sadyas eva nayet ūrdhvam tasmāt ārādhayet gurum
śrī sārepyasya saṃbhāṣāt pātakam naśyati kṣaṇāt
tasmāt parīkṣya yatnena śāstra uktyā jñāna lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: AbhT_15.547a/. śāstrācāreṇa varteta tena saṅgaṃ tathā kuru /
analyzed: śāstra ācāreṇa varteta tena saṅgam tathā kuru

original: AbhT_15.547b/. snehājjātu vadejjñānaṃ lobhānna hriyate hi saḥ // 547
analyzed: snehāt jātu vadet jñānam lobhāt na hriyate hi saḥ

original: AbhT_15.548a/. tena tuṣṭena tṛpyanti devāḥ pitara evaca /
analyzed: tena tuṣṭena tṛpyanti devāḥ pitaraḥ eva ca

original: AbhT_15.548b/. uttīrya narakādyānti sadyaḥ śivapuraṃ mahat // 548
analyzed: uttīrya narakāt yānti sadyas śiva puram mahat

original: AbhT_15.549a/. bhuṅkte tiṣṭhedyatra gṛhe vrajecchivapuraṃ tu saḥ /
analyzed: bhuṅkte tiṣṭhet yatra gṛhe vrajet śiva puram tu saḥ

original: AbhT_15.549b/. iti jñātvā sadā pitrye śrāddhe svaṃ gurumarcayet // 549
analyzed: iti jñātvā sadā pitrye śrāddhe svam gurum arcayet

original: AbhT_15.550a/. bhuñjīta sa svayaṃ cānyānādiśettatkṛte guruḥ /
analyzed: bhuñjīta sa svayam ca anyān ādiśet tad kṛte guruḥ

original: AbhT_15.550b/. yo dīkṣitastu śrāddhādau svatantraṃ vidhimācaret // 550
analyzed: yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ tu śrāddha ādau svatantram vidhim ācaret

original: AbhT_15.551a/. tasya tanniṣphalaṃ sarvaṃ samayena ca laṅghyate /
analyzed: tasya tat niṣphalam sarvam samayena ca laṅghyate
saiddhāntika arpitam caṇḍī yogyam dravyam vivarjayet
śākinī vācakam śabdam na kadācid samuccaret

original: AbhT_15.552b/. striyaḥ pūjyā virūpāstu vṛddhāḥ śilpopajīvikāḥ // 552
analyzed: striyaḥ pūjyāḥ virūpāḥ tu vṛddhāḥ śilpa upajīvikāḥ
antyāḥ vikārita aṅgyaḥ ca veśyāḥ svacchanda ceṣṭitāḥ

original: AbhT_15.553b/. tathāca śrīgame proktaṃ pūjanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ // 553
analyzed: tathā ca śrī game proktam pūjanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ
nirācārāḥ sarva bhakṣyāḥ dharma adharma vivarjitāḥ

original: AbhT_15.554b/. svacchandagāḥ palāśinyo lampaṭā devatā iva // 554
analyzed: svacchanda gāḥ palāśinyaḥ lampaṭāḥ devatāḥ iva

original: AbhT_15.555a/. veśyāḥ pūjyāstadgṛhaṃ ca prayāgo@tra yajetkramam /
analyzed: veśyāḥ pūjyāḥ tad gṛham ca prayāga utra yajet kramam
strīṣu tat na ācaret kicid yena tābhyaḥ jugupsate

original: AbhT_15.556a/. ato na nagnāstāḥ paśyennacāpi prakaṭastanīḥ /
analyzed: atas na nagnāḥ tāḥ paśyet na ca api prakaṭa stanīḥ

original: AbhT_15.556b/. vṛddhāyāḥ saṃsthitāyā vā na jugupseta mudrikām // 556
analyzed: vṛddhāyāḥ saṃsthitāyāḥ vā na jugupseta mudrikām

original: AbhT_15.557a/. vaikṛtyaṃ tatra saurūpyaṃ melakaṃ na prakāśayet /
analyzed: vaikṛtyam tatra saurūpyam melakam na prakāśayet
deva mūrtim śūnya tanum pūjayet tripathā ādiṣu
sarva parvasu sāmānya viśeṣeṣu viśeṣataḥ
pūjā guroḥ anadhyāyaḥ melake lobha varjanam

original: AbhT_15.559a/. na jugupseta madyādi vīradravyaṃ kadācana /
analyzed: na jugupseta madya ādi vīra dravyam kadācana

original: AbhT_15.559b/. na nindedatha vandeta nityaṃ tajjoṣiṇastathā // 559
analyzed: na nindet atha vandeta nityam tad joṣiṇaḥ tathā

original: AbhT_15.560a/. upadeśāya na doṣā hṛdayaṃ cenna vidviṣet /
analyzed: upadeśāya na doṣāḥ hṛdayam ced na vidviṣet
vijātīya vikalpa aṃśa utpuṃsanāya yateta ca

original: AbhT_15.561a/. guroḥ śāstrasya devīnāṃ nāma mantre yatastataḥ /
analyzed: guroḥ śāstrasya devīnām nāma mantre yatas tatas
arcātaḥ nyatra na uccāryam āhūtam tarpayet tatas

original: AbhT_15.562a/. āgatasya ca mantrasya na kuryāttarpaṇaṃ yadi /
analyzed: āgatasya ca mantrasya na kuryāt tarpaṇam yadi
harati ardha śarīram tat iti ūce bhagavān yatas

original: AbhT_15.563a/. śrīmadūrmau ca devīnāṃ vīrāṇāṃ ceṣṭitaṃ na vai /
analyzed: śrīmat ūrmau ca devīnām vīrāṇām ceṣṭitam na vai
prathayet na jugupseta vadet na adravya pāṇikaḥ

original: AbhT_15.564a/. śrīpūrvaṃ nāma vaktavyaṃ gurordravyakareṇa ca /
analyzed: śrī pūrvam nāma vaktavyam guroḥ dravya kareṇa ca

original: AbhT_15.564b/. gurvādīnāṃ na laṅghyā ca chāyā na tairthikaiḥ saha // 564
analyzed: guru ādīnām na laṅghyā ca chāyā na tairthikaiḥ saha
jalpam kurvan sva śāstra artham vadet na api ca sūcayet
nityāt viśeṣa pūjām ca kuryāt naimittike vidhau

original: AbhT_15.566a/. tato@pi madhye varṣasya tato@pi hi pavitrake /
analyzed: tatas upi madhye varṣasya tatas upi hi pavitrake

original: AbhT_15.566b/. anyastamantro nāsīta sevyaṃ śāstrāntaraṃ ca no // 566
analyzed: anyaḥ ta mantraḥ na āsīta sevyam śāstra antaram ca no
a prarūḍham hi vijñānam kampeta itara bhāvanāt
gṛha upaskaraṇa astrāṇi dava tā yāga yogataḥ

original: AbhT_15.568a/. arcyānīti na padbhyāṃ vai spṛśennāpi vilaṅghyet /
analyzed: arcyāni iti na padbhyām vai spṛśet na api vilaṅghyet
guru varge gṛha āyāte viśeṣam kaṃcid ācaret
dīkṣitānām na nindā ādi kuryāt vidveṣa pūrvakam

original: AbhT_15.569b/. upadeśāya no doṣaḥ sa hyavidveṣapūrvakaḥ // 569
analyzed: upadeśāya naḥ doṣaḥ sa hi a vidveṣa pūrvakaḥ
na vaṣṇavādika adhas stha dṛṣṭibhiḥ saṃvaset alam
sahabhojana śayyā ādyar na eṣām prakaṭayet sthitim
uktam śrīṃ mādhava kule śāsana antara saṃsthitān

original: AbhT_15.571b/. vedoktiṃ vaiṣṇavoktiṃ ca tairuktaṃ varjayetsadā // 571
analyzed: veda uktim vaiṣṇava uktim ca taiḥ uktam varjayet sadā
akulīneṣu saṃparkāt tad kulāt patanāt bhayam
eka pātre kula āmnāye tasmāt tān parivarjayet

original: AbhT_15.573a/. pramādācca kṛte sakhye goṣṭhyāṃ cakraṃ tu pūjayet /
analyzed: pramādāt ca kṛte sakhye goṣṭhyām cakram tu pūjayet
śrīmat ūrmau ca kathitam āgama antara sevake
guru antara rate mūḍhe deva dravya upajīvake

original: AbhT_15.574b/. śaktihiṃsākare duṣṭe saṃparkaṃ naiva kārayet // 574
analyzed: śakti hiṃsā kare duṣṭe saṃparkam na eva kārayet
na vikalpena dīkṣā ādau vrajet āyatana ādikam
ukta āsthā śithila tve yat nimittam na eva tat caret
śāsana sthān purā jātyā na paśyet na api udīrayet
na ca vyavaharet sarvān śiva abhedena kevalam

original: AbhT_15.577a/. sadvidyaiḥ sākamāsīta jñānadīptyai yateta ca /
analyzed: sat vidyaiḥ sākam āsīta jñāna dīptyai yateta ca
na asaṃskṛtām vrajet tad jam viphala tvam na ca ānayet
melaka ardha niśā caryā jana varjam ca tat na hi
māṃsa ādi dāha gandham ca jighret devī priyaḥ hi asau
guru ājñām pālayan sarvam tyajet mantra mayaḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_15.580a/. akurvanniṣphalāṃ naiva ceṣṭeta trividhāṃ kriyām /
analyzed: akurvān niṣphalām na eva ceṣṭeta trividhām kriyām

original: AbhT_15.580b/. mantratantrairna vādaṃ ca kuryānno bhakṣayedviṣam // 580
analyzed: mantra tantraiḥ na vādam ca kuryāt no bhakṣayet viṣam

original: AbhT_15.581a/. samayānāṃ vilope ca guruṃ pṛcchedasannidhau /
analyzed: samayānām vilope ca gurum pṛcchet asannidhau
tad vargam nija santānam anyam tasya api asaṃnidhau
tena uktam anutiṣṭhet ca nirvikalpam prayatnataḥ
yatas śāstra ādi saṃbodha tanmayīkṛta mānasaḥ

original: AbhT_15.583a/. śiva eva gururnāsya vāgasatyā viniḥsaret /
analyzed: śivaḥ eva guruḥ na asya vāc asatyā viniḥsaret

original: AbhT_15.583b/. śivasya svātmasaṃskṛtyai prahvībhāvo guroḥ punaḥ // 583
analyzed: śivasya sva ātma saṃskṛtyai prahvī bhāvaḥ guroḥ punar
hlādāya iti ubhaya arthāya tad tuṣṭiḥ phala dā śiśoḥ
guru āyatta eka siddhiḥ hi samayī api vibodha bhāj
tad bodha bahu mānena vidyāt gurutamam gurum

original: AbhT_15.585b/. ataḥ saṃprāpya vijñānaṃ yo gurau bāhyamānavān // 585
analyzed: atas saṃprāpya vijñānam yaḥ gurau bāhya mānavān

original: AbhT_15.586a/. nāsau vijñānaviśvasto nāsatyaṃ bhraṣṭa eva saḥ /
analyzed: na asau vijñāna viśvastaḥ na asatyam bhraṣṭaḥ eva saḥ
jñāna anāśvasta cittam tam vacaḥ mātreṇa śāstritam

original: AbhT_15.587a/. bhaktaṃ ca nārcayejjātu hṛdā vijñānadūṣakam /
analyzed: bhaktam ca na arcayet jātu hṛdā vijñāna dūṣakam

original: AbhT_15.587b/. tādṛk ca na guruḥ kāryastaṃ kṛtvāpi parityajet // 587
analyzed: tādṛś ca na guruḥ kāryaḥ tam kṛtvā api parityajet
mukhya buddhyā na saṃpaśyet vaiṣṇava ādi gatān gurūn
tathā ca śrīmat ūrmyākhye guroḥ uktam viśeṣaṇam

original: AbhT_15.589a/. gurvājñā prāṇasaṃdehe nopekṣyā no vikalpyate /
analyzed: guru ājñā prāṇa saṃdehe na upekṣyā no vikalpyate
kaula dīkṣā kaula śāstram tattva jñānam prakāśitam

original: AbhT_15.590a/. yenāsau gururityukto hyanye vai nāmadhāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: yena asau guruḥ iti uktaḥ hi anye vai nāmadhāriṇaḥ
śrīmat ānandaśāstre ca tathā eva uktam viśeṣaṇam

original: AbhT_15.591a/. yasmāddīkṣā mantraśāstraṃ tattvajñānaṃ sa vai guruḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt dīkṣā mantra śāstram tattva jñānam sa vai guruḥ

original: AbhT_15.591b/. tiṣṭhedavyaktaliṅgaśca na liṅgaṃ dhārayet kvacit // 591
analyzed: tiṣṭhet avyakta liṅgaḥ ca na liṅgam dhārayet kvacid
na liṅgibhiḥ samam kaiścid kuryāt ācāra melanam

original: AbhT_15.592b/. kevalaṃ liṅginaḥ pālyā na bībhatsyā virūpakāḥ // 592
analyzed: kevalam liṅginaḥ pālyāḥ na bībhatsyāḥ virūpakāḥ
śrīmat rātrikule ca uktam mokṣaḥ śaṅkā apahānitaḥ
na likhet mantrahṛdayam śrīmat mālā uditam kila
tad aṅgāt uddharet mantram na tu lekhe vilekhayet
atattva abhiniveśam ca na kuryāt pakṣapātataḥ
jāti vidyā kula ācāra deha deśa guṇa artha jān
grahān grahān iva aṣṭau drāk tyajet gahvara rśitān
tathā śrī niśicāra ādau haya tvena upadarśitān
brāhmaṇa uham mayā veda śāstra uktāt aparam katham
anuṣṭheyam ayam jāti grahaḥ para nirodhakaḥ
evam anye api udāhāryāḥ kula gahvara vartmanā
a tatsvabhāve tādrūpyam darśayan avaśepi yaḥ

original: AbhT_15.599a/. svarūpācchādakaḥ so@tra graho graha ivoditaḥ /
analyzed: sva rūpa ācchādakaḥ saḥ utra grahaḥ grahaḥ iva uditaḥ

original: AbhT_15.599b/. saṃvitsvabhāve no jātiprabhṛtiḥ kāpi kalpanā // 599
analyzed: saṃvid svabhāve no jāti prabhṛtiḥ kā api kalpanā

original: AbhT_15.600a/. rūpaṃ sā tvasvarūpeṇa tadrūpaṃ chādayatyalam /
analyzed: rūpam sā tu asvarūpeṇa tat rūpam chādayati alam
yā kācid kalpanā saṃvid tattvasya akhaṇḍita ātmanaḥ

original: AbhT_15.601a/. saṃkocakāriṇī sarvaḥ sa grahastāṃ parityajet /
analyzed: saṃkoca kāriṇī sarvaḥ sa grahaḥ tām parityajet
śrīmat ānandaśāstre ca kathitam parameṣṭhinā

original: AbhT_15.602a/. nirapekṣaḥ prabhurvāmo na śuddhyā tatra kāraṇam /
analyzed: nirapekṣaḥ prabhuḥ vāmaḥ na śuddhyā tatra kāraṇam
devī tṛptiḥ makhe rakta māṃsaiḥ no śauca yojanāt

original: AbhT_15.603a/. dvijāntyajaiḥ samaṃ kāryā carcānte@pi marīcayaḥ /
analyzed: dvija antyajaiḥ samam kāryā carcā ante pi marīcayaḥ
avikāra kṛtaḥ tena vikalpāt nirayaḥ bhavet
sarva deva mayaḥ kāyaḥ sarva prāṇiṣu iti sphuṭam
śrīmadbhiḥ nakula īśa ādyaiḥ api etat su nirūpitam
śarīram eva āyatanam na anyat āyatanam vrajet
tīrtham ekam smaret mantram anya tīrthāni varjayet

original: AbhT_15.606a/. vidhimenaṃ sukhaṃ jñātvā vidhijālaṃ parityajet /
analyzed: vidhim enam sukham jñātvā vidhi jālam parityajet
samādhiḥ niścayam muktvā na ca anyena upalabhyate

original: AbhT_15.607a/. iti matvā vidhānajñaḥ saṃmohaṃ parivarjayet /
analyzed: iti matvā vidhāna jñaḥ saṃmoham parivarjayet

original: AbhT_15.607b/. mantrasya hṛdayaṃ muktvā na cānyatparamaṃ kvacit // 607
analyzed: mantrasya hṛdayam muktvā na ca anyat paramam kvacid

original: AbhT_15.608a/. iti matvā vidhānajño mantrajālaṃ parityajet /
analyzed: iti matvā vidhāna jñaḥ mantra jālam parityajet

original: AbhT_15.608b/. naivedyaṃ prāśayennadyāstaccheṣaṃ ca jale kṣipet // 608
analyzed: naivedyam prāśayet nadyāḥ tad śeṣam ca jale kṣipet

original: AbhT_15.609a/. tairbhukte na bhaveddoṣo jalajaiḥ pūrvadīkṣitaiḥ /
analyzed: taiḥ bhukte na bhavet doṣaḥ jala jaiḥ pūrva dīkṣitaiḥ
saṃgamāt
jñāna prāpti abhyupāya tvāt samayāḥ te prakīrtitāḥ

original: AbhT_15.610b/. evaṃ saṃśrāvya samayāndevaṃ saṃpūjya daiśikaḥ // 610
analyzed: evam saṃśrāvya samayān devam saṃpūjya daiśikaḥ
visarjayet sva cit vyomni śānte mūrti vilāpanāt

original: AbhT_15.611b/. yadi putrakadīkṣāsya na kāryā samanantaram // 611
analyzed: yadi putraka dīkṣā asya na kāryā samanantaram
tadā abhiṣiñcet sa astreṇa śiva kumbhena tam śiśum
ātmānam ca tatas yasmāt jalamūrtiḥ maheśvaraḥ
mantra yuj nikhila āpyāyī kāryam tat abhiṣecanam

original: AbhT_15.613b/. iti samayadīkṣaṇamidaṃ prakāśitaṃ vistarācca saṃkṣepāt //
analyzed: iti samaya dīkṣaṇam idam prakāśitam vistarāt ca saṃkṣepāt
atha śrī tantrāloke ṣoḍaśam āhnikam

original: AbhT_16.1a/. atha putrakatvasiddhyai nirūpyate śivanirūpito @tra vidhiḥ /
analyzed: atha putraka tva siddhyai nirūpyate śiva nirūpitaḥ tra vidhiḥ

original: AbhT_16.1b/. yadā tu samayasthasya putrakatve niyojanam /
analyzed: yadā tu samaya sthasya putraka tve niyojanam

original: AbhT_16.1c/. gurutve sādhakatve vā kartumicchati daiśikaḥ // 1
analyzed: guru tve sādhaka tve vā kartum icchati daiśikaḥ

original: AbhT_16.2a/. tadādhivāsaṃ kṛtvāhni dvitīye maṇḍalaṃ likhet /
analyzed: tadā adhivāsam kṛtvā ahni dvitīye maṇḍalam likhet
tathā anyatra yathā uditam
ṣaṣ aṣṭa tad dvi guṇita caturviṃśati saṃkhyayā
cakra pañcakam ākhyātam śāstre śrī pūrva saṃjñite
dvātriṃśat tad dvi guṇitam śrīmat traiśirase mate
tasmāt yathā tathā yāgam yāvat cakreṇa saṃmitam
pūjayet yena tena atra triśūla trayam ālikhet
madhya savya anya bhedena pūrṇam saṃpūjitam bhavet
vartanā maṇḍalasya agre saṃkṣepāt upadekṣyate
ālikhya maṇḍalam gandha vastreṇa eva asya mārjanam

original: AbhT_16.8a/. kṛtvā snāto guruḥ prāgvanmaṇḍalāgre@tra devatāḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā snātaḥ guruḥ prāgvat maṇḍala agre itra devatāḥ
bāhya gāḥ pūjayet dvāra deśe ca dvāradevatāḥ
maṇḍalasya purobhāge tadā aiśāna diśaḥ kramāt
āgneyī antam gaṇeśa ādīn kṣetrapa antān prapūjayet
iti saptakam ākhyātam guru paṅkti vidhau prapūjyam asmad gurubhiḥ

original: AbhT_16.11a/. tata ājñāṃ gṛhītvā tu puṣpadhūpādipūjitam /
analyzed: tatas ājñām gṛhītvā tu puṣpa dhūpa ādi pūjitam
pūjyam ādhāra śakti ādi śūla mūlāt prabhṛti alam

original: AbhT_16.12a/. śivāntaṃ sitapadmānte triśūlānāṃ traye kramāt /
AbhT_16.12b/. madhyaśūle madhyagaḥ syātsadbhāvaḥ parayā saha // 12
analyzed: madhya śūle madhya gaḥ syāt sadbhāvaḥ parayā saha

original: AbhT_16.13a/. vāme cāparayā sākaṃ navātmā dakṣagaṃ param /
analyzed: vāme ca aparayā sākam nava ātmā dakṣa gam param
triśūle dakṣiṇe madhya śṛṅga sthaḥ rati śekharaḥ
syāt parāparayā sākam dakṣe bhairava sat pare

original: AbhT_16.14b/. vāme triśūle madhyastho navātmāparayā saha // 14
analyzed: vāme triśūle madhya sthaḥ nava ātmā aparayā saha

original: AbhT_16.15a/. syātpare parayā sākaṃ vāmāre saṃśca bhairavaḥ /
analyzed: syāt pare parayā sākam vāma are san ca bhairavaḥ

original: AbhT_16.15b/. itthaṃ sarvagatatve śrīparādevyāḥ sthite sati // 15
analyzed: ittham sarva gata tve śrī parā devyāḥ sthite sati
yāgaḥ bhavet su saṃpūrṇaḥ tad adhiṣṭhāna mātrataḥ
eka śūla ipyataḥ yāge cintayet tat adhiṣṭhitam
a vidhi jñaḥ vidhāna jñaḥ iti evam trīśikā uditam

original: AbhT_16.17b/. tato madhye tathā dakṣe vāme śṛṅge ca sarvataḥ // 17
analyzed: tatas madhye tathā dakṣe vāme śṛṅge ca sarvatas
lokapāla astra paryantam eka ātma tvena pūjayet

original: AbhT_16.18b/. paratvena ca sarvāsāṃ devatānāṃ prapūjayet // 18
analyzed: para tvena ca sarvāsām devatānām prapūjayet
śrīmantam mātṛsadbhāva bhaṭṭārakam anāmayam
tatas api bhoga yāgena vidyā aṅgam bhairavāṣṭakam
yāmalam cakra devīḥ ca sva sthāne pūjayet bahis
lokapālān astra yutān gandha puṣpa āsava ādibhiḥ
pūjayet parayā bhaktyā vitta śāṭhya vivarjitaḥ
tatas kumbha astra kalaśī maṇḍala stha anala ātmanām
pañcānām anusandhānam kuryāt advaya bhāvanāt

original: AbhT_16.22b/. ye tu tāmadvayavyāptiṃ na vindanti śivātmikām // 22
analyzed: ye tu tām advaya vyāptim na vindanti śiva ātmikām
mantra nāḍī prayogeṇa te viśanti advaye pathi
sva dakṣiṇena niḥsṛtya maṇḍala sthasya vāmataḥ
praviśya anyena niḥsṛtya kumbha sthe karkarī gate
vahni sthe ca krameṇa ittham yāvat svasmin sva vāmataḥ
mūla anusandhāna balāt prāṇa tantu umbhane sati
ittham aikya sphurat tā ātmā vyāpti saṃvid prakāśate
tatas viśeṣa pūjām ca kuryāt advaya bhāvitām
yat śiva advaya pīyūṣa saṃsiktam paramam hi tat
tena argha puṣpa gandha ādeḥ āsavasya paśoḥ atha

original: AbhT_16.27b/. yā śivādvayatādṛṣṭiḥ sā śuddhiḥ paramīkṛtiḥ // 27
analyzed: yā śiva advaya tā dṛṣṭiḥ sā śuddhiḥ paramīkṛtiḥ
nivedayet vibhoḥ agre jīvān dhātūn tad utthitān
siddhān asiddhān vyāmiśrān yat vā kiṃcid carācaram
dṛṣṭa prokṣita saṃdraṣṭṛ prālabdha upātta yojitaḥ
nirvāpitaḥ vīra paśuḥ saḥ uṣṭadhā uttara tā uttamaḥ
yathottaram na dātavyam ayogyebhyaḥ kadācana

original: AbhT_16.30b/. śivopayuktaṃ hi havirna sarvo bhoktumarhati // 30
analyzed: śiva upayuktam hi haviḥ na sarvaḥ bhoktum arhati
yaḥ tu dīkṣā vihīnaḥ api śiva icchā vidhi coditaḥ

original: AbhT_16.31b/. bhaktyāśnāti sa saṃpūrṇaḥ samayī syātsubhāvitaḥ // 31
analyzed: bhaktyā aśnāti sa saṃpūrṇaḥ samayī syāt su bhāvitaḥ
dṛṣṭa uvalokitaḥ ca eva kiraṇa iddha dṛś arpaṇāt
prokṣitaḥ kevalam hi arghapātra vipruḍbhiḥ ukṣitaḥ
saṃdraṣṭā darśita aśeṣa samyak pūjita maṇḍalaḥ
prālabdhaḥ ukta tritaya saṃskṛtaḥ saḥ api dhūnayet

original: AbhT_16.34a/. kampeta prasravetstabdhaḥ pralīno vā yathottaram /
analyzed: kampeta prasravet stabdhaḥ pralīnaḥ vā yathottaram
upāttaḥ yāga sānnidhye śamitaḥ śastra mārutaiḥ
nirvāpitaḥ kṛta abhyāsa guru prāṇa manaḥ ūrpaṇāt
dakṣiṇena agninā saumya kalā jāla vilāpanāt
tathā hi ādau param rūpam ekībhāvena saṃśrayet
tasmāt āgneya cāreṇa jvālā mālā mucā āviśet
paśoḥ vāmena candra aṃśu jālam tāpena gālayet
viśrāmyet prāṇa raśmi gaṇaiḥ saha

original: AbhT_16.38b/. paro bhūtvā svaśaktyātra jīvaṃ jīvena veṣṭayet // 38
analyzed: paraḥ bhūtvā sva śaktyā atra jīvam jīvena veṣṭayet

original: AbhT_16.39a/. svacitsūryeṇa saṃtāpya drāvayet kalāṃ kalām /

analyzed: tatas drutam kalā jālam prāpayya ekatvam ātmani
unmūlayeta saṃrambhāt karma baddham amum rasāt
tatas unmūlana udveṣṭa yogāt vāmam paribhraman
hṛd karṇikā rūḍhi lābhāt ojaḥ dhātum vilāpitam
śuddha soma ātmakam sāram īṣat lohita pītalam
ādāya kari hasta agra sadṛśe prāṇa vigrahe
niḥsṛtya jhaṭiti sva ātma vāma mārgeṇa saṃviśet
āpyāyayan apāna ākhya candra cakra hṛd ambuje

original: AbhT_16.45a/. sthitaṃ taddevatācakraṃ tena sāreṇa tarpayet /
analyzed: sthitam tat devatā cakram tena sāreṇa tarpayet
anena vidhinā sarvān rasa rakta ādikān tathā
dhātūn samāharet saṃgha kramāt ekaika śotha vā
kevalam tu athavā agni indu ravi saṃghaṭṭa madhya gam
jyotiḥ rūpam atha prāṇa śakti ākhyam jīvam āharet

original: AbhT_16.48a/. tadeva tarpaṇaṃ mukhyaṃ bhogyabhoktrātmataiva sā /
analyzed: tat eva tarpaṇam mukhyam bhogya bhoktṛ ātma tā eva sā
āvṛtti śata yogena paśoḥ nirvāpaṇam bhavet
kṛtvā katipayam kālam tatra abhyāsam ananya dhīḥ

original: AbhT_16.51a/. yathā cintāmaṇau proktaṃ tena rūpeṇa yogavit /
analyzed: yathā cintāmaṇau proktam tena rūpeṇa yoga vid
niḥśaṅkaḥ siddhim āpnoti gopyam tat prāṇa vat sphuṭam

original: AbhT_16.52a/. parokṣe@pi paśāvevaṃ vidhiḥ syādyojanaṃ prati /
analyzed: parokṣe api paśau evam vidhiḥ syāt yojanam prati
praveśitaḥ yāga bhuvi hataḥ tatra eva sādhitaḥ
cakra juṣṭaḥ ca tatra eva sa vīra paśuḥ ucyate
yaḥ tu anyatra api nihataḥ sāmastyena aṃśataḥ pi vā

original: AbhT_16.54a/. devāya vinivedyeta sa vai bāhyapaśurmataḥ /
analyzed: devāya vinivedyeta sa vai bāhya paśuḥ mataḥ

original: AbhT_16.54b/. rājyaṃ lābho@tha tatsthairyaṃ śive bhaktistadātmatā // 54
analyzed: rājyam lābhaḥ utha tad sthairyam śive bhaktiḥ tad ātma tā
tad sāyujyam paśoḥ sāmyāt bāhya ādeḥ vīra dharmaṇaḥ
puṣpa ādayaḥ api tad lābha bhāginaḥ śiva pūjayā

original: AbhT_16.57a/. yāgenaivānugṛhṇāti kiṃ kiṃ yanna carācaram /
analyzed: yāgena eva anugṛhṇāti kim kim yat na carācaram
tena avīraḥ api śaṅkā ādi yuktaḥ kāruṇikaḥ api ca
na hiṃsā buddhim ādadhyāt paśu karmaṇi jātucit
paśoḥ mahā upakāraḥ yam tadātve pi apriyam bhavet
vyādhi cheda auṣadha tapaḥ yojanā atra nidarśanam

original: AbhT_16.59b/. śrīmanmṛtyuñjaye proktaṃ pāśacchede kṛte paśoḥ // 59
analyzed: śrīmat mṛtyuñjaye proktam pāśa chede kṛte paśoḥ
mala traya viyogena śarīram na prarohati
dharma adharma ogha vicchedāt śarīram cyacate kila
tena etat māraṇam na uktam dīkṣā iyam citra rūpiṇī

original: AbhT_16.61b/. rūḍhapāśasya yaḥ prāṇairviyogo māraṇaṃ hi tat // 61
analyzed: rūḍha pāśasya yaḥ prāṇaiḥ viyogaḥ māraṇam hi tat
