original: AbhT_16.62a/. iyaṃ tu yojanaiva syātpaśordevāya tarpaṇe /
analyzed: iyam tu yojanā eva syāt paśoḥ devāya tarpaṇe
tasmāt deva uktim āśritya paśūn dadyāt bahūn iti
niveditaḥ punar prāpta dehaḥ bhūyas niveditaḥ

original: AbhT_16.63b/. ṣaṭkṛtva itthaṃ yaḥ so@tra ṣaḍjanmā paśuruttamaḥ // 63
analyzed: ṣaṣ kṛtvas ittham yaḥ saḥ utra ṣaṣ janmā paśuḥ uttamaḥ

original: AbhT_16.64a/. yathā pākakramācchuddhaṃ hema tadvatsa kīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: yathā pāka kramāt śuddham hema tadvat sa kīrtitaḥ

original: AbhT_16.64b/. kāṃ siddhiṃ naiva vitaretsvayaṃ kiṃvā na mucyate // 64
analyzed: kām siddhim nā eva vitaret svayam kiṃvā na mucyate
uktam tu ānandaśāstre yaḥ mantra saṃskāravān tyajet
samayān kutsayet devīḥ dadyāt mantrān vinā nayāt
dīkṣā mantra ādikam prāpya tyajet putra ādi mohitaḥ
tatas manuṣya tām etya punar evam karoti api
ittham eka ādi sapta anta janmā asau dvividhaḥ dvipāt
catuṣpād vā paśuḥ devī carukā artham prajāyate

original: AbhT_16.68a/. dātrarpito@sau taddvārā yāti sāyujyataḥ śivam /
analyzed: dātṛ arpitā usau tad dvārā yāti sāyujyataḥ śivam

original: AbhT_16.68b/. iti saṃbhāvya citraṃ tatpaśūnāṃ praviceṣṭitam // 68
analyzed: iti saṃbhāvya citram tat paśūnām praviceṣṭitam

original: AbhT_16.69a/. bhogyīcikīrṣitaṃ naiva kuryādanyatra taṃ paśum /
analyzed: bhogyīcikīrṣitam nā eva kuryāt anyatra tam paśum

original: AbhT_16.69b/. nāpi naiṣa bhavedyogya iti buddhvāpasārayet // 69
analyzed: na api na eṣa bhavet yogyaḥ iti buddhvā apasārayet

original: AbhT_16.70a/. taṃ paśuṃ kiṃtu kāṅkṣā cedviśeṣe taṃ tu ḍhaukayet /
analyzed: tam paśum kiṃtu kāṅkṣā ced viśeṣe tam tu ḍhaukayet
tāvataḥ tān paśūn dadyāt tathā ca uktam maheśinā
paśoḥ vapā medasī ca gālite vahni madhyataḥ
arpayet śakti cakrāya paramam tarpaṇam matam
karṇikā kuṇḍalī majja parśu mukhyataram ca vā
tatas agnau tarpaṇam kuryāt mantra cakrasya daiśikaḥ

original: AbhT_16.73b/. tannivedya ca devāya tato vijñāpayetprabhum // 73
analyzed: tat nivedya ca devāya tatas vijñāpayet prabhum
guru tvena tvayā eva aham ājñātaḥ parameśvara
sākṣāt svapna upadeśa ādyaiḥ japaiḥ guru mukhena vā
anugrāhyāḥ tvayā śiṣyāḥ śiva śakti pracoditāḥ
tat ete tadvidhāḥ prāptāḥ tvam ebhyaḥ kuru anugraham
samāveśaya mām sva ātma raśmibhiḥ yat aham śivaḥ
evam bhavatu iti tatas śiva uktim abhinandayet
śiva abhinnam atha ātmānam pañcakṛtya karam smaret
sva ātmanaḥ karaṇam mantrān mūrtim ca anujighṛkṣayā
tatas baddhvā sita uṣṇīṣam hastayoḥ arcayet kramāt
anyonyam pāśa dāhāya śuddha tattva visṛṣṭaye
tejaḥ rūpeṇa mantrān ca śiva haste samarcayet
garbha āvaraṇa gān aṅga parivāra āsana ujjhitān
ātmānam bhāvayet paścāt ekakam jala candra vat
kṛtyā upādhi vaśāt bhinnam ṣoḍhā bhinnam tu vastutas
maṇḍala sthaḥ uham eva ayam sākṣī ca akhila karmaṇām

original: AbhT_16.81b/. śuddhā hi draṣṭṛtā śambhormaṇḍale kalpitā mayā // 81
analyzed: śuddhā hi draṣṭṛ tā śambhoḥ maṇḍale kalpitā mayā
homa adhikaraṇa tvena vahnau aham avasthitaḥ
yad ātma tā iddhāḥ mantrāḥ syuḥ pāśa ploṣa vidhau alam
sāmānya tejaḥ rūpa antara āhūtāḥ bhuvana īśvarāḥ
tarpitāḥ śrāvitāḥ ca aṇoḥ na adhikāram pratanvate

original: AbhT_16.84a/. ā yāgāntamahaṃ kumbhe saṃsthito vighnaśāntaye /
analyzed: ā yāga antam aham kumbhe saṃsthitaḥ vighna śāntaye
sāmānya rūpa tā yena viśeṣa āpyāya kāriṇī
śiṣya dehe ca tad pāśa śithila tva prasiddhaye
sa hi sva icchā vaśāt pāśān vidhunvan iva vartate
sākṣāt sva deha saṃsthaḥ uham kartā anugraha karmaṇām
jñāna kriyā svatantra tvāt dīkṣā karmaṇi peśalaḥ
bhinna kārya ākṛti vrāta indriya cakra anusandhimān

original: AbhT_16.87b/. eko yathāhaṃ vahnyādiṣaḍrūpo@smi tathā sphuṭam // 87
analyzed: ekaḥ yathā aham vahni ādi ṣaṣ rūpaḥ asmi tathā sphuṭam
evam ālocya yena eṣā udhvanā dīkṣām cikīrṣati

original: AbhT_16.88b/. anusaṃhitaye śiṣyavarjaṃ pañcasu taṃ yajet // 88
analyzed: anusaṃhitaye śiṣya varjam pañcasu tam yajet
anusandhi bala ante ca samāsa vyāsa bhedataḥ
kuryāt atyantam abhyastam anya antarbhāva pūritam
tatas api cintayā bhūyas anusandadhyāt śiva ātma tām

original: AbhT_16.90b/. ahameva paraṃ tattvaṃ naca paddhaṭavat kvacit // 90
analyzed: aham eva param tattvam na ca paddhaṭa vat kvacid
mahā prakāśaḥ tat tena mayi sarvam idam jagat
na ca tat kenacid bāhya pratibimba vat arpitam
kartāham asya tat na anya adhīnam ca mad adhiṣṭhitam
mad sama tvam gataḥ jantuḥ muktaḥ iti abhidhīyate
tāpa nirgharṣa seka ādi pāramparyeṇa vahni tām
yathā ayaḥ golakaḥ yāti guruḥ evam śiva ātma tām
tatas puras sthitam yat vā puras bhāvita vigraham

original: AbhT_16.95a/. parokṣadīkṣaṇe yadvā darbhādyaiḥ kalpite mṛte /
analyzed: parokṣa dīkṣaṇe yat vā darbha ādyaiḥ kalpite mṛte
śiṣye vīkṣya arcya puṣpa ādyaiḥ nyaset adhvānam asya tam
yena adhvanā mukhya tayā dīkṣām icchati daiśikaḥ

original: AbhT_16.96b/. taṃ dehe nyasya tatrāntarbhāvyamanyaditi sthitiḥ // 96
analyzed: tam dehe nyasya tatra antar bhāvyam anyat iti sthitiḥ

original: AbhT_16.97a/. śodhyādhvani ca vinyaste tatraiva pariśodhakam /
analyzed: śodhya adhvani ca vinyaste tatra eva pariśodhakam
nyaset yathā īpsitam mantram śodhya aucitya anusārataḥ
kvacid śodhyam tu a vinyasya śodhaka nyāsa mātrataḥ

original: AbhT_16.98b/. svayaṃ śuddhyati saṃśodhyaṃ śodhakasya prabhāvataḥ // 98
analyzed: svayam śuddhi ati saṃśodhyam śodhakasya prabhāvataḥ

original: AbhT_16.99a/. aparaṃ parāparaṃ ca paraṃ ca vidhimicchayā /
analyzed: aparam para aparam ca param ca vidhim icchayā
tad yojana anusāreṇa śritvā nyāsaḥ ṣaḍadhvanaḥ
vasu kha indau dvādaśāntam iti eṣa trividhaḥ vidhiḥ

original: AbhT_16.101a/. krameṇa kathyate dṛṣṭaḥ śāstre śrīpūrvasaṃjñite /
analyzed: krameṇa kathyate dṛṣṭaḥ śāstre śrī pūrva saṃjñite

original: AbhT_16.101b/. tatra tattveṣu vinyāso gulphānte caturaṅgule // 101
analyzed: tatra tattveṣu vinyāsaḥ gulpha ante catur aṅgule

original: AbhT_16.102a/. dharā jalādimūlāntaṃ pratyekaṃ dvyaṅgulaṃ kramāt /
analyzed: dharā jala ādi mūla antam pratyekam dvi aṅgulam kramāt
rasa śruti aṅgulam nābheḥ ūrdhvam ittham ṣaṣ aṅgule

original: AbhT_16.103a/. puṃsaḥ kalāntaṃ ṣaṭtattvīṃ pratyekaṃ tryaṅgule kṣipet /

analyzed: aṣṭādaśa aṅgulam tu evam kaṇṭha kūpa avasānakam
pratyekam iti abdhi vasu saṃkhya mālika deśataḥ
śivatattvam tatas paścāt tejaḥ rūpam an ākulam
sarveṣām vyāpaka tvena sa bāhya abhyantaram smaret
jalāt hi antam sārdha yugmam mūlam tri aṅgulam iti atas
dvādaśa aṅgula tā ādhikyāt vidhiḥ eṣa parāparaḥ

original: AbhT_16.107a/. jalāddhyantaṃ tryaṅgule cedavyaktaṃ tu catuṣṭaye /
analyzed: jalāt hi antam tri aṅgule ced avyaktam tu catuṣṭaye
tad caturviṃśati ādhikyāt paraḥ api aṣṭaśate vidhiḥ
trividha unmānakam vyaktam vasu digbhyaḥ ravi kṣayāt
mayatantre tathā ca uktam tad tad sva phala vāñchayā
nyāsam prakalpayet tāvat tattva antar bhāva cintanāt

original: AbhT_16.110b/. uktaṃ ca triśirastantre svādhārasthaṃ yathāsthitam // 110
analyzed: uktam ca triśiraḥ tantre sva ādhāra stham yathā sthitam
dvādaśa aṅgulam utthānam deha atītam samam tatas

original: AbhT_16.111b/. dvāsaptatirdaśa dve ca dehasthaṃ śiraso@ntataḥ // 111
analyzed: dvāsaptatiḥ daśa dve ca deha stham
pādāt ārabhya suśroṇi anāhata pada avadhi
deha atīte api viśrāntyā saṃvitteḥ kalpanā vaśāt
deha tvam iti tasmāt syāt utthānam dvādaśa aṅgulam
iti nirṇetum atra etat uktam aṣṭa uttaram śatam

original: AbhT_16.114a/. puranyāso@tha gulphāntaṃ bhūḥ purāṇyatra ṣoḍaśa /
analyzed: pura nyāsaḥ utha gulpha antam bhūḥ purāṇi atra ṣoḍaśa
tasmāt eka aṅgula vyāptyā pratyekam lakula āditaḥ
dvis aṇḍa antam tri aṅgulam tu chagala aṇḍam atha abdhiṣu
deva yoga aṣṭake dve hi pratyeka aṅgula pādataḥ
iti pradhāna paryantam ṣaṭcatvāriṃśat aṅgulam
ṣaṭpañcāśat purāṇi ittham prāk dharāyām tu ṣoḍaśa
tatas api ardha aṅgula vyāptyā ṣaṣ purāṇi aṅgula traye

original: AbhT_16.117b/. catvāri yugma ekasminnekaṃ ca puramaṅgule // 117
analyzed: catvāri yugme ekasmin ekam ca puram aṅgule
sa rāge puṃs purāṇi īśa saṃkhyāni ittham ṣaṣ aṅgule
krodha īśa puram ekasmin dvaye ca aṇḍam iyam ca vid
saṃvarta jyotiṣoḥ evam kalā tattva gayoḥ kramāt
śūra pañca anta purayoḥ niyatau ca eka yugma tā
śrī pūrvaśāstre tat ca uktam parameśeṇa śaṃbhunā
asāra tvāt kramasya ādau niyatiḥ paratas kalā
athavā anyonya saṃjñābhyām tattvayoḥ vyapadeśya tā
eka vīra śikhā īśa śrīkaṇṭhāḥ kāle trayaḥ traye
kālasya pūrvam vinyāsaḥ niyateḥ abhidhīyate
athavā anyonya saṃjñābhiḥ vyapadeśaḥ hi dṛśyate
evam pum ādi ṣaṭtattvī vinyastā aṣṭādaśa aṅgule
tatas api aṅguṣṭha mātra antam māyā tattva stham aṣṭakam
pratyekam ardha aṅgulataḥ syāt aṅgula catuṣṭaye
ittham dvi akṣṇi purāṇi aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ puruṣāt niśi
pura trayam dvayoḥ tri aṃśa nyūna aṅgulam iti kramāt
dvayoḥ dvayam pañca purī vaidyīye catur aṅgule
tata aiśa purāṇi aṣṭau

original: AbhT_16.127a/. tatastrīṇi dvaye dve ca dvayoritthaṃ catuṣṭaye /
analyzed: tatas trīṇi dvaye dve ca dvayoḥ ittham catuṣṭaye

original: AbhT_16.127b/. sādāśivaṃ pañcakaṃ syāditthaṃ vasvekakaṃ ravau // 127
analyzed: sādāśivam pañcakam syāt ittham vasu ekakam ravau

original: AbhT_16.128a/. ṣoḍaśakaṃ rasaviśikhaṃ vasudvikaṃ vasuśaśīti puravargāḥ /
analyzed: ṣoḍaśakam rasa viśikham vasu dvikam vasu śaśī iti pura vargāḥ

original: AbhT_16.128b/. vedā rasābdhi yugmākṣi ca ravayastatra cāṅgulāḥ kramaśaḥ // 128
analyzed: vedāḥ rasa abdhi yugma akṣi ca ravayaḥ tatra ca aṅgulāḥ kramaśas
aṣṭādaśa adhika śatam purāṇi caturaśīti mite

original: AbhT_16.129b/. vinyastāni taditthaṃ śeṣe tu vyāpakaṃ śivaṃ tattvam // 129
analyzed: vinyastāni tat ittham śeṣe tu vyāpakam śivam tattvam

original: AbhT_16.130a/. iti vidhiraparaḥ kathitaḥ parāparākhyo rasaśrutisthāne /
analyzed: iti vidhiḥ aparaḥ kathitaḥ parāpara ākhyaḥ rasa śruti sthāne

original: AbhT_16.130b/. aṣṭaśaraṃ saṃkhyānaṃ khamunikṛtaṃ tatpare vidhau jñeyam // 130
analyzed: aṣṭa śaram saṃkhyānam kha muni kṛtam tat pare vidhau jñeyam
lakula ādeḥ yoga aṣṭaka paryantasya atra bhuvana pūgasya
adhikīkuryāt gaṇanā vaśena bhāgam vidhi dvaye kramaśas
apara ādi vidhi traitāt atha nyāsaḥ padādhvanaḥ

original: AbhT_16.132b/. pūrvaṃ daśapadī coktā svatantrā nyasyate yadā // 132
analyzed: pūrvam daśapadī ca uktā svatantrā nyasyate yadā

original: AbhT_16.133a/. tayaiva dīkṣā kāryā cettadeyaṃ nyāsakalpanā /
analyzed: tayā eva dīkṣā kāryā ced tadā iyam nyāsa kalpanā
tattva ādi mukhya tā yogāt dīkṣāyām tu pada āvalī
tad tattva ādi anusāreṇa tatra antar bhāvyate tathā
sva pradhāna tva yoge tu dīkṣāyām pada paddhatim
nyasyet krameṇa tattva ādi vadana an avalokinīm
caturṣu aṣṭāsu ca aṣṭāsu daśasu atha daśasu atha
daśasu atho pañcadaśasu atha veda śara induṣu
dharā padāt navapadīm mātṛkā mālinī gatām

original: AbhT_16.137a/. yojayedvyāptṛ daśamaṃ padaṃ tu śivasaṃjñitam /
analyzed: yojayet vyāptṛ daśamam padam tu śiva saṃjñitam

original: AbhT_16.137b/. dharāpadaṃ varjayitvā pañca yāni padāni tu // 137
analyzed: dharā padam varjayitvā pañca yāni padāni tu
vidhi dvayam syāt nikṣipya dvādaśa dvādaśa aṅgulān
mantrādhvanaḥ upi eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ vinyāsa yojane

original: AbhT_16.139a/. vyāptimātraṃ hi bhidyetetyuktaṃ prāgeva tattathā /
analyzed: vyāpti mātram hi bhidyeta iti uktam prāk eva tat tathā
varṇādhvanaḥ atha vinyāsaḥ kathyate itra vidhi traye

original: AbhT_16.140a/. ekaṃ caturṣu pratyekaṃ dvayoraṅgulayoḥ kramāt /
analyzed: ekam caturṣu pratyekam dvayoḥ aṅgulayoḥ kramāt
trayoviṃśati varṇī syāt ṣaṣ varṇī ekaikaśas triṣu
pratyekam atha catvāraḥ caturṣu iti vilomataḥ
varjayitvā adya varṇam tu tattva vat syāt ravīt navīn
tām trayoviṃśatau varṇeṣu api anyat syāt vidhi dvayam
śrī pūrvaśāstre tena ādau tattveṣu uktam vidhi trayam
atidiṣṭam tu tad bhinna abhinna varṇa dvaye samam

original: AbhT_16.144a/. dvividho@pi hi varṇānāṃ ṣaḍvidho bheda ucyate /
analyzed: dvividhaḥ api hi varṇānām ṣaḍvidhaḥ bhedaḥ ucyate
tattva mārga vidhānena jñātavyaḥ paramārthataḥ
upadeśa atideśābhyām yat uktam tad pada ādiṣu
bhūyas utidiṣṭam tatra eva śāstre smat hṛdayeśvare
pada mantra kalā ādīnām pūrva sūtra anusārataḥ
tritaya tvam prakurvīta tattva varṇa ukta vartmanā
uktam tat pada mantreṣu kalāsu atha nirūpyate
caturṣu rasa vede dvāviṃśatau dvādaśasu atha
nivṛttya ādyāḥ catasraḥ syuḥ vyāptrī syāt śānti atītikā

original: AbhT_16.148b/. dvitīyasyāṃ kalāyāṃ tu dvādaśa dvādaśāṅgulān // 148
analyzed: dvitīyasyām kalāyām tu dvādaśa dvādaśa aṅgulān
kramāt kṣiptvā vidhi dvaitam parāpara para ātmakam
catur aṇḍa vidhiḥ tu ādi śabdena iha pragṛhyate
kalā catuṣka vat tena tasmin vācyam vidhi trayam
evam ṣaḍvidham adhvānam śodhya śiṣya tanau purā
nyasya ekatama mukhya tvāt nyasyet śodhaka saṃmatam
adhvani āsana mantra oghaḥ śodhakaḥ hi ekaḥ āditas
śabdarāśiḥ mālinī ca samasta vyastataḥ dvidhā
eka vīra tayā yat vā ṣaṭkam yāmala yogataḥ
pañca vaktrī śakti tadvat bhedāt ṣoḍhā punar dvidhā
ekāki yāmala tvena iti evam sā dvādaśa ātmikā
ṣaṣ aṅgī sakala anya tvāt dvividhā vaktra vat punar
dvādaśa tvena guṇitā caturviṃśati bhedikā

original: AbhT_16.155a/. aghorādyaṣṭake dve ca tṛtīyaṃ yāmalodayāt /
analyzed: aghora ādi aṣṭake dve ca tṛtīyam yāmala udayāt
mātṛsadbhāva mantraḥ ca kevalaḥ śruti cakra gaḥ
eka dvi tri catur bhedāt trayodaśa bhidā ātmakaḥ
eka vīra tayā saḥ ayam caturdaśa tayā sthitaḥ
devatābhiḥ nijābhiḥ tat mātṛsadbhāva vṛṃhitam

original: AbhT_16.158a/. itthaṃ śodhakavargo@yaṃ mantrāṇāṃ saptatiḥ smṛtā /
analyzed: ittham śodhaka vargaḥ iyam mantrāṇām saptatiḥ smṛtā
ṣaṣ ardha śāstreṣu śrīmat sāraśāstre ca kathyate
aghora ādi aṣṭakena iha śodhanīyam vipaścitā
athavā eka akṣarā mantraiḥ athavā mātṛkā kramāt
bhairaveṇa mahādevi tu atha vaktra aṅga pañcakaiḥ

original: AbhT_16.161a/. yena yena hi mantreṇa tantre@sminnudbhavaḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yena yena hi mantreṇa tantre smin udbhavaḥ kṛtaḥ
tena eva dīkṣayet mantrī iti ājñā pārameśvarī

original: AbhT_16.162a/. evaṃ śodhakabhedena saptatiḥ kīrtitā bhidaḥ /
analyzed: evam śodhaka bhedena saptatiḥ kīrtitā bhidaḥ

original: AbhT_16.162b/. śodhyanyāsaṃ vinā mantrairetairdīkṣā yadā bhavet // 162
analyzed: śodhya nyāsam vinā mantraiḥ etaiḥ dīkṣā yadā bhavet
tadā saptatidhā jñeyā janana ādi vivarjitā
śodhya bhedaḥ atha vaktavyaḥ saṃkṣepāt saḥ api kathyate
eka tri pañca ṣaṭtriṃśat bhedāt tāttvaḥ caturvidhaḥ
pañca eka bhedāt ca adhvānaḥ tathā eva aṇḍa catuṣṭayam

original: AbhT_16.165a/. evaṃ daśavidhaṃ śodhyaṃ triṃśaddhā tadvidhitrayāt /
analyzed: evam daśavidham śodhyam triṃśaddhā tad vidhi trayāt
śodhya śodhaka bhedena śatāni tu ekaviṃśatiḥ
atrā api nyāsa yogena śodhya idhvani tathā ākṛteḥ
śata ekaviṃśati bhidā janana ādi ujjhitā bhavet
janana ādi mayī tāvatī evam śata dṛśi śrutiḥ
syāt saptati adhikā sā api dravya vijñāna bhedataḥ
dvidhā iti pañcāśītiḥ syāt śatāni adhika kha abdhikā
bhoga mokṣa anusandhānāt dvividhā sā prakīrtitā
aśubhasya eva saṃśuddhyā śubhasya api atha śodhanāt

original: AbhT_16.169b/. dvidhā bhogaḥ śubhe śuddhiḥ kālatrayavibhedini // 169
analyzed: dvidhā bhogaḥ śubhe śuddhiḥ kāla traya vibhedini
eka dvi sāmastya vaśāt saptadhā iti aṣṭadhā bhujiḥ
guru śiṣya kramāt saḥ api dvidhā iti evam vibhidyate
pratyakṣa dīkṣaṇe yasmāt dvayoḥ eka anusandhitaḥ

original: AbhT_16.171b/. tādṛgdīkṣāphalaṃ pūrṇaṃ visaṃvāde tu viplavaḥ // 171
analyzed: tādṛś dīkṣā phalam pūrṇam visaṃvāde tu viplavaḥ
parokṣa mṛta dīkṣā ādau guruḥ eva anusandhimān

original: AbhT_16.172b/. kriyājñānamahimnā taṃ śiṣyaṃ dhāmnīpsite nayet // 172
analyzed: kriyā jñāna mahimnā tam śiṣyam dhāmni īpsite nayet

original: AbhT_16.173a/. avibhinne kriyājñāne karmaśuddhau tathaiva te /
analyzed: a vibhinne kriyā jñāne karma śuddhau tathā eva te
anusandhiḥ punar bhinnaḥ karma yasmāt tad ātmakam
śrīmat svacchandaśāstre ca vāsanā bhedataḥ phalam
śiṣyāṇām ca guroḥ ca uktam abhinne api kriyā ādike
bhogasya śodhakāt śodhyāt anusandheḥ ca tādṛśāt
vaicitryam asti bhedasya vaicitrya prāṇa tā yatas
tathā hi vaktraiḥ yasya adhvā śuddhaḥ taiḥ eva yojitaḥ

original: AbhT_16.176b/. bhoktumiṣṭe kvacittattve sa bhoktā tadbalānvitaḥ // 176
analyzed: bhoktum iṣṭe kvacid tattve sa bhoktā tad bala anvitaḥ

original: AbhT_16.177a/. śubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ cātra sadbhāve bhogacitratā /
analyzed: śubhānām karmaṇām ca atra sadbhāve bhoga citra tā
tādṛś eva bhavet karma śuddhau tu anyā eva citra tā
bhogaḥ ca sadya autkrāntyā dehena eva atha saṃgataḥ

original: AbhT_16.178b/. tadaivābhyāsato vāpi dehānte vetyasau catuḥ // 178
analyzed: tadā eva abhyāsataḥ vā api dehānte vā iti asau catuḥ
prāktana aṣṭa bhidā yogāt dvātriṃśat bhedaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_16.179b/. mokṣa eko@pi bījasya samayākhyasya tādṛśam // 179
analyzed: mokṣaḥ ekaḥ api bījasya samaya ākhyasya tādṛśam

original: AbhT_16.180b/. vṛddhaṃ voddiśya śaktaṃ vā śodhanāśodhanāddvidhā // 180
analyzed: vṛddham vā uddiśya śaktam vā śodhana a śodhanāt dvidhā
sadyas autkrāntitaḥ traidham sā ca āsanna mṛtau guroḥ
kāryā iti ājñā maheśasya śrīmat gahvara bhāṣitā

original: AbhT_16.182a/. dṛṣṭvā śiṣyaṃ jarāgrastaṃ vyādhinā paripīḍitam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā śiṣyam jarā grastam vyādhinā paripīḍitam
utkramayya tatas tu enam para tattve niyojayet
pañcatriṃśat amī bhedāḥ guroḥ vā guru śiṣyayoḥ
ukta dvaividhya kalanāt saptatiḥ parikīrtitāḥ
etaiḥ bhedaiḥ purā uktān tān bhedān dīkṣā gatān guruḥ
hatvā vadet prasaṃkhyānam su abhyasta jñāna siddhaye
pañcāśītiśatī yā catvāriṃśat sam uttarā kathitā

original: AbhT_16.185b/. tāṃ saptatyā bhittvā dīkṣābhedānsvayaṃ kalayet // 185
analyzed: tām saptatyā bhittvā dīkṣā bhedān svayam kalayet

original: AbhT_16.186a/. pañcakamiha lakṣāṇāṃ ca saptanavatiḥ sahasraparisaṃkhyā /
analyzed: pañcakam iha lakṣāṇām ca saptanavatiḥ sahasra parisaṃkhyā
aṣṭau śatāni dīkṣā bhedaḥ yam mālinītantre
saptatidhā śoddhṛ gaṇaḥ triṃśaddhā śodhyaḥ eka tattva ādiḥ
sa aṇḍaḥ ṣaḍadhva rūpaḥ tathā iti kartavya tā catur bhedā
dravya jñāna mayī sā janana ādi vivarjitā atha tad yuktā
pañcatriṃśaddhā punar eṣā bhoga apavarga sandhānāt
yasmāt dvātriṃśaddhā bhogaḥ śubha śuddhi aśuddhi kāla bhidā
mokṣaḥ tredhā dviguṇā saptatiḥ iti kārya tā bhedāḥ
śodhana śodhya vibhedāt iti kartavya tva bhedataḥ ca eṣā

original: AbhT_16.190b/. dīkṣā bahudhā bhinnā śodhyavihīnā tu saptatidhā // 190
analyzed: dīkṣā bahudhā bhinnā śodhya vihīnā tu saptatidhā
ca tattva ādeḥ pañcadaśa ādi ukta bheda parigaṇanāt

original: AbhT_16.192a/. bhedānāṃ parigaṇanā na śakyate kartumityasaṃkīrṇāḥ /
analyzed: bhedānām parigaṇanā na śakyate kartum iti asaṃkīrṇāḥ

original: AbhT_16.192b/. bhedāḥ saṃkīrṇāḥ punaranye bhūyastvakāriṇo bahudhā // 192
analyzed: bhedāḥ saṃkīrṇāḥ punar anye bhūyastva kāriṇaḥ bahudhā
śodhaka śodhya ādīnām dvitra ādi vibheda sadbhāvāt

original: AbhT_16.193b/. bhoge sādhye yadyadbahu kartavyaṃ tadāśrayenmatimān // 193
analyzed: bhoge sādhye yat yat bahu kartavyam tat āśrayet matimān

original: AbhT_16.194a/. kāraṇabhūyastvaṃ kila phalabhūyastvāya kiṃ citram /
analyzed: kāraṇa bhūyaḥ tvam kila phala bhūyaḥ tvāya kim citram
apavarge na tu bhedaḥ tena asmin vāsanā dṛḍha tva juṣā
alpā api āśrayaṇīyā kriyā atha vijñāna mātre vā

original: AbhT_16.195b/. abhinavaguptaguruḥ punarāha hi sati vittadeśakālādau // 195
analyzed: abhinavagupta guruḥ punar āha hi sati vitta deśa kāla ādau
apavarge api hi vistīrṇa karma vijñāna saṃgrahaḥ kāryaḥ
cit vṛtteḥ vaicitryāt cāñcalye api krameṇa sandhānāt
tasmin tasmin vastuni rūḍhiḥ avaśyam śiva ātmikā bhavati
tattvam idam etat ātmakam etasmāt proddhṛtaḥ mayā śiṣyaḥ

original: AbhT_16.198a/. itthaṃ kramasaṃvittau mūḍho@pi śivātmako bhavati /
analyzed: ittham krama saṃvittau mūḍhaḥ api śiva ātmakaḥ bhavati
kramika tathāvidha śiva tā anugraha subhagam ca daiśikam paśyan
śiśuḥ api tad abheda dṛśā bhakti balāt ca abhyupaiti śiva bhāvam

original: AbhT_16.199b/. yadyapi vikalpavṛtterapi mokṣaṃ dīkṣayaiva dehānte // 199
analyzed: yadi api vikalpa vṛtteḥ api mokṣam dīkṣayā eva dehānte

original: AbhT_16.200a/. śāstre provāca vibhustathāpi dṛḍhavāsanā yuktā /
analyzed: śāstre provāca vibhuḥ tathā api dṛḍha vāsanā yuktā
mokṣe api asti viśeṣaḥ kriyā alpa bhūyaḥ tva jaḥ sa loka ādiḥ

original: AbhT_16.201a/. iti kecittadayuktaṃ sa vicitro bhoga eva kathitaḥ syāt /
analyzed: iti kecid tat ayuktam sa vicitraḥ bhogaḥ eva kathitaḥ syāt
saṃskāra śeṣa vartana jīvita madhye sya samaya lopa ādyam
na āyāti vighna jālam kriyā bahu tvam mumukṣoḥ tat
yasmāt sa bīja dīkṣā saṃskṛta puruṣasya samaya lopa ādye
bhukte bhogāt mokṣaḥ na evam nirbīja dīkṣāyām

original: AbhT_16.203b/. iti kecinmanyante yuktaṃ taccāpi yatsmṛtaṃ śāstre // 203
analyzed: iti kecid manyante yuktam tat ca api yat smṛtam śāstre
samaya ullaṅghanāt devi kravyāda tvam śatam samāḥ
tasmāt uru śiṣya matau śiva bhāva nirūḍhi vitaraṇa samartham

original: AbhT_16.205b/. kramikaṃ tattvoddharaṇādi karma mokṣe@pi yuktamativitatam // 205
analyzed: kramikam tattva uddharaṇa ādi karma mokṣe api yuktam ati vitatam

original: AbhT_16.206a/. yastu sadā bhāvanayā svabhyastajñānavānguruḥ sa śiśoḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu sadā bhāvanayā su abhyasta jñānavān guruḥ sa śiśoḥ
apavargāya yatheccham yam kaṃcid upāyam anutiṣṭhet

original: AbhT_16.207a/. evaṃ śiṣyatanau śodhyaṃ nyasyādhvānaṃ yathepsitam /
analyzed: evam śiṣya tanau śodhyam nyasya adhvānam yathā īpsitam
śodhakam mantram upari nyasyet tattva anusārataḥ
dvayoḥ mātṛkayoḥ tattva sthityā varṇa kramaḥ purā
kathitaḥ tam tathā nyasyet tad tad tattva viśuddhaye

original: AbhT_16.209a/. varṇādhvā yadyapi proktaḥ śodhyaḥ pāśātmakastu saḥ /
analyzed: varṇādhvā yadi api proktaḥ śodhyaḥ pāśa ātmakaḥ tu saḥ
māyīyaḥ śodhakaḥ tu anyaḥ śiva ātmā para vāc mayaḥ

original: AbhT_16.210a/. uvāca sadyojyotiśca vṛttau svāyambhuvasya tat /
analyzed: uvāca sadyojyotiḥ ca vṛttau svāyambhuvasya tat

original: AbhT_16.210b/. bāḍhameko hi pāśātmā śabdo@nyaśca śivātmakaḥ // 210
analyzed: bāḍham ekaḥ hi pāśa ātmā śabdaḥ nyaḥ ca śiva ātmakaḥ
tasmāt tasya eva varṇasya yuktā śodhaka śodhya tā

original: AbhT_16.211b/. śrīpūrvaśāstre cāpyuktaṃ te tairāliṅgitā iti // 211
analyzed: śrī pūrvaśāstre ca api uktam te taiḥ āliṅgitāḥ iti
sadyojāta ādi vaktrāṇi hṛd ādi aṅgāni pañca ca
parāparāyāḥ vailomyāt dharāyām syāt pada trayam
tatas jalāt ahaṅkāre pañca aṣṭaka samāśrayāt

original: AbhT_16.214a/. padāni pañca dhīmūlapuṃrāgākhye traye trayam /
analyzed: padāni pañca dhī mūla puṃrāga ākhye traye trayam
ekam tu aśuddha vid kāla dvaye ca ekam niyāmake
kalā māyā dvaye ca ekam padam uktam iha kramāt
ekonaviṃśatiḥ sā iyam padānām syāt parāparā

original: AbhT_16.216b/. sārdhaṃ caikaṃ caikaṃ sārdhaṃ dve dve śaśī dṛgatha yugmam // 216
analyzed: sārdham ca ekam ca ekam sārdham dve dve śaśī dṛś atha yugmam

original: AbhT_16.217a/. trāṇi dṛgabdhiścandraḥ śrutiḥ śaśī pañca vidhumahaścandrāḥ /
analyzed: trāṇi dṛś abdhiḥ candraḥ śrutiḥ śaśī pañca vidhu mahaḥ candrāḥ
eka anna viṃśatau syāt akṣara saṃkhyā padeṣu iyam devyāḥ
ha l dvaya yuta vasu citragu parisaṃkhyāta sva varṇāyāḥ
mūla antam sārdha varṇam syāt māyā antam varṇam ekakam
śakti antam ekam aparā nyāse vidhiḥ udīritaḥ

original: AbhT_16.219b/. māyāntaṃ haltataḥ śaktiparyante svara ucyate // 219
analyzed: māyā antam ha l tatas śakti paryante svaraḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_16.220a/. niṣkale śivatattve vai paro nyāsaḥ paroditaḥ /
analyzed: niṣkale śivatattve vai paraḥ nyāsaḥ para uditaḥ
parāparā padāni eva hi aghorī ādi aṣṭaka dvaye
mantrāḥ tad anusāreṇa tattveṣu etat dvayam kṣipet
piṇḍa akṣarāṇām sarveṣām varṇa saṃkhyā vibhedataḥ

original: AbhT_16.222a/. avyaktāntaṃ svare nyasyā śeṣaṃ śeṣeṣu yojayet /
analyzed: avyakta antam svare nyasya ā śeṣam śeṣeṣu yojayet
bījāni sarva tattveṣu vyāptṛ tvena prakalpayet
piṇḍānām bīja vat nyāsam anye tu pratipedire

original: AbhT_16.223b/. akṛte vātha śodhyasya nyāse vastubalāt sthiteḥ // 223
analyzed: a kṛte vā atha śodhyasya nyāse vastu balāt sthiteḥ
śodhaka nyāsa mātreṇa sarvam śodhyam viśudhyati
śrīmat mṛtyuñjaya ādau ca kathitam parameṣṭhinā
adhunā nyāsa mātreṇa bhūtaśuddhiḥ prajāyate
deha śuddhi artham api etat tulyam etena vastutas
anya prakaraṇa uktam yat yuktam prakaraṇa antare

original: AbhT_16.226b/. jñāpakatvena sākṣādvā tatkiṃ nānyatra gṛhyate // 226
analyzed: jñāpaka tvena sākṣāt vā tat kim na anyatra gṛhyate
mālinī mātṛkā aṅgasya nyāsaḥ yā ṛcā vidhau purā

original: AbhT_16.227b/. proktaḥ kevalasaṃśoddhṛmantranyāse sa eva tu // 227
analyzed: proktaḥ kevala saṃśoddhṛ mantra nyāse saḥ eva tu
tripadī dvayoḥ dvayoḥ syāt pratyekam atha aṣṭasu śruti padāni
diś candra candra rasa ravi śara śara dṛś dṛś mṛgāṅka śaśi gaṇane

original: AbhT_16.229a/. aṅgulamāne devyā aṣṭādaśa vaibhavena padamanyat /
analyzed: aṅgula māne devyāḥ aṣṭādaśa vaibhavena padam anyat
aparam mānam idam syāt kevala śodhaka manu nyāse
dvādaśakam dvādaśakam tattva upari pūrvavat tu anyat
kevala śodhaka mantra nyāsa abhiprāyataḥ mahādevaḥ
tattva krama uditam api nyāsam punar āha tad viruddham api

original: AbhT_16.232a/. niṣkale padamekārṇaṃ yāvattrīṇi tu pārthive /
analyzed: niṣkale padam eka arṇam yāvat trīṇi tu pārthive
punar ca mālinītantre varga vidyā vibhedataḥ
dvidhā padāni iti uktvā ākhyat nyāsam anyādṛśam vibhuḥ

original: AbhT_16.234a/. ekaikaṃ dvyaṅgulaṃ jñeyaṃ tatra pūrvaṃ padatrayam /

analyzed: aṣṭa aṅgulāni catvāri daśa aṅgulam atas param

original: AbhT_16.235a/. dvyaṅgule dve pade cānye ṣaḍaṅgulamataḥ param /
analyzed: dvi aṅgule dve pade ca anye ṣaṣ aṅgulam atas param
dvādaśa aṅgulam anyat ca dvenye pañca aṅgule pṛthak

original: AbhT_16.236a/. padadvayaṃ catuṣparva tathānye dve dviparvaṇī /
analyzed: pada dvayam catuṣparva tathā anye dve dvi parvaṇī

original: AbhT_16.236b/. evaṃ parāparādevyāḥ svatantro nyāsa ucyate // 236
analyzed: evam parāparā devyāḥ svatantraḥ nyāsaḥ ucyate
eva yojayet

original: AbhT_16.237b/. iti darśayituṃ nāsya pṛthaṅnyāsaṃ nyarūpayat // 237
analyzed: iti darśayitum na asya pṛthak nyāsam nyarūpayat
evam śodhaka mantrasya nyāse tad raśmi yogataḥ
pāśa jālam vilīyeta tad dhyāna balataḥ guroḥ
śodhya tattve samastānām yonīnām tulya kālataḥ
jananāt bhogataḥ karma kṣaye syāt apavṛkta tā
dehaiḥ tāvadbhiḥ asya aṇoḥ citram bhoktuḥ api sphuṭam
manaḥ nusandhiḥ na u viśva saṃyoga pravibhāgavat

original: AbhT_16.241a/. niyatyā manaso dehamātre vṛttistataḥ param /
analyzed: niyatyā manasaḥ deha mātre vṛttiḥ tatas param
na anusandhā yatas sā eka svānta yukta akṣa kalpitā

original: AbhT_16.242a/. pradeśavṛtti ca jñānamātmanastatra tatra tat /
analyzed: pradeśa vṛtti ca jñānam ātmanaḥ tatra tatra tat
bhogya jñānam na anya deheṣu anusandhānam arhati

original: AbhT_16.243a/. yadā tu manasastasya dehavṛtterapi dhruvam /
analyzed: yadā tu manasaḥ tasya deha vṛtteḥ api dhruvam
yoga mantra kriyā ādeḥ syāt vaimalyam tad vidā tadā
yathāmalam manaḥ dūra sthitam api āśu paśyati
tathā pratyaya dīkṣāyām tad tad bhuvana darśanam

original: AbhT_16.245a/. jananādiviyuktāṃ tu yadā dīkṣāṃ cikīrṣati /
analyzed: janana ādi viyuktām tu yadā dīkṣām cikīrṣati
tadā asmāt uddharāmi iti yuktam ūha prakalpanam

original: AbhT_16.246a/. yadā śodhyaṃ vinā śoddhṛnyāsastatrāpi mantrataḥ /
analyzed: yadā śodhyam vinā śoddhṛ nyāsaḥ tatra api mantrataḥ
janana ādi kramam kuryāt tattva saṃśleṣa varjitam
ekāki śoddhṛ nyāse ca janana ādi vivarjane
tat śoddhṛ saṃpuṭam nāma kevalam parikalpayet
dravya yogena dīkṣāyām tila ājya akṣata taṇḍulam
tad tad mantreṇa juhuyāt janma yoga viyogayoḥ

original: AbhT_16.249a/. yadā vijñānadīkṣāṃ tu kuryācchiṣyaṃ tadā bhṛśam /
analyzed: yadā vijñāna dīkṣām tu kuryāt śiṣyam tadā bhṛśam
tad mantra saṃjalpa balāt ca avikalpakāt

original: AbhT_16.250a/. vikalpaḥ kila saṃjalpamayo yatsa vimarśakaḥ /
analyzed: vikalpaḥ kila saṃjalpa mayaḥ yat sa vimarśakaḥ
mantra ātmā asau vimarśaḥ ca śuddha upāśavatā ātmakaḥ
nityaḥ ca anādi vara da śiva abheda upakalpitaḥ
tad yogāt daiśikasya api vikalpaḥ śiva tām vrajet
śrī sāraśāstre tat idam parameśena bhāṣitam
arthasya pratipattiḥ yā grāhya grāhaka rūpiṇī

original: AbhT_16.253a/. sā eva mantraśaktistu vitatā mantrasantatau /
analyzed: sā eva mantra śaktiḥ tu vitatā mantra santatau
parāmarśa svabhāvā ittham mantra śaktiḥ udāhṛtā
uktam śrī pauṣkare nye ca brahma viṣṇu ādayaḥ uṇḍa gāḥ
prādhānikāḥ sāñjanāḥ te sāttva rājasa tāmasāḥ
taiḥ aśuddha parāmarśāt tanmayībhāvitaḥ guruḥ

original: AbhT_16.256a/. vaiṣṇavādiḥ paśuḥ prokto na yogyaḥ patiśāsane /
analyzed: vaiṣṇava ādiḥ paśuḥ proktaḥ na yogyaḥ pati śāsane
ye mantrāḥ śuddha mārga sthāḥ śiva bhaṭṭāraka ādayaḥ

original: AbhT_16.257a/. śrīmanmataṅgādidṛśā tanmayo hi guruḥ śivaḥ /
analyzed: śrīmat mataṅga ādi dṛśā tad mayaḥ hi guruḥ śivaḥ
nanu svatantra saṃjalpa yogāt astu vimarśi tā

original: AbhT_16.258a/. prākkutaḥ sa vimarśāccetkutaḥ so@pi nirūpaṇe /
analyzed: prāk kutas sa vimarśāt ced kutas saḥ api nirūpaṇe
ādyaḥ tathā avikalpa tva pradaḥ syāt upadeṣṭṛtaḥ
yaḥ saṃkrāntaḥ abhijalpaḥ syāt tasya api anya upadeṣṭṛtaḥ
pūrva pūrva kramāt ittham yaḥ eva ādi guroḥ purā
saṃjalpaḥ hi abhisaṃkrāntaḥ saḥ udyāpī asti iti gṛhyatām
yaḥ tathāvidha saṃjalpa balāt kopi svatantrakaḥ

original: AbhT_16.261a/. vimarśaḥ kalpyate so@pi tadātmaiva suniścitaḥ /
analyzed: vimarśaḥ kalpyate saḥ api tad ātmā eva su niścitaḥ

original: AbhT_16.261b/. ghaṭakumbha itītthaṃ vā yadi bhedo nirūpyate // 261
analyzed: ghaṭa kumbhaḥ iti ittham vā yadi bhedaḥ nirūpyate
saḥ upi anya kalpanā dāyī hi an ādṛtyaḥ prayatnataḥ
paṇāyate karoti iti vikalpasya ucitau sphuṭam

original: AbhT_16.263a/. karapāṇyabhijalpau tau saṃkīryetāṃ kathaṃ kila /
analyzed: kara pāṇi abhijalpau tau saṃkīryetām katham kila
śabdāt śabda antare tena vyutpattiḥ vyavadhānataḥ
vyavahārāt tu sā sākṣāt citra upākhyā vimarśinī
yāvat bālasya saṃvittiḥ akṛtrima vimarśane
tena tad mantra śabda artha viśeṣa uttham vikalpanam
śabda antara utthāt bhedena paśyatā mantraḥ ādṛtaḥ
yat ca api bīja piṇḍa ādeḥ uktam prāk bodha rūpakam
tat tasya eva kutas nyasya tat kasmāt anya kalpanā

original: AbhT_16.267b/. etadarthaṃ guroryatnāllakṣaṇe tatra tatra tat // 267
analyzed: etad artham guroḥ yatnāt lakṣaṇe tatra tatra tat
lakṣaṇam kathitam hi eṣa mantra tantra viśāradaḥ
tena mantra artha saṃbodhe mantra vārtikam ādarāt
ūha apoha prayogam vā sarvathā guruḥ ācaret
mantra artha vid abhāve tu sarvathā mantra tad mayam
gurum kuryāt tad abhyāsāt tad saṃkalpa mayaḥ hi asau
tad samāna abhisaṃjalpaḥ yadā mantra artha bhāvanāt

original: AbhT_16.271a/. gurorbhavettadā sarvasāmye ko bheda ucyatām /
analyzed: guroḥ bhavet tadā sarva sāmye kaḥ bhedaḥ ucyatām

original: AbhT_16.271b/. aṃśenāpyatha vaiṣamye na tato@rthakriyā hi sā // 271
analyzed: aṃśena api atha vaiṣamye na tatas ṛthakriyā hi sā

original: AbhT_16.272a/. gomayātkīṭataḥ kīṭa ityevaṃ nyāyato yadā /
analyzed: gomayāt kīṭataḥ kīṭaḥ iti evam nyāyataḥ yadā
saṃjalpa antarataḥ api artha kriyām tām eva paśyati

original: AbhT_16.273a/. tadaiṣa satyasaṃjalpaḥ śiva eveti kathyate /
analyzed: tadā eṣa satya saṃjalpaḥ śivaḥ eva iti kathyate

original: AbhT_16.273b/. sa yadvakti tadeva syānmantro bhogāpavargadaḥ // 273
analyzed: sa yat vakti tat eva syāt mantraḥ bhoga apavarga daḥ
na aiṣobhinavaguptasya pakṣaḥ mantra arpita ātmanaḥ
yaḥ ṛthakriyām āha bhinnām kīṭayoḥ api tādṛśoḥ
mantra arpita manāḥ kiṃcid vat anyat tu viṣam haret

original: AbhT_16.275b/. tanmantra eva śabdaḥ sa paraṃ tatra ghaṭādivat // 275
analyzed: tad mantraḥ eva śabdaḥ sa param tatra ghaṭa ādi vat
tad saṃskṛtaḥ api anyat eṣa kurvan sva ātmani tṛpyati
tathā tad mantra saṃjalpa bhāvitaḥ anyat api bruvan
anicchuḥ api tad rūpaḥ tathā kārya karaḥ dhruvam
vikalpayan api eka artham yatas nyat api paśyati
viṣa apahāri mantra ādi iti uktam śrī pūrva śāsane
yadi vā viṣa nāśe pi hetu bhedāt vicitra tā
dhātu āpyāya ādikān anta kārya bhedāt bhaviṣyati
tat evam mantra saṃjalpa vikalpa abhyāsa yogataḥ
bhāvya vastu sphuṭībhāvaḥ saṃjalpa hrāsa yogataḥ

original: AbhT_16.281a/. vastveva bhāvayatyeṣa na saṃjalpamimaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: vastu eva bhāvayati eṣa na saṃjalpam imam punar

original: AbhT_16.281b/. gṛhṇāti bhāsanopāyaṃ bhāte tatra tu tena kim // 281
analyzed: gṛhṇāti bhāsana upāyam bhāte tatra tu tena kim
evam saṃjalpa nirhrāse su parisphuṭatā ātmakam
sphuret vastu avikalpakam

original: AbhT_16.283a/. nirvikalpā ca sā saṃvidyadyathā paśyati sphuṭam /
analyzed: nirvikalpā ca sā saṃvid yat yathā paśyati sphuṭam
tat tathā eva tathā ātma tvāt vastunā api bahis sthiteḥ
viśeṣataḥ tu a māyīya śiva tā bheda śālinaḥ

original: AbhT_16.284b/. mokṣe@bhyupāyaḥ saṃjalpo bandhamokṣau tataḥ kila // 284

analyzed: vikalpe api guroḥ samyak abhinna śiva tā juṣaḥ
avikalpaka paryanta pratīkṣā na upayujyate

original: AbhT_16.286a/. tadvimarśasvabhāvā hi sā vācyā mantradevatā /
analyzed: tad vimarśa svabhāvā hi sā vācyā mantradevatā
mahā saṃvid samāsannā iti uktam śrī gamaśāsane
nikaṭa sthāḥ yathā rājñām anyeṣām sādhayanti alam

original: AbhT_16.287b/. siddhiṃ rājopagāṃ śīghramevaṃ mantrādayaḥ parām // 287
analyzed: siddhim rāja upagām śīghram evam mantra ādayaḥ parām
ukta abhiprāya garbham tat uktam śrī mālinīmate

original: AbhT_16.288b/. mantrāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kasmādityukte munibhiḥ kila // 288
analyzed: mantrāṇām lakṣaṇam kasmāt iti ukte munibhiḥ kila
yogam eka tvam icchanti vastunaḥ unyena vastunā
tat vastu jñeyam iti uktam heya tva ādi prasiddhaye
tad prasiddhyai śivena uktam jñānam yat upavarṇitam
sa bīja yoga saṃsiddhyai mantra lakṣaṇam api alam

original: AbhT_16.291a/. na cādhikāritā dīkṣāṃ vinā yoge@sti śāṅkare /
analyzed: na ca adhikāri tā dīkṣām vinā yoga īsti śāṅkare

original: AbhT_16.291b/. kriyājñānavibhedena sā ca dvedhā nigadyate // 291
analyzed: kriyā jñāna vibhedena sā ca dvedhā nigadyate

original: AbhT_16.292a/. dvividhā sā prakartavyā tena caitadudāhṛtam /
analyzed: dvividhā sā prakartavyā tena ca etat udāhṛtam
na ca yoga adhikāri tvam ekam eva anayā bhavet
api mantra adhikāri tvam muktiḥ ca śiva dīkṣayā
anena etat api proktam yogī tattva aikya siddhaye
mantram eva āśrayet mūlam nirvikalpa antam ādṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_16.294b/. mantrābhyāsena bhogaṃ vā mokṣaṃ vāpi prasādhayan // 294
analyzed: mantra abhyāsena bhogam vā mokṣam vā api prasādhayan
tatra adhikāri tā labdhyai dīkṣām gṛhṇīta daiśikāt
tena mantra jñāna yoga balāt yat yat prasādhayet
tat syāt asya anya tattve api yuktasya guruṇā śiśoḥ

original: AbhT_16.296b/. dīkṣā hyasyopayujyeta saṃskriyāyāṃ sa saṃskṛtaḥ // 296
analyzed: dīkṣā hi asya upayujyeta saṃskriyāyām sa saṃskṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_16.297a/. svabalenaiva bhogaṃ vā mokṣaṃ vā labhate budhaḥ /
analyzed: sva balena eva bhogam vā mokṣam vā labhate budhaḥ

original: AbhT_16.297b/. tena vijñānayogādibalī prāk samayī bhavan // 297
analyzed: tena vijñāna yoga ādi balī prāk samayī bhavan

original: AbhT_16.298a/. putrako vā na tāvānsyādapitu svabalocitaḥ /
analyzed: putrakaḥ vā na tāvān syāt api tu sva bala ucitaḥ

original: AbhT_16.298b/. yastu vijñānayogādivandhyaḥ so@ndho yathā pathi // 298
analyzed: yaḥ tu vijñāna yoga ādi vandhyaḥ saḥ undhaḥ yathā pathi

original: AbhT_16.299a/. daiśikāyatta eva syādbhoge muktau ca sarvathā /
analyzed: daiśika āyattaḥ eva syāt bhoge muktau ca sarvathā

original: AbhT_16.299b/. dīkṣā ca kevalā jñānaṃ vināpi nijamāntaram // 299
analyzed: dīkṣā ca kevalā jñānam vinā api nijam āntaram

original: AbhT_16.300a/. mocikaiveti kathitaṃ yuktyā cāgamataḥ purā /
analyzed: mocikā evā iti kathitam yuktyā ca āgamataḥ purā
yaḥ tu dīkṣā kṛtām eva apekṣya yojanikām śiśuḥ
sphuṭībhūtyai tat ucitam jñānam yogam atha āśritaḥ

original: AbhT_16.301b/. so@pi yatraiva yuktaḥ syāttanmayatvaṃ prapadyate // 301
analyzed: saḥ api yatra eva yuktaḥ syāt tad maya tvam prapadyate
guru dīkṣā mantra śāstra adhīna sarva sthitiḥ tatas
duṣṭānām eva sarveṣām bhūta bhavya bhaviṣyatām

original: AbhT_16.303a/. karmaṇāṃ śodhanaṃ kāryaṃ bubhukṣorna śubhātmanām /
analyzed: karmaṇām śodhanam kāryam bubhukṣoḥ na śubha ātmanām

original: AbhT_16.303b/. yaḥ punarlaukikaṃ bhogaṃ rājyasvargādikaṃ śiśuḥ // 303
analyzed: yaḥ punar laukikam bhogam rājya svarga ādikam śiśuḥ
tyaktvā loka uttaram bhogam īpsuḥ tasya śubheṣu api
tatra dravya mayīm dīkṣām kurvan ājya tila ādikaiḥ
karma asya śodhayāmi iti juhuyāt daiśika uttamaḥ

original: AbhT_16.305b/. jñānamayyāṃ tu dīkṣāyāṃ tadviśuddhyati sandhitaḥ // 305
analyzed: jñāna mayyām tu dīkṣāyām tad viśuddhi ati sandhitaḥ
guroḥ sva saṃvid rūḍhasya balāt tad prakṣayaḥ bhavet
yadā asya aśubha karmāṇi śuddhāni syuḥ tadā śubham
sva tāratamya āśrayaṇāt adhva madhye prasūti dam
śubha pāka krama upātta phala bhoga samāptitaḥ
yatra eṣa yojitaḥ tad sthaḥ bhāvi karma kṣaye kṛte
bhāvinām ca ādya deha stha deha antara vibhedinām
aśubha aṃśa viśuddhau syāt bhogasya eva an upakṣayaḥ
bhuñjānasya asya satatam bhogān māyā ālayān tatas
na duḥkha phala dam deha ādi adhva madhye pi kiṃcana
tatas māyā ālaye bhukta samasta sukha bhogakaḥ

original: AbhT_16.311a/. niṣkale sakale vaiti layaṃ yojanikābalāt /
analyzed: niṣkale sakale vā eti layam yojanikā balāt

original: AbhT_16.311b/. iti prameyaṃ kathitaṃ dīkṣā kāle guroryathā // 311
analyzed: iti prameyam kathitam dīkṣā kāle guroḥ yathā
atha śrī tantrāloke saptadaśam āhnikam
atha bhairava tādātmya dāyinīm prakriyām bruve
evam maṇḍala kumbha agni śiṣya sva ātmasu pañcasu

original: AbhT_17.2a/. gṛhītvā vyāptimaikyena nyasyādhvānaṃ ca śiṣyagam /
analyzed: gṛhītvā vyāptim aikyena nyasya adhvānam ca śiṣya gam
karma māyā aṇu malina trayam bāhau gale tathā
śikhāyām ca kṣipet sūtra granthi yogena daiśikaḥ

original: AbhT_17.3b/. tasyātadrūpatābhānaṃ malo granthiḥ sa kīrtyate // 3
analyzed: tasya a tad rūpa tā bhānam malaḥ granthiḥ sa kīrtyate
bāhū karma āspadam viṣṇuḥ māyā ātmā gala saṃśritaḥ

original: AbhT_17.5a/. adhovahā śikhāṇutvaṃ tenetthaṃ kalpanā kṛtā /
analyzed: adhas vahā śikhā aṇu tvam tena ittham kalpanā kṛtā
nara śakti śiva ākhyasya trayasya bahu bheda tām

original: AbhT_17.6a/. vaktuṃ tristriguṇaṃ sūtraṃ granthaye parikalpayet /
analyzed: vaktum tris triguṇam sūtram granthaye parikalpayet
tejaḥ jala anna tritayam tredhā pratyekam api adaḥ
śruti ante kepi atas śukla kṛṣṇa raktam prapedire
tatas agnau tarpita aśeṣa mantre cit vyoma mātrake
sāmānya rūpe tattvānām kramāt śuddhim samācaret
tatra sva mantra yogena dharām āvāhayet purā
iṣṭvā puṣpa ādibhiḥ sarpiḥ tila ādyaiḥ atha tarpayet
tad tattva vyāpikām paścāt māyā tattva adhidevatām

original: AbhT_17.10b/. āvāhane mātṛkārṇaṃ mālinyarṇaṃ ca pūjane // 10
analyzed: āvāhane mātṛkā arṇam mālinī arṇam ca pūjane
kuryāt iti guruḥ prāha svarūpa āpyāyana dvayāt

original: AbhT_17.11b/. tāro varṇo@tha saṃbuddhipadaṃ tvāmityataḥ param // 11
analyzed: tāraḥ saṃbuddhi padam tvām iti atas param
uttama eka yutam karma padam dīpakam api atas
nāma caturthī antam
iti ūha mantra yogena tat tat karma pravartayet

original: AbhT_17.13b/. āvāhanānantaraṃ hi karma sarvaṃ nigadyate // 13
analyzed: āvāhana anantaram hi karma sarvam nigadyate
āvāhanam ca saṃbodhaḥ sva svabhāva vyavasthiteḥ
bhāvasya aham maya sva ātma tādātmya āveśyamāna tā

original: AbhT_17.15a/. śāktī bhūmiśca saivoktā yasyāṃ mukhyāsti pūjyatā /
analyzed: śāktī bhūmiḥ ca sā eva uktā yasyām mukhyā asti pūjya tā
a bhāta tvāt abhedāt ca na hi asau nṛ śiva ātmanoḥ

original: AbhT_17.16a/. jaḍābhāseṣu tattveṣu saṃvitsthityai tato guruḥ /

analyzed: āvāhana vibhaktim prāk kṛtvā turya vibhaktitaḥ
namaskāra anta tā yogāt pūrṇām sattām prakalpayet
tatas pūrṇa svabhāva tvam tad rūpa udreka yogataḥ
dhyeya udrekaḥ bhavet dhyātṛ prahvī bhāva vaśa ādi atas
āvāhya iṣṭvā pratarpya iti śrī svacchande nirūpitam
anena eva pathā āneyam iti asmad guravaḥ jaguḥ
para tvena tu yat pūjyam tat svatantra cit ātmakam
anavacchid prakāśa tvāt na prakāśyam tu kutracid
tasya hi etat prapūjya tva dhyeya tva ādi yat ullaset
tasya eva tat svatantra tvam yā ati durghaṭa kāri tā

original: AbhT_17.21b/. saṃbodharūpe tattasmin kathaṃ saṃbodhanā bhavet // 21
analyzed: saṃbodha rūpe tat tasmin katham saṃbodhanā bhavet
prakāśanāyām na syāt prakāśasya prakāśa tā
saṃbodhana vibhaktyā eva vinā karma ādi śakti tām
svātantryāt tam darśayitum tatra ūham imam ācaret
devam āvāhayāmi iti tatas devāya dīpakam
bhavet
nutiḥ pūrṇa tvam agni indu saṃghaṭṭa āpyāya tā param

original: AbhT_17.25a/. āpyāyakaṃ ca procchālaṃ vauṣaḍādi pradīpayet /
analyzed: āpyāyakam ca procchālam vauṣaṭ ādi pradīpayet

original: AbhT_17.25b/. tatra bāhye@pi tādātmyaprasiddhaṃ karma codyate // 25
analyzed: tatra bāhye api tādātmya prasiddham karma codyate
yadi karma padam tat naḥ guruḥ abhyūhayet kvacid
an ābhāsita tad vastu bhāsanāya niyujyate

original: AbhT_17.27a/. mantraḥ kiṃ tena tatra syātsphuṭaṃ yatrāvabhāsi tat /
analyzed: mantraḥ kim tena tatra syāt sphuṭam yatra avabhāsi tat
tena prokṣaṇa saṃseka japa ādi vidhiṣu dhruvam
tad karma abhyūhanam kuryāt pratyuta vyavadhātṛ tām
bahis tathā ātma tā bhāve kāryam karma pada ūhanam
tṛptau āhuti hutabhuj pāśa ploṣat chid ādiṣu
yatra uddiṣṭe vidhau paścāt tat anantaiḥ kriyā ātmakaiḥ

original: AbhT_17.30a/. aṃśaiḥ sādhyaṃ na tatroho dīkṣaṇādividhiṣviva /
analyzed: aṃśaiḥ sādhyam na tatra ūhaḥ dīkṣaṇa ādi vidhiṣu iva
tatas śiṣyasya tad tattva sthāna istreṇa pratāḍanam
kṛtvā atha śivahastena hṛdayam parimarśayet

original: AbhT_17.31b/. tataḥ svanāḍīmārgeṇa hṛdayaṃ prāpya vai śiśoḥ // 31
analyzed: tatas sva nāḍī mārgeṇa hṛdayam prāpya vai śiśoḥ

original: AbhT_17.32a/. śiṣyātmanā sahaikatvaṃ gatvādāya ca taṃ hṛdā /
analyzed: śiṣya ātmanā saha ekatvam gatvā ādāya ca tam hṛdā
puṭitam haṃsa rūpa ākhyam tatra saṃhāra mudrayā
kuryāt ātmīya hṛdaya sthitam api avabhāsakam
śiṣya dehasya tejobhiḥ raśmi mātrā viyogataḥ
sva bandha sthāna calanāt svatantra sthāna lābhataḥ
sva karma a paratantra tvāt sarvatra utpattim arhati
tena ātma hṛdaya ānītam prāk kṛtvā pudgalam tatas
māyāyām tad dharā tattva śarīrāṇi asya saṃsṛjet

original: AbhT_17.36a/. tatrāsya garbhādhānaṃ ca yuktaṃ puṃsavanādibhiḥ /
analyzed: tatra asya garbhādhānam ca yuktam puṃsavana ādibhiḥ
garbha niṣkrāma paryantaiḥ ekām kurvīta saṃskriyām
jananam bhoga bhoktṛ tvam militvā ekā atha saṃskriyā

original: AbhT_17.37b/. tato@sya teṣu bhogeṣu kuryāttanmayatāṃ layam // 37
analyzed: tatas asya teṣu bhogeṣu kuryāt tad maya tām layam
tatas tad tattva pāśānām vicchedam samupācaret
saṃskārāṇām catuṣke asmin aparām ca para aparām

original: AbhT_17.39a/. mantrāṇāṃ pañcadaśakaṃ parāṃ vā yojayetkramāt /
analyzed: mantrāṇām pañcadaśakam parām vā yojayet kramāt

original: AbhT_17.39b/. pivanyādyaṣṭakaṃ śastrādikaṃ ṣaṭkaṃ parā tathā // 39

analyzed: iti pañcadaśā ete syuḥ kramāt līna tva saṃskṛtau
aparā mantra muktvā prāñc amuka ātmanaḥ iti atha

original: AbhT_17.41a/. garbhādhānaṃ karomīti punarmantraṃ tameva ca /
analyzed: garbhādhānam karomi iti punar mantram tam eva ca
svāhā antam uccaran dadyāt āhuti tritayam guruḥ
param parāparā mantram amuka ātmanaḥ iti atha
jātasya bhoga bhoktṛ tvam karomi atha parāparām

original: AbhT_17.43a/. ante svāheti proccārya vitarettisra āhutīḥ /
analyzed: ante svāhā iti proccārya vitaret tisraḥ āhutīḥ
uccārya pivanī mantram amuka ātmanaḥ iti atha

original: AbhT_17.44a/. bhoge layaṃ karomīti punarmantraṃ tameva ca /
analyzed: bhoge layam karomi iti punar mantram tam eva ca
svāhā antam āhutīḥ tisraḥ dadyāt ājya tila ādibhiḥ

original: AbhT_17.45a/. eṣa eva vamanyādau vidhiḥ pañcadaśāntake /
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva vamanī ādau vidhiḥ pañcadaśa antake
pūrvam parā ātmakam mantram amuka ātmanaḥ iti atha
pāśa ācchedam karomi iti parā mantraḥ punar tatas

original: AbhT_17.46b/. huṃ svāhā phaṭ samuccārya dadyāttisro@pyathāhutīḥ // 46
analyzed: hum svāhā phaṭ samuccārya dadyāt tisraḥ api atha āhutīḥ

original: AbhT_17.47a/. saṃskārāṇāṃ catuṣke@sminye mantrāḥ kathitā mayā /
analyzed: saṃskārāṇām catuṣke ismin ye mantrāḥ kathitāḥ mayā
teṣu karma padāt pūrvam dharā tattva padam vadet
tatas dharā tattva patim āmantrya iṣṭvā pratarpya ca
śiva abhimāna saṃrabdhaḥ guruḥ evam samādiśet

original: AbhT_17.49a/. tattveśvara tvayā nāsya putrakasya śivājñayā /
analyzed: tattva īśvara tvayā na asya putrakasya śiva ājñayā
pratibandhaḥ prakartavyaḥ yātuḥ padam anāmayam
tatas yadi samīheta dharā tattva antarāla gam
pṛthak śodhayitum mantrī bhuvana ādi adhva pañcakam
aparā mantrataḥ prāgvat tisraḥ tisraḥ tad āhutīḥ
dadyāt puram śodhayāmi iti ūha yuktam prasanna dhīḥ
evam kalā mantra pada varṇeṣu api vicakṣaṇaḥ
tisraḥ tisraḥ hutīḥ dadyāt pṛthak

original: AbhT_17.53a/. tataḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ dattvā parayā vauṣaḍantayā /
analyzed: tatas pūrṇāhutim dattvā parayā vauṣaṭ antayā
aparā mantrataḥ śiṣyam uddhṛtya ātma hṛdam nayet
yadā tu ekena śuddhena tad antar bhāva cintanāt
na pṛthak śodhayet tattva nātha saṃśravaṇāt param
tadā pūrṇām vitīrya aṇum utkṣipya ātmani yojayet
tātsthya ātma saṃsthya yogāya tayā eva aparayā āhutīḥ
sa karma padayā dadyāt iti kecid tu manvate
anye tu guravaḥ prāhuḥ bhāvanām ayam īdṛśam

original: AbhT_17.57a/. nātra bāhyāhutirdeyā daiśikasya pṛthak punaḥ /
analyzed: na atra bāhya āhutiḥ deyā daiśikasya pṛthak punar

original: AbhT_17.57b/. dadyādvā yadi no doṣaḥ syādupāyaḥ sa bhāvane // 57
analyzed: dadyāt vā yadi no doṣaḥ syāt upāyaḥ sa bhāvane
evam prāktana tātsthya ātma saṃstha tve yojayet guruḥ

original: AbhT_17.58b/. tataḥ śiṣyahṛdaṃ neyaḥ sa ātmā tāvato@dhvanaḥ // 58
analyzed: tatas śiṣya hṛdam neyaḥ saḥ ātmā tāvataḥ dhvanaḥ

original: AbhT_17.59a/. śuddhastaddārḍhyasiddhyai ca pūrṇā syātparayā punaḥ /
analyzed: śuddhaḥ tad dārḍhya siddhyai ca pūrṇā syāt parayā punar

original: AbhT_17.60a/. juhomi punarastreṇa vauṣaḍanta iti kṣipet /
analyzed: juhomi punar astreṇa vauṣaṭ antaḥ iti kṣipet

original: AbhT_17.60b/. punaḥ pūrṇāṃ tato māyāmabhyarcyātha visarjayet // 60
analyzed: punar pūrṇām tatas māyām abhyarcya atha visarjayet
dharā tattvam viśuddham sat jalena śuddha rūpiṇā

original: AbhT_17.61b/. bhāvayenmiśritaṃ vāri śuddhiyogyaṃ tato bhavet // 61
analyzed: bhāvayet miśritam vāri śuddhi yogyam tatas bhavet
tathā tat tat purā tattva miśraṇāt uttarottaram
sarvā śivībhavet tattva āvalī śuddhā anyathā pṛthak

original: AbhT_17.63a/. pṛthaktvaṃ ca malo māyābhidhānastasya saṃbhave /
analyzed: pṛthaktvam ca malaḥ māyā abhidhānaḥ tasya saṃbhave
karma kṣaye api no muktiḥ bhavet vidyeśvara ādi vat

original: AbhT_17.64a/. tato@pi jalatattvasya vahnau vyomni cidātmake /
analyzed: tatas api jala tattvasya vahnau vyomni cit ātmake
āhvāna ādi akhilam yāvat tejasi asya vimaśraṇam

original: AbhT_17.65a/. evaṃ kramātkalātattve śuddhe pāśaṃ bhujāśritam /
analyzed: evam kramāt kalā tattve śuddhe pāśam bhuja āśritam
chindyāt kalā hi sā kiṃcitkartṛtva unmīlana ātmikā

original: AbhT_17.66a/. karmākhyamalajṛmbhātmā taṃ ca granthiṃ srugagragam /
analyzed: karma ākhya mala jṛmbhā ātmā tam ca granthim sruc agra gam
pūrṇāhutyā samam vahni mantra tejasi nirdahet
mantraḥ hi viśva rūpaḥ san upāśraya vaśāt tathā

original: AbhT_17.68a/. pluṣṭo līnasvabhāvo@sau pāśastaṃ prati śambhuvat /
analyzed: pluṣṭaḥ līna svabhāvaḥ asau pāśaḥ tam prati śambhu vat
parameśa mahā tejaḥ śeṣa mātra tvam aśnute
karma pāśā itra hotavye pūrṇayā asya śubha aśubham

original: AbhT_17.69b/. aśubhaṃ vā bhavadbhūtaṃ bhāvi vātha samastakam // 69
analyzed: aśubham vā bhavat bhūtam bhāvi vā atha samastakam

original: AbhT_17.70a/. dahāmi phaṭtrayaṃ vauṣaḍiti pūrṇāṃ vinikṣipet /
analyzed: dahāmi phaṭ trayam vauṣaṭ iti pūrṇām vinikṣipet

original: AbhT_17.70b/. evaṃ māyāntasaṃśuddhau kaṇṭhapāśaṃ ca homayet // 70
analyzed: evam māyā anta saṃśuddhau kaṇṭha pāśam ca homayet
pūrṇasya tasya māyā ākhyam pāśa bheda prathā ātmakam

original: AbhT_17.71b/. dahāmi phaṭtrayaṃ vauṣaḍiti pūrṇāṃ kṣipedguruḥ // 71
analyzed: dahāmi phaṭ trayam vauṣaṭ iti pūrṇām kṣipet guruḥ

original: AbhT_17.72a/. nirbījā yadi kāryā tu tadātraivāparāṃ kṣipet /
analyzed: nirbījā yadi kāryā tu tadā atra eva aparām kṣipet
pūrṇām samaya pāśa ākhya bīja dāha pada anvitām

original: AbhT_17.73a/. gurau deve tathā śāstre bhaktiḥ kāryāsya nahyasau /
analyzed: gurau deve tathā śāstre bhaktiḥ kāryā asya na hi asau

original: AbhT_17.73b/. samayaḥ śaktipātasya svabhāvo hyeṣa no pṛthak // 73
analyzed: samayaḥ śaktipātasya svabhāvaḥ hi eṣa no pṛthak

original: AbhT_17.74a/. māyānte śuddhimāyāte vāgīśī yā purābhavat /
analyzed: māyā ante śuddhim āyāte vāgīśī yā purā bhavat
māyā śakti mayī sā eva vidyā śakti tvam aśnute
tat śuddhavidyām āhūya vidyā śaktim niyojayet
evam krameṇa saṃśuddhe sadāśiva pade pi alam

original: AbhT_17.76a/. śikhāṃ granthiyutāṃ chittvā malamāṇavakaṃ dahet /
analyzed: śikhām granthi yutām chittvā malam āṇavakam dahet

original: AbhT_17.76b/. yato@dhikārabhogākhyau dvau pāśau tu sadāśive // 76
analyzed: yatas adhikāra bhoga ākhyau dvau pāśau tu sadāśive
iti uktyā āṇava pāśaḥ atra māyīyaḥ tu niśā avadhiḥ
śiṣyaḥ yathocitam snāyāt ācāmet daiśikaḥ svayam
āṇava ākhye vinirdagdhe hi adhas vāhi śikhā male
tatas prāc ukta sakala prameyam paricintayan
śiṣya deha ādim ātmīya deha prāṇa ādi yojitam
kṛtvā ātma deha prāṇa ādeḥ viśvam antar anusmaret
ukta prakriyayā ca evam dṛḍha buddhiḥ an anya dhīḥ

original: AbhT_17.80b/. prāṇasthaṃ deśakālādhvayugaṃ prāṇaṃ ca śaktigam // 80
analyzed: prāṇa stham deśa kāla adhva yugam prāṇam ca śakti gam

original: AbhT_17.81a/. tāṃ ca saṃvidgatāṃ śuddhāṃ saṃvidaṃ śivarūpiṇīm /
analyzed: tām ca saṃvid gatām śuddhām saṃvidam śiva rūpiṇīm
śiṣya saṃvid abhinnām ca mantra vahni ādi abhedinīm
dhyāyan prāgvat prayogeṇa śivam sakala niṣkalam

original: AbhT_17.82b/. dvyātmakaṃ vā kṣipetpūrṇāṃ praśāntakaraṇena tu // 82
analyzed: dvi ātmakam vā kṣipet pūrṇām praśānta karaṇena tu
uktam traiśirase tantre sarva saṃpūraṇa ātmakam
mūlāt udaya gatyā tu śiva indu parisaṃplutam
janma anta madhya kuhara mūla srotaḥ samutthitam

original: AbhT_17.84b/. śivārkaraśmibhistīvraiḥ kṣubdhaṃ jñānāmṛtaṃ tu yat // 84
analyzed: śiva arka raśmibhiḥ tīvraiḥ kṣubdham jñāna amṛtam tu yat
tena saṃtarpayet samyak praśānta karaṇena tu
mūla sthānāt samārabhya kṛtvā someśam anta gam
kham iva ātiṣṭhate yāvat praśāntam tāvat ucyate

original: AbhT_17.88a/. uktaṃ śrīpūrvaśāstre ca srucamāpūrya sarpiṣā /
analyzed: uktam śrī pūrvaśāstre ca srucam āpūrya sarpiṣā
kṛtvā śiṣyam tathā ātma stham mūlamantram anusmaran

original: AbhT_17.89a/. śivaṃ śaktiṃ tathātmānaṃ śiṣyaṃ sarpistathānalam /
analyzed: śivam śaktim tathā ātmānam śiṣyam sarpiḥ tathā analam
ekīkurvan śanais gacchet dvādaśāntam an anya dhīḥ
tatra kumbhakam āsthāya dhyāyan sakala niṣkalam
tiṣṭhet tāvat anudvignaḥ yāvat ājya kṣayaḥ

original: AbhT_17.91a/. evaṃ yuktaḥ pare tattve guruṇā śivamūrtinā /
analyzed: evam yuktaḥ pare tattve guruṇā śiva mūrtinā
na bhūyas paśu tām eti dagdha māyā nibandhanaḥ

original: AbhT_17.92a/. dehapāte punaḥ prepsedyadi tattveṣu kutracit /
analyzed: dehapāte punar prepset yadi tattveṣu kutracid
bhogān samasta vyasta tva bhedaiḥ ante param padam
tadā tad tattva bhūmau tu tad saṃkhyāyām an anya dhīḥ
punar yojanikām kuryāt pūrṇāhuti antareṇa tu

original: AbhT_17.94a/. muktipradā bhogamokṣapradā vā yā prakīrtitā /
analyzed: mukti pradā bhoga mokṣa pradā vā yā prakīrtitā
dīkṣā sā syāt sa bīja tva nirbīja ātma tayā dvidhā

original: AbhT_17.95a/. bāle nirjñātamaraṇe tvaśakte vā jarādibhiḥ /
analyzed: bāle nirjñāta maraṇe tu aśakte vā jarā ādibhiḥ
kāryā nirbījikā dīkṣā śaktipāta bala udaye
nirbījāyām sa āmayān tu pāśān api viśodhayet
kṛta nirbīja dīkṣaḥ tu deva agni guru bhakti bhāj

original: AbhT_17.97a/. iyataiva śivaṃ yāyāt sadyo bhogān vibhujya vā /
analyzed: iyatā eva śivam yāyāt sadyas bhogān vibhujya vā
śrīmat dīkṣottare ca uktam cāre ṣaṭtriṃśat aṅgule
tattvāni ā pāda mūrdha antam bhuvanāni tyajet kramāt
tuṭi mātram niṣkalam tat adeham tat mahat param

original: AbhT_17.99a/. śaktyā tatra kṣipāmyenamiti dhyāyaṃstu dīkṣayet /
analyzed: śaktyā tatra kṣipāmi enam iti dhyāyan tu dīkṣayet

original: AbhT_17.99b/. sabījāyāṃ tu dīkṣāyāṃ samayānna viśodhayet // 99
analyzed: sa bījāyām tu dīkṣāyām samayān na viśodhayet
viśeṣaḥ tu ayam etasyām yāvajjīvam śiśoḥ guruḥ
śeṣa vṛttyai śuddha tattva sṛṣṭim kurvīta pūrṇayā
abhinnāt śiva saṃbodha jaladheḥ yugapad sphurat
pūrṇām kṣipan tattva jālam dhyāyet bhā rūpakam sṛtam
viśuddha tattva sṛṣṭim vā kuryāt kumbha abhiṣecanāt
tathā dhyāna balāt eva yat vā pūrṇa abhiṣecanaiḥ
pṛthivī sthira rūpā asya śiva rūpeṇa bhāvitā
sthirīkaroti tām eva bhāvanām iti śuddhi ati
jalam āpyāyayati enām tejaḥ bhāsvara tām nayet
evam tad mātra vargaḥ upi śivatā mayaḥ iṣyate
śiva āmoda bhara āsvāda darśana sparśanāni alam
tad ākarṇanam iti evam indriyāṇām viśuddha tā
saṃkalpa adhyavasā mānāḥ prakāśaḥ rakti saṃsthitī
śiva ātma tvena yat sā iyam śuddha tā mānasa ādike

original: AbhT_17.108b/. niyamo rañjanaṃ kartṛbhāvaḥ kalanayā saha // 108
analyzed: niyamaḥ rañjanam kartṛ bhāvaḥ kalanayā saha
vedanam heya vastu aṃśa viṣaye supta kalpa tā
ittham śiva aikya rūḍhasya ṣaṣ kañcuka gaṇaḥ upi ayam

original: AbhT_17.110a/. śuddha eva pumān prāptaśivabhāvo viśuddhyati /
analyzed: śuddhaḥ eva pumān prāpta śiva bhāvaḥ viśuddhi ati
vidyeśa ādiṣu tattveṣu nā eva kācid aśuddha tā

original: AbhT_17.111a/. ityevaṃ śuddhatattvānāṃ sṛṣṭyā śiṣyo@pi tanmayaḥ /
analyzed: iti evam śuddha tattvānām sṛṣṭyā śiṣyaḥ api tad mayaḥ
bhavet hi etat sūcitam śrīmālinīvijayottare
bandha mokṣau ubhau etau indriyāṇi jaguḥ budhāḥ
nigṛhītāni bandhāya vimuktāni vimuktaye

original: AbhT_17.113a/. etāni vyāpake bhāve yadā syurmanasā saha /
analyzed: etāni vyāpake bhāve yadā syuḥ manasā saha

original: AbhT_17.113b/. muktāni kvāpi viṣaye rodhādbandhāya tāni tu // 113
analyzed: muktāni kvāpi viṣaye rodhāt bandhāya tāni tu
iti evam dvividhaḥ bhāvaḥ śuddha aśuddha prabhedataḥ
indriyāṇām samākhyātaḥ siddha yogi īśvare mate
śrīmān vidyā guruḥ tu āha pramāṇa stuti darśane
samasta mantraiḥ dīkṣāyām niyamaḥ tu eṣa kathyate

original: AbhT_17.116a/. māyāntaśuddhau sarvāḥ syuḥ kriyā hyaparayā sadā /
analyzed: māyā anta śuddhau sarvāḥ syuḥ kriyāḥ hi aparayā sadā

original: AbhT_17.116b/. dvyātmayā sakalānte tu niṣkale parayaiva tu // 116
analyzed: sakala ante tu niṣkale parayā eva tu
īśa ante ca pivanī ādi sakala anta iṅga pañcakam
iti evam vidhim ālocya karma kuryāt guru uttamaḥ

original: AbhT_17.118a/. purādhvani hutīnāṃ yā saṃkhyeyaṃ tattvavarṇayoḥ /
analyzed: purā adhvani hutīnām yā saṃkhyā iyam tattva varṇayoḥ
tām eva dviguṇīkuryāt padādhvani caturguṇām
kramāt mantra kalā mārge dviguṇā dviguṇā kramāt
yāvat tri tattva saṃśuddhau syāt viṃśati guṇā tatas
pratikarma bhavet ṣaṣṭiḥ āhutīnām tri tattvake

original: AbhT_17.120b/. ekatattve śataṃ prāhurāhutīnāṃ tu sāṣṭakam // 120
analyzed: eka tattve śatam prāhuḥ āhutīnām tu sa aṣṭakam

original: AbhT_17.121a/. vilomakarmaṇā sākaṃ yāḥ pūrṇāhutayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: viloma karmaṇā sākam yāḥ pūrṇāhutayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: AbhT_17.121b/. tāsāṃ sarvādhvasaṃśuddhau saṃkhyānyatvaṃ na kiṃcana // 121
analyzed: tāsām sarva adhva saṃśuddhau saṃkhyā anya tvam na kiṃcana
iti eṣā kathitā dīkṣā janana ādi samanvitā
atha śrī tantrāloke aṣṭādaśam āhnikam
atha saṃkṣipta dīkṣā iyam śiva tā āpatti dā ucyate

original: AbhT_18.1b/. na rajo nādhivāso@tra na bhūkṣetraparigrahaḥ /
analyzed: na rajaḥ na adhivāsaḥ utra na bhū kṣetra parigrahaḥ

original: AbhT_18.1c/. yatra tatra pradeśe tu pūjayitvā guruḥ śivam // 1
analyzed: yatra tatra pradeśe tu pūjayitvā guruḥ śivam
adhvānam manasā dhyātvā dīkṣayet tattva pāragaḥ

original: AbhT_18.2b/. jananādivihīnāṃ tu yena yenādhvanā guruḥ // 2
analyzed: janana ādi vihīnām tu yena yena adhvanā guruḥ
kuryāt saḥ eka tattva antām śiva bhāva eka bhāvitaḥ
parā mantraḥ tatas asya iti tattvam saṃśodhayāmi atha

original: AbhT_18.4a/. svāheti pratitattvaṃ syācchuddhe pūrṇāhutiṃ kṣipet /
analyzed: svāhā iti prati tattvam syāt śuddhe pūrṇāhutim kṣipet
evam mantra antaraiḥ kuryāt samastaiḥ athavā ukta vat
parā saṃpuṭitam nāma svāhā antam prathama antakam

original: AbhT_18.5b/. śataṃ sahasraṃ sāṣṭaṃ vā tena śaktyaiva homayet // 5
analyzed: śatam sahasram sāṣṭam vā tena śaktyā eva homayet
tatas pūrṇā iti saṃśodhya hīnam uttamam īdṛśam

original: AbhT_18.6b/. dīkṣākarmoditaṃ tatra tatra śāstre maheśinā // 6
analyzed: dīkṣā karma uditam tatra tatra śāstre maheśinā
pratyekam mātṛkā yugma varṇaiḥ tattvāni śodhayet

original: AbhT_18.7b/. yadi vā piṇḍamantreṇa sarvamantreṣvayaṃ vidhiḥ // 7
analyzed: yadi vā piṇḍa mantreṇa sarva mantreṣu ayam vidhiḥ
yathā yathā ca su abhyasta jñānaḥ tad maya tā ātmakaḥ

original: AbhT_18.8b/. gurustathā tathā kuryāt saṃkṣiptaṃ karma nānyathā // 8
analyzed: guruḥ tathā tathā kuryāt saṃkṣiptam karma na anyathā

original: AbhT_18.9a/. śrībrahmayāmale coktaṃ saṃkṣipte@pi hi bhāvayet /
analyzed: śrī brahmayāmale ca uktam saṃkṣipte api hi bhāvayet

original: AbhT_18.9b/. vyāptiṃ sarvādhvasāmānyāṃ kiṃtu yāge na vistaraḥ // 9
analyzed: vyāptim sarva adhva sāmānyām kiṃtu yāge na vistaraḥ
a tanmayībhūtam iti vikṣiptam karma sandadhat
kramāt tādātmyam eti iti vikṣiptam vidhim ācaret

original: AbhT_18.11a/. saṃkṣipto vidhirukto@yaṃ kṛpayā yaḥ śivoditaḥ /
analyzed: saṃkṣiptaḥ vidhiḥ uktaḥ yam kṛpayā yaḥ śiva uditaḥ

original: AbhT_18.11b/. dīkṣottare kairaṇe ca tatra tatrāpi śāsane // 11
analyzed: dīkṣottare kairaṇe ca tatra tatra api śāsane
atha śrī tantrāloke ekānna viṃśam āhnikam
atha sadyaḥsamutkrānti pradā dīkṣā nirūpyate
tad kṣaṇāt ca upabhogāt vā dehapāte śivam vrajet
iti uktyā mālinīśāstre sūcitā asau maheśinā
dehapāte samīpa sthe śaktipāta sphuṭa tvataḥ
āsādya śāṃkarīm dīkṣām tasmāt dīkṣā kṣaṇāt param
śivam vrajet iti arthaḥ utra pūrva apara vivecanāt
vyākhyātaḥ śrīmatā asmākam guruṇā śambhu mūrtinā
yadā hi āsanna maraṇe śaktipātaḥ prajāyate

original: AbhT_19.4b/. tatra mande@tha gurvādisevayāyuḥ kṣayaṃ vrajet // 4
analyzed: tatra guru ādi sevayā āyuḥ kṣayam vrajet

original: AbhT_19.5a/. athavā bandhumitrādidvārā sāsya vibhoḥ patet /
analyzed: athavā bandhu mitra ādi dvārā sā asya vibhoḥ patet

original: AbhT_19.5b/. pūrvaṃ vā samayī naiva parāṃ dīkṣāmavāptavān // 5
analyzed: pūrvam vā samayī nā eva parām dīkṣām avāptavān
āpta dīkṣaḥ api vā prāṇān jihāsuḥ kleśa varjitam
antyān guruḥ tadā kuryāt sadyas autkrāntidīkṣaṇam
na tu apakva male na api śeṣa kārmika vigrahe
kuryāt utkramaṇam śrīmat gahvare ca nirūpitam

original: AbhT_19.8a/. dṛṣṭvā śiṣyaṃ jarāgrastaṃ vyādhinā paripīḍitam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā śiṣyam jarā grastam vyādhinā paripīḍitam
utkramayya tatas tu enam para tattve niyojayet

original: AbhT_19.10a/. vidhiṃ pūrvoditaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtvā samayaśuddhitaḥ /
analyzed: vidhim pūrva uditam sarvam kṛtvā samaya śuddhitaḥ
kṣurikām asya vinyasyet jvalantīm marma kartarīm
kṛtvā pūrva uditam nyāsam kāla anala sama prabham
saṃhṛti kramataḥ sārdham sṛkchindi yugalena tu
āgneyīm dhāraṇām kṛtvā sarva marma pratāpanīm
pūrayet vāyunā deham aṅguṣṭhāt mastaka antakam
tam utkṛṣya tatas uṅguṣṭhāt ūrdhva antam vakṣyamāṇayā
kṛntet marmāṇi randhra antāt kālarātryā visarjayet
anena krama yogena yojitaḥ huti varjitaḥ
samayī apyeti tām dīkṣām iti śrī mālinīmate
kvacid anyataratra atha prāc ukta paśu karma vat
praviśya mūlam kanda ādeḥ chindan aikya vibhāvanāt
pūrṇāhuti prayogeṇa sva iṣṭe dhāmni niyojayet

original: AbhT_19.17b/. cintayitvāmunā tasya vedanaṃ bodhanaṃ bhramam // 17
analyzed: cintayitvā amunā tasya vedanam bodhanam bhramam

original: AbhT_19.18a/. dīpanaṃ tāḍanaṃ todaṃ calanaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: dīpanam tāḍanam todam calanam ca punar punar
kanda ādi cakra gam kuryāt viśeṣeṇa hṛd ambuje

original: AbhT_19.19a/. dvādaśānte tataḥ kṛtvā binduyugmagate kṣipet /
AbhT_19.19b/. nirlakṣye vā pare dhāmni saṃyuktaḥ parameśvaraḥ // 19
analyzed: nirlakṣye vā pare dhāmni saṃyuktaḥ parameśvaraḥ

original: AbhT_19.20a/. na tasya kuryātsaṃskāraṃ kaṃcidityāha gahvare /
analyzed: na tasya kuryāt saṃskāram kaṃcid iti āha gahvare

original: AbhT_19.20b/. devaḥ kimasya pūrṇasya śrāddhādyairiti bhāvitaḥ // 20
analyzed: devaḥ kim asya pūrṇasya śrāddha ādyaiḥ iti bhāvitaḥ
śrīmat dīkṣottare tu eṣa vidhiḥ vahni puṭīkṛtaḥ
haṃsaḥ pumān adhas tasya rudra bindu samanvitaḥ
śiṣya dehe niyojya etat anudvagnaḥ śatam japet

original: AbhT_19.22b/. utkramyordhvanimeṣeṇa śiṣya itthaṃ paraṃ vrajet // 22
analyzed: utkramya ūrdhva nimeṣeṇa śiṣyaḥ ittham param vrajet
eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ śrīmat siddhayogīśvarīmate

original: AbhT_19.23b/. iyamutkrāmaṇī dīkṣā kartavyā yogino guroḥ // 23
analyzed: iyam utkrāmaṇī dīkṣā kartavyā yoginaḥ guroḥ
an abhyasta prāṇa cāraḥ katham enām kariṣyati
vakṣyamāṇām brahma vidyām sakalām

original: AbhT_19.25a/. karṇe@sya vā paṭhedbhūyo bhūyo vāpyatha pāṭhayet /
analyzed: vā paṭhet bhūyas bhūyas vā api atha pāṭhayet

original: AbhT_19.25b/. svayaṃ ca karma kurvīta tattvaśuddhyādikaṃ guruḥ // 25
analyzed: svayam ca karma kurvīta tattva śuddhi ādikam guruḥ
mantra kriyā balāt pūrṇāhutyā ittham yojayet pare
yoga abhyāsam a kṛtvā api sadyas autkrānti dām guruḥ
jñāna mantra kriyā dhyāna balāt kartum bhavet prabhuḥ
anayā utkramyate śiṣyaḥ balāt eva ekakam kṣaṇam

original: AbhT_19.28a/. kālasyollaṅghya bhogo hi kṣaṇiko@syāstu kiṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: kālasya ullaṅghya bhogaḥ hi kṣaṇikaḥ syāḥ tu kim tatas

original: AbhT_19.28b/. sadya+utkrāntidā cānyā yasyāṃ pūrṇāhutiṃ tadā // 28
analyzed: sadya autkrānti dā ca anyā yasyām pūrṇāhutim tadā
dadyāt yadā asya prāṇāḥ syuḥ dhruvam niṣkramaṇa icchavaḥ
vinā api kriyayā bhāvi brahma vidyā balāt guruḥ
karṇa jāpa prayogeṇa tattva kañcuka jālataḥ
niḥsārayan yathā abhīṣṭe sakale niṣkale dvaye

original: AbhT_19.31a/. tattve vā yatra kutrāpi yojayetpudgalaṃ kramāt /
analyzed: tattve vā yatra kutra api yojayet pudgalam kramāt

original: AbhT_19.31b/. samayī putrako vāpi paṭhedvidyāmimāṃ tathā // 31
analyzed: samayī putrakaḥ vā api paṭhet vidyām imām tathā
tad pāṭhāt tu samayī uktām rudra aṃśa āpattim aśnute
etau jape ca adhyayane yasmāt adhikṛtau ubhau
na adhyāpana upadeśe vā saḥ eṣa udhyayanāt ṛte
paṭhatoḥ tu anayoḥ vastu svabhāvāt tasya sā gatiḥ
yathā niṣiddha bhūta ādi karmā mantram smaran svayam
āviṣṭe api kvacid na eti lopam kartṛ tva varjanāt

original: AbhT_19.35a/. yathā ca vācayañśāstraṃ samayī śūnyaveśmani /
analyzed: yathā ca vācayan śāstram samayī śūnya veśmani
na lupyate tad antar stha prāṇi varga upakārataḥ

original: AbhT_19.36a/. tathā svayaṃ paṭhanneṣa vidyāṃ vastusvabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: tathā svayam paṭhan eṣa vidyām vastu svabhāvataḥ

original: AbhT_19.36b/. tasminmukte na lupyeta yato kiṃcitkaro@tra saḥ // 36
analyzed: tasmin mukte na lupyeta yatas kiṃcid karaḥ atra saḥ
nanu ca a dīkṣita agre sa nā uccaret śāstra paddhatim
hanta kuḍya agra topyasya niṣedhaḥ tu atha kathyate
paryudāsena yaḥ śrotum avadhārayitum kṣamaḥ

original: AbhT_19.39a/. sa evātra niṣiddho no kuḍyakīṭapatatriṇaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva atra niṣiddhaḥ no kuḍya kīṭa patatriṇaḥ
tarhi pāṣāṇa tulya usau vilīna indriya vṛttikaḥ
tasya agre paṭhataḥ tasya niṣedha ullaṅghanā katham

original: AbhT_19.40b/. sa tu vastusvabhāvena galitākṣo@pi budhyate // 40
analyzed: sa tu vastu svabhāvena galita akṣaḥ api budhyate
akṣa an apekṣayā eva antar cit śaktyā sva prakāśayā
prāk deham kila tityakṣuḥ na uttaram ca adhitaṣṭhivān
madhye prabodhaka balāt pratibudhyet pudgalaḥ
mantrāḥ śabda mayāḥ śuddha vimarśa ātma tayā svayam
artha ātmanā ca avabhāntaḥ tad artha pratibodhakāḥ

original: AbhT_19.43b/. tenāsya galitākṣasya prabodho jāyate svayam // 43
analyzed: tena asya galita akṣasya prabodhaḥ jāyate svayam
yathā hi alpa javaḥ vāyuḥ sajātīya vimiśritaḥ
javī tathā ātmā saṃsupta āmarśaḥ upi evam prabudhyate

original: AbhT_19.45b/. prabuddhaḥ sa ca saṃjāto na cādīkṣita ucyate // 45
analyzed: prabuddhaḥ sa ca saṃjātaḥ na ca a dīkṣitaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_19.46a/. dīkṣā hi nāma saṃskāro na tvanyatso@sti cāsya hi /
analyzed: dīkṣā hi nāma saṃskāraḥ na tu anyat saḥ asti ca asya hi

original: AbhT_19.46b/. ata eva nijaṃ śāstraṃ paṭhati kvāpi sāmaye // 46
analyzed: atas eva nijam śāstram paṭhati kvāpi sāmaye

original: AbhT_19.47a/. tacchrutvā ko@pi dhanyaścenmucyate nāsya sā kṣatiḥ /
analyzed: tat śrutvā kaḥ api dhanyaḥ ced mucyate na asya sā kṣatiḥ
śāstra nindām mā eṣa kārṣīt dvayoḥ pātitya dāyinīm
iti evaṃparam etat na a dīkṣita agre paṭhet iti

original: AbhT_19.48b/. yathā ca samayī kāṣṭhe loṣṭe vā mantrayojanām // 48
analyzed: yathā ca samayī kāṣṭhe loṣṭe vā mantra yojanām

original: AbhT_19.49a/. kurvaṃstasmiṃścalatyeti na lopaṃ tadvadatra hi /
analyzed: kurvan tasmin calati eti na lopam tadvat atra hi
yatas asya pratyaya prāpti prepsoḥ samayinaḥ tathā

original: AbhT_19.50a/. pravṛttasya svabhāvena tasminmukte na vai kṣatiḥ /
analyzed: pravṛttasya svabhāvena tasmin mukte na vai kṣatiḥ

original: AbhT_19.50b/. sādhakastu sadā sādhye phale niyatiyantraṇāt // 50
analyzed: sādhakaḥ tu sadā sādhye phale niyati yantraṇāt
makṣikā śruta mantraḥ api prāyaścitta aucitīm caret
ittham sadyas samutkrāntiḥ yā uktā tām ājñayā guroḥ
samayi ādiḥ api prokta kāle prokta artha siddhaye
svayam kuryāt samabhyasta prāṇa cāra gama āgamaḥ
a kṛta adhikṛtiḥ vā api guruḥ samaya śuddhaye
adhastana pada avasthaḥ na tu jñāna iddha cetanaḥ
iti iyam sadyas autkrāntiḥ sūcitā mālinīmate

original: AbhT_19.54b/. svayaṃ vā guruṇā vātha kāryatvena maheśinā // 54
analyzed: svayam vā guruṇā vā atha kārya tvena maheśinā

original: AbhT_19.55a/. sarvaṃ bhogaṃ virūpaṃ tu matvā dehaṃ tyajedyadi /
analyzed: sarvam bhogam virūpam tu matvā deham tyajet yadi

original: AbhT_19.55b/. tadā tena krameṇāśu yojitaḥ samayī śivaḥ // 55
analyzed: tadā tena krameṇa āśu yojitaḥ samayī śivaḥ
uktā iyam sadyas autkrāntiḥ yā gopyā prāṇa vat budhaiḥ
atha śrī tantrāloke viṃśatitamam āhnikam
atha dīkṣām bruve mūḍha jana āśvāsa pradāyinīm
vāyavyapura nirdhūte kare savye
bījam kiṃcid gṛhītvā etat tathā eva hṛdaya antare
kare ca dahyamānam sat cintayet tad japa eka yuj
vahni dīpita phaṭkāra dhoraṇī dāha pīḍitam
bījam nirbīja tām eti sva sūti karaṇa akṣamam

original: AbhT_20.5a/. taptaṃ naitatprarohāya tenaiva pratyayena tu /
analyzed: taptam na etat prarohāya tena eva pratyayena tu

original: AbhT_20.6a/. dagdhāni na svakāryāya nirbījapratyayaṃ tvimam /
analyzed: dagdhāni na sva kāryāya nirbīja pratyayam tu imam

original: AbhT_20.6b/. sa śrīmānsuprasanno me śaṃbhunātho nyarūpayat // 6
analyzed: sa śrīmān su prasannaḥ me śaṃbhunā atho nyarūpayat

original: AbhT_20.7a/. bījasyāpyatra kāryā ca yojanā kṛpayā guroḥ /
analyzed: bījasya api atra kāryā ca yojanā kṛpayā guroḥ
yatas dīkṣā su dīpta tvāt sthāvarāṇi api mocayet
yaḥ guruḥ japa homa arcā dhyāna siddha tvam ātmani

original: AbhT_20.8b/. jñātvā dīkṣāṃ carettasya dīkṣā sapratyayā smṛtā // 8
analyzed: jñātvā dīkṣām caret tasya dīkṣā sa pratyayā smṛtā

original: AbhT_20.9a/. avadhūte nirācāre tattvajñe natvayaṃ vidhiḥ /
analyzed: avadhūte nirācāre tattva jñe na tu ayam vidhiḥ

original: AbhT_20.9b/. sācāraiḥ kriyate dīkṣā yā dṛṣṭapratyayānvitā // 9
analyzed: sa ācāraiḥ kriyate dīkṣā yā dṛṣṭa pratyaya anvitā

original: AbhT_20.10a/. nirācāreṇa dīkṣāyāṃ pratyayastu na gadyate /
analyzed: nirācāreṇa dīkṣāyām pratyayaḥ tu na gadyate
jñānam sva pratyayam yasmāt na phala antaram arhati
dhyāna ādi tu phalāt sādhyam iti siddhāmata uditam
tulā śuddhi parīkṣām vā kuryāt pratyaya yoginīm
yathā śrī tantrasadbhāve kathitā parameśinā
śrī pūrvaśāstre api eṣā ca sūcitā parameśinā

original: AbhT_20.13a/. ānanda udbhavaḥ kampo nidrā ghūrṇiśca pañcamī /
analyzed: ānandaḥ udbhavaḥ kampaḥ nidrā ghūrṇiḥ ca pañcamī
iti evam vadatā śakti tāratamya abhidhāyinā
udbhavaḥ laghu bhāvena deha graha tirohiteḥ

original: AbhT_20.14b/. deho hi pārthivo mukhyastadā mukhyatvamujjhati // 14
analyzed: dehaḥ hi pārthivaḥ mukhyaḥ tadā mukhya tvam ujjhati
bhāvi lāghava mantreṇa śiṣyam dhyātvā samutplutam
karmāṇi tatra aśeṣāṇi pūrva uktāni ācaret guruḥ
uktā sā iyam tulā śuddhi dīkṣā pratyaya dāyinī
atha śrī tantrāloke ekaviṃśatitamam āhnikam
parokṣa saṃsthitasya atha dīkṣā karma nigadyate
bhukti mukti prasiddhi artham nīyate sat gurum prati
iti asmin mālinī vākye pratiḥ sāṃmukhya vācakaḥ
sāṃmukhyam ca asya śiṣyasya tad kṛpā āspada tā ātmakam
tam ārādhya iti vacanam kṛpā hetu upalakṣaṇam
tad saṃbandhāt tatas kaścid tad kṣaṇāt apavṛjyate
iti asya ayam api hi arthaḥ mālinī vākya sat maṇeḥ
tad kṣaṇāt iti na asya asti yiyāsā ādi kṣaṇa antaram
kiṃtu evam eva karuṇā nighnaḥ tam guruḥ uddharet
guru sevā kṣīṇa tanoḥ dīkṣām a prāpya pañcatām
gatasya atha svayam mṛtyu kṣaṇa udita tathā ruceḥ
athavā adhara tantra ādi dīkṣā saṃskāra bhāginaḥ
prāpta sāmayikasya atha parām dīkṣām a vindataḥ
ḍimba āhatasya yoga īśī bhakṣitasya abhicārataḥ
mṛtasya guruṇā yantra tantra ādi nihatasya vā
bhraṣṭa sva samayasya atha dīkṣām prāptavataḥ api alam
bandhu bhāryā suhṛd putra gāḍha abhyarthana yogataḥ
svayam tad viṣaya utpanna karuṇā bala tā api vā
vijñāta tad mukha āyāta śaktipāta aṃśa dharmaṇaḥ
guruḥ dīkṣām mṛtoddhārīm kurvīta śiva dāyinīm
śrī mṛtyuñjaya siddha ādau tat uktam parameśinā
a dīkṣite nṛpati ādau alase patite mṛte
bāla ātura strī vṛddhe ca mṛtoddhāram prakalpayet

original: AbhT_21.13a/. vidhiḥ sarvaḥ pūrvamuktaḥ sa tu saṃkṣipta iṣyate /
analyzed: vidhiḥ sarvaḥ pūrvam uktaḥ sa tu saṃkṣiptaḥ iṣyate

original: AbhT_21.13b/. gurvādipūjārahito bāhye bhogāya sā yataḥ // 13
analyzed: guru ādi pūjā rahitaḥ bāhye bhogāya sā yatas
adhivāsa caru kṣetram śayyā maṇḍala kalpane
na upayogi atra tad śiṣya saṃskriyā svapna dṛṣṭaye
mantra saṃnidhi saṃtṛpti yogāya atra tu maṇḍalam

original: AbhT_21.15b/. bhūyodine ca devārcā sākṣānnāsyopakāri tat // 15
analyzed: bhūyas dine ca deva arcā sākṣāt na asya upakāri tat
kriyā upakaraṇa sthāna maṇḍala ākṛti mantrataḥ

original: AbhT_21.17a/. tatpraviṣṭasya kasyāpi śiṣyāṇāṃ ca gurostathā /
analyzed: tad praviṣṭasya kasya api śiṣyāṇām ca guroḥ tathā
ekādaśā ete kathitāḥ saṃnidhānāya hetavaḥ
uttarottaram utkṛṣṭāḥ tathā vyāmiśraṇā vaśāt
kriyā ati bhūyasī puṣpa ādi uttamam lakṣaṇa anvitam

original: AbhT_21.19a/. ekaliṅgādi ca sthānaṃ yatrātmā saṃprasīdati /
analyzed: eka liṅga ādi ca sthānam yatra ātmā saṃprasīdati
maṇḍalam tri triśūla abja cakram yat mantra maṇḍale
anāhūte pi dṛṣṭam sat samayi tva prasādhanam
tat uktam mālinītantre siddham samaya maṇḍalam
yena saṃdṛṣṭa mātrā iti siddha mātra pada dvayāt
ākṛtiḥ dīpta rūpā yā mantraḥ tadvat su dīptikaḥ

original: AbhT_21.22a/. śiṣṭaṃ spaṣṭamato neha kathitaṃ vistarātpunaḥ /
analyzed: śiṣṭam spaṣṭam atas na iha kathitam vistarāt punar

original: AbhT_21.22b/. kṛtvā maṇḍalamabhyarcya tatra devaṃ kuśairatha // 22
analyzed: kṛtvā maṇḍalam abhyarcya tatra devam kuśaiḥ atha
gomayena ākṛtim kuryāt śiṣya vat tām nidhāpayet
tatas tasyām śodhyam ekam adhvānam vyāpti bhāvanāt

original: AbhT_21.24a/. prakṛtyantaṃ vinikṣipya punarenaṃ vidhiṃ caret /
analyzed: prakṛti antam vinikṣipya punar enam vidhim caret
mahā jāla prayogeṇa sarvasmāt adhva madhyataḥ
cittam ākṛṣya tatrastham kuryāt tad vidhiḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_21.25b/. mūlādhārādudetya prasṛtasuvitatānantanāḍyadhvadaṇḍaṃ vīryeṇākramya nāsāgaganaparigataṃ vikṣipan vyāptumīṣṭe /
analyzed: mūlādhārāt udetya prasṛta su vitata ananta nāḍī adhva daṇḍam vīryeṇa ākramya nāsā gagana parigatam vikṣipan vyāptum īṣṭe
yāvat dhūma abhirāma pracitatara śikhā jālakena adhva cakram saṃchādya abhīṣṭa jīva ānayanam iti mahā jāla nāmā prayogaḥ

original: AbhT_21.26a/. etenācchādanīyaṃ vrajati paravaśaṃ saṃmukhīnatvamādau pañcādānīyate cetsakalamatha tato@pyadhvamadhyādyatheṣṭam /
analyzed: etena ācchādanīyam vrajati paravaśam saṃmukhīna tvam ādau pañcāt ānīyate ced sakalam atha tatas upi adhva madhyāt yatheṣṭam

original: AbhT_21.26b/. ākṛṣṭāvuddhṛtau vā mṛtajanaviṣaye karṣaṇīye@tha jīve yogaḥ śrīśaṃbhunāthāgamaparigamito jālanāmā mayoktaḥ // 26
analyzed: ākṛṣṭau uddhṛtau vā mṛta jana viṣaye jīve yogaḥ śrī śaṃbhunātha āgama parigamitaḥ jāla nāmā mayā uktaḥ

original: AbhT_21.27a/. ciravighaṭite senāyugmeyathāmilite punarhayagajanaraṃ svāṃ svāṃ jātiṃ rasādabhidhāvati /
analyzed: cira vighaṭite senā yugme yathā milite punar haya gaja naram svām svām jātim rasāt abhidhāvati
karaṇa pavanaiḥ nāḍī cakraiḥ tathā eva samāgataiḥ nija nija rasāt ekībhāvyam sva jāla vaśīkṛtaiḥ
mahā jāla samākṛṣṭaḥ jīvaḥ vijñāna śālinā
svar preta tiryak nirayān tadā eva eṣa vimuñcati
tad jñāna mantra yoga āptaḥ puruṣaḥ ca eṣa kṛtrimam
yogī iva sādhya hṛdayāt tadā tādātmyam ujjhati
sthāvara ādi daśāḥ citrāḥ tad sa loka samīpa tāḥ

original: AbhT_21.30b/. tyajecceti na citraṃ sa evaṃ yaḥ karmaṇāpi vā // 30
analyzed: tyajet ca iti na citram saḥ evam yaḥ karmaṇā api vā
adhikāri śarīra tvāt mānuṣye tu śarīra gaḥ

original: AbhT_21.31b/. na tadā mucyate dehāddehānte tu śivaṃ vrajet // 31
analyzed: na tadā mucyate dehāt deha ante tu śivam vrajet

original: AbhT_21.32a/. tasmindehe tu kāpyasya jāyate śāṅkarī parā /
analyzed: tasmin dehe tu kā api asya jāyate śāṅkarī parā
bhaktiḥ ūhāt ca vijñānāt ācāryāt vā api asevitāt
tad deha saṃsthitaḥ api eṣa jīvaḥ jāla balāt imam
dārbha ādi deham vyāpnoti sva adhiṣṭhityā api a cetayan
yoga mantra kriyā jñāna bhūyas bala vaśāt punar
manuṣya deham api eṣa tadā eva āśu vimuñcati

original: AbhT_21.35a/. suptakalpo@pyadeho@pi yo jīvaḥ so@pi jālataḥ /
analyzed: supta kalpaḥ upi adehaḥ api yaḥ jīvaḥ saḥ api jālataḥ

original: AbhT_21.35b/. ākṛṣṭo dārbhamāyāti dehaṃ phalamayaṃ ca vā // 35
analyzed: ākṛṣṭaḥ dārbham āyāti deham phala mayam ca vā
jātīphala ādi yat kiṃcid tena vā deha kalpanā
antar bahis dvaya aucityāt tat atra utkṛṣṭam ucyate

original: AbhT_21.37a/. tato jālakramānītaḥ sa jīvaḥ suptavatsthitaḥ /
analyzed: tatas jāla krama ānītaḥ sa jīvaḥ supta vat sthitaḥ
manaḥ viśiṣṭa deha ādi sāmagrī prāpti abhāvataḥ

original: AbhT_21.38a/. na spandate na jānāti na vakti na kilecchati /
analyzed: na spandate na jānāti na vakti na kila icchati
tādṛśasya eva saṃskārān sarvān prāgvat prakalpayet
nirbīja dīkṣā yogena sarvam kṛtvā purā uditam

original: AbhT_21.39b/. vidhiṃ yojanikāṃ pūrṇāhutyā sākaṃ kṣipecca tam // 39
analyzed: vidhim yojanikām pūrṇāhutyā sākam kṣipet ca tam
dārbha ādi dehe mantra agnau arpite pūrṇayā saha
mukta pāśaḥ śivam yāti punarāvṛtti varjitaḥ

original: AbhT_21.41a/. sapratyayā tviyaṃ yatra spandate darbhajā tanuḥ /
analyzed: sa pratyayā tu iyam yatra spandate darbha jā tanuḥ
tatra prāṇa manaḥ mantra arpaṇa yogāt tathā bhavet

original: AbhT_21.42a/. sābhyāsasya tadapyuktaṃ balāśvāsi na tatkṛte /
analyzed: sa abhyāsasya tat api uktam balāśva asi na tad kṛte
mṛtoddhāra uditaiḥ eva yathāsaṃbhūti hetubhiḥ

original: AbhT_21.43a/. jīvatparokṣadīkṣāpi kāryā nirbījikā tu sā /
analyzed: jīvat parokṣa dīkṣā api kāryā nirbījikā tu sā
tasyām darbha ākṛti prāya kalpane jāla yogataḥ
saṃkalpa mātreṇa ākarṣaḥ jīvasya mṛti bhītitaḥ
śiṣṭam prāgvat kuśa ādi uttha ākāra viploṣa varjitam
pārimityāt anaiśvaryāt sādhye niyati yantraṇāt
jāla ākṛṣṭiḥ vinā abhyāsam rāga dveṣāt na jāyate
parokṣaḥ eva atulyābhiḥ dīkṣābhiḥ yadi dīkṣitaḥ
tatra uttaram syāt balavat saṃskārāya tu adhastanam
bhukti yojanikāyām tu bhūyobhiḥ gurubhiḥ tathā
kṛtāyām bhoga vaicitryam hetu vaicitrya yogataḥ
parokṣa dīkṣaṇe māyā uttīrṇe bhogāya yojayet

original: AbhT_21.48b/. bhogānīpsā durlabhā hi satī vā bhogahānaye // 48
analyzed: bhogān īpsā durlabhā hi satī vā bhoga hānaye
uktam hi sva anya saṃvittyoḥ sva saṃvid balavattarā
bādhaka tve bādhikā asau sāmya audāsīnyayoḥ tathā
śrīmān dharmaśivaḥ upi āha pārokṣyām karma paddhatau
agniḥ ciṭiciṭi śabdam sa dhūmam pratimuñcati
dhatte nīla ambuda chāyām muhur jvalati śāmyati

original: AbhT_21.52a/. vistaro ghorarūpaśca mahīṃ dhāvati cāpyadhaḥ /
analyzed: vistaraḥ ghora rūpaḥ ca mahīm dhāvati ca api adhas

original: AbhT_21.52b/. dhvāṃkṣādyaśravyaśabdo vā tadā taṃ lakṣayedguruḥ // 52
analyzed: dhvāṃkṣa ādya śravya śabdaḥ vā tadā tam lakṣayet guruḥ
brahmahatyā ādibhiḥ pāpaiḥ tad saṅgaiḥ ca upapātakaiḥ

original: AbhT_21.53b/. tadā tasya na kartavyā dīkṣāsminnakṛte vidhau // 53
analyzed: tadā tasya na kartavyā dīkṣā asmin a kṛte vidhau
nava ātmā phaṭ puṭa antar sthaḥ punar pañca phaṭ anvitaḥ
amukasya iti pāpāni dahāmi anu phaṭ aṣṭakam
iti sāhasrikaḥ homaḥ kartavyaḥ tila taṇḍulaiḥ

original: AbhT_21.55b/. ante pūrṇā ca dātavyā tato@smai dīkṣayā guruḥ // 55
analyzed: ante pūrṇā ca dātavyā tatas asmai dīkṣayā guruḥ
para yojana paryantam kuryāt tattva viśodhanam
pratyakṣe api sthitasya aṇoḥ pāpinaḥ bhagavat mayīm

original: AbhT_21.57a/. śaktiṃ prāptavato jyeṣṭhāmevameva vidhiṃ caret /
analyzed: śaktim prāptavataḥ jyeṣṭhām evam eva vidhim caret

original: AbhT_21.57b/. yadi vā daiśikaḥ samyaṅ na dīptastasya tatpurā // 57
analyzed: yadi vā daiśikaḥ samyak na dīptaḥ tasya tat purā
prāyaścittaiḥ tathā dānaiḥ prāṇāyāmaiḥ ca śodhanam

original: AbhT_21.58b/. kṛtvā vidhimimāṃ cāpi dīkṣāṃ kuryādaśaṅkitaḥ // 58
analyzed: kṛtvā vidhim imām ca api dīkṣām kuryāt aśaṅkitaḥ
sarvathā vartamānaḥ api tattva vid mocayet paśūn
icchayā eva śivaḥ sākṣāt tasmāt tam pūjayet sadā

original: AbhT_21.60a/. śāṭhyaṃ tatra na kāryaṃ ca tatkṛtvādho vrajecchiśuḥ /
analyzed: śāṭhyam tatra na kāryam ca tat kṛtvā adhas vrajet śiśuḥ

original: AbhT_21.60b/. na punaḥ kīrtayettasya pāpaṃ kīrtayitā vrajet // 60
analyzed: na punar kīrtayet tasya pāpam kīrtayitā vrajet
nirayam varjayet tasmāt iti dīkṣottare vidhiḥ
eṣā parokṣa dīkṣā dvidhā uditā jīvat itara bhedena
atha śrī tantrāloke dvāviṃśatitamam āhnikam
liṅga uddhāra ākhyām atha vacmaḥ śiva śāsana eka nirdiṣṭām
uktam śrī mālinītantre kila pārthiva dhāraṇām

original: AbhT_22.2b/. uktvā yo yojito yatra sa tasmānna nivartate // 2
analyzed: uktvā yaḥ yojitaḥ yatra sa tasmāt na nivartate
yogyatā vaśa saṃjātā yasya yatra eva śāsanā

original: AbhT_22.3b/. sa tatraiva niyoktavyo dīkṣākāle tatastvasau // 3
analyzed: sa tatra eva niyoktavyaḥ dīkṣā kāle tatas tu asau

original: AbhT_22.4a/. phalaṃ sarvaṃ samāsādya śive yukto@pavṛjyate /
analyzed: phalam sarvam samāsādya śive yuktā upavṛjyate
a yuktaḥ api ūrdhva saṃśuddhim saṃprāpya bhuvaneśataḥ
śuddhaḥ śiva tvam āyāti dagdha saṃsāra bandhanaḥ
uktvā puṃdhāraṇām ca uktam etat vaidāntikam mayā

original: AbhT_22.6a/. kapilāya purā proktaṃ prathame paṭale tathā /
analyzed: kapilāya purā proktam prathame paṭale tathā

original: AbhT_22.6b/. anena kramayogena saṃprāptaḥ paramaṃ padam // 6
analyzed: anena krama yogena saṃprāptaḥ paramam padam

original: AbhT_22.7a/. na bhūyaḥ paśutāmeti śuddhe svātmani tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: na bhūyas paśu tām eti śuddhe sva ātmani tiṣṭhati
atas hi dhvanyate irthaḥ iyam śiva tattva adhareṣu api
tattveṣu yojitasya asti punar uddharaṇīya tā
śiva āgamasya sarvebhyaḥ api āgamebhyaḥ viśiṣṭa tā

original: AbhT_22.9b/. śivajñānena ca vinā bhūyo@pi paśutodbhavaḥ // 9
analyzed: śiva jñānena ca vinā bhūyas api paśu tā udbhavaḥ
kramaḥ ca śakti saṃpātaḥ mala hāniḥ yiyāsu tā
dīkṣā bodhaḥ heya hāniḥ upādeya laya ātma tā
sva ātma sthitiḥ ca iti evam hi darśana antara saṃsthiteḥ
proktam uddharaṇīya tvam śiva śakti īritasya hi
atha vaiṣṇava bauddha ādi tantra anta adhara vartinām
yadā śiva arka raśmi oghaiḥ vikāsi hṛdaya ambujam

original: AbhT_22.13b/. liṅgoddhṛtistadā pūrvaṃ dīkṣākarma tataḥ param // 13
analyzed: liṅga uddhṛtiḥ tadā pūrvam dīkṣā karma tatas param
prāk liṅga antara saṃsthaḥ upi dīkṣātaḥ śiva tām vrajet
tatra upavāsya tam ca anya dine sa ādhāra mantrataḥ
sthaṇḍile pūjayitvā īśam śrāvayet tasya vartanīm
eṣa prāk abhavat liṅgī coditaḥ tu adhunā tvayā
prasannena tat etasmai kuru samyak anugraham

original: AbhT_22.16b/. svaliṅgatyāgaśaṅkotthaṃ prāyaścittaṃ ca māsya bhūt // 16
analyzed: sva liṅga tyāga śaṅkā uttham prāyaścittam ca mā asya bhūt
acirāt tvanmayībhūya bhogam mokṣam prapadyatām

original: AbhT_22.17b/. evamastvityathājñāṃ ca gṛhīrvā vratamasya tat // 17
analyzed: evam astu iti atha ājñām ca gṛhīḥ vā vratam asya tat
apāsya ambhasi nikṣipya snapayet anurūpatas
snātam saṃprokṣayet arghapātra ambhobhiḥ anantaram
pañcagavyam dantakāṣṭham tatas tasmai samarpayet

original: AbhT_22.19b/. tatastaṃ baddhanetraṃ ca praveśya praṇipātayet // 19
analyzed: tatas tam baddha netram ca praveśya praṇipātayet

original: AbhT_22.20a/. praṇavo mātṛkā māyā vyomavyāpī ṣaḍakṣaraḥ /
AbhT_22.20b/. bahurūpo@tha netrākhyaḥ sapta sādhāraṇā amī // 20
analyzed: bahurūpā utha netra ākhyaḥ sapta sādhāraṇāḥ amī
teṣām madhyāt ekatamam mantram asmai samarpayet
saḥ upi ahorātram eva enam japet alpa bhuj api abhuj
mantram asmai samarpya atha sa ādhāra vidhi saṃskṛte
vahnau tarpita tad mantre vrata śuddhim samācaret

original: AbhT_22.23a/. pūjitenaiva mantreṇa kṛtvā nāmāsya saṃpuṭam /
analyzed: pūjitena eva mantreṇa kṛtvā nāma asya saṃpuṭam
prāyaścittam śodhayāmi phaṭ svāhā iti ūha yogataḥ

original: AbhT_22.24a/. śataṃ sahasraṃ vā hutvā punaḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ tathā /
analyzed: śatam sahasram vā hutvā punar pūrṇāhutim tathā
prayogāt vauṣaṭ antām ca kṣiptvā āhūya vrateśvaram
tāraḥ vrata īśvarāya iti namaḥ ca iti enam arcayet

original: AbhT_22.25b/. śrāvayecca tvayā nāsya kāryaṃ kiṃcicchivājñayā // 25
analyzed: śrāvayet ca tvayā na asya kāryam kiṃcid śiva ājñayā

original: AbhT_22.26a/. tato vrateśvarastarpyaḥ svāhāntena tataśca saḥ /
analyzed: tatas vrateśvaraḥ tarpyaḥ svāhā antena tatas ca saḥ
kṣamayitvā visṛjyaḥ syāt tatas agneḥ ca visarjanam

original: AbhT_22.27a/. tacchrāvaṇaṃ ca devāya kṣamasveti visarjanam /
analyzed: tad śrāvaṇam ca devāya kṣamasva iti visarjanam
tatas tṛtīya divase prāgvat sarvaḥ vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
sādhaka ācārya tā mārge na yogyāḥ te punarbhuvaḥ
punarbhuvaḥ api jñāna iddhāḥ bhavanti guru tā āspadam
mokṣāya eva na bhogāya bhogāya api abhyupāyataḥ
iti uktavān sva paddhatyām īśāna śiva daiśikaḥ
guru antasya api adhas dṛṣṭi śāyinaḥ saṃskriyām imām

original: AbhT_22.32a/. kṛtvā rahasyaṃ kathayennānyathā kāmike kila /
