analyzed: kṛtvā rahasyam kathayet na anyathā kāmike kila
anya tantra abhiṣikte api rahasyam na prakāśayet
sva tantra sthaḥ api guru antaḥ gurum ajñam upāśritaḥ
tatra paścāt anāśvastaḥ tatra api vidhim ācaret
ajña ācārya mukha āyātam nirvīryam mantram eṣa yat
japtavān sa guruḥ ca atra na adhikārī ukta dūṣaṇāt

original: AbhT_22.35a/. tato@sya śuddhiṃ prākkṛtvā tato dīkṣāṃ samācaret /
analyzed: tatas asya śuddhim prāk kṛtvā tatas dīkṣām samācaret
adhas darśana saṃsthena guruṇā dīkṣitaḥ purā
tīvra śakti vaśāt paścāt yadā gacchet sa sat gurum

original: AbhT_22.36b/. tadāpyasya śiśorevaṃ śuddhiṃ kṛtvā sa sadguruḥ // 36
analyzed: tadā api asya śiśoḥ evam śuddhim kṛtvā sa sat guruḥ
dīkṣā ādi karma nikhilam kuryāt ukta vidhānataḥ

original: AbhT_22.37b/. prāpto@pi sadgururyogyabhāvamasya na vetti cet // 37
analyzed: prāptaḥ api sat guruḥ yogya bhāvam asya na vetti ced
vijñāna dāne tad śiṣyaḥ yogya tām darśayet nijām

original: AbhT_22.38b/. sarvathā tvabruvanneṣa bruvāṇo vā viparyayam // 38
analyzed: sarvathā tu abruvān eṣa bruvāṇaḥ vā viparyayam

original: AbhT_22.39a/. ajño vastuta eveti tattyaktvetthaṃ vidhiṃ caret /
analyzed: ajñaḥ vastutas evā iti tat tyaktvā ittham vidhim caret
na tirobhāva śaṅkā atra kartavyā buddhi śālinā
adhas spṛś tvam tirobhūtiḥ na ūrdhva upāya vivecanam
siddhānte dīkṣitāḥ tantre daśa aṣṭādaśa bhedini
siddhavīrāvalīsāre bhairavīye kule api ca
pañca dīkṣā krama upāttā dīkṣā anuttara saṃjñitā
tena liṅga uddhṛtya anugṛhyate
śāstra jñānam samanvicchet saḥ api yāyāt bahūn gurūn
tad dīkṣāḥ ca api gṛhṇīyāt abhiṣecana paścimāḥ
jñāna upodbalikāḥ tāḥ hi tad tad jñānavatā kṛtāḥ

original: AbhT_22.45a/. uktaṃ ca śrīmate śāstre tatra tatra ca bhūyasā /
analyzed: uktam ca śrī mate śāstre tatra tatra ca bhūyasā

original: AbhT_22.45b/. āmodārthī yathā bhṛṅgaḥ puṣpātpuṣpāntaraṃ vrajet // 45
analyzed: āmoda arthī yathā bhṛṅgaḥ puṣpāt puṣpa antaram vrajet

original: AbhT_22.46a/. vijñānārthī tathā śiṣyo gurorgurvantaraṃ tviti /
analyzed: vijñāna arthī tathā śiṣyaḥ guroḥ guru antaram tu iti

original: AbhT_22.46b/. gurūṇāṃ bhūyasāṃ madhye yato vijñānamuttamam // 46
analyzed: gurūṇām bhūyasām madhye yatas vijñānam uttamam

original: AbhT_22.47a/. prāptaṃ so@sya gururdīkṣā nātra mukhyā hi saṃvidi /
analyzed: prāptam sā usya guruḥ dīkṣā na atra mukhyā hi saṃvidi

original: AbhT_22.47b/. sarvajñānanidhānaṃ tu guruṃ saṃprāpya susthitaḥ // 47
analyzed: sarva jñāna nidhānam tu gurum saṃprāpya susthitaḥ
tam eva ārādhayet dhīmān tad tad jijñāsana unmukhaḥ
iti dīkṣā vidhiḥ proktaḥ liṅga uddharaṇa paścimaḥ
atha śrī tantrāloke trayoviṃśatitamam āhnikam
atha abhiṣekasya vidhiḥ kathyate pārameśvaraḥ
yā eṣā putraka dīkṣā uktā guru sādhakayoḥ api
sā eva adhikāriṇī bhogya tattva yuktimatī kramāt
su abhyasta jñāninam santam bubhūṣum atha bhāvinam

original: AbhT_23.3b/. yogyaṃ jñātvā svādhikāraṃ gurustasmai samarpayet // 3
analyzed: yogyam jñātvā sva adhikāram guruḥ tasmai samarpayet

original: AbhT_23.4a/. yo naivaṃ veda naivāsāvabhiṣikto@pi daiśikaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ nā evam veda na eva asau abhiṣiktaḥ api daiśikaḥ

original: AbhT_23.5a/. yo na vedādhvasandhānaṃ ṣoḍhā bāhyāntarasthitam /
analyzed: yaḥ na veda adhva sandhānam ṣoḍhā bāhya antara sthitam
sa guruḥ mocayet na iti siddhayogīśvarīmate
sarva lakṣaṇa hīnaḥ api jñānavān guruḥ iṣyate
jñāna prādhānyam eva uktam iti śrī kaca bhārgave

original: AbhT_23.8a/. na svayaṃbhūstasya coktaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ parameśinā /
analyzed: na svayaṃbhūḥ tasya ca uktam lakṣaṇam parameśinā
abhaktaḥ jīvita dhiyā kurvan īśān adhiṣṭhitaḥ
paścā ātmanā svayaṃbhūṣṇuḥ na adhikārī sa kutracid
bhasma aṅkuraḥ vrati sutaḥ duḥśīlā tanayaḥ tathā

original: AbhT_23.10a/. kuṇḍo golaśca te duṣṭā uktaṃ devyākhyayāmale /
analyzed: kuṇḍaḥ golaḥ ca te duṣṭāḥ uktam devī ākhya yāmale

original: AbhT_23.10b/. punarbhūścānyaliṅgo yaḥ punaḥ śaive pratiṣṭhitaḥ // 10
analyzed: punarbhūḥ ca anya liṅgaḥ yaḥ punar śaive pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: AbhT_23.11a/. śrīpūrvaśāstre na tveṣa niyamaḥ ko@pi coditaḥ /
analyzed: śrī pūrvaśāstre na tu eṣa niyamaḥ kaḥ api coditaḥ
yathā artha tattva saṃgha jñaḥ tathā śiṣye prakāśakaḥ

original: AbhT_23.12a/. yaḥ punaḥ sarvatattvāni vettītyādi ca lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: yaḥ punar sarva tattvāni vetti ityādi ca lakṣaṇam

original: AbhT_23.12b/. yogacāre ca yadyatra tantre coditamācaret // 12
analyzed: yogacāre ca yat yatra tantre ca uditam ācaret

original: AbhT_23.13a/. tathaiva siddhaye seyamājñeti kila varṇitam /
analyzed: tathā eva siddhaye sā iyam ājñā iti kila varṇitam
yaḥ tu karmi tayā ācāryaḥ tatra kāṇa ādi varjanam
yatas kāraka sāmagryāt karmaṇaḥ na adhikaḥ kvacid
devyāḥ yāmalaśāstre ca kāñci ādi parivarjanam
tad dṛṣṭa doṣāt krodha ādeḥ samyak jñātari asau kutas
guravaḥ tu svayaṃbhu ādi varjyam yat yāmala ādiṣu
karmi abhiprāyataḥ sarvam tat iti vyācacakṣire
atas deśa kula ācāra deha lakṣaṇa kalpanām
an ādṛtya eva saṃpūrṇa jñānam kuryāt guruḥ gurum

original: AbhT_23.17b/. prāgvatsaṃpūjya hutvā ca śrāvayitvā cikīrṣitam // 17
analyzed: prāgvat saṃpūjya hutvā ca śrāvayitvā cikīrṣitam

original: AbhT_23.18a/. tato@bhiṣiñcettaṃ śiṣyaṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā tataḥ sakṛt /
analyzed: tatas abhiṣiñcet tam śiṣyam catuḥṣaṣṭyā tatas sakṛt
tad mantra rasa toyena pūrva ukta vidhinā guruḥ
vibhavena su vistīrṇam tatas tasmai vadet svakam

original: AbhT_23.19b/. sarvaṃ kartavyasāraṃ yacchāstrāṇāṃ paramaṃ rahaḥ // 19
analyzed: sarvam kartavya sāram yat śāstrāṇām paramam rahaḥ
anugrāhyāḥ tvayā śiṣyāḥ śiva śakti pracoditāḥ

original: AbhT_23.20b/. uktaṃ jñānottare caitadbrāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā viśaḥ // 20
analyzed: uktam jñānottare ca etat brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ viśaḥ

original: AbhT_23.21a/. napuṃsakāḥ striyaḥ śūdrā ye cānye@pi tadarthinaḥ /
analyzed: napuṃsakāḥ striyaḥ śūdrāḥ ye ca anye api tad arthinaḥ

original: AbhT_23.21b/. te dīkṣāyāṃ na mīmāṃsyā jñānakāle vicārayet // 21
analyzed: te dīkṣāyām na mīmāṃsyāḥ jñāna kāle vicārayet

original: AbhT_23.22a/. jñānamūlo guruḥ proktaḥ saptasatrīṃ pravartayet /
analyzed: jñāna mūlaḥ guruḥ proktaḥ sapta satrīm pravartayet

original: AbhT_23.22b/. dīkṣā vyākhyā kṛpā maitrī śāstracintā śivaikatā // 22

analyzed: annādidānam iti etat pālayet sapta satrakam
abhiṣeka vidhau ca asmai karaṇī khaṭikā ādikam
sarva upakaraṇa vrātam arpaṇīyam vipaścite
saḥ abhiṣiktaḥ gurum paścāt dakṣiṇābhiḥ prapūjayet

original: AbhT_23.25a/. jñānahīno guruḥ karmī svādhikāraṃ samarpya no /
analyzed: jñāna hīnaḥ guruḥ karmī sva adhikāram samarpya no
dīkṣā ādi adhikṛtim kuryāt vinā tasya ājñayā punar
iti evam śrāvayet saḥ api namaskṛtya abhinandayet
tatas prabhṛti asau pūrvaḥ guruḥ tyakta adhikārakaḥ
yatheccham vicaret vyākhyā dīkṣā ādau yantraṇa ujjhitaḥ
kurvan na bādhyate yasmāt dīpāt dīpa vat īdṛśaḥ
santānaḥ na adhikārasya cyavokurvan na bādhyate

original: AbhT_23.28b/. prāk ca kurvanvihanyeta siddhātantre taducyate // 28
analyzed: prāk ca kurvan vihanyeta siddhātantre tat ucyate
yathārtham upadeśam tu kurvan ācāryaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_23.29b/. na cāvajñā kriyākāle saṃsāroddharaṇaṃ prati // 29
analyzed: na ca avajñā kriyā kāle saṃsāra uddharaṇam prati

original: AbhT_23.30a/. na dīkṣeta guruḥ śiṣyaṃ tattvayuktastu garvataḥ /
analyzed: na dīkṣeta guruḥ śiṣyam tattva yuktaḥ tu garvataḥ

original: AbhT_23.30b/. yo@sya syānnarake vāsa iha ca vyādhito bhavet // 30
analyzed: yaḥ syāt narake vāse iha ca vyādhitaḥ bhavet
prāpta abhiṣekaḥ sa guruḥ ṣaṣ māsāt mantra paddhatim
sarvām tantra uditām dhyāyet japet ca a tanmaya tvataḥ
yadā eva tanmayībhūtaḥ tadā vīryam upāgataḥ
chindyāt pāśān tatas yatnam kuryāt tad maya tā sthitau
hṛd cakrāt utthitā sūkṣmā śaśi sphaṭika saṃnibhā

original: AbhT_23.34a/. dvādaśānte nirūḍhā sā sauṣumne tripathāntare /
analyzed: dvādaśānte nirūḍhā sā sauṣumne tripatha antare
tatra hṛd cakram āpūrya japet mantram jvalat prabham
yāvat śānta śikhā ākīrṇam viśva ājya pravilāpakam
tad ājya dhārā saṃtṛpta māna abhi kuhara antaram

original: AbhT_23.36b/. evaṃ mantrā mokṣadāḥ syurdīptā buddhāḥ sunirmalāḥ // 36
analyzed: evam mantrāḥ mokṣa dāḥ syuḥ dīptāḥ buddhāḥ su nirmalāḥ
yatra yatra japet cakre samasta vyasta bhedanāt

original: AbhT_23.39a/. tatra tatra mahāmantra iti devyākhyayāmale /
analyzed: tatra tatra mahā mantraḥ iti devī ākhya yāmale
vidyā vratam idam proktam mantra vīrya prasiddhaye
tat ca tādātmyam eva iti yat uktam spandaśāsane
tat ākramya balam mantrāḥ sarvajña bala śālinaḥ
pravartante idhikārāya karaṇāni iva dehinām
kṛtavidyā vrataḥ paścāt dīkṣā vyākhyā ādi sarvatas
kuryāt yogyeṣu śiṣyeṣu na ayogyeṣu kadācana
rahasye yojayet vipram parīkṣya viparītatas
ācārāt śaktim api eva na anyathā iti ūrmiśāsane
nitya ādi alpa alpakam kuryāt yat uktam brahmayāmale

original: AbhT_23.44a/. cīrṇavidyāvrataḥ sarvaṃ manasā vā smaretpriye /
analyzed: cīrṇa vidyā vrataḥ sarvam manasā vā smaret priye
deha saṃbandha saṃchanna sārvajñyaḥ dambha bhājanam
a vidan dīkṣamāṇaḥ api na duṣyet daiśikaḥ kvacid

original: AbhT_23.45b/. jñātvā tvayogyatāṃ nainaṃ dīkṣeta pratyavāyitām // 45
analyzed: jñātvā tu ayogya tām na enam dīkṣeta pratyavāyi tām

original: AbhT_23.46a/. buddhvā jñāne śāstrasiddhigurutvādau ca taṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: buddhvā jñāne śāstra siddhi guru tva ādau ca tam punar
bhūyas eva parīkṣeta tad tad aucitya śālinam

original: AbhT_23.47a/. tatra tatra niyuñjīta natu jātu viparyayāt /
analyzed: tatra tatra niyuñjīta na tu jātu viparyayāt

original: AbhT_23.47b/. nanu tadvastvayogyasya tatrecchā jāyate kutaḥ // 47
analyzed: nanu tad vastu ayogyasya tatra icchā jāyate kutas
tad īśa adhiṣṭhita icchā eva yogyatām asya sūcayet

original: AbhT_23.48b/. satyaṃ kāpi prabuddhāsāvicchā rūḍhiṃ na gacchati // 48
analyzed: satyam kā api prabuddhā asau icchā rūḍhim na gacchati
vidyut vat pāpa śīlasya yathā pāpa apavarjane
rūḍhi arūḍhī tad icchāyāḥ api śaṃbhu prasādataḥ
a prarūḍha tathā icchākaḥ tatas eva na bhājanam
yaḥ samyak jñānam ādāya guru viśvāsa varjitaḥ
lokam viplāvayet na asmin jñāte vijñānam arpayet
ajñāte api punar jñāte vijñāna haraṇam caret
punar punar yadā jñātaḥ viśvāsa parivarjitaḥ
tadā tam agratas dhyāyet sphurantam candra sūrya vat
tatas nija hṛd ambhoja bodha ambara tala uditām
svarbhānu malinām dhyāyet vāmām śaktim vimohanīm
vāma ācāra krameṇa enām niḥsṛtām sādhya gāminīm

original: AbhT_23.54b/. cintayitvā tayā grastaprakāśaṃ taṃ vicintayet // 54
analyzed: cintayitvā tayā grasta prakāśam tam vicintayet
anena krama yogena mūḍha buddheḥ durātmanaḥ
vijñāna mantra vidyā ādyāḥ prakurvanti apakāri tām

original: AbhT_23.56a/. nanu vijñānamātmasthaṃ kathaṃ hartuṃ kṣamaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: nanu vijñānam ātma stham katham hartum kṣamam bhavet

original: AbhT_23.56b/. ato vijñānaharaṇaṃ kathaṃ śrīpūrva ucyate // 56
analyzed: atas vijñāna haraṇam katham śrī pūrve ucyate

original: AbhT_23.57a/. ucyate nāsya śiṣyasya vijñānaṃ rūḍhimāgatam /
analyzed: ucyate na asya śiṣyasya vijñānam rūḍhim āgatam
tathātve haraṇam kasmāt pūrṇa yogya tva śālinaḥ

original: AbhT_23.58a/. kiṃtveṣa vāmayā śaktyā mūḍho gāḍhaṃ vibhoḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: kiṃtu eṣa vāmayā śaktyā mūḍhaḥ gāḍham vibhoḥ kṛtaḥ
svabhāvāt eva tena asya vidyā ādyam apakārakam

original: AbhT_23.59a/. guruḥ punaḥ śivābhinnaḥ sanyaḥ pañcavidhāṃ kṛtim /
analyzed: guruḥ punar śiva abhinnaḥ sanyaḥ pañcavidhām kṛtim
kuryāt yadi tatas pūrṇam adhikāri tvam asya tat
atas yathā śuddha tattva sṛṣṭi sthityoḥ mala atyaye
śiva abhedena tat kuryāt tadvat pañcamam api ayam
tirobhāva abhidham kṛtyam tathā asau śiva tā ātmakaḥ

original: AbhT_23.62a/. ata eva śive śāstre jñāne cāśvāsabhājanam /
analyzed: atas eva śive śāstre jñāne ca āśvāsa bhājanam
guroḥ mūḍha tayā kopa dhāmā api na tirohitaḥ

original: AbhT_23.63a/. gururhi kupito yasya sa tirohita ucyate /
analyzed: guruḥ hi kupitaḥ yasya sa tirohitaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_23.63b/. saṃsārī satu devo hi gururna ca mṛṣāvidaḥ // 63
analyzed: saṃsārī satu devaḥ hi guruḥ na ca mṛṣāvidaḥ

original: AbhT_23.64a/. tata eva ca śāstrādidūṣako yadyapi krudhā /
analyzed: tatas eva ca śāstra ādi dūṣakaḥ yadi api krudhā

original: AbhT_23.64b/. na dahyate@sau guruṇā tathāpyeṣa tirohitaḥ // 64
analyzed: na dahyate asau guruṇā tathā api eṣa tirohitaḥ
asmad guru āgamaḥ tu eṣa tirobhūte svayam śiśau

original: AbhT_23.65b/. na kupyenna śapeddhīmān sa hyanugrāhakaḥ sadā // 65
analyzed: na kupyet na śapet dhīmān sa hi anugrāhakaḥ sadā

original: AbhT_23.66a/. īśecchācoditaḥ pāśaṃ yadi kaṇṭhe nipīḍayet /
analyzed: īśa icchā coditaḥ pāśam yadi kaṇṭhe nipīḍayet
kim ācāryeṇa tatra asya kāryā syāt sahakāri tā
śiva abhinnaḥ api hi guruḥ anugraha mayīm vibhoḥ
mukhyām śaktim upāsīnaḥ nugṛhṇīyāt sa sarvathā

original: AbhT_23.68a/. svātantryamātrajñaptyai tu kathitaṃ śāstra īdṛśam /
analyzed: svātantrya mātra jñaptyai tu kathitam śāstre īdṛśam

original: AbhT_23.68b/. na kāryaṃ patatāṃ hastālambaḥ sahyo na pātanam // 68
analyzed: na kāryam patatām hasta ālambaḥ sahyaḥ na pātanam
atas eva svatantra tvāt icchāyāḥ punar unmukham
prāyaścittaiḥ viśodhya enam dīkṣeta kṛpayā guruḥ
ūrdhva dṛṣṭau prapannaḥ san na āśvastaḥ tatas param
adhas śāstram prapadya api na śreyaḥ pātra tām iyāt
adhas dṛṣṭau prapannaḥ tu tad anāśvasta mānasaḥ
ūrdhva śāsana bhāj pāpam tat ca ujjhet ca śivībhavet
rājñe druhyan amātya aṅga bhūtaḥ upi hi vihanyate
viparyayaḥ tu na iti evam ūrdhvām dṛṣṭim samāśrayet
śrī pūrvaśāstre tena uktam yāvat tena eva na uddhṛtaḥ
atra hi arthaḥ iyam etāvat pūrva ukta jñāna vṛṃhitaḥ
guruḥ tāvat saḥ eva atra tad śabdena avamṛśyate
tādṛś su abhyasta vijñāna bhājā ūrdhva pada śālinā
an uddhṛtasya na śreyaḥ etat anya guru uddhṛteḥ
atas eva ambujanmā arka dṛṣṭāntaḥ utra nirūpitaḥ
trijagat jyotiṣaḥ hi anyat tejaḥ nyat ca niśākṛtaḥ
jñānam anyat trika guroḥ anyat tu adhara vartinām

original: AbhT_23.77a/. ata eva purābhūtagurvabhāvo yadā tadā /
analyzed: atas eva purābhūta guru abhāvaḥ yadā tadā
tad anyam lakṣaṇa upetam āśrayet punar unmukhaḥ
sati tasmin tu unmukhaḥ san kasmāt jahyāt yadi sphuṭam
syāt anyatara gaḥ doṣaḥ yodhi kāra apaghātakaḥ

original: AbhT_23.79a/. doṣaśceha na lokastho doṣatvena nirūpyate /
analyzed: doṣaḥ ca iha na loka sthaḥ doṣa tvena nirūpyate
ajñāna khyāpana ayukta khyāpana ātmā tu asau mataḥ
śiṣyasya api tathābhūta jñāna anāśvasta rūpa tā

original: AbhT_23.80b/. mukhyo doṣastadanye hi doṣāstatprabhavā yataḥ // 80
analyzed: mukhyaḥ doṣaḥ tad anye hi doṣāḥ tad prabhavāḥ yatas

original: AbhT_23.81a/. na dhvastavyādhikaḥ ko hi bhiṣajaṃ bahu manyate /
analyzed: na dhvasta vyādhikaḥ kaḥ hi bhiṣajam bahu manyate
asūyuḥ nūnam adhvasta vyādhiḥ svasthāyate balāt

original: AbhT_23.82a/. evaṃ jñānasamāśvastaḥ kiṃ kiṃ na gurave caret /
analyzed: evam jñāna samāśvastaḥ kim kim na gurave caret

original: AbhT_23.82b/. no cennūnamaviśvasto viśvasta iva tiṣṭhati // 82
analyzed: no ced nūnam aviśvastaḥ viśvastaḥ iva tiṣṭhati

original: AbhT_23.83a/. ajñānādaya evaite doṣā na laukikā guroḥ /
analyzed: ajñāna ādayaḥ eva ete doṣāḥ na laukikāḥ guroḥ
iti khyāpayitum proktam mālinīvijayottare

original: AbhT_23.84a/. na tasyānveṣayedvṛttaṃ śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
analyzed: na tasya anveṣayet vṛttam śubham vā yadi vā aśubham

original: AbhT_23.84b/. sa eva tadvijānāti yuktaṃ cāyuktameva vā // 84
analyzed: saḥ eva tat vijānāti yuktam ca ayuktam eva vā
akāryeṣu yadā saktaḥ prāṇa dravya apahāriṣu
tadā nivāraṇīyā usau praṇatena vipaścitā
viśeṣaṇam akāryāṇām ukta abhiprāyam eva yat
tena ativāryamāṇaḥ api yadi asau na nivartate
tadā anyatra kvacid gatvā śivam eva anucintayet

original: AbhT_23.87b/. na hyasya sa gurutve syāddoṣo yenoṣare kṛṣim // 87
analyzed: na hi asya sa guru tve syāt doṣaḥ yena ūṣare kṛṣim
kuryāt vrajet niśāyām vā sa tu artha prāṇa hārakaḥ
tadīya apriya bhīruḥ tu param tādṛśam ācaret
yatas tat apriyam na eṣa śṛṇuyāt iti bhāṣitam

original: AbhT_23.89b/. śrīmātaṅge taduktaṃ ca nādhītaṃ bhūmabhītitaḥ // 89
analyzed: śrī mātaṅge tat uktam ca na adhītam bhūma bhītitaḥ
yat ca etat uktam etāvat kartavyam iti tat dhruvam
tīvra śakti gṛhītānām svayam eva hṛdi sphuret
upadeśaḥ tu ayam manda madhya śakteḥ nijām kramāt

original: AbhT_23.91b/. śaktiṃ jvalayituṃ proktaḥ sā hyevaṃ jājvalītyalam // 91
analyzed: śaktim jvalayitum proktaḥ sā hi evam
dṛḍha anurāga subhaga saṃrambha ābhoga bhāginaḥ
sva ullāsi smara sarvasyam dārḍhyāya anyatra dṛśyate
nanu eṣa kasmāt dṛṣṭāntaḥ kim etena aśubham kṛtam

original: AbhT_23.93b/. citspandaḥ sarvago bhinnādupādheḥ sa tathā tathā // 93
analyzed: cit spandaḥ sarva gaḥ bhinnāt upādheḥ sa tathā tathā
bhavet kaḥ api tirobhūtaḥ punar unmukhitaḥ api san
vinā api daiśikāt prāgvat svayam eva vimucyate
prakāraḥ tu eṣa na atra uktaḥ śaktipāta balāt gataḥ
asaṃbhāvya tayā ca atra dṛḍha kopa prasāda vat

original: AbhT_23.96a/. ityeṣa yo guroḥ prokto vidhistaṃ pālayedguruḥ /
analyzed: iti eṣa yaḥ guroḥ proktaḥ vidhiḥ tam pālayet guruḥ

original: AbhT_23.96b/. anyathā na śivaṃ yāyācchrīmatsāre ca varṇitam // 96
analyzed: anyathā na śivam yāyāt śrīmat sāre ca varṇitam

original: AbhT_23.97a/. anyāyaṃ ye prakurvanti śāstrārthaṃ varjayantyalam /
analyzed: anyāyam ye prakurvanti śāstra artham varjayanti alam
anyatra api adhikāram ca na īyāt vidyeśa tām vrajet
anyatra samaya tyāgāt kravyāda tvam śatam samāḥ
iyat tatratya tātparyam siddhānta guruḥ unnayaḥ

original: AbhT_23.99b/. bhavetpiśācavidyeśaḥ śuddha eva tu tāntrikaḥ // 99
analyzed: bhavet piśāca vidyā īśaḥ śuddhaḥ eva tu tāntrikaḥ
ṣaṣ ardha daiśikaḥ ca ardha nārīśa bhuvana sthitiḥ
eṣā karma pradhānānām gurūṇām gatiḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_23.101a/. jñānināṃ caiṣa no bandha iti sarvatra varṇitam /
analyzed: jñāninām ca eṣa naḥ bandhaḥ iti sarvatra varṇitam
sādhakasya abhiṣeke api sarvaḥ yam kathyate vidhiḥ

original: AbhT_23.102a/. adhikārārpaṇaṃ nātra naca vidyāvrataṃ kila /
analyzed: adhikāra arpaṇam na atra na ca vidyā vratam kila
sādhya mantra arpaṇam tu atra sva upayogi kriyā krame
samasta ipi upadeśaḥ syāt nija upakaraṇa arpaṇam
abhiṣeka vidhiḥ nirūpitaḥ parameśeṇa yathā nirūpitaḥ
atha śrī tantrāloke caturviṃśatitamam āhnikam
atha śāmbhava śāsana uditām sa rahasyām śṛṇuta antya saṃskriyām
sarveṣām adhara sthānām guru antānām api sphuṭam
śaktipātāt purā proktāt kuryāt antyeṣṭi dīkṣaṇam
ūrdhva śāsana gānām ca samaya upahata ātmanām
antyeṣṭi dīkṣā kartavyā guruṇā tattva vedinā
samayācāra doṣeṣu pramādāt skhalitasya hi
antyeṣṭi dīkṣā kāryā iti śrī dīkṣottaraśāsane
yat kiṃcid kathitam pūrvam mṛtoddhāra abhidhe vidhau

original: AbhT_24.5b/. pratimāyāṃ tadevātra sarvaṃ śavatanau caret // 5
analyzed: pratimāyām tat eva atra sarvam śava tanau caret
śrī siddhātantra kathitaḥ vidhiḥ eṣa nirūpyate
antimam yat bhavet pūrvam tat kṛtvā antimam ādimam
saṃhṛtya ekaikam iṣṭiḥ yā sā antyeṣṭiḥ dvitayī matā
pūjā dhyāna japa āpluṣṭa samaye na tu sādhake

original: AbhT_24.8a/. piṇḍapātādayaṃ muktaḥ khecaro vā bhavetpriye /
analyzed: piṇḍapātāt ayam muktaḥ khecaraḥ vā bhavet priye

original: AbhT_24.8b/. ācārye tattvasaṃpanne yatra tatra mṛte sati // 8
analyzed: ācārye tattva saṃpanne yatra tatra mṛte sati
antyeṣṭiḥ nā eva vidyeta śuddha cetasya mūrdhani

original: AbhT_24.9b/. mantrayogādibhirye ca māritā narake tu te // 9
analyzed: mantra yoga ādibhiḥ ye ca māritāḥ narake tu te
kāryā teṣām iha antyeṣṭiḥ guruṇā ati kṛpālunā

original: AbhT_24.10b/. na maṇḍalādikaṃ tvatra bhavecchamāśānike vidhau // 10
analyzed: na maṇḍala ādikam tu atra bhavet śamāśānike vidhau
kecid tat api kartavyam ūcire preta sadmani

original: AbhT_24.11b/. pūjayitvā vibhuṃ sarvaṃ nyāsaṃ pūrvavadācaret // 11
analyzed: pūjayitvā vibhum sarvam nyāsam pūrva vat ācaret
saṃhāra krama yogena caraṇāt mūrdha paścimam
tathā eva bodhayet enam kriyā jñāna samādhibhiḥ
bindunā rodhayet tattvam śakti bījena vedhayet

original: AbhT_24.13b/. ghaṭṭayennādadeśe tu triśūlena tu tāḍayet // 13
analyzed: ghaṭṭayet nāda deśe tu triśūlena tu tāḍayet
suṣumnā antargatena eva visargeṇa punar punar

original: AbhT_24.14b/. tāḍayeta kalāḥ sarvāḥ kampate@sau tataḥ paśuḥ // 14
analyzed: tāḍayeta kalāḥ sarvāḥ kampate au tatas paśuḥ
utkṣipet vāma hastam vā tatas tam yojayet pare

original: AbhT_24.15b/. pratyayena vinā mokṣo hyaśraddheyo vimohitaiḥ // 15
analyzed: pratyayena vinā mokṣaḥ hi aśraddheyaḥ vimohitaiḥ
tad artham etat uditam na tu mokṣa upayogi adaḥ
iti ūce parameśaḥ śrī kulagahvara śāsane
sādhyaḥ unumeyaḥ mokṣa ādiḥ pratyayaiḥ yat atīndriyaḥ
dīkṣottare ca puri aṣṭa varga arpaṇam iha uditam

original: AbhT_24.18a/. tadvidhiḥ śrutipatre@bje madhye devaṃ sadāśivam /
analyzed: tad vidhiḥ śruti pattra ibje madhye devam sadāśivam
īśa rudra hari brahma catuṣkam prāc diś ādeḥ

original: AbhT_24.19a/. pūjayitvā śrutisparśau rasaṃ gandhaṃ vapurdvayam /
analyzed: pūjayitvā śruti sparśau rasam gandham vapuḥ dvayam
dhī ahaṃkṛtī manaḥ ca iti brahma ādiṣu arpayet kramāt

original: AbhT_24.20a/. eteṣāṃ tarpaṇaṃ kṛtvā śatahomena daiśikaḥ /
analyzed: eteṣām tarpaṇam kṛtvā śata homena daiśikaḥ
eṣā sāṃnyāsikī dīkṣā puryaṣṭaka viśodhanī
puryaṣṭakasya abhāve ca na svarga naraka ādayaḥ

original: AbhT_24.21b/. tathā kṛtvā na kartavyaṃ laukikaṃ kiṃcanāpi hi // 21
analyzed: tathā kṛtvā na kartavyam laukikam kiṃcana api hi
uktam śrī mādhava kule śāsana sthaḥ mṛteṣu api
piṇḍapāta udaka asru ādi laukikam parivarjayet

original: AbhT_24.23a/. śivaṃ saṃpūjya cakrārcāṃ yathāśakti samācaret /
analyzed: śivam saṃpūjya cakra arcām yathāśakti samācaret
kramāt tri daśama triṃśa triṃśa vatsara vāsare
iti uktaḥ untya iṣṭi yāgaḥ yam parameśvara bhāṣitaḥ
atha śrī tantrāloke pañcaviṃśatitamam āhnikam
atha śrāddha vidhiḥ śrīmat ṣaṣ ardha uktaḥ nigadyate
siddhātantre sūcitā asau mūrti yāga nirūpaṇe
antyeṣṭyā su viśuddhānām aśuddhānām ca tad vidhiḥ

original: AbhT_25.3a/. tryahe turye@hni daśame māsi māsyādyavatsare /
analyzed: tri ahe turya ihni daśame māsi māsi ādya vatsare

original: AbhT_25.3b/. varṣe varṣe sarvakālaṃ kāryastatsvaiḥ sa pūrvavat // 3
analyzed: varṣe varṣe sarvakālam kāryaḥ tad svaiḥ sa pūrvavat
tatra prāgvat yajet devam homayet anale tathā
tatas naivedyam eva prāk gṛhītvā hasta gocare
guruḥ anna mayīm śaktim vṛṃhikām vīrya rūpiṇīm

original: AbhT_25.5b/. dhyātvā tayā samāviṣṭaṃ taṃ sādhyaṃ cintayetsudhīḥ // 5
analyzed: dhyātvā tayā samāviṣṭam tam sādhyam cintayet sudhīḥ
tatas asya yaḥ pāśava oṃśaḥ bhogya rūpaḥ tam arpayet
bhoktari eka ātma bhāvena śiṣyaḥ ittham śivībhavet

original: AbhT_25.7a/. bhogyatānyā tanurdeha iti pāśātmakā matāḥ /
analyzed: bhogya tā anyā tanuḥ dehaḥ iti pāśa ātmakāḥ matāḥ
śrāddhe mṛta uddhṛtau antayāge teṣām śivīkṛtiḥ
ekena eva vidhānena yadi api syāt kṛtārtha tā

original: AbhT_25.8b/. tathāpi tanmayībhāvasiddhyai sarvaṃ vidhiṃ caret // 8
analyzed: tathā api tanmayībhāva siddhyai sarvam vidhim caret
bubhukṣoḥ tu kriyā abhyāsa bhūmānau phala bhūmani
tattva jñāna arka vidhvasta dhvāntasya tu na kaḥ api ayam
antyeṣṭi śrāddha vidhi ādiḥ upayogī kadācana
teṣām tu guru tad varga vargya sabrahmacāriṇām
bhavet
yadā hi bodhasya udrekaḥ tadā parva āha pūraṇāt
janma aikya divasau tena parvaṇī bodha siddhitaḥ
putrakaḥ api yadā kasmaicana syāt upakārakaḥ
tadā mātuḥ pituḥ śakteḥ vāma dakṣa antarāla gāḥ
nāḍīḥ pravāhayet devāya arpayeta niveditam
śrīmat bharuṇatantre ca tat śivena nirūpitam
tad vāha kāla apekṣā ca kāryā tad rūpa siddhaye

original: AbhT_25.15b/. svācchandyenātha tatsiddhiṃ vidhinā bhāvinā caret // 15
analyzed: svācchandyena atha tad siddhim vidhinā bhāvinā caret

original: AbhT_25.16a/. yasya kasyāpi vā śrāddhe gurudevāgnitarpaṇam /
analyzed: yasya kasya api vā śrāddhe guru deva agni tarpaṇam

original: AbhT_25.16b/. sacakreṣṭi bhavecchrauto natu syātpāśavo vidhiḥ // 16
analyzed: sa cakra iṣṭi bhavet śrautaḥ na tu syāt pāśavaḥ vidhiḥ

original: AbhT_25.17a/. śrīmaukuṭe tathā coktaṃ śivaśāstre sthito@pi yaḥ /
analyzed: śrī maukuṭe tathā ca uktam śivaśāstre sthitaḥ api yaḥ

original: AbhT_25.17b/. pratyeti vaidike bhagnaghaṇṭāvanna sa kiṃcana // 17
analyzed: pratyeti vaidike bhagna ghaṇṭā vat na sa kiṃcana
tathā ukta deva pūjā ādi cakra yāga anta karmaṇā
rudra tvam eti asau jantuḥ bhogān divyān samaśnute

original: AbhT_25.19a/. atha vacmaḥ sphuṭaṃ śrīmatsiddhaye nāḍicāraṇam /
analyzed: atha vacmaḥ sphuṭam śrīmat siddhaye nāḍi cāraṇam

original: AbhT_25.19b/. yā vāhayitumiṣyeta nāḍī tāmeva bhāvayet // 19
analyzed: yā vāhayitum iṣyeta nāḍī tām eva bhāvayet

original: AbhT_25.20a/. bhāvanātanmayībhāve sā nāḍī vahati sphuṭam /
analyzed: bhāvanā tanmayībhāve sā nāḍī vahati sphuṭam

original: AbhT_25.20b/. yadvā vāhayituṃ yeṣṭā tadaṅgaṃ tena pāṇinā // 20
analyzed: yat vā vāhayitum yā iṣṭā tad aṅgam tena pāṇinā

original: AbhT_25.21a/. āpīḍya kukṣiṃ namayetsā vahennāḍikā kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: āpīḍya kukṣim namayet sā vahet nāḍikā kṣaṇāt
evam śrāddha mukhena api bhoga mokṣa ubhaya sthitim

original: AbhT_25.22a/. kuryāditi śivenoktaṃ tatra tatra kṛpālunā /
analyzed: kuryāt iti śivena uktam tatra tatra kṛpālunā
śaktipāta udaye jantoḥ yena upāyena daiśikaḥ
karoti uddharaṇam tat tat nirvāṇāya asya kalpate

original: AbhT_25.23b/. uddhartā devadevo hi sa cācintyaprabhāvakaḥ // 23
analyzed: uddhartā devadevaḥ hi sa ca acintya prabhāvakaḥ
upāyam guru dīkṣā ādi dvāra mātreṇa saṃśrayet
uktam śrīmat mataṅga ākhye muni praśnāt anantaram
muktiḥ vivekāt tattvānām dīkṣātaḥ yogataḥ yadi
caryā mātrāt katham sā syāt iti atas samam uttaram
prahasya ūce vibhuḥ kasmāt bhrāntiḥ te parameśituḥ

original: AbhT_25.26b/. sarvānugrāhakatvaṃ hi saṃsiddhaṃ dṛśyatāṃ kila // 26
analyzed: sarva anugrāhaka tvam hi saṃsiddham dṛśyatām kila
prāpta mṛtyoḥ viṣa vyādhi śastra ādi kila kāraṇam

original: AbhT_25.27b/. alpaṃ vā bahu vā tadvadanudhyā muktikāraṇam // 27
analyzed: alpam vā bahu vā tadvat anudhyā mukti kāraṇam
mukti artham upacaryante bāhya liṅgāni amūni tu

original: AbhT_25.28b/. iti jñātvā na sandeha itthaṃ kāryo vipaścitā // 28
analyzed: iti jñātvā na sandehaḥ ittham kāryaḥ vipaścitā

original: AbhT_25.29a/. iyataiva kathaṃ muktiriti bhaktiṃ parāṃ śrayet /
analyzed: iyatā eva katham muktiḥ iti bhaktim parām śrayet
uktaḥ śrāddha vidhiḥ bhrānti gara ātaṅka vimardanaḥ
atha śrī tantrāloke ṣaḍviṃśam āhnikam
atha ucyate śeṣa vṛttiḥ jīvatām upayoginī

original: AbhT_26.2a/. dīkṣā bahuprakāreyaṃ śrāddhāntā yā prakīrtitā /
analyzed: dīkṣā bahu prakārā iyam śrāddha antā yā prakīrtitā

original: AbhT_26.2b/. sā saṃskriyāyai mokṣāya bhogāyāpi dvayāya vā // 2
analyzed: sā saṃskriyāyai mokṣāya bhogāya api dvayāya vā

original: AbhT_26.3a/. tatra saṃskārasiddhyai yā dīkṣā sākṣānna mocanī /
analyzed: tatra saṃskāra siddhyai yā dīkṣā sākṣāt na mocanī
anusaṃdhi vaśa ādyā ca sākṣāt moktrī sa bījikā
tayā ubhayyā dīkṣitāḥ ye teṣām ājīva vartanam
vaktavyam putraka ādīnām tad maya tva prasiddhaye
bubhukṣoḥ vā mumukṣoḥ vā sva saṃvid guru śāstrataḥ

original: AbhT_26.5b/. pramāṇādyā saṃskriyāyai dīkṣā hi guruṇā kṛtā // 5
analyzed: pramāṇa ādyā saṃskriyāyai dīkṣā hi guruṇā kṛtā

original: AbhT_26.6a/. tataḥ sa saṃskṛtaṃ yogyaṃ jñātvātmānaṃ svaśāsane /
analyzed: tatas sa saṃskṛtam yogyam jñātvā ātmānam sva śāsane

original: AbhT_26.6b/. taduktavastvanuṣṭhānaṃ bhuktyai muktyai ca sevate // 6
analyzed: tad ukta vastu anuṣṭhānam bhuktyai muktyai ca sevate
ācārya pratyayāt eva yaḥ pi syāt bhukti mukti bhāj
tad pratyūha udaya dhvastyai brūyāt tasya api vartanam
sva saṃvid guru saṃvittyoḥ tulya pratyaya bhāj api
śeṣa vṛttyā samādeśyaḥ tad vighna ādi praśāntaye

original: AbhT_26.9a/. yaḥ sarvathā parāpekṣāmujjhitvā tu sthito nijāt /
analyzed: yaḥ sarvathā para apekṣām ujjhitvā tu sthitaḥ nijāt
pratyayāt yaḥ api ca ācārya pratyayāt eva kevalāt
tau sāṃsiddhika nirbījau kaḥ vadet śeṣa vṛttaye
kramāt tad maya tā upāya guru arcana ratau tu tau
tatra eṣām śeṣa vṛtti artham nitya naimittike dhruve
kāmya varjam yatas kāmāḥ citrāḥ citra abhyupāyakāḥ

original: AbhT_26.12a/. tatra nityo vidhiḥ sandhyānuṣṭhānaṃ devatāvraje /
analyzed: tatra nityaḥ vidhiḥ sandhyā anuṣṭhānam devatā vraje
guru agni śāstra sahite pūjā bhūta dayā iti ayam

original: AbhT_26.13a/. naimittikastu sarveṣāṃ parvaṇāṃ pūjanaṃ japaḥ /
analyzed: naimittikaḥ tu sarveṣām parvaṇām pūjanam japaḥ

original: AbhT_26.14a/. ācāryasya ca dīkṣeyaṃ bahubhedā vivecitā /
analyzed: ācāryasya ca dīkṣā iyam bahu bhedā vivecitā

original: AbhT_26.14b/. vyākhyādikaṃ ca tattasyādhikaṃ naimittikaṃ dhruvam // 14
analyzed: vyākhyā ādikam ca tat tasya adhikam naimittikam dhruvam
tatra ādau śiśave vrūyāt guruḥ nitya vidhim sphuṭam
tad yogya tām samālokya vitata avitata ātmanām
mukhya itara ādi mantrāṇām vīrya vyāpti ādi yogya tām

original: AbhT_26.16b/. dṛṣṭvā śiṣye tamevāsmai mūlamantraṃ samarpayet // 16
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā śiṣye tam eva asmai mūlamantram samarpayet
tad śāstra dīkṣitaḥ hi eṣa niryantrā ācāra śaṅkitaḥ

original: AbhT_26.17b/. na mukhye yogya ityanyasevātaḥ syāttu yogyatā // 17
analyzed: na mukhye yogyaḥ iti anya sevātaḥ syāt tu yogya tā
sādhakasya bubhukṣoḥ tu sādhakībhāvinaḥ upi vā
puṣpa pāta vaśāt siddhaḥ mantra ūrpyaḥ sādhya siddhaye

original: AbhT_26.19a/. vitate guṇabhūte vā vidhau diṣṭe punarguruḥ /
analyzed: vitate guṇa bhūte vā vidhau diṣṭe punar guruḥ

original: AbhT_26.19b/. jñātvāsmai yogyatāṃ sāraṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ vidhimācaret // 19
analyzed: jñātvā asmai yogyatām sāram saṃkṣiptam vidhim ācaret

original: AbhT_26.20a/. tatraiṣa niyamo yadyanmāntraṃ rūpaṃ na tadguruḥ /
analyzed: tatra eṣa niyamaḥ yat yat māntram rūpam na tat guruḥ
likhitvā prathayet śiṣye viśeṣāt ūrdhva śāsane

original: AbhT_26.21a/. mantrā varṇātmakāste ca parāmarśātmakāḥ saca /
analyzed: mantrāḥ varṇa ātmakāḥ te ca parāmarśa ātmakāḥ saca
guru saṃvid abhinnaḥ śvet saṃkrāmet sā tatas śiśau

original: AbhT_26.22a/. lipisthitastu yo mantro nirvīryaḥ so@tra kalpitaḥ /
analyzed: lipi sthitaḥ tu yaḥ mantraḥ nirvīryaḥ saḥ utra kalpitaḥ
saṃketa balataḥ na asya pustakāt prathate mahaḥ
pustaka adhīta vidyāḥ ca iti uktam siddhāmate tatas

original: AbhT_26.23b/. ye tu pustakalabdhe@pi mantre vīryaṃ prajānate // 23
analyzed: ye tu pustaka labdhe api mantre vīryam prajānate

original: AbhT_26.24a/. te bhairavīyasaṃskārāḥ proktāḥ sāṃsiddhikā iti /
analyzed: te bhairavīya saṃskārāḥ proktāḥ sāṃsiddhikāḥ iti

original: AbhT_26.24b/. iti jñātvā guruḥ samyak paramānandaghūrṇitaḥ // 24
analyzed: iti jñātvā guruḥ samyak parama ānanda ghūrṇitaḥ

original: AbhT_26.25a/. tādṛśe tādṛśe dhāmni pūjayitvā vidhiṃ caret /
analyzed: tādṛśe tādṛśe dhāmni pūjayitvā vidhim caret
yathā anya śiṣya anuṣṭhānam na anya śiṣyeṇa budhyate
tathā kuryāt guruḥ gupti hāniḥ doṣavatī yatas

original: AbhT_26.26b/. devīnāṃ tritayaṃ śuddhaṃ yadvā yāmalayogataḥ // 26
analyzed: devīnām tritayam śuddham yat vā yāmala yogataḥ
devīm ekām atho śuddhām vadet vā yāmala ātmikām

original: AbhT_26.27b/. tatra mantraṃ sphuṭaṃ vaktrādguruṇopāṃśu coditam // 27
analyzed: tatra mantram sphuṭam vaktrāt guruṇā upāṃśu coditam
avadhārya ā pravṛtteḥ tam abhyasyet manasā svayam
tatas su śikṣitām sthāna deha antar śodhana trayīm

original: AbhT_26.29a/. nyāsaṃ dhyānaṃ japaṃ mudrāṃ pūjāṃ kuryātprayatnataḥ /
analyzed: nyāsam dhyānam japam mudrām pūjām kuryāt prayatnataḥ

original: AbhT_26.29b/. tatra prabhāte saṃbudhya sveṣṭāṃ prāgdevatāṃ smaret // 29
analyzed: tatra prabhāte saṃbudhya sva iṣṭām prāk devatām smaret

original: AbhT_26.30a/. kṛtāvaśyakakartavyaḥ śuddho bhūtvā tato gṛham /
analyzed: kṛta āvaśyaka kartavyaḥ śuddhaḥ bhūtvā tatas gṛham
āśritya uttara diś vaktraḥ sthāna deha antara traye

original: AbhT_26.31a/. śuddhiṃ vidhāya mantrāṇāṃ yathāsthānaṃ niveśanam /
analyzed: śuddhim vidhāya mantrāṇām yathāsthānam niveśanam
deha asu dhī vyoma bhūṣu manasā tatra ca arcanam
japam ca atra yathāśakti devāya etat nivedanam
tanmayībhāva siddhi artham prati sandhyam samācaret
anye tu prāc udak paścāt daśa dikṣu catuṣṭayīm

original: AbhT_26.34a/. sandhyānāmāhuretacca tāntrikīyaṃ na no matam /
analyzed: sandhyānām āhuḥ etat ca tāntrikī iyam na naḥ matam

original: AbhT_26.34b/. yāsau kālādhikāre prāk sandhyā proktā catuṣṭayī // 34
analyzed: yā asau kāla adhikāre prāk sandhyā proktā catuṣṭayī
tām eva antar samādhāya sāndhyam vidhim upācaret
sandhyā catuṣṭayī kṛtyam ekasyām athavā śiśuḥ
kuryāt svādhyāya vijñāna guru kṛtya ādi tatparaḥ
tad saṃskāra vaśāt sarvam kālam syāt tad mayaḥ hi asau
tatas yathā iṣṭa kāle au pūjām puṣpa āsava ādibhiḥ
sthaṇḍila ādau śiśuḥ kuryāt vibhava ādi anurūpataḥ
su śuddhaḥ san vidhim sarvam kṛtvā antara japa antakam
arghapātram purā yadvat vidhāya sva iṣṭa mantrataḥ
tena sthaṇḍila puṣpa ādi sarvam saṃprokṣayet budhaḥ
tatas tatra eva saṃkalpya dvāra āsana guru kramam
pūjayet śiva tā āviṣṭaḥ sva deha arcā puraḥsaram
tatas tat sthaṇḍilam vīdhra vyoma sphaṭika nirmalam

original: AbhT_26.41b/. bodhātmakaṃ samālokya tatra svaṃ devatāgaṇam // 41
analyzed: bodha ātmakam samālokya tatra svam devatā gaṇam
pratibimba tayā paśyet bimba tvena ca bodhataḥ
etat āvāhanam mukhyam vyajanāt marutām iva
sarva gopi marut yadvat vyajanena upajīvitaḥ
artha kṛt sarva gam mantra cakram rūḍheḥ tathā bhavet
catuṣka pañcāśikayā tat etat tattvam ucyate
śrī nirmaryādaśāstre ca tat etat vibhunā uditam

original: AbhT_26.45a/. devaḥ sarvagato deva nirmaryādaḥ kathaṃ śivaḥ /
analyzed: devaḥ sarva gataḥ deva nirmaryādaḥ katham śivaḥ
āvāhyate kṣamyate vā iti evaṃpṛṣṭaḥ bravīt vibhuḥ

original: AbhT_26.46a/. vāsanāvāhyate devi vāsanā ca visṛjyate /
analyzed: vāsanā āvāhyate devi vāsanā ca visṛjyate
parama arthena devasya na āvāhana visarjane

original: AbhT_26.47a/. āvāhito mayā devaḥ sthaṇḍile ca pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
analyzed: āvāhitaḥ mayā devaḥ sthaṇḍile ca pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: AbhT_26.47b/. pūjitaḥ stuta ityevaṃ hṛṣṭvā devaṃ visarjayet // 47
analyzed: pūjitaḥ stutaḥ iti evam hṛṣṭvā devam visarjayet
prāṇinām aprabuddhānām santoṣa jananāya vai
āvāhana ādikam teṣām pravṛttiḥ katham anyathā

original: AbhT_26.49a/. kālena tu vijānanti pravṛttāḥ patiśāsane /
analyzed: kālena tu vijānanti pravṛttāḥ pati śāsane
anukrameṇa devasya prāptim bhuvana pūrvikām

original: AbhT_26.50b/. kuto vānīyate devaḥ kutra vā nīyate@pi saḥ // 50
analyzed: kutas vā ānīyate devaḥ kutra vā nīyate api saḥ

original: AbhT_26.51a/. sthūlasūkṣmādibhedena sa hi sarvatra saṃsthitaḥ /
analyzed: sthūla sūkṣma ādi bhedena sa hi sarvatra saṃsthitaḥ
āvāhite mantra gaṇe puṣpa āsava nivedanaiḥ
dhūpaiḥ ca tarpaṇam kāryam śraddhā bhakti bala ucitaiḥ
dīptānām śakti nāda ādi mantrāṇām āsavaiḥ palaiḥ

original: AbhT_26.53a/. raktaiḥ prāk tarpaṇa paścāt puṣpadhūpādivistaraiḥ /
analyzed: raktaiḥ prāk puṣpa dhūpa ādi vistaraiḥ

original: AbhT_26.53b/. āgatasya tu mantrasya na kuryāttarpaṇaṃ yadi // 53
analyzed: āgatasya tu mantrasya na kuryāt tarpaṇam yadi

original: AbhT_26.54a/. haratyardhaśarīraṃ sa ityuktaṃ kila śambhunā /
analyzed: harati ardha śarīram saḥ iti uktam kila śambhunā
yat yat eva asya manasi vikāsi tvam prayacchati

original: AbhT_26.55a/. tenaiva kuryātpūjāṃ sa iti śambhorviniścayaḥ /
analyzed: tena eva kuryāt pūjām saḥ iti śambhoḥ viniścayaḥ
sādhakānām bubhukṣūṇām vidhiḥ niyati yantritaḥ

original: AbhT_26.56a/. mumukṣūṇāṃ tattvavidāṃ sa eva tu nirargalaḥ /
analyzed: mumukṣūṇām tattva vidām saḥ eva tu nirargalaḥ
kārye viśeṣam ādhitsuḥ viśiṣṭam kāraṇam spṛśet

original: AbhT_26.57b/. santi bhoge viśeṣāśca vicitrāḥ kāraṇeritāḥ // 57
analyzed: santi bhoge viśeṣāḥ ca vicitrāḥ kāraṇa īritāḥ
deśa kāla anusandhāna guṇa dravya kriyā ādibhiḥ

original: AbhT_26.58b/. svalpā kriyā bhūyasī vā hṛdayāhlādadāyibhiḥ // 58
analyzed: su alpā kriyā bhūyasī vā hṛdaya āhlāda dāyibhiḥ
bāhyaiḥ saṃkalpajaiḥ vā api kārakaiḥ parikalpitā
mumukṣoḥ na viśeṣāya naiḥśreyasa vidhim prati
nahi brahmaṇi śaṃsanti bāhulya alpa tva durdaśāḥ
citaḥ svātantrya sāra tvāt tasya ānanda ghana tvataḥ
kriyā syāt tanmayībhūtyai hṛdaya āhlāda dāyibhiḥ
śiva abheda bharāt bhāva vargaḥ ścyotati yam rasam
tam eva parame dhāmni pūjanāya arpayet budhaḥ

original: AbhT_26.62b/. stotreṣu bahudhā caitanmayā proktaṃ nijāhnike // 62
analyzed: stotreṣu bahudhā ca etat mayā proktam nija āhnike
adhiśayya pāramārthika bhāva prasara prakāśam ullasati

original: AbhT_26.63b/. yā paramāmṛtadṛk tvāṃ tayārcayante rahasyavidaḥ // 63
analyzed: yā parama amṛta dṛś tvām tayā arcayante rahasya vidaḥ
kṛtvā ādhāra dharām svabhāva kusumaiḥ sva āmoda sandohibhiḥ

original: AbhT_26.64b/. ānandāmṛtanirbharasvahṛdayānarghārghapātrakramāt tvāṃ devyā saha dehadevasadane devārcaye@harniśam // 64
analyzed: ānanda amṛta nirbhara sva hṛdaya anargha arghapātra kramāt tvām devyā saha deha deva sadane deva arcaya iharniśam
nānā āsvāda rasām imām tri jagatīm hṛd cakra yantra arpitām ūrdhva adhyasta viveka gaurava bharāt niṣpīḍya niḥṣyanditam

original: AbhT_26.65b/. yatsaṃvitparamāmṛtaṃ mṛtijarājanmāpahaṃ jṛmbhate tena tvāṃ haviṣā pareṇa parame saṃtarpaye@harniśam // 65
analyzed: yat saṃvid parama amṛtam mṛti jarā janma apaham jṛmbhate tena tvām haviṣā pareṇa parame saṃtarpaya iharniśam
iti śloka traya upāttam artham antar vibhāvayan
yena kena api bhāvena tarpayet devatā gaṇam
mudrām pradarśayet paścāt manasā vā api yogataḥ
vacasā mantra yogena vapuṣā saṃniveśataḥ

original: AbhT_26.68a/. kṛtvā japaṃ tataḥ sarvaṃ devatāyai samarpayet /
analyzed: kṛtvā japam tatas sarvam devatāyai samarpayet
tat ca uktam kartṛ tā tattva nirūpaṇa vidhau purā
tatas visarjanam kāryam bodha aikātmya prayogataḥ

original: AbhT_26.69b/. kṛtvā vā vahnigāṃ mantratṛptiṃ proktavidhānataḥ // 69
analyzed: kṛtvā vā vahni gām mantra tṛptim prokta vidhānataḥ
dvāra pīṭha guru vrāta samarpita nivedanāt
ṛtenyat svayam aśnīyāt agādha imbhasi atha kṣipet

original: AbhT_26.71a/. prāṇino jalajāḥ pūrvadīkṣitāḥ śambhunā svayam /
analyzed: prāṇinaḥ jala jāḥ pūrva dīkṣitāḥ śambhunā svayam
vidhinā bhāvinā śrīmat mīnanātha avatāriṇā
mārjāra mūṣika ādyaiḥ yat a dīkṣaiḥ ca api bhakṣitam
tat śaṅkā ātaṅka dānena vyādhaye narakāya ca
atas tattva vidā dhvasta śaṅkā ātaṅkaḥ api paṇḍitaḥ
prakaṭam na īdṛśam kuryāt loka anugraha vāñchayā
śrīmat matamahāśāstre tat uktam vibhunā svayam
svayam tu śaṅkā saṅkoca niṣkāsana parāyaṇaḥ

original: AbhT_26.75a/. bhavettathā yathānyeṣāṃ śaṅkā no manasi sphuret /
analyzed: bhavet tathā yathā anyeṣām śaṅkā no manasi sphuret

original: AbhT_26.75b/. mārjayitvā tataḥ snānaṃ puṣpeṇātha prapūjayet // 75
analyzed: mārjayitvā tatas snānam puṣpeṇa atha prapūjayet

original: AbhT_26.76a/. puṣpādi sarvaṃ tatsthaṃ tadagādhāmbhasi nikṣipet /
analyzed: puṣpa ādi sarvam tad stham tat agādha ambhasi nikṣipet
uktaḥ sthaṇḍila yāgaḥ uyam nityakarmaṇi śambhunā
atha śrī tantrāloke saptaviṃśatitamam āhnikam
athā ucyate liṅga pūjā sūcitā mālinīmate
eteṣām ūrdhva śāstra ukta mantrāṇām na pratiṣṭhitam
bahiṣkuryāt tatas hi ete rahasya tvena siddhi dāḥ
sva vīrya ānanda māhātmya praveśa vaśa śālinīm

original: AbhT_27.3b/. ye siddhiṃ dadate teṣāṃ bāhyatvaṃ rūpavicyutiḥ // 3
analyzed: ye siddhim dadate teṣām bāhya tvam rūpa vicyutiḥ

original: AbhT_27.4a/. kiṃca coktaṃ samāveśapūrṇo bhoktrātmakaḥ śivaḥ /
analyzed: kiṃca ca uktam samāveśa pūrṇaḥ bhoktṛ ātmakaḥ śivaḥ
bhoga lāmpaṭya bhāj bhoga vicchede nigraha ātmakaḥ

original: AbhT_27.5b/. svayaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yena so@syābhoge vinaśyati // 5
analyzed: svayam pratiṣṭhitam yena sā usya ābhoge vinaśyati
uktam jñānottarāyām ca tat etat parameśinā
śivaḥ yāga priyaḥ yasmāt viśeṣāt mātṛ madhya gaḥ
tasmāt rahasya śāstreṣu ye mantrāḥ tān budhaḥ bahis
na pratiṣṭhāpayet jātu viśeṣāt vyakta rūpiṇaḥ

original: AbhT_27.8a/. ata eva mṛtasyārthe pratiṣṭhānyatra yoditā /
analyzed: atas eva mṛtasya arthe pratiṣṭhā anyatra yā uditā

original: AbhT_27.8b/. sātra śāstreṣu no kāryā kāryā sādhāraṇī punaḥ // 8
analyzed: sā atra śāstreṣu na u kāryā kāryā sādhāraṇī punar
tad maya tva saṃsiddheḥ ā ca abhīṣṭa phala udayāt

original: AbhT_27.9b/. putrakaḥ sādhako vyaktamavyaktaṃ vā samāśrayet // 9
analyzed: putrakaḥ sādhakaḥ vyaktam avyaktam vā samāśrayet
putrakaiḥ guruḥ abhyarthyaḥ sādhakaḥ tu svayam vidan
yadi tat sthāpayet no ced tena api arthyaḥ guruḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_27.11a/. guruścātra nirodhākhye kāla itthaṃ vibhau vadet /
analyzed: guruḥ ca atra nirodha ākhye kāle ittham vibhau vadet
jīvati asmin phala antam tvam tiṣṭheḥ jīva avadhi iti vā

original: AbhT_27.12a/. liṅgaṃ ca bāṇaliṅgaṃ vā ratnajaṃ vātha mauktikam /
analyzed: liṅgam ca bāṇaliṅgam vā ratna jam vā atha mauktikam

original: AbhT_27.12b/. pauṣpamānnamatho vāstraṃ gandhadravyakṛtaṃ ca vā // 12
analyzed: pauṣpam ānnam atho vā astram gandha dravya kṛtam ca vā

original: AbhT_27.13a/. natu pāṣāṇajaṃ liṅgaṃ śilpyutthaṃ parikalpayet /
analyzed: na tu pāṣāṇa jam liṅgam śilpi uttham parikalpayet
dhātu uttham ca suvarṇa uttha varjam anyat vivarjayet
na ca atra liṅgam āna ādi kvacid api upayujyate
udāra vīryaiḥ mantraiḥ yat bhāsitam phala dam hi tat
tasya api sthaṇḍila ādi ukta vidhinā śuddhim ācaret
mantra arpaṇam tathā eva syāt nirodhaḥ tu ukta yuktitaḥ

original: AbhT_27.16a/. agnau ca tarpaṇaṃ bhūriviśeṣāddakṣiṇā guroḥ /
analyzed: agnau ca tarpaṇam bhūri viśeṣāt dakṣiṇā guroḥ
dīna ādi tṛptiḥ vibhavāt yāgaḥ iti adhikaḥ vidhiḥ
sarveṣu avyakta liṅgeṣu pradhānam syāt akalpitam

original: AbhT_27.17b/. tathā ca tatra tatroktaṃ lakṣaṇe pārameśvare // 17
analyzed: tathā ca tatra tatra uktam lakṣaṇe pārameśvare

original: AbhT_27.18a/. sūtre pātre dhvaje vastre svayambhūbāṇapūjite /
analyzed: sūtre pātre dhvaje vastre svayambhū bāṇa pūjite

original: AbhT_27.18b/. nadīprasravaṇotthe ca nāhvānaṃ nāpi kalpanā // 18
analyzed: nadī prasravaṇa utthe ca na āhvānam na api kalpanā
vyaktam vā citra pusta ādau devadāru suvarṇa jam
atha dīkṣita sat śilpi kṛtam sthāpayate guruḥ
athavā lakṣaṇa upeta mūrdha tad karpara āśritam
tad lakṣaṇam bruve śrīmat picuśāstre nirūpitam

original: AbhT_27.22a/. tūre yogaḥ sadā śastaḥ siddhido doṣavarjite /
analyzed: tūre yogaḥ sadā śastaḥ siddhi daḥ doṣa varjite
jālakaiḥ jarjaraiḥ randhraiḥ dantaiḥ ūna adhikaiḥ rujā

original: AbhT_27.23a/. yukte ca tūre hāniḥ syāt taddhīne yāga uttamaḥ /
analyzed: yukte ca tūre hāniḥ syāt tad hīne yāgaḥ uttamaḥ
kāmyaḥ eva bhavet tūram iti kecid prapedire
guravaḥ tu vidhau kāmye yatnāt doṣān tyajet iti

original: AbhT_27.24b/. vyācakṣate picuproktaṃ na nitye karmaṇītyadaḥ // 24
analyzed: vyācakṣate picu proktam na nitye karmaṇi iti adaḥ
śrī siddhātantre uktam ca tūra lakṣaṇam uttamam
padma gorocanā muktā nīra sphaṭika saṃnibhe
eka ādi pañca sat randhra vidyā rekhā anvite śubhe
na rūkṣa vakra śakala dīrgha nimna sa binduke
ślakṣṇayā vajra sūcyā atra sphuṭam devī gaṇa anvitam
sarvam samālikhet pūjyam sarva avayava sundaram
etat eva anusartavyam arghapātre pi lakṣaṇam
śrī brahmayāmale pi uktam pātram gomukham uttamam
gaja kūrma talam kumbha vṛtta śaktikaja ākṛti
akṣasūtram atho kuryāt tatra eva abhyarcayet kramam

original: AbhT_27.31a/. akṣasūtraṃ kramotkṛṣṭaṃ raudrākṣaṃ vā viśeṣataḥ /
AbhT_27.31b/. śataṃ tithyuttaraṃ yadvā sāṣṭaṃ yadvā tadardhakam // 31
analyzed: śatam tithi uttaram yat vā sa aṣṭam yat vā tad ardhakam
tad ardham vā atha pañcāśat yuktam tat parikalpayet
pañcadhā ādi anta gam ca aikyam iti upāntya akṣa gaḥ vidhiḥ
śakti tadvat prabhedena tatra dvairūpyam ucyate

original: AbhT_27.34a/. tato dviguṇamāne tu dvirūpaṃ nyāsamācaret /
analyzed: tatas dviguṇa māne tu dvi rūpam nyāsam ācaret
tatas api dviguṇe sṛṣṭi saṃhṛti dvitayena tam
mātṛkām mālinīm vā atha nyasyet kha śara saṃmite

original: AbhT_27.35b/. uttame tu dvayīṃ nyasyennyasya pūrvaṃ pracoditān // 35
analyzed: uttame tu dvayīm nyasyet nyasya pūrvam pracoditān
dīkṣāyām mukhyatas mantrān tān pañcadaśa daiśikaḥ
yadi vā tattva bhuvana kalā mantra pada arṇa jaiḥ

original: AbhT_27.37a/. saṃkhyābhedaiḥ kṛte sūtre taṃ taṃ nyāsaṃ guruścaret /
analyzed: saṃkhyā bhedaiḥ kṛte sūtre tam tam nyāsam guruḥ caret
kṛtvā akṣa sūtram tasya api sarvam sthaṇḍila vat bhavet

original: AbhT_27.38a/. pūjitena ca tenaiva japaṃ kuryādatandritaḥ /
analyzed: pūjitena ca tena eva japam kuryāt atandritaḥ
vidhiḥ uktaḥ tu ayam śrīmat mālinīvijayottare
cakra vat bhramayan etat yat vakti sa japaḥ bhavet
yat īkṣate juhoti etat bodha agnau saṃpraveśanāt
athavā argha mahāpātram kuryāt tat ca uttaram param

original: AbhT_27.40b/. nārikelamatho bailvaṃ sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ ca vā // 40
analyzed: nārikelam atho bailvam sauvarṇam rājatam ca vā

original: AbhT_27.41a/. tasyāpyeṣa vidhiḥ sarvaḥ pratiṣṭhādau prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: tasya api eṣa vidhiḥ sarvaḥ pratiṣṭhā ādau prakīrtitaḥ
tat niṣkampa rasaiḥ pūrṇam kṛtvā asmin pūjayet kramam

original: AbhT_27.42a/. adhomukhaṃ sadā sthāpyaṃ pūjitaṃ pūjane punaḥ /
analyzed: adhomukham sadā sthāpyam pūjitam pūjane punar

original: AbhT_27.42b/. tatpātramunmukhaṃ tacca riktaṃ kuryānna tādṛśam // 42
analyzed: tat pātram unmukham tat ca riktam kuryāt na tādṛśam
pūjā ante tad rasa āpūrṇam ātmānam pravidhāya tat

original: AbhT_27.43b/. adhomukhaṃ ca saṃpūjya sthāpayet vicakṣaṇaḥ // 43
analyzed: adhomukham ca saṃpūjya sthāpayet vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: AbhT_27.44a/. khaṅgaṃ kṛpāṇikāṃ yadvā kartarīṃ makuraṃ ca vā /
analyzed: khaṅgam kṛpāṇikām yat vā kartarīm makuram ca vā
vimalam tat tathā kuryāt śrīmat kālī mukha uditam
śrī bhairavakule pi uktam kula parva prapūjane

original: AbhT_27.45b/. sthaṇḍile@gnau paṭe liṅge pātre padme@tha maṇḍale // 45
analyzed: sthaṇḍila ignau paṭe liṅge pātre maṇḍale

original: AbhT_27.46a/. mūrtau ghaṭe@strasaṃghāte dhaṭe sūtre@tha pūjayet /
analyzed: mūrtau pūjayet
svena svena upacāreṇa saṅkaram varjayet iti
yathā apsu śāntaye mantrāḥ tadvat astra ādiṣu dhruvam
akāmasya tu te tad tad sthāna upādhi vaśāt dhruvam
athavā pustakam tādṛś rahaḥśāstra krama umbhitam

original: AbhT_27.49b/. suśuddhaṃ dīkṣitakṛtaṃ tatrāpyeṣa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // 49
analyzed: su śuddham dīkṣita kṛtam tatra api eṣa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
ittham svayaṃpratiṣṭheṣu yāvat yāvat sthitiḥ bhavet
vibhavaiḥ tarpaṇam śuddhiḥ tāvat viccheda varjanam

original: AbhT_27.51a/. ata eva yadā bhūridinaṃ maṇḍalakalpanam /
analyzed: atas eva yadā bhūri dinam maṇḍala kalpanam

original: AbhT_27.51b/. tadā dine dine kuryādvibhavaistarpaṇaṃ bahu // 51
analyzed: tadā dine dine kuryāt vibhavaiḥ tarpaṇam bahu

original: AbhT_27.52a/. pratiṣṭhāyāṃ ca sarvatra guruḥ pūrvoditaṃ param /
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāyām ca sarvatra guruḥ pūrva uditam param
sa tattvam anusandhāya saṃnidhim sphuṭam ācaret

original: AbhT_27.53a/. siddhe tu tanmayībhāve phale putrakasādhakaiḥ /
analyzed: siddhe tu tanmayībhāve phale putraka sādhakaiḥ
anyasmai tat dvayāt anyatarasmai tat samarpyate

original: AbhT_27.54a/. tasyāpyeṣa vidhiḥ sarvastadalābhe tu sarvathā /
analyzed: tasya api eṣa vidhiḥ sarvaḥ tad alābhe tu sarvathā

original: AbhT_27.54b/. agādhe@mbhasi tatkṣepyaṃ kṣamayitvā visṛjya ca // 54
analyzed: agādha imbhasi tat kṣepyam kṣamayitvā visṛjya ca
iti eṣa sva pratiṣṭhāna vidhiḥ śiva nirūpitaḥ
para pratiṣṭhite liṅge svayaṃbhuvi
sarvam āsana pakṣe prāk nyasya saṃpūjayet kramam

original: AbhT_27.56b/. śuddhāśuddhādhvajāḥ sarve mantrāḥ sarvaḥ śivāntakaḥ // 56
analyzed: śuddha a śuddha a dhvajāḥ sarve mantrāḥ sarvaḥ śiva antakaḥ
adhvā ca iha āsane proktaḥ tat sarvatra arcayet idam
āvāhana visṛṣṭī tu tatra prāgvat samācaret

original: AbhT_27.58a/. uktaṃ tantre@pyaghoreśe svacchande vibhunā tathā /
analyzed: uktam tantre pi aghoreśe svacchande vibhunā tathā
athavā pratyaham prokta māna ardha ardha niyogataḥ

original: AbhT_27.59a/. kṛtveṣṭaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tatra samastaṃ kramamarcayet /
analyzed: kṛtvā iṣṭam maṇḍalam tatra samastam kramam arcayet
bahu prakāra bhinnasya liṅgasya arcā nirūpitā
atha śrī tantrāloke aṣṭāviṃśam āhnikam
iti nitya vidhiḥ proktaḥ naimittikam atha ucyate

original: AbhT_28.2a/. niyataṃ bhāvi yannityaṃ tadityasminvidhau sthite /
analyzed: niyatam bhāvi yat nityam tat iti asmin vidhau sthite

original: AbhT_28.2b/. mukhyatvaṃ tanmayībhūtiḥ sarvaṃ naimittikaṃ tataḥ // 2
analyzed: mukhya tvam tanmayībhūtiḥ sarvam naimittikam tatas
dina ādi kalpanā utthe tu naiyatye sarva nitya tā
dina māsa ṛkṣa varṣā ādi naiyatyāt ucyate tadā
pramātṛ aniyatam prāhuḥ naimittikam idam budhāḥ
sandhyā ādi parva saṃpūjā pavitrakam idam sadā
nityam niyata rūpa tvāt sarvasmin śāsana āśrite
jñāna śāstra guru bhrātṛ tad varga prāptayaḥ tathā
śrāddham vipad pratīkāraḥ pramoda udbhuta darśanam
yoginī melakaḥ sva aṃśa santāna ādyaiḥ ca melanam
śāstra vyākhyā purā madhya avasānāni krama udayaḥ
devatā darśanam svāpnam ājñā samaya niṣkṛtiḥ
iti naimittikam śrīmat tantrasāre nirūpitam

original: AbhT_28.10a/. tatra parvavidhiṃ brūmo dvidhā parva kulākulam /
analyzed: tatra parva vidhim brūmaḥ dvidhā parva kulākulam
kula aṣṭaka kṛtam pūrvam proktam śrī yogasaṃcare
abdhi indu muniḥ iti etat māheśyāḥ brahma santateḥ
pratipad pañcadaśyau dve kaumāryāḥ rasa vahni
abdhiḥ akṣi indu vaiṣṇavyāḥ aindryāḥ tu astram trayodaśī

original: AbhT_28.12b/. vārāhyā randhrarudrau dve caṇḍyā vasvakṣiyugmakam // 12
AbhT_28.13a/. dve dve tithī tu sarvāsāṃ yogeśyā daśamī punaḥ /
analyzed: dve dve tithī tu sarvāsām yogeśyāḥ daśamī punar

original: AbhT_28.13b/. tasyā apyaṣṭamī yasmāddvitithiḥ sā prakīrtitā // 13
analyzed: tasyāḥ api aṣṭamī yasmāt dvi tithiḥ sā prakīrtitā
anyāḥ ca ākula parva api vaiparītyena lakṣitam

original: AbhT_28.14b/. kulaparveti tadbrūmo yathoktaṃ bhairave kule // 14
analyzed: kula parvā iti tat brūmaḥ yathā uktam bhairave kule

original: AbhT_28.15b/. yo@yaṃ prāṇāśritaḥ pūrvaṃ kālaḥ proktaḥ suvistarāt // 15
analyzed: yaḥ ayam prāṇa āśritaḥ pūrvam kālaḥ proktaḥ su vistarāt

original: AbhT_28.16a/. sa cakrabhedasaṃcāre kāṃcit sūte svasaṃvidam /
analyzed: sa cakra bheda saṃcāre kāṃcid sūte sva saṃvidam
sva saṃvid pūrṇa tā lābha samayaḥ parva bhaṇyate

original: AbhT_28.17a/. parva pūraṇa ityeva yadvā pṝ pūraṇārthakaḥ /
analyzed: parva pūraṇe iti eva yat vā pṝ pūraṇa arthakaḥ
parva śabdaḥ niruktaḥ ca parva tad pūraṇāt iti

original: AbhT_28.18a/. haiḍare@tra ca śabdo@yaṃ dvidhā nāntetaraḥ śrutaḥ /
analyzed: ca śabdaḥ iyam dvidhā na anta itaraḥ śrutaḥ
tad cakra cāra niṣṇātāḥ ye kecid pūrṇa saṃvidaḥ
tad melaka samāyuktāḥ te tad pūjā parāḥ sadā
yaḥ upya tanmayaḥ eṣaḥ api tad kāle sva krama arcanāt
tad yoginī siddha saṅgha melakāt tanmayībhavet
yathā prekṣaṇake tad tad draṣṭṛ saṃvid abhedi tām

original: AbhT_28.21a/. kramoditāṃ sadya eva labhate tatpraveśanāt /
analyzed: krama uditām sadyas eva labhate tad praveśanāt
yoga abhyāsa krama upāttām tathā pūrṇām sva saṃvidam
labhante sadyas eva etat saṃvid aikya praveśanāt

original: AbhT_28.22b/. tatkālaṃ cāpi saṃvitteḥ pūrṇatvāt kāmadogdhṛtā // 22
analyzed: tad kālam ca api saṃvitteḥ pūrṇa tvāt kāma dogdhṛ tā

original: AbhT_28.23a/. tena tattatphalaṃ tatra kāle saṃpūjayācirāt /
analyzed: tena tat tat phalam tatra kāle saṃpūjaya acirāt
yathā cira upātta dhanaḥ kurvan utsavam ādarāt
atithim saḥ anugṛhṇāti tad kāla abhijñam āgatam
tathā su phala saṃsiddhyai yoginī siddha nāyakāḥ
yatnavantaḥ api tad kāla abhijñam tam anugṛhṇate

original: AbhT_28.25b/. uktaṃ ca tatra teneha kule sāmānyatetyalam // 25
analyzed: uktam ca tatra tena iha kule sāmānya tā iti alam

original: AbhT_28.26a/. yasya yaddhṛdaye devi vartate daiśikājñayā /
analyzed: yasya yat hṛdaye devi vartate daiśika ājñayā

original: AbhT_28.26b/. mantro yogaḥ kramaścaiva pūjanāt siddhido bhavet // 26
analyzed: mantraḥ yogaḥ kramaḥ ca eva pūjanāt siddhi daḥ bhavet
kula ācāreṇa deveśi pūjyam siddhi vimuktaye

original: AbhT_28.27b/. ye parvasveṣu deveśi tarpaṇaṃ tu viśeṣataḥ // 27
analyzed: ye parvasveṣu deveśi tarpaṇam tu viśeṣataḥ

original: AbhT_28.28a/. gurūṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca na kurvanti pramādataḥ /
analyzed: gurūṇām devatānām ca na kurvanti pramādataḥ

original: AbhT_28.28b/. durācārā hi te duṣṭāḥ paśutulyā varānane // 28
analyzed: durācārāḥ hi te duṣṭāḥ paśu tulyāḥ varānane
abhāvāt nitya pūjāyāḥ avaśyam hi eṣu pūjayet
aṭanam jñāna śakti ādi lābha artham yat prakīrtitam
śakti yāgaḥ ca yaḥ proktaḥ vaśyā ākarṣaṇa māraṇam
tat sarvam parva divaseṣu ayatnena eva siddhi ati
tad sāmānya viśeṣābhyām ṣoḍhā parva nirūpitam

original: AbhT_28.31b/. māsasyādyaṃ pañcamaṃ ca śrīdinaṃ paribhāṣyate // 31

analyzed: utkṛṣṭa tvāt parva dinam śrī pūrva tvena bhāṣyate

original: AbhT_28.32b/. samayo hyeṣa yadguptaṃ tannānupapadaṃ vadet // 32
analyzed: samayaḥ hi eṣa yat guptam tat na anupapadam vadet
turya aṣṭamāni a bhuvana caramāṇi dvayoḥ api
pakṣayoḥ iha sāmānya sāmānyam parva kīrtitam
yat eteṣu dineṣu eva bhaviṣyat graha bhā ātmakaḥ
sā ca ekādaśadhā ekasmin ekasmin vibhunā uditā
sajātīyā tu sotkṛṣṭā iti evam śambhuḥ nyarūpayat

original: AbhT_28.36a/. kṛṣṇayugaṃ vahnisitaṃ śrutikṛṣṇaṃ vahnisitamiti pakṣāḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa yugam vahni sitam śruti kṛṣṇam vahni sitam iti pakṣāḥ
arka indu jīva candrāḥ budha yugma indu arka kavi guru vidhu syāt
paraphalguḥ caitra maghe tiṣyaḥ prākphalgukarṇa śatabhiṣajaḥ
mūlaprājāpatye viśākhikā śravaṇa saṃjñayā bhāni
randhre tithi arka pare vasu randhre śaśi vṛṣa aṅka rasa randhra yugam
prathama niśā iti ca samayaḥ mārgaśiraḥ prabhṛti māseṣu

original: AbhT_28.39b/. kanyāntyajātha veśyā rāgavatī tattvavedinī dūtī // 39
analyzed: kanyā antyajā atha veśyā rāgavatī tattva vedinī dūtī
vyāsa samāsāt kramaśas pūjyāḥ cakrenuyāga ākhye
sarvatra ca parva dine kuryāt anuyāga cakram atiśayataḥ

original: AbhT_28.41b/. anuyāgaḥ kila mukhyaḥ sarvasminneva karmaviniyoge // 41
analyzed: anuyāgaḥ kila mukhyaḥ sarvasmin eva karma viniyoge
anuyāga kāla lābhe tasmāt prayateta tad paramaḥ

original: AbhT_28.42b/. bhagrahasamayaviśeṣo nāśvayuje ko@pi tena tadvarjam // 42
analyzed: bha graha samaya viśeṣaḥ na āśvayuje kaḥ pi tena tad varjam
velā bhagraha kalanā kathitā ekādaśasu māseṣu

original: AbhT_28.43b/. phālgunamāse śuklaṃ yatproktaṃ dvādaśīdinaṃ parva // 43
analyzed: phālguna māse śuklam yat proktam dvādaśī dinam parva
agra tithi vedha yogaḥ mukhyatamaḥ asau viśeṣaḥ utra

original: AbhT_28.44b/. divasaniśe kila kṛtvā tribhāgaśaḥ prathamamadhyamāparavibhāgaḥ // 44
analyzed: divasa niśe kila kṛtvā tri bhāgaśas prathama madhyama apara vibhāgaḥ
pūjā kālaḥ tatra tri bhāgite mukhyatamaḥ kālaḥ

original: AbhT_28.45b/. yadi saṃghaṭeta velā mukhyatamā bhagrahau tathā cakram // 45
analyzed: yadi saṃghaṭeta velā mukhyatamā bha grahau tathā cakram

original: AbhT_28.46a/. tadyāga ādiyāgastatkāmyaṃ pūjayaiva parvasu siddhyet /
analyzed: tad yāgaḥ ādiyāgaḥ tad kāmyam pūjayā eva parvasu siddhyet

original: AbhT_28.47a/. jñātvā sādhakamukhyastattatkāryaṃ tadā tadā kuryāt /
analyzed: jñātvā sādhaka mukhyaḥ tat tat kāryam tadā tadā kuryāt

original: AbhT_28.47b/. ukto yo@rcākālastaṃ cedullaṅghya bhagrahatithiḥ syāt // 47
analyzed: uktaḥ yaḥ ṛcā kālaḥ tam ced ullaṅghya bha graha tithiḥ syāt
tam an ādṛtya viśeṣam pradhānayet sāmayam iti kecid

original: AbhT_28.48b/. neti tvasmadguravo viśeṣarūpā hi tithiriha na velā // 48
analyzed: na iti tu asmad guravaḥ viśeṣa rūpā hi tithiḥ iha na velā
saṃvedya rūpa śaśadhara bhāgaḥ saṃvedaka arka kara nikaraiḥ

original: AbhT_28.49b/. yāvānyāvati pūrṇaḥ sā hi tithirbhagrahaiḥ sphuṭībhavati // 49
analyzed: yāvān yāvati pūrṇaḥ sā hi tithiḥ bha grahaiḥ sphuṭībhavati

original: AbhT_28.50a/. tasmānmukhyātra tithiḥ sā ca viśeṣyā graharkṣayogena /
analyzed: tasmāt mukhyā atra tithiḥ sā ca viśeṣyā graha ṛkṣa yogena

original: AbhT_28.50b/. velātra na pradhānaṃ yuktaṃ caitattathāhi parameśaḥ // 50
analyzed: velā atra na pradhānam yuktam ca etat tathā hi parameśaḥ
śrī trikabhairava kula śāstreṣu ūce na parva divaseṣu
velā yogam kaṃcana tithi bha graha yogataḥ hi anyam
tithiḥ tu pūjyā pradhāna rūpa tvāt
śveta abhāve kṛṣṇa chāga ālambham hi kathayanti
yat punar ūrmi prabhṛtini śāstre velā uditā api tat kāmyam

original: AbhT_28.53b/. mukhyatayoddiśya vidhiṃ tathāca tatra pauṣaparvadine // 53
analyzed: mukhya tayā uddiśya vidhim tathā ca tatra pauṣa parva dine

original: AbhT_28.54a/. kṛtvārcanamardhaniśi dhyātvā japtvā bahirgatasya yathā /
analyzed: kṛtvā arcanam ardha niśi dhyātvā japtvā bahis gatasya yathā

original: AbhT_28.54b/. ādeśaḥ phalati tathā māghe cakrādvacaḥ phalati // 54
analyzed: ādeśaḥ phalati tathā māghe cakrāt vacaḥ phalati

original: AbhT_28.55a/. acirādabhīṣṭasiddhiḥ pañcasu maitrī dhanaṃ ca melāpaḥ /
analyzed: acirāt abhīṣṭa siddhiḥ pañcasu maitrī dhanam ca melāpaḥ
siddhādeśa prāptiḥ mārga antam kathyate vibhunā
bha graha yoga abhāve velām tu titheḥ avaśyam īkṣeta

original: AbhT_28.57a/. sā hi tathā sphuṭarūpā titheḥ svabhāvodayaṃ dadyāt /
analyzed: sā hi tathā sphuṭa rūpā titheḥ svabhāva udayam dadyāt
bha graha tithi velā aṃśa anuyāyi sarva aṅga sundaram tu dinam
yadi labhyeta tadā asmin viśeṣatama pūjanam racayet

original: AbhT_28.58b/. naca kāmyameva kevalametatparivarjane yataḥ kathitaḥ // 58
analyzed: na ca kāmyam eva kevalam etat parivarjane yatas kathitaḥ
samaya vilopaḥ śrīmat bhairavakule ūrmiśāstre ca

original: AbhT_28.59b/. duṣṭā hi durācārāḥ paśutulyāḥ parva ye na viduḥ // 59
analyzed: duṣṭāḥ hi durācārāḥ paśu tulyāḥ parva ye na viduḥ
na ca kāmyasya a karaṇe syāt jātu pratyavāyi tvam
tatra anuyāga siddhi artham cakrayāgaḥ nirūpyate

original: AbhT_28.61a/. mūrtiyāga iti prokto yaḥ śrīyogīśvarīmate /
AbhT_28.61b/. nityaṃ naimittikaṃ karma yadatroktaṃ maheśinā // 61
analyzed: nityam naimittikam karma yat atra uktam maheśinā

original: AbhT_28.62a/. sarvatra cakrayāgo@tra mukhyaḥ kāmye viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: sarvatra cakrayāgotra mukhyaḥ kāmye viśeṣataḥ

original: AbhT_28.62b/. jñānī yogī ca puruṣaḥ strī vāsminmūrtisaṃjñake // 62
analyzed: jñānī yogī ca puruṣaḥ strī vā asmin mūrti saṃjñake
yoge prayatnataḥ yojyaḥ tat hi pātram anuttaram
tad saṃparkāt pūrṇa tā syāt iti traiśirasa ādiṣu

original: AbhT_28.64a/. tena sarvaṃ hutaṃ ceṣṭaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram /
analyzed: tena sarvam hutam ca iṣṭam trailokyam sa carācaram

original: AbhT_28.64b/. jñānine yogine vāpi yo dadāti karoti vā // 64
analyzed: jñānine yogine vā api yaḥ dadāti karoti vā

original: AbhT_28.65a/. dīkṣottare@pi ca proktamannaṃ brahmā raso hariḥ /
analyzed: dīkṣottare pi ca proktam annam brahmā rasaḥ hariḥ

original: AbhT_28.65b/. bhoktā śiva iti jñānī śvapacānapyathoddhareat // 65
analyzed: bhoktā śivaḥ iti jñānī śvapacān api atha uddhareat

original: AbhT_28.66a/. sarvatattvamayo bhūtvā yadi bhuṅkte sa sādhakaḥ /
analyzed: sarva tattva mayaḥ bhūtvā yadi bhuṅkte sa sādhakaḥ
tena bhojita mātreṇa sakṛt koṭiḥ tu bhojitā

original: AbhT_28.67a/. atha tattvavidetasminyadi bhuñjīta tat priye /
analyzed: atha tattva vid etasmin yadi bhuñjīta tat priye

original: AbhT_28.67b/. parisaṃkhyā na vidyeta tadāha bhagavāñchivaḥ // 67
analyzed: parisaṃkhyā na vidyeta tat āha bhagavān śivaḥ

original: AbhT_28.68a/. bhojyaṃ māyātmakaṃ sarvaṃ śivo bhoktā sa cāpyaham /
analyzed: bhojyam māyā ātmakam sarvam śivaḥ bhoktā sa ca api aham

original: AbhT_28.68b/. evaṃ yo vai vijānāti daiśikastattvapāragaḥ // 68
analyzed: evam yaḥ vai vijānāti daiśikaḥ tattva pāragaḥ

original: AbhT_28.69a/. taṃ dṛṣṭvā devamāyāntaṃ krīḍantyoṣadhayo gṛhe /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā devam āyāntam krīḍanti oṣadhayaḥ gṛhe
nivṛttam adya eva asmābhiḥ saṃsāra gahana arṇavāt

original: AbhT_28.70a/. yadasya vaktraṃ saṃprāptā yāsyāmaḥ paramaṃ padam /
analyzed: yat asya vaktram saṃprāptāḥ yāsyāmaḥ paramam padam
anyepāna bhujaḥ hi ūrdhve prāṇa upānaḥ tu adhomukhaḥ
tasmin bhoktari deveśi dātuḥ kula śatāni api
āśu eva parimucyante narakāt yātanā arṇavāt
śrīmat niśāṭane pi uktam kathana anveṣaṇāt api
śrotra abhyantara saṃprāpte guru vaktrāt vinirgate

original: AbhT_28.73a/. muktastadaiva kāle tu yantraṃ tiṣṭhati kevalam /
analyzed: muktaḥ tadā eva kāle tu yantram tiṣṭhati kevalam

original: AbhT_28.73b/. surāpaḥ steyahārī ca brahmahā gurutalpagaḥ // 73
analyzed: surāpaḥ steya hārī ca brahma hā gurutalpa gaḥ

original: AbhT_28.74a/. antyajo vā dvijo vātha bālo vṛddho yuvāpi vā /
analyzed: antyajaḥ vā dvijaḥ vā atha bālaḥ vṛddhaḥ yuvā api vā

original: AbhT_28.74b/. paryantavāsī yo jñānī deśasyāpi pavitrakaḥ // 74
AbhT_28.75a/. tatra saṃnihito devaḥ sadevīkaḥ sakiṅkaraḥ /
analyzed: tatra saṃnihitaḥ devaḥ sa devīkaḥ sa kiṅkaraḥ
tasmāt prādhānyataḥ kṛtvā gurum jñāna viśāradam
mūrtiyāgam caret tasya vidhiḥ yogīśvarīmate
pavitra ārohaṇe śrāddhe tathā parva dineṣu alam
sūrya candra uparāga ādau laukikeṣu api parvasu

original: AbhT_28.77b/. utsave ca vivāhādau viprāṇāṃ yajñakarmaṇi // 77
analyzed: utsave ca vivāha ādau viprāṇām yajña karmaṇi

original: AbhT_28.78a/. dīkṣāyāṃ ca pratiṣṭhāyāṃ samayānāṃ viśodhane /
analyzed: dīkṣāyām ca pratiṣṭhāyām samayānām viśodhane

original: AbhT_28.78b/. kāmanārthaṃ ca kartavyo mūrtiyāgaḥ sa pañcadhā // 78
analyzed: kāmanā artham ca kartavyaḥ mūrtiyāgaḥ sa pañcadhā
kevalaḥ kevalaiḥ eva gurubhiḥ miśritaḥ punar

original: AbhT_28.80a/. sādhakādyaiḥ sapatnīkairyāmalaḥ sa dvidhā punaḥ /
analyzed: sādhaka ādyaiḥ sa patnīkaiḥ yāmalaḥ sa dvidhā punar
patnī yogāt kraya ānīta veśyā saṃyogāt uthavā
cakriṇī ādyāḥ ca vakṣyante śakti yogāt yathā ucitāḥ
tad saṃyogāt cakra yuktaḥ yāgaḥ sarva phala pradaḥ

original: AbhT_28.82a/. sarvaistu sahito yāgo vīrasaṅkara ucyate /
analyzed: sarvaiḥ tu sahitaḥ yāgaḥ vīra saṅkaraḥ ucyate
madhye guruḥ bhavet teṣām guru vargaḥ tad āvṛtiḥ

original: AbhT_28.83a/. tisra āvṛtayo bāhye samayyantā yathākramam /
analyzed: tisraḥ āvṛtayaḥ bāhye samayi antāḥ yathākramam

original: AbhT_28.83b/. paṅktikrameṇa vā sarve madhye teṣāṃ guruḥ sadā // 83
analyzed: paṅkti krameṇa vā sarve madhye teṣām guruḥ sadā
tadā tad gandha dhūpa sraj samālambhana vāsasā
pūjyam cakra anusāreṇa tat tat cakram idam tu iti

original: AbhT_28.85a/. ekārake yathā cakre ekavīravidhiṃ smaret /
analyzed: ekārake yathā cakre eka vīra vidhim smaret
dvi are yāmalam anyatra trikam evam ṣaṣ asrake

original: AbhT_28.86a/. ṣaḍyoginīḥ saptakaṃ ca saptāre@ṣṭāṣṭake ca vā /
analyzed: ṣaṣ yoginīḥ saptakam ca sapta āreṣṭa aṣṭake ca vā

original: AbhT_28.86b/. anyadvā tādṛśaṃ tatra cakre tādṛksvarūpiṇi // 86
analyzed: anyat vā tādṛśam tatra cakre tādṛś svarūpiṇi

original: AbhT_28.87a/. tataḥ pātre@lisaṃpūrṇe pūrvaṃ cakraṃ yajetsudhīḥ /
analyzed: tatas pātra ili saṃpūrṇe pūrvam cakram yajet sudhīḥ
ādhāra yukte na ādhāra rahitam tarpaṇam kvacid

original: AbhT_28.88a/. ādhāreṇa vinā bhraṃśo naca tuṣyanti raśmayaḥ /
analyzed: ādhāreṇa vinā bhraṃśaḥ na ca tuṣyanti raśmayaḥ
preta rūpam bhavet pātram śākta amṛtam atha āsavaḥ

original: AbhT_28.89a/. bhoktrī tatra tu yā śaktiḥ sa śambhuḥ parameśvaraḥ /
analyzed: bhoktrī tatra tu yā śaktiḥ sa śambhuḥ parameśvaraḥ
aṇu śakti śiva ātmā ittham dhyātvā saṃmilitam trayam
tatas tu tarpaṇam kāryam āvṛteḥ āvṛteḥ kramāt
pratisaṃcara yogena punar antar praveśayet
yāvat guru antikam tat hi pūrṇam bhramaṇam ucyate

original: AbhT_28.91b/. tatrādau devatāstarpyāstato vīrā iti kramaḥ // 91
analyzed: tatra ādau devatāḥ tarpyāḥ tatas vīrāḥ iti kramaḥ
vīraḥ ca vīraśaktiḥ ca iti evam asmad guru kramaḥ
tatas vat aṃśān vividhān māṃsa matsya ādi saṃyutān

original: AbhT_28.93a/. agre tatra pravikiret tṛptyantaṃ sādhakottamaḥ /
analyzed: agre tatra pravikiret tṛpti antam sādhaka uttamaḥ
pātra abhāve punar bhadram vellitā śuktim eva ca

original: AbhT_28.94a/. pātre kurvīta matimāniti siddhāmate kramaḥ /
analyzed: pātre kurvīta matimān iti siddhāmate kramaḥ
dakṣa hastena bhadram syāt vellitā śuktiḥ ucyate
dakṣa hastasya kurvīta vāma upari kanīyasīm
tarjanī aṅguṣṭha yogena dakṣa adhas vāmaka aṅgulīḥ
niḥsandhi bandhau dvau ittham vellitā śuktiḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_28.96b/. ye tatra pānakāle tu bindavo yānti medinīm // 96
analyzed: ye tatra pāna kāle tu bindavaḥ yānti medinīm
taiḥ tuṣyanti hi vetāla guhyaka ādyāḥ gabhastayaḥ

original: AbhT_28.97b/. dhārayā bhairavastuṣyet karapānaṃ paraṃ tataḥ // 97
analyzed: dhārayā bhairavaḥ tuṣyet kara pānam param tatas

original: AbhT_28.98a/. praveśo@tra na dātavyaḥ pūrvameva hi kasyacit /
analyzed: praveśaḥ utra na dātavyaḥ pūrvam eva hi kasyacid

original: AbhT_28.98b/. pramādāttu praviṣṭasya vicāraṃ naiva carcayet // 98
analyzed: pramādāt tu praviṣṭasya vicāram na eva carcayet

original: AbhT_28.99a/. evaṃ kṛtvā kramādyāgamante dakṣiṇayā yutam /
analyzed: evam kṛtvā krama ādi āgam ante dakṣiṇayā yutam
samālambhana tāmbūla vastra ādyam vitaret budhaḥ

original: AbhT_28.100a/. rūpakārdhāt paraṃ hīnāṃ na dadyāddakṣiṇāṃ sudhīḥ /
analyzed: rūpaka ardhāt param hīnām na dadyāt dakṣiṇām sudhīḥ
samayibhyaḥ kramāt dvi dviguṇā guru antakam bhavet
eṣa syāt mūrtiyāgaḥ tu sarva yāga pradhānakaḥ

original: AbhT_28.101b/. kāmye tu saṃvidhau saptakṛtvaḥ kāryastathāvidhaḥ // 101
analyzed: kāmye tu saṃvidhau sapta kṛtvas kāryaḥ tathāvidhaḥ

original: AbhT_28.102a/. jānanti prathamaṃ gehaṃ tatastasya samarthatām /
analyzed: jānanti prathamam geham tatas tasya samartha tām
balābalam tatas paścāt vismayanta itra mātaraḥ
tatas api saṃnidhīyante prīyante vara dāḥ tatas
devīnām atha nāthasya parivāra yujā upi alam
vallabhaḥ mūrtiyāgaḥ uyamataḥ kāryaḥ vipaścitā

original: AbhT_28.104b/. rāktau gupte gṛhe vīrāḥ śaktayo@nyonyamapyalam // 104
analyzed: gupte gṛhe vīrāḥ śaktayaḥ nyonyam api alam
a saṃketa yujaḥ yojyāḥ devatā śabda kīrtanāt
alābhe mūrti cakrasya kumārīḥ eva pūjayet

original: AbhT_28.106a/. kāmyārthe tu na tāṃ vyaṅgāṃ stanapuṣpavatīṃ tathā /
analyzed: kāmya arthe tu na tām vyaṅgām stana puṣpavatīm tathā
pratipad śruti saṃjñe ca caturthī ca uttarā traye

original: AbhT_28.107a/. haste ca pañcamī ṣaṣṭhī pūrvāsvatha punarvasau /
analyzed: haste ca pañcamī ṣaṣṭhī pūrvāsu atha punarvasau

original: AbhT_28.107b/. saptamī tatparā pitrye rohiṇyāṃ navamī tathā // 107
analyzed: saptamī tad parā pitrye rohiṇyām navamī tathā

original: AbhT_28.108a/. mūle tu dvādaśī brāhme bhūtāśvinyāṃ ca pūrṇimā /
analyzed: mūle tu dvādaśī brāhme bhūtāśvinyām ca pūrṇimā
dhaniṣṭhāyām amāvasyā saḥ yam ekādaśa ātmakaḥ
arka ādi traya śukra anyatama yuktaḥ api ahargaṇaḥ

original: AbhT_28.109b/. yogaparveti vikhyāto rātrau vā dina eva vā // 109
analyzed: yogaparvā iti vikhyātaḥ rātrau vā dine eva vā
yogaparvaṇi kartavyaḥ mūrtiyāgaḥ tu sarvathā
yaḥ sarvān yogaparva ākhyān vāsarān pūjayet sudhīḥ

original: AbhT_28.111a/. mūrtiyāgena so@pi syāt samayī maṇḍalaṃ vinā /
analyzed: mūrti yāgena saḥ api syāt samayī maṇḍalam vinā
iti eṣa mūrtiyāgaḥ śrī siddhayogīśvarīmate
athā ucyate śivena uktaḥ pavitraka vidhiḥ sphuṭaḥ
śrī ratnamālā triśiraḥśāstrayoḥ sūcitaḥ punar
tatra prādhānyataḥ śrīmat mālā uktaḥ vidhiḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_28.114b/. nāgarājaḥ svabhuvane meghakāle sma nāvasat // 114
analyzed: nāga rājaḥ sva bhuvane megha kāle sma na avasat

original: AbhT_28.115a/. kevalaṃ tu pavitro@yaṃ vāyubhakṣaḥ samāḥ śatam /
analyzed: kevalam tu pavitra uyam vāyubhakṣaḥ samāḥ śatam

original: AbhT_28.115b/. divyaṃ daśaguṇaṃ nāthaṃ bhairavaṃ paryapūjayat // 115
analyzed: divyam daśaguṇam nātham bhairavam paryapūjayat

original: AbhT_28.116a/. vyajijñapacca taṃ tuṣṭaṃ nāthaṃ varṣāsvahaṃ nije /
analyzed: vyajijñapat ca tam tuṣṭam nātham varṣāsu aham nije

original: AbhT_28.116b/. pātāle nāsituṃ śaktaḥ so@pyenaṃ parameśvaraḥ // 116
analyzed: pātāle na āsitum śaktaḥ saḥ api enam parameśvaraḥ
nāgam nija jaṭā jūṭa pīṭha gam paryakalpayat
tatas samasta deva oghaiḥ dhāritā asau sva mūrdhani

original: AbhT_28.118a/. mahatāṃ mahitānāṃ hi nādbhuta viśvapūjyatā /
analyzed: mahatām mahitānām hi na adbhuta viśva pūjya tā
tasmāt maheśituḥ mūrdhni devatānām ca sarvaśas
ātmanaḥ ca pavitram tam kuryāt yāga puraḥsaram

original: AbhT_28.119b/. daśa koṭyo na pūjānāṃ pavitrārohaṇe samāḥ // 119
analyzed: daśa koṭyaḥ na pūjānām pavitra ārohaṇe samāḥ

original: AbhT_28.120a/. vṛthā dīkṣā vṛthā jñānaṃ gurvārādhanameva ca /
analyzed: vṛthā dīkṣā vṛthā jñānam guru ārādhanam eva ca
vinā pavitra ādyena etat haret nāgaḥ śiva ājñayā
tasmāt sarva prayatnena sa kāryaḥ kula vedibhiḥ
āṣāḍha śuklāt mithuna karkaṭa sthe ravau vidhiḥ
kartavyaḥ yāvat sā tula pūrṇimā
tulā upalakṣitasya antyam kārtikasya dinam matam
kula śabdam paṭhantaḥ anye vyākhyā bhedam prakurvate

original: AbhT_28.124a/. kulasya nityācakrasya pūrṇatvaṃ yatra tanmatam /
analyzed: kulasya nityā cakrasya pūrṇa tvam yatra tat matam

original: AbhT_28.125a/. pūrṇatvaṃ tatra candrasya sā tithiḥ kulapūrṇimā /
analyzed: pūrṇa tvam tatra candrasya sā tithiḥ kula pūrṇimā
dakṣiṇa uttara gaḥ kālaḥ kula ākula tayā uditaḥ

original: AbhT_28.126a/. kulasya tasya carame dine pūrṇatvamucyate /
analyzed: kulasya tasya carame dine pūrṇa tvam ucyate
pavitrake prakāśa tva siddhyai kṛṣṇasya vartmanaḥ
tat etat bahu śāstra uktam rūpam devaḥ nyarūpayat
ekena eva padena śrī ratnamālā kula āgame
tat atra samaye sarva vidhi saṃpūraṇa ātmakaḥ

original: AbhT_28.129a/. pavitrakavidhiḥ kāryaḥ śuklapakṣe tu sarvathā /
AbhT_28.129b/. pūraṇaṃ śaktiyogena śaktyātma ca sitaṃ dalam // 129
analyzed: pūraṇam śakti yogena śakti ātma ca sitam dalam
dakṣiṇāyana sājātyāt tena tad vidhiḥ ucyate
eka dvi tri catur pañca ṣaṣ latā ekatamam mahat
sauvarṇa sūtram triguṇam sa eka granthi śatam gurau

original: AbhT_28.132a/. pare gurau tu tryadhikamadhyabdhi parameṣṭhini /
analyzed: pare gurau tu parameṣṭhini
prāk siddha ācārya yogeśa viṣaye tu rasa adhikam
aṣṭa adhikam śivasya uktam citra ratna prapūritam

original: AbhT_28.134a/. vaṭuke kanakābhāve raupyaṃ tu parikalpayet /
analyzed: vaṭuke kanaka abhāve raupyam tu parikalpayet
pāṭṭasūtram atha kṣaumam kārpāsam tri tri tānitam
tasmāt navaguṇāt sūtrāt triguṇa ādi kramāt kuru

original: AbhT_28.135b/. caṇḍāṃśuguṇaparyantaṃ tato@pi triguṇaṃ ca vā // 135

analyzed: tena aṣṭādaśa tantu uttham adhamam madhyamam punar

original: AbhT_28.136b/. aṣṭottaraśataṃ tasmāt triguṇaṃ tūttamaṃ matam // 136
analyzed: aṣṭottaraśatam tasmāt triguṇam tu uttamam matam
granthayaḥ tattva saṃkhyātāḥ ṣaḍadhva kalanā vaśāt
yat vā vyāsa samāsābhyām citrāḥ sat gandha pūritāḥ
viśeṣa vidhinā pūrvam pūjayitvā arpayet tatas
guru ātmanoḥ jānu nābhi kaṇṭha mūrdha anta gam ca vā
tatas mahā utsavaḥ kāryaḥ guru pūjā puraḥsaraḥ
tarpyāḥ śāsana gāḥ sarve dakṣiṇā vastra bhojanaiḥ
mahān utsavaḥ prakartavyaḥ gīta nṛtta ātmakaḥ mahān
cāturmāsyam sapta dinam tri dinam vā api alābhataḥ
tad ante kṣamayet devam maṇḍala ādi visarjayet
vahnim ca paścāt kartavyaḥ cakrayāgaḥ purā uditaḥ

original: AbhT_28.142b/. māse māse caturmāse varṣe vāpi pavitrakam // 142
analyzed: māse māse catur māse varṣe vā api pavitrakam
sarvathā eva prakartavyam yathā vibhava vistaram

original: AbhT_28.143b/. vittābhāve punaḥ kāryaṃ kāśairapi kuśombhitaiḥ // 143
analyzed: vitta abhāve punar kāryam kāśaiḥ api

original: AbhT_28.144a/. sati vitte punaḥ śāṭhyaṃ vyādhaye narakāya ca /
analyzed: sati vitte punar śāṭhyam vyādhaye narakāya ca
tatra api paripūrṇa tvam pavitraka samarcanāt
pavitraka vilope tu prāyaścittam japet sudhīḥ
su śuddhaḥ san punar kuryāt iti ājñā parameśituḥ

original: AbhT_28.146b/. atha triśirasi prokto likhyate tadvidhiḥ sphuṭaḥ // 146
analyzed: atha triśirasi proktaḥ likhyate tad vidhiḥ sphuṭaḥ
tri prameyasya śaivasya pañca pañca ātmakasya vā
daśa aṣṭādaśa bhedasya ṣaṭsrotasaḥ iha ucyate
ye narāḥ samaya bhraṣṭāḥ guru śāstra ādi dūṣakāḥ
akāmāt kāmataḥ vā api sūkṣma pāpa pravartinaḥ

original: AbhT_28.149b/. teṣāṃ praśamanārthāya pavitraṃ kriyate śive // 149
analyzed: teṣām praśamana arthāya pavitram kriyate śive
na tu duḥkha prade kṛṣṇe kartṛ rāṣṭra nṛpa ādiṣu

original: AbhT_28.151a/. pāṭṭasūtraṃ tu kauśeyaṃ kārpāsaṃ kṣaumameva ca /
analyzed: pāṭṭasūtram tu kauśeyam kārpāsam kṣaumam eva ca
cāturāśramikāṇām tu subhruvā kartita ukṣitam

original: AbhT_28.152a/. tridhā tu triguṇīkṛtya mānasaṃkhyāṃ tu kārayet /
analyzed: tridhā tu triguṇīkṛtya māna saṃkhyām tu kārayet

original: AbhT_28.152b/. aṣṭottaraṃ tantuśataṃ tadardhaṃ vā tadardhakam // 152
analyzed: aṣṭa uttaram tantu śatam tad ardham vā tad ardhakam
hrāsaḥ tu pūrva saṃkhyāyāḥ daśabhiḥ daśabhiḥ kramāt

original: AbhT_28.153b/. navabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ saptaviṃśatyā vā śivāditaḥ // 153
analyzed: navabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ saptaviṃśatyā vā śiva āditaḥ
yādṛśaḥ tantu vinyāsaḥ granthīn kuryāt tu tāvataḥ
catur sama viliptān tān athavā kuṅkumena tu
arcāsu śobhanam mūrghni tri tattva parikalpanāt
dvādaśa granthi śaktīnām brahma vaktra arciṣām api

original: AbhT_28.156b/. vidyāpīṭhe cale liṅge sthaṇḍile ca gurorgaṇe // 156
analyzed: vidyā pīṭhe cale liṅge sthaṇḍile ca guroḥ gaṇe
ghaṇṭāyām sruc sruve śiṣya liṅgiṣu dvāra toraṇe

original: AbhT_28.157b/. svadehe vahnipīṭhe ca yathāśobhaṃ tadiṣyate // 157
analyzed: sva dehe vahni pīṭhe ca yathāśobham tat iṣyate
prāsāde yāga gehe ca kārayet nava raṅgikam
vidyā pīṭhe tu kha śarāḥ pratimā liṅga pīṭha gam

original: AbhT_28.159a/. vasuvedaṃ ca ghaṇṭāyāṃ śarākṣyaṣṭādaśa sruve /
analyzed: vasu vedam ca ghaṇṭāyām śara akṣi aṣṭādaśa sruve

original: AbhT_28.159b/. vedākṣi sruci ṣaṭtriṃśat prāsāde maṇḍape raviḥ // 159
analyzed: veda akṣi sruci ṣaṭtriṃśat prāsāde maṇḍape raviḥ

original: AbhT_28.160b/. sapta sādhakagāḥ pañca putrake sapta sāmaye // 160
analyzed: sapta sādhakagāḥ pañca putrake sapta sāmaye
catvāraḥ atha anya śāstra sthe śiṣye pañcakam ucyate

original: AbhT_28.161b/. liṅgināṃ kevalo granthistoraṇe daśa kalpayet // 161
analyzed: liṅginām kevalaḥ granthiḥ toraṇe daśa kalpayet

original: AbhT_28.162a/. dvāreṣvaṣṭau granthayaḥ syuḥ kṛtvetthaṃ tu pavitrakam /
analyzed: dvāreṣu aṣṭau granthayaḥ syuḥ kṛtvā ittham tu pavitrakam
pūjayitvā mantra jālam tatas
pavitrakāṇām saṃpādya kuryāt saṃpāta saṃskriyām
tatas saṃvatsaram dhyāyet bhairavam chidra sākṣiṇam
dattvā pūrṇāhutim devi praṇamet mantrabhairavam
om samasta kriyā doṣa pūraṇa īśa vratam prati

original: AbhT_28.165a/. yatkiṃcidakṛtaṃ duṣṭaṃ kṛtaṃ vā mātṛnandana /
analyzed: yat kiṃcid akṛtam duṣṭam kṛtam vā mātṛ nandana
tat sarvam mama deveśa tvad prasādāt praṇaśyatu

original: AbhT_28.166a/. sarvathā raśmicakreśa namastubhyaṃ prasīda me /
analyzed: sarvathā raśmi cakra īśa namaḥ tubhyam prasīda me
anena dadyāt devāya nimantraṇa pavitrakam

original: AbhT_28.167b/. pañcagavyaṃ caruṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ śiṣyaiḥ samantataḥ // 167
analyzed: pañcagavyam carum dantakāṣṭham śiṣyaiḥ samantataḥ

original: AbhT_28.168a/. ācārya nidrāṃ kurvīta prātarutthāya cāhnikam /
analyzed: ācārya nidrām kurvīta prātar utthāya ca āhnikam

original: AbhT_28.168b/. tato vidhiṃ pūjayitvā pavitrāṇi samāharet // 168
analyzed: tatas vidhim pūjayitvā pavitrāṇi samāharet

original: AbhT_28.169a/. dantakāṣṭhaṃ mṛcca dhātrī samṛddhātrī sahāmbunā /
analyzed: dantakāṣṭham mṛd ca dhātrī sa mṛd dhātrī saha ambunā

original: AbhT_28.169b/. catuḥsamaṃ ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ bhasma pañcasu yojayet // 169
analyzed: catur samam ca taiḥ sārdham bhasma pañcasu yojayet
prāc dakṣa paścima ūrdhva stha vāma vaktreṣu vai kramāt
pañca etāni pavitrāṇi sthāpayet ca īśa gocare

original: AbhT_28.171a/. kuśedhma pañcagavyaṃ ca śarvāgre viniyojayet /
analyzed: kuśa idhma pañcagavyam ca śarva agre viniyojayet
vāma amṛta ādi saṃyuktam naivedyam trividham tatas

original: AbhT_28.172a/. dadyādasṛk tathā madyaṃ pānāni vividhāni ca /
analyzed: dadyāt asṛj tathā madyam pānāni vividhāni ca
tatas homaḥ mahā akṣma aja māṃsaiḥ tila yutaiḥ atho
tilaiḥ ghṛta yutaiḥ yat vā taṇḍulaiḥ atha dhānyakaiḥ

original: AbhT_28.174a/. mūlaṃ sahasraṃ sāṣṭoktaṃ triśaktau brahmavaktrakam /
AbhT_28.174b/. arciṣāṃ tu śataṃ sāṣṭaṃ tataḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ kṣipet // 174
analyzed: arciṣām tu śatam sāṣṭam tatas pūrṇāhutim kṣipet

original: AbhT_28.175a/. tato@ñjalau pavitraṃ tu gṛhītvā prapaṭhedidam /
analyzed: tatas uñjalau pavitram tu gṛhītvā prapaṭhet idam

original: AbhT_28.175b/. akāmādathavā kāmādyanmayā na kṛtaṃ vibho // 175
analyzed: akāmāt athavā kāmāt yat mayā na kṛtam vibho
tat acchidram mama astu īśa pavitreṇa tava ājñayā
mūlamantraḥ pūraya iti kriyā niyamam iti atha
vauṣaṭ antam pavitram ca dadyāt bindu avasānakam
nāda antam samana antam ca api unmanā antam kramāt trayam
evam catuṣṭayam dadyāt anulomena bhautikaḥ
naiṣṭhikaḥ tu vilomena pavitraka catuṣṭayam
yat kiñcid vividham vastra chatra alaṅkaraṇa ādikam
tat nivedyam dīpa mālāḥ suvarṇa tila bhājanam
vastra yugma yutam sarva sampūraṇa nimittataḥ
bhojanīyāḥ pūjanīyāḥ śiva bhaktāḥ tu śaktitaḥ
catur tri dvi eka māsa ādi dina ekāntam mahā utsavam
kuryāt tatas na vrajeyuḥ anya sthānam kadācana

original: AbhT_28.182a/. tatastu daiśikaḥ pūjyo gāmasmai kṣīriṇīṃ navām /
analyzed: tatas tu daiśikaḥ pūjyaḥ gām asmai kṣīriṇīm navām
dadyāt suvarṇa ratna ādi rupya vastra vibhūṣitām
vadet guruḥ ca saṃpūrṇaḥ vidhiḥ tava bhavatu iti
vaktavyam devadevasya punarāgamanāya ca
tatas visarjanam kāryam guptam ābharaṇa ādikam
naivedyam guruḥ ādāya yāga arthe tat niyojayet
caturṇām api sāmānyam pavitrakam iti smṛtam

original: AbhT_28.185b/. nāsmādvrataṃ paraṃ kiñcit kā vāsya stutirucyate // 185
analyzed: na asmāt vratam param kiñcid kā vā asya stutiḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_28.186a/. śeṣaṃ tvagādhe vāryoghe kṣipenna sthāpayetsthiram /
analyzed: śeṣam tu agādhe vāri oghe kṣipet na sthāpayet sthiram
atha naimittika vidhiḥ yaḥ purā sūtritaḥ mayā

original: AbhT_28.187a/. sa bhaṇyate tatra kāryā devasyārcā viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: sa bhaṇyate tatra kāryā devasya arcā viśeṣataḥ
cakrayāgaḥ ca kartavyaḥ pūrva ukta vidhinā budhaiḥ
tatra yat yat nija abhīṣṭa bhoga mokṣa upakārakam
pāramparyeṇa sākṣāt vā bhavet cit acit ātmakam
tat pūjyam tad upāyāḥ ca pūjyāḥ tad maya tāptaye
tad upāyaḥ api saṃpūjyaḥ mūrti kāla kriyā ādikaḥ
upeya sūti sāmarthyam upāya tvam tad arcanāt
tad rūpa tanmayībhāvāt upeyam śīghram āpnuyāt

original: AbhT_28.191a/. yathā yathā ca naikaṭyamupāyeṣu tathā tathā /
analyzed: yathā yathā ca naikaṭyam upāyeṣu tathā tathā
avaśyaṃbhāvi kārya tvam viśeṣāt ca arcana ādike
jñānasya kasyacid prāptiḥ bhoga mokṣa upakāriṇaḥ
yadā tat mukhyam eva uktam naimittika dinam budhaiḥ
tad upāyaḥ śāstram atra vaktā api aupayikaḥ guruḥ
tad vidyaḥ api guru bhrātā saṃvādāt jñāna dāyakaḥ

original: AbhT_28.194a/. guroḥ patnī tathā bhrātā putra ityādiko gaṇaḥ /
analyzed: guroḥ patnī tathā bhrātā putraḥ iti ādikaḥ gaṇaḥ
na yoni saṃbandha vaśāt vidyā saṃbandha jaḥ tu saḥ
vīrya aruṇa parīṇāma deha ahantā pratiṣṭhitāḥ
deha upakāra santānāḥ jñāteye pariniṣṭhitāḥ
tathā ca smṛti śāstreṣu santateḥ dāya hāri tā
yuktā eva tāvān sa hi uktaḥ bhedāt dūra antika tvataḥ
ye tu tyakta śarīra āsthāḥ bodha ahambhāva bhāginaḥ
bodha upakāra santāna dvayāt te bandhu tā juṣaḥ
tatra ittham prāk yadā paśyet śakti unmīlita dṛkkriyaḥ
dehaḥ tāvat ayam pūrva pūrva upādāna nirmitaḥ
ātmā vikāra rahitaḥ śāśvata tvāt ahetukaḥ

original: AbhT_28.199b/. svātantryāt punarātmīyādayaṃ channa iva sthitaḥ // 199
analyzed: svātantryāt punar ātmīyāt ayam channaḥ iva sthitaḥ
punar ca prakaṭībhūya bhairavībhāva bhājanam
tatra asya prakaṭībhāve bhukti mukti ātmake bhṛśam

original: AbhT_28.201a/. ya upāyaḥ samucito jñānasantāna eṣa saḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ upāyaḥ samucitaḥ jñāna santānaḥ eṣa saḥ
krama sphuṭībhavat tādṛś sadṛśa jñāna dhārayā

original: AbhT_28.202a/. galadvijātīyatayā prāpyaṃ śīghraṃ hi labhyate /
analyzed: galat vijātīya tayā prāpyam śīghram hi labhyate
evam ca anādi saṃsāra ucita vijñāna santateḥ

original: AbhT_28.203a/. dhvaṃse lokottaraṃ jñānaṃ santānāntaratāṃ śrayet /
analyzed: dhvaṃse loka uttaram jñānam santāna antara tām śrayet
kāraṇam mukhyam ādyam tat guru vijñānam ātma gam
atyantam sva viśeṣāṇām tatra arpaṇa vaśāt sphuṭam

original: AbhT_28.205a/. upādānaṃ hi tadyuktaṃ dehabhede hi satyapi /
analyzed: upādānam hi tat yuktam dehabhede hi sati api
deha santati gau bheda abhedau vijñāna santateḥ
na tathātvāya yogi icchā āviṣṭa śāva śarīra vat
deham atyajataḥ nānā jñāna upādāna tā na kim
tena vijñāna santāna prādhānyāt yauna santateḥ
anyonyam guru santānaḥ yaḥ śiva jñāna niṣṭhitaḥ

original: AbhT_28.208b/. itthaṃ sthite trayaṃ mukhyaṃ kāraṇaṃ sahakāri ca // 208
analyzed: ittham sthite trayam mukhyam kāraṇam sahakāri ca
eka kāraṇa kāryam ca vastu iti eṣa guroḥ gaṇaḥ
guruḥ kāraṇam atra uktam tad patnī sahakāriṇī
yatas niḥśaktikasya asya na yāga idhikṛtiḥ bhavet
antar stha udāra saṃvitti śakteḥ bāhyām vinā api tām
sāmarthyam yoginaḥ yadvat vinā api sahakāriṇam

original: AbhT_28.211b/. ekajanyā bhrātaraḥ syustatsadṛgyastu ko@pi saḥ // 211
analyzed: ekajanyāḥ bhrātaraḥ syuḥ tad sadṛś yaḥ tu kaḥ api saḥ
punar paramparā yogāt guru vargaḥ upi bhaṇyate

original: AbhT_28.212b/. mukhya eṣa tu santānaḥ pūjyo mānyaśca sarvadā // 212
analyzed: mukhyaḥ eṣa tu santānaḥ pūjyaḥ mānyaḥ ca sarvadā

original: AbhT_28.213a/. gurvādīnāṃ ca sambhūtau dīkṣāyāṃ prāyaṇe@pi ca /
analyzed: guru ādīnām ca sambhūtau dīkṣāyām prāyaṇe api ca
yat ahar tat hi vijñāna upāya deha ādi kāraṇam
evam sva janma divasaḥ vijñāna upāyaḥ ucyate
tādṛś bhoga apavarga ādi hetoḥ dehasya kāraṇam

original: AbhT_28.215a/. dīkṣādikaśca saṃskāraḥ svātmano yatra cāhni tat /
analyzed: dīkṣā ādikaḥ ca saṃskāraḥ sva ātmanaḥ yatra ca ahni tat
bhavet janma dinam mukhyam jñāna santāna janmataḥ

original: AbhT_28.216a/. svakaṃ mṛtidinaṃ yattu tadanyeṣāṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: svakam mṛti dinam yat tu tat anyeṣām bhaviṣyati
naimittikam mṛtaḥ yasmāt śiva abhinnaḥ tadā bhavet
tatra prasaṅgāt maraṇa svarūpam brūmahe sphuṭam
vicitra phala karma ogha vaśāt tad tad śarīra bhāj
śarīra bhāj tvam ca etāvat yat tat garbha stha deha gaḥ
saṃvitteḥ śūnya rūḍhāyāḥ prathamaḥ prāṇana udayaḥ
garbha stha deha nirmāṇe tasya eva īśvara tā punar
asaṅkocasya tanu ādi kartā tena īśaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_28.220b/. sa vāyvātmā dṛḍhe tasmindehayantre cidātmanā // 220
analyzed: sa vāyu ātmā dṛḍhe tasmin dehayantre cit ātmanā
