preryamāṇaḥ vicarati bhastrā yantra gavāyu vat
atas prāk gāḍha saṃsupta utthita vat sa prabuddhyate

original: AbhT_28.222a/. kramāddehena sākaṃ ca prāṇanā syādbalīyasī /
analyzed: kramāt dehena sākam ca prāṇanā syāt balīyasī
tatra api karma niyati balāt sā prāṇanā akṣatām
gṛhṇāti śūnya suṣira saṃvid sparśa adhika tvataḥ
evam krameṇa saṃpuṣṭa deha prāṇa balaḥ bhṛśam
bhogān karma kṛtān bhuṅkte yoni a yoni ja deha gaḥ

original: AbhT_28.224b/. uktaṃ ca gahvarābhikhye śāstre śītāṃśumaulinā // 224
analyzed: uktam ca gahvara abhikhye śāstre śītāṃśumaulinā

original: AbhT_28.225a/. yathā gṛhaṃ viniṣpādya gṛhī samadhitiṣṭhati /
analyzed: yathā gṛham viniṣpādya gṛhī samadhitiṣṭhati

original: AbhT_28.225b/. tathā dehī tanuṃ kṛtvā kriyādiguṇavarjitaḥ // 225
analyzed: tathā dehī tanum kṛtvā kriyā ādi guṇa varjitaḥ
kiñcid sphuraṇa mātraḥ prāk niṣkalaḥ saḥ api śabdyate
sphuṭa indriya ādi tattvaḥ tu sakala ātmā iti bhaṇyate

original: AbhT_28.227a/. ityādi śrīgahvaroktaṃ tata eva paṭhedbahu /
analyzed: ityādi śrī gahvara uktam tatas eva paṭhet bahu

original: AbhT_28.227b/. kṣaye tu karmaṇāṃ teṣāṃ dehayantre@nyathāgate // 227
analyzed: kṣaye tu karmaṇām teṣām
prāṇayantram vighaṭate dehaḥ syāt kuḍya vat tatas
bhaṅgaḥ śoṣaḥ klidiḥ vāta śleṣma agni apacaya uccayaiḥ
iti evamādi yat kiñcid prāk saṃsthāna upamardakam
deha yantre vighaṭanam tat eva uktam manīṣibhiḥ
tasmin vighaṭite yantre sā saṃvid prāṇana ātma tām

original: AbhT_28.231a/. gṛhṇāti yonije@nyatra vā dehe karmacitrite /
analyzed: gṛhṇāti yoni jeni atra vā dehe karma citrite
sa dehaḥ pratibudhyeta prasupta utthita vat tadā
tasya api bhoga tad hāni mṛtayaḥ prāgvat eva hi
visṛṣṭi sthiti saṃhārāḥ ete karma bala ādi atas
atas niyati kāla ādi vaicitrya anuvidhāyinaḥ

original: AbhT_28.233b/. anugrahastu yaḥ so@yaṃ svasvarūpe vikasvare // 233
analyzed: anugrahaḥ tu yaḥ saḥ yam sva svarūpe vikasvare
jñapti ātmā iti katham karma niyati ādi pratīkṣate
saṅkoca hāni rūpe ismin katham hetuḥ anugrahe
anugrahaḥ ca kramikaḥ tīvraḥ ca iti vibhidyate

original: AbhT_28.236a/. prāk caiṣa vistarātprokta iti kiṃ punaruktibhiḥ /
analyzed: prāk ca eṣa vistarāt proktaḥ iti kim punaruktibhiḥ
tena dīkṣā śiva jñāna dagdha saṅkoca bandhanaḥ

original: AbhT_28.237a/. dehānte śiva eveti nāsya dehāntarasthitiḥ /
analyzed: dehānte śivaḥ eva iti na asya deha antara sthitiḥ
ye api tattva avatīrṇānām śaṃkara ājñā anuvartinām
svayambhu muni deva ṛṣi manuja ādi bhuvām gṛhe

original: AbhT_28.238b/. mṛtāste tatpuraṃ prāpya pureśairdīkṣitāḥ kramāt // 238
analyzed: mṛtāḥ te tat puram prāpya pureśaiḥ dīkṣitāḥ kramāt

original: AbhT_28.239a/. martye@vatīrya vā no vā śivaṃ yāntyapunarbhavāḥ /
analyzed: vā naḥ vā śivam yānti apunarbhavāḥ
tatra svayambhuvaḥ dvedhā ke pi anugraha tad parāḥ
ke api sva kṛtyā āyāta aṃśa sthāna mātra upasevinaḥ
yad nugraha artham ājñaptāḥ teṣu yaḥ mriyate naraḥ

original: AbhT_28.241a/. so@nugrahaṃ sphuṭaṃ yāti vinā martyāvatārataḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ūnugraham sphuṭam yāti vinā martya avatārataḥ
yaḥ tu sva kāryam kurvāṇaḥ tat sthānam na aṃśataḥ tyajet

original: AbhT_28.242a/. yathā gaurī tapasyantī kaśmīreṣu guhāgatā /
analyzed: yathā gaurī tapasyantī kaśmīreṣu guhā gatā

original: AbhT_28.242b/. tatraiva vā yathā dhyānoḍḍāre naraharirvibhuḥ // 242
analyzed: tatra eva vā yathā dhyāna uḍḍāre narahariḥ vibhuḥ
vitastām nayataḥ daityān trāsayan dṛptaḥ utthitaḥ

original: AbhT_28.243b/. sāligrāme yathā viṣṇuḥ śivo vā svopabhoginaḥ // 243
analyzed: sāligrāme yathā viṣṇuḥ śivaḥ vā sva upabhoginaḥ

original: AbhT_28.244a/. tapasyantau badaryāṃ ca naranārāyaṇau tathā /
analyzed: tapasyantau badaryām ca nara nārāyaṇau tathā
iti evamādayaḥ devāḥ sva kṛtyā aṃśa sthitāḥ tathā

original: AbhT_28.245a/. ārādhitāḥ svocitaṃ tacchīghraṃ vidadhate phalam /
analyzed: ārādhitāḥ sva ucitam tat śīghram vidadhate phalam

original: AbhT_28.245b/. svakṛtyāṃśasthitānāṃ ca dhāmni ye@ntaṃ vrajanti te // 245
analyzed: sva kṛtyā aṃśa sthitānām ca dhāmni vrajanti te
tatra bhogān tathā bhuktvā martyeṣu avataranti api
martya avatīrṇāḥ te tad tad aṃśakāḥ tad mayāḥ punar
tad dīkṣā jñāna caryā ādi kramāt yānti śiva ātma tām
sthāvara ādyāḥ tiryak antāḥ paśavaḥ asmin dvaye mṛtāḥ
sva karma saṃskriyā vedhāt tat loke citra tā juṣaḥ
puṃsām ca paśu mātrāṇām sālokyam avivekataḥ
avivekaḥ tad viśeṣān unmeṣāt mauḍhyataḥ tathā
sthāvara ādyāḥ tathābhāvam uttarottara tām ca vā

original: AbhT_28.250a/. prapadyante na te sākṣādrudratāṃ tāṃ kramātpunaḥ /
analyzed: prapadyante na te sākṣāt rudra tām tām kramāt punar
haṃsa kāraṇḍava ākīrṇe nānā taru kula ākule

original: AbhT_28.251a/. ityetadāgameṣūktaṃ tata eva pure pure /
analyzed: iti etat āgameṣu uktam tatas eva pure pure
kṣetra mānam bruve śrīmat sarvajñāna ādiṣu uditam
liṅgāt hasta śatam kṣetram ācārya sthāpite sati
svayambhūte sahasram tu tad ardham ṛṣi yojite
tattva vid sthāpite liṅge svayambhu sadṛśam phalam
a tattva vid yat ācāryaḥ liṅgam sthāpayate tadā
punar vidhiḥ bhavet doṣaḥ hi anyathā ubhaya dūṣakaḥ

original: AbhT_28.254b/. ahamanyaḥ parātmānyaḥ śivo@nya iti cenmatiḥ // 254
analyzed: aham anyaḥ parātmā anyaḥ śivaḥ nyaḥ iti ced matiḥ

original: AbhT_28.255a/. na mocayenna muktaśca sarvamātmamayaṃ yataḥ /
analyzed: na mocayet na muktaḥ ca sarvam ātma mayam yatas
tasmāt tattva vidā yat yat sthāpitam liṅgam uttamam
tat eva āyatana tvena saṃśrayet bhukti muktaye
uktam śrī ratnamālāyām jñātvā kālam upasthitam
mokṣa arthī na bhayam gacchet tyajet deham aśaṅkitaḥ
tīrtha āyatana puṇyeṣu kālam vā vañcayet priye

original: AbhT_28.258a/. ayogināmayaṃ panthā yogī yogena vañcayet /
analyzed: ayoginām ayam panthāḥ yogī yogena vañcayet

original: AbhT_28.258b/. vañcane tvasamarthaḥ san kṣetramāyatanaṃ vrajet // 258
analyzed: vañcane tu asamarthaḥ san kṣetram āyatanam vrajet

original: AbhT_28.259a/. tīrthe samāśrayāttasya vañcanaṃ tu vijāyate /
analyzed: tīrthe samāśrayāt tasya vañcanam tu vijāyate
anena ca dharā ādyeṣu tattveṣu abhyāsa yogataḥ
tāvat siddhi juṣā api uktā muktyai kṣetra upayogi tā
samyak jñānini vṛttāntaḥ purastāt tu upadekṣyate

original: AbhT_28.261a/. paśūnāmeṣa vṛttānto ye tu tattattvadīkṣitāḥ /
analyzed: paśūnām eṣa vṛttāntaḥ ye tu tad tattva dīkṣitāḥ
te tad īśa samīpa tvam yānti sva aucitya yogataḥ
yogya tā vaśa saṃjātā yasya yatra eva vāsanā
sa tatra eva niyoktavyaḥ pureśāt ca ūrdhva śuddhi bhāj
iti śrī pūrva kathitam śrīmat svāyambhuve pi ca
yaḥ yatra abhilaṣet bhogān sa tatra eva niyojitaḥ
siddhi bhāj mantra sāmarthyāt ityādi anyatra varṇitam
ye tu tad tattva vijñāna mantra caryā ādi vartinaḥ

original: AbhT_28.265a/. mṛtāste tatra tadrudrasayuktvaṃ yānti kovidāḥ /
analyzed: mṛtāḥ te tatra tad rudra sayuj tvam yānti kovidāḥ

original: AbhT_28.265b/. teṣāṃ sayuktvaṃ yātānāmapi saṃskārato nijāt // 265
analyzed: teṣām sayuj tvam yātānām api saṃskārataḥ nijāt
tathā tathā vicitraḥ syāt avatāraḥ tad aṃśataḥ

original: AbhT_28.266b/. siddhāntādau purāṇeṣu tathāca śrūyate bahu // 266
analyzed: siddhānta ādau purāṇeṣu tathā ca śrūyate bahu
tulye rudra avatāra tve citra tvam karma bhogayoḥ
aneka śakti khacitam yatas bhāvasya yat vapuḥ
śaktibhyaḥ ṛtha antaram na eṣa tad samūhāt ṛte bhavet
tena śakti samūha ākhyāt tasmāt rudra ādya daṃśataḥ

original: AbhT_28.269a/. kṛtyaṃ taducitaṃ siddhyet soṃ@śo@vatarati sphuṭam /
analyzed: kṛtyam tat ucitam siddhyet sphuṭam
ye ca adhara prāpta dīkṣāḥ tad āsthāna ujjhitāḥ pare
tattve mṛtāḥ kāṣṭha vat te dharā ipi utkarṣa bhāginaḥ
ye tu ujjhita tad utkarṣāḥ te tad uttara bhāginaḥ
ye pi ūrdhva tattva dīkṣāḥ te vinā tāvat vivekataḥ
prāpta adhara antāḥ api tad dīkṣā phala subhāginaḥ

original: AbhT_28.272a/. atyaktāsthā hi te tatra dīkṣāyāmapi śāstritāt /
analyzed: a tyakta āsthāḥ hi te tatra dīkṣāyām api śāstritāt

original: AbhT_28.272b/. vinā vivekādāsthāṃ te śritā lokaprasiddhitaḥ // 272
analyzed: vinā vivekāt āsthām te śritāḥ loka prasiddhitaḥ

original: AbhT_28.273a/. paśumātrasya sālokyaṃ sāmīpyaṃ dīkṣitasya tu /
analyzed: paśu mātrasya sālokyam sāmīpyam dīkṣitasya tu
tad parasya tu sāyujyam iti uktam parameśinā
yaḥ tu ūrdhva śāstra gaḥ tatra tyakta āsthaḥ saṃśayena saḥ
vrajan āyatanam na eva phalam kiñcid samaśnute
uktam tad viṣayam ca etat devadevena yat vṛthā

original: AbhT_28.275b/. dīkṣā jñānaṃ tathā tīrthaṃ tasyetyādi savistaram // 275
analyzed: dīkṣā jñānam tathā tīrtham tasya ityādi sa vistaram

original: AbhT_28.276a/. yastu tāvadayogyo@pi tathāste sa śivālaye /
analyzed: yaḥ tu tāvat ayogyaḥ api tathā āste sa śivālaye
paścāt āsthā nibandhena tāvat eva phalam bhajet

original: AbhT_28.277a/. nadīnagahradaprāyaṃ yacca puṇyaṃ na tanmṛtau /
analyzed: nadīnaga hrada prāyam yat ca puṇyam na tat mṛtau
utkṛṣṭam tat mṛtānām tu svarga bhoga upabhogi tā
ye punar prāpta vijñāna vivekāḥ maraṇa antike
adhara āyataneṣu āsthām śritāḥ te itra tirohitāḥ
tad jñāna dūṣaṇa uktam yat teṣām syāt kila pātakam
tad tad pureśa dīkṣā ādi kramāt naśyet iti sthitiḥ
dīkṣā āyatana vijñāna dūṣiṇaḥ ye tu cetasā

original: AbhT_28.280b/. ācaranti ca tatte@tra sarve nirayagāminaḥ // 280
analyzed: ācaranti ca sarve niraya gāminaḥ
jñāna āyatana dīkṣā ādau āsthā bandha paricyutiḥ
vyāpāra vyāhṛtaiḥ jñeyā tāni api dvividhāni ca
yāni jātucit api eva svāsthye na udamiṣan punar
asvāsthye dhātu doṣa utthāni eva tad bhoga mātrakam
dhātu doṣāt ca saṃsāra saṃskārāḥ te prabodhitāḥ

original: AbhT_28.283b/. chidragā api bhūyiṣṭhajñānadagdhā na rohiṇaḥ // 283
analyzed: chidra gāḥ api bhūyiṣṭha jñāna dagdhāḥ na rohiṇaḥ

original: AbhT_28.284a/. ye tu kaivalyabhāgīyāḥ svāsthye@nunmiṣitāḥ sadā /
analyzed: ye tu kaivalya bhāgīyāḥ sadā
asvāsthye ca unmiṣanti ete saṃskārāḥ śaktipātataḥ
yatas sāṃsārikāḥ pūrva gāḍha abhyāsa upasaṃskṛtāḥ
iti ūce bhujaga adhīśaḥ tad chidreṣu iti sūtrataḥ

original: AbhT_28.286a/. ye tu kaivalyabhāgīyāḥ pratyayāste na jātucit /
analyzed: ye tu kaivalya bhāgīyāḥ pratyayāḥ te na jātucit
abhyastāḥ saṃsṛteḥ bhāvāt tena ete śaktipātataḥ
vyāpāra vyāhṛtaiḥ tena dhātu doṣa prakopitaiḥ
aprāpta niścaya āmarśaiḥ supta matta upamānakaiḥ
viparītaiḥ api jñāna dīkṣā guru ādi dūṣakaiḥ

original: AbhT_28.288b/. tirobhāvo na vijñeyo hṛdaye rūḍhyabhāvataḥ // 288
analyzed: tirobhāvaḥ na vijñeyaḥ hṛdaye rūḍhi abhāvataḥ
atas eva prabuddhaḥ api karma utthān bhoga rūpiṇaḥ
yama kiṅkara sarpa ādi pratyayān deha gaḥ bhajet

original: AbhT_28.290a/. naitāvatā na mukto@sau mṛtirbhogo hi janmavat /
analyzed: na etāvatā na muktā asau mṛtiḥ bhogaḥ hi janma vat

original: AbhT_28.290b/. sthitivacca tato duḥkhasukhābhyāṃ maraṇaṃ dvidhā // 290
analyzed: sthiti vat ca tatas duḥkha sukhābhyām maraṇam dvidhā
atas yathā prabuddhasya sukha duḥkha vicitra tāḥ

original: AbhT_28.291b/. sthitau na ghnanti muktatvaṃ maraṇe@pi tathaiva tāḥ // 291
analyzed: sthitau na ghnanti mukta tvam maraṇe api tathā eva tāḥ
ye punar yoginaḥ te api yasmin tattve su bhāvitāḥ
cittam niveśayanti eva tat tattvam yānti aśaṅkitāḥ

original: AbhT_28.293a/. śrīsvacchande tataḥ proktaṃ gandhadhāraṇayā mṛtāḥ /
analyzed: śrī svacchande tatas proktam gandha dhāraṇayā mṛtāḥ

original: AbhT_28.293b/. ityādi mālinīśāstre dhāraṇānāṃ tathā phalam // 293
analyzed: ityādi mālinīśāstre dhāraṇānām tathā phalam

original: AbhT_28.294a/. eteṣāṃ maraṇābhikhyo bhogo nāsti tu ye tanum /
analyzed: eteṣām maraṇa abhikhyaḥ bhogaḥ na asti tu ye tanum
dhāraṇābhiḥ tyajanti āśu para deha praveśa vat
etāvān mṛti bhogaḥ hi marma chid mūḍha tā akṣa gā

original: AbhT_28.295b/. dhvāntābilatvaṃ manasi taccaiteṣu na vidyate // 295
analyzed: dhvānta abila tvam manasi tat ca eteṣu na vidyate
tathā hi mānasam yatnam tāvat samadhitiṣṭhati
ahaṃrūḍhyā pare dehe yāvat syāt buddhi saṃcaraḥ
prāṇa cakram tad āyattam api saṃcarate pathā
tena eva atas prabuddhyeta para deha ikṣa cakrakam
makṣikāḥ makṣikā rājam yathā utthitam anūtthitāḥ
sthitam ca anuviśanti evam cittam sarva akṣa vṛttayaḥ
atas asya para deha ādi saṃcāre na asti melanam
akṣāṇām madhya gam sūkṣmam syāt etat deha vat punar
evam para śarīra ādi cāriṇām iva yoginām
tad tad tattva śarīra antar cāriṇām na asti mūḍha tā

original: AbhT_28.301a/. te cāpi dvividhā jñeyā laukikā dīkṣitāstathā /
analyzed: te ca api dvividhāḥ jñeyāḥ laukikāḥ dīkṣitāḥ tathā

original: AbhT_28.301b/. pūrve śivāḥ syuḥ kramaśaḥ pare tadbhogamātrataḥ // 301
analyzed: pūrve śivāḥ syuḥ kramaśas pare tad bhoga mātrataḥ
dīkṣā api ūrdhva adhara aneka bheda yojanikā vaśāt
bhidyamānā yoginām syāt vicitra phala dāyinī

original: AbhT_28.303a/. ye tu vijñāninaste@tra dvedhā kampretaratvataḥ /
analyzed: ye tu vijñāninaḥ te itra dvedhā kampra itara tvataḥ

original: AbhT_28.303b/. tatra ye kampravijñānāste dehānted śivāḥ sphuṭam // 303
analyzed: tatra ye kampra vijñānāḥ te dehānta id śivāḥ sphuṭam
yatas vijñānam eteṣām utpannam na ca su sphuṭam
vikalpa antara yogena na ca api unmūlita ātmakam

original: AbhT_28.305a/. ato dehe pramādottho vikalpo dehapātataḥ /
analyzed: atas dehe pramāda utthaḥ vikalpaḥ dehapātataḥ
naśyet avaśyam tat ca api budhyate jñānam uttamam
saṃskāra kalpanā atiṣṭhat adhvastīkṛtam antarā

original: AbhT_28.306b/. prāptapākaṃ saṃvarīturapāye bhāsate hi tat // 306
analyzed: prāpta pākam saṃvarītuḥ apāye bhāsate hi tat

original: AbhT_28.307a/. ye tu svabhyastavijñānamayāḥ śivamayāḥ sadā /
analyzed: ye tu su abhyasta vijñāna mayāḥ śiva mayāḥ sadā

original: AbhT_28.307b/. jīvanmuktā hi te naiṣāṃ mṛtau kāpi vicāraṇā // 307
analyzed: jīvanmuktāḥ hi te na eṣām mṛtau kā api vicāraṇā

original: AbhT_28.308a/. yathāhi jīvanmuktānāṃ sthitau nāsti vicāraṇā /
analyzed: yathā hi jīvanmuktānām sthitau na asti vicāraṇā
sukhi duḥkhi vimūḍha tve
mṛtau api tathā na sā
śrī ratnamālāśāstre tat uvāca parameśvaraḥ
sva śāstre ca api ahi īśānaḥ viśva ādhāra dhurandharaḥ

original: AbhT_28.310a/. rathyāntare mūtrapurīṣamadhye caṇḍālagehe niraye śmaśāne /
analyzed: rathyā antare mūtra purīṣa madhye caṇḍāla gehe niraye śmaśāne

original: AbhT_28.310b/. sacintako vā gatacintako vā jñānī vimokṣaṃ labhate@pi cānte // 310
analyzed: sa cintakaḥ vā gata cintakaḥ vā jñānī vimokṣam labhate api ca ante
api ca iti dhvaniḥ jīvanmukta tām asya bhāṣate
sa cintā acintaka tva uktiḥ etāvat saṃbhava sthitim

original: AbhT_28.312a/. tīrthe śvapacagṛhe vā naṣṭasmṛtirapi parityajeddeham /
analyzed: tīrthe śvapaca gṛhe vā naṣṭa smṛtiḥ api parityajet deham
jñāna sama kāla muktaḥ kaivalyam yāti hata śokaḥ

original: AbhT_28.313a/. anantakārikā caiṣā prāhedaṃ bandhakaṃ kila /
AbhT_28.313b/. sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cāsya śaṅkyaṃ taccāsya no bhavet // 313
analyzed: sukṛtam duṣkṛtam ca asya śaṅkyam tat ca asya naḥ bhavet
api śabdāt alupta smṛtyā vā saṃbhāvyate kila

original: AbhT_28.314b/. mṛtirnaṣṭasmṛtereva mṛteḥ prāk sāstu kiṃ tayā // 314
analyzed: mṛtiḥ naṣṭa smṛteḥ eva mṛteḥ prāk sā astu kim tayā
liṅ ca saṃbhāvanāyām syāt iyat saṃbhāvyate kila
sa ca kāladhvaniḥ prāha mṛteḥ muktau ahetutām
kaivalyam iti ca āśaṅkā padam yā api abhavat tanuḥ
bheda prada tvena eṣā api dhvastā tena viśoka tā
para deha ādi saṃbandhaḥ yathā na asya vibhedakaḥ
tathā sva deha saṃbandhaḥ jīvanmuktasya yadi api
atas ca na viśeṣaḥ usya viśva ākṛti nirākṛteḥ

original: AbhT_28.318b/. śivābhinnasya dehe vā tadabhāve@pi vā kila // 318
analyzed: śiva abhinnasya dehe vā tad abhāve api vā kila
tathā api prācya tad bheda saṃskāra āśaṅkana sthiteḥ
adhunā uktam kevala tvam yat vā mātṛ antara āśrayāt

original: AbhT_28.320a/. tānyenaṃ na vidurbhinnaṃ taiḥ sa mukto@bhidhīyate /
analyzed: tāni enam na viduḥ bhinnam taiḥ sa muktaḥ abhidhīyate
śrīmat traiśirase pi uktam sūrya indu puṭa varjite
jugupsā bhāva bhaṅga sthe sarvatas stambha vat sthite
sarva vyāpatti rahite pramāṇa pratyaya atige
tasmin bodha antare līnaḥ karma kartā api anañjanaḥ

original: AbhT_28.322b/. pradhānaṃ ghaṭa ākāśa ātmā maṣṭe ghaṭe@pi kham // 322
analyzed: pradhānam ghaṭaḥ ākāśaḥ ātmā maṣṭe ghaṭe pi kham
na naśyet tadvat eva asau ātmā śiva mayaḥ bhavet
svatantraḥ uvasthitaḥ jñānī prasaret sarva vastuṣu

original: AbhT_28.324a/. tasya bhāvo nacābhāvaḥ saṃsthānaṃ naca kalpanā /
analyzed: tasya bhāvaḥ na ca abhāvaḥ saṃsthānam na ca kalpanā
etat eva antar āgūrya guruḥ gītāsu abhāṣata

original: AbhT_28.325a/. yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaranbhāvaṃ tyajatyante kalevaram /
analyzed: yam yam vā api smaran bhāvam tyajati ante kalevaram

original: AbhT_28.325b/. taṃ tamevaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ // 325
analyzed: tam tam eva eti kaunteya sadā tad bhāva bhāvitaḥ

original: AbhT_28.326a/. tasmātsarveṣu kāleṣu māmanusmara yudhya ca /
analyzed: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca

original: AbhT_28.326b/. yadā sattve vivṛddhe tu pralīnastvūrdhvagastadā // 326
analyzed: yadā sattve vivṛddhe tu pralīnaḥ tu ūrdhva gaḥ tadā
tatra indriyāṇām saṃmoha śvāsa āyāsa parīta tā

original: AbhT_28.328a/. ityādimṛtibhogo@yaṃ dehe na tyajanaṃ tanoḥ /
analyzed: iti ādi mṛti bhogaḥ ūyam dehe na tyajanam tanoḥ
yaḥ tu asau kṣaṇaḥ eva ekaḥ caramaḥ prāṇana ātmakaḥ
yad anantaram eva eṣa dehaḥ syāt kāṣṭha kuḍya vat
sā dehatyāga kāla aṃśa kalā deha viyoginī
tatas eva hi tad deha sukha duḥkha ādika ujjhitā
tasyām yat eva smarati prāk saṃskāra prabodhataḥ
adṛṣṭa abhyāsa bhūyaḥ tva śaktipāta ādi hetukāt
tat eva rūpam abhyeti sukhi duḥkhi vimūḍhakam
yat vā niḥsukha duḥkha ādi yadi vā ānanda rūpakam

original: AbhT_28.332b/. kasmādeti tadevaiṣa yataḥ smarati saṃvidi // 332
analyzed: kasmāt eti tat eva eṣa yatas smarati saṃvidi
prāk prasphuret yat adhikam dehā usau cit adhiṣṭhiteḥ
yat eva prāk adhiṣṭhānam citā tādātmya vṛttitaḥ

original: AbhT_28.334a/. saivātra līnatā proktā sattve rajasi tāmase /
analyzed: sā eva atra līna tā proktā sattve rajasi tāmase

original: AbhT_28.334b/. nīlapītādike jñeye yataḥ prākkalpitāṃ tanum // 334
analyzed: nīla pīta ādike jñeye yatas prāk kalpitām tanum
adhiṣṭhāya eva saṃvittiḥ adhiṣṭhānam karoti alam
atas dhiṣṭheya mātrasya śarīra tve pi kuḍyataḥ
dehasya asti viśeṣaḥ yat sarva adhiṣṭheya pūrva tā
tādātmya vṛttiḥ anyeṣām tat na satī api vedyate
vedyānām kintu dehasya nitya avyabhicari tvataḥ

original: AbhT_28.337b/. sā ca tasyaiva dehasya pūrvamṛtyantajanmanā // 337
analyzed: sā ca tasya eva dehasya pūrva mṛti anta janmanā
smṛtyā prācya anubhavana kṛta saṃskāra citrayā
yuktyā anayā asmad santāna guruṇā kallaṭena yat
deha aviśeṣe prāṇa ākhya dārḍhyam hetuḥ udīritam
tat yuktam anyathā prāṇa dārḍhye kaḥ hetuḥ ekatas
deha tvasya aviśeṣe pi iti eṣa praśnaḥ na śāmyati

original: AbhT_28.340b/. smaranniti śatā hetau tadrūpaṃ pratipadyate // 340
analyzed: smaran iti śatā hetau tad rūpam pratipadyate

original: AbhT_28.341a/. prāk smaryate yato dehaḥ prākcitādhiṣṭhitaḥ sphuran /
analyzed: prāk smaryate yatas dehaḥ prāk citā adhiṣṭhitaḥ sphuran
atas smaraṇam antyam yat tat asarvajña mātṛṣu
na jātu gocaraḥ yasmāt deha antara viniścayaḥ
yat tu bandhu priyā putra pāna ādi smaraṇam sphuṭam

original: AbhT_28.343a/. na taddehāntarāsaṅgi na tadantyaṃ yato bhavet /
analyzed: na tat deha antara āsaṅgi na tat antyam yatas bhavet

original: AbhT_28.343b/. kasyāpi tu śarīrānte vāsanā yā prabhotsyate // 343
analyzed: kasya api tu śarīra ante vāsanā yā prabhotsyate
deha sattve tad aucityāt jāyeta anubhavaḥ sphuṭaḥ
yathā purāṇe kathitam mṛga potaka tṛṣṇayā
muniḥ kaḥ api mṛgī bhāvam abhyuvāha adhivāsitaḥ
tatra saḥ unubhavaḥ hetuḥ na janmāntara sūtaye

original: AbhT_28.346a/. tasyaitadvāsanā hetuḥ kākatālīyavat sa tu /
analyzed: tasya etat vāsanā hetuḥ kākatālīya vat sa tu

original: AbhT_28.346b/. nanu kasmāttadevaiṣa smarati ityāha yatsadā // 346
analyzed: nanu kasmāt tat eva eṣa smarati iti āha yat sadā
tad bhāva bhāvitaḥ tena tat eva eṣa smarati alam
evam asmi bhaviṣyāmi iti eṣa tad bhāvaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_28.348a/. bhaviṣyato hi bhavanaṃ bhāvyate na sataḥ kvacit /
analyzed: bhaviṣyataḥ hi bhavanam bhāvyate na sataḥ kvacid
kramāt sphuṭa tva karaṇam bhāvanam parikīrtyate

original: AbhT_28.349a/. sphuṭasya cānubhavanaṃ na bhāvanamidaṃ sphuṭam /
analyzed: sphuṭasya ca anubhavanam na bhāvanam idam sphuṭam

original: AbhT_28.349b/. tadaharjātabālasya paśoḥ kīṭasya vā taroḥ // 349
analyzed: tad ahar jāta bālasya paśoḥ kīṭasya vā taroḥ
mūḍha tve pi tadānīm prāk bhāvanā hi abhavat sphuṭā
sā tad mūḍha śarīra ante saṃskāra pratibodhanāt
deśa ādi vyavadhāne api vāsanānām udīritāt
ānantarya eka rūpa tvāt smṛti saṃskārayoḥ atas
tathā anubhavana ārūḍhyā sphuṭasya api tu bhāvi tā

original: AbhT_28.353a/. bhāvyamānā na kiṃ sūte tatsantānasadṛgvapuḥ /
analyzed: bhāvyamānā na kim sūte tad santāna sadṛś vapuḥ
tat tādṛś tādṛśaiḥ bandhu putra mitra ādibhiḥ saha
bhāsate pi pare loke svapna vat vāsanā kramāt
nanu mātṛ antaraiḥ bandhu putra ādyaiḥ tat tathā na kim

original: AbhT_28.355a/. vedyate ka idaṃ prāha sa tāvadveda vedyatām /
analyzed: vedyate kaḥ idam prāha sa tāvat veda vedya tām
vyāpāra vyāhṛti vrāta vedye mātṛ antara vraje

original: AbhT_28.356a/. svapne nāsti sa ityeṣā vākpramāṇavivarjitā /
analyzed: svapne na asti saḥ iti eṣā vāc pramāṇa vivarjitā

original: AbhT_28.356b/. ya evaite tu dṛśyante jāgratyete mayekṣitāḥ // 356
analyzed: ye eva ete tu dṛśyante jāgrati ete mayā īkṣitāḥ
svapnaḥ iti astu mithyā etat tad pramātṛ vacaḥ balāt

original: AbhT_28.357b/. yānapaśyamahaṃ svapne pramātṝṃste na kecana // 357
analyzed: yān apaśyam aham svapne pramātṝn te na kecana

original: AbhT_28.358a/. na śocanti na cekṣante māmityatrāsti kā pramā /
analyzed: na śocanti na ca īkṣante mām iti atra asti kā pramā
yatas sarva anumānānām sva saṃvedana niṣṭhitau
ghaṭa ādeḥ astitā saṃvid niṣṭhitā na tu tad gatā
tadvat mātṛ antare pi eṣā saṃvid niṣṭhā na tad gatā

original: AbhT_28.360b/. tena sthitamidaṃ yadyadbhāvyate tattadeva hi // 360
analyzed: tena sthitam idam yat yat bhāvyate tat tat eva hi

original: AbhT_28.361a/. dehānte budhyate no cet syādanyādṛkprabodhanam /
analyzed: dehānte budhyate no ced syāt anyādṛś prabodhanam
tathā hi antya kṣaṇe brahma vidyā karṇana saṃskṛtaḥ
mucyate jantuḥ iti uktam prāk saṃskāra bala tvataḥ
nipātābhyām anta śabdāt smaraṇāt śatuḥ antyataḥ
pādāt ca nikhilāt ardha ślokāt ca samanantarāt
līna śabdāt ca sarvam tat uktam artha sa tattvakam
a jñātvā etat tu sarve api kuśa kāśa avalambinaḥ
yad tadoḥ vyatyayam kecid kecid anyādṛśam kramam

original: AbhT_28.365a/. bhinnakramau nipātau ca tyajatīti ca saptamīm /
analyzed: bhinna kramau nipātau ca tyajati iti ca saptamīm
vyācakṣate tat ca sarvam na upayogi ukta yojane
na ca tat darśitam mithyā svānta sammoha dāyakam
tat ittham prāyaṇasya etat tattvam śrī śambhunāthataḥ
adhigamya uditam tena mṛtyoḥ bhītiḥ vinaśyati
vidita mṛti sa tattvāḥ saṃvid ambhaḥ nidhānāt acala hṛdaya vīrya ākarṣa niṣpīḍana uttham

original: AbhT_28.367c/. amṛtamiti nigīrṇe kālakūṭe@tra devā yadi pivatha tadānīṃ niścitaṃ vaḥ śivatvam // 367
analyzed: amṛtam iti nigīrṇe devāḥ yadi pivatha tadānīm niścitam vaḥ śiva tvam

original: AbhT_28.368a/. utsavo@pi hi yaḥ kaścillaukikaḥ so@pi saṃmadam /
analyzed: utsavaḥ api hi yaḥ kaścid laukikaḥ saḥ api saṃmadam
saṃvid abdhi taraṅga ābham sūte tat api parvavat
etena ca vipad dhvaṃsa pramoda ādiṣu parvatāḥ
vyākhyātā tena tatra api viśeṣāt devatā arcanam
pura kṣobhāt yadbhutam yat tat svātantrye sva saṃvidaḥ
yoginī melakaḥ dvedhā haṭhataḥ priyataḥ tathā
prācye chidrāṇi saṃrakṣet kāma cāri tvam uttare

original: AbhT_28.372a/. sa ca dvayo@pi mantroddhṛtprasaṅge darśayiṣyate /
analyzed: sa ca mantra uddhṛt prasaṅge darśayiṣyate
yoginī melakāt ca eṣā uvaśyam jñānam prapadyate
tena tad parva tadvat ca sva santāna ādi melanam
saṃvid sarva ātmikā deha bheda ādyā saṅkucet tu sā
ucchalat nija raśmi oghaḥ saṃvitsu pratibimbitaḥ
bahu darpaṇa vat dīptaḥ
atas eva gīta gīta prabhṛtau bahu parṣadi

original: AbhT_28.376a/. yaḥ sarvatanmayībhāve hlādo natvekakasya saḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sarva tanmayībhāve hlādaḥ na tu ekakasya saḥ
ānanda nirbharā saṃvid pratyekam sā tathā eka tām
nṛtta ādau viṣaye prāptā pūrṇa ānanda tvam aśnute
īrṣyā asūyā ādi saṅkoca kāraṇa abhāvatā utra sā
a tad maye tu kasmiṃścid tatrasthe pratihanyate
sthapuṭa sparśa vat saṃvid vijātīya tayā sthite
atas cakra arcana ādyeṣu vijātīyam a tad mayam
nā eva praveśayet saṃvid saṅkocana nibandhanam
yāvanti eva śarīrāṇi sva aṅga vat syuḥ su nirbharām

original: AbhT_28.381a/. ekāṃ saṃvidamāviśya cakre tāvanti pūjayet /
analyzed: ekām saṃvidam āviśya cakre tāvanti pūjayet
praviṣṭaḥ ced pramādena saṅkocam na vrajet tatas

original: AbhT_28.382a/. prastutaṃ svasamācāraṃ tena sākaṃ samācaret /
analyzed: prastutam sva samācāram tena sākam samācaret
sa tu anugraha śaktyā ced viddhaḥ tat tanmayībhavet
vāma āviddhaḥ tu tat nindet paścāt tam ghātayet api
śrīmat picumate ca uktam ādau yatnena rakṣayet

original: AbhT_28.384a/. praveśaṃ saṃpaviṣṭasya na vicāraṃ tu kārayet /
analyzed: praveśam saṃpaviṣṭasya na vicāram tu kārayet

original: AbhT_28.384b/. lokācārasthito yastu praviṣṭe tādṛśe tu saḥ // 384
analyzed: loka ācāra sthitaḥ yaḥ tu praviṣṭe tādṛśe tu saḥ

original: AbhT_28.385a/. akṛtvā taṃ samācāraṃ punaścakraṃ prapūjayet /
analyzed: a kṛtvā tam samācāram punar cakram prapūjayet
atha vacmi guroḥ śāstra vyākhyā kramam udāhṛtam
kalpa vid tad samūha jñaḥ śāstra vid saṃhitā artha vid
sarva śāstra artha vid ca iti guruḥ bhinnā upadiśyate

original: AbhT_28.387b/. yo yatra śāstre svabhyastajñāno vyākhyāṃ carettu saḥ // 387
analyzed: yaḥ yatra śāstre su abhyasta jñānaḥ vyākhyām caret tu saḥ
na anyathā tad abhāvaḥ ced sarvathā saḥ upi atha ācaret
śrī bhairavakule ca uktam kalpa ādi jña tvam īdṛśam
guroḥ lakṣaṇam etāvat saṃpūrṇa jñāna tā eva yā
tatra api yā asya cit vṛtti karmi bhid sā api avāntarā
devyāyāmale uktam tat dvāpañcāśa āhve āhnike

original: AbhT_28.390b/. deva eva gurutvena tiṣṭhāsurdaśadhā bhavet // 390
analyzed: devaḥ eva guru tvena tiṣṭhāsuḥ daśadhā bhavet
ucchuṣma śavara caṇḍagu mataṅga ghorāntaka ugra halahalakāḥ

original: AbhT_28.391b/. krodhī huluhulurete daśa guravaḥ śivamayāḥ pūrve // 391
analyzed: krodhī huluhuluḥ ete daśa guravaḥ śiva mayāḥ pūrve
te sva aṃśa cittavṛtti krameṇa pauruṣa śarīram āsthāya
anyonya bhinna saṃvid kriyāḥ api jñāna paripūrṇāḥ
sarva ili māṃsa nidhuvana dīkṣā arcana śāstra sevane niratāḥ
abhimāna śama krodha kṣamā ādiḥ avāntaraḥ bhedaḥ

original: AbhT_28.394a/. itthaṃ vijñāya sadā śiṣyaḥ sampūrṇaśāstraboddhāram /
analyzed: ittham vijñāya sadā śiṣyaḥ sampūrṇa śāstra boddhāram
vyākhyāyai gurum abhyarthayeta pūjā puraḥsaram matimān

original: AbhT_28.395a/. so@pi svaśāsanīye paraśiṣye@pivāpi tādṛśaṃ śāstram /
analyzed: saḥ api sva śāsanīye tādṛśam śāstram
śrotum yogye kuryāt vyākhyānam vaiṣṇava ādya dhare
karuṇā rasa paripūrṇaḥ guruḥ punar marma dhāma parivarjam

original: AbhT_28.396b/. adhame@pi hi vyākuryātsambhāvya hi śaktipātavaicitryam // 396
analyzed: adhame api hi vyākuryāt sambhāvya hi śaktipāta vaicitryam

original: AbhT_28.397a/. liptāyāṃ bhuvi pīṭhe caturasre paṅkajatrayaṃ kajage /

analyzed: kuryāt vidyāpīṭham syāt rasa vahni aṅgulam tu etat
madhye vāgīśānīm dakṣa uttarayoḥ gurūn gaṇeśam ca

original: AbhT_28.398b/. adhare kaje ca kalpeśvaraṃ prapūjyārghapuṣpatarpaṇakaiḥ // 398
analyzed: adhare kaje ca kalpeśvaram prapūjya argha puṣpa tarpaṇakaiḥ
sāmānya vidhi niyukta arghapātra yogena cakram atha samyak
santarpya vyākhyānam kuryāt sambandha pūrvakam matimān
sūtra pada vākya paṭala grantha krama yojanena sambandhāt
avyāhata pūrva aparam upavṛhya nayeta vākyāni
maṇḍūka plava siṃha avalokana ādyaiḥ yathāyatham nyāyaiḥ
avihata pūrva aparakam śāstra artham yojayet asaṅkīrṇam
tantra āvartana bādha prasaṅga tarka ādibhiḥ ca sat nyāyaiḥ

original: AbhT_28.402b/. vastu vadedvākyajño vastvantarato viviktatāṃ vidadhat // 402
analyzed: vastu vadet vākya jñaḥ vastu antarataḥ vivikta tām vidadhat
yat yat vyāhṛti padavīm āyāti tat eva dṛḍhataraiḥ nyāyaiḥ
balavat kuryāt dūṣyam yadi api agre bhaviṣyat syāt
dṛḍha racita pūrvapakṣa proddharaṇa pathena vastu yat vācyam
śiṣya matau ārohati tadā āśu saṃśaya viparyayaiḥ vikalam

original: AbhT_28.405a/. bhāṣā nyāyo vādo layaḥ kramo yadyadeti śiṣyasya /
analyzed: bhāṣā nyāyaḥ vādaḥ layaḥ kramaḥ yat yadā iti śiṣyasya
sambodha upāya tvam tathā eva guruḥ āśrayet vyākhyām

original: AbhT_28.406a/. vācyaṃ vastu samāpya pratarpaṇaṃ pūjanaṃ bhaveccakre /
analyzed: vācyam vastu samāpya pratarpaṇam pūjanam bhavet cakre

original: AbhT_28.406b/. punaraparaṃ vastu vadetpaṭalādūrdhvaṃ tu no jalpet // 406
analyzed: punar aparam vastu vadet paṭalāt ūrdhvam tu no jalpet

original: AbhT_28.407a/. vyākhyānte kṣamayitvā visṛjya sarvaṃ kṣipedagādhajale /
analyzed: vyākhyā ante kṣamayitvā visṛjya sarvam kṣipet agādha jale
śāstra ādi madhya nidhane viśeṣataḥ pūjanam kuryāt
viśeṣa pūjanam kuryāt samayebhyaḥ ca niṣkṛtau
a vikalpa mateḥ na syuḥ prāyaścittāni yadi api
tathā api a tattva vid varga anugrahāya tathā caret

original: AbhT_28.409b/. śrīpicau ca smṛtereva pāpaghnatve kathaṃ vibho // 409
analyzed: śrīpicau ca smṛteḥ eva pāpa ghna tve katham vibho

original: AbhT_28.410a/. prāyaścittavidhiḥ prokta iti devyā pracodite /
analyzed: prāyaścitta vidhiḥ proktaḥ iti devyā pracodite
satyam smaraṇam eva iha sakṛt japtam vimocayet
sarvasmāt karmaṇaḥ jālāt smṛti tattva kalā vidaḥ
tathā api sthiti rakṣā artham kartavyaḥ coditaḥ vidhiḥ
a tattva vedinaḥ ye hi caryā mātra eka niṣṭhitāḥ

original: AbhT_28.412b/. teṣāṃ dolāyite citte jñānahāniḥ prajāyate // 412
analyzed: teṣām dolāyite citte jñāna hāniḥ prajāyate
tasmāt vikalpa rahitaḥ saṃvṛti uparataḥ yadi
śāstra caryā sadā āyattaiḥ saṅkaram tat vivarjayet
saṅkaram vā samanvicchet prāyaścittam samācaret

original: AbhT_28.414b/. yathā teṣāṃ na śāstrārthe dolārūḍhā matirbhavet // 414
analyzed: yathā teṣām na śāstra arthe dolā rūḍhā matiḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_28.415a/. yatsvayaṃ śivahastākhye vidhau saṃcoditaṃ purā /
analyzed: yat svayam śivahasta ākhye vidhau saṃcoditam purā

original: AbhT_28.415b/. śataṃ japtvāsya cāstrasya mucyate strīvadhādṛte // 415
analyzed: śatam japtvā asya ca astrasya mucyate strī vadhāt ṛte
śakti nāśāt mahā doṣaḥ narakam śāśvatam priye
iti śrī ratnamālāyām samaya ullaṅghane kṛte
kula jānām samākhyātā niṣkṛtiḥ duṣṭa kartarī

original: AbhT_28.417b/. śrīpūrve samayānāṃ tu śodhanāyoditaṃ yathā // 417
analyzed: śrī pūrve samayānām tu śodhanāya uditam yathā

original: AbhT_28.418a/. mālinī mātṛkā vāpi japyā lakṣatrayāntakam /

analyzed: pratiṣṭhitasya pūra ādeḥ darśanena adhikāriṇā
prāyaścittam prakartavyam iti śrī brahmayāmale
brahma ghnaḥ guru talpa sthaḥ vīra dravya haraḥ tathā
naimittikānām lakṣa ādi kramāt dvi dviguṇam japet
vratena kenacid yuktaḥ mita bhuj brahmacaryavān
dūtī parigrahena atra gataḥ ced kāma mohitaḥ
lakṣa jāpam tatas kuryāt iti uktam brahmayāmale
dīkṣā abhiṣeka naimitta vidhi ante guru pūjanam

original: AbhT_28.425a/. sa guruḥ sarvadā grāhyastyaktvānyaṃ tatsthitaṃ tvapi /
analyzed: sa guruḥ sarvadā grāhyaḥ tyaktvā anyam tad sthitam tu api

original: AbhT_28.425b/. maṇḍale svastikaṃ kṛtvā tatra haimādikāsanam // 425
analyzed: maṇḍale svastikam kṛtvā tatra haima ādika āsanam
kṛtvā arcayeta tatrastham adhvānam sakala antakam
tatas vijñapayet bhaktyā tad adhiṣṭhitaye gurum

original: AbhT_28.427a/. sa tatra pūjyaḥ svairmantraiḥ puṣpadhūpārghavistaraiḥ /
analyzed: sa tatra pūjyaḥ svaiḥ mantraiḥ puṣpa dhūpa argha vistaraiḥ
samālambhana sat vastraiḥ naivedyaiḥ tarpaṇaiḥ kramāt
āśāntam pūjayitvā enam dakṣiṇābhiḥ yajet śiśuḥ
sarva svam asmai saṃdadyāt ātmānam api bhāvitaḥ

original: AbhT_28.429a/. atoṣayitvā tu guruṃ dakṣiṇābhiḥ samantataḥ /
analyzed: a toṣayitvā tu gurum dakṣiṇābhiḥ samantataḥ
tattva jñaḥ api ṛṇa bandhena tena yāti adhikāri tām
guru pūjām akurvāṇaḥ śatam janmāni jāyate

original: AbhT_28.430b/. adhikārī tato muktiṃ yātīti skandayāmale // 430
analyzed: adhikārī tatas muktim yāti iti skandayāmale

original: AbhT_28.431a/. tasmādavaśyaṃ dātavyā gurave dakṣiṇā punaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt avaśyam dātavyā gurave dakṣiṇā punar

original: AbhT_28.431b/. pūrvaṃ hi yāgāṅgatayā proktaṃ tattuṣṭaye tvidam // 431
analyzed: pūrvam hi yāga aṅga tayā proktam tad tuṣṭaye tu idam
tad juṣṭam atha tasya ājñām prāpya aśnīyāt svayam śiśuḥ
tatas prapūjayet cakram yathā vibhava sambhavam

original: AbhT_28.433a/. akṛtvā guruyāgaṃ tu kṛtamapyakṛtaṃ yataḥ /
analyzed: a kṛtvā guru yāgam tu kṛtam api akṛtam yatas
tasmāt prayatnataḥ kāryaḥ guru yāgaḥ yathābalam

original: AbhT_28.434a/. atatrastho@pi hi guruḥ pūjyaḥ saṃkalpya pūrvavat /
analyzed: a tatrasthaḥ api hi guruḥ pūjyaḥ saṃkalpya pūrvavat
tat dravyam devatā kṛtye kuryāt bhakta janeṣu atha
parva pavitra prabhṛti prabhedi naimittikam tu idam karma
atha śrī tantrāloke ekonatriṃśam āhnikam

original: AbhT_29.1a/. atha samucitādhikāriṇa uddiśya rahasya ucyate@tra vidhiḥ /
analyzed: atha samucita adhikāriṇaḥ uddiśya rahasyaḥ ucyate itra vidhiḥ
atha sarvā api upāsā iyam kula prakriyayā ucyate
tathā dhārā adhirūḍheṣu guru śiṣyeṣu yā ucitā

original: AbhT_29.2b/. uktaṃ ca parameśena sāratvaṃ kramapūjane // 2
analyzed: uktam ca parameśena sāra tvam krama pūjane
siddha krama niyuktasya māsena ekena yat bhavet
na tat varṣa sahasraiḥ syāt mantra oghaiḥ vividhaiḥ iti

original: AbhT_29.4a/. kulaṃ ca parameśasya śaktiḥ sāmarthyamūrdhvatā /
analyzed: kulam ca parameśasya śaktiḥ sāmarthyam ūrdhvatā

original: AbhT_29.4b/. svātantryamojo vīryaṃ ca piṇḍaḥ saṃviccharīrakam // 4
analyzed: svātantryam ojaḥ vīryam ca piṇḍaḥ saṃvid śarīrakam
tathātvena samastāni bhāva jātāni paśyataḥ
dhvasta śaṅkā samūhasya yāgaḥ tādṛśaḥ eva saḥ
tādṛś rūpa nirūḍhi artham manaḥ vāc kāya vartmanā

original: AbhT_29.6b/. yadyatsamācaredvīraḥ kulayāgaḥ sa sa smṛtaḥ // 6
analyzed: yat yat samācaret vīraḥ kula yāgaḥ sa sa smṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_29.7a/. bahiḥ śaktau yāmale ca dehe prāṇapathe matau /
analyzed: bahis śaktau yāmale ca dehe prāṇa pathe matau

original: AbhT_29.7b/. iti ṣoḍhā kulejyā syātpratibhedaṃ vibhedinī // 7
analyzed: iti ṣoḍhā kula ijyā syāt pratibhedam vibhedinī
snāna maṇḍala kuṇḍa ādi ṣoḍhā nyāsa ādi yat na tat

original: AbhT_29.8b/. kiñcidatropayujyeta kṛtaṃ vā khaṇḍanāya no // 8
analyzed: kiñcid atrā upayujyeta kṛtam vā khaṇḍanāya no

original: AbhT_29.9b/. jñānajñeyamayaṃ kaulaṃ proktaṃ traiśirase mate // 9
analyzed: jñāna jñeya mayam kaulam proktam traiśirase mate

original: AbhT_29.10a/. atra yāge ca yaddravyaṃ niṣiddhaṃ śāstrasantatau /
analyzed: atra yāge ca yat dravyam niṣiddham śāstra santatau
tat eva yojayet dhīmān vāma amṛta pariplutam
śrī brahmayāmale pi uktam surā śiva rasaḥ bahis

original: AbhT_29.11b/. tāṃ vinā bhuktimuktī no piṣṭakṣaudraguḍaistu sā // 11
analyzed: tām vinā bhukti muktī no piṣṭa kṣaudra guḍaiḥ tu sā
strī napuṃsaka pum rūpā tu pūrva apara bhoga dā

original: AbhT_29.12b/. drākṣotthaṃ tu paraṃ tejo bhairavaṃ kalpanojjhitam // 12

analyzed: etat svayam rasaḥ śuddhaḥ prakāśa ānanda cit mayaḥ
devatānām priyam nityam tasmāt etat pivet sadā
śrīmat kramarahasye ca nyarūpi parameśinā

original: AbhT_29.14b/. arghapātraṃ yāgadhāma dīpa ityucyate trayam // 14
analyzed: arghapātram yāga dhāma dīpaḥ iti ucyate trayam

original: AbhT_29.15a/. rahasyaṃ kaulike yāge tatrārghaḥ śaktisaṃgamāt /
analyzed: rahasyam kaulike yāge tatra arghaḥ śakti saṃgamāt

original: AbhT_29.16a/. dīpā ghṛtotthā gāvo hi bhūcaryo devatāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: dīpāḥ ghṛta utthāḥ gāvaḥ hi bhūcaryaḥ devatāḥ smṛtāḥ
iti jñātvā traye amuṣmin yatnavān kaulikaḥ bhavet
tena arghapātra prādhānyam jñātvā dravyāṇi śambhunā
yāni uktāni aviśaṅkā utra bhavet śaṅkā hi dūṣikā
yāgaukaḥ gandha dhūpa āḍhyam praviśya prāc udak mukhaḥ
parayā vā atha mālinyā vilomāt ca anulomataḥ
dāha āpyāya mayīm śuddhim dīpta saumya vibhedataḥ
krameṇa kuryāt athavā mātṛ sadbhāva mantrataḥ
dīkṣām ced pracikīrṣuḥ tat śodhya adhva nyāsa kalpanam
tatas saṃśodhya vastūni śaktyā eva amṛta tām nayet
parā sampuṭa gā yat vā mātṛ sampuṭa gā api atho

original: AbhT_29.21b/. kevalā mālinī yadvā tāḥ samasteṣu karmasu // 21
analyzed: kevalāḥ mālinī yat vā tāḥ samasteṣu karmasu
nanda hetu phalaiḥ dravyaiḥ arghapātram prapūrayet
tatra ukta mantra tādātmyāt bhairava ātma tvam ānayet
tena nirbharam ātmānam bahis cakra anucakra gam
vipruḍbhiḥ ūrdhva adharayoḥ antar pītyā ca tarpayet
tathā pūrṇa sva raśmi oghaḥ procchalat vṛtti tā vaśāt
bahis tādṛśam ātmānam didṛkṣuḥ bahis arcayet
tad dvi triguṇe rakta paṭe śubhe
vyomni sindūra subhage
nārikela ātmake ka ādye madya pūrṇe itha bhājane

original: AbhT_29.26b/. yadvā samudite rūpe maṇḍalasthe ca tadṛśi // 26
analyzed: yat vā samudite rūpe maṇḍala sthe ca tat ṛśi

original: AbhT_29.27a/. yāgaṃ kurvīta matimāṃstatrāyaṃ krama ucyate /
analyzed: yāgam kurvīta matimān tatra ayam kramaḥ ucyate
diśi udīcyām rudra koṇāt vāyavī antam gaṇeśvaram
vaṭukam trīn gurūn siddhān yoginīḥ pīṭham arcayet
prācyām diśi gaṇeśa adhas ārabhya abhyarcayet tatas
khaga indraḥ sahavijjāmbaḥ illāīambayā saha
purā

original: AbhT_29.30b/. śaktyā maṅgalayā kūrma illā+ī+ambayā saha // 30
analyzed: śaktyā maṅgalayā kūrmaḥ illāīambayā saha
jaitraḥ yāmye hi avijitaḥ tathā sa ānanda mekhalaḥ
kāmamaṅgalayā meṣaḥ kullāīambayā saha
vindhyojitā upi ajarayā saha mekhalayā pare

original: AbhT_29.32b/. macchandaḥ kuṅkuṇāmbā ca ṣaḍyugmaṃ sādhikārakam // 32
AbhT_29.33a/. saumye marutta īśāntaṃ dvitīyā paṅktirīdṛśī /
analyzed: saumye marutte īśa antam dvitīyā paṅktiḥ īdṛśī
amara varadeva citra ali vindhya guḍikāḥ iti kramāt ṣaṭ amī

original: AbhT_29.34a/. sillā+ī eruṇayā tathā kumārī ca bodhā+ī /
analyzed: sillāī eruṇayā tathā kumārī ca
sa mahālacchī ca apara mekhalayā śaktayaḥ ṣaḍ imāḥ

original: AbhT_29.35a/. ete hi sādhikārāḥ pūjyā yeṣāmiyaṃ bahuvibhedā /
analyzed: ete hi sādhikārāḥ pūjyāḥ yeṣām iyam bahu vibhedā
santatiḥ anavacchinnā citrā śiṣya praśiṣya mayī
ānanda āvali bodhi prabhu pāda antā atha yogi śabda antā
etāḥ ovallyaḥ syuḥ mudrā ṣaṭkam kramāt tu etat
dakṣa aṅguṣṭha ādi kaniṣṭhikā antam atha sā kanīyasī vāmāt
dvidaśānta ūrdhva ga kuṇḍali baindava hṛd nābhi kandam iti chu m m
śava rāḍabilla paṭṭillāḥ karabilla ambi śarabillāḥ
aḍabī ḍombī dakṣiṇa billāḥ kumbhārika akṣara ākhyāḥ ca
devī koṭṭa kula adri tripurī kāma ākhyam aṭṭahāsaḥ ca
dakṣiṇa pīṭham ca etat ṣaṭkam ghara palli pīṭha gam kramaśas

original: AbhT_29.40a/. iti saṅketābhijño bhramate pīṭheṣu yadi sa siddhīpsuḥ /
analyzed: iti saṅketa abhijñaḥ bhramate pīṭheṣu yadi sa siddhi īpsuḥ
acirāt labhate tat tat prāpyam yat yoginī vadanāt
ūrdhvaretasaḥ ete ṣaṣ adhikāra pada ujjhitāḥ

original: AbhT_29.42a/. adhikāro hi vīryasya prasaraḥ kulavartmani /
analyzed: adhikāraḥ hi vīryasya prasaraḥ kula vartmani
tad aprasara yogena te proktāḥ ūrdhvaretasaḥ
anyāḥ ca guru tad patnyaḥ śrīmat kālī kula uditāḥ
an ātta dehāḥ krīḍanti taiḥ taiḥ dehaiḥ aśaṅkitāḥ
prabodhita tathā icchākaiḥ tad je kaulam prakāśate
tathārūpa tayā tatra guru tvam paribhāṣitam

original: AbhT_29.45a/. te viśeṣānna saṃpūjyāḥ smartavyā eva kevalam /
analyzed: te viśeṣāt na saṃpūjyāḥ smartavyāḥ eva kevalam
tatas abhyantaratas vāyu vahnyoḥ mātṛkayā saha
mālinī kramaśas pūjyā tatas antar mantra cakrakam

original: AbhT_29.47a/. cakrātmake citiḥ prabhvī proktā seha kuleśvarī /
AbhT_29.47b/. sā madhye śrīparā devī mātṛsadbhāvarūpiṇī // 47
analyzed: sā madhye śrī parā devī mātṛsadbhāva rūpiṇī
pūjyā atha tad samāropāt aparā atha parāparā

original: AbhT_29.48b/. ekavīrā ca sā pūjyā yadivā sakuleśvarā // 48
analyzed: eka vīrā ca sā pūjyā yadi vā sa kula īśvarā
prasaret śaktiḥ ucchūnā sa ullāsaḥ bhairavaḥ punar
mahā prakāśa rūpāyāḥ saṃvidaḥ visphuliṅga vat
yaḥ raśmi oghaḥ tam eva atra pūjayet devatā gaṇam
antar dvādaśakam pūjyam tatas uṣṭa aṣṭākam eva ca

original: AbhT_29.51b/. catuṣkaṃ vā yathecchaṃ vā kā saṅkhyā kila raśmiṣu // 51
analyzed: catuṣkam vā yatheccham vā kā saṅkhyā kila raśmiṣu

original: AbhT_29.52a/. māheśī vairiñcī kaumārī vaiṣṇavī caturdikkam /
analyzed: māheśī vairiñcī kaumārī vaiṣṇavī caturdikkam

original: AbhT_29.52b/. aindrī yāmyā muṇḍā yogeśīrīśatastu koṇeṣu // 52
analyzed: aindrī yāmyā muṇḍā koṇeṣu
pavana antam aghora ādikam aṣṭakam asmin atha aṣṭake kramaśas
saṅghaṭṭa ānanda dṛśā sampūjyam yāmalībhūtam

original: AbhT_29.54a/. aṣṭāṣṭake@pi hi vidhau nānānāmaprapañcite bahudhā /
analyzed: aṣṭa aṣṭake api hi vidhau nānā nāma prapañcite bahudhā

original: AbhT_29.54b/. vidhireṣa eva vihitastatsaṃkhyā dīpamālā syāt // 54
analyzed: vidhiḥ eṣaḥ eva vihitaḥ tad saṃkhyā dīpa mālā syāt
śrī ratnamālā śāstre tu varṇa saṃkhyāḥ pradīpakāḥ
varṇān ca mukhya pūjyāyāḥ vidyāyāḥ gaṇayet sudhīḥ
pīṭha kṣetra ādibhiḥ sākam kuryāt vā kula pūjanam
yathā śrī mādhavakule parameśeṇa bhāṣitam
pīṭha śmaśāna sahitam pūjayet bhoga mokṣayoḥ
ātmanaḥ vā athavā śakteḥ cakrasya atha smaret imam

original: AbhT_29.58b/. nyasyatvena vidhiṃ dehe pīṭhākhye pārameśvaram // 58
analyzed: nyasya tvena vidhim dehe pīṭha ākhye pārameśvaram

original: AbhT_29.59a/. aṭṭahāsaṃ śikhāsthāne caritraṃ ca karandhrake /
analyzed: aṭṭahāsam śikhāsthāne caritram ca karandhrake
śrutyoḥ kaulagirim nāsā randhrayoḥ ca jayantikām

original: AbhT_29.60a/. bhruvorujjayinīṃ vaktre prayāgaṃ hṛdaye punaḥ /
analyzed: bhruvoḥ ujjayinīm vaktre prayāgam hṛdaye punar

original: AbhT_29.60b/. vārāṇasīṃ skandhayuge śrīpīṭhaṃ virajaṃ gale // 60
analyzed: vārāṇasīm skandha yuge śrīpīṭham virajam gale

original: AbhT_29.61a/. eḍābhīmudare hālāṃ nābhau kande tu gośrutim /
analyzed: eḍābhīm udare hālām nābhau kande tu gośrutim

original: AbhT_29.61b/. upasthe marukośaṃ ca nagaraṃ pauṇḍravardhanam // 61
analyzed: upasthe marukośam ca nagaram pauṇḍravardhanam
elāpuram puras tīram sakthi ūrvoḥ dakṣiṇa ādeḥ

original: AbhT_29.62b/. kuḍyākeśīṃ ca sopānaṃ māyāpūkṣīrake tathā // 62
analyzed: kuḍyākeśīm ca sopānam māyā pū kṣīrake tathā
jānu jaṅghe gulpha yugme tu āmrāta nṛpa sadmanī
pāda ādhāre tu vairiñcīm kālāgni avadhi dārikām
na aham asmi na ca anyaḥ asti kevalāḥ śaktayaḥ tu aham
iti evam vāsanām kuryāt sarvadā smṛti mātrataḥ

original: AbhT_29.65a/. na tithirna ca nakṣatraṃ nopavāso vidhīyate /
analyzed: na tithiḥ na ca nakṣatram na upavāsaḥ vidhīyate
grāmyadharma rataḥ siddhyet sarvadā smaraṇena hi
mātaṅga kṛṣṇa saunika kārmuka cārmika vikoṣi dhātu vibhedāḥ
mātsyika cākrika dayitāḥ teṣām patnyaḥ navā atra nava yāge
saṅgama varuṇa ākula giri aṭṭahāsa jayantī caritraka āmraka koṭṭam

original: AbhT_29.67b/. haimapuraṃ navamaṃ syānmadhye tāsāṃ ca cakriṇī mukhyā // 67
analyzed: haimapuram navamam syāt madhye tāsām ca cakriṇī mukhyā

original: AbhT_29.68a/. bījaṃ sā pīḍayate rasaśalkavibhāgato@tra kuṇḍalinī /
analyzed: bījam sā pīḍayate kuṇḍalinī
adhyuṣṭa pīṭha netrī kanda sthā viśvatas bhramati

original: AbhT_29.69a/. iṣṭvā cakrodayaṃ tvitthaṃ madhye pūjyā kuleśvarī /
analyzed: iṣṭvā cakra udayam tu ittham madhye pūjyā kuleśvarī
ekavīrā cakra yuktā cakra yāmala gā api vā
īśa indra agni yama kravyād ka vāyu dakṣu ha āsataḥ
trikam trikam yajet etat bhāvi sva trika saṃyutam
hṛd kuṇḍalī bhruvoḥ madhyam etat eva kramāt trayam
śmaśānāni kramāt kṣetra bhavam sat yoginī gaṇam
vasu aṅgula unnatān ūrdhva vartulān kṣāma madhyakān
rakta vartīn śruti dṛśaḥ dīpān kurvīta sarpiṣā
yat kiñcid athavā madhye sva anuṣṭhānam prapūjayet
advaitam eva na dvaitam iti ājñā parameśituḥ
siddhānta vaiṣṇava ādi uktāḥ mantrāḥ mala yutāḥ tatas
tāvat tejaḥ sahiṣṇu tvāt nirjīvāḥ syuḥ iha advaye
kalaśam netrabandha ādi maṇḍalam sruc sruva analam

original: AbhT_29.76a/. hitvātra siddhiḥ sanmadye pātre madhye kṛśāṃ yajet /
analyzed: hitvā atra siddhiḥ sat madye pātre madhye kṛśām yajet
ahorātram imam yāgam kurvataḥ ca aparehani
vīra bhojye kṛtā ivaśyam mantrāḥ siddhyanti ayatnataḥ
pīṭha stotram paṭhet atra yāge bhāgyāvaha āhvaye
mūrtīḥ eva athavā yugma rūpāḥ vīra svarūpiṇīḥ
avadhūtāḥ nirācārāḥ pūjayet kramaśas budhaḥ

original: AbhT_29.79a/. eka evātha kauleśaḥ svayaṃ bhūtvāpi tāvatīḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva atha kaula īśaḥ svayam bhūtvā api tāvatīḥ
śaktīḥ yāmala yogena tarpayet viśva rūpa vat
kramaḥ nāma na kaścid syāt prakāśa maya saṃvidi

original: AbhT_29.80b/. cidabhāvo hi nāstyeva tenākālaṃ tu tarpaṇam // 80
analyzed: cit abhāvaḥ hi na asti eva tena akālam tu tarpaṇam
atra krame bheda taroḥ samūlam unmūlanāt āsana pakṣa carcā

original: AbhT_29.81b/. pṛthaṅna yuktā parameśvaro hi svaśaktidhāmnīva viśaṃśramīti // 81
analyzed: pṛthak na yuktā parameśvaraḥ hi sva śakti dhāmni iva
tatas japaḥ prakartavyaḥ tri lakṣa ādi vibhedataḥ

original: AbhT_29.82b/. uktaṃ śrīyogasañcāre sa ca citrasvarūpakaḥ // 82
AbhT_29.83a/. udaye saṅgame śāntau trilakṣo japa ucyate /
analyzed: udaye saṅgame śāntau tri lakṣaḥ japaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_29.83b/. āsye gamāgame sūtre haṃsākhye śaivayugmake // 83
analyzed: āsye gama āgame sūtre haṃsa ākhye śaiva yugmake

original: AbhT_29.84a/. pañcalakṣā ime proktā daśāṃśaṃ homamācaret /
analyzed: pañca lakṣāḥ ime proktāḥ daśa aṃśam homam ācaret

original: AbhT_29.84b/. netre gamāgame vaktre haṃse caivākṣasūtrake // 84
analyzed: netre gama āgame vaktre haṃse ca eva akṣasūtrake
śiva śakti samāyoge ṣaṣ lakṣaḥ japaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_29.85b/. netre gamāgame karṇe haṃse vaktre ca bhāmini // 85
analyzed: netre gama āgame karṇe haṃse vaktre ca bhāmini

original: AbhT_29.86a/. haste ca yugmake caiva japaḥ saptavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: haste ca yugmake ca eva japaḥ saptavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_29.86b/. netre gamāgame karṇāvāsyaṃ guhyaṃ ca guhyakam // 86
analyzed: netre gama āgame karṇau āsyam guhyam ca guhyakam

original: AbhT_29.87a/. śatāreṣu ca madhyasthaṃ sahasrāreṣu bhāmini /
analyzed: śata areṣu ca madhya stham sahasra areṣu bhāmini

original: AbhT_29.87b/. japa eṣa rudralakṣo homo@pyatra daśāṃśataḥ // 87
analyzed: japaḥ eṣa rudra lakṣaḥ homaḥ api atra daśa aṃśataḥ

original: AbhT_29.88a/. netre gamāgame karṇau mukhaṃ brahmabilāntaram /
analyzed: netre gama āgame karṇau mukham brahmabila antaram

original: AbhT_29.88b/. stanau hastau ca pādau ca guhyacakre dvirabhyaset // 88
analyzed: stanau hastau ca pādau ca guhya cakre dvis abhyaset

original: AbhT_29.89a/. yatra yatra gataṃ cakṣuryatra yatra gataṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: yatra yatra gatam cakṣuḥ yatra yatra gatam manaḥ
haṃsaḥ tatra dvis abhyasyaḥ vikāsa ākuñcana ātmakaḥ

original: AbhT_29.90a/. sa ātmā mātṛkā devī śivo dehavyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ātmā mātṛkā devī śivaḥ deha vyavasthitaḥ
anyaḥ saḥ anyaḥ ham iti evam vikalpam na ācaret yatas

original: AbhT_29.91a/. yo vilpayate tasya siddhimuktī sudūrataḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tasya siddhi muktī su dūratas
atha ṣoḍaśa lakṣa ādi prāṇa cāre purā ukta vat
śuddha aśuddha vikalpānām tyāgaḥ ekāntaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_29.92b/. tatrasthaḥ svayamevaiṣa juhoti ca japatyapi // 92
analyzed: tatrasthaḥ svayam eva eṣa juhoti ca japati api
japaḥ sañjalpa vṛttiḥ ca nāda āmarśa svarūpiṇī

original: AbhT_29.93b/. tadāmṛṣṭasya cidvahnau layo homaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // 93

analyzed: āmarśaḥ ca purā proktaḥ devī dvādaśaka ātmakaḥ

original: AbhT_29.94b/. dve antye saṃvidau tatra layarūpāhutikriyā // 94
analyzed: dve antye saṃvidau tatra laya rūpa āhuti kriyā
daśa anyāḥ tad upāyāya iti evam home daśa aṃśa tām

original: AbhT_29.96a/. sākaṃ bāhyasthayā śaktyā yadā tveṣa samarcayet /
analyzed: sākam bāhya sthayā śaktyā yadā tu eṣa samarcayet

original: AbhT_29.96b/. tadāyaṃ parameśokto rahasyo bhaṇyate vidhiḥ // 96
analyzed: tadā ayam parameśa uktaḥ rahasyaḥ bhaṇyate vidhiḥ

original: AbhT_29.97a/. uktaṃ śrīyogasañcāre brahmacarye sthitiṃ bhajet /
analyzed: bhajet

original: AbhT_29.97b/. ānando brahma paramaṃ tacca dehe tridhā sthitam // 97
analyzed: ānandaḥ brahma paramam tat ca dehe tridhā sthitam
upakāri dvayam tatra phalam anyat tad ātmakam
oṣṭhya antya tritaya asevī brahmacārī saḥ ucyate
tad varjitāḥ ye paśavaḥ ānanda parivarjitāḥ

original: AbhT_29.100a/. dvaye@pi niraye yānti raurave bhīṣaṇe tviti /
analyzed: dvaye api niraye yānti raurave bhīṣaṇe tu iti
śakteḥ lakṣaṇam etāvat tadvataḥ hi avibhedi tā

original: AbhT_29.101a/. tādṛśīṃ tena tāṃ kuryānnatu varṇādyapekṣaṇam /
analyzed: tādṛśīm tena tām kuryāt na tu varṇa ādi apekṣaṇam
laukika alaukika dvi ātma saṅgāt tādātmya tā adhikāt

original: AbhT_29.102a/. kāryahetusahotthā sā tridhoktā śāsane guroḥ /
analyzed: kārya hetu sahotthā sā tridhā uktā śāsane guroḥ
sākṣāt paramparā yogāt tad tulyā iti tridhā punar
śrī sarvācārahṛdaye tat etat upasaṃhṛtam
ṣaḍ etāḥ śaktayaḥ proktāḥ bhukti mukti phala pradāḥ
dvābhyām tu sṛṣṭi saṃhārau tasmāt melakam uttamam
tām āhṛtya mithas abhyarcya tarpayitvā parasparam
tad pradhānam bhavet cakram anucakram atas uparam
vikāsāt tṛptitaḥ pāśa utkartanāt kṛti śaktitaḥ

original: AbhT_29.107a/. cakraṃ kaseścakeḥ kṛtyā karoteśca kiloditam /
analyzed: cakram kaseḥ cakeḥ kṛtyā karoteḥ ca kila uditam

original: AbhT_29.107b/. yāgaśca tarpaṇaṃ bāhye vikāsastacca kīrtyate // 107
analyzed: yāgaḥ ca tarpaṇam bāhye vikāsaḥ tat ca kīrtyate
cakra anucakra antara gāt śaktimat parikalpitāt
prāṇagāt api atha ānanda syandinā ubhyavahārataḥ
gandha dhūpa sraj ādeḥ ca bāhyāt ucchalanam citaḥ
ittham sva ucita vastu aṃśaiḥ anucakreṣu tarpaṇam
kurvīyātām iha anyonyam mukhya cakra ekatā kṛte
uktam ca triśiraḥ tantre vimala āsana gocaraḥ

original: AbhT_29.111a/. akṣaṣaṭkasya madhye tu rudrasthānaṃ samāviśet /
analyzed: akṣa ṣaṭkasya madhye tu rudra sthānam samāviśet

original: AbhT_29.112a/. kramaśo@nucakradevyaḥ saṃviccakraṃ hi madhyamaṃ yānti /
analyzed: kramaśas unucakra devyaḥ saṃvid cakram hi madhyamam yānti

original: AbhT_29.112b/. svasthatanoraparasya tu tā dehādhiṣṭhitaṃ vihāya yataḥ // 112
analyzed: svastha tanoḥ aparasya tu tāḥ deha adhiṣṭhitam vihāya yatas

original: AbhT_29.113a/. āsata iti tadahaṃyurno pūrṇo nāpi cocchalati /
analyzed: āsate iti tat ahaṃyuḥ no pūrṇaḥ na api ca ucchalati
tad śakti śaktimat yugam anyonya samunmukham bhavati
tat yugalam ūrdhva dhāma praveśa saṃsparśa jāta saṅkṣobham

original: AbhT_29.115a/. kṣubhnātyanucakrāṇyapi tāni tadā tanmayāni na pṛthaktu /
analyzed: kṣubhnāti anucakrāṇi api tāni tadā tanmayāni na pṛthak tu
ittham yāmalam etat galita bhidā saṃkatham yat eva syāt
krama tāratamya yogāt sā eva hi saṃvid visarga saṅghaṭṭaḥ
tat dhruva dhāma anuttaram ubhaya ātmaka jagat udāra sa ānandam

original: AbhT_29.117a/. no śāntaṃ nāpyuditaṃ śāntoditasūtikāraṇaṃ paraṃ kaulam /
analyzed: śāntam na api uditam śānta udita sūti kāraṇam param kaulam
anavacchinna pada īpsuḥ tām saṃvidam ātmasāt sadā kuryāt

original: AbhT_29.118a/. anavacchinnaṃ paramārthato hi rūpaṃ cito devyāḥ /
analyzed: anavacchinnam paramārthataḥ hi rūpam citaḥ devyāḥ
īdṛś tādṛś prāya praśama udaya bhāva vilaya parikathayā
anavacchinnam dhāma praviśet vaisargikam subhagaḥ
śānta udita ātmakam dvayam atha yugapad udeti śakti śaktimatoḥ
rūpam uditam paraspara dhāma gatam śāntam ātma gatam eva

original: AbhT_29.120b/. ubhayamapi vastutaḥ kila yāmalamiti tathoditaṃ śāntam // 120
analyzed: ubhayam api vastutas kila yāmalam iti tathā uditam śāntam

original: AbhT_29.121a/. śaktistadvaducitāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ puṣṇāti no tadvān /
analyzed: śaktiḥ tadvat ucitām sṛṣṭim puṣṇāti no tadvān
śānta udita ātmaka ubhaya rūpa parāmarśa sāmya yoge api

original: AbhT_29.122a/. pravikasvaramadhyapadā śaktiḥ śāstre tataḥ kathitā /
analyzed: pravika svara madhya padā śaktiḥ śāstre tatas kathitā
tasyām eva kula artham samyak saṃcārayet guruḥ tena

original: AbhT_29.123a/. taddvāreṇa ca kathitakrameṇa saṃcārayeta nṛṣu /
analyzed: tad dvāreṇa ca kathita krameṇa saṃcārayeta nṛṣu
sva śarīra adhika sadbhāva bhāvi tām iti tatas prāha
śrīmat kallaṭa nāthaḥ prokta samasta artha labdhaye vākyam
tat mukhya cakram uktam maheśinā yoginī vaktram
tatra eṣa sampradāyaḥ tasmāt saṃprāpyate jñānam
tat idam alekhyam bhaṇitam vaktrāt vaktra stham ukta yuktyā ca

original: AbhT_29.126a/. vaktraṃ pradhānacakraṃ svā saṃvillikhyatāṃ ca katham /
analyzed: vaktram pradhāna cakram svā saṃvid likhyatām ca katham

original: AbhT_29.126b/. atha sṛṣṭe dvitaye@smin śāntoditadhāmni ye@nusaṃdadhate // 126
analyzed: atha sṛṣṭe dvitaye ismin śānta udita dhāmni

original: AbhT_29.127a/. prācyāṃ visargasattāmanavacchidi te pade rūḍhāḥ /
analyzed: prācyām visarga sattām anavacchidi te pade rūḍhāḥ
ye siddhim āptu kāmāḥ tebhyaḥ uditam rūpam āhareyuḥ atho
tena eva pūjayeyuḥ saṃvid naikaṭya śuddhatama vapuṣā

original: AbhT_29.128b/. tadapica mitho hi vaktrātpradhānato vaktragaṃ yato bhaṇitam // 128
analyzed: tat api ca mithas hi vaktrāt pradhānataḥ vaktra gam yatas bhaṇitam
ajara amara pada dāna pravaṇam kula saṃjñitam paramam
ye api aprāpta vibodhāḥ tebhiḥ udita utphulla yāga saṃrūḍhāḥ
tad parikalpita cakra stha devatāḥ prāpnuvanti vijñānam

original: AbhT_29.130b/. te tatra śakticakre tenaivānandarasamayena bahiḥ // 130
analyzed: te tatra śakti cakre tena eva ānanda rasa mayena bahis

original: AbhT_29.131a/. dikṣu catasṛṣu proktakrameṇa gaṇanāthataḥ prabhṛti sarvam /
analyzed: dikṣu catasṛṣu prokta krameṇa gaṇanāthataḥ prabhṛti sarvam

original: AbhT_29.131b/. saṃpūjya madhyamapade kuleśayugmaṃ tvarātraye devīḥ // 131
analyzed: saṃpūjya madhyama pade kula īśa yugmam tvarā traye devīḥ

original: AbhT_29.132a/. bāhye pratyaramatha kila catuṣkamiti raśmicakramarkāram /
analyzed: bāhye kila catuṣkam iti raśmi cakram arka aram
aṣṭakam aṣṭa aṣṭakam atha vividham saṃpūjayet krameṇa muniḥ

original: AbhT_29.133a/. nijadehagate dhāmani tathaiva pūjyaṃ samabhyasyet /
analyzed: nija deha gate dhāmani tathā eva pūjyam samabhyasyet
yat tat śāntam rūpam tena abhyastena hṛdaya saṃvittyā
śāntam śiva padam eti hi galita taraṅga arṇava prakhyam
tad śānta pada adhyāsāt cakra sthaḥ devatā gaṇaḥ sarvaḥ
tiṣṭhati uparata vṛttiḥ śūnya ālambī nirānandaḥ
yaḥ api anucakra dṛś ādi sva rūpa bhāj saḥ api yat tad āyattaḥ
tena ānande magnaḥ tiṣṭhati ānanda sākāṅkṣaḥ
para tad svarūpa saṅghaṭṭam antareṇa eṣa karaṇa raśmi gaṇaḥ

original: AbhT_29.137a/. āste hi niḥsvarūpaḥ svarūpalābhāya conmukhitaḥ /
analyzed: āste hi niḥsva rūpaḥ sva rūpa lābhāya ca unmukhitaḥ
raṇaraṇaka rasān nija rasa bharita bahirbhāva carvaṇa vaśena
viśrānti dhāma kiñcid labdhvā sva ātmani atha arpayate
cakreśvaraḥ api pūrva ukta yuktitaḥ procchalet rabhasāt

original: AbhT_29.140a/. trividho visarga itthaṃ saṅghaṭṭaḥ proditastathā śāntaḥ /
analyzed: trividhaḥ visargaḥ ittham saṅghaṭṭaḥ proditaḥ tathā śāntaḥ

original: AbhT_29.140b/. visṛjati yato vicitraḥ sargo vigataśca yatra sarga iti // 140
analyzed: visṛjati yatas vicitraḥ sargaḥ vigataḥ ca yatra sargaḥ iti

original: AbhT_29.141a/. śrītattvarakṣaṇe śrīnigame triśiromate ca tatproktam /
analyzed: śrī tattva rakṣaṇe śrī nigame triśiromate ca tat proktam

original: AbhT_29.141b/. kuṇḍaṃ śaktiḥ śivo liṅgaṃ melakaṃ paramaṃ padam // 141

analyzed: dvābhyām sṛṣṭiḥ saṃhṛtiḥ tad visargaḥ trividhaḥ game

original: AbhT_29.143a/. viśrāmaṃ ca samāveśaṃ suṣīṇāṃ marutāṃ tathā /
analyzed: viśrāmam ca samāveśam suṣīṇām marutām tathā

original: AbhT_29.143b/. gatabhedaṃ ca yantrāṇāṃ sandhīnāṃ marmaṇāmapi // 143
analyzed: gata bhedam ca yantrāṇām sandhīnām marmaṇām api

original: AbhT_29.144a/. dvāsaptatipade dehe sahasrāre ca nityaśaḥ /
analyzed: dvāsaptati pade dehe sahasrāre ca nityaśas
gati āgati antarā vittī saṅghaṭṭayati yat śivaḥ
tad prayatnāt sadā tiṣṭhet saṅghaṭṭe bhairave pade
ubhayoḥ tat nirākāra bhāva saṃprāpti lakṣaṇam
abhyasyet bhāva saṃvittim sarva bhāva nivartanāt
sūrya somau tu saṃrudhya laya vikṣepa mārgataḥ
evam trividha vimarśa āveśa samāpatti dhāmni yaḥ udeti
saṃvid parimarśa ātmā dhvaniḥ tat eva iha mantra vīryam syāt
tatra eva udita tādṛśa phala lābha samutsukaḥ svakam mantram

original: AbhT_29.149a/. anusandhāya sadā cedāste mantrodayaṃ sa vai vetti /
analyzed: anusandhāya sadā ced āste mantra udayam sa vai vetti
atra eva japam kuryāt anucakra eka tva saṃvid āgamane
yugapad lakṣa vibheda prapañcitam nāda vṛttyā eva
śrī yogasañcare pi ca mudrā iyam yoginīpriyā paramā
madhya stha nāla gumphita saroja yuga ghaṭṭana kramāt agnau
iti śaśadhara vāsarapati citragu saṃghaṭṭa mudrayā jhaṭiti
sṛṣṭi ādi kramam antar kurvan turye sthitim labhate
pāna upabhoga līlā hāsa ādiṣu yaḥ bhavet vimarśa mayaḥ
avyucchinna anāhata rūpaiḥ tat mantra vīryam syāt

original: AbhT_29.156b/. iti cakrāṣṭakarūḍhaḥ sahajaṃ japamācaran pare dhāmni // 156
analyzed: iti cakra aṣṭaka rūḍhaḥ sahajam japam ācaran pare dhāmni
yat bhairava aṣṭaka padam tat labhatā iṣṭaka kalā bhinnam

original: AbhT_29.158a/. tatsaṃmelanayoge dehāntākhye ca yāmale cakre /
analyzed: tad saṃmelana yoge dehānta ākhye ca yāmale cakre
kuca madhya hṛdaya deśāt oṣṭha antam kaṇṭha gam yat avyaktam
tad cakra dvaya madhya gam ākarṇya kṣobha vigama samaye yat

original: AbhT_29.159b/. nirvānti tatra caivaṃ yo@ṣṭavidho nādabhairavaḥ paramaḥ // 159
analyzed: nirvānti tatra ca evam yoṣṭavidhaḥ nādabhairavaḥ paramaḥ

original: AbhT_29.160a/. jyotirdhvanisamirakṛtaḥ sā māntrī vyāptirucyate paramā /
analyzed: jyotiḥ dhvani samira kṛtaḥ sā māntrī vyāptiḥ ucyate paramā

original: AbhT_29.160b/. sakalākaleśaśūnyaṃ kalāḍhyakhamale tathā kṣapaṇakaṃ ca // 160
analyzed: sakala a kalā īśa śūnyam kalā āḍhya kha male tathā kṣapaṇakam ca
antaḥstham kaṇṭhya uṣṭhyam candrāt vyāptiḥ tathā unmanā antā iyam

original: AbhT_29.161b/. evaṃ karmaṇi karmaṇi yatra kvāpi smaran vyāptim // 161
analyzed: evam karmaṇi karmaṇi yatra kvāpi smaran vyāptim
satatam alepaḥ jīvanmuktaḥ para bhairavībhavati
tādṛś melaka kalikā kalita tanuḥ kaḥ api yaḥ bhavet garbhe

original: AbhT_29.163a/. uktaḥ sa yoginībhūḥ svayameva jñānabhājanaṃ rudraḥ /
analyzed: uktaḥ sa yoginī bhūḥ svayam eva jñāna bhājanam rudraḥ

original: AbhT_29.163b/. śrīvīrāvaliśāstre bālo@pi ca garbhago hi śivarūpaḥ // 163
analyzed: śrī vīrāvaliśāstre bālaḥ api ca garbha gaḥ hi śiva rūpaḥ

original: AbhT_29.164a/. ādīyate yataḥ sāraṃ tasya mukhyasya caiṣa yat /
analyzed: ādīyate yatas sāram tasya mukhyasya ca eṣa yat
mukhyaḥ ca yāgaḥ tena ayam ādiyāgaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_29.165a/. tatra tatra ca śāstre@sya svarūpaṃ stutavān vibhuḥ /
analyzed: tatra tatra ca svarūpam stutavān vibhuḥ
yugmasya asya prasādena vrata yoga vivarjitaḥ
śakti dehe nije nyasyet vidyām kūṭam anukramāt
dhyātvā candra nibham padmam ātmānam bhāskara dyutim
vidyā mantra ātmakam pīṭha dvayam atra eva melayet

original: AbhT_29.169a/. na paṭhyate rahasyatvātspaṣṭaiḥ śabdairmayā punaḥ /
analyzed: na paṭhyate rahasya tvāt spaṣṭaiḥ śabdaiḥ mayā punar
kutūhalī tu ukta śāstra saṃpāṭhāt eva lakṣayet

original: AbhT_29.170a/. yadbhajante sadā sarve yadvān devaśca devatā /
analyzed: yat bhajante sadā sarve yadvān devaḥ ca devatā

original: AbhT_29.171a/. deha eva paraṃ liṅgaṃ sarvatattvātmakaṃ śivam /
analyzed: dehaḥ eva param liṅgam sarva tattva ātmakam śivam
devatā cakra saṃjuṣṭam pūjā dhāma tat uttamam
tat eva maṇḍalam mukhyam tri triśūla abja cakra kham

original: AbhT_29.172b/. tatraiva devatācakraṃ bahirantaḥ sadā yajet // 172
analyzed: tatra eva devatā cakram bahis antar sadā yajet
sva sva mantra parāmarśa pūrvam tad janmabhiḥ rasaiḥ
ānanda bahulaiḥ sṛṣṭi saṃhāra vidhinā spṛśet
tad sparśa rabhasa udbuddha saṃvid cakram tad īśvaraḥ
labhate paramam dhāma tarpita aśeṣa daivataḥ
anuyāga ukta vidhinā dravyaiḥ hṛdaya hāribhiḥ
tathā eva sva sva kāmarśa yogāt antar pratarpayet
kṛtvā ādhāra dharām svabhāva kusumaiḥ sva āmoda sandohibhiḥ

original: AbhT_29.176b/. ānandāmṛtanirbharasvahṛdayānarghārghapātrakramāt tvāṃ devyā saha dehadevasadane devārcaye@harniśam // 176
analyzed: ānanda amṛta nirbhara sva hṛdaya anargha arghapātra kramāt tvām devyā saha deha deva sadane deva arcaya iharniśam
śrī vīrāvalī amaryāda prabhṛtau śāstra sañcaye

original: AbhT_29.177b/. sa eṣa paramo yāgaḥ stutaḥ śītāṃśumaulinā // 177
analyzed: saḥ eṣa paramaḥ yāgaḥ stutaḥ śītāṃśu maulinā
athavā prāṇa vṛtti stham samastam devatā gaṇam
paśyet pūrva ukta yuktyā eva tatra eva abhyarcayet guruḥ
prāṇa āśritānām devīnām brahma nāsā ādi bhedibhiḥ
evam prāṇa krameṇa eva tarpayet devatā gaṇam
acirāt tad prasādena jñāna siddhīḥ atha aśnute
viśva ābhoga prayogeṇa tarpaṇīyam vipaścitā

original: AbhT_29.182a/. yatra sarve layaṃ yānti dahyante tattvasañcayāḥ /
analyzed: yatra sarve layam yānti dahyante tattva sañcayāḥ

original: AbhT_29.182b/. tāṃ citiṃ paśya kāyasthāṃ kālānalasamaprabhām // 182
analyzed: tām citim paśya kāyasthām kāla anala sama prabhām
śūnya rūpe śmaśāne ismin yoginī siddha sevite
krīḍā sthāne mahā raudre sarva astamita vigrahe
sva raśmi maṇḍala ākīrṇe dhvaṃsita dhvānta santatau
sarvaiḥ vikalpaiḥ nirmukte ānanda pada kevale
asaṃkhya citi saṃpūrṇe śmaśāne citi bhīṣaṇe

original: AbhT_29.185b/. samastadevatādhāre praviṣṭaḥ ko na siddhyati // 185
analyzed: samasta devatā ādhāre praviṣṭaḥ kaḥ na siddhi ati
śrīmat vīrāvalīśāstre ittham provāca bhairavī
ittham yāgam vidhāya ādau tādṛśa aucitya bhāginam

original: AbhT_29.187a/. lakṣaikīyaṃ svaśiṣyaṃ taṃ dīkṣayettādṛśi krame /
analyzed: lakṣa ekīyam sva śiṣyam tam dīkṣayet tādṛśi krame

original: AbhT_29.187b/. rudraśaktyā tu taṃ prokṣya devābhyāśe niveśayet // 187
analyzed: rudra śaktyā tu tam prokṣya deva abhyāśe niveśayet

original: AbhT_29.188a/. bhujau tasya samālokya rudraśaktyā pradīpayet /
analyzed: bhujau tasya samālokya rudra śaktyā pradīpayet
tayā eva asya arpayet puṣpam karayoḥ gandha digdhayoḥ

original: AbhT_29.189a/. nirālambau tu tau tasya sthāpayitvā vicintayet /
analyzed: nirālambau tu tau tasya sthāpayitvā vicintayet
rudra śaktyā ākṛṣyamāṇau dīptayā aṅkuśa rūpayā

original: AbhT_29.190a/. tataḥ sa svayamādāya vastraṃ baddhadṛśirbhavet /
analyzed: tatas sa svayam ādāya vastram baddha dṛśiḥ bhavet
svayam ca pātayet puṣpam tad pātāt lakṣayet kulam
tatas asya mukham uddhāṭya pādayoḥ praṇipātayet
hastayoḥ mūrdhni ca api asya devī cakram samarcayet
ākarṣya ākarṣaka tvena prerya preraka bhāvataḥ

original: AbhT_29.192b/. uktaṃ śrīratnamālāyāṃ nābhiṃ daṇḍena saṃpuṭam // 192
analyzed: uktam śrī ratnamālāyām nābhim daṇḍena saṃpuṭam
vāma bhūṣaṇa jaṅghābhyām nitambena api alaṅkṛtam

original: AbhT_29.193b/. śiṣyahaste puṣpabhṛte codanāstraṃ tu yojayet // 193
analyzed: śiṣya haste puṣpa bhṛte codana astram tu yojayet

original: AbhT_29.194a/. yāvatsa stobhamāyātaḥ svayaṃ patati mūrdhani /
analyzed: yāvat sa stobham āyātaḥ svayam patati mūrdhani
anena eva prayogeṇa carukam grāhayet guruḥ

original: AbhT_29.195b/. śiṣyeṇa dantakāṣṭhaṃ ca tatpātaḥ prāgvadeva tu // 195
analyzed: śiṣyeṇa dantakāṣṭham ca tad pātaḥ prāgvat eva tu

original: AbhT_29.196a/. karastobho netrapaṭagrahāt prabhṛti yaḥ kila /

analyzed: dantakāṣṭha samādāna paryantaḥ tatra lakṣayet
tīvra manda ādi bhedena śaktipātam tathāvidham

original: AbhT_29.197b/. ityeṣa samayī proktaḥ śrīpūrve karakampataḥ // 197
analyzed: iti eṣa samayī proktaḥ śrī pūrve kara kampataḥ
samayī tu karastobhāt iti śrī bhogahastake
caru eva vā guruḥ dadyāt vāma amṛta pariplutam
niḥśaṅkam grahaṇāt śakti gotraḥ māyā ujjhitaḥ bhavet
sa kampaḥ tu ādadānaḥ syāt samayī vācana ādiṣu
kāla antara idhu asaṃśuddhyā pālanāt samaya sthiteḥ
siddhi pātram iti śrīmat ānandeśvaraḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_29.201a/. yadā tu putrakaṃ kuryāttadā dīkṣāṃ samācaret /
analyzed: yadā tu putrakam kuryāt tadā dīkṣām samācaret

original: AbhT_29.202a/. nyasyecchikhāntaṃ patati tenātredṛk kramo bhavet /
analyzed: nyasyet śikhā antam patati tena atra īdṛś kramaḥ bhavet
prokṣitasya śiśoḥ nyasta prokta śodhya adhva paddhateḥ
ṛju deha juṣaḥ śaktim pādāt mūrdha antam āgatām
pāśān dahantīm saṃdīptām cintayet tad mayaḥ guruḥ
upaviśya tatas tasya mūla śodhyāt prabhṛti alam

original: AbhT_29.205a/. evaṃ sarvāṇi śodhyāni tattvādīni puroktavat /
analyzed: evam sarvāṇi śodhyāni tattva ādīni purā ukta vat

original: AbhT_29.205b/. dagdhvā līnāṃ śive dhyāyenniṣkale sakale@thavā // 205
analyzed: dagdhvā līnām śive dhyāyet niṣkale sakala ithavā

original: AbhT_29.206a/. yoginā yojitā mārge sajātīyasya poṣaṇam /
analyzed: yoginā yojitā mārge sajātīyasya poṣaṇam
kurute nirdahati antar bhinna jāti kadambakam
anayā śodhyamānasya śiśoḥ tīvra ādi bhedataḥ
śaktipātāt citi vyoma prāṇana antar bahis tanūḥ

original: AbhT_29.208a/. āviśantī rudraśaktiḥ kramātsūte phalaṃ tvidam /
analyzed: āviśantī rudra śaktiḥ kramāt sūte phalam tu idam

original: AbhT_29.208b/. ānandamudbhavaṃ kampaṃ nidrāṃ ghūrṇiṃ ca dehagām // 208
analyzed: ānandam udbhavam kampam nidrām ghūrṇim ca deha gām
evam stobhita pāśasya yojitasya ātmanaḥ śive
śeṣa bhogāya kurvīta sṛṣṭim saṃśuddha tattva gām
athavā kasyacid na evam āveśaḥ tat dahet imam
bahis antar ca ukta śaktyā patet ittham sa bhū tale
yasya tu evam api syāt na tam atra upala vat tyajet

original: AbhT_29.211b/. atha sapratyayāṃ dīkṣāṃ vakṣye tuṣṭena dhīmatā // 211
analyzed: atha sa pratyayām dīkṣām vakṣye tuṣṭena dhīmatā
śaṃbhu nāthena upadiṣṭām dṛṣṭām sadbhāva śāsane
sudhā agni marutaḥ manda para kālāgni vāyavaḥ
vahni saudha āsukūṭa agni vāyuḥ sarve sa ṣaṣṭhakāḥ
etat piṇḍa trayam stobha kāri pratyekam ucyate

original: AbhT_29.214a/. śaktibījaṃ smṛtaṃ yacca nyasyetsārvāṅgikaṃ tu tat /
analyzed: śaktibījam smṛtam yat ca nyasyet sārvāṅgikam tu tat
japā kusuma saṃkāśam caitanyam tasya madhyatas

original: AbhT_29.215b/. vāyunā preritaṃ cakraṃ vahninā paridīpitam // 215
analyzed: vāyunā preritam cakram vahninā paridīpitam
tat dhyāyet ca japet mantram nāma antarita yogataḥ

original: AbhT_29.216b/. nimeṣārdhāttu śiṣyasya bhavetstobho na saṃśayaḥ // 216
analyzed: nimeṣa ardhāt tu śiṣyasya bhavet stobhaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: AbhT_29.217a/. ātmānaṃ prekṣate devi tattve tattve niyojitaḥ /
analyzed: ātmānam prekṣate devi tattve tattve niyojitaḥ

original: AbhT_29.217b/. yāvatprāptaḥ paraṃ tattvaṃ tadā tveṣa na paśyati // 217
analyzed: yāvat prāptaḥ param tattvam tadā tu eṣa na paśyati

original: AbhT_29.218a/. anena kramayogena sarvādhvānaṃ sa paśyati /
analyzed: anena krama yogena sarva adhvānam sa paśyati
athavā sarva śāstrāṇi api udgrāhayati tad kṣaṇāt
pṛthak tattva vidhau dīkṣām yogya tā vaśa vartinaḥ
tattva abhyāsa vidhānena siddha yogī samācaret
iti saṃdīkṣitasya asya mumukṣoḥ śeṣa vartane
kula krama iṣṭiḥ ādeśyā pañca avasthā samanvitā
jāgrat ādiṣu saṃvittiḥ yathā syāt anapāyinī
kula yāgaḥ tathā ādeśyaḥ yoginī mukha saṃsthitaḥ

original: AbhT_29.222a/. sarvaṃ jāgrati kartavyaṃ svapne pratyekamantragam /
analyzed: sarvam jāgrati kartavyam svapne pratyeka mantra gam
nivārya supte mūla ākhyaḥ sva śakti paribṛṃhitaḥ

original: AbhT_29.223a/. turye tvekaiva dūtyākhyā tadatīte kuleśitā /
analyzed: turye tu ekā eva dūtī ākhyā tad atīte kula īśitā
sva śakti paripūrṇānām ittham pūjā pravartate
piṇḍa stha ādi ca pūrva uktam sarva atīta avasānakam
nirūpayet
sādhakasya bubhukṣoḥ tu samyak yoga abhiṣecanam
tatra iṣṭvā vibhavaiḥ devam hema ādi mayam avraṇam

original: AbhT_29.226b/. kulāṣṭakena tatpūjyaṃ śaṅkhe cāpi kuleśvarau // 226
analyzed: kula aṣṭakena tat pūjyam śaṅkhe ca api kuleśvarau
ānanda amṛta saṃpūrṇe śiva hasta ukta vartmanā
tena abhiṣiñcet tam paścāt sa kuryāt mantra sādhanam
ācāryasya abhiṣekaḥ ayam adhikāra anvitaḥ sa tu
kuryāt piṣṭa ādibhiḥ ca asya catuḥṣaṣṭim pradīpakān

original: AbhT_29.229a/. aṣṭāṣṭakena pūjyāste madhye prāgvat kuleśvarau /
analyzed: aṣṭa aṣṭakena pūjyāḥ te madhye prāgvat kula īśvarau
śivahasta ukta yuktyā eva gurum api abhiṣecayet
abhiṣiktau imau evam sarva yogi gaṇena tu
viditau bhavataḥ tatra guruḥ mokṣa pradaḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_29.231a/. tātparyamasya pādasya sa siddhīḥ saṃprayacchati /
analyzed: tātparyam asya pādasya sa siddhīḥ saṃprayacchati

original: AbhT_29.231b/. gururyaḥ sādhakaḥ prāksyādanyo mokṣaṃ dadātyalam // 231
analyzed: guruḥ yaḥ sādhakaḥ prāk syāt anyaḥ mokṣam dadāti alam
anayoḥ kathayet jñānam trividham sarvam api alam

original: AbhT_29.232b/. svakīyājñāṃ ca vitaret svakriyākaraṇaṃ prati // 232
analyzed: svakīya ājñām ca vitaret sva kriyā karaṇam prati

original: AbhT_29.233a/. ṣaṭkaṃ kāraṇasaṃjñaṃ yattathā yaḥ paramaḥ śivaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṭkam kāraṇa saṃjñam yat tathā yaḥ paramaḥ śivaḥ
sākam bhairava nāthena tat aṣṭakam udāhṛtam

original: AbhT_29.234a/. pratyekaṃ tasya sārvātmyaṃ paśyaṃstāṃ vṛttimātmagām /
analyzed: pratyekam tasya sārvātmyam paśyan tām vṛttim ātma gām
cakṣuḥ ādau saṃkramayet yatra yatra indriye guruḥ

original: AbhT_29.235a/. sa eva pūrṇaiḥ kalaśairabhiṣekaḥ paraḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva pūrṇaiḥ kalaśaiḥ abhiṣekaḥ paraḥ smṛtaḥ
vinā bāhyaiḥ api iti uktam śrī vīrāvalibhairave

original: AbhT_29.236a/. sadya eva tu bhogepsoryogātsiddhatamo guruḥ /
analyzed: sadyas eva tu bhoga īpsoḥ yogāt siddhatamaḥ guruḥ
kuryāt sadyas tathā abhīṣṭa phala dam vedha dīkṣaṇam

original: AbhT_29.237a/. vedhadīkṣā ca bahudhā tatra tatra nirūpitā /
analyzed: vedha dīkṣā ca bahudhā tatra tatra nirūpitā
sā ca abhyāsavatā kāryā yena ūrdhva ūrdhva praveśataḥ
śiṣyasya cakra saṃbheda pratyayaḥ jāyate dhruvaḥ

original: AbhT_29.238b/. yenāṇimādikā siddhiḥ śrīmālāyāṃ ca coditā // 238
analyzed: yena aṇima ādikā siddhiḥ śrī mālāyām ca coditā
ūrdhva cakra daśā alābhe piśāca āveśe eva sā
ṣoḍhā śrī gahvare vedha dīkṣā uktā parameśinā
jvālā ākulam sva śāstra uktam cakram aṣṭa āraka ādikam
dhyātvā tena asya hṛd cakra vedhanāt mantra vedhanam

original: AbhT_29.241b/. ākāraṃ navadhā dehe nyasya saṃkramayettataḥ // 241
analyzed: ākāram navadhā dehe nyasya saṃkramayet tatas
nyāsa yogena śiṣyāya dīpyamānam mahā
pāśastobhāt tatas tasya para tattve tu yojanam

original: AbhT_29.243a/. iti dīkṣottare dṛṣṭo vidhirme śaṃbhunoditaḥ /
analyzed: iti dīkṣottare dṛṣṭaḥ vidhiḥ me śaṃbhunā uditaḥ
nādena vedhayet cittam nādavedhaḥ udīritaḥ
bindu sthāna gatam cittam bhrū madhya patha saṃsthitam

original: AbhT_29.245a/. hṛllakṣye vā maheśāni binduṃ jvālākulaprabham /
analyzed: hṛd lakṣye vā maheśāni bindum jvālā ākula prabham
tena saṃbodhayet sādhyam bindu ākhyaḥ yam prakīrtitaḥ
śāktam śaktimat uccārāt gandha uccāreṇa sundari
śṛṅgāṭaka āsana stham tu kuṭilam kuṇḍala ākṛtim
anuccāreṇa ca uccārya vedhayet nikhilam jagat
evam bhramara vedhena śākta vedhaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
sā ca eva paramā śaktiḥ ānanda pravikāsinī
janma sthānāt param yāti phaṇa pañcaka bhūṣitā

original: AbhT_29.249a/. kalāstattvāni nandādyā vyomāni ca kulāni ca /
analyzed: kalāḥ tattvāni nanda ādyāḥ vyomāni ca kulāni ca
brahma ādi kāraṇāni akṣāṇi eva sā pañcaka ātmikā
evam pañca prakārā sā brahma sthāna vinirgatā

original: AbhT_29.250b/. brahmasthāne viśantī tu taḍillīnā virājate // 250
analyzed: brahmasthāne viśantī tu taḍit līnā virājate
praviṣṭā vedhayet kāyam ātmānam pratibhedayet
evam bhujaṅga vedhaḥ tu kathitaḥ bhairavāgame

original: AbhT_29.252a/. tāvadbhāvayate cittaṃ yāvaccittaṃ kṣayaṃ gatam /
analyzed: tāvat bhāvayate cittam yāvat cittam kṣayam gatam

original: AbhT_29.252b/. kṣīṇe citte sureśāni parānanda udāhṛtaḥ // 252
analyzed: kṣīṇe citte sureśāni parānandaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: AbhT_29.253a/. nendriyāṇi na vai prāṇā nāntaḥkaraṇagocaraḥ /
analyzed: na indriyāṇi na vai prāṇāḥ na antaḥkaraṇa gocaraḥ

original: AbhT_29.253b/. na mano nāpi mantavyaṃ na mantā na manikriyā // 253
analyzed: na manaḥ na api mantavyam na mantā na mani kriyā
sarva bhāva parikṣīṇaḥ paravedhaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
manu śakti bhuvana rūpa jñā piṇḍa sthāna nāḍi para bhedāt

original: AbhT_29.255a/. navadhā kalayantyanye vedaṃ guravo rahasyavidaḥ /
analyzed: navadhā kalayanti anye vedam guravaḥ rahasya vidaḥ
māyā garbha agni varṇa ogha yukte tri aśriṇi maṇḍale

original: AbhT_29.256a/. dhyātvā jvālākarālena tena granthīn vibhedayet /
analyzed: dhyātvā jvālā karālena tena granthīn vibhedayet
puṣpaiḥ hanyāt yojayet ca pare mantra abhidhaḥ vidhiḥ
nāḍyā āviśya anyatarayā caitanyam kanda dhāmani
piṇḍīkṛtya paribhramya pañca aṣṭa śikhayā haṭhāt
śakti śūla agra gamitam kvāpi cakre niyojayet
śaktyā iti śāktaḥ vedhaḥ yam sadyas pratyaya kārakaḥ
ādhārāt nirgatayā śikhayā jyotsnā avadātayā rabhasāt
aṅguṣṭha mūla pīṭha krameṇa śiṣyasya līnayā vyomni
deham su acchīkṛtya kṣā ādīn ā antān smaran purā ukta puryoghān
nija maṇḍala nirdhyānāt pratibimbayate bhuvanavedhaḥ
bhrū madhya udita baindava dhāma antar kāṃcid ākṛtim rucirām
tādātmyena dhyāyet śiṣyam paścāt ca tanmayīkuryāt

original: AbhT_29.262a/. iti rūpavedha uktaḥ sā cehākṛtirupaiti dṛśyatvam /
analyzed: iti rūpa vedhaḥ uktaḥ sā ca iha ākṛtiḥ upaiti dṛśya tvam
ante tad sāyujyam śiṣyaḥ ca āyāti tanmayībhūtaḥ
vijñānam aṣṭadhā yat hrāṇā ādika buddhi saṃjña karaṇa antaḥ
tat sva sva nāḍi sūtra krameṇa saṃcārayet śiṣye
abhimāna dārḍhya bandha krameṇa vijñāna saṃjñakaḥ vedhaḥ

original: AbhT_29.265a/. piṇḍaḥ paraḥ kalātmā sūkṣmaḥ puryaṣṭako bahiḥ sthūlaḥ /
analyzed: piṇḍaḥ paraḥ kalā ātmā sūkṣmaḥ puryaṣṭakaḥ bahis sthūlaḥ

original: AbhT_29.265b/. chāyātmā sa parāṅmukha ādarśādau ca saṃmukho jñeyaḥ // 265
analyzed: chāyā ātmā sa parāṅmukhaḥ ādarśa ādau ca saṃmukhaḥ jñeyaḥ

original: AbhT_29.266a/. iti yaḥ piṇḍavibhedastaṃ rabhasāduttarottare śamayet /
analyzed: iti yaḥ piṇḍa vibhedaḥ tam rabhasāt uttarottare śamayet

original: AbhT_29.267a/. yadyaddehe cakraṃ tatra śiśoretya viśramaṃ kramaśaḥ /
analyzed: yat yat dehe cakram tatra śiśoḥ etya viśramam kramaśas
ujjvalayet tat cakram sthāna ākhyaḥ tad phala pradaḥ vedhaḥ
nāḍyaḥ pradhāna bhūtāḥ tisraḥ nyāḥ tad gatāḥ tu asaṃkhyeyāḥ
ekīkāraḥ tābhiḥ nāḍī vedhaḥ utra tad phala kṛt
abhilaṣita nāḍi vāhaḥ mukhyābhiḥ cakṣuḥ ādi niṣṭhābhiḥ
lāṅgūla ākṛti balavat sva nāḍi saṃvoṣṭitām apara nāḍīm

original: AbhT_29.270b/. āsphoṭya siddhamapi bhuvi pātayati haṭhānmahāyogī // 270
analyzed: āsphoṭya siddham api bhuvi pātayati haṭhāt mahā yogī
para vedham samasteṣu cakreṣu advaitam āmṛśan

original: AbhT_29.271b/. paraṃ śivaṃ prakurvīta śivatāpattido guruḥ // 271
analyzed: param śivam prakurvīta śiva tā āpatti daḥ guruḥ
śrīmat vīrāvali kule tathā ca ittham nirūpitam

original: AbhT_29.272b/. abhedyaṃ sarvathā jñeyaṃ madhyaṃ jñātvā na lipyate // 272
analyzed: abhedyam sarvathā jñeyam madhyam jñātvā na lipyate

original: AbhT_29.273a/. tadvibhāgakrame siddhaḥ sa gururmocayet paśūn /
analyzed: tad vibhāga krame siddhaḥ sa guruḥ mocayet paśūn

original: AbhT_29.273b/. guroragre viśecchiṣyo vaktraṃ vaktre tu vedhayet // 273
analyzed: guroḥ agre viśet śiṣyaḥ vaktram vaktre tu vedhayet
rūpam rūpe tu viṣayaiḥ yāvat samarasībhavet
citte samarasībhūte dvayoḥ aunmanasī sthitiḥ
ubhayoḥ ca unmanaḥ gatyā tad kāle dīkṣitaḥ bhavet
śaśi bhāskara saṃyoge jīvaḥ tad maya tām vrajet

original: AbhT_29.276a/. atra brahmādayo devā muktaye mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: atra brahma ādayaḥ devāḥ muktaye mokṣa kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
nirudhya raśmi cakram svam bhoga mokṣau ubhau api

original: AbhT_29.277a/. grasate yadi taddīkṣā śārvīyaṃ parikīrtitā /
analyzed: grasate yadi tat dīkṣā śārvī iyam parikīrtitā

original: AbhT_29.277b/. sa eṣa mokṣaḥ kathito niḥspandaḥ sarvajantuṣu // 277
analyzed: saḥ eṣa mokṣaḥ kathitaḥ niḥspandaḥ sarva jantuṣu
bāhyam prāṇam bāhya gatam timira ākāra yogataḥ
niryātam romakūpaiḥ tu bhramantam sarva kāraṇaiḥ
madhyam nirlakṣyam āsthāya bhramayet visṛjet tatas
saṃghaṭṭa utpāṭa yogena vedhayet granthi pañcakam
saṃghaṭṭa vṛtti yugalam madhya dhāma vicintayet
na ātma vyoma bahis mantra deha saṃdhānam ācaret
dīkṣā iyam sarva jantūnām śiva tā āpatti dāyikā

original: AbhT_29.282a/. dīkṣānte dīpakān paktvā samastaiḥ sādhakaiḥ saha /
analyzed: dīkṣā ante dīpakān paktvā samastaiḥ sādhakaiḥ saha
caruḥ prāśyaḥ kula ācāryaiḥ mahāpātaka nāśanaḥ
iti śrī ratnamālāyām ūna adhika vidhiḥ tu yaḥ

original: AbhT_29.283b/. sa eva pātakaṃ tasya praśamo@yaṃ prakīrtitaḥ // 283
analyzed: saḥ eva pātakam tasya praśamaḥ yam prakīrtitaḥ

original: AbhT_29.284a/. pare@hani guroḥ kāryo yāgastena vinā yataḥ /
analyzed: parehani guroḥ kāryaḥ yāgaḥ tena vinā yatas

original: AbhT_29.284b/. na vidhiḥ pūrṇatāṃ yāti kuryādyatnena taṃ tataḥ // 284
analyzed: na vidhiḥ pūrṇa tām yāti kuryāt yatnena tam tatas
yena yena guruḥ tuṣyet tat tat asmai nivedayet

original: AbhT_29.286b/. avalokya paraṃ brahma tatpivedājñayā guroḥ // 286
analyzed: avalokya param brahma tat pivet ājñayā guroḥ

original: AbhT_29.287a/. tarpayitvā tu bhūtāni gurave vinivedayet /
analyzed: tarpayitvā tu bhūtāni gurave vinivedayet

original: AbhT_29.287b/. kṛtvā bhuvi guruṃ natvādāya saṃtarpya khecarīḥ // 287
analyzed: kṛtvā bhuvi gurum natvā ādāya saṃtarpya khecarīḥ

original: AbhT_29.288a/. svaṃ mantraṃ tacca vanditvā dūtīṃ gaṇaptiṃ gurūn /
analyzed: svam mantram tat ca vanditvā dūtīm gaṇaptim gurūn
kṣetrapam vīra saṅghātam guru ādi kramaśas tatas

original: AbhT_29.289a/. vīraspṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃ dravyaṃ pivennaivānyathā kvacit /
analyzed: vīra spṛṣṭam svayam dravyam pivet na eva anyathā kvacid
lobha moha mada krodha rāga māyā juṣaḥ ca ye

original: AbhT_29.290b/. taiḥ sākaṃ na ca kartavyametacchreyorthinātmani // 290
analyzed: taiḥ sākam na ca kartavyam etat śreyaḥ ūrthinā ātmani

original: AbhT_29.291a/. yāgādau yāgamadhye ca yāgānte gurupūjane /
analyzed: yāga ādau yāga madhye ca yāga ante guru pūjane

original: AbhT_29.291b/. naimittikeṣu prokteṣu śiṣyaḥ kuryādimaṃ vidhim // 291
analyzed: naimittikeṣu prokteṣu śiṣyaḥ kuryāt imam vidhim

original: AbhT_29.292a/. iti rahasyavidhiḥ paricarcito gurumukhānubhavaiḥ suparisphuṭaḥ /
analyzed: iti rahasya vidhiḥ paricarcitaḥ guru mukha anubhavaiḥ su parisphuṭaḥ
atha śrī tantrāloke triṃśam āhnikam
atha yathā ucita mantra kadambakam trika kula krama yogi nirūpyate
tāvat vimarśa an ārūḍha dhiyām kramāt

original: AbhT_30.2a/. pratibuddhā hi te mantrā vimarśaikasvabhāvakāḥ /
analyzed: pratibuddhāḥ hi te mantrāḥ vimarśa eka svabhāvakāḥ
svatantrasya eva cit dhāmnaḥ svātantryāt kartṛ tā mayāḥ
yam āviśanti ca ācāryam tam tādātmya nirūḍhitaḥ
svatantrīkurvate yānti karaṇāni api kartṛ tām

original: AbhT_30.4a/. ādhāraśaktau hrīṃ pṛthvīprabhṛtau tu catuṣṭaye /
analyzed: ādhāra śaktau hrīṃ pṛthvī prabhṛtau tu catuṣṭaye

original: AbhT_30.4b/. kṣlāṃ kṣvīṃ vaṃ kṣamiti prāhuḥ kramādvarṇacatuṣṭayam // 4
AbhT_30.5a/. haṃ nāle yaṃ tathā raṃ laṃ vaṃ dharmādicatuṣṭaye /
analyzed: haṃ nāle yaṃ tathā raṃ laṃ vaṃ dharma ādi catuṣṭaye

original: AbhT_30.5b/. ṛṃ ṝṃ ḷṃ ḷḷṃ catuṣke ca viparītakramādbhavet // 5
analyzed: ṛṃ ṝṃ ḷṃ ḷḷṃ catuṣke ca viparīta kramāt bhavet
om aum has trayam iti etat vidyā māyā kalā traye
anusvāra visargau ca vidyeśa īśvara tattvayoḥ
ka ādi bha antāḥ kesareṣu prāṇa uṣṭa svara saṃyutaḥ

original: AbhT_30.7b/. sabinduko daleṣvaṣṭasvatha svaṃ nāma dīpitam // 7
analyzed: sa bindukaḥ daleṣu aṣṭasu atha svam nāma dīpitam
śaktīnām navakasya syāt śa ṣa sā maṇḍala traye

original: AbhT_30.8b/. sabindukāḥ kṣmaṃ prete jraṃ śūlaśṛṅgeṣu kalpayet // 8
analyzed: sa bindukāḥ kṣmaṃ prete jraṃ śūla śṛṅgeṣu kalpayet
pṛthak āsana pūjāyām kramāt mantrāḥ ime smṛtāḥ

original: AbhT_30.9b/. saṃkṣepapūjane tu prāgādyamantyaṃ ca bījakam // 9
analyzed: saṃkṣepa pūjane tu prāc ādyam antyam ca bījakam
ādāya ādhāra śakti ādi śūla śṛṅga antam arcayet
sa ṣaṣṭha svara birndu adha candra ādyāḥ syuḥ nava ātmanaḥ
kṣepa ākrānti cit udbodha dīpana sthāpanāni atha
tad saṃvittiḥ tad āpattiḥ iti saṃjñā abhiśabditā
etāvatī mahāvyāptiḥ mūrti tvena atra kīrtitā
pariṇāmaḥ tad layaḥ ca namaskāraḥ saḥ ucyate
eṣa tri arṇa ujjhita udhastāt dīrghaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ svaraiḥ yutaḥ

original: AbhT_30.15b/. ṣaḍaṅgāni hṛdādīni vaktrāṇyasya ca kalpayet // 15
analyzed: ṣaṣ aṅgāni hṛd ādīni vaktrāṇi asya ca kalpayet
kṣaya ravala bījaiḥ tu dīptaiḥ bindu vibhūṣitaiḥ
eṣa
mātṛkā mālinī mantrau prāk eva samudāhṛtau

original: AbhT_30.18a/. oṃkāro@tha caturthyantā saṃjñā natiriti kramāt /
analyzed: oṃkārā utha caturthī antā saṃjñā natiḥ iti kramāt

original: AbhT_30.18b/. gaṇeśādiṣu mantraḥ syādbījaṃ yeṣu na coditam // 18
analyzed: gaṇeśa ādiṣu mantraḥ syāt bījam yeṣu na coditam
nāma ādi akṣaram ākāra bindu candra ādi dīpitam
sarveṣām eva bījānām tat caturdaśa ṣaṣṭha yuj
āmantritāni aghorī ādi tritayasya krama uditaiḥ

original: AbhT_30.20b/. bījairvisargiṇī māyā huṃ hakāro visargavān // 20
analyzed: bījaiḥ visargiṇī māyā hum hakāraḥ visargavān
punar devī trayasya api kramāt āmantraṇa trayam
dvitīyasmin pada ekāraḥ ekārasya iha ca smṛtaḥ
tatas śakti dvayā mantraḥ luptam tatra antyam akṣaram
he gni varṇau ubhau pañca svara yuktau parau pṛthak

original: AbhT_30.23a/. akārayuktāvastraṃ huṃ ha visargī punaḥ śaraḥ /
analyzed: akāra yuktā vastram hum ha visargī punar śaraḥ
tāreṇa saha vasu agni varṇa ardha arṇa dvaya adhikā
eṣā parāparā devyāḥ vidyā śrī trikaśāsane
pañca ṣaṣ pañca veda akṣi vahni netra akṣaram padam

original: AbhT_30.25a/. aghoryādau saptake syāt pivanyāḥ pariśiṣṭakam /
analyzed: aghorī ādau saptake syāt pivanyāḥ pariśiṣṭakam
devatā cakra vinyāsaḥ sa bahu tvāt na lipyate

original: AbhT_30.26b/. māyā visargiṇī huṃ phaṭ ceti mantro@parātmakaḥ // 26

analyzed: parāyāḥ tu ukta sat vyāptiḥ jīvaḥ saha caturdaśaḥ
sā aneka bhedā triśiraḥśāstre proktā maheśinā
svarūpataḥ vibhinnā api racanā aneka saṅkulā

original: AbhT_30.28b/. jīvaḥ prāṇastha evātra prāṇo vā jīvasaṃsthitaḥ // 28
analyzed: jīvaḥ prāṇa sthaḥ eva atra prāṇaḥ vā jīva saṃsthitaḥ
ādhāra ādheya bhāvena avinābhāva yogataḥ
haṃsam ca amṛta madhya stham kālarudra vibheditam
bhuvaneśa śiraḥ yuktam anaṅga dvaya yojitam
dīptāt dīptataram jñeyam ṣaṭcakra krama yojitam

original: AbhT_30.31a/. prāṇaṃ daṇḍāsanasthaṃ tu guhyaśaktīcchayā yutam /
analyzed: prāṇam daṇḍa āsana stham tu guhya śakti icchayā yutam
parā iyam vācikā uddiṣṭā mahā jñāna svarūpataḥ
sphuṭam bhairava hṛt jñānam idam tu ekākṣaram param

original: AbhT_30.32b/. amṛtaṃ kevalaṃ khasthaṃ yadvā sāvitrikāyutam // 32
analyzed: amṛtam kevalam kha stham yat vā sāvitrikā yutam
