śūnya dvaya samopetam parāyāḥ hṛdayam param

original: AbhT_30.33b/. yugmayāge prasiddhaṃ tu kartavyaṃ tattvavedibhiḥ // 33
analyzed: yugma yāge prasiddham tu kartavyam tattva vedibhiḥ
anye api eka akṣarāḥ ye tu eka vīra vidhānataḥ
guptāḥ guptatarāḥ te tu aṃga abhijana varjitāḥ
yaṣṭavyāḥ sādhaka indraiḥ tu kula sthāḥ siddhi dāyakāḥ
kula krama vidhānena sūkṣma vijñāna yogataḥ

original: AbhT_30.36a/. anuṣṭheyāḥ sadā devi striyā vā puruṣeṇa vā /
analyzed: anuṣṭheyāḥ sadā devi striyā vā puruṣeṇa vā
sakāraḥ dīrgha ṣaṭkena yukta uṅgāni ānanāni tu

original: AbhT_30.37a/. syāt sa eva paraṃ hrasvapañcasvarakhasaṃyutaḥ /
analyzed: syāt saḥ eva param hrasva pañca svara kha saṃyutaḥ
oṃkāraiḥ pañcabhiḥ mantraḥ vidyā aṅga hṛdayam bhavet
praṇavaḥ ca amṛte tejaḥ mālini svāhayā saha
ekādaśa akṣaram brahmaśiraḥ tat mālinīmate

original: AbhT_30.39a/. vedavedani hūṃ phaṭca praṇavādiyutā śikhā /
analyzed: veda vedani hūm phaṭ ca praṇava ādi yutā śikhā
vajriṇe vajradharāya svāhā iti oṃkāra pūrvakam
ekādaśa akṣaram varma puruṣṭutam iti smṛtam

original: AbhT_30.40b/. tāro dvijihvaḥ khaśarasvarayugjīva eva ca // 40
analyzed: tāraḥ dvi jihvaḥ kha śara svara yuj jīvaḥ eva ca
netram etat prakāśa ātma sarva sādhāraṇam smṛtam

original: AbhT_30.41b/. tāraḥ ślīṃ paśu huṃ phat ca tadastraṃ rasavarṇakam // 41
analyzed: tāraḥ ślīṃ paśu hum phat ca tat astram rasa varṇakam
la ra ṭa kṣa vayaiḥ dīrghaiḥ sama yuktaiḥ sa bindukaiḥ
indra ādayaḥ tad astrāṇi hrasvaiḥ viṣṇu prajāpatī
smṛtau turya dvitīyābhyām hrasvābhyām padma cakrake

original: AbhT_30.43b/. namaḥ svāhā tathā vauṣaṭ huṃ vaṣaṭ phaṭ ca jātayaḥ // 43
analyzed: namaḥ svāhā tathā vauṣaṭ hum vaṣaṭ phaṭ ca jātayaḥ

original: AbhT_30.44a/. aṅgeṣu kramaśaḥ ṣaṭsu karmasvatha tadātmikāḥ /
analyzed: aṅgeṣu kramaśas ṣaṭsu karmasu atha tad ātmikāḥ

original: AbhT_30.44b/. jape home tathāpyāye samuccāṭe@tha śāntike // 44
analyzed: jape home tathā āpyāye samuccāṭetha śāntike
abhicāre ca mantrāṇām namaskāra ādi jātayaḥ
akṣi ṣaṣ muni vargebhyaḥ dvitīyāḥ saha bindunā

original: AbhT_30.46a/. yonyarṇena ca mātṝṇāṃ sadmāvaḥ kālakarṣiṇī /
analyzed: yoni arṇena ca mātṝṇām sadmāvaḥ kālakarṣiṇī

original: AbhT_30.46b/. ādyojjhito vāpyantena varjito vātha saṃmataḥ // 46
analyzed: ādya ujjhitaḥ vā api antena varjitaḥ vā atha saṃmataḥ
ati dīptaḥ tu vāma aṃghriḥ bhūṣitaḥ mūrdhni bindunā
dakṣa ja anugataḥ ca ayam sarva mātṛ gaṇa arcitaḥ

original: AbhT_30.48b/. anena prāṇitāḥ sarve dadate vāñchitaṃ phalam // 48
analyzed: anena prāṇitāḥ sarve dadate vāñchitam phalam

original: AbhT_30.49a/. sadbhāvaḥ paramo hyeṣa mātṝṇāṃ bhairavasya ca /
analyzed: sadbhāvaḥ paramaḥ hi eṣa mātṝṇām bhairavasya ca
tasmāt enam japet mantrī yaḥ icchet siddhim uttamām
rudra śakti samāveśaḥ nityam atra pratiṣṭhitaḥ
yasmāt eṣā parā śaktiḥ bhedena anyena kīrtitā

original: AbhT_30.51a/. yāvatyaḥ siddhayastantre tāḥ sarvāḥ kurute tviyam /
analyzed: yāvatyaḥ siddhayaḥ tantre tāḥ sarvāḥ kurute tu iyam
aṅga vaktrāṇi ca api asyāḥ prāgvat svara niyogataḥ
daṇḍaḥ jīvaḥ triśūlam ca dakṣa aṅguli aparaḥ tanau
nābhi kaṇṭhau marut rudrau visargaḥ sa triśūlakaḥ
sarva yogini cakrāṇām adhipaḥ yam udāhṛtaḥ
asya api uccāraṇāt eva saṃvittiḥ syāt purā uditā
mahācaṇḍā iti tu iti aṣṭa varṇakam
nava arṇā iyam guptatarā sadbhāvaḥ kālakarṣiṇī
śrī ḍāmare mahā yāge parātparatara uditā

original: AbhT_30.56b/. śatāvartanayā hyasyā jāyate mūrdhni vedanā // 56
analyzed: śata āvartanayā hi asyāḥ jāyate mūrdhni vedanā
evam pratyayam ālocya mṛtyu jit dhyānam āśrayet
na enām samuccaret devi yaḥ icchet dīrgha jīvitam
dvis daṇḍa agnī śūla nabhaḥprāṇāḥ chettṛ analau tathā
kūṭa agnī sa visargāḥ ca pañca api ete tha pañcasu
vyomasu iti śivena uktam tantrasadbhāvaśāsane

original: AbhT_30.59b/. chedinī kṣurikeyaṃ syādyayā yojayate pare // 59
analyzed: chedinī kṣurikā iyam syāt yayā yojayate pare
bindu indu analakūṭa agni marut ṣaṣṭha svaraiḥ yutam
āpādatala mūrdha antam smaret astram idam jvalat

original: AbhT_30.61a/. kuñcanaṃ cāṅgulīnāṃ tu kartavyaṃ codanaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: kuñcanam ca aṅgulīnām tu kartavyam codanam tatas
jānu ādi para cakra antam cakrāt cakram tu kuñcayet

original: AbhT_30.62a/. kathitaṃ sarahasyaṃ tu sadyonirvāṇakaṃ param /
analyzed: kathitam sa rahasyam tu sadyonirvāṇakam param
atha ucyate brahma vidyā sadyas pratyaya dāyinī
śivaḥ śrī bhūtirājaḥ yām asmabhyam pratyapādayat
sarveṣām eva bhūtānām maraṇe samupasthite

original: AbhT_30.64a/. yayā paṭhitayotkramya jīvo yāti nirañjanam /
analyzed: yayā paṭhitayā utkramya jīvaḥ yāti nirañjanam

original: AbhT_30.64b/. yā jñānino@pi saṃpūrṇakṛtyasyāpi śrutā satī // 64
analyzed: yā jñāninaḥ api saṃpūrṇa kṛtyasya api śrutā satī
yām ākarṇya mahā moha vivaśaḥ api kramāt gataḥ
prabodham vaktṛ sāṃmukhyam abhyeti rabhasāt svayam
parama padāt tvam iha agāḥ sanātanaḥ tvam jahīhi dehāntam

original: AbhT_30.67a/. pādāṅguṣṭhādi vibho nibandhanaṃ bandhanaṃ hyugram /
analyzed: pādāṅguṣṭha ādi vibho nibandhanam bandhanam hi ugram
āryā vākyam idam pūrvam bhuvana ākhyaiḥ padaiḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_30.68a/. gulphānte jānugataṃ jatrusthaṃ bandhanaṃ tathā meḍhre /
analyzed: gulpha ante jānu gatam jatru stham bandhanam tathā meḍhre
jahihi puram agrya madhyam hṛd padmāt tvam samuttiṣṭha
etāvadbhiḥ padaiḥ etat āryā vākyam dvitīyakam

original: AbhT_30.69b/. haṃsa hayagrīva vibho sadāśivastvaṃ paro@si jīvākhyaḥ // 69
analyzed: haṃsa hayagrīva vibho sadāśivaḥ tvam parosi jīva ākhyaḥ
ravi soma vahni saṅgha dṛ bindu dehaḥ ha ha ha samutkrāma
tṛtīyam āryā vākyam prāc saṃkhyaiḥ eka adhikaiḥ padaiḥ
haṃsa mahā mantra mayaḥ sanātanaḥ tvam śubha aśubha apekṣī
kamala ubhaya viniviṣṭaḥ prabodham āyāhi devatā dā iha
āryā vākyam idam sārdham rudra saṃkhya pada īritam

original: AbhT_30.73a/. niḥśvāse tvapaśabdasya sthāne@styupa iti dhvaniḥ /
analyzed: niḥśvāse tu apa śabdasya iti dhvaniḥ
ajñānāt tvam baddhaḥ prabodhita uttiṣṭha devāde
etat pañcamam ārya ardha vākyam syāt saptabhiḥ padaiḥ
vraja tālusāhvaya antam hi auḍambara ghaṭṭitam mahā dvāram

original: AbhT_30.75a/. prāpya prayāhi haṃho haṃho vā vāmadevapadam /
analyzed: prāpya prayāhi haṃho haṃho vā vāmadeva padam
āryyā vākyam idam ṣaṣṭham syāt caturdaśabhiḥ padaiḥ
granthīśvara paramātman śānta mahātālu randhram āsādya

original: AbhT_30.76b/. utkrama he deheśvara nirañjanaṃ śivapadaṃ prayāhyāśu // 76
analyzed: utkrama he deheśvara nirañjanam śiva padam prayāhi āśu
āryāvākyam saptamam syāt tat caturdaśabhiḥ padaiḥ
prabhañjanaḥ tvam iti evam pāṭhaḥ niḥśvāsa śāsane
ākramya madhya mārgam prāṇa apānau samāhṛtya

original: AbhT_30.78b/. dharmādharmau tyaktvā nārāyaṇa yāhi śāntāntam // 78
analyzed: dharma adharmau tyaktvā nārāyaṇa yāhi śānta antam
āryā vākyam idam proktam aṣṭamam navabhiḥ padaiḥ

original: AbhT_30.79b/. he brahman he viṣṇo he rudra śivo@si vāsudevastvam // 79
analyzed: he brahman he viṣṇo he rudra śivaḥ asi vāsudevaḥ tvam
agnīṣoma sanātana mṛd piṇḍam jahihi he mahākāśa
etat bhuvana saṃkhyātaiḥ āryyā vākyam prakīrtitam
sanātma tri piṇḍam iti mahā kośam iti sthitam
aṅguṣṭha mātram amalam āvaraṇam jahihi he mahā sūkṣma
āryyā vākyam idam ṣaḍbhiḥ padaiḥ daśamam ucyate

original: AbhT_30.83a/. alaṃ dviriti sūkṣmaṃ cetyevaṃ śrīmukuṭottare /
analyzed: alam dvis iti sūkṣmam ca iti evam śrī mukuṭottare
puruṣaḥ tvam prakṛti mayaiḥ baddhaḥ uhaṅkāra tantunā bandhaiḥ
abhava abhava nitya udita paramātman tyaja sa rāgam adhvānam
etat trayodaśa padam syāt āryā vākyam uttamam
hrīṃ hūm mantra śarīram avilambam āśu tvam ehi dehāntam
ārya ardha vākyam etat syāt dvādaśam ṣaṭpadam param

original: AbhT_30.86a/. tadidaṃ guṇabhūtamayaṃ tyaja sva ṣoṭkośikaṃ piṇḍam /
analyzed: tat idam guṇa bhūta mayam tyaja sva ṣoṭkośikam piṇḍam
syāt trayodaśa māryā ardham padaiḥ saptabhiḥ īdṛśam

original: AbhT_30.87a/. mā dehaṃ bhūtamayaṃ pragṛhyatāṃ śāśvataṃ mahādeham /
analyzed: mā deham bhūta mayam pragṛhyatām śāśvatam mahā deham
ārya ardha vākyam tāvadbhiḥ padaiḥ etat caturdaśam

original: AbhT_30.88a/. maṇḍalamamalamanantaṃ tridhā sthitaṃ gaccha bhittvaitat /
analyzed: maṇḍalam amalam anantam tridhā sthitam gaccha bhittvā etat
ārya ardha vākyam aṣṭābhiḥ padaiḥ pañcadaśam tu idam
sakalā iyam brahma vidyā syāt pañcadaśabhiḥ sphuṭaiḥ
vākyaiḥ pañca akṣaraiḥ tu asyāḥ niṣkalā parikīrtyate
prativākyam yayā ādi anta yojitā paripaṭhyate

original: AbhT_30.90b/. tāro māyā vedakalo mātṛtāro navātmakaḥ // 90

analyzed: iti pañca akṣarāṇi syuḥ prokta vyāpti anusārataḥ
etena śakti uccāra stha bījena ālabhyate paśuḥ
kṛta dīkṣā vidhiḥ pūrvam brahma ghnaḥ api viśuddhi ati

original: AbhT_30.93b/. tāraḥ śamarayaiḥ piṇḍo natiśca caturarṇakam // 93
analyzed: tāraḥ śama rayaiḥ piṇḍaḥ natiḥ ca catur arṇakam

original: AbhT_30.94a/. śākinīstobhanaṃ marma hṛdayaṃ jīvitaṃ tvidam /
analyzed: śākinīstobhanam marma hṛdayam jīvitam tu idam
an a c ka nāsā adhas vaktra candra khaṇḍaiḥ ca maṇḍitam
vaśam āyānti śākinyaḥ sthānam etena ced dahet
visarjayet tāḥ prathamam anyathā chidrayanti tāḥ

original: AbhT_30.97b/. hrīṃ klīṃ vleṃ kleṃ ebhirvarṇairdvādaśasvarabhūṣitaiḥ // 97
analyzed: hrīṃ   vleṃ   ebhiḥ varṇaiḥ dvādaśa svara bhūṣitaiḥ

original: AbhT_30.98a/. priyamelāpanaṃ nāma hṛdayaṃ sampuṭaṃ japet /
analyzed: japet
pratyekam athavā dvābhyām sarvaiḥ vā vidhiḥ uttamaḥ

original: AbhT_30.99b/. ya uktaḥ śambhunāthena sa mayā darśitaḥ kramāt // 99
analyzed: yaḥ uktaḥ śambhunāthena sa mayā darśitaḥ kramāt

original: AbhT_30.100a/. atha vittavihīnānāṃ prapannānāṃ ca tattvataḥ /
analyzed: atha vitta vihīnānām prapannānām ca tattvataḥ
deśa kāla ādi doṣeṇa na tathā adhyavasāyinām
prakartavyā yathā dīkṣā śrī santati āgama uditā
kathyate hāṭaka īśāna pātāla adhipa coditā

original: AbhT_30.102a/. śrīnātha ārya bhagavannetattritayaṃ hi kanda ādhāre /
analyzed: śrī nāthaḥ ārya bhagavan etat tritayam hi kande ādhāre

original: AbhT_30.102b/. varuṇo macchando bhagavatta iti trayamidaṃ hṛdaye // 102
analyzed: varuṇaḥ mat chandaḥ bhagavattaḥ iti trayam idam hṛdaye
dharma ādi varga saṃjñāḥ catvāraḥ kaṇṭha deśa gāḥ pūjyāḥ
hrīṃ śrīṃ pūrvāḥ sarve sambodha juṣaḥ ca pāda śabda antāḥ
mūrdha tale vidyā trayam uktam bhāvi atha manaḥ abhiyogena
kusumaiḥ ānandaiḥ vā bhāvanayā vā api kevalayā

original: AbhT_30.105a/. guruṇā tattvavidā kila śiṣyo yadi mokṣamātrakṛtahṛdayaḥ /
analyzed: guruṇā tattva vidā kila śiṣyaḥ yadi mokṣa mātra kṛta hṛdayaḥ
mokṣa eka dāna caturā dīkṣā sā iyam para upaniṣad uktā
etad dīkṣā dīkṣitaḥ etad vidyā trayam smaran hṛdaye

original: AbhT_30.106b/. bāhyārcādi vinaiva hi vrajati paraṃ dhāma dehānte // 106
analyzed: bāhya arcā ādi vinā eva hi vrajati param dhāma dehānte
praṇavaḥ māyā binduḥ varṇa trayam āditaḥ kuryāt
pada pañcakasya saṃbodhana yuktasya agni dayitā ante
siddhasādhani tat pūrvam śabdabrahma svarūpiṇi
samasta bandha śabdena sahitam ca nikṛntani
bodhani śiva sadbhāva janani āmantritam ca tat
anuttara icche gha antaḥ ca sa trayodaśa su svaraḥ
asya varṇa trayasya ante tu antaḥsthānām catuṣṭayam
mahā hāṭaka śabda ādyam īśvarā iti arṇa saptakam
āmantritam kṣamasva iti tri arṇam pāpa anta kāriṇi
ṣaṣ arṇam pāpa śabda ādi vimoha nipadam tatas

original: AbhT_30.113b/. pāpaṃ hana dhuna dvirdvirdaśārṇaṃ padamīdṛśam // 113
analyzed: pāpam hana dhuna dvis dvis daśa arṇam padam īdṛśam
tatas ekākṣaram yat tat visarga brahma kīrtitam
saha ekībhāvataḥ paṭhet

original: AbhT_30.116a/. māyārṇañca pare brahme caturvidye padatrayam /
analyzed: pare brahme catur vidye pada trayam
aṣṭa arṇam atha pañca arṇam yogadhāriṇi saṃjñitam
ātma antarātma paramātma rūpam ca pada trayam
ekāra antam bodhana stham daśa arṇam parikīrtitam
rudra śakti iti veda arṇam syāt rudra dayitā itha me
pāpam daha daha iti eṣā dvādaśa arṇā catuṣpadī

original: AbhT_30.119a/. saumye sadāśive yugmaṃ ṣaṭkaṃ bindviṣusāvahā /

analyzed: sārdha varṇa catuṣkam tat iti eṣā samaya apahā
vidyā sārdha arṇa kha śara saṃkhyā sā pārameśvarī
yaḥ sākṣāt abhajat śrīmān śrīkaṇṭhaḥ mānuṣīm tanum
atra vīryam purā eva uktam sarvatra anusaret guruḥ

original: AbhT_30.122b/. nahi tatkiṃcanāpyasti yatpurā na nirūpitam // 122
analyzed: nahi tat kiṃcana api asti yat purā na nirūpitam

original: AbhT_30.123a/. niṣphalā punaruktistu nāsmabhyaṃ jātu rocate /
analyzed: niṣphalā punaruktiḥ tu na asmabhyam jātu rocate
iti evam mantra vidyā ādi svarūpam upavarṇitam
atha śrī tantrāloke ekatriṃśam āhnikam
atha maṇḍala sadbhāvaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa abhidhīyate
sādhayitvā diśam pūrvām sūtram āsphālayet samam
tat ardhayitvā madhya prāc pratīcīṣu aṅkayet punar
tatas api ardha tad ardha ardha mānataḥ pūrva paścimau
aṅkayet tāvatā dadyāt sūtreṇa bhrama yugmakam
matsya sandhi dvayam tu evam dakṣiṇa uttarayoḥ bhavet
tad madhye pātayet sūtram dakṣiṇa uttara siddhaye
yadi vā prāc parāc tulya sūtreṇa uttara dakṣiṇe
aṅkayet aparāt aṅkāt pūrvāt api tathā eva te
matsya madhye kṣipet sūtram āyatam dakṣiṇa uttare
mata kṣetra ardha mānena madhyāt dikṣu aṅkayet tatas
sūtrābhyām diś dvaya utthābhyām matsyaḥ syāt pratikoṇa gaḥ
matsyeṣu vedāḥ sūtrāṇi iti evam syāt caturasrakam

original: AbhT_31.7b/. ekasmātprabhṛti proktaṃ śatāntaṃ maṇḍalaṃ yataḥ // 7
analyzed: ekasmāt prabhṛti proktam śata antam maṇḍalam yatas

original: AbhT_31.8a/. siddhātantre maṇḍalānāṃ śataṃ tatpīṭha ucyate /
analyzed: siddhātantre maṇḍalānām śatam tat pīṭhaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_31.8b/. yattanmadhyagataṃ mukhyaṃ maṇḍalānāṃ trayaṃ smṛtam // 8
analyzed: yat tat madhya gatam mukhyam maṇḍalānām trayam smṛtam
madhyaśūlam tritriśūlam navaśūlam iti sphuṭam
tatra śūla vidhānam yat uktam bhedaiḥ anantakaiḥ
tad yoni maṇḍalam brūmaḥ sadbhāva krama darśitam
veda āśrite catur haste tri bhāgam sarvatas tyajet

original: AbhT_31.11a/. bhāgaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ sarvaṃ tattatkṣetraṃ vibhājayet /
analyzed: bhāgaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ sarvam tat tat kṣetram vibhājayet

original: AbhT_31.12a/. kṛtvāvadhiṃ tato lakṣyaṃ caturthaṃ sūtramāditaḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā avadhim tatas lakṣyam caturtham sūtram āditas
tatas tiryak vrajet sūtram caturtham tad anantare
tayoḥ lagnam brahmasūtrāt tṛtīye marmaṇi sthitam
bhavet
brahmasūtrāt dvitīyasmin haste marmaṇi niścalam
kṛtvā pūrṇa indu yugalam vartayeta vicakṣaṇaḥ
brahmasūtra gatāt ṣaṣṭhāt tiryagbhāgāt tṛtīyake
kṛtvā ardha koṣṭhake sūtram pūrṇa candra agra lambitam
bhramayet unmukham khaṇḍa candra yuj vahni bhāga gam
tiryak bhāga dvayam tyaktvā khaṇḍendoḥ paścimāt tatas

original: AbhT_31.17b/. koṇaṃ yāvattathā syācca kuryāt khaṇḍaṃ bhramadvayam // 17
analyzed: koṇam yāvat tathā syāt ca kuryāt khaṇḍam bhrama dvayam
su tīkṣṇa kuṭila agram tat ekam śṛṅgam prajāyate

original: AbhT_31.18b/. dvitīyasminnapi proktaḥ śṛṅga eṣa vidhiḥ sphuṭaḥ // 18
analyzed: dvitīyasmin api proktaḥ śṛṅge eṣa vidhiḥ sphuṭaḥ
kartavye tṛtīye ūrdhva koṣṭhake
caturtha ardhe ca candrārdha dvayam antar mukham bhavet
tat ca pūrṇa indum ekam prāc vartitam prāpnuyāt yathā
anyonya granthi yogena baddha āra tvam prajāyate
evam khaṇḍa indu dvaya vartanāt

original: AbhT_31.21b/. madhyābhyāṃ gaṇḍikā śliṣṭā parābhyāmagrato nayet // 21
analyzed: madhyābhyām gaṇḍikā śliṣṭā parābhyām agratas nayet

original: AbhT_31.22a/. sūtraṃ pārśvadvaye yena tīkṣṇaṃ syānmadhyaśṛṅgagam /
analyzed: sūtram pārśva dvaye yena tīkṣṇam syāt madhya śṛṅga gam
pārśva dvaya adhare paścāt brahmasūtram dvitīyakam
avadhānena saṃgrāhyam ācāryeṇa ūha vedinā
bhavet paścānmukhaḥ mantrī tasmin ca brahmasūtrake

original: AbhT_31.24a/. madhyaśṛṅgaṃ varjayitvā sarvaḥ pūrvodito vidhiḥ /
analyzed: madhya śṛṅgam varjayitvā sarvaḥ pūrva uditaḥ vidhiḥ
tatas yat unmukham khaṇḍa candra yugmam purā uditam
tatas dvayena kartavyā gaṇḍikā antar su saṃgatā
adhas bhāga vivṛddhyā asya padmam vṛtta catuṣṭayam

original: AbhT_31.26b/. tataścakraṃ ṣoḍaśāraṃ dvādaśāraṃ dvidhātha tat // 26
analyzed: tatas cakram ṣoḍaśa aram dvādaśa aram dvidhā atha tat

original: AbhT_31.27a/. madhye kuleśvarīsthānaṃ vyoma vā tilakaṃ ca vā /
analyzed: madhye kuleśvarī sthānam vyoma vā tilakam ca vā

original: AbhT_31.27b/. padmaṃ vātha ṣaḍaraṃ vā viyaddvādaśakaṃ ca vā // 27
analyzed: padmam vā atha ṣaṣ aram vā viyat dvādaśakam ca vā
sapta āre śliṣṭa mātreṇa madhyatas

original: AbhT_31.28b/. padmānāmatha cakrāṇāṃ vyomnāṃ vā saptakaṃ bhavet // 28
analyzed: padmānām atha cakrāṇām vyomnām vā saptakam bhavet
miśritam vā atha saṃkīrṇam samāsa vyāsa bhedataḥ

original: AbhT_31.29b/. tataḥ kṣetrārdhamānena kṣetraṃ tatrādhikaṃ kṣipet // 29
analyzed: tatas kṣetra ardha mānena kṣetram tatra adhikam kṣipet

original: AbhT_31.30a/. tatra daṇḍaḥ smṛto bhāgaḥ ṣaḍarāmalasārakaḥ /
analyzed: tatra daṇḍaḥ smṛtaḥ bhāgaḥ ṣaḍarā amalasārakaḥ

original: AbhT_31.31a/. yā sā kuṇḍalinī devī taraṅgākhyā mahormiṇī /
analyzed: yā sā kuṇḍalinī devī taraṅga ākhyā mahā ūrmiṇī

original: AbhT_31.31b/. sā ṣaḍaśreṇa kandākhye sthitā ṣaḍdevatātmikā // 31
analyzed: sā ṣaṣ aśreṇa kanda ākhye sthitā ṣaṣ devatā ātmikā
aṣṭa bhāgaiḥ ca vistīrṇaḥ dīrghaḥ ca api tad ardhataḥ

original: AbhT_31.32b/. tato dvārāṇi kāryāṇi citravartanayā kramāt // 32
analyzed: tatas dvārāṇi kāryāṇi citra vartanayā kramāt
veda āśrāyata rūpāṇi yat iva vṛtta mātrataḥ
spaṣṭa śṛṅgam atho kuryāt yat iva vaiparītyataḥ

original: AbhT_31.34a/. unmukhaṃ candrayugmaṃ vā bhaṅktvā kuryāccatuṣṭayam /
analyzed: unmukham candra yugmam vā bhaṅktvā kuryāt catuṣṭayam

original: AbhT_31.34b/. kuṭilo madhyataḥ spaṣṭo@dhomukhaḥ pārśvagaḥ sthitaḥ // 34
analyzed: kuṭilaḥ madhyatas spaṣṭaḥ adhomukhaḥ pārśva gaḥ sthitaḥ
uttāna ūrdhva samaḥ pūrṇaḥ śliṣṭaḥ granthi gataḥ tathā
candrasya ittham dvādaśadhā vartanā bhrama bhedinī
antar bahis mukha tvena sā punar dvividhā matā
tad bhedāt maṇḍalānām syāt asaṅkhyaḥ bheda vistaraḥ
śobhā upaśobhā saṃbhedāt guṇa rekhā vikalpataḥ
bhāva abhāva vikalpena maṇḍalānām ananta tā
tatas rajāṃsi deyāni yathāśobha anusārataḥ

original: AbhT_31.39b/. sindūraṃ rājavartaṃ ca khaṭikā ca sitottamā // 39
analyzed: sindūram rājavartam ca khaṭikā ca sitottamā
uttamāni rajāṃsi iha devatā traya yogataḥ

original: AbhT_31.40b/. parā candrasamaprakhyā raktā devī parāparā // 40
analyzed: parā candra sama prakhyā raktā devī parāparā

original: AbhT_31.41a/. aparā sā parā kālī bhīṣaṇā caṇḍayoginī /
analyzed: aparā sā parā kālī bhīṣaṇā caṇḍayoginī

original: AbhT_31.41b/. dṛṣṭvaitanmaṇḍalaṃ devyaḥ sarvā nṛtyanti sarvadā // 41
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā etat maṇḍalam devyaḥ sarvāḥ nṛtyanti sarvadā
anarcite ipi adīkṣeṇa dṛṣṭe dīkṣyeta mātṛbhiḥ
kiṃvā ati bahunā uktena tri triśūla āra saptakāḥ
śūlayāgāḥ ṣaṭ sahasrāṇi evam sārdha śata dvayam

original: AbhT_31.43b/. yā sā devī parā śaktiḥ prāṇavāhā vyavasthitā // 43
analyzed: yā sā devī parā śaktiḥ prāṇavāhā vyavasthitā

original: AbhT_31.44a/. viśvāntaḥ kuṇḍalākārā sā sākṣādatra vartitā /
analyzed: viśva antar kuṇḍala ākārā sā sākṣāt atra vartitā
tattvāni tattva devyaḥ ca viśvam asmin pratiṣṭhitam

original: AbhT_31.45a/. atrordhve tantumātreṇa tisraḥ śūlāragāḥ sthitāḥ /
analyzed: atra ūrdhve tantu mātreṇa tisraḥ śūla āragāḥ sthitāḥ
āsana tvena ca icchā ādyāḥ bhoga mokṣa prasādhikāḥ
tāḥ tu mokṣa eka kāmasya śūla ārā viddha madhyakāḥ
tasmāt enam mahā yāgam mahā vibhava vistaraiḥ
pūjayet bhūti kāmaḥ vā mokṣa kāmaḥ api vā budhaḥ
asya darśana mātreṇa bhūta vetāla guhyakāḥ

original: AbhT_31.48a/. palāyante daśa diśaḥ śivaḥ sākṣātprasīdati /
analyzed: palāyante daśa diśaḥ śivaḥ sākṣāt prasīdati
manda śakti bala āviddhaḥ upi etad maṇḍala pūjanāt
samaśnute

original: AbhT_31.49b/. yatprāpya heyopādeyaṃ svayameva vicārya saḥ // 49
analyzed: yat prāpya heya upādeyam svayam eva vicārya saḥ
dehānte syāt bhairava ātmā siddhi kāmaḥ atha siddhi ati

original: AbhT_31.50b/. maṇḍalasyāsya yo vyāptiṃ devatānyāsameva ca // 50
analyzed: maṇḍalasya asya yaḥ vyāptim devatā nyāsam eva ca

original: AbhT_31.51a/. vartanāṃ ca vijānāti sa gurustrikaśāsane /
analyzed: vartanām ca vijānāti sa guruḥ trika śāsane

original: AbhT_31.51b/. tasya pādarajo mūrdhni dhāryaṃ śivasamīhinā // 51
analyzed: tasya pāda rajaḥ mūrdhni dhāryam śiva samīhinā

original: AbhT_31.52a/. atra sṛṣṭisthitidhvaṃsān kramāt trīnapi pūjayet /
analyzed: atra sṛṣṭi sthiti dhvaṃsān kramāt trīn api pūjayet

original: AbhT_31.52b/. turyaṃ tu madhyato yadvā sarveṣu paripūrakam // 52
analyzed: turyam tu madhyatas yat vā sarveṣu paripūrakam

original: AbhT_31.53a/. catustriśūlaṃ vā guptadaṇḍaṃ yāgaṃ samācaret /
analyzed: catur triśūlam vā gupta daṇḍam yāgam samācaret

original: AbhT_31.53b/. tatra tat pūjayetsamyak sphuṭaṃ kramacatuṣṭayam // 53
analyzed: tatra tat pūjayet samyak sphuṭam krama catuṣṭayam
iti etat kathitam gupte ṣaṣ ardha hṛdaye pare

original: AbhT_31.55a/. agrataḥ sūtrayitvā tu maṇḍalaṃ sarvakāmadam /
analyzed: agratas sūtrayitvā tu maṇḍalam sarva kāma dam
mahā śūla samopetam padma cakra ādi bhūṣitam

original: AbhT_31.56a/. dvāre dvāre likhecchūlaṃ varjayitvā tu paścimam /
analyzed: dvāre dvāre likhet śūlam varjayitvā tu paścimam

original: AbhT_31.56b/. koṇeṣvapica vā kāryaṃ mahāśūlaṃ drumānvitam // 56
analyzed: koṇeṣu api ca vā kāryam mahā śūlam druma anvitam

original: AbhT_31.57a/. amṛtāmbhobhavārīṇāṃ śūlāgre tu trikaṃ trikam /
AbhT_31.57b/. śūla itthaṃ prakartavyamaṣṭadhā tat tridhāpivā // 57
analyzed: śūle ittham prakartavyam aṣṭadhā tat tridhā api vā

original: AbhT_31.58a/. evaṃ saṃsūcitaṃ divyaṃ khecarīṇāṃ puraṃ tviti /
analyzed: evam saṃsūcitam divyam khecarīṇām puram tu iti
sthāna antare api kathitam śrī siddhātantraśāsane

original: AbhT_31.59a/. kajaṃ madhye tadardhena śūlaśṛṅgāṇi tāni tu /
analyzed: kajam madhye tad ardhena śūla śṛṅgāṇi tāni tu

original: AbhT_31.59b/. śūlāṅkaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kalpyaṃ kamalāṅkaṃ ca pūraṇe // 59
analyzed: śūla aṅkam maṇḍalam kalpyam kamala aṅkam ca pūraṇe
atha śūla abja vinyāsaḥ śrī pūrve triśiromate
yathā uktaḥ sāra śāstre ca tantra sadbhāva guhyayoḥ
tathā pradarśyate spaṣṭam yadi api ukta kramāt gataḥ

original: AbhT_31.62a/. vedāśrite trihaste prāk pūrvamardha vibhājayet /
analyzed: veda āśrite tri haste prāk pūrvam ardha vibhājayet
hasta ardham sarvatas tyaktvā pūrva udak yāmya diś gatam
tri aṅgulaiḥ koṣṭhakaiḥ ūrdhvaiḥ tiryak ca aṣṭadvidha ātmakaiḥ

original: AbhT_31.63b/. dvau dvau bhāgau parityajya punardakṣiṇasaumyagau // 63
analyzed: dvau dvau bhāgau parityajya punar dakṣiṇa saumya gau
brahmaṇaḥ pārśvayoḥ jīvāt caturthāt pūrvatas tathā
tayoḥ antar tṛtīye tu dakṣiṇa uttara pārśvayoḥ
jīve khaṇḍa indu yugalam kuryāt antar bhramāt budhaḥ
tayoḥ apara marma stham khaṇḍendu dvaya koṭi gam

original: AbhT_31.66b/. bahirmukhaṃ bhramaṃ kuryāt khaṇḍacandradvayaṃ dvayam // 66
analyzed: kuryāt
tadvat brahmaṇi kurvīta bhāga bhāga ardha saṃmitam
tatas dvitīya bhāga ante brahmaṇaḥ pārśvayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: AbhT_31.68a/. dve rekhe pūrvage neye bhāgatryaṃśaśame budhaiḥ /
analyzed: dve rekhe pūrva ge neye bhāga tri aṃśa śame budhaiḥ
sūtra dvayam prakurvīta madhya śṛṅga prasiddhaye
tad agra pārśvayoḥ jīvāt sūtram ekāntare dhṛtam
tayoḥ eva aparāt jīvāt prathama ardha indu koṇataḥ
tadvat eva nayet sūtram śṛṅga dvitaya siddhaye
kṣetra ardhe ca apare daṇḍaḥ dvi karaḥ channa pañcakaḥ
ṣaṣ vistṛtam catur dīrgham tad adhas mala sārakam

original: AbhT_31.72b/. vedāṅgulaṃ ca tadadho mūlaṃ tīkṣṇāgramiṣyate // 72
analyzed: veda aṅgulam ca tad adhas mūlam tīkṣṇa agram iṣyate
ādi kṣetrasya kurvīta dikṣu dvāra catuṣṭayam

original: AbhT_31.73b/. hastāyāmaṃ tadardhaṃ vā vistārādapi tatsamam // 73
analyzed: hasta āyāmam tad ardham vā vistārāt api tad samam

original: AbhT_31.74a/. dviguṇaṃ bāhyataḥ kuryāttataḥ padmaṃ yathā śṛṇu /
analyzed: dviguṇam bāhyatas kuryāt tatas padmam yathā śṛṇu
ekaika bhāga mānāni kuryāt vṛttāni veda vat
dikṣu aṣṭau punar api aṣṭau jīva sūtrāṇi ṣoḍaśa
dvayoḥ dvayoḥ punar madhye tad saṃkhyātāni pātayet
eṣām tṛtīya vṛtta stham pārśva jīva samam bhramam
etad antam prakurvīta tatas jīva agram ānayet
yatra eva kutracid saṅgaḥ tad saṃbandhe sthirīkṛte

original: AbhT_31.77b/. tatra kṛtvā nayenmantrī patrāgrāṇāṃ prasiddhaye // 77
analyzed: tatra kṛtvā nayet mantrī pattra agrāṇām prasiddhaye
ekaikasmin dale kuryāt kesarāṇām trayam trayam
dviguṇa aṣṭa aṅgulam kāryam tadvat śṛṅgaka ja trayam
karṇikā pīta varṇena mūla madhya agra bhedataḥ

original: AbhT_31.79b/. sitaṃ raktaṃ tathā pītaṃ kāryaṃ kesarajālakam // 79
analyzed: sitam raktam tathā pītam kāryam kesara jālakam
dalāni śukla varṇāni prativāraṇayā saha
pīṭham tadvat catuṣkoṇam karṇikā ardha samam bahis
sita rakta pīta kṛṣṇaiḥ tad pādān vahnitaḥ kramāt
caturbhiḥ api śṛṅgāṇi tribhiḥ maṇḍalam iṣyate
daṇḍaḥ syāt nīla raktena pītam āmalasārakam

original: AbhT_31.82b/. raktaṃ śūlaṃ prakurvīta yattatpūrvaṃ prakalpitam // 82
analyzed: raktam śūlam prakurvīta yat tat pūrvam prakalpitam
paścāt dvārasya pūrveṇa tyaktvā aṅgula catuṣṭayam

original: AbhT_31.83b/. dvāraṃ vedāśri vṛttaṃ vā saṃkīrṇaṃ vā vicitritam // 83
analyzed: dvāram veda aśri vṛttam vā saṃkīrṇam vā vicitritam
eka dvi tri puram tulyam sāmudgam athavā ubhayam
kapola kaṇṭha śobhā upaśobhā ādi bahu citritam
vicitra ākāra saṃsthānam vallī sūkṣma gṛha anvitam

original: AbhT_31.85b/. śrīdevyāyāmale tūktaṃ kṣetre vedāśrite sati // 85
analyzed: śrī devyāyāmale tu uktam kṣetre veda āśrite sati

original: AbhT_31.86a/. ardhaṃ dvādaśadhā kṛtvā tiryagūrdhvaṃ ca tiryajam /
analyzed: ardham dvādaśadhā kṛtvā tiryak ūrdhvam ca tiryajam
bhāgam ekam sva pārśva ūrdhvam guruḥ samavatārayet

original: AbhT_31.87a/. madhyasthaṃ taṃ tribhāgaṃ ca tadante bhramayedubhau /
analyzed: madhya stham tam tri bhāgam ca tad ante bhramayet ubhau
bhāgam ekam parityajya tad madhye bhramayet punar
tṛtīya aṃśa ūrdhvatas bhrāmyam ūrdhva aṃśam yāvat antatas
caturtha aṃśāt tad ūrdhvam tu ūrdhva adhas yojayet punar
tad mānāt ūrdhvam ābhrāmya caturthena niyojayet
ūrdhvāt yojayate sūtram brahmasūtra avadhi kramāt

original: AbhT_31.90a/. kramādvaipulyataḥ kṛtvā aṃśaṃ vai hrāsayet punaḥ /
analyzed: kramāt vaipulyataḥ kṛtvā aṃśam vai hrāsayet punar
ardha bhāga pramāṇaḥ tu daṇḍaḥ dviguṇaḥ iṣyate

original: AbhT_31.91a/. bhāgaṃ bhāgaṃ gṛhītvā tu ubhayoratha gocarāt /
analyzed: bhāgam bhāgam gṛhītvā tu ubhayoḥ atha gocarāt

original: AbhT_31.91b/. bhrāmyaṃ pippalavat patraṃ vartanaiṣā tvadho bhavet // 91
analyzed: bhrāmyam pippala vat patram vartanā eṣā tu adhas bhavet
ṣoḍaśa aṃśe likhet padmam dvādaśa aṅgula lopanāt

original: AbhT_31.92b/. tadūrdhvaṃ madhyabhāge tu vārijanma samālikhet // 92
analyzed: tad ūrdhvam madhya bhāge tu vārijanma samālikhet
madhya śṛṅga avasāne tu tṛtīyam vilikhet tatas
savya asavye tathā eva iha kaṭi stha abje samālikhet

original: AbhT_31.94a/. karṇikā pītalā raktapītaśuklaṃ ca kesaram /
analyzed: karṇikā pītalā rakta pīta śuklam ca kesaram

original: AbhT_31.94b/. dalāni padmabāhyasthā śuklā ca prativāraṇī // 94
analyzed: dalāni padma bāhya sthā śuklā ca prativāraṇī

original: AbhT_31.95a/. śūlaṃ kṛṣṇena rajasā brahmarekhā sitā punaḥ /
analyzed: śūlam kṛṣṇena rajasā brahmarekhā sitā punar

original: AbhT_31.95b/. śūlāgraṃ jvālayā yuktaṃ śūladaṇḍastu pītalaḥ // 95
analyzed: śūla agram jvālayā yuktam śūla daṇḍaḥ tu pītalaḥ

original: AbhT_31.96a/. śūlamadhye ca yatpadmaṃ tatreśaṃ pūjayetsadā /
analyzed: śūla madhye ca yat padmam tatra īśam pūjayet sadā

original: AbhT_31.96b/. asyordhve tu parāṃ dakṣe@nyāṃ vāme cāparāṃ budhaḥ // 96
analyzed: asya ūrdhve tu parām dakṣenyām vāme ca aparām budhaḥ

original: AbhT_31.97a/. yā sā kālāntakā devī parātītā vyavasthitā /
analyzed: yā sā kālāntakā devī para atītā vyavasthitā

original: AbhT_31.97b/. grasate śūlacakraṃ sā tvicchāmātreṇa sarvadā // 97
analyzed: grasate śūla cakram sā tu icchā mātreṇa sarvadā

original: AbhT_31.98a/. śāntirūpā kalā hyeṣā vidyārūpā parā bhavet /
analyzed: śānti rūpā kalā hi eṣā vidyā rūpā parā bhavet

original: AbhT_31.98b/. aparā tu pratiṣṭhā syānnivṛttistu parāparā // 98
analyzed: aparā tu pratiṣṭhā syāt nivṛttiḥ tu parāparā

original: AbhT_31.99a/. bhairavaṃ daṇḍa ūrdhvasthaṃ rūpaṃ sādāśivātmakam /

analyzed: catasraḥ śaktayaḥ tu asya sthūlāḥ sūkṣmāḥ tu anekadhā
eṣa yāgaḥ samākhyātaḥ ḍāmara ākhyaḥ tri śaktikaḥ
atha traiśirase śūla abja vidhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ abhilikhyate
vāma amṛta ādibhiḥ mukhyaiḥ pavitraiḥ su manoramaiḥ

original: AbhT_31.101b/. bhūmiṃ rajāṃsi karaṇīṃ khaṭikāṃ mūlato@rcayet // 101
analyzed: bhūmim rajāṃsi karaṇīm khaṭikām mūlatā urcayet

original: AbhT_31.102a/. caturaśre caturhaste madhye śūlaṃ karatrayam /
analyzed: caturaśre catur haste madhye śūlam kara trayam
caṇḍaḥ dvi hastaḥ ūrdhva adhas pīṭha yuj vipulaḥ tu asau
vasu aṅgulaḥ prakartavyaḥ sūtra traya samanvitaḥ
dvādaśa aṅgula mānena daṇḍa mūle tu pīṭhikā
dairghyāt tu ucchrāyāt ca ūrdhve ca catur aṅgula mānataḥ
ūrdhve pi ucchrāyataḥ veda aṅgulā dairghyāt daśa aṅgulā

original: AbhT_31.105b/. kṛtvā daṇḍaṃ triśūlaṃ tu tribhirbhāgaiḥ samantataḥ // 105
analyzed: kṛtvā daṇḍam triśūlam tu tribhiḥ bhāgaiḥ samantataḥ
aṣṭa aṅgula pramāṇaiḥ syāt hasta mātram samantataḥ

original: AbhT_31.106b/. śūlāgraṃ śūlamadhyaṃ tacchūlamūlaṃ tu tadbhavet // 106
analyzed: śūla agram śūla madhyam tat śūla mūlam tu tat bhavet

original: AbhT_31.107a/. vedī madhye prakartavyā ubhayośca ṣaḍaṅgulam /
analyzed: vediḥ madhye prakartavyā ubhayoḥ ca ṣaṣ aṅgulam
dvādaśa aṅgula dīrghā tu ubhayoḥ pārśvayoḥ tathā
catur aṅgulam ucchrāyāt mūle vedīm prakalpayet
ubhayoḥ pārśvayoḥ ca evam ardhacandra ākṛtim tathā
bhrāmayet khaṭikā sūtram kaṭim kuryāt dvis aṅgulām
vaipulyāt dairghyataḥ devi catur aṅgula mānataḥ

original: AbhT_31.110a/. yādṛśaṃ dakṣiṇe bhāge vāme tadvatprakalpayet /
analyzed: yādṛśam dakṣiṇe bhāge vāme tadvat prakalpayet
madhye śūla agra vaipulyāt aṅgulaḥ ca adhordhvataḥ
catur aṅgula mānena vaipulyāt tu ṣaṣ aṅgulā

original: AbhT_31.111b/. ucchrāyāttu tataḥ kāryā gaṇḍikā tu svarūpataḥ // 111
analyzed: ucchrāyāt tu tatas kāryā gaṇḍikā tu svarūpataḥ

original: AbhT_31.112a/. pīṭhordhve tu prakartavyaṃ śūlamūlaṃ tu suvrate /
analyzed: pīṭha ūrdhve tu prakartavyam śūla mūlam tu suvrate

original: AbhT_31.112b/. śūlāgramaṅgulaṃ kāryaṃ sutīkṣṇaṃ tu ṣaḍaṅgulam // 112
analyzed: śūla agram aṅgulam kāryam su tīkṣṇam tu ṣaṣ aṅgulam
arāmadhyam prakartavyam arādhaḥ tu ṣaṣ aṅgulam

original: AbhT_31.113b/. caturaṅgulanimnaṃ tu madhyaṃ tu parikalpayet // 113
analyzed: catur aṅgula nimnam tu madhyam tu parikalpayet

original: AbhT_31.114a/. pūrvāparaṃ tadeveha madhye śūlaṃ tu tadbahiḥ /
analyzed: pūrva aparam tat eva iha madhye śūlam tu tad bahis

original: AbhT_31.114b/. kārayeta tribhiḥ sūtrairekaikaṃ vartayeta ca // 114
analyzed: kārayeta tribhiḥ sūtraiḥ ekaikam vartayeta ca
tu
kramāt dakṣa anya madhyeṣu tri aṣṭa dvādaśa patrakam
vidyā abhikhyam śūla mūle rajaḥ paścāt prapātayet
triśūlam daṇḍa paryantam rājavartena pūrayet

original: AbhT_31.117b/. sūtratrayasya pṛṣṭhe tu śuklaṃ cārātrayaṃ bhavet // 117
analyzed: sūtra trayasya pṛṣṭhe tu śuklam ca ārā trayam bhavet

original: AbhT_31.118a/. śuklena rajasā śūlamūle vidyāmbujaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: bhavet

original: AbhT_31.119a/. śuklena vyomarekhā syāt sā sthaulyādaṅgulaṃ bahiḥ /
analyzed: śuklena vyomarekhā syāt sā sthaulyāt aṅgulam bahis

original: AbhT_31.119b/. tāṃ tyaktvā vedikā kāryā hastamātraṃ pramāṇātaḥ // 119
analyzed: tām tyaktvā vedikā kāryā hasta mātram pramāṇātaḥ
vaipulya triguṇam dairghyāt prākāram caturaśrakam
samantataḥ utha dikṣu syuḥ dvārāṇi kara mātrataḥ
tridhā vibhajya kramaśas dvādaśa aṅgula mānataḥ

original: AbhT_31.121b/. kaṇṭhaṃ kapolaṃ śobhāṃ tu upaśobhāṃ tadantataḥ // 121
analyzed: kaṇṭham kapolam śobhām tu upaśobhām tad antataḥ
prākāram caturaśram tu sa bhū rekhā samanvitam
sita rakta pīta kṛṣṇaiḥ rajobhiḥ kārayet tatas

original: AbhT_31.123a/. raktai rajobhirmadhyaṃ tu yathāśobhaṃ tu pūrayet /
analyzed: raktaiḥ rajobhiḥ madhyam tu yathāśobham tu pūrayet

original: AbhT_31.123b/. asyā vyāptau purā coktaṃ tatraivānusarecca tat // 123
analyzed: asyāḥ vyāptau purā ca uktam tatra eva anusaret ca tat

original: AbhT_31.125a/. hṛdi sthāne gatā devyastriśūlasya sumadhyame /
analyzed: hṛdi sthāne gatāḥ devyaḥ triśūlasya sumadhyame

original: AbhT_31.125b/. nābhisthaḥ śūladaṇḍastu śūlamūlaṃ hṛdi sthitam // 125
analyzed: nābhi sthaḥ śūladaṇḍaḥ tu śūla mūlam hṛdi sthitam

original: AbhT_31.126a/. śaktisthānagataṃ prāntaṃ prānte cakratrayaṃ smaret /
analyzed: śakti sthāna gatam prāntam prānte cakra trayam smaret
utkṣipya utkṣipya kalayā deha madhya svarūpataḥ
praviśet mūla madhya antam prānta ante śaktiveśmani
a spanda karaṇam kṛtvā ekadā spanda vartanam

original: AbhT_31.129a/. tatra pūjyaṃ prayatnena jāyante sarvasiddhayaḥ /
analyzed: tatra pūjyam prayatnena jāyante sarva siddhayaḥ
samasta mantra cakra ādyaiḥ evamādi prayatnataḥ
viṣuvat sthena vinyāsaḥ mantrāṇām maṇḍala uttame

original: AbhT_31.131b/. kāryo@smin pūjite yatra sarveśvarapadaṃ bhajet // 131
analyzed: kāryaḥ asmin pūjite yatra sarveśvara padam bhajet

original: AbhT_31.132a/. svastikenātha kartavyaṃ yuktaṃ tasyocyate vidhiḥ /
analyzed: svastikena atha kartavyam yuktam tasya ucyate vidhiḥ
nāḍikāḥ sthāpayet pūrvam muhūrtam parimāṇataḥ
śakra vāruṇa diś sthāḥ ca yāmya saumya gatāḥ tathā
ekonatriṃśat vaṃśāḥ syuḥ ṛju tiryañc gatāḥ tathā
aṣṭau marma śatāni ekacatvāriṃśat ca jāyate
vaṃśaiḥ viṣaya saṃkhyaiḥ ca padmam yugma indu maṇḍalam
rasa saṃkhyaiḥ bhavet pīṭham svastikam sarva kāma dam
vasu saṃkhyaiḥ dvāra vīthau evam bhāga parikramaḥ
randhra vipra śara agnīn ca lupyet bāhya antaram kramāt

original: AbhT_31.136b/. marmāṇi ca caturdikṣu madhyāddvāreṣu sundari // 136
analyzed: marmāṇi ca catur dikṣu madhyāt dvāreṣu sundari
vahni bhūta muni vyoma bāhya garbhe purīṣu ca
lopayet ca eva marmāṇi antar nāḍi vivarjitān
dvāra prākāra koṇeṣu netra anala śarān ṛtūn
nāḍayaḥ brahma vaṃśasya lopyāḥ netrāt rasa sthitāḥ
vahneḥ netra analau lopyau vedāt netra yugam rasāt

original: AbhT_31.139b/. netraṃ saumyagataṃ lopyaṃ pūrvādvedānalau rasāt // 139
analyzed: netram saumya gatam lopyam pūrvāt veda analau rasāt

original: AbhT_31.140a/. lokasthā nāḍikā hitvā netrādvedāgnayaḥ kramāt /
analyzed: loka sthāḥ nāḍikāḥ hitvā netrāt veda agnayaḥ kramāt

original: AbhT_31.140b/. śarairvahnigataṃ caiva yugaṃ netrāgnayo rasāt // 140
analyzed: śaraiḥ vahni gatam ca eva yugam netra agnayoḥ rasāt
netrāt pūrva gatāt ca eva sumeruḥ dvāra saṃjñitaḥ

original: AbhT_31.141b/. svastikā ca purī ramyā caturdikṣu sthitāvubhau // 141
analyzed: svastikā ca purī ramyā catur dikṣu sthitau ubhau

original: AbhT_31.142a/. marmaṇāṃ ca śate dve ca ṛṣibhirguṇitā diśaḥ /
analyzed: marmaṇām ca śate dve ca ṛṣibhiḥ guṇitāḥ diśaḥ
netra ādikān ca saṃmārjya mārga madhyāt su śobhane

original: AbhT_31.143a/. ṛṣitrayakṛte madhye viṣayaiḥ karṇikā bhavet /
analyzed: ṛṣi traya kṛte madhye viṣayaiḥ karṇikā bhavet
netrīkṛtān vasūn patram netram sakṛt vibhājitam

original: AbhT_31.144a/. vahniṃ vasugataṃ kṛtvā śaśāṅkasthāṃśca lopayet /
analyzed: vahnim vasu gatam kṛtvā śaśāṅka sthān ca lopayet
vahni iṣu ṛṣi madhyāt ca lopyam pīṭha induka avadhi
brahmaṇaḥ netra viṣayāt netrāt veda analau haret

original: AbhT_31.145b/. sāgare netrakaṃ lopyaṃ nāḍayaḥ pūrvadiggatāḥ // 145
analyzed: sāgare netrakam lopyam nāḍayaḥ pūrva diś gatāḥ
saumya gāt pīṭha koṇeṣu lopayeta caturṣu api

original: AbhT_31.147a/. dalāni kāryāṇi sitaiḥ kesaraṃ raktapītalaiḥ /
analyzed: dalāni kāryāṇi sitaiḥ kesaram rakta pītalaiḥ
karṇikā kanaka prakhyā pallava antāḥ ca lohitāḥ
pīṭham rekhā traya upetam sita lohita pītalam
svastikāḥ ca catur varṇāḥ agneḥ īśāna gocarāḥ
vīthī vidruma saṃkāśā sva dikṣu astrāṇi bāhyatas
indranīla nibham vajram śaktim padma maṇi prabhām
daṇḍam hāṭaka saṃkāśam vaktram tasya ati lohitam
nīla dyuti samam khaḍgam pāśam vatsaka saprabham
dhvajam puṣpa phala upetam pañca raṅgaiḥ ca śobhitam
gadā hema nibhā ati ugrā nānā ratna vibhūṣitā
śūlam nīla ambuja samam jvalat vahni ugra śekharam
tasya upari sitam padmam īṣat pīta aruṇa prabham
cakram hema nibham dīptam arāḥ vaiḍūrya saṃnibhāḥ

original: AbhT_31.154a/. arāmadhyaṃ supītaṃ ca bāhyaṃ jvālāruṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: bhavet
mandiram devadevasya sarva kāma phala pradam

original: AbhT_31.155a/. śrīsiddhāyāṃ śūlavidhiḥ prāk kṣetre caturaśrite /
AbhT_31.155b/. hastamātraṃ tridhā sūryānnavakhaṇḍaṃ yathā bhavet // 155
analyzed: hasta mātram tridhā sūryāt nava khaṇḍam yathā bhavet

original: AbhT_31.156a/. madhye śūlaṃ ca tatretthaṃ madhyabhāgaṃ tridhā bhajet /
analyzed: madhye śūlam ca tatra ittham madhya bhāgam tridhā bhajet
navabhiḥ koṣṭhakaiḥ yuktam tatoyam vidhiḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_31.157a/. madhyabhāgatrayaṃ tyaktvā madhye bhāgadvayasya tu /

analyzed: adhastāt bhrāmayet sūtram śaśāṅka śakala ākṛti
ubhayatas bhrāmayet tatra yathā agre ha ākṛtiḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_31.158b/. koṭyāṃ tatra kṛtaṃ sūtraṃ nayedrekhāṃ tu pūrvikām // 158
analyzed: koṭyām tatra kṛtam sūtram nayet rekhām tu pūrvikām
apara dvāra pūrveṇa tyaktvā aṅgula catuṣṭayam
rekhām vināśayet prājñaḥ yathā śūla ākṛtiḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_31.160a/. śūlāgre tvardhahastena tyaktvā padmāni kārayet /
analyzed: śūla agre tu ardha hastena tyaktvā padmāni kārayet

original: AbhT_31.160b/. adhaḥ śṛṅgatrayaṃ hastamadhye padmaṃ sakarṇikam // 160
analyzed: adhas śṛṅga trayam hasta madhye padmam sa karṇikam
mukha agre dhārayet sūtram tribhiḥ hastaiḥ tu pātayet
madhye ca ūrdhvam tatas kuryāt adhastāt aṅgula dvayam

original: AbhT_31.162a/. rekhādvayaṃ pātayeta yathā śūlaṃ bhavatyapi /
analyzed: rekhā dvayam pātayeta yathā śūlam bhavati api
adhobhāga ādibhiḥ ca ūrdhvam tatra rekhā prapadyate

original: AbhT_31.163a/. samīkṛtya tataḥ sūtre ūrdhve dve evameva tu /
analyzed: samīkṛtya tatas sūtre ūrdhve dve evam eva tu
madhyam padmam pratiṣṭhāpyam śūla adhastāt yaśasvini

original: AbhT_31.164a/. ityeṣa maṇḍalavidhiḥ kathitaḥ saṃkṣepayogato mahāgurubhiḥ /
analyzed: iti eṣa maṇḍala vidhiḥ kathitaḥ saṃkṣepa yogataḥ mahā gurubhiḥ
atha śrī tantrāloke dvātriṃśam āhnikam

original: AbhT_32.1a/. atha kathaye mudrāṇāṃ gurvāgamagītamatra vidhim / 0b
analyzed: atha kathaye mudrāṇām guru āgama gītam atra vidhim
bimbāt samudayaḥ yasyāḥ iti uktā pratibimba tā

original: AbhT_32.2b/. vimbasya yasyā udaya ityuktā tadupāyatā // 2
analyzed: vimbasya yasyāḥ udayaḥ iti uktā tad upāya tā
mudam sva rūpa lābha ākhyam deha dvāreṇa ca ātmanām

original: AbhT_32.3b/. rātyarpayati yattena mudrā śāstreṣu varṇitā // 3
analyzed: rāti arpayati yat tena mudrā śāstreṣu varṇitā
tatra pradhāna bhūtā śrīkhecarī devatā ātmikā
niṣkala tvena vikhyātā sākalyena triśūlinī

original: AbhT_32.5a/. karaṅkiṇī krodhanā ca bhairavī lelihānikā /
AbhT_32.5b/. mahāpretā yogamudrā jvālinī kṣobhiṇī dhruvā // 5

analyzed: iti evaṃbahu bhedā iyam śrī khecarī eva gīyate
anyāḥ tad aṅga bhūtāḥ tu padma ādyāḥ mālinīmate
tāsām bahu tva amukhya tva yogābhyām na iha varṇanam
śrī khecarī samāviṣṭaḥ yat yat sthānam samāśrayet
devī saṃnidhaye tat syāt alam kim ḍambaraiḥ vṛthā

original: AbhT_32.8b/. kāmye karmaṇi tāśca syurmukhyāḥ kasyāpi jātucit // 8
analyzed: kāmye karmaṇi tāḥ ca syuḥ mukhyāḥ kasya api jātucit
mudrā caturvidhā kāya kara vāc citta bhedataḥ

original: AbhT_32.10a/. tatra pūrṇena rūpeṇa khecarīmeva varṇaye /
analyzed: tatra pūrṇena rūpeṇa khecarīm eva varṇaye

original: AbhT_32.10b/. baddhvā padmāsanaṃ yogī nābhāvakṣeśvaraṃ kṣipet // 10
analyzed: baddhvā padmāsanam yogī nābhau akṣeśvaram kṣipet
daṇḍa ākāram tu tam tāvat nayet yāvat kakha trayam

original: AbhT_32.11b/. nigṛhya tatra tattūrṇaṃ prerayet khatrayeṇa tu // 11
analyzed: nigṛhya tatra tat tūrṇam prerayet kha trayeṇa tu

original: AbhT_32.12a/. etāṃ baddhvā khe gatiḥ syāditi śrīpūrvaśāsane /
analyzed: etām baddhvā khe gatiḥ syāt iti śrī pūrvaśāsane
dhvani jyotiḥ marut yuktam cittam viśramya ca upari

original: AbhT_32.13a/. anenābhyāsayogena śivaṃ bhittvā paraṃ vrajet /
analyzed: anena abhyāsa yogena śivam bhittvā param vrajet

original: AbhT_32.13b/. jatrvadhastātkarau kṛtvā vāmapādaṃ ca dakṣiṇe // 13
analyzed: jatru adhastāt karau kṛtvā vāma pādam ca dakṣiṇe

original: AbhT_32.14a/. vidāryāsyaṃ kaniṣṭhābhyāṃ madhyamābhyāṃ tu nāsikām /
analyzed: vidārī āsyam kaniṣṭhābhyām madhyamābhyām tu nāsikām
anāme kuñcayet prājñaḥ bhrū bhaṅgam tarjanī dvayam

original: AbhT_32.15a/. jihvāṃ ca cālayenmantrī hāhākāraṃ ca kārayet /
analyzed: jihvām ca cālayet mantrī hāhākāram ca kārayet
triśūlena prayogeṇa brahmarandhram upasthitaḥ

original: AbhT_32.16a/. padaṃ santyajya tanmātraṃ sadyastyajati medinīm /
analyzed: padam santyajya tanmātram sadyas tyajati medinīm
śakti tritaya sambaddhe adhiṣṭhātṛ tri daivate
triśūlam tat vijānīyāt yena vyoma utpatet budhaḥ
ākāśa bhāvam santyajya sattā mātram upasthitaḥ

original: AbhT_32.18b/. śūlaṃ samarasaṃ kṛtvā rase rasa iva sthitaḥ // 18
analyzed: śūlam sama rasam kṛtvā rase rase iva sthitaḥ

original: AbhT_32.19a/. ekadaṇḍaṃ sa vijñāya triśūlaṃ khacaraṃ priye /
analyzed: eka daṇḍam sa vijñāya triśūlam kha caram priye

original: AbhT_32.19b/. baddhvā tu khecarīṃ mudrāṃ dhyātvātmānaṃ ca bhairavam // 19
analyzed: baddhvā tu khecarīm mudrām dhyātvā ātmānam ca bhairavam
tyakta aṃśakaḥ nirācāraḥ niḥśaṅkaḥ loka varjitaḥ
avadhūtaḥ nirācāraḥ na aham asmi iti bhāvayam
mantra eka niṣṭhaḥ saṃpaśyan deha sthāḥ sarva devatāḥ
hlāda udvega asmitā kruṣṭa nidrā maithuna matsare

original: AbhT_32.22b/. rūpādau vā kartṛkarmakaraṇeṣu ca sarvaśaḥ // 22
analyzed: rūpa ādau vā kartṛ karma karaṇeṣu ca sarvaśas
na aham asmi iti manvānaḥ ekībhūtam vicintayan
karṇa akṣi mukha nāsā ādi cakra stham devatā gaṇam

original: AbhT_32.24a/. grahītāraṃ sadā paśyan khecaryā siddhyati sphuṭam /
analyzed: grahītāram sadā paśyan khecaryā siddhi ati sphuṭam

original: AbhT_32.24b/. vidyāśaṅkī malāśaṅkī śāstraśaṅkī na siddhyati // 24
analyzed: vidyā āśaṅkī mala āśaṅkī śāstra śaṅkī na siddhi ati

original: AbhT_32.25a/. śivo raviḥ śivo vahniḥ paktṛtvātsa purohitaḥ /
analyzed: śivaḥ raviḥ śivaḥ vahniḥ paktṛ tvāt sa purohitaḥ

original: AbhT_32.25b/. tatrasthā devatāḥ sarvā dyotayantyo@khilaṃ jagat // 25
analyzed: tatrasthāḥ devatāḥ sarvāḥ dyotayantyā ukhilam jagat

original: AbhT_32.26a/. kaniṣṭhayā vidāryāsyaṃ tarjanībhyāṃ bhruvau tathā /
analyzed: kaniṣṭhayā vidārya āsyam tarjanībhyām bhruvau tathā

original: AbhT_32.26b/. anāme madhyame vaktre jihvayā tālukaṃ spṛśet // 26
analyzed: anāme madhyame vaktre jihvayā tālukam spṛśet

original: AbhT_32.27a/. eṣā karaṅkiṇī devī jvālinīṃ śṛṇu sāṃpratam /
analyzed: eṣā karaṅkiṇī devī jvālinīm śṛṇu sāṃpratam
hanuḥ lalāṭa gau hastau prasārya aṅgulitaḥ sphuṭau
cālayet vāyu vegena kṛtvā antar bhrukuṭīm budhaḥ

original: AbhT_32.28b/. vidāryāsyaṃ sajihvaṃ ca hāhākāraṃ tu kārayet // 28
analyzed: vidārī āsyam sa jihvam ca hāhākāram tu kārayet

original: AbhT_32.29a/. eṣā jvālinyagnicakre tayā cāṣṭottaraṃ śatam /
analyzed: eṣā jvālinī agni cakre tayā ca aṣṭa uttaram śatam
japet yadi tatas siddhyet trailokyam sacarācaram
para deheṣu ca ātmānam param ca ātma śarīrataḥ
paśyet carantam hā nādāt gama āgama pada sthitam

original: AbhT_32.31a/. navacchidragataṃ caikaṃ nadantaṃ vyāpakaṃ dhruvam /
analyzed: nava chidra gatam ca ekam nadantam vyāpakam dhruvam

original: AbhT_32.31b/. anayā hi khacārī śrīyogasañcāra ucyate // 31
analyzed: anayā hi kha cārī śrī yoga sañcāraḥ ucyate
kula kuṇḍalikām baddhvā aṇoḥ antara vedinīm
vāmaḥ yaḥ yam jagatī asmin tasya saṃharaṇa udyatām
sva sthāne nirvṛtim labdhvā jñāna amṛta rasa ātmakam

original: AbhT_32.33b/. vrajetkandapadaṃ madhye rāvaṃ kṛtvā hyarāvakam // 33
analyzed: vrajet kanda padam madhye rāvam kṛtvā hi a rāvakam

original: AbhT_32.34a/. yāvajjīvaṃ catuṣkoṇaṃ piṇḍādhāraṃ ca kāmikam /
analyzed: yāvajjīvam catuṣkoṇam piṇḍa ādhāram ca kāmikam

original: AbhT_32.34b/. tatra tāṃ bodhayitvā tu gatiṃ buddhvā kramāgatām // 34
analyzed: tatra tām bodhayitvā tu gatim buddhvā krama āgatām
cakra ubhaya nibaddhām tu śākhā prānta avalambinīm
mūlasthānāt yathā devi tamogranthim vidārayet
vajra ākhyām jñāna jena eva tathā śākhā ubhaya antataḥ
koṇa madhya viniṣkrāntam liṅga mūlam vibhedayet
tatra saṅghaṭṭitam cakra yugmam aikyena bhāsate
vaiparītyāt tu nikṣipya dvidhā bhāvam vrajati atas
ūrva ādi aṅguṣṭha kālāgni paryante sā vinikṣipet
gama āgamana sañcāre caret sā liṅga liṅginī
tatra tad pada saṃyogāt unmīlana vidhāyinī

original: AbhT_32.39b/. yo jānāti sa siddhyettu rasādānavisargayoḥ // 39
analyzed: yaḥ jānāti sa siddhyet tu rasa ādāna visargayoḥ
sa saṅgamam idam sthānam ūrmiṇi unmīlanam param

original: AbhT_32.40b/. eṣa kramastato@nyo@pi vyutkramaḥ khecarī parā // 40
analyzed: eṣa kramaḥ tatonyaḥ api vyutkramaḥ khecarī parā

original: AbhT_32.41b/. varṇāstatra layaṃ yānti hyavarṇe varṇarūpiṇi // 41
analyzed: varṇāḥ tatra layam yānti hi avarṇe varṇa rūpiṇi
samuccārya

original: AbhT_32.42b/. ākramya prathamaṃ cakraṃ khe yantre pādapīḍitam // 42
analyzed: ākramya prathamam cakram khe yantre pāda pīḍitam
nādam vai śakti sat garbham sat garbhāt kaulinī padam
bīja pañcaka cāreṇa śūlabheda krameṇa tu
hṛd śūla granthi bhedaiḥ cit rudra śaktim prabodhayet
āgacchet lambikā sthānam sūtra dvādaśa nirgatam
bhūyas tu kurute līlām māyā pañjara vartinīm

original: AbhT_32.46b/. punaḥ sṛṣṭiḥ saṃhṛtiśca khecaryā kriyate budhaiḥ // 46
analyzed: punar sṛṣṭiḥ saṃhṛtiḥ ca khecaryā kriyate budhaiḥ

original: AbhT_32.47b/. cumbākāreṇa vaktreṇa yattattvaṃ śrūyate param // 47
analyzed: cumba ākāreṇa vaktreṇa yat tattvam śrūyate param
grasamānam idam viśvam candrārka puṭa saṃpuṭe
tena eva syāt kha gāmī iti śrīmat kāmikaḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_32.49a/. bhavānmuktvā drāvayanti pāśānmudrā hi śaktayaḥ /
analyzed: bhavān muktvā drāvayanti pāśān mudrāḥ hi śaktayaḥ

original: AbhT_32.49b/. mukhyāsāṃ khecarī sā ca tridhoccāreṇa vācikī // 49
analyzed: mukhyā āsām khecarī sā ca tridhā uccāreṇa vācikī
triśiromudgaraḥ devi kāyikī paripaṭhyate

original: AbhT_32.50b/. nāsāṃ netradvayaṃ cāpi hṛtstanadvayameva ca // 50
analyzed: nāsām netra dvayam ca api hṛd stana dvayam eva ca

original: AbhT_32.51a/. vṛṣaṇadvayaliṅgaṃ ca prāpya kāyaṃ gatā tviyam /
analyzed: vṛṣaṇa dvaya liṅgam ca prāpya kāyam gatā tu iyam
bhava sthāna abhava sthānam uccāreṇa avadhārayet
mānasīyam itas tu anyāḥ padma ādyāḥ aṣṭa mudrikāḥ
mātṛ vyūha kule tāḥ syuḥ asyāḥ tu parivāra gāḥ
śarīram tu samastam yat kūṭa akṣara sama ākṛti

original: AbhT_32.53b/. eṣā mudrā mahāmudrā bhairavasyeti gahvare // 53
analyzed: eṣā mudrā mahāmudrā bhairavasya iti gahvare
su upaviṣṭaḥ padmake tu hasta agra aṅguli raśmibhiḥ
parāṅmukhaiḥ jhaṭiti udyat raśmibhiḥ pṛṣṭha saṃsthitaiḥ
tasmāt eva samuttambya bāhū ca eva avakuñcitau
samyak vyomasu saṃsthānāt vyoma ākhyā khecarī matā
śānta ākhyā sā hasta yugmam ūrdhva adhas sthitam udgatam
sama dṛṣṭyā avalokyam ca bahis yojita pāṇikam
eṣā eva śakti mudrā ced adhas dhāvita pāṇikā
daśānām aṅgulīnām tu muṣṭibandhāt anantaram

original: AbhT_32.59b/. saṃhāramudrā caiṣaiva yadyūrdhvaṃ kṣipyate kila // 59
analyzed: saṃhāra mudrā ca eṣā eva yadi ūrdhvam kṣipyate kila
utkrāmaṇī jhagiti eva paśūnām pāśa kartarī

original: AbhT_32.60b/. śvabhre sudūre jhaṭiti svātmānaṃ pātayanniva // 60
analyzed: śvabhre su dūre jhaṭiti sva ātmānam pātayan iva
sāhasa anupraveśena kuñcitam hasta yugmakam
adhas vīkṣaṇa śīlam ca samyak dṛṣṭi samanvitam
aṣṭadhā ittham varṇitā śrī bhargāṣṭakaśikhākule
evam nānāvidhān bhedān āśritya ekā eva yā sthitā

original: AbhT_32.63b/. śrīkhecarī tayāviṣṭaḥ paraṃ bījaṃ prapadyate // 63
analyzed: śrīkhecarī tayā āviṣṭaḥ param bījam prapadyate

original: AbhT_32.64a/. ekaṃ sṛṣṭimayaṃ bījaṃ yadvīryaṃ sarvamantragam /
analyzed: ekam sṛṣṭi mayam bījam yat vīryam sarva mantra gam

original: AbhT_32.64b/. ekā mudrā khecarī ca mudraughaḥ prāṇito yayā // 64
analyzed: ekā mudrā khecarī ca mudrā oghaḥ prāṇitaḥ yayā
tat evam khecarī cakra rūḍhau yat rūpam ullaset

original: AbhT_32.65b/. tadeva mudrā mantavyā śeṣaḥ syāddehavikriyā // 65
analyzed: tat eva mudrā mantavyā śeṣaḥ syāt deha vikriyā

original: AbhT_32.68a/. iti mudrāvidhiḥ proktaḥ sugūḍho yaḥ phalapradaḥ /
analyzed: iti mudrā vidhiḥ proktaḥ su gūḍhaḥ yaḥ phala pradaḥ
atha śrī tantrāloke trayastriṃśam āhnikam
atha avasara saṃprāptaḥ ekīkāraḥ nigadyate

original: AbhT_33.1b/. yaduktaṃ cakrabhedena sārdhaṃ pūjyamiti trikam /
analyzed: yat uktam cakra bhedena sārdham pūjyam iti trikam
tatra eṣa cakra bhedānām ekīkāraḥ diśā anayā

original: AbhT_33.2a/. viśvā tadīśā hāraudrī vīranetryambikā tathā /

analyzed: gurvī iti ṣaṣ are devyaḥ śrī siddhāvīra darśitāḥ

original: AbhT_33.3a/. māheśī brāhmaṇī skāndī vaiṣṇavyaindrī yamātmikā /

analyzed: cāmuṇḍā ca eva
agni nirṛti vāyu īśa mātṛbhiḥ dvādaśa anvitāḥ

original: AbhT_33.4b/. nandā bhadrā jayā kālī karālī vikṛtānanā // 4
AbhT_33.5a/. kroṣṭukī bhīmamudrā ca vāyuvegā hayānanā /
AbhT_33.5b/. gambhīrā ghoṣaṇī ceti caturviṃśatyare vidhiḥ // 5
analyzed: gambhīrā ghoṣaṇī ca iti caturviṃśati are vidhiḥ
siddhiḥ vṛddhiḥ dyutiḥ lakṣmīḥ medhā kāntiḥ sudhā dhṛtiḥ

original: AbhT_33.6b/. dīptiḥ puṣṭirmatiḥ kīrtiḥ susthitiḥ sugatiḥ smṛtiḥ // 6
analyzed: dīptiḥ puṣṭiḥ matiḥ kīrtiḥ susthitiḥ sugatiḥ smṛtiḥ
suprabhā ṣoḍaśī ca iti śrīkaṇṭha ādika śaktayaḥ

original: AbhT_33.7b/. baliśca balinandaśca daśagrīvo haro hayaḥ // 7
analyzed: baliḥ ca balinandaḥ ca daśagrīvaḥ haraḥ hayaḥ

original: AbhT_33.8a/. mādhavaḥ ṣaḍare cakre dvādaśāre tvamī smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: mādhavaḥ ṣaṣ are cakre dvādaśa are tu amī smṛtāḥ

original: AbhT_33.8b/. dakṣaścaṇḍo haraḥ śauṇḍī pramatho bhīmamanmathau // 8
analyzed: dakṣaḥ caṇḍaḥ haraḥ śauṇḍī pramathaḥ bhīma manmathau
śakuniḥ sumatiḥ nandaḥ gopālaḥ ca pitāmahaḥ
arghīśaḥ bhārabhūtiḥ ca sthitiḥ sthāṇuḥ haraḥ tathā
jhaṇṭhi bhautika sadyojānu graha krūra sainikāḥ
dvi aṣṭau yat vā amṛtaḥ tena yuktāḥ pūrṇa ābha tad dravāḥ
ogha ūrmi syandana aṅgāḥ ca vapuḥ udgāra vaktrakāḥ
śrīpāṭhāt śaktayaḥ ca etāḥ ṣoḍaśa eva prakīrtitāḥ
saṃvarta lakuli bhṛgu sita baka khaṅgi pināki bhujaga bali kālāḥ
dvis chagala aṇḍau śikhi śoṇa meṣa mīna tridaṇḍi sa āṣāḍhi
devīkānta tad ardhau dāruka hali soma nāthaśarmāṇaḥ
tad mūrti utsāha da vardhanāḥ ca bala subala bhadradā vahakāḥ
tadvān dātā ca īśaḥ nandana sama bhadra tad mūrtiḥ
durgaḥ bhadra ākhya kālaḥ ca
cetas nuga kauśika kāla viśva suśivāḥ tathā aparaḥ kopaḥ
śruti agni are syuḥ ete strī pāṭhāt śaktayaḥ tu etāḥ

original: AbhT_33.18a/. dvādaśāre tatsahitāḥ ṣoḍaśāre svarāḥ kramāt /
analyzed: dvādaśa are tad sahitāḥ ṣoḍaśa are svarāḥ kramāt

original: AbhT_33.18b/. halastaddviguṇe@ṣṭāre yādyaṃ hāntaṃ tu tattrike // 18
AbhT_33.19a/. dvātriṃśadarake sāntaṃ binduḥ sarveṣu mūrdhani /
analyzed: dvātriṃśat arake sa antam binduḥ sarveṣu mūrdhani
evam anyān bahūn cakra bhedān asmāt prakalpayet
ekaḥ eva cit ātmā eṣa viśva āmarśana sārakaḥ
śaktiḥ tadvān atas mātā śabdarāśiḥ prakīrtitau
tayoḥ eva vibhāge tu śakti tadvat prakalpane
śabdarāśiḥ mālinī ca kṣobha ātma vapuḥ īdṛśam
tathā antar stha parāmarśa bhedane vastutas trikam
ānanda īśa ūrmi yoge tu tat ṣaṭkam samudāhṛtam
antaḥstha ūṣma samāyogāt tat aṣṭakam udāhṛtam
tadā amṛta catuṣka ūna bhāve dvādaśakam bhavet
tad yoge ṣoḍaśa ākhyam syāt evam yāvat asaṃkhya tā
viśvam eka parāmarśa saha tvāt prabhṛti sphuṭam
aṃśa aṃśikā parāmarśān paryante sahate yatas
atas pañcāśat aikātmyam svara vyakti virūpa tā
iti pradarśitam pūrvam ardha mātrā saha tvataḥ
svarārdham api asti yatas svaritasya ardha mātrakam
tasya āditas udāttam tat kathitam pada vedinā
ittham saṃvid iyam yājya sva rūpa āmarśa rūpiṇī
abhinnam saṃvidaḥ ca etat cakrāṇām cakravālakam
svāmi āvaraṇa bhedena bahudhā tat prayojayet
parā aparā parā ca anyā sṛṣṭi sthiti tirodhayaḥ
mātṛsadbhāva rūpā tu turyā viśrāntiḥ ucyate

original: AbhT_33.31a/. tacca prakāśaṃ vaktrasthaṃ sūcitaṃ tu pade pade /
analyzed: tat ca prakāśam vaktra stham sūcitam tu pade pade
tathā asya viśvam ābhāti sva ātma tanmaya tām gatam
iti eṣa śāstra arthasya uktaḥ ekīkāraḥ guru uditaḥ
atha śrī tantrāloke catustriṃśam āhnikam
ucyate tha sva svarūpa praveśaḥ krama saṅgataḥ
yat etat bahudhā proktam āṇavam śiva tā āptaye
tatra antar antar āviśya viśrāmyet savidhe pade
tatas api āṇava saṃtyāgāt śāktīm bhūmim upāśrayet
tatas api śāmbhavīm evam tāratamya kramāt sphuṭam
ittham krama udita vibodha mahā marīci saṃpūrita prasara bhairava bhāva bhāgī
anta ibhi upāya nirapekṣa tayā eva nityam sva ātmānam āviśati garbhita viśva rūpam
kathitaḥ ayam sva svarūpa praveśaḥ parameṣṭhinā
atha śrī tantrāloke pañcatriṃśam āhnikam
atha ucyate samastānām śāstrāṇām iha melanam

original: AbhT_35.1b/. iha tāvatsama sto@yaṃ vyavahāraḥ purātanaḥ // 1
analyzed: iha tāvat samaḥ stoyam vyavahāraḥ purātanaḥ
prasiddhim anusandhāya sā eva ca āgamaḥ ucyate
anvaya vyatirekau hi prasiddheḥ upajīvakau
sva āyatta tve tayoḥ vyakti pūge kim syāt tayoḥ gatiḥ
pratyakṣam api netra ātma dīpa artha ādi viśeṣa jam

original: AbhT_35.4a/. apekṣate tatra mūle prasiddhiṃ tāṃ tathātmikām /
analyzed: apekṣate tatra mūle prasiddhim tām tathā ātmikām

original: AbhT_35.4b/. abhitaḥsaṃvṛte jāta ekākī kṣudhitaḥ śiśuḥ // 4
analyzed: abhitas saṃvṛte jātaḥ ekākī kṣudhitaḥ śiśuḥ

original: AbhT_35.5a/. kiṃ karotu kimādattāṃ kena paśyatu kiṃ vrajet /
analyzed: kim karotu kim ādattām kena paśyatu kim vrajet

original: AbhT_35.5b/. nanu vastuśatākīrṇe sthāne@pyasya yadeva hi // 5
analyzed: nanu vastu śata ākīrṇe sthāne pi asya yat eva hi

original: AbhT_35.6a/. paśyato jighrato vāpi spṛśataḥ saṃprasīdati /
analyzed: paśyataḥ jighrataḥ vā api spṛśataḥ saṃprasīdati
cetaḥ tat eva ādāya drāk saḥ nvaya vyatireka bhāj
hanta cetaḥ prasādaḥ api yaḥ sau artha viśeṣa gaḥ
saḥ api prāc vāsanā rūpa vimarśa parikalpitaḥ
na pratyakṣa anumāna ādi bāhya māna prasāda jaḥ
prāk vāsanā upajīvi etat pratibhā mātram eva na

original: AbhT_35.9a/. na mṛdabhyavahārecchā puṃso bālasya jāyate /
analyzed: na mṛd abhyavahāra icchā puṃsaḥ bālasya jāyate

original: AbhT_35.9b/. prāgvāsanopajīvī cedvimarśaḥ sā ca vāsanā // 9
analyzed: prāk vāsanā upajīvī ced vimarśaḥ sā ca vāsanā

original: AbhT_35.10a/. prācyā cedāgatā seyaṃ prasiddhiḥ paurvakālikī /
analyzed: prācyā ced āgatā sā iyam prasiddhiḥ paurvakālikī
na ca cetaḥ prasattyā eva sarvaḥ vyavahṛti kramaḥ
mūlam prasiddhiḥ tat mānam sarvatra evā iti gṛhyatām
pūrva pūrva upajīvi tva mārgaṇe sā kvacid svayam
sarvajña rūpe hi ekasmin niḥśaṅkam bhāsata purā

original: AbhT_35.12b/. vyavahāro hi naikatra samastaḥ ko@pi mātari // 12
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ hi nā ekatra samastaḥ kaḥ api mātari
tena asarvajña pūrva tva mātreṇa eṣā na siddhi ati

original: AbhT_35.13b/. bahusarvajñapūrvatve na mānaṃ cāsti kiṃcana // 13
analyzed: bahu sarvajña pūrva tve na mānam ca asti kiṃcana
tad vimarśa svabhāvaḥ asau bhairavaḥ parameśvaraḥ
tatas ca aṃśa aṃśikā yogāt sā prasiddhiḥ paramparām
śāstram vā āśritya vitatāḥ lokān saṃvyavahārayet
tayā eva a śaiśavāt sarve vyavahāra dharā juṣaḥ
santaḥ samupajīvanti śaivam eva ādyam āgamam

original: AbhT_35.17a/. apūrṇāstu pare tena na mokṣaphalabhāginaḥ /
analyzed: apūrṇāḥ tu pare tena na mokṣa phala bhāginaḥ
upajīvanti yāvat tu tāvat tad phala bhāginaḥ
bālya apāye pi yat bhoktum annam eṣa pravartate
tad prasiddhyā eva na adhyakṣāt na anumānāt asambhavāt
na ca kā api atra doṣa āśā śaṅkāyāḥ ca nivṛttitaḥ
prasiddhiḥ ca avigāna utthā pratītiḥ śabdana ātmikā

original: AbhT_35.20a/. mātuḥ svabhāvo yattasyāṃ śaṅkate naiṣa jātucit /
analyzed: mātuḥ svabhāvaḥ yat tasyām śaṅkate na eṣa jātucit
sva kṛta tva vaśāt eva sarva vid sa hi śaṅkaraḥ
yāvat tu śiva tā nā asya tāvat sva ātma anusāriṇīm
tāvatīm eva tām eṣa prasiddhim na abhiśaṅkate
anyasyām abhiśaṅkī syāt bhūyas tām bahu manyate

original: AbhT_35.22b/. evaṃ bhāviśivatvo@mūṃ prasiddhiṃ manyate dhruvam // 22
analyzed: evam bhāvi śiva tva umūm prasiddhim manyate dhruvam
ekaḥ eva āgamaḥ ca ayam vibhunā sarva darśinā

original: AbhT_35.23b/. darśito yaḥ pravṛtte ca nivṛtte ca pathi sthitaḥ // 23
analyzed: darśitaḥ yaḥ pravṛtte ca nivṛtte ca pathi sthitaḥ
dharma artha kāma mokṣeṣu pūrṇa apūrṇa ādi bhedataḥ
vicitreṣu phaleṣu ekaḥ upāyaḥ śāmbhava āgamaḥ
tasmin viṣaya vaiviktyāt vicitra phala dāyini
citra upāya upadeśaḥ api na virodha āvahaḥ bhavet

original: AbhT_35.26a/. laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ sāṅkhyaṃ yogādi pāñcarātrakam /

analyzed: bauddha ārhata nyāya śāstram padārtha krama tantraṇam
siddhānta tantra śākta ādi sarvam brahma udbhavam yatas
śrī svacchanda ādiṣu proktam sadyojāta ādi bhedataḥ
yathā ekatra api veda ādau tad tad āśrama gāminaḥ
saṃskāra antaram atra api tathā liṅga uddhṛta ādikam
yathā ca tatra pūrvasmin āśrame na uttara āśramāt

original: AbhT_35.29b/. phalameti tathā pāñcarātrādau na śivātmatām // 29
analyzed: phalam eti tathā pāñcarātra ādau na śiva ātma tām
ekaḥ eva āgamaḥ tasmāt tatra laukika śāstrataḥ
prabhṛti ā avaiṣṇavāt bauddhāt śaivāt sarvam hi niṣṭhitam

original: AbhT_35.31a/. tasya yattat paraṃ prāpyaṃ dhāma tat trikaśabditam /
analyzed: tasya yat tat param prāpyam dhāma tat trika śabditam
sarva a vibheda anucchedāt tat eva kulam ucyate
yathā ūrdhva adhara tā bhājsu deha aṅgeṣu vibhediṣu

original: AbhT_35.32b/. ekaṃ prāṇitamevaṃ syāt trikaṃ sarveṣu śāstrataḥ // 32
analyzed: ekam prāṇitam evam syāt trikam sarveṣu śāstrataḥ
śrīmat kālīkule ca uktam pañca srotaḥ vivarjitam
daśa aṣṭādaśa bhedasya sāram etat prakīrtitam

original: AbhT_35.34a/. puṣpe gandhastile tailaṃ dehe jīvo jale@mṛtam /
analyzed: puṣpe gandhaḥ tile tailam dehe jīvaḥ jala imṛtam

original: AbhT_35.34b/. yathā tathaiva śāstrāṇāṃ kulamantaḥ pratiṣṭhitam // 34
analyzed: yathā tathā eva śāstrāṇām kulam antar pratiṣṭhitam
tat ekaḥ eva āgamaḥ yam citraḥ citra idhi kāriṇi
tathā eva sā prasiddhiḥ hi sva yūthya para yūthya gā

original: AbhT_35.36a/. sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ pāñcarātraṃ vedāṃścaiva na nindayet /
analyzed: sāṃkhyam yogam pāñcarātram vedān ca eva na nindayet

original: AbhT_35.36b/. yataḥ śivodbhavāḥ sarva iti svacchandaśāsane // 36
analyzed: yatas śiva udbhavāḥ sarve iti svacchandaśāsane
ekasmāt āgamāt ca ete khaṇḍa khaṇḍāḥ vyapoddhṛtāḥ

original: AbhT_35.37b/. loke syurāgamāstaiśca jano bhrāmyati mohitaḥ // 37
analyzed: loke syuḥ āgamāḥ taiḥ ca janaḥ bhrāmyati mohitaḥ
aneka āgama pakṣe api vācyā viṣaya bhedi tā
avaśyam ūrdhva adhara tā sthityā prāmāṇya siddhaye

original: AbhT_35.39a/. anyathā naiva kasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ siddhyati dhruvam /
analyzed: anyathā nā eva kasya api prāmāṇyam siddhi ati dhruvam
nitya tvam avisaṃvādaḥ iti naḥ māna kāraṇam
asmin aṃśe api amuṣya eva prāmāṇyam syāt tathā uditeḥ
anyathā vyākṛtau kḷptau asatya tve prarocane
atiprasaṅga sarvasya api āgamasya apabādhakaḥ
avaśya upetya iti asmin māne āgama nāmani
avaśya upetyam eva etat śāstra niṣṭhā nirūpaṇam

original: AbhT_35.42b/. pradhāne@ṅge kṛto yatnaḥ phalavānvastuto yataḥ // 42
analyzed: pradhāna iṅge kṛtaḥ yatnaḥ phalavān vastutas yatas
atas asmin yatnavān kaḥ api bhavet śaṃbhu pracoditaḥ

original: AbhT_35.43b/. tatra tatra ca śāstreṣu nyarūpyata maheśinā // 43
analyzed: tatra tatra ca śāstreṣu nyarūpyata maheśinā

original: AbhT_35.44a/. etāvatyadhikārī yaḥ sa durlabha iti sphuṭam /
analyzed: etāvatī adhikārī yaḥ sa durlabhaḥ iti sphuṭam
ittham śrī śambhunāthena mama uktam śāstra melanam
atha śrī tantrāloke ṣaṭtriṃśam āhnikam
āyātiḥ atha śāstrasya
śrī siddha ādi vinirdiṣṭā gurubhiḥ ca nirūpitā

original: AbhT_36.1c/. bhairavo bhairavī devī svacchando lākulo@ṇurāṭ // 1

analyzed: navabhiḥ kramaśas adhītam nava koṭi pravistaram

original: AbhT_36.3a/. etaistato guruḥ koṭimātrāt pādaṃ vitīrṇavān /
analyzed: etaiḥ tatas guruḥ koṭi mātrāt pādam vitīrṇavān

original: AbhT_36.3b/. dakṣādibhya ubhau pādau saṃvartādibhya eva ca // 3
analyzed: dakṣa ādibhyaḥ ubhau pādau saṃvarta ādibhyaḥ eva ca

original: AbhT_36.4a/. pādaṃ ca vāmanādibhyaḥ pādārdhaṃ bhārgavāya ca /
analyzed: pādam ca vāmana ādibhyaḥ pāda ardham bhārgavāya ca

original: AbhT_36.4b/. pādapādaṃ tu balaye pādapādastu yo@paraḥ // 4
analyzed: pāda pādam tu balaye pāda pādaḥ tu yoparaḥ

original: AbhT_36.5a/. siṃhāyārdhaṃ tataḥ śiṣṭāddvau bhāgau vinatābhuve /
analyzed: siṃhāya ardham tatas śiṣṭāt dvau bhāgau vinatā bhuve

original: AbhT_36.5b/. pādaṃ vāsukināgāya khaṇḍāḥ saptadaśa tvamī // 5
analyzed: pādam vāsuki nāgāya khaṇḍāḥ saptadaśa tu amī
svargāt ardham rāvaṇaḥ utha jahre rāma ūrdham api atas
vibhīṣaṇa mukhāt āpa guru śiṣya vidhi kramāt
khaṇḍaiḥ ekāt na viṃśatyā vibhaktam tat abhūt tatas
pādaḥ mūla uddhārau uttara vṛhat uttare tathā kalpaḥ
sāṃhita kalpa skandau anuttaram vyāpakam tridhā tisraḥ

original: AbhT_36.9a/. devyo@tra nirūpyante kramaśo vistāriṇaiva rūpeṇa /
analyzed: devyaḥ atra nirūpyante kramaśas vistāriṇā eva rūpeṇa

original: AbhT_36.9b/. navame pade tu gaṇanā na kāciduktā vyavacchidāhīne // 9
analyzed: navame pade tu gaṇanā na kācid uktā
rāmāt ca lakṣmaṇaḥ tasmāt siddhāḥ tebhyaḥ api dānavāḥ
guhyakāḥ ca tatas tebhyaḥ yoginaḥ nṛ varāḥ tatas

original: AbhT_36.11a/. teṣāṃ krameṇa tanmadhye bhraṣṭaṃ kālāntarādyadā /
analyzed: teṣām krameṇa tad madhye bhraṣṭam kāla antarāt yadā
tadā śrīkaṇṭha nātha ājñā vaśāt siddhā avātaram

original: AbhT_36.12b/. dvayādvaye ca nipuṇāḥ krameṇa śivaśāsane // 12
analyzed: dvaya advaye ca nipuṇāḥ krameṇa śiva śāsane

original: AbhT_36.13a/. ādyasya cānvayo jajñe dvitīyo duhitṛkramāt /
analyzed: ādyasya ca anvayaḥ jajñe dvitīyaḥ duhitṛ kramāt
sa ca ardhatryambaka abhikhyaḥ saṃtānaḥ su pratiṣṭhitaḥ
atas ca ardha catasraḥ utra maṭhikāḥ saṃtati kramāt
śiṣya praśiṣyaiḥ vistīrṇāḥ śata śākham vyavasthitaiḥ
adhyuṣṭa saṃtati srotaḥ sāra bhūta rasa āhṛtim
vidhāya tantrālokaḥ yaḥ syandate sakalān rasān
uktā āyātiḥ upādeya bhāvaḥ nirṇīyate idhunā
atha śrī tantrāloke saptatriṃśam āhnikam
ukta nītyā eva sarvatra vyavahāre pravartite
prasiddhau upajīvyāyām avaśya grāhyaḥ āgamaḥ
yathā laukika dṛṣṭyā anya phala bhāj tad prasiddhitaḥ
samyak vyavaharan tadvat śiva bhāj tad prasiddhitaḥ
tad avaśya grahītavye śāstre sva aṃśa upadeśini
manāk phala ibhyupādeyatamam tad viparītakam
yathā khageśvarī bhāva niḥśaṅka tvāt viṣam vrajet
kṣayam karma sthitiḥ tadvat aśaṅkāt bhairava tvataḥ
yat ārṣe pāta hetu uktam tat asmin vāmaśāsane
āśu siddhyai yatas sarva mārṣam māyā udara sthitam

original: AbhT_37.6a/. tacca yatsarvasarvajñadṛṣṭaṃ taccāpi kiṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tat ca yat sarva sarvajña dṛṣṭam tat ca api kim bhavet
yat aśeṣa upadeśena sūyate inuttaram phalam
yathā adharādhara prokta vastu tattva anuvādataḥ

original: AbhT_37.7b/. uttaraṃ kathitaṃ saṃvitsiddhaṃ taddhi tathā bhavet // 7
analyzed: uttaram kathitam saṃvid siddham tat hi tathā bhavet
apūrṇa sarva vid proktiḥ jñāyate dhara śāsane
ūrdhva śāsana vastu aṃśe dṛṣṭvā api ca samujjhite

original: AbhT_37.9b/. adhaḥ śāstreṣu māyātvaṃ lakṣyate sargarakṣaṇāt // 9
analyzed: adhas śāstreṣu māyā tvam lakṣyate sarga rakṣaṇāt
ṛṣi vākyam bahu kleśam adhruva alpa phalam mitam
na eva pramāṇayet vidvān śaivam eva āgamam śrayet
tat ārṣe pāta hetu uktam tat asmin vāmaśāsane
āśu siddhyai yatas sarva mārṣam māyā udara sthitam
yathā khageśvarī bhāva niḥśaṅka tvāt viṣam vrajet
kṣayam karma sthitiḥ tadvat aśaṅkāt bhairava tvataḥ
etad viparyayāt grāhyam avaśyam śiva śāsanam
dvau āptau tatra ca śrīmat śrīkaṇṭhala kula īśvarau
dvi pravāham idam śāstram mamyak niḥśreyasa pradam
prācyasya tu yathā abhīṣṭa bhoga da tvam api sthitam
tat ca pañcavidham proktam śakti vaicitrya citritam
daśa aṣṭādaśadhā srotaḥ pañcakam yat tatas upi alam
utkṛṣṭam bhairava abhikhyam catuḥṣaṣṭi vibheditam
samūhaḥ pīṭham etat ca dvidhā dakṣiṇa vāmataḥ

original: AbhT_37.19a/. mantro vidyeti tasmācca mudrāmaṇḍalagaṃ dvayam /
analyzed: mantraḥ vidyā iti tasmāt ca mudrā maṇḍala gam dvayam

original: AbhT_37.19b/. mananatrāṇadaṃ yattu mantrākhyaṃ tatra vidyayā // 19
analyzed: manana trāṇa dam yat tu mantra ākhyam tatra vidyayā
upodbalanam āpyāyaḥ sā hi vedya artha bhāsinī

original: AbhT_37.21a/. maṇḍalaṃ sāramuktaṃ hi maṇḍaśrutyā śivāhvayam /

analyzed: evam anyonya saṃbheda vṛtti pīṭha catuṣṭayam
yatas tasmāt bhavet sarvam pīṭhe pīṭhe pi vastutas

original: AbhT_37.22b/. pradhānatvāttasya tasya vastuno bhinnatā punaḥ // 22
analyzed: pradhāna tvāt tasya tasya vastunaḥ bhinna tā punar
kathitā sādhaka indrāṇām tad tad vastu prasiddhaye

original: AbhT_37.23b/. pratyekaṃ taccaturdhaivaṃ maṇḍalaṃ mudrikā tathā // 23
analyzed: pratyekam tat caturdhā evam maṇḍalam mudrikā tathā

original: AbhT_37.24a/. mantro vidyeti ca pīṭhamutkṛṣṭaṃ cottarottam /
analyzed: mantraḥ vidyā iti ca pīṭham utkṛṣṭam ca uttarottam
vidyāpīṭha pradhānam ca siddhayogīśvarīmatam
tasya api paramam sāram mālinīvijaya uttaram
uktam śrī ratnamālāyām etat ca parameśinā
aśeṣa tantra sāram tu vāma dakṣiṇam āśritam
ekatra militam kaulam śrī ṣaḍardhakaśāsane
siddhānte karma bahulam mala māyā ādi rūṣitam
dakṣiṇam raudra karma āḍhyam vāmam siddhi samākulam
su alpa puṇyam bahu kleśam sva pratīti vivarjitam

original: AbhT_37.28b/. mokṣavidyāvihīnaṃ ca vinayaṃ tyaja dūrataḥ // 28
analyzed: mokṣa vidyā vihīnam ca vinayam tyaja dūratas

original: AbhT_37.29a/. yasminkāle ca guruṇā nirvikalpaṃ prakāśitam /
analyzed: yasmin kāle ca guruṇā nirvikalpam prakāśitam

original: AbhT_37.29b/. muktastenaiva kālena yantraṃ tiṣṭhati kevalam // 29
analyzed: muktaḥ tena eva kālena yantram tiṣṭhati kevalam
mayā etat srotasām rūpam anuttara padāt dhruvāt
ārabhya vistareṇa uktam mālinīślokavārtike
jijñāsuḥ tatas evā idam avadhārayitum kṣamaḥ
vayam tu ukta anuvacanam aphalam na ādriyāmahe
ittham dadat anāyāsāt jīvanmukti mahā phalam
yathā īpsita mahā bhoga dātṛ tvena vyavasthitam
ṣaṣ ardha sāram sat śāstram upādeyam idam sphuṭam

original: AbhT_37.33b/. ṣaṭtriṃśatā tattvabalena sūtā yadyapyanantā bhuvanāvalīyam /
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśatā tattva balena sūtāḥ yadi api anantā bhuvana āvaliḥ iyam

original: AbhT_37.33c/. brahmāṇḍamatyantamanoharaṃ tu vaicitryavarjaṃ nahi ramyabhāvaḥ // 33
analyzed: brahmāṇḍam atyanta manoharam tu vaicitrya varjam nahi ramya bhāvaḥ

original: AbhT_37.34a/. bhūrādisaptapurapūrṇatame@pi tasmin manye dvitīyabhuvanaṃ bhavanaṃ sukhasya /
analyzed: bhūḥ ādi sapta pura pūrṇatame api tasmin manye dvitīya bhuvanam bhavanam sukhasya
kva anyatra citra gati sūrya śaśāṅka śobhi rātri indiva prasara bhoga vibhāga bhūṣā
tatra api ca tridiva bhoga mahārgha varṣadvīpa antarāt adhikam eva kumārikāhvam
yatra adharādhara padāt paramam śiva antam āroḍhum api adhikṛtiḥ kṛtinām anarghā

original: AbhT_37.36a/. prākkarmabhogipaśutocitabhogabhājā kiṃ janmanā nanu sukhaikapade@pi dhāmni /
analyzed: prāk karma bhogi paśu tā ucita bhoga bhājā kim janmanā nanu sukha eka pade api dhāmni

original: AbhT_37.36b/. sarvo hi bhāvini paraṃ paritoṣameti saṃbhāvite natu nimeṣiṇi vartamāne // 36
analyzed: sarvaḥ hi bhāvini param paritoṣam eti saṃbhāvite na tu nimeṣiṇi vartamāne

original: AbhT_37.37a/. kanyāhvaye@pi bhuvane@tra paraṃ mahīyān deśaḥ sa yatra kila śāstravarāṇi cakṣuḥ /
analyzed: kanyā āhvaye pi param mahīyān deśaḥ sa yatra kila śāstra varāṇi cakṣuḥ
jāti andha sadmani na janma na

original: AbhT_37.38a/. niḥśeṣaśāstrasadanaṃ kila madhyadeśastasminnajāyata guṇābhyadhiko dvijanmā /
analyzed: niḥśeṣa śāstra sadanam kila madhyadeśaḥ tasmin ajāyata guṇa abhyadhikaḥ dvijanmā
kopyatriguptaḥ iti nāma nirukta gotraḥ śāstra abdhi carvaṇa kalā udyat agastya gotraḥ

original: AbhT_37.39a/. tamatha lalitādityo rājā nijaṃ puramānayat praṇayarabhasāt kaśmīrākhyaṃ himālayamūrdhagam /
analyzed: tam atha lalitādityaḥ rājā nijam puram ānayat praṇaya rabhasāt kaśmīra ākhyam himālaya mūrdha gam

original: AbhT_37.39b/. adhivasati yadgaurīkāntaḥ karairvijayādibhiryugapadakhilaṃ bhogāsāraṃ rasāt paricarcitum // 39
analyzed: adhivasati yat gaurī kāntaḥ karaiḥ vijaya ādibhiḥ yugapad akhilam bhoga āsāram rasāt paricarcitum

original: AbhT_37.40a/. sthāne sthāne munibhirakhilaiścakrire yannivāsā yaccādhyāste pratipadamidaṃ sa svayaṃ candracūḍaḥ /
analyzed: sthāne sthāne munibhiḥ akhilaiḥ cakrire yad nivāsāḥ yat ca adhyāste pratipadam idam sa svayam candracūḍaḥ

original: AbhT_37.40b/. tanmanye@haṃ samabhilaṣitāśeṣasiddhernasiddhyai kaśmīrebhyaḥ paramatha puraṃ pūrṇavṛtterna tuṣṭyai // 40
analyzed: tat manye iham samabhilaṣita aśeṣa siddheḥ na siddhyai kaśmīrebhyaḥ param atha puram pūrṇa vṛtteḥ na tuṣṭyai

original: AbhT_37.41a/. yatra svayaṃ śāradacandraśubhrā śrīśāradeti prathitā janeṣu /
analyzed: yatra svayam śārada candra śubhrā śrīśāradā iti prathitā janeṣu
śāṇḍilya sevā rasa su prasannā sarvam janam svaiḥ vibhavaiḥ yunakti
nāraṅga aruṇa kānti pāṇḍu vikacat balla avadāta chavi prodbhinna amala mātuluṅga kanaka chāyā abhirāma prabham
kerī kuntala kandalī pratikṛti śyāma prabhā bhāsvaram yasmin śakti catuṣṭaya ujjvala malam madyam mahābhairavam

original: AbhT_37.43a/. trinayanamahākopajvālāvilīna iha sthito madanaviśikhavrāto madyacchalena vijṛmbhate /
analyzed: trinayana mahā kopa jvālā vilīnaḥ iha sthitaḥ madana viśikha vrātaḥ madya chalena vijṛmbhate

original: AbhT_37.43b/. kathamitarathā rāgaṃ mohaṃ madaṃ madanajvaraṃ vidadhadaniśaṃ kāmātaṅkairvaśīkurute jagat // 43
analyzed: katham itarathā rāgam moham madam madana jvaram vidadhat aniśam kāma ātaṅkaiḥ vaśīkurute jagat

original: AbhT_37.44a/. yatkāntānāṃ praṇayavacasi prauḍhimānaṃ vidatte yannirvighnaṃ nidhuvanavidhau sādhvasaṃ saṃdhunoti /
analyzed: yat kāntānām praṇaya vacasi prauḍhimānam vidatte yat nirvighnam nidhuvana vidhau sādhvasam saṃdhunoti

original: AbhT_37.44b/. yasmin viśvāḥ kalitarucayo devatāścakracaryastanmārdvīkaṃ sapadi tanute yatra bhogāpabargau // 44
analyzed: yasmin viśvāḥ kalita rucayaḥ devatāḥ cakracaryaḥ tat mārdvīkam sapadi tanute yatra bhoga apabargau
udyat gaura aṅkura vikasitaiḥ śyāma raktaiḥ palāśaiḥ antar gāḍha aruṇa ruci lasat kesara ālī vicitraiḥ

original: AbhT_37.45b/. ākīrṇā bhūḥ pratipadamasau yatra kāśmīrapuṣpaiḥ samyagdevītritayayajanodyānamāviṣkaroti // 45
analyzed: ākīrṇā bhūḥ pratipadam asau yatra kāśmīra puṣpaiḥ samyak devī tritaya yajana udyānam āviṣkaroti

original: AbhT_37.46a/. sarvo lokaḥ kaviratha budho yatra śūro@pi vāgmī candroddyotā masṛṇagatayaḥ pauranāryaśca yatra /
analyzed: sarvaḥ lokaḥ kaviḥ atha budhaḥ yatra śūraḥ api vāgmī candra uddyotāḥ masṛṇa gatayaḥ paura nāryaḥ ca yatra
yatra aṅgāra ujjvala vikasita ananta sauṣumṇa mārga grasta arka induḥ gagana vimalaḥ yoginīnām ca vargaḥ

original: AbhT_37.47a/. śrīmatparaṃ pravaranāma puraṃ ca tatra yannirmame pravarasena iti kṣitīśaḥ /
analyzed: śrīmat param pravara nāma puram ca tatra yat nirmame pravara senaḥ iti kṣitīśaḥ
yaḥ sva pratiṣṭhita maheśvara pūjana ante vyoma utpatan udasṛjat kila dhūpa ghaṇṭām

original: AbhT_37.48a/. āndolanoditamanoharavīranādaiḥ sā cāsya tatsucaritaṃ prathayāṃbabhūva /
analyzed: āndolana udita manohara vīra nādaiḥ sā ca asya tat su caritam prathayāṃbabhūva

original: AbhT_37.48b/. sadvṛttasāragurutaijasamūrtayo hi tyaktā api prabhuguṇānadhikaṃ dhvananti // 48
analyzed: sat vṛtta sāra guru taijasa mūrtayaḥ hi tyaktāḥ api prabhu guṇa anadhikam dhvananti
proddhūta vetasa latā sita cāmara oghaiḥ ājya abhiṣekam aniśam dadatī smarasya
rodhaḥ pratiṣṭhita maheśvara siddha liṅga svāyaṃbhuva arcana vilepana gandha puṣpaiḥ

original: AbhT_37.51b/. nyakkurvatī harapinākakalāvatīrṇā yadbhūṣayatyavirataṃ taṭinī vitastā // 51
analyzed: nyakkurvatī hara pināka kalā avatīrṇā yat bhūṣayati aviratam taṭinī vitastā
tasmin kuvera pura cāri siṃtā aṃśumauli sāṃmukhya darśana virūḍha pavitra bhāve

original: AbhT_37.52b/. vaitastarodhasi nivāsamamuṣya cakre rājā dvijasya parikalpitabhūrisaṃpat // 52
analyzed: vaitasta rodhasi nivāsam amuṣya cakre rājā dvijasya parikalpita bhūri saṃpad

original: AbhT_37.53a/. tasyānvaye mahati ko@pi varāhaguptanāmā babhūva bhagavān svayamantakāle /
analyzed: tasya anvaye mahati kaḥ pi varāhagupta nāmā babhūva bhagavān svayam antakāle
gīrvāṇa sindhu laharī kalita agra mūrdhā yasya akarot param anugraham āgraheṇa
tasya ātmajaḥ cukhalaka iti jane prasiddhaḥ candra avadāta dhiṣaṇaḥ narasiṃhaguptaḥ

original: AbhT_37.54b/. yaṃ sarvaśāstrarasamajjanaśubhracittaṃ māheśvarī paramalaṃkurute sma bhaktiḥ // 54
analyzed: yam sarva śāstra rasa majjana śubhra cittam māheśvarī param alaṃkurute sma bhaktiḥ
tāruṇya sāgara taraṅga bharān apohya vairāgya potam adhiruhya dṛḍham haṭhena

original: AbhT_37.55b/. yo bhaktirohaṇamavāpya maheśacintāratnairalaṃ dalayati sma bhavāpadastāḥ // 55
analyzed: yaḥ bhakti rohaṇam avāpya maheśa cintā ratnaiḥ alam dalayati sma bhava āpadaḥ tāḥ
tasya ātmajaḥ ubhinavaguptaḥ iti prasiddhaḥ śrī candracūḍa caraṇa abja parāga pūtaḥ

original: AbhT_37.56b/. mātā vyayūyujadamuṃ kila bālya eva daivaṃ hi bhāviparikarmaṇi saṃskaroti // 56
analyzed: mātā vyayūyujat amum kila bālye eva daivam hi bhāvi parikarmaṇi saṃskaroti

original: AbhT_37.57a/. mātā paraṃ bandhuriti pravādaḥ snoho@tigāḍhīkurute hi pāśān /
analyzed: mātā param bandhuḥ iti pravādaḥ snohā uti gāḍhīkurute hi pāśān

original: AbhT_37.57b/. tanmūlabandhe galite kilāsya manye sthitā jīvata eva muktiḥ // 57
analyzed: tad mūla bandhe galite kila asya manye sthitā jīvataḥ eva muktiḥ
pitrā sa śabda gahane kṛta saṃpraveśaḥ tarkārṇava ūrmi pṛṣata amala pūta cittaḥ
sāhitya sāndra rasa bhoga paraḥ maheśa bhaktyā svayaṃgrahaṇa durmadayā gṛhītaḥ

original: AbhT_37.59a/. sa tanmayībhūya na lokavartanīmajīgaṇat kāmapi kevalaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: sa tanmayībhūya na loka vartanīm ajīgaṇat kām api kevalam punar

original: AbhT_37.59b/. tadīyasaṃbhogavivṛddhaye purā karoti dāsyaṃ guruveśmasu svayam // 59
analyzed: tadīya saṃbhoga vivṛddhaye purā karoti dāsyam guru veśmasu svayam
turya ākhya saṃtati mahodadhi pūrṇa candraḥ śrī somataḥ sakala vid kila śaṃbhu nāthaḥ
anye api dharma śiva vāmanaka udbhaṭa śrī bhūteśa bhāskara mukha pramukhāḥ mahāntaḥ

original: AbhT_37.63a/. ete sevārasaviracitānugrahāḥ śāstrasārapauḍhādeśaprakaṭasubhagaṃ svādhikāraṃ kilāsmai /
analyzed: ete sevā rasa viracita anugrahāḥ śāstra sāra pauḍhā deśa prakaṭa subhagam sva adhikāram kila asmai

original: AbhT_37.63b/. yat saṃprāduryadapi ca janānnaikṣatākṣetrabhūtān svātmārāmastadayamaniśaṃ tattvasevāraso@bhūt // 63
analyzed: yat saṃprāduḥ yat api ca janān na aikṣata a kṣetra bhūtān sva ātma ārāmaḥ tat ayam aniśam tattva sevā rasaḥ bhūt
saḥ anugrahītum atha śāṃbhava bhakti bhājam svam bhrātaram akhila śāstra vimarśa pūrṇam

original: AbhT_37.64b/. yāvanmanaḥ praṇidadhāti manorathākhyaṃ tāvajjanaḥ katipayastamupāsasāda // 64
analyzed: yāvat manaḥ praṇidadhāti manoratha ākhyam tāvat janaḥ katipayaḥ tam upāsasāda

original: AbhT_37.65a/. śrīśaurisaṃjñatanayaḥ kila karṇanāmā yo yauvane viditaśāṃbhavatattvasāraḥ /
analyzed: śrī śauri saṃjña tanayaḥ kila karṇa nāmā yaḥ yauvane vidita śāṃbhava tattva sāraḥ

original: AbhT_37.65b/. dehaṃ tyajan prathayati sma janasya satyaṃ yogacyutaṃ prati mahāmunikṛṣṇavākyam // 65
analyzed: deham tyajan prathayati sma janasya satyam yoga cyutam prati mahā muni kṛṣṇa vākyam

original: AbhT_37.66a/. tadbālamitramatha mantrisutaḥ prasiddhaḥ śrīmandra ityakhilasāraguṇābhirāmaḥ /
analyzed: tad bāla mitram atha mantri sutaḥ prasiddhaḥ śrī mandraḥ iti akhila sāra guṇa abhirāmaḥ

original: AbhT_37.66b/. lakṣmīsarasvati samaṃ yamalaṃcakāra sāpatnakaṃ tirayate subhagaprabhāvaḥ // 66
analyzed: lakṣmī sarasvati samam yam alaṃcakāra sāpatnakam tirayate subhaga prabhāvaḥ
anye pitṛvya tanayāḥ śiva śakti śubhrāḥ kṣema utpala abhinava cakraka padma guptāḥ

original: AbhT_37.67b/. ye saṃpadaṃ tṛṇamamaṃsata śaṃbhusevāsaṃpūritaṃ svahṛdayaṃ hṛdi bhāvayantaḥ // 67
analyzed: ye saṃpadam tṛṇam amaṃsata śaṃbhu sevā saṃpūritam sva hṛdayam hṛdi bhāvayantaḥ
ṣaṣ ardha śāstreṣu samastam eva yena adhijagme vidhi maṇḍala ādi
sa rāmaguptaḥ guru śaṃbhu śāstra sevā vidhi vyagra samagra mārgaḥ
anyaḥ api kaścana janaḥ śiva śaktipāta saṃpreraṇā paravaśa svaka śakti sārthaḥ

original: AbhT_37.69b/. abhyarthanāvimukhabhāvamaśikṣitena tenāpyanugrahapadaṃ kṛta eṣa vargaḥ // 69
analyzed: abhyarthanā vimukha bhāvam aśikṣitena tena api anugraha padam kṛtaḥ eṣa vargaḥ

original: AbhT_37.70a/. ācāryamabhyarthayate sma gāḍhaṃ saṃpūrṇatantrādhigamāya samyak /
analyzed: ācāryam abhyarthayate sma gāḍham saṃpūrṇa tantra adhigamāya samyak
jāyeta daiva anugṛhīta buddheḥ saṃpad prabandha eka rasā eva saṃpad

original: AbhT_37.71a/. so@pyabhyupāgamadabhīpsitamasya yadvā svātodyameva hi ninartiṣato@vatīrṇam /
analyzed: saḥ upi abhyupāgamat abhīpsitam asya yat vā svātodyam eva hi

original: AbhT_37.71b/. so@nugrahapravaṇa eva hi sadgurūṇāmājñāvaśena śubhasūtimahāṅkureṇa // 71
analyzed: saḥ anugraha pravaṇaḥ eva hi sat gurūṇām ājñā vaśena śubha sūti mahā aṅkureṇa

original: AbhT_37.72a/. vikṣiptabhāvaparihāramatho cikīrṣan mandraḥ svake puravare sthitimasya vavre /
analyzed: vikṣipta bhāva parihāram atho cikīrṣan mandraḥ svake pura vare sthitim asya vavre

original: AbhT_37.72b/. ābālagopamapi yatra maheśvarasya dāsyaṃ janaścarati pīṭhanivāsakalpe // 72
analyzed: ā bāla gopam api yatra maheśvarasya dāsyam janaḥ carati pīṭha nivāsa kalpe

original: AbhT_37.73a/. tasyābhavat kila pitṛvyavadhūrvidhātrā yā nirmame galitasaṃsṛticitracintā /
analyzed: tasya abhavat kila pitṛvya vadhūḥ vidhātrā yā nirmame galita saṃsṛti citra cintā

original: AbhT_37.74a/. mūrtā kṣameva karuṇeva gṛhītadehā dhāreva vigrahavatī śubhaśīlatāyāḥ /
analyzed: mūrtā kṣamā iva karuṇā iva gṛhīta dehā dhārā iva vigrahavatī śubha śīla tāyāḥ
vairāgya sāra paripāka daśā iva pūrṇā tattva artha ratna rucira sthiti rohaṇa urvī

original: AbhT_37.75a/. bhrātāpi tasyāḥ śaśiśubhramaulerbhaktyā paraṃ pāvitacittavṛttiḥ /
analyzed: bhrātā api tasyāḥ śaśi śubhra mauleḥ bhaktyā param pāvita cittavṛttiḥ
sa śauriḥ ātta īśvara mantri bhāvaḥ tatyāja yaḥ bhūpati mantri bhāvam
tasya snuṣā karṇa vadhūḥ vidhūta saṃsāra vṛttiḥ sutam ekam eva
yā asūta yogeśvaridatta saṃjñam nāma anurūpa sphurat artha tattvam

original: AbhT_37.77a/. yāmagrage vayasi bhartṛviyogadīnāmanvagrahīt trinayanaḥ svayameva bhaktyā /
analyzed: yām agrage vayasi bhartṛ viyoga dīnām anvagrahīt trinayanaḥ svayam eva bhaktyā

original: AbhT_37.77b/. bhāviprabhāvarabhaseṣu janeṣvanarthaḥ satyaṃ samākṛṣati so@rthaparamparāṇām // 77
analyzed: bhāvi prabhāva rabhaseṣu janeṣu anarthaḥ satyam samākṛṣati saḥ ūrtha paramparāṇām

original: AbhT_37.78a/. bhaktyullasatpulakatāṃ sphuṭamaṅgabhūṣāṃ śrīśaṃbhunāthanatimeva lalāṭikāṃ ca /
analyzed: bhakti ullasat pulaka tām sphuṭam aṅga bhūṣām śrī śaṃbhu nātha natim eva lalāṭikām ca

original: AbhT_37.78b/. śaivaśrutiṃ śravaṇabhūṣaṇamapyavāpya saubhāgyamabhyadhikamudvahati sma yāntaḥ // 78
analyzed: śaiva śrutim śravaṇa bhūṣaṇam api avāpya saubhāgyam abhyadhikam udvahati sma yāntaḥ

original: AbhT_37.79a/. ambābhidhānā kila sā guruṃ taṃ svaṃ bhrātaraṃ śaṃbhudṛśābhyapaśyat /
analyzed: ambā abhidhānā kila sā gurum tam svam bhrātaram śaṃbhu dṛśā abhyapaśyat
bhāvi prabhāva ujjvala bhavya buddhiḥ satas vajānāti na bandhu buddhyā

original: AbhT_37.80a/. bhrātā tadīyo@bhinavaśca nāmnā na kevalaṃ saccaritairapi svaiḥ /
analyzed: bhrātā tadīyaḥ abhinavaḥ ca nāmnā na kevalam sat caritaiḥ api svaiḥ

original: AbhT_37.80b/. pītena vijñānarasena yasya tatraiva tṛṣṇā vavṛdhe nikāmam // 80
analyzed: pītena vijñāna rasena yasya tatra eva tṛṣṇā vavṛdhe nikāmam
saḥ nyaḥ ca śāṃbhava marīci caya praṇaśyat saṃkoca hārda nalinī ghaṭita ujjvala śrīḥ

original: AbhT_37.81b/. taṃ lumpakaḥ paricacāra samudyameṣu sādhuḥ samāvahati hanta karāvalambam // 81
analyzed: tam lumpakaḥ paricacāra samudyameṣu sādhuḥ samāvahati hanta kara avalambam

original: AbhT_37.82a/. itthaṃ gṛhe vatsalikāvitīrṇe sthitaḥ samādhāya matiṃ bahūni /
analyzed: ittham gṛhe vatsalikā vitīrṇe sthitaḥ samādhāya matim bahūni

original: AbhT_37.82b/. pūrvaśrutānyākalayan svabuddhyā śāstrāṇi tebhyaḥ samavāpa sāram // 82
analyzed: pūrva śrutāni ākalayan sva buddhyā śāstrāṇi tebhyaḥ samavāpa sāram

original: AbhT_37.83a/. sa tannibandhaṃ vidadhe mahārthaṃ yuktyāgamodīritatantratattvam /
analyzed: sa tad nibandham vidadhe mahā artham yukti āgama udīrita tantra tattvam

original: AbhT_37.83b/. ālokamāsādya yadīyameṣa lokaḥ sukhaṃ saṃcaritā kriyāsu // 83
analyzed: ālokam āsādya yadi iyam eṣa lokaḥ sukham saṃcaritā kriyāsu

original: AbhT_37.84a/. santo@nugṛhṇīta kṛtiṃ tadīyāṃ hṛhṇīta pūrvaṃ vidhireṣa tāvat /
analyzed: santaḥ anugṛhṇīta kṛtim tadīyām hṛhṇīta pūrvam vidhiḥ eṣa tāvat

original: AbhT_37.84b/. tato@pi gṛhṇātu bhavanmatiṃ sā sadyo@nugṛhṇātu ca tattvadṛṣṭyā // 84
analyzed: tatas api gṛhṇātu bhavat matim sā sadyas nugṛhṇātu ca tattva dṛṣṭyā

original: AbhT_37.85a/. idamabhinavaguptaprombhitaṃ śāstrasāraṃ śiva niśamaya tāvat sarvataḥśrotratantraḥ /
analyzed: idam abhinavagupta prombhitam śāstra sāram śiva niśamaya tāvat sarvatas śrotra tantraḥ

original: AbhT_37.85b/. tava kila nutireṣā sā hi tvadrūpacarcetyabhinavaparituṣṭo lokamātmīkuruṣva // 85
analyzed: tava kila nutiḥ eṣā sā hi tvad rūpa carcā iti abhinava parituṣṭaḥ lokam ātmīkuruṣva
